40001001	Ashin na be fee gbe lè ūbū lihwan Ujeso Ukristi angwu a ma yi igia Udebid, u shi igia Ebraham.
40001002	Ebraham a ma yi ātyām Azik; Azik u shi atyam Ujekob; Ujekob u shi atyam Ujuda lè bebwende.
40001003	Ujuda a ma yi atyam Uperez befe lè Uzera abe be ko andabell le Utama; Uperez u shi atyam Uhezeron; Uhezeron u shi atyam Aram.
40001004	Aram a ma yi atyam Aminadab; Aminadab u shi atyam Unashon; Unashon u shi atyam Usalmon;
40001005	Usalmon u shi atyam Ubowaz angwu be ko anam le Urehab; Ubowaz a ma yi atyam Ubed angwu be ko anam le Urut; Ubed u shi atyam Ujesi;
40001006	Ujesi u shi atyam Usu Udebid. Udebid a ma yi atyam Usolomon angwu anam a ma yi ungye Uraya;
40001007	Usolomon a ma yi atyam Urehebom; Urehebom u shi atyam Abia; Abia u shi atyam Asa.
40001008	Asa a ma yi atyam Ujehoshafat; Ujehoshafat u shi atyam Ujoram; Ujoram u shi atyam Uzaya.
40001009	Uzaya a ma yi atyam Ujotam; Ujotam u shi atyam Ahaz; Ahaz u shi atyam Uhezekaya.
40001010	Uhezekaya a ma yi atyam Umanasa; Umanasa u shi atyam Amon; Amon u shi atyam Ujosaya.
40001011	Ujosaya a hwan Ujekonaya lè bebwende mà ukpong bendi-linaa Izwell be hà kwu kung bendi Izwell gye he 'ubong Ubabilon.
40001012	Nya a na bendi Izwell be ma yi he Ubabilon, Ujekonaya a hwan Ushiatell; Ushiatell a ma yi atyam Uzerebabel;
40001013	Uzerebabel u shi atyam Abiyud; Abiyud u shi atyam Eliakim; Eliakim u shi atyam Azor.
40001014	Azor a ma yi atyam Uzadok; Uzadok u shi atyam Akim; Akim u shi atyam Ilayud.
40001015	Ilayud a ma yi atyam Eliyeza; Eliyeza u shi atyam Umatan; Umatan u shi atyam Ujekob.
40001016	Ujekob a ma yi atyam Ujosef angwu a ma yi ukyebb Umeri. Umeri a hwan Ujeso angwu be ko le Ukristi, Undi-likpan.
40001017	Ki ma yi lè īgbè bendi lihwo lè ngi inde kung lè ha Ebraham be wu ha Udebid; ki shi lè īgbè bendi lihwo lè ngi inde kung lè ha Udebid be wu he 'unyong ahwu be kwu kung bendi Izwell gye he abwo lifee he Ubabilon; ki shi lè īgbè bendi lihwo lè ngi inde kung lè he 'unyong ahwu be ma yi he abwo lifee be wu he 'unyong ahwu be hwan Ujeso Ukristi.
40001018	Ashin na 'ì yi 'ukwo ahwu be ma hwan Ujeso Ukristi. Ujosef a ma kyebb le u ba kpebb Umeri angwu ù yi anam Ujeso. Mà ukpong Umeri a ma hà lè bee lè he, a ngye le a shi lizam gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim.
40001019	Ukyema Ujosef a ma yi undi ununung a. A ma kee le u fa he ishwia he 'uhwo he 'ugbo ye. Fe na a ma shi ugim le u ban úkyébb uma he 'undyell.
40001020	Nya a na a maa gim gbe lè 'imen ashin, udengell Unim a be kong ha ahe he itam, le Ujosef angwu lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Udebid ù shell ná ù kpebb Umeri ye. Ukatia Kunyong Unim na a shi-e a shi lizam.
40001021	U ba hwan unwaa ungikye; Ujosef ù kwu-e lizen le Ujeso likorye u ba kpan bendi bema lè he biban bibell.
40001022	Abin puu bi ma shi nya a na Unim a kong gbe ha undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom 'ima leěti. A ma kong le:
40001023	"Unwaasul angwu a wa ngye ungikye ye, u ba sha lizam hwan unwaa ungikye. Be ba ko he le Imandyell." (Lizen anyin li ze le, "Unim ù yi utung ha abel.")
40001024	He 'unyong ahwu Ujosef a ma wum lè he 'unde, a shi nya a na udengell Unim a de-e. A ma kpebb Umeri.
40001025	A tem ndē ipel ha ahe mà ukpong a hà hwan unwaa umen ana ye. Ujosef a ma kwu-e lizen le Ujeso.
40002001	Be ma hwan Ujeso he Betelehem he 'ubong Ujudia he 'unyong ahwu Uherod a ma yi usu há. Ki gbe 'igbe ye, bendi abe be bi lishi abe be ma ngye gbe lè ikpen be ma bo lè he 'igie he 'ipi libwee lı fem gye he Ujeruselem.
40002002	Be lè bii le: "Unwaa angwu be hwan le ù kwu usu Ijuus ù yi hung a? Li ndè ukpen uma a fem lè he 'igie he 'ipi libwee lı fem. Li be le lî be fe-e."
40002003	Nyong Usu Uherod a gyo ashin gyo-gyo, ufung a maa fel waa he 'itaa 'imen lè bendi puu he Ujeruselem.
40002004	A ko bekaandi puu abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be he 'iteng ken. A bii ābe le, he hung be be hwan Ukristi?
40002005	Be fan he le: "Be ba hwan he he Betelehem he 'ubong Ujudia. Kife na undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a fee leěti le:
40002006	'Men bendi Betelehem he 'ubong Ujudia, men na ma dyam hwò bekaandi abe he Ujudia puu, likorye lè he lishi līmen na unwan ken u be kwu usu, angwu u be kam bendi begi, Izwell.' "
40002007	Uherod a ko begaandi abe be ma be lè he 'igie he 'ipi libwee lı fem ana gye azu he 'undyell lè bii ābe 'unyong ahwu ukpen a fem.
40002008	A hà som ābe gye he Betelehem lè utebb anwun. A de le: "Mà lè shun unwaa umen anwun tyuo-tyuo-tyuo. Gbe ma nde-e, ma tem be de-m he-m mi or titi mì lè fe-e."
40002009	Be hà gbè. Ukpen umen angwu be ma ndè lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı fem ana, a teng ābe kpamm lè wu he 'iteng 'imen ashi unwaa ù yi.
40002010	Be ma yi lè igor kangg ná be ma ndè ukpen a naa.
40002011	Be hà gye he afee ushom lè ndè unwaa lè anam, Umeri. Be tim anung he itang fe unwaa. Be ngwee abwo he ibam ibell, ke-e beke bekaandi. Beke abe be ke-e bè yi 'índe ashi 'i ngbebb 'unung hwò puu ashi be ko le igold, lè behwu abe be nung nyin, abe be ko le ifrankisens lè umuru.
40002012	Unim a ke be utebb he itam le bè tem lè gbè he 'ipi Uherod ye. Be fel gbe he 'ukwo 'ususo a gye he 'ubong 'ubell.
40002013	Be gbe-gbe, itam i shi Ujosef. He itam udengell Atyetyan Unim a be hwaa lè he de-e le, ù bo 'inaa he-e ù kung unwaa lè anam unwaa buu lè be gye he 'ubong Igyept lè kwu há kpamm u gbe de-e le be bo lè há. Uherod u fel ba kee unwaa he-e ù gwu-e.
40002014	Ujosef a kung wum lè he 'unde, u bo 'inaa kung unwaa befe lè anam unwaa nya lè 'usu bo ndo he Igyept.
40002015	A ma kwu há kpamm Uherod u gbe hwō. A shi nya a na Unim a kong gbe ha undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom 'ima leěti. A ma kong le: "Mi be lè Unwaa-gi lè he Igyept."
40002016	Uherod a ndè le begaandi abena be lam he. A fel he ingywo kangg. A kung uten tye le bè gwu mbee bebwaa bengikye abe kung lè he aze afee be he itang abe he Betelehem lè ashi abong angi à yi gwaa ha abe. A ma shi āshi keè ha 'unyong ahwu begaandi be de-e le be ndè ukpen.
40002017	He 'ukwo 'umen i na 'iwom 'i shi nya a na Ujeremaya angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong leěti.
40002018	A ma kong le: "Be gyo 'ihwuhwee lihwu he Urama. Urechell u kya bebwaa-ma. U kya kangg le be tie lè he, u bong ye, likorye bebwaa-ma be hwō mbee."
40002019	Uherod a hwō. Itam i hà shi Ujosef há he Igyept. He itam udengell Atyetyan Unim a be,
40002020	de-e le ù bo 'inaa he-e ù kung unwaa befe lè anam unwaa tem gye he 'ubong bendi Izwell. Abe be maa kee unwaa le hè be bè gwu be hwō mà.
40002021	Ujosef a wum lè he 'unde, u bo 'inaa kung unwaa befe lè anam unwaa tem gye he 'ubong bendi Izwell.
40002022	A gyo le unwaa Uherod angwu be ko le Akeleyes a fel usu lishi atyam he Ujudia. He atan-lengi anwun a maa fel shell ná u lè ndē há. Itam isuso i mbee shi-e. Unim a ma ke-e utebb, a bo gye he 'ubong Ugalili,
40002023	lè ndē he 'ipi ashi be ko le Unazaret. Ki shi nya a na bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be kong leěti a. Be ma kong le bendi be ba kong le ù yi Unazarin.
40003001	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a be kpi 'isom Unim abunale he libeb he 'ubong Ujudia le,
40003002	bendi bè bel àtyám lè he biban bibell likorye 'unyong 'u fel kpee-kpee ahwu bendi be nde ná Unim u fem Kusu 'uma he igye.
40003003	Ufe na Azaya, undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim, a maa kong gbe lè he le: "Undi u ba gaa lè he libeb le, 'Mà kam 'ukwo Atyetyan ndor he. Mà shi 'ukwo ahwu 'u ngbebb ndor he he-e ù be gbè.' "
40003004	Ujon a maa fa inditen angi be shì āngi lè indib inyia angi be ko le 'itokaba a, u bua ukwob inyia he anyong. Lizi lima li ma yi igwom lè ìhwaà.
40003005	Bendi be maa ba lè he Ujeruselem lè ashi Ujudia puu lè ashi angi gwaa ha umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Ujodan ba hwaa lè he.
40003006	Be maa bun biban bibell kong. Ujon u kib ābe he umbwo ukaandi Ujodan.
40003007	Ujon a ndè bendi gbamm lè he likwu Iferesis lè Isadusis be be le ù kib ābe he umbwo. A bii ābe le: "Ayang a tebb amen abe mà yi ná ìshiı ibibi le mà buu hwaa lè he ingywo Unim angi i ndo be ukpor?"
40003008	A mbee de le: "Mà kwu ná ìkwán angi ı wum agbe anunung hè men mà tyung le ma bel lè he biban bīmen.
40003009	Mà fel tam pwom ungwu le bwo Ebraham ù yi atiemen a ye. Mà ngye dangg le Unim ù yi lè ikeb le u sha akor anyin a bel igia Ebraham.
40003010	Lìkee li fel kwu nyong lî wob ìkwán lè idaa lè idaa a. Ùkwán uyang-yang angwu a wum agbe anunung ye, be ba wob he fa he 'inde.
40003011	Undi angwu u be-m lè há item ù yi undi ukaandi hwo-m. Mi kpee he he 'ubee or ye. Mi-i kib amen he umbwo, ufe u ba kib amen he Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu lè 'ìndē.
40003012	Men mà yi ná ityungkafa. Ufe ù yi lè 'udiya 'uma kwu he 'ubwo. U ba kpam ityungkafa, u puu kung igyang angyell fe he libel, ukpor u ba kung abia ángi ting sha he 'índe ashi 'ı nim ye ngyor igye kpamm."
40003013	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a kung bo lè he Ugalili lè hwaa lè Ujon he umbwo ukaandi Ujodan le Ujon ù kib he he umbwo.
40003014	Ujon a ma kaa he-e ù shi-e ù gie ugim uma. Ujon a bii he le: "Wo angwu hang wo kib mi he umbwo, fe wò be le mi mì kib-a a?"
40003015	Ujeso a de-e le: "Kib mi he umbwo he 'unyong ahwun likorye 'ukwo 'umen i na lı shi ashi Unim a kee." Ujon a hà bong.
40003016	A kib Ujeso he umbwo kib-kib, a kung fem lè há. Lifung-atabe li kung buu. Ujeso a ndè Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be ná 'alulu so-e he lishi.
40003017	Be gyo lingmam Unim lè he lifung-atabe le: "Anwun ù yi 'iken Unwaa-gi a. Ki nyin mi lè he 'indee-indee."
40004001	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a kung teng Ujeso gbe ndo he libeb hè usu bibibi ù gil he.
40004002	Ujeso a lè kwu há ati asi afee lè 'usu asi afee faale lizi azele. Itung i fel ndo he.
40004003	Usu bibibi a kung be hwaa lè he, be de-e le: "Ndo shi akor anyin à bel lizi ka-a ha-a à zī a, gbé wo de le wò yi Unwaa Unim a."
40004004	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le undigye u kpan gba he lizi azele life-life a ye.Undi u kpan gba he igie iyang-yang angi Unim a kong a."
40004005	Usu bibibi a kung Ujeso gye lè he he Ujeruselem. A te lè he lè pwom he lishi 'uto 'usi he Ushom Unim,
40004006	u de-e le: "Geb lè nyin gye he itang, gbé wo de le wò yi Unwaa Unim a. Kì yi le be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le Unim u ba ndor idengell ima le ì kpa-a tyang. I ba kwa-a he abwo ndor he 'usi, ha-a à ti 'ubee or fe he 'ukor ye."
40004007	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le undi ù shī gil Atyam Unim ye."
40004008	Usu bibibi a hà te lè he lè naa he lishi ukwell 'usi, a tyung he abong igye puu lè 'itaa a dyam lè kwom.
40004009	A de-e le: "Gbe wo tim anung he itang fe-m, mi kung āngi puu ka-a."
40004010	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Usetan, gbe-m lè nyin. Be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le undigye ù pee Atyam Unim, u ke-e ufe-ufe a ife."
40004011	Usu bibibi a hà tyang he. Idengell Unim i be kpell he.
40004012	Ujeso a gyo le Uherod a kwu Ujon fe he igaadye. A hà kung gbe ndo he 'ubong Ugalili.
40004013	A kwu he lishi Unazaret ye. A lè ndē he lishi angi be ko le Ukapanyam angi gwaa ha umbwo Ugalili. Itang angi há i ma yi itang bendi Uzebulon befe lè Unafatali a.
40004014	Ki ma shi nya a na Azaya angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong a. A ma de le:
40004015	"Itang Uzebulon befe lè Unafatali angi ì yi lè he igbindi umbwo Ujodan, kubong Ugalili he 'ipi ashi bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye be ndē gbamm,
40004016	há na bendi abe bè yi he 'ifufebb be ndè 'ikung-gbo 'ikaandi. Kikung-gbo 'i taa tyung bendi abe bè yi he 'ifufebb 'igyang ashi kpenn."
40004017	Kung lè há he 'unyong 'umen ana na Ujeso a ma keb abunale de bendi le bè bel àtyám lè he biban bibell likorye baale be nde ná Unim u fem Kusu 'uma he igye.
40004018	Nya a na Ujeso a maa tan gbe he ungwu umbwo Ugalili, a ndè bekwu-ikwan, bendi befee, abe be ko le Andru lè Usaimun angwu be mbee ko le Ipita. Bè yi bebwanam bende a. Be maa tyang 'ataa há he umbwo kwa ìkwǎn.
40004019	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà be pwom mi, mî hwua amen ná mà tan ko bendi ke-m."
40004020	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo be tyang litaa libell ndor he itang pwom he.
40004021	A mbee tan te 'ushu lè ndè bebwanam bende, bendi befee. Be ma yi bebwaa Uzebedi abe be ko le Ujems lè Ujon a. Be ma yi he afee 'inong lishor utung ha atyabell Uzebedi, be bwee litaa libell. Ujeso a kung ko ābe.
40004022	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo be tyang 'inong 'ibell lè atyabell pwom he.
40004023	Ujeso a ma tan mbee biteng puu he Ugalili hwua bendi igie Unim he ishom angi Ijuus ı kwu liwu. U bun 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Kusu Unim de be, u mbee bendi lè he bitaa angmam atyetye-atyetye, abi bi mbu ābe.
40004024	Bendi āshì angi he Usiria be gyo biwom abi Ujeso u shi he Ugalili. Be be lè bendi bebell abe be mbu bitaa angmam atyetye-atyetye lè abe ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha abe, lè abe be ngyor lityuo, lè abe be hwō abee, be lè be hwaa lè Ujeso le ù mbee ābe. Ujeso a mbee ābe puu.
40004025	Bendi gbamm be maa ba lè he 'ubong Ugalili, lè he 'igie 'ubong ashi 'ì yi Ishokwo Lihwo, lè he Ujeruselem, lè he 'ubong Ujudia, lè he igbindi umbwo Ujodan be pwom Ujeso.
40005001	Ujeso a ndè bendi gbamm be ndo ba hwaa lè he, a kung mbo lè kwu he lishi 'igugo. Bendi-utung bema be lè kaa kel-kel fe-e.
40005002	A keb ābe biwom ahwuale. A de le:
40005003	"Igor ì yi ke bendi abe be ngye le 'i fong ābe lè Unim. Bè yi lè abwo he Kusu Unim a.
40005004	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe be shi beshi biban. Unim u ba tie lè be.
40005005	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe be keb 'uhwo-bell be he itang. Be ba kpa ashi Unim a kyebb ndor ābe.
40005006	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe bè yi lè 'igyor kangg le hang be shi ashi Unim a kee. Unim u ba kwun ābe 'igyor.
40005007	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe be ndè bende-bell beshi. Unim u ba nda ābe befe or beshi.
40005008	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe àtyám abell à yi ataa-ataa. Be ba nda Unim.
40005009	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe be shi ikwun. Unim u ba ko ābe le bebwaa-ma.
40005010	Igor ì yi ke bendi abe be kpē 'ingie le bwo be shi 'inunung ashi Unim a kee le bè shi Bè yi lè abwo he Kusu Unim a.
40005011	"Igor ì yi ke men he 'unyong ahwu bendi be bia amen, be teb lè men, be bè bitaa iman atyetye fe men likorye mà yi ke-m.
40005012	Mà yal gor likorye Unim a ndor amen 'uke 'ukaandi he lifung-atabe. Kitaa 'imen i na bendi be maa shi bendi abe be maa tye ugie 'isom Unim abe leěti."
40005013	A mbee kong le: "Mà yi a ná bendo a ke bendigye puu. Gbe bendo be nyin he ungwu ye, kì nem kwa lè 'itaa be shi ābe bè nyin ye. Bè nem hwua 'ifong ye. Bendi be kung ābe wu lè hell, be tem ābe abee gbè.
40005014	"Mà mbee yi a ná 'ikung-gbo a ke bendigye puu. Ushu angwu be tye pwom he lishi ukwell ù hà ndo kwa he 'undyell ye.
40005015	Undi ù hà ndo gba 'imor-inde tem lè 'igbor shā āshi ye. U kung āshi la ndor he 'usi he 'udyan ushom a, hè undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi há he ushom ù ndè há.
40005016	Kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi kpe-kpe le mà tyang 'ikung-gbo 'īmen 'ì taa hè bendi bè ndè aki anunung āmen, be kung ipee ke Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe."
40005017	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà shī gim le mi be mî mbee lè Iten Umosis lè biwom abi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be maa hwua bendi a ye. Mi be mî shi ābi bì fel yilididi a; mi mbee lè bi a ye.
40005018	Mà ngye dangg le likpe ken or lè he Iten lì hà ndo nim ye kpamm lifung-atabe lè igye bi gbe mbee, biwom puu bi fe lishi.
40005019	Undi uyang-yang angwu a ban uten ken or angwu a zen hwò puu, u hwua bende-ma le bè mbee ban uten umen ana, u ba kwa undi angwu ù yi ilaa-ilaa he Kusu Unim. Ukpor undi angwu a ndor āngi puu, u hwua bende-ma le bè ndor āngi, hà u ba kwa ukaandi a he Kusu Unim.
40005020	Mi kee le mà ngye le gbe ma shi 'inunung hwò bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten befe lè bendi Iferesis ye, hà Kiteng-usu Unim 'ì yi ke men ye."
40005021	"Mā gyo le be maa da bendi leěti le bè gwu undi ye. Undi angwu a gwu undi, be maa he ushe he ukoto.
40005022	Mi ufe mi de men 'anaa-anaa i le undi angwu a fel ngywo or fe ungwende, be maa he ushe he ukoto. Undi angwu a ko ungwende le undi-ilaa, be maa he ushe he ukoto. Angwu a ko ungwende le 'ikpel-ye undi, u gya he 'índe.
40005023	He ashin, gbe wo kam le wo ka Unim 'uke, wo lè fel he 'iteng ashangale, wo hà well le unwanaa ù yi linaa ha awo,
40005024	wò kung 'uke 'ugang ndor há he 'iteng ashangale, wo tem nya 'ukwo-ukwo lè shi ikwun ha ahe, wo hà tem be kung 'uke 'ugang ke Unim.
40005025	"Gbe undi a ka-a 'ushia, wò shi ikwun ha ahe akikye mà ukpong ma hà wu he ukoto. Gbe na a ye, u ta lè wo là ka umaa-ishe, umaa-ishe u kwa-a ke angwu idashanda, angwu idashanda u kpa-a lè fe he igaadye.
40005026	Ngye le wo ba kwa há he igaadye kpamm wo gbe hwee únde angwu be tang-a puu."
40005027	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Ma ma gyo le iten i de le, undi ù gbe ipel ha undi-iso fem ungye-ma tyang ye.
40005028	Mi ufe mi de men 'anaa-anaa i le undi angwu a ndè ungingye bell he, hà a shi 'iban agbele ipel ha ahe lityam.
40005029	He atan-lengi anwun gbe utong-shi ugang angwu lizen u sha-a le wò shi 'iban, wo yii waa he tyang hell. Ki ngbebb le ligwo ligang lì waa nim hwò ashi le wò gye he 'índe lè agwo agang puu.
40005030	Gbe 'ubwo lizen 'ugang 'u sha-a le wò shi 'iban, wo tang āhwu tyang hell. Ki ngbebb le ligwo ligang lì waa nim hwò ashi le wò gye he 'índe lè agwo agang puu."
40005031	"Iten i mbee de le undi angwu a ndō ungye-ma ù fee 'ushia libee abanale ke-e.
40005032	Mi ufe mi de men le gbe undi a ndor ungye-ma 'idideng fem ashi le ungye angwu há a gbe ipel ha undi ususo tyang, hà a shi ungye-ma le ù shi 'iban agbele ipel gbe a gye libee lisuso. Undi angwu a kpebb he or titi a shi 'iban agbele ipel."
40005033	"Ma mbee gyo le be maa da bendi leěti le bè shī ban úkyébb ubell ye, bè shi ashi be kyebb he ashi Atyabell Unim le be sha.
40005034	Mi ufe mi de men le he 'unyong ahwu ma ke undi úkyébb mà shī tam 'iwom ye, mà shī tam lifung-atabe or ye, likorye lì yi 'iteng-usu Unim a.
40005035	Mà tam igye ye, likorye ì yi 'iteng ashi a pwom abee ama a. Mà tam Ujeruselem ye, likorye ù yi lishi Usu ukaandi a.
40005036	Mà shī tam lìshī līmen or ye, likorye ma sha ugil ūmen ken or le ù bel ùbí mbee, ngwu mà shi-e ù ngyor ùshì mbee ye.
40005037	Mà kee-kee de le e-e-eng, eng, mà 'i mbee. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma fel kong fem ashin tyang 'i ba lè ha Usetan, usu bibibi a."
40005038	"Ma gyo le iten i kong le undi angwu a hwuà undi utong-shi, bè hwuǎ he uma or titi; undi angwu a gbung undi ushang, bè gbung he uma or titi.
40005039	Mi ufe mi de men le gbe undi a shi ban-a, wo-ò shī tem he utyang ye. Gbe undi a kpam-a 'ubwo he 'unaa ahwu lizen, wo bel àhwu limbell ndor he he-e ù mbee kpam.
40005040	Gbe undi a kwa-a gye he ukoto kpe kung aliga agang angi wo shī lè he afee kwu lishi, wo mbee waa āngi lè he igye or bee he pel.
40005041	Gbe undi a kwa-a he ikeb le wò so-e ūkpòng lè wu he ulamba ken, wo so-e ahe ilamba ifee.
40005042	Gbe undi a nyong-a 'iwom, wo ke-e áshi; gbe undi a be le wò pwee he 'iwom, wo pwee he áshi."
40005043	"Ma gyo le iten i de le 'ì nyin amen lè bedim-men, ma tel bendi-linaa bēmen.
40005044	Mi ufe mi de men 'anaa-anaa i le 'ì nyin amen lè bendi-linaa bēmen, ma bii Unim le ù ke bendi abe be shi 'ibibi ha amen 'ukwun.
40005045	Gbe ma shi ná a, mà ha kwa bebwaa Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe. Kì yi le u sha ishu i bya biwom bendi bebibi or, abe benunung or nya 'itaa ken; u shi umbwo u ndor wu biwom bendi abe be shi 'inunung lè abe be shi 'ibibi.
40005046	Gbe 'ı nyin amen lè bendi abe 'ı nyin ābe lè men befe-befe a, hà mà ndor lishi le Unim ù ke men 'ukwun ye, likorye bendi abe be kpe ukpanda or bè yi lè benyin abe 'itaa ana.
40005047	Gbe ma kong lè bedim-men befe-befe or, hà ma shi 'ikaa 'iwom a ye. Bendi abe be bong ha Unim ye or be kong lè bedim-bell.
40005048	Mà kwu yilididi nya a na Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe ù yi."
40006001	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Mà shi aki anunung āmen he 'ugbo le bendi bè ndè men ná ma shi āngi a ye. Gbe ma shi ná a, hà ma ba kpa lifem lè ha Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe ye.
40006002	Gbe ma ke undi-likaa 'iwom, mà bun ungwu ná bendi-ilam be maa bun he ishom angi be kwu liwu, lè he ishokwo ye. Befe be sha ná hè bendi bè pee ābe a. Mà ngye dangg le be kpe lifem libell puu mà.
40006003	Gbe undi u kpell undi-likaa, ù shi udim-ma angwu ù yi-e he lityam or ù ngye ye,
40006004	hè 'ì kwu he 'undyell a. Mà Atyamen angwu u ndè ashi u shi he 'undyell u ba ka he lifem."
40006005	"He 'unyong ahwu ma kong ha Unim mà shi ná bendi-ilam a ye. Ki nyin ābe le bè kong ha Unim he 'ipi be kwu liwu, lè he ishokwo hè bendi bè ndè be. Mà ngye dangg le be kpē lifem libell mà.
40006006	Gbe ma ndo kong ha Unim, mà gye he afee ushom lè shī lìshì, ma hà kong ha Atyamen Unim angwu be nde-e ye. Mà Atyamen angwu u ndè ashi ma shi he 'undyell u ba ka amen lifem.
40006007	"Gbe ma kong ha Unim, mà shī kong akpe angi à yi ilaa-ilaa ná bendi abe be bong ha Unim ye be kong ye. Befe be kong le gbe be kong akpe gbamm, Unim ubell ù ha gyo ābe.
40006008	Mà kwu ná befe bè yi a ye. Atyamen Unim a ngye abi bi fong amen lè bi mà ukpong ma hà bii he.
40006009	Mà kong ha Unim 'itaa ashin: 'Atyetyan angwu ù yi he lifung-atabe, ipee ì kwu ke lizen ligang.
40006010	Bendi bè hà kpa-a ná Usu. Biwom puu he igye i bì shi ná wo kee nya a na abi he lifung-atabe bı shi.
40006011	Ke li lizi angi lı zī 'unyin.
40006012	Tyang biban bityan ke li ná bel li tyang ke bendi abe be shi ban li.
40006013	Tyang li lì mbu he ugilale ye. Kpan li lè he abwo usu bibibi.'
40006014	"Gbe ma tyang ke bendi abe be shi ban amen, Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe ù ha tyang biban bīmen ka amen.
40006015	Ukpor gbe ma tyang ke bendi abe be shi ban amen ye, hà Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe ù hà ndo tyang biban bīmen ka amen ye."
40006016	Ujeso a kong gye 'ushu le: "He 'unyong ahwu ma kong ha Unim lè itung andoale, mà ndor 'ushu 'imbwee-imbwee ná bendi-ilam be shi a ye. Befe be sha 'uhwo-bell hè bendi bè ngye le be ndo itung há. Mà ngye dangg le be kpē lifem libell mà.
40006017	He 'unyong ahwu ma kong ha Unim lè itung andoale, mà to atong-shi āmen, ma por lishi līmen,
40006018	hè undi ù ngye le ma ndo itung há ye. Atyamen angwu be nde-e ye ufe-ufe na u ngye. Atyamen umen angwu u ndè ashi ma shi he 'undyell i u ba ka amen lifem."
40006019	"Mà kam bingbebb bīmen ndor hen he igye anyin a ye teng ikung lè bindebekpen bi za ban ābi, bezi be ban ushom lè zì kung ābi.
40006020	Mà kam bingbebb bīmen ndor he lifung-atabe hwan, hè ikung or, bindebekpen or, bì zī ban ābi or, ngwu bezi bè zì kung ye.
40006021	He 'iteng ashi bingbebb bīmen bì yi, há na àtyám āmen a kwu titi."
40006022	"Atong-shi à yi nya a na 'imor-inde a ke inyiahwo. Gbe atong-shi āmen à yi gelalala, inyiahwo īmen puu i kwa lè 'ikung-gbo.
40006023	Ukpor gbe atong-shi āmen à yi anunung ye, inyiahwo īmen puu i kwa he 'ifufebb. Gbe 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ì yi ha amen 'ì bel 'ifufebb, hà 'ifufebb ashi há 'i gya gba gyong."
40006024	"Undi ken ù hà ndo fa bétyám befee ye. Gbe ná a ye, hà u tel angwu ken, ki nyin he lè angwell. U ka angwu ken ife, u bia angwell. Wò hà ndo fa Unim or, bingbebb or, nya 'ugbe ken ye.
40006025	"Kife na mı de men le, ufung ù bè men gbe lè lizi angi mà zī, lè umbwo angwu mà ngwo kwu bewum, ngwu gbe lè inditen angi mà fe ye. Likpan li dyam hwò lizi, inyiahwo i dyam hwò inditen.
40006026	Ma ndè linyun li kwan ìtiá or, ngwu lì fem fe he abel or ye. Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe na u ndè gbe lè ngi. Men mà yi 'ukpo hwò linyun ibwan-ibwan.
40006027	Ayang he liwu līmen u zī igye gbe gyong 'unyong ahwu hang a hwō, le bwo u shell lihwu?
40006028	"Ki shi ná a, ma bè ufung gbe lè inditen? Ma ndè ná abia a shi bibubo. A sha aki or, ngwu à tye inditen lè 'uhwo-ngi or ye.
40006029	Mi kee le mà ngye le mà na Usu Usolomon a ma mbu 'ingbebb 'indee-indee or, a ma bwee idem áshiá ha 'ubia ken or ye.
40006030	Unim na u bwee abia. Abia angi a hwaa ashia 'unyin, te-te 'uhwo a fel angi be ting āngi shī 'ìndē or, u bwee āngi teng-teng lè men a? Má fe lityam ha ahe gbungg ye.
40006031	Mà shī waa ufung le he hung ma be lè lizi lè umbwo lè inditen ye.
40006032	(Kitaa i na bendi abe be bong ha Unim ye be kee biwom bimen i mbee 'unyong.) Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe a ngye le 'i fong amen lè biwom bimen i puu.
40006033	Mà kung Unim angwu ù yi Usu ūmen a ndor 'ushu, ma mbee shi ashi a kong, mà u kung biwom bimen i ka amen.
40006034	Ufung ù shī bè men gbe lè 'iwom ashi 'uhwo 'ı shi ye. Liti angi 'uhwo li ba kwa lè bingie ángi. Liti liyang-yang lì yi lè bingie keè ha 'uhwo-ngi. Mà kung bingie liti lisuso fe pel ha bingie liti angyell ye."
40007001	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Mà maa undi ushe ye, hè Unim or ù maa amen ushe ye.
40007002	Kitaa ashi men ma maa undi ushe na Unim u be maa amen. Iten angi ma gim le bendi bè ndor na Unim u gim le men mà ndor.
40007003	Ki shi ná a, wo ndè 'anwaa 'ibia ake 'à yi unde-gang he utong-shi, ki gbee-a gbe lè ubim ukwan angwu ù yi kie he ugang utong-shi ye?
40007004	Ki shi ná a, wo de unde-gang le ù ndor ha-a à fem he 'anwaa 'ibia lè he utong-shi, wo shi lè ubim ukwan he ugang utong-shi?
40007005	Wo undi-ilam, wo-ò fem ubim ukwan angwu ù yi-a he utong-shi, mà wo nda nwongg fem unde-gang 'anwaa 'ibia lè he utong-shi.
40007006	"Mà kung 'iwom ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim ke bendi abe bè yi ná ibua ye, teng i ngmam amen. Mà kung 'ukpana 'ūmen fe bendi abe bè yi ná 'ikagbo ye, teng i tan lè hwu ngywal bisor."
40007007	"Kiwom ashi 'i fong amen, mà bii, mà ma kpa āshi. Mà kee 'iwom, mà ma nda āshi. Mà kem abwo he lishi, mà Unim u buu amen ángi.
40007008	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bii 'iwom, u kpa āshi; angwu a kee 'iwom, u ndè shi; angwu a kem abwo he lishi, Unim u buu he ángi.
40007009	Men betyam bebwaa, ayang he liwu līmen ù nya kung 'ukor a ke unwaa-ma, gbe a bii he 'ipam a? Hà u kwa ùshiı a ka he, gbe a bii he ùkwǎn?
40007011	Men abe ma ban i, má ngye le ma ka bebwaa-men biwom binunung teng-teng lè Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe a? Ufe u ba kung biwom binunung ka bendi abe be bii he.
40007012	"He atan-lengi anwun 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma kee le bendi bè shi ke men, mà shi āshi ha abe. Kimen i na Iten Umosis lè ashia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim bi hwua li."
40007013	"Mà gbe he ungwu likong angwu ù yi shib-shib hwan likorye 'ukwo ahwu 'u gye he 'ìndē 'ù yi lè ungwu likong angwu a gia, ku ngbèbb agbele. Bendi gbamm be gba nya he 'ukwo 'umen ana.
40007014	Kukwo ahwu be gbe be kwu lè likpan 'ù yi lè ungwu likong angwu ù yi shib-shib, ku mbee shi lè 'ingie agbele. Bendi abe be ndè 'ukwo 'umen i be go ye."
40007015	"Mà baa 'uhwo-men lè ha bendi abe be bè iman le be bun 'isom Unim. Be ba hwaa lè men mbiloo ná ìtiā, ukpor bè yi nya a na inyia ibibi angi ı gwu ìtiā a.
40007016	Ma ngya ābe gba he akpe angi be shi nya a na ma ngye ùkwán gbe he agbe angi u wum. Ūtōng u wum agbe 'ūshù, nyong ù wum agbe ilyom ye.
40007017	Ùkwán ununung u wum agbe anunung; ùkwán ubibi u wum agbe abibi.
40007018	Ùkwán ununung ù hà ndo wum agbe abibi, ngwu ùkwán ubibi ù wum agbe anunung ye.
40007019	Ùkwán uyang-yang angwu u wum agbe anunung ye, be ging he fa he 'índe.
40007020	Kitaa 'imen i na ma ngye bendi abe be bè iman le be bun 'isom Unim gbe he akpe angi be shi."
40007021	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu u ko mi le Átyám na u be gye he Kiteng-usu Unim he lifung-atabe ye. Bendi abe be shi biwom abi Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe a kee le bè shi befe-befe na be be gye há.
40007022	Nya he Liti Ushe Unim bendi gbamm be ba da-m le: 'Atyetyan, li maa bun 'isom Unim he lizen ligang, li ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi, li mbee shi bikwele-uhwo gbamm he lizen ligang.'
40007023	Mi-ì ha ba da ābe le be maa sha bibibi, bè gbe-m lè í. Mi ngye be ye."
40007024	Ujeso a hà de le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo igie igi, u shi ngi, ù yi ná ungikye angwu a bi lishi angwu a ma tye ushom uma pwom he likwu 'ukor.
40007025	Umbwo a ndor kangg. Lishor li sho wul wu mbee bipi. Kufem 'u shì kangg, ukpor ushom a ma mbu ye likorye a ma tye-e pwom he 'ukor a.
40007026	Undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo igie igi, u shi āngi ye, ù yi nya a na 'ikpel-ye undi ashi 'i ma tye ushom uma pwom he likwu 'uyia a.
40007027	Umbwo a ndor kangg. Lishor li sho wul wu mbee bipi. Kufem 'u shì kangg. Ushom ana a ma gyebb shī he itang kpemm. Agyebbale ushom ana a ma ban kangg."
40007028	Ujeso a ma kong ashin 'i mbee, ki ma kwu bendi he 'uhwo 'itaa ashi u hwua ābe.
40007029	A maa hwua lè ikeb. A maa hwua ābe ná bekaandi bebell abe be hwua ābe Iten a ye.
40008001	Bendi be ma kwuo pwom Ujeso he 'unyong ahwu a shul lè he 'igugo.
40008002	Undi-akpaa ususo a hà be hwaa lè he, u tim anung he itang fe-e. A de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, ki nya nyin-a le wò mbee mi a?"
40008003	Ujeso a kung ndaa 'ubwo tyua he, de-e le: "Ki nyin mi. Kanaa-anaa i wo mbee." Akpaa ama a kung taa nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
40008004	Ujeso a kung de-e le ù de undi áshi ye. A de-e le, ù gbe ligbe-ligbe lè hwaa lè undi angwu u shang Unim he-e ù nde-e. Ù shang Unim ná Umosis a ma ke uten hè 'ì tyung bendi puu le a mbee.
40008005	Ujeso a lè wu he Ukapanyam, ukaandi ishogya ususo angwu a maa be lè he Urom a be hwaa lè he, tim he anung le ù kpell he. A de Ujeso le,
40008006	uboyi uma ù yi gogo ye ndē há he ushu. U bo 'inaa or mbee ye, likorye lingmam lima li go kangg.
40008007	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Lì gye, mî ndo la mbee he."
40008008	Gyo ungikye ana le: "E-e-eng, ukaandi, mi kpè angwu wò gye ha ami ushu ye. Wo-ò kong he ungwu ufe-ufe, mà uboyi ugi u mbee.
40008009	Mi or titi mì yi he 'ubwo bekaandi ishogya abe bè yi-m lè he 'ushu. Mi shi lè ishogya angi mì yi āngi lè he 'ushu. Mi da undi ken le ù gye há ana, u gya há. Mi de angwell le ù be nyin, u ba. Gbe mi de uboyi ugi le ù shi 'iwom, u sha āshi. Ashin 'i shi-m mi ngye le gbe wo kong likpe life-life, mà uboyi ugi u mbee."
40008010	Ujeso a gyo ashin, ki kwu-e he 'uhwo. A kung de bendi abe bè yi utung ha ahe le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le mi wa ndè undi angwu a fe lityam ha ami 'itaa i he Izwell or ngye ye.
40008011	Mà ngye dangg le bendi gbamm be ba ba lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı fem lè ashi libwee lı ngwee ba za lizi utung ha Ebraham lè Azik lè Ujekob he Kiteng-usu Unim he lifung-atabe.
40008012	Ukpor bendi abe 'ì yi le hang bè kwu he Kiteng-usu Unim, befe, Unim u ba ndō ābe tyang he igye he 'ipi be be kwu ki, be kem ishang lè 'imbwee kangg."
40008013	A hà de ukaandi umen ana le: "Ndo gye he ushu. Kiwom ashi wo ndor lishi ha ashi 'i ba kwa ka-a." Uboyi ukaandi umen ana a ma mbee nya he 'unyong 'umen ana.
40008014	Ujeso a gye he ushaale Ipita. A ndè anam ungye Ipita ù yi gogo ye ndē há. Inyiahwo i maa shá he.
40008015	Ujeso a ndaa 'ubwo tyua he he 'uma 'ubwo. A mbee. A kung bo 'inaa, u fel sha he 'ugaa.
40008016	Likwulukwu li gyebb. Bendi gbamm be be lè bendi abe ikeb ibibi ì yi ha abe, be hwaa lè Ujeso. Ujeso a maa kong lingmam life-life, ikeb ibibi i fem gbe lè ha abe, u mbee bendi-angmam puu.
40008017	Ashin 'i shi hè 'ì kwu ná Azaya angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong leěti a. A ma de le: "A kung angmam atyan so 'uhwo-ma."
40008018	Ujeso a ndè ná bendi be sho fe-e, a de le bè gye he igbindi umbwo angwell.
40008019	Undi ken angwu a maa hwua bendi Iten a kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, mi kee le mi pwom-a gya he 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi wo gye."
40008020	Ujeso a kung de-e le: " Ífé ì yi lè abell angi ı ndē, linyun li shi lè agwu, ukpor mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè 'iteng ashi mı ndē gbam mbu 'unde ye."
40008021	Undi-utung uma ken a kung de-e le: "Atyagi, tyang mi mì lè ngi atyagi, mà ukpong."
40008022	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Wo-ò pwom mi. Tyang akwom à ngi akwom abell."
40008023	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be lè ngwee 'inong lishor.
40008024	Nya imbul-imbul 'ufem 'ukaandi 'u keb apuale. Umbwo a maa fel tō lè 'inong, u tab fa he 'inong. Ujeso ufe a ma yi he 'unde.
40008025	Bendi-utung bema be lè wum he. Be de-e le: "Atyetyan, kpan li, li nim inim."
40008026	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Kibang 'i tan lè shi ma shell? Má fe lityam ha ami gbungg ye." A kung bo 'inaa kong ha 'ufem lè umbwo le bì kwun atyung. Bi kung kwun atyung shangg.
40008027	Ki kwu bendi puu he 'uhwo, be bii le: "Kibang 'itaa undi ashi ù yi? Kufem or, umbwo or, bi ka he ife."
40008028	Ujeso a gye he igbindi umbwo he 'ipi bendi Ugerasa be maa ndē. A lè wu há wu-wu, a kpee ha bendi befee abe be maa be lè he 'ipi be ngi akwom. Bendi bemen befee ana be ma yi lè ikeb ibibi ha abe. Be ma yi lè ikeb kangg le undi a maa tem gba 'ukwo 'umen ana ye.
40008029	Be nde Ujeso nde-nde, be fel gaa bii he le: "Unwaa Unim, wo la sha li ná a? Wo be ha-a à ke li 'ingie mà ukpong 'unyong 'utyan 'u hà fel a?"
40008030	Ikagbo gbamm i maa tan za há kpee-kpee.
40008031	Ikeb ibibi ana i tim Ujeso anung le: "Gbe wo ndó li, wo tyang li hè li lì lè ngwee ikagbo anyina."
40008032	Ujeso a de ngi le ì ndo te. I fem lè ha bendi befee ana lè ngwee ikagbo. Ikagbo ana i buu shul 'igugo lè mbu hwō fe he umbwo.
40008033	Bendi abe be maa kang ikagbo be buu gye he lifung-ushu lè bun biwom puu abi bi shi lè 'itaa ashi ikeb ibibi i fem lè ha bendi abena.
40008034	Bendi gbamm abe há he lishi limen ana be lè hwaa lè Ujeso, tim he anung le ù gbe lè ha abe 'ubong.
40009001	Ujeso a ngwee 'inong tem gye he igbindi umbwo angwu he 'ubong 'uma.
40009002	Bendi besuso be be lè uhwo-abee he 'ataa le be ba hwaa lè he. Ujeso a ndè le be bong le u mbee he. A kung de uhwo-abee le: "Unwaa-gi, shī shell ye. Mi tyang biban bigang ka-a."
40009003	Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten be de bende le: "Ungikye anwun u kong ban Unim."
40009004	Ujeso a ngye igim ibell. A kung bii ābe le: "Ki shi ná a, ma gim 'ibibi 'itaa i?
40009005	Ashi le mì de-e le mi tyang biban bima ke-e na 'ì yi pie-pie hwò à, hà ashi le ù bo 'inaa ndo tan á?
40009006	Mi ba tyung amen le mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè ikeb he igye anyin le mi tyang biban ka bendi." A kung de uhwo-abee le ù bo 'inaa, kung 'ataa 'ama ndo gye he ushu.
40009007	Ungikye umen ana a kung bo 'inaa gbe ndo he ushu.
40009008	Bendi be ndè ashi 'i shi, be fel he 'ushell, be pee Unim ná a ke bendigye ikeb le bè shi 'iwom ashi 'itaa i.
40009009	Ujeso a gbe lè nya, u gya. Nya a na a maa te lè 'ukwo a ndè undi angwu u kpe ukpanda angwu be maa ko le Umatyuo. A ma yi kwu he ufishi uma. Ujeso a de-e le ù be pwom he. A kung bo 'inaa gbe utung ha ahe.
40009010	He 'unyong ken Ujeso a maa za lizi he ushom Umatyuo. Bendi gbamm abe be kpē ukpanda or, bendi-iban or, be lè zī lizi utung ha Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema.
40009011	Bendi Iferesis besuso be ndè Ujeso u za lizi utung ha abe, be bii bendi-utung bema le: "Ki shi ná a, ukaandi ūmen u zī lizi utung ha bendi abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi-iban?"
40009012	Ujeso a gyo ābe. A kung fan ābe le: "Bendi abe bè yi gogo na be kee undi-usi ye, bendi-angmam a.
40009013	Mà lè hwua ngye ashi 'imen i 'i ze: Mi kee bityuale abi be shang mi a ye, ukpor mi kee 'inunung ashele a. Mi be le mî ko bendi benunung a ye, ukpor mi be le mî ko bendi-biban á."
40009014	Bendi-utung Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo be hà be hwaa lè Ujeso, be bii he le: "Ki shi ná a, bel lè bendi Iferesis lı kong ha Unim lè itung andoale mbee 'unyong, ukpor bendi-utung begang befe be ndo itung kpaa or ye?"
40009015	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ma kong le begaandi abe be be he 'ipam libee bè kwu lè 'imbwee he 'unyong ahwu ukyebb ungye ù yi utung ha abe a? Dia! Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu be be kwu kung ukyebb ungye gbe lè he lè ha abe, saa be hà ndo itung."
40009016	Ujeso a bun ityang de be le: "Kì yi lè undi angwu u kung 'ihwom 'ifufe kpi shī ligia aliga angi atim ye. Gbe undi a shi ná, kihwom ashi 'ifufe 'i gie aliga angi atim, ligia angi lifufe li fel go hwà angi litim.
40009017	Ki shi lè undi angwu u kung 'utyuo ahwu 'ì so-i tım fe he 'ito ukwob inyia angwu u ndo kaa ye. Gbe a shi ná, hà 'utyuo 'u tya paa ukwob inyia wa he itang, kutyuo lingyor, kito ukwob inyia lingyor. Kì yi le bè kung 'utyuo ahwu 'u tim fe he 'ito ukwob inyia angwu ù so 'ifufe hwan, hè ukwob inyia or, kutyuo or, bì ban ye."
40009018	Nya a na Ujeso a maa de be ashin, ungikye angwu a ma yi ukaandi he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu a be hwaa lè he, tim anung he itang fe-e, u de-e le, unwaa-ma angwu ungingye a hwō. Ù be tyua he 'ubwo he-e ù tem wum.
40009019	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be kung bo gbe utung ha ahe.
40009020	Nya a na be maa te lè 'ukwo, ungingye ususo angwu a ma wu anung kpamm lè wu he aze lihwo lè ngi afee a be há he liwu. A bel tang Ujeso lè he item, u tyua he 'ubwo he ungwu aliga.
40009021	A kong ha ahe lityam le: "Gbe mi tyua he 'ubwo he aliga afe-afe or, mi mbee."
40009022	Ujeso a bel àshì nde-e, u de-e le: "Unwaa-gi, shī shell ye. Abongale ugang a shi-a wo mbee." Ungingye umen ana a ma mbee nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
40009023	Ujeso a hà gye he ushaale úkaandi ana. A ndè le bendi abe be ki lihwu be shi 'ihwee kangg.
40009024	A de be le, befe puu bè gye he igye. Unwaa a hwō ihwō ye, a mbu 'unde a. Puu ubell be keb be fel gwee he.
40009025	Bendi be shul he igye shul-shul, Ujeso a gbe gye há he 'ipo unwaa umen ana lè kwu-e 'ubwo he 'ubwo. A bo 'inaa.
40009026	Be ma bun àshi 'i shi de bendi mbee 'ubong 'umen ana puu.
40009027	Ujeso a gbe lè nya, u gya. Nya a na a maa te lè 'ukwo, bendi befee abe be hwuà ashi be pwom he. Be fel gaa le: "Igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha abel."
40009028	Ujeso a gbe gye he afee ushom. Bendi abe be hwuà ashi be lè hwaa lè he. Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Ma bong le mi mbee amen mbee a?" Be bong le: "Eng, ukaandi."
40009029	Ujeso a kung abwo tyua ābe he atong-shi, u de be le 'ì shi ābe nya a na be bong.
40009030	Atong-shi a kung buu. Ujeso a tye be uten le bè de undi áshi ye.
40009031	Ukpor be lè bun gbe lè Ujeso de bendi mbee 'ubong 'umen ana puu.
40009032	Nya a na bendi be maa gbe lè há, bendi besuso be be lè undi angwu a kwom umbell be hwaa lè Ujeso. Ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe.
40009033	Ujeso a ndō ikeb ibibi ana, i fem lè ha ahe fem-fem, ungikye ana u fel kong likong. Ki ma kwu bendi he 'uhwo, be fel da le be wa ndè 'iwom 'itaa i he Izwell ngye ye.
40009034	Bendi Iferesis be de le usu bibibi na a ke Ujeso ikeb le ù ndō ikeb ibibi.
40009035	Ujeso a tan mbee ashi 'ubong puu. A maa hwua bendi he ishom ibell angi be kwu liwu, u bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi gbe lè Kusu Unim, u mbee bendi lè he bitaa angmam atyetye-atyetye.
40009036	A ma nde liwu bendi, beshi be shi-e lè be likorye be maa kpa 'ingie faale undi angwu u ndè gbe lè be nya a na ìtiā angi ì yi faale undi angwu u kang āngi a.
40009037	A kung de bendi-utung bema le: "Agbudyu a go lè afemale, ukpor bendi abe be fem bè yi gbungg ye.
40009038	Mà bii ugyang utia le ù mbee som bendi abe be fem agbudyu gye há he utia."
40010001	Ujeso a ko bendi-utung abe lihwo lè be befee be he 'iteng ken. A ke be ikeb le bè ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi, be mbee bendi lè he angmam puu.
40010002	Azen bebwaa-isom bema, bendi lihwo lè be befee na à yi nyin: Usaimun angwu a kwù le Ipita lè ungwende, Andru, lè bebwaa Uzebedi befee abe be maa ko le Ujems lè Ujon,
40010003	lè Ufilip lè Ubatilomi lè Utormas lè Umatyuo angwu a maa kpē ukpanda lè Ujems angwu a ma yi unwaa Alfiyes lè Utadyus,
40010004	lè Usaimun angwu a ma yi he liwu Ijuus angi li kee le be kwa lè 'uhwo-bell, lè Ujudas Isikariyot angwu a ma ndyebb Ujeso zi ha bendi-linaa bema.
40010005	Nya a na Ujeso a kam le u som bendi bemen lihwo lè be befee i gya he igye, a de be le: "Mà gye he 'ubong bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or, ngwu mà gye he Usameria or ye.
40010006	Mà gye he bendi Izwell a. Bè yi nya a na ìtiā angi i nim a.
40010007	Mà lì bun de be le baale be nde ná Unim u fem Kusu 'uma he igye.
40010008	Mà mbee bendi-angmam, ma wum bendi lè he lihwu, ma shi abe akpaa be taa, ma ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi. Má kpē 'isom 'inunung faale 'ugia akele, men or mà lè bun 'isom 'inunung faale 'ugia akpēle.
40010009	Mà shī fe únde he ibam te lè he ye.
40010010	Mà faa ibam lizi or, ngwu mà kwu aliga afee or, ngwu mà kwu ikwob abee ifee or, ngwu mà kwu utyuu or ye. Kì yi le bè ke undi aki ashi 'i fong he lè shi.
40010011	"He 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi ma gye, mà lè kee undi angwu u bong kpē men. Mà kwu ha ahe kpamm ma gbe gbe lè há he 'iteng 'imen ana.
40010012	Ushu uyang-yang angwu ma gye, mà de bendi abe bè yi há le Unim ù ke be 'ukwun.
40010013	Gbe bendi abe bè yi há be kpē men, ma tyang 'ukwun 'umen i 'u ngyor kwu ha abe. Gbe be kpē men ye, be tem kwu lè 'ukwun ye.
40010014	He 'iteng ashi ma te, bendi be kpē men or, ngwu bè dang 'utyung gyo amen or ye, ma gbe lè há, ma shell 'umbulmbul lè he abee āmen wu ābe he itang.
40010015	Mà ngye dangg le he Liti angi Unim u be tang ushe u ba nda bendi abe he Usodem lè Ugomoro beshi hwà bendi bemen ana."
40010016	"Mi som amen le mà te lè kwu ná ìtiā ı kwu he liwu inyia ibibi a. Mà bi lishi ná ìshiı, ma kwu lè 'uhwo ambwele ná lilulu.
40010017	Mà baa 'uhwo-men likorye bendi be ba kwa amen gya he ukoto le bè maa amen ushe, be be kpam amen ikwun he ishom ibell angi be kwu liwu.
40010018	He 'uhwo 'ugi be ba kwa amen lè ka bekaandi lè besu hè be bè maa amen ushe. Há na ma be nde 'ukwo bun 'isom 'inunung de be befe lè abe bè yi Ijuus a ye.
40010019	Gbe be kwu amen gye lè men he 'ipi be maa ushe, mà waa ufung gbe lè ashi ma lè kong lè 'itaa ashi ma be kong āshi ye. Unim u ba ka amen igie angi ma kong he 'unyong ahwu 'unyong 'umen ana 'u fel.
40010020	Men na ma be kong ye, Ukatia Kunyong Unim na u be kong gbe ha amen.
40010021	"Bendi be fel ba kung bebwandabell ka le bè gwu. Betyam bebwaa be be kung bebwaa-bell ke le bè gwu. Bebwaa be nem be fe betyabell lè bendabell ye, be be kung ābe ke le bè gwu.
40010022	Bendi puu be ba tel amen he 'uhwo 'ugi. Ukpor undi angwu a ngyor naa genn fe Unim lè wu he umbee-likel u ba kwa lè likpan 'unyong.
40010023	Gbe be ke men 'ingie lè he 'ubong ahwun, mà buu gye he 'ubong 'ususo. Ma ba sha aki āmen mbee ashi Izwell puu mà ukpong mi Unwaa Undigye, mi hà be ye.
40010024	"Undi uhwuale u dyam hwà undi angwu u hwua he ye; ufee u dyam hwà átyám ye.
40010025	Undi uhwuale u kaa he-e ù fel ná undi angwu u hwua he; ufee u kwu ná átyám. Gbe be ko ugyang ushu le Ubielzebul, hà be ba ko bendi bema bitaa azen abi bi ban hwò anyina!"
40010026	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Mà shī shell bendigye ye. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi be nyia shì, ki ba fem he igye. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi he 'undyell, bendi be ba ngya āshi.
40010027	Kiwom ashi mı nyia de men lè 'usu, mà kong āshi lè ishu; kiwom ashi ma gyo he 'undyell, mà lè kong āshi he 'ugbo.
40010028	Mà shell bendi abe be gwu agwo, be gwu 'ūnyōng mbee ye a ye. Mà shell Unim angwu u gwu agwo or, kūnyōng or, fe he 'índē a.
40010029	Be ka lishishe lifee ukobo ken a, ukpor kashishe ken or 'a mbwa he itang, Atyamen u mor angyele ye.
40010030	Men ufe, Unim a bo ngye 'ugii igil he lishi līmen or.
40010031	Mà shī shell ye, undigye ken ù yi Unim he 'ukpo hwò lishishe gbamm."
40010032	"Undi uyang-yang angwu a kong de bendi gboo le ù yi ke-m mi a, mi ba sha he ná he ashi Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe.
40010033	Ukpor undi angwu a swan gboo le ù yi ke-m mi a ye, mi ba swan he he ashi Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe."
40010034	"Mà shī gim le mi be lè ikwun a he igye i ye, mi be lè 'ùkyē a.
40010035	Mi be le mî shi betyam bebwaa befe lè bebwaa-bell bè fel linaa ha bende, mi shi benam bebwaa befe lè bebwaa-bell be fel linaa ha bende, mi shi bengye libee befe lè bendabell ushu be fel linaa ha bende.
40010036	Bendi-linaa undi be fel ba ba lè ha ahe 'ikwu-lihwan a.
40010037	"Undi angwu 'i nyin he lè atyam or, anam or, hwo-m mi, hà a kpè le u kwa undi-utung ugi ye; undi angwu 'i nyin he lè unwaa-ma ungikye or, ungingye or, hwo-m mi, hà a kpè le u kwa undi-utung ugi ye.
40010038	Undi angwu a bong lihwu, kung 'ikpakpaa 'ima ashi be be maa he bee so pwom mi ye, hà a kpè le u kwa undi-utung ugi a ye.
40010039	Undi angwu u kaa le u kpan lishi lima, hà a nim lè 'uhwo-ma; undi angwu u bong lihwu he 'uhwo 'ugi na u be kwu lè likpan."
40010040	"Undi angwu a kpe men, hà a kpe i-mi a. Undi angwu a kpe-m, hà a kpe ufe angwu a som i-mi a.
40010041	Undi angwu a kpe unwaa-isom Unim le bwo ù yi unwaa-isom Unim a, Unim u ba ka he ufe or lifem. Undi angwu a kpē undi ununung le bwo ù yi ununung a, Unim u ba ka he ufe or lifem.
40010042	Undi angwu a ke undi-utung ugi angwu ù yi ilaa-ilaa or umbwo le bwo ù yi undi-utung ugi a, u ba kpa lifem lima."
40011001	Ujeso a ke bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee utebb anwun puu, a hà gbe lè há 'iteng 'imen ana lè bun 'isom Unim de bendi he ashi angi à yi kpee-kpee.
40011002	Bendi-utung Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo be be he igaadye de-e gbe lè aki angi Ujeso Ukristi u shi. A hà som ābe besuso hwaa lè Ujeso.
40011003	Be lè bii Ujeso le: "Wo na Ujon a maa de le wo ba à, hà lì ndor lishi undi ususo?"
40011004	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà tem lè de Ujon biwom abi ma gyo, ma mbee ndè.
40011005	Bendi abe be hwuà ashi be fel nda, abe be hwō abee be fel tan, abe akpaa be taa, abe be kwom atyung be fel gyo, akwom a wum, bendi-likaa be gyo 'isom 'inunung.
40011006	Undi angwu u tyāng ityang gbe lè mi ye, ù yi undi igor."
40011007	Bendi-utung Ujon be kung tem. Ujeso a keb akongale ha bendi gbamm abe bè yi há gbe lè Ujon. A bii ābe le: "He 'unyong ahwu ma maa lè hwaa lè Ujon he afee libeb, ma maa ndor lishi le ma la nda 'ibang a há? Abia angi 'ufem 'u shì nii āngi â, hà ma maa la nda 'ibang á?
40011008	Ma maa la nda undi angwu a fe bihwom binunung â? Bendi abe be fe bihwom 'itaa ana, be mbu 'ingbebb, be nda he ishaale besu a.
40011009	Ma maa ndor lishi le ma la nda 'ibang a? Undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ye a? Undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ye a?" A tem lè shi fan le: "Eng, ukpor má ngye le ma ma ndè undi angwu a dyam hwò bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim abe leěti.
40011010	Ujon na undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma fee he 'ushia Unim gbe lè he leěti le Unim a de le, unwaa-isom uma ufe Unim ù yi nyin. U ba som he ta-m lè he 'ushu he-e ù shi 'ukwo ndor mi.
40011011	Mi kee le mà ngye le Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a ma dyam hwò bendigye puu, ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a kpe Unim ná Usu uma, mà undi umen ana ù yi he 'ukpo ye or, a fel he 'ukpo hwò Ujon.
40011012	Kung lè he 'unyong ahwu Ujon a ma be bun 'isom 'inunung kpamm be kwom 'unyin i, bendi be kaa kangg hè be bè kwu lè libwo he Kusu Unim. Kanaa-anaa i or, bendi abe bè yi lè ikeb bè so-i kaa hè be bè kwu lè libwo limen ana.
40011013	Bendi abe be maa tye ugie 'isom Unim puu lè Iten Umosis be maa kong gba lè Kusu Unim kpamm be kwom he 'unyong ahwu Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo.
40011014	Gbe ma fe lityam ha 'isom 'ibell, Ujon ù yi ná Ilaja angwu be maa kong gbe lè abele uma a.
40011015	Gbe mà yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, mà gyo."
40011016	Ujeso a mbee bii le: "Mì kung bendi abe ati anyin paa ha 'ibang a?" A tem lè shi fan le: "Bè yi ná inwaabwan ı kwu he ushokwo 'ate nà. Likwu ken li ko da likwu angyell le:
40011017	'Li kem libee fe men, ma ngyor ye. Li ki lihwu, men ma ki ye.'
40011018	Ujon a maa ndo itung, u ngwo 'utyuo ye. Bendi be maa da le u ngyor lityuo.
40011019	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi be mi za bizizi, mi ngwo bingwungwo. Bendi be da le: 'Mà ndè ungikye anwun. U sha uwub lizi, u mbee ngwo betyuo kangg. A ngwee 'udim ha bendi abe be kpē ukpanda lè abe biban.' Bendi abe bè yi lè lishi abyele Unim, likpe libell li tyung le lishi abyele Unim lì yi 'igyang a."
40011020	Ujeso a kong bia bendi āshì angi a ma shi bikwele-uhwo gbamm, likorye be bel àtyám lè he biban ye.
40011021	A de le: "Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen, bendi abe he Ukorazin lè abe he Besaida. Mì shi bikwele-uhwo he Utaya lè Usaidon ná mi shi ha amen 'ubong nyin, hang bendi abe bè yi há be fe akpen, be kem atyung wu 'uhwo-bell leěti hè 'ì tyung le be bel àtyám lè he biban ashele.
40011022	Mà ngye le he atan-lengi anwun Unim u ba ndà bendi Utaya lè Usaidon beshi hwà amen he Liti angi u tang bendi ushe.
40011023	Men bendi Ukapanyam befe, ma kong le Unim u ba kung amen gya he 'usi-usi a? Dia! U ba keb amen gya há he itang gungg. Bikwele-uhwo abi mi shi ha amen 'ubong i, mì shi ābi he Usodem a, hang Usodem ù so igye.
40011024	Mà ngye le Unim u ba ndà bendi Usodem beshi he Liti ushe amaale hwà amen."
40011025	He 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a kung kong ha Unim le: "Atyagi angwu ù yi lè lifung-atabe lè igye i, mi pee-a ná wo kung biwom abi wo ndyell lè ha bendi abe be bi lishi lè abe be ngye biwom, tyung bendi abe be ngye 'iwom ye.
40011026	Atyagi, ki ngbebb-a wo-gyang le wò shi ashin.
40011027	"Atyagi a ke-m biwom puu. Kì yi lè undi angwu a ngye-m, mi Unwaa-ma, dangg fem Atyagi tyang ye. Ki shi lè undi angwu a ngye Atyagi dangg fem i-mi Unwaa-ma, lè bendi abe mi kee le mi tyung ābe áhe tyang ye.
40011028	"Men puu abe ma so bengbebb be ngbēbb amen, mà be hwaa lè mi, mà mi ba ka amen 'ūnyōng ashwele.
40011029	Mì yi katiaa, mi dim idim ye. Mà shi nya a na mi de men, mà hwua lè ha ami, mà àtyám āmen a kwa lè ikwun.
40011030	Aki ashele utung ha ami à yi lè 'indee ye; ūkpòng angwu mı be so amen u ngbebb ye, ù yi fěē."
40012001	Ki gbe 'igbe ye, Ujeso a lè tan gbe he utia utung ha bendi-utung bema he liti uwell Ijuus. Itung i maa ndo bendi-utung bema. Be maa fel tang biwom abi bì yi ìtǒng ná abung, gbel ābi he abwo keb azēle.
40012002	Bendi Iferesis be nde be, be kung de Ujeso le ù ndè ná bendi-utung bema be ban uten ubell angwu liti uwell.
40012003	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Ma wa bo gbe lè 'iwom ashi Usu Udebid a ma shi he 'unyong ahwu itung i maa ndo ābe befe lè bendi-utung bema ye a?
40012004	A ma gye he Ushom Unim lè kung ibred angi ì yi ta-ta ke Unim kung zī teng ke bendi-utung bema. Mà na Iten i ma bong le bè zī āngi ye or, be ma zī āngi. Bendi abe be shang Unim befe-befe na be maa zī āngi.
40012005	Ma wa bo ashia Iten Umosis le he liti uwell bendi abe be shang Unim he Ushom Unim be maa ban uten liti uwell ye a? Be maa za libi he ashele ashin ye.
40012006	Mà ngye le 'iwom 'ì yi nyin inyin ashi 'i dyam hwò Ushom Unim.
40012007	Kiwom ashi be ma fee ndor leěti le mi kee bityuale ashangale a ye, mi kee inunung ashele a, mà ngye likpe áshi hang ma ben bendi abe be zī libi ye.
40012008	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè ikeb le mi da bendi ashi bè shi he liti uwell."
40012009	Ujeso a gbe lè he 'iteng 'imen ana lè ngwee he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu.
40012010	Undi ususo a ma yi há angwu a ma hwō 'ubwo. Bendi besuso abe be shi há, be kee le be kee àshi be kwu 'ubwo kwu-e le a mbu he iten. Be bii he le: "Iten ityan i bong le undi ù mbee undi he liti uwell a?"
40012011	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Gbe undi ken he liwu līmen u nya yi lè ùtiā ken, gbe ùtiā angwu há a mbu fe he libell he liti uwell, undi angwu há u nya fěm he ye a?
40012012	Undigye ù yi he 'ukpo hwò ùtiā. Iten ityan i bong le lì kpell undi he liti uwell."
40012013	A kung de ungikye umen angwu a hwō 'ubwo ana le ù ndaa 'ubwo. A ndaa āhwu, ku tem fel kang-kang a ná ahwell 'ù yi.
40012014	Bendi Iferesis be kung gbe lè há lè shi itim le bè gwu-e.
40012015	Ujeso a gyo gbe lè shi, a gbe lè há he 'iteng 'imen ana. Bendi be ti kwuo pwom he. A ma mbee bendi-angmam puu abe be pwom he.
40012016	U tye be uten le bè de undi gbe lè he ye.
40012017	Ki shi nya a na Azaya angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong leěti a. A ma kong le Unim a de le:
40012018	"Unwaa-gi angwu mi waa som na ù yi i. Ki nyin mi lè he 'indee-indee. Mi ba kung Ukatia Kunyong ugi fa he. Unwaa umen i u ba da bendi puu gbà lè 'igyang 'igi.
40012019	U ba shwan 'ushwan or, ngwu ù gaa 'igegaa or ye, u ba naa he 'ukwo gaa 'igegaa ye.
40012020	Abia angi a nii shī he itang or, u ba tyam āngi ye. Kìndē ashi 'i la nim or, u ba nim āshi ye. U ba ngib lityam kpamm u gbe shi 'igyang 'i hwò 'ibibi.
40012021	Bendi puu be ba ndor lishi ha ahe."
40012022	Bendi besuso be hà be lè ungikye ususo be hwaa lè Ujeso. Ungikye umen i a ma hwuà ashi, u kwom umbell likorye ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe. Ujeso a mbee he. A maa fel kong likong, u mbee ndè.
40012023	Ki kwu bendi he 'uhwo, be fel bii le: "Unwaa Udebid na ù nya yi nyin ye a?"
40012024	Bendi Iferesis be kung fan ābe le: "U ndō ikeb ibibi le bwo Ubielzebul angwu ù yi usu bibibi a ke-e ikeb a."
40012025	Ujeso a ngye igim ibell, a kung de be le: "Kubong ahwu 'u tang he abwo keb andoale ha bende 'ù hà ndo naa ye. Kikwu-lihwan ashi 'i tang he abwo keb andoale 'ì hà ndo naa ye.
40012026	Fe gbe bendi Usetan be tang he abwo keb andoale ha bende, hà 'i ze le be tang he abwo, be ba naa ye.
40012027	Nyong 'ì yi nyin, ma de le mi ndō ikeb ibibi le bwo Ubielzebul a ke-m ikeb a. Ayang a hà ke bendi bēmen ikeb le bè ndō āngi? Bendi bēmen begyang be tyung le ma mbeb.
40012028	Ukatia Kunyong Unim na u ke-m ikeb le mì ndō ikeb ibibi. Ashin 'i tyung le ikeb Kusu Unim i fel he liwu līmen mà.
40012029	"Kì yi lè undi angwu u gye he ushom undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb lè kung he bigbor faale afaale a kwu-e bua indi ukpong ye. U kwa he bua indi, u hà zī 'ute kung bigbor bima lè há he ushom.
40012030	"Undi angwu ù yi utung ha ami ye, ù yi linaa ha ami; undi angwu u kpell mi kam ikam ye, u peb ipeb.
40012031	He atan-lengi anwun mi de men le undi angwu u kong 'ibibi 'iyang-yang, Unim u tyang ka he, ukpor gbe a kong 'ibibi gbe lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim, ufe, Unim u tyang ka he ye.
40012032	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kong ban mi Unwaa Undigye, Unim u tyang ke he. Undi angwu a kong ban Ukatia Kunyong Unim, ufe, Unim ù hà ndo tyang ka he ye nya a kpamm."
40012033	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Gbe undi a kee agbe anunung, u kwan ùkwán ununung. Gbe undi a kwan ùkwán ubibi, u kwa lè agbe abibi. Be ngya ùkwán uyang-yang gba he agbe angi u wum a.
40012034	Men abe ma ngye beshu ná ìshiı, mà yi bendi bebibi, ma nya kong 'inunung ná a? Ungwu undi u kong 'iwom ashi 'i sho ha ahe lityam a.
40012035	Undi ununung u ba lè 'inunung lè ha ahe lityam angi li sho lè biwom binunung. Undi ubibi u be lè bibibi lè ha ahe lityam angi li sho lè biwom bibibi.
40012036	"Mi kee le mà ngye le, he Liti angi Unim u be tang ushe, undi u ba bun likpe liyang-yang angi lì yi he 'ukpo ye, angi a kong.
40012037	Igie undi igyang na Unim u be kung tang he ushe. Igie undi, gbe i be ke-e likpong ye, i ka he libi."
40012038	Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten lè abe Iferesis be kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, li kee le wò shi 'ikwele-uhwo ashi 'ì tyung ikeb Unim."
40012039	Ujeso a kung kong le: "Men bendi abe he ati anyin ma fel bebibi, mà tem fa Unim or ye. Ma kee le ma ndà 'ikwele-uhwo ashi 'ı tyung ikeb Unim, ukpor mà hà ndo ndà 'isuso fem ashi Ujona tyang ye.
40012040	Nya a na Ujona a ma kwu he lifung ūkwǎn ukaandi ati akie lè besu bekie, kitaa 'imen na mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be kwu he likwun ati akie, besu bekie.
40012041	He Liti angi Unim u be tang bendi ushe, bendi Uninibe be ba bo 'inaa nya, be ke men libi likorye befe be ma bel àtyám lè he biban bibell he 'unyong ahwu be ma gyo Ujona a bun igie Unim. Undi ususo ù yi utung ha amen nyin a dyam hwò Ujona.
40012042	He Liti limen ana, usu ungingye angwu u be lè he Ushiba u ba bo 'inaa nya, u ke bendi abe ati anyin libi likorye a ma tan lè he 'ubong 'uma ukong-ukong-ukong lè gyo biwom abi Usu Usolomon u hwua lè lishi abyele. Undi ususo ù yi utung ha amen nyin 'anaa-anaa i a dyam hwò Usolomon."
40012043	Ujeso a mbee de be le: "He 'unyong ahwu ikeb ibibi ı fem lè ha undi, i la tan mbee libeb kee 'iteng ashi ì kwu sho 'unyong. Gbe i ndè ye,
40012044	i tem kong ha 'uhwo-ngi le, i ba tem gya he 'ipi i ma be. I tem la ndà 'ipi 'imen ana 'ì yi 'itaa-itaa, bigbor bi shi ndor he 'iteng ábi,
40012045	i hà tem la ba lè ikeb ibibi idyong-ifee angi i ban hwò angi igyang. Be be fel ha undi umen ana, be shi-e u fel ban hwò 'itaa a ma yi lè he ukpi-ikwu. Kitaa 'imen i na 'ı be shi ha bendi bebibi abe ati anyin."
40012046	Nya a na Ujeso a maa kong ha bendi, bebwanam lè anam be be naa he igye. Be kee le be kong ha ahe.
40012047	Undi ususo angwu a ma yi há a kung de Ujeso le: "Anaa lè bebwanaa bè yi naa he igye, be kee le be kong ha awo."
40012048	Ujeso a fan le: "Ayang ù yi andagi; beyang bè yi bebwandagi?"
40012049	A kung 'ubwo tyung hwaa lè bendi-utung bema, u de le: "Aben na bè yi andagi lè bebwandagi.
40012050	Undi angwu u shi 'iwom ashi Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe a kee le ù shi na ù yi andagi lè unwandagi a."
40013001	Nya he liti limen ana Ujeso a bo lè he ushu angwu á yi kwu gye he ungwu umbwo. A bel kwu ko he-e ù hwua bendi biwom.
40013002	Bendi gbamm be ma sho kel-kel fe-e. He ashina a bo lè ngwee he 'inong lishor, bel kwu há, bendi be sho he ugo-igye.
40013003	A hwua ābe biwom gbamm gbe he ityang. A de be le: "Ungikye ususo a ma gye ìtǒng bikwukwan awele.
40013004	Nya a na a maa wu ìtǒng bikwukwan he utia, ìtǒng isuso i mbu wu lè ubi-ukwo lè ubi-ukwo. Linyun li be kpi āngi mbell.
40013005	Isuso i mbu pwom he 'ukor he 'ipi itang ì yi gbungg ye. Le bwo itang ì yi gbungg ye, itong i mbi akikye.
40013006	Ishu i kung bi gwu bikwukwan bimen ana. Bi ma hwō likorye idaa ábi i gye he itang ye.
40013007	Ìtǒng isuso i mbu wu há 'ipi ikwu agasham ì yi. Nyong agasham a mbi, a mbell nim āngi.
40013008	Ìtǒng isuso i mbu wu he itang inunung. I mbi, i kaa shi ìtǒng. Aten asuso a shi ìtǒng asi adyong, asuso ìtǒng asi akie, asuso ìtǒng lisi lè ngi lihwo."
40013009	Ujeso a hà kung de be le: "Angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo."
40013010	Bendi-utung Ujeso be be hwaa lè he, be bii he le: "Ki shi ná a, wo kong ha bendi abena he ityang a."
40013011	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Men na Unim a tyung amen 'undyell gbe lè Kusu 'uma. A tyung ābe befe a ye.
40013012	Undi angwu ù yi lè 'iwom, Unim u fa shwa he áshi he-e ù kwu lè shi 'ì go kangg gbe gyong 'itaa a kee. Ukpor undi angwu ù yi lè shi ye, ake ù yi lè ke zangg or, Unim u pan kpa kúng he áke.
40013013	Atan-lengi angwu mı bun gbe he ityang a ù yi le be ndà andele ufe-ufe-ufe, ukpor ki nung ābe ye; be gyo agyoale ufe-ufe-ufe, be ngya likpe lima ye.
40013014	Be shi nya a na Azaya a ma fee a. A ma fee le Unim a de le: 'Bendi aben be ba gyo agyoale ufe-ufe-ufe, be ngya likpe lima ye. Be nde andele ufe-ufe-ufe, ki nung ābe ye,
40013015	likorye be teb àtyám, be kwom atyung abell, be mbee shib àshì abell, teng 'iwom 'i nung ābe, be gyo, be ndè shob, be bel hwaa lè mi, mi tyang biban bibell ke be.' "
40013016	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Liti li ngbebb amen, likorye ma ndà, ma mbee gyo.
40013017	Mà ngye dangg le bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim gbamm lè bendi Unim besuso be maa kee le hang be ndà abi ma ndè i, be mbee gyo abi ma gyo i, ukpor be maa ndà or, ngwu bè gyo or ye."
40013018	"Mà dang 'utyung hè men mà gyo likpe ityang angi gbe lè ìtǒng bikwukwan.
40013019	Ìtǒng angi i mbu wu he ubi-ukwo ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo 'isom ashi gbe lè Kusu Unim, ki nung ābe ye, Usetan, usu bibibi, u ba kpa kung 'isom lè ha abe atyam.
40013020	Ìtǒng angi i mbu wu he itang angi ì yi akor-akor ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo 'isom Unim be kpe shi lè igor,
40013021	ukpor 'i ngwee ha abe atyam ye. Be bong ha Unim he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg. Gbe be kpē 'ingie likorye be bong ha 'isom 'imen i, be wee abwo nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
40013022	Angi i mbu wu he 'ipi ikwu agasham ì yi, ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo 'isom gyo-gyo, ufung awaale angwu gbe lè biwom abi he igye anyin lè benyin bingbebb bi gwu 'isom ashi be gyo, be nem shi āshi ye.
40013023	Ìtǒng angi i mbu wu he itang inunung ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo 'isom, ki nung ābe. Be ba lè lifem li kwu ná àtén angi a shi ìtǒng asi adyong, asuso ìtǒng asi akie, asuso lisi lè ngi lihwo."
40013024	Ujeso a bun ityang isuso de be le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná undi angwu a wu ìtǒng bikwukwan inunung he utia uma.
40013025	He liti ken lè 'usu he 'unyong ahwu bendi puu bè yi he 'unde, undi-linaa uma a be wu ikwu abia há he utia gbe lè há.
40013026	Bikwukwan abi binunung bi mbi kaa kpè, bi shi azam, keb ahwanale; abia or a hwan.
40013027	Bendi aki ungikye umen ana be be de-e le: 'Ukaandi, ndè le wo ma wu ìtǒng bikwukwan inunung ife-ife a ha awo utia? Abia afe a hà be lè hung a?'
40013028	Ugyang utia a kung fan ābe le: 'Undi-linaa na a shi 'imen i.' Bendi aki be kung bii he le: 'Wo kee le lì lè gbel abia angi há a?'
40013029	Gyo he le: 'Dia! Gbe ma gbel āngi, ma waa lè bikwukwan or.
40013030	Mà tyang ābi bì kaa utung-utung kpamm nyong liti angi be tam. Mi ba da bendi abe be tam le bè nam abia a 'ushu gbong āngi bua abua-abua ting shī 'ìndē. Be hà tam bikwukwan abi binunung fe-m he ābèl.' "
40013031	Ujeso a bun ityang isuso de be le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná ùtǒng angwu be ko he igie Beke le umustad, angwu a zen hwò ìtǒng puu. Undi u kung he kwan he utia, u mbi, u kaa dyam hwò bikwukwan puu. U fel ùkwán, linyun li lè shi agwu he ibubu ima."
40013033	Ujeso a mbee bun ityang de be le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná iyist angi ı shi ibred ı mbwee nà. Ungingye u kung āngi bell pel ha itasa ifelawa ikie he 'ikpetye, i gbo kpē mbee āngi puu."
40013034	Ujeso a maa bun biwom abin puu da bendi gbamm gbà he ityang a. A maa da ābe 'iwom faale ityang ye.
40013035	A ma shi nya a na undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a kong leěti a. A ma kong le: "Mi ba kong ha abe gbà he ityang. Mi ba da ābe biwom abi bì yi he 'undyell kung lè há he 'unyong ahwu Unim a shi igye anyin."
40013036	Ujeso a hà gbe lè há he liwu bendi lè ngwee he afee ushom. Bendi-utung bema be kung be hwaa lè he de-e le: "De li likpe ityang angi gbe lè abia angi he utia."
40013037	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Undi angwu a wu ìtǒng inunung na ù yi-m, mi Unwaa Undigye;
40013038	ùtiá u shi igye anyin; ìtǒng inunung i shi bendi abe bè yi ke Kiteng-usu Unim; abia à yi bendi abe bè yi ke Usetan, usu bibibi.
40013039	Undi-linaa angwu a kwan abia u shi Usetan. Kunyong ahwu be tam 'u shi umbee-likel liti igye anyin; bendi abe be be tam be shi idengell Unim.
40013040	Nya a na be ma gbong abia ting shī 'ìndē, kitaa 'imen na 'ı be kwu he umbee-likel liti igye anyin.
40013041	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba som idengell igi i la gbong bendi puu lè he Kiteng-usu 'igi abe be maa shi bendi be shi biban lè bendi bebibi abe be teng puu,
40013042	la fa he 'inde 'ikaandi he 'ipi be be kwu ki, be kem ishang lè 'imbwee kangg.
40013043	Bendi Unim befe be ba taa ná libwee he Kiteng-usu Atyabell Unim. Gbe mà yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, mà gyo."
40013044	"Kusu Unim 'ù mbee yi ná 'iwom ashi 'ı kaa 'ate ashi 'ì yi ndyell he 'upung. Gbe undi a gia he, u tyang he ndyell há. U gbe lè há lè igor lè kung biwom bima puu abi ù yi lè bi ndyebb zi, u tem lè ndyebb kung 'upung 'umen ana."
40013045	"Kusu Unim 'ù mbee yi ná undi-ūshī u shun 'iwom 'inunung ashi 'ì yi ná 'ukpana.
40013046	Gbe a lè ndè shi 'i ngbebb 'unung kangg, u tem lè kung biwom abi ù yi lè bi ndyebb zi lè ndyebb 'iwom 'imen ana."
40013047	"Kusu Unim 'ù mbee yi ná 'ataa ake be tyang gye he umbwo, ka lè kwu bitaa īkwǎn atyetye-atyetye.
40013048	Gbe 'ataa 'a sho, bendi abe be kwu ìkwǎn be su lè ke gye he ugo-igye lè bel kwu ko taa āngi. Be kung ìkwǎn angi inunung fe he bigbor bibell; be kung biziizi lè ìnòng lishor wu lè hell.
40013049	Kitaa 'imen na 'ı be kwu he umbee-likel liti igye anyin. Idengell Unim i ba la taa bendi bebibi lè ha abe benunung,
40013050	ta lè abe bebibi la tya he 'inde 'ikaandi. Bendi bemen i be ba kya há, kem ishang lè 'imbwee kangg."
40013051	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Biwom abin bi nung amen a?" Be bong.
40013052	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Ashin 'i ze le undi uyang-yang angwu u hwua bendi Iten, gbe be hwua he gbe lè Kusu Unim u kwa nya a na ugyang ushaale angwu u gye he 'ipi ashi a ndor biwom lè kung biwom bifufe lè abi bitim be he igye a."
40013053	Ujeso a bun ityang anyin puu, a ha gbe lè há he 'iteng 'imen ana,
40013054	gye he 'ubong 'uma. Nya a na a ma yi há, a maa hwua bendi he ushom ubell angwu be kwu liwu. Bendi abe be gyo he, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo. Be fel bii le: "A hà be lè lishi abyele anyin lè hung a? A be lè ikeb angi u shi bikwele-uhwo abin lè hung a?"
40013055	Be mbee bii le: "Ù yi unwaa ukapenta a ye a? Umeri na ù yi anam ye a? Ujems lè Ujosef lè Usaimun lè Ujudas na bè yi bebwende ye a?
40013056	Bebwende abe bengingye na lì yi lè bende i puu ye a? A be lè bimen i lè hung a?"
40013057	Be fel tel he. Ujeso a kung de be le: "Bendi be ka undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim ife mbee bipi puu, ukpor bendi abe he 'ubong 'uma lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima be ka he ife ye."
40013058	A shi bikwele-uhwo gbamm he ahe 'ubong ye, likorye be ma fe lityam ha ahe ye.
40014001	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana na Uherod angwu a ma yi usu Ugalili a ma gyo gbe lè Ujeso.
40014002	A kung de bendi bema le, Ujon angwu a maa kib bendi he umbwo na a tem wum lè he lihwu. Kife na 'i tan lè shi u shi bikwele-uhwo bimen i 'itaa i.
40014003	Kitaa i na Ujon a hwō. Uherod a ma kpē kung Uherodias angwu a ma yi ungye unwanam Uherod angwu be ko le Ufilip. Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a maa da Uherod kpamm le uten a bong le ù kpē kung Uherodias ye. Uherod a kong, be kwu Ujon be fe-e ashishilika te lè he lè fe he igaadye. A shi ashin he 'uhwo Uherodias.
40014005	Uherod a ma kee le u gwa Ujon, ukpor a ma shell ná u gwu-e likorye bendi Ijuus be maa da le ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a.
40014006	He liti ken Uherod a shi 'ipam awellale liti lihwan lima. Unwaa Uherodias a ma ngyor angyor he ashi begaandi puu.
40014007	Ki nyin Uherod he lityam. A kung kyebb he le u tyuú he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi a kee.
40014008	A lè bii anam. Anam a tebb he le ù lè de Uherod le ù tang lishi Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo, fe he undor tyuú he 'anaa-anaa nyin. Unwaa umen ana a lè tem de-e nya a na anam a kong.
40014009	Ki ban usu he lityam. Ukpor le bwo a ke úkyébb he ashi begaandi bema, a ke uten le bè lè shi nya a na a kee.
40014010	Uherod a ma som, be lè kwu Ujon há he igaadye tang lishi.
40014011	Be be lè lishi lima he undor be ke unwaa umen ana. Ufe u kpe ngi lè ke anam.
40014012	Bendi-utung Ujon be be kung 'ikem 'ima lè ngi, be hà lè de Ujeso ashi 'i shi.
40014013	Ujeso a gyo ashin, a kung gbe lè he 'iteng ashi a ma yi, lè ngwee he 'inong lishor gye he 'iteng ashi undi ù yi ye. Bendi be gyo gbe lè shi, be gbe pwom he he abee.
40014014	Ujeso a kung fem lè he afee 'inong be ndè liwu bendi. Beshi be kung shi-e lè be kangg. A ma mbee bendi-angmam abe be be há.
40014015	Nya he likwulukwu limen ana bendi-utung bema be be hwaa lè he, de-e le: "Likwulukwu li gyebb mà. Bendi be ndē nyin he 'iteng ashin ye. De bendi le bè ndo gye he ishaale hè be bè lè kee lizi ndyebb zi."
40014016	Ujeso a kung de be le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le bè gye ye. Befe-gyang bè ke be ashi bè zī.
40014017	Be kung de-e le bè kee-kee yi lè bikem ibred bidyong lè ìkwǎn ifee a.
40014018	Ufe a kung de be le bè be lè bi. Be te lè bi.
40014019	A kung de bendi bemen ana, be be kwu ko he bikpam. A kpē bikem ibred bidyong lè ìkwǎn ifee ana kwu he abwo, u kung àshì gye he 'usi lifung-atabe pee Unim. A kung ibred bun ibun ibun kung ke bendi-utung bema, be kpē ke bendi abena.
40014020	Puu ubell be ma zī gwul. Bendi-utung Ujeso be gbong bigem abi be zī bi teng. Be sho bitetel lihwo lè bi bifee.
40014021	He liwu bendi abe be ma zī lizi ana, bekaandi bengikye befe-befe be maa mbee asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'afee lè bendi asi lihwo, fem bengingye lè inwaabwan tyang.
40014022	Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema le bè lè ngwee he afee 'inong ndo gye he igbindi umbwo angwell. A hà de bendi abe be teng le bè ndo gye.
40014023	A de bendi, be gbe ligye puu, a mbo gye he 'igugo ututeb lè kong ha Unim. Likwulukwu li gyebb, Ujeso a ma yi há he 'igugo ututeb.
40014024	Kinong 'i shi he 'udyan umbwo. Ushob umbwo a maa bong 'inong 'ì te sii ye, likorye 'ufem 'u maa shà ndà àshì hwaa lè 'ife a.
40014025	He ashi liti Ujeso a tan he likwu umbwo lè hwaa lè be.
40014026	Bendi-utung bema be ma fel he 'ushell he 'unyong ahwu be nde-e u tan he likwu umbwo. Kushell 'u ma shi ābe be ma fel gaa le: "Uhwutang a."
40014027	Ujeso a kung de be nya 'ukwo-ukwo le: "Mi a; mà shell ye."
40014028	Ipita a kung de-e le: "Atyagi, gbe 'ì yi awo a, wo de-m le mî tan he likwu umbwo be hwaa lè wo."
40014029	Ujeso a kung de-e le ù be. Ipita a fem lè he afee 'inong tem abee he likwu umbwo, u ndo la hwaa lè Ujeso.
40014030	Ipita a ndè 'ufem 'u shà kangg, u fel shell. A keb animale gye he liten umbwo, u fel kya ko Ujeso le ù kpan he.
40014031	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo Ujeso a ndaa 'ubwo kwu-e, u de-e le: "Wo fe lityam ha ami gbungg ye. Ki shi ná a, wó yi fel tyāng ityang?"
40014032	Be lè kwu he afee 'inong. Kufem 'u kwun.
40014033	Bendi-utung Ujeso abe be teng be pee Ujeso, de-e le: "Wò yi Unwaa Unim a 'igyang."
40014034	Be gyong umbwo ukaandi gye he 'ipi ashi be ko le Ugenesaret.
40014035	Bendi be shob Ujeso. Be som ko bendi-angmam abe bè yi he abong angi à yi há kel-kel. Be be lè be hwaa lè Ujeso.
40014036	Be tim Ujeso anung le ù tyang bendi-angmam bè tyua he 'ubwo he ungwu aliga ufe-ufe or. Bendi puu abe be tyua he 'ubwo bé mbeē.
40015001	Bendi Iferesis lè bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten be be lè he Ujeruselem be hwaa lè Ujeso. Be bii he le:
40015002	"Ki shi ná a, bendi-utung begang be ban itel angi betietyan be ke li? Be to abwo he 'ukwo ahwu 'ù yi kpa-kpa ná itel ityan ì yi mà ukpong be hà zī lizi ye."
40015003	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Ki shi ná a, men ma ban Iten Unim, ma shi iten angi īmen igyang?
40015004	Unim a de le: 'Fe atia lè anaa,' u mbee de le undi angwu a kong ban atyam or, anam or, bè gwu-e.
40015005	Ukpor men ufe ma hwua bendi le gbe undi ù yi lè 'iwom ashi hang a kung kpell atyam or, anam or, gbe a ko āshi le kuke Unim,
40015006	hà 'ì nem yi le ù ke atyam lè anam ife ye. Na ma ban Iten Unim shi imen nyin 'itaa i á.
40015007	Men abe mà yi àshì lè benyin, lityam lè bebong, Azaya a ma kong 'igyang a gbe lè men. A kong le, Unim a de le:
40015008	'Bendi aben be ka-m ife he ungwu ufe-ufe a. Ukpor àtyám abell à yi lè 'igbe lè ha ami.
40015009	Ìfé angi 'itaa i ì yi 'idideng a. Be hwua iten bendigye nya a na ì yi àngi igi a.' "
40015010	Ujeso a hà ko bendi abe bè yi há be hwaa lè 'uhwo-ma, u kung de be le: "Ashi mi ndo de men i, mà dang 'utyung gyo āshi hè 'ì nung amen.
40015011	Kiwom ashi undi u kung fe he ungwu na 'ı ban he ye, kiwom ashi u kong lè he ungwu be he igye na 'ı ban he."
40015012	Bendi-utung bema be hà be hwaa lè he, bii he le: "Wó yi nya ngye le bendi Iferesis bé yi fel he ingywo he 'unyong ahwu wó yii kong igie anyina bee?"
40015013	A kung ityang bun le: "Kikwukwan 'iyang-yang ashi Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe na a kwan ye, be wob āshi lè idaa lè idaa tyang lè hell."
40015014	A hà de bendi-utung bema le, "Mà tyang ābe bè shi ashi befe be kee. Bè yi bihwua-ashi bekaandi a. Ki shi le gbe undi angwu a hwuà ashi u teng unde-ma uhwua-ashi, befe a puu befee be la mbwa fa he libell."
40015015	Ipita a hà kung bii he le ù de be ashi ityang anyin i ze.
40015016	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Men or titi 'i wa nung amen ye a?
40015017	Kì yi le mà ngye le gbe undi a kung 'iwom fe he ungwu, u za āshi fa he lifung, u ngyà āshi wa lè hell, ki mbee he lè he inyiahwo.
40015018	Biwom abi undi u kong lè he ungwu uma be he igye bi ba lè ha ahe lityam a. Bife na bı ban undigye.
40015019	Igim ibibi angi ı be lè he lityam undigye na ı shi-e u gwu undi, u kee ungye undi, u wul ná bityuale bı wul, u zì 'azi, u bè uman, u kong ban bendi.
40015020	Biwom abin na bı ban undigye. Lizi azele faale abwo atoale he 'ukwo ahwu uten a kong na 'ı ban undigye ye."
40015021	Ujeso a hà bo lè he 'ipi a ma yi ana, gye he 'iteng ashi 'i ma yi gwaa ha ashi angi be ko le Utaya befe lè Usaidon.
40015022	Ungingye angwu a ma yi undi Ijuus a ye, a ma yi ndē há he 'iteng 'imen ana. A ma yi undi Ukenan. A be hwaa lè Ujeso, u ki fe-e le: "Ukaandi, wo igia Udebid, beshi bè sha-a lè mi. Ndè unwaa-gi ungingye, ikeb ibibi i kwu-e betye-betye."
40015023	Nya a na Ujeso a ma wa fan he 'iwom mà ye, bendi-utung bema be keb be fel da he le ù ndō ungingye umen ana lè há. U fem ābe 'ushun gba gyong.
40015024	Ujeso a kung fan ungingye umen ana le: "Mi kee-kee be ke bendi Izwell abe bè yi ná ìtiā angi i nim a."
40015025	Ungingye umen ana a gyo igie imen ana gyo-gyo, a te lè tim anung he 'ushu Ujeso, u de-e le: "Ukaandi, hā kpell mi."
40015026	Ujeso a hà mbee fan he le: "Ki ngbebb le bè kung lizi bendigye ke ibua ye."
40015027	Angwu ungingye ana a kung fan he le: "Ukaandi, kì yi ná. Ukpor ibua or i za atan angi betyabell be taa wu he itang."
40015028	Ujeso a hà kung de ungingye ana le: "Wo fe lityam ha ami 'igyang-igyang. Mi hwuà-a igben angi wo kee." Unwaa ungingye umen ana a ma mbee nya he 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a kong igie anyina.
40015029	Ujeso a gbe lè he 'iteng ashina lè gbe gwaa ha ungwu umbwo Ugalili. A mbo gye he 'igugo lè bel kwu ko.
40015030	Bendi gbamm be be lè bendi abe be hwō abee lè abe be hwuà ashi lè abe be kwom umbell lè abe be mbu bitaa angmam atyetye-atyetye be hwaa lè he. A ma mbee ābe puu.
40015031	Ki ma kwu bendi he 'uhwo ná bendi abe be kwom umbell be fel kong, abe be hwō abee be fel tan, abe be hwuà ashi be fel ndè. Be pee Unim bendi Izwell.
40015032	Ujeso a hà ko bendi-utung bema be he 'iteng ken, u de be le: "Beshi be shi-m lè bendi aben kangg likorye 'unyin 'i fel ati akie ná be kwu utung ha ami, bè tem yi lè ashi be zı ye. Nya a na itung ı ndo ābe i, mi kee le mi da ābe le bè ndo gye he ishu ibell faale afaale mi ke be lizi ye, teng itung i la tyan ābe tyang he 'ukwo."
40015033	Bendi-utung bema be bii he le: "He hung nyin undi ù ha ndè lizi hen libeb angi lì kpè ke 'igegang bendi aben?"
40015034	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le, bè yi lè 'ibang há? Be fan he le, bè yi lè bikem ibred bidyong-ifee lè inwaa īkwǎn zangg.
40015035	Ujeso a hà de bendi bemen ana le bè kwu ko he itang.
40015036	A hà kpē ibred lè ìkwǎn kwu ha ahe 'ubwo, u pee Unim. A kung ābi bun ibun ibun ke bendi-utung bema. Befe be hà kpē bi lè ke bendi abena puu.
40015037	Befe puu be ma zī gwul. Bendi-utung bema be gbong bigem abi be zī bi teng; bi ma sho bitetel bidyong-ifee.
40015038	He liwu bendi abe be ma zī lizi ana, bekaandi bengikye befe-befe be ma yi asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo, fem bengingye lè inwaabwan tyang.
40015039	Ujeso a hà de bendi abena le bè ndo gye. Ufe-gyang a bo lè ngwee he afee 'inong lishor ndo he 'igie 'ubong Umagadan.
40016001	Bendi besuso lè he likwu Iferesis befe lè Isadusis be te lè hwaa lè Ujeso. Be maa kung he lè he 'usi hè be bè gyo ashi u kong. Be de-e le ù shi 'ikwele-uhwo tyung ābe hè be bè ngye le Unim na a som he.
40016002	Ujeso a hà fan ābe le: "Men abe likwulukwu lı gyebb-gyebb, ma de le nyong bibu bi bung gbuu ana liti angi 'uhwo li ba kwa nwongg.
40016003	Leèti-leèti, ma de le nyin umbwo u ndor likorye bibu bi gye kpenn. Ma ndà bibu bife ma ngya àshi bi tyung le nyin 'i sha, ukpor bikwele-uhwo gbe lè ati anyin mà hà ndo ngya likpe ábi ye."
40016004	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Men bendi abe he ati anyin ma fel bebibi, mà tem fa Unim or ye. Ma kee le mì shi 'ikwele-uhwo tyung amen a?" A hà swan de be le u sha 'ikwele-uhwo tyung ābe ye. Kikwele-uhwo ashi u be tyung ābe 'ì kee-kee yi àshi Ujona. A hà gbe tyang ābe gye he 'iteng 'isuso.
40016005	Bendi-utung Ujeso be ma tia umbwo ukaandi kpē igbindi, ukpor be ma well kung ibred ye.
40016006	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà baa 'uhwo-men teng 'iwom Iferesis befe lè Isadusis ashi 'ì yi ná iyist angi ı shi ibred ı mbwee i ban amen."
40016007	Bendi-utung bema bè fel kong ha bende le: "Ujeso a kong ashin le bwo li be lè ibred ye a."
40016008	Ujeso a ngye ashi be kong. A kung de be le: "Má fe lityam ha ami gbungg ye. Kife na 'i shi amen ma kong le ma be lè ibred ye ana.
40016009	Nyong 'ì yi i or, ki wa nung amen ye a? Ma nya naa lityam le mi ma kung bikem ibred bidyong bun ke bendi asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe afee lè bendi asi lihwo be ma zī gwul puu a? Bigem abi be zī bi teng bi ma sho bitetel bifung?
40016010	Hà bendi abe asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo abe mi ma kung bikem ibred bidyong-ifee ke be, ma ma gbong bigem abi be zī bi teng, bi ma sho bitetel bifung?
40016011	Ki shi ná a, men ma fel gim le mí yii kong gbe lè ibred a, he 'unyong ahwu mí yi de men le mà baa 'uhwo-men teng 'iwom Iferesis lè Isadusis ashi 'ì yi ná iyist angi ı shi ibred ı mbwee i ban amen?"
40016012	Ki ma hà nung ābe le Ujeso a maa kong gba lè iyist angi ı shi ibred ı mbwee a ye, a maa da ābe le bè baa 'uhwo-bell lè he biwom abi Iferesis lè Isadusis be hwua a.
40016013	Ujeso a ma gye he lishi Usesaria Ufilipai. A hà bii bendi-utung bema le, bendi be da lè ufe Unwaa Undigye, ù yi ayang undi a?
40016014	Be kung fan he le: "Bendi-iso be da le wò yi Ujon angwu a maa kib bendi he umbwo a. Besuso be de le wò yi Ilaja a; besuso be de le wò yi Ujeremaya a. Gbe 'ì yi ná ye, hà wò yi undi angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim leěti a."
40016015	Ujeso a hà tem lè shi bii ābe befe le: "Men ufe ma hà de le mì yi ayang a?"
40016016	Usaimun Ipita a kung fan he le: "Wò yi Ukristi, Unwaa Unim angwu ù yi uwum a." (Ukristi na Unim a kyebb le u ba som ba he igye anyin le ù kwu Undi-likpan.)
40016017	Ujeso a kung de Ipita le: "Wo unwaa Ujon, Unim a ka-a 'ukwun. Undigye na a hwua-a 'igyang ashi wo kong i ye. Atyagi ugyang angwu he lifung-atabe na a tyung-a ashi wo kong i.
40016018	Mi da awo le, wò yi Ipita, he utie-ukor anwun na mı be tye lìshií liwu bendi abongale ligi. Lihwu or li ba kwa lè ikeb le li hwà āngi ye.
40016019	Mi ka-a ikeb le wò ndè gbe lè bendi abe bè yi ke Kiteng-usu Unim le 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi wo tel he igye anyin, Unim u tel āshi titi he lifung-atabe. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi wo tel āshi he igye anyin ye, Unim u ba tel āshi he lifung-atabe ye."
40016020	Ujeso a hà tebb bendi-utung bema le bè de bendi le ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan a ye.
40016021	Kung lè he 'unyong 'umen ana gye 'ushu, Ujeso a maa fel bun gboo da bendi-utung bema le, kì yi kpe-kpe le ù gye he Ujeruselem hè bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten bè be ke-e 'ingie há kangg. Be ba gwa he, ukpor u ba tem wum lè he lihwu he liti angi lekie.
40016022	Ipita a hà ko he gye he item, lè swan de-e le ù tem kong ná ye. Unim ù hà ndo bong le abin bì shi fe-e ye.
40016023	Ujeso a bel àshì ndè Ipita kporr, a kung igie ikaa-ikaa kong ha ahe le: "Usetan, gbe-m lè nyin. Wo la teng mi le mì shi ban Atyagi a? Ugim ugang ù yi angwu undigye a, ù yi angwu Unim a ye."
40016024	Ujeso a hà kung de bendi-utung bema le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le u pwom mi, ù zob 'uhwo-ma. Ù bong lihwu kung 'ikpakpaa ashi be be maa he bee so, pwom mi.
40016025	Undi angwu a kee le u kpan lishi lima, hà a nim lè 'uhwo-ma. Undi angwu a bong lihwu he 'uhwo ahwu 'ugi na u be kwu lè likpan.
40016026	Gbe undigye ù yi lè biwom puu he igye anyin, kibang 'ı be kwu lifem lima, gbe a nim 'ūnyōng 'uma? U ba kwa lè lifem ye, likorye 'ì yi lè 'iwom ashi undi u be ke kpē 'ūnyōng 'uma ahwu 'u nim ye.
40016027	He ashin, baale mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be be he ikeb Atyagi utung ha idengell ima. Mi be hwee undi uyang-yang he ashi a shi he igye anyin.
40016028	Mi kee le mà ngye dangg le men besuso abe mà yi naa nyin, ma ba hwa ye, kpamm ma gbe nde-m mi Unwaa Undigye, nyong mı be ná Usu."
40017001	Ati a gbe adyong, he ledyong-ken Ujeso a kpē Ipita lè Ujems lè unwaande Ujon gye lè be he lishi ukwell hè befe-befe bè lè kwu há.
40017002	Be lè wu há, Ujeso a gie he ashi abell. Kushu 'uma 'u gie, ku fel taa ná libwee lı taa nà. Bihwom bima or bi taa. Bi fel bifung-bifung kpeladadada.
40017003	Bendi-utung Ujeso be ndè Umosis befe lè Ilaja be fem há, be kong ha Ujeso.
40017004	Ipita a hà kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, kiteng ashin 'i ngbebb ashi lı ngyor kwu i. Gbe 'i ngbebb-a, tyang li lì kaa bebuu bekie, kugang ken, Umosis ken, Ilaja ken."
40017005	Nya a na Ipita a maa so-i kong ashina, kibu ashi 'ı taa 'i ma be shī ābe a kpemm. Be gyo lingmam Unim lè ha 'ibu ana le: "Anwun na ù yi 'iken Unwaa-gi. Ki nyin mi lè he 'indee-indee. Mà gyo he."
40017006	He 'unyong ahwu bendi-utung Ujeso be gyo lingmam limen ana, be ma fel lè 'ushell kangg, be buu lè àshì abell shī fe he itang.
40017007	Ujeso a hà be hwaa lè be, u tyua ābe 'ubwo de be le: "Mà shell ye; mà bo 'inaa."
40017008	Be bo 'inaa bel àshì shun kel-kel, be tem ndè undi-iso pel ha Ujeso ye.
40017009	Nya a na be maa shul ukwell be 'utan, Ujeso a tye be uten le, bè de undi 'iwom ashi be ndè ye kpamm ufe Unwaa Undigye, u gbe hwō wum.
40017010	Bendi-utung bema be kung bii he le: "Kibang 'ì yi atan-lengi nyong bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten be de le Ilaja na 'ì yi kpe-kpe lē ù be be 'ushu?"
40017011	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le Ilaja ù be 'ushu 'igyang he-e ù kam biwom puu.
40017012	Ukpor mi de men le, Ilaja a be mà. Bendi be shi-e 'itaa be kee likorye be shob he ye. Kitaa 'imen i na bendi be be shi-m, mi Unwaa Undigye or, 'iwom 'itaa ashi be kee."
40017013	Bendi-utung bema be hà ndè shob le u kong gbà lè Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a.
40017014	Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be ma tem be hwaa lè liwu bendi. Ungikye ususo a be tim anung he 'ushu Ujeso,
