40017015	u de-e le: "Ukaandi, beshi bè sha-a lè unwaa-gi ungikye angwu u mbu 'ishin. He 'unyong ahwu 'i kwu-e, kunyong 'ususo 'i sha he u mbwa fa he 'inde; kunyong 'ususo 'i shi-e u mbu fe he lishor.
40017016	Mí yi be lè he hwaa lè bendi-utung begang, be mbee he mbeè ye."
40017017	Ujeso a kung fan le: "Men bendi-umbeb, mì kwu utung ha amen lè 'igbe ná a, ma hà fe lityam ha ami? Ma kee le mì ngib lityam lè men 'igbe ná a?" A hà de-e le: "Be lè unwaa umen ana ke-m."
40017018	Ujeso a kung gaa fe ikeb ibibi ana. I fem lè ha unwaa umen ana, a mbee nya he abwo-abwo.
40017019	Bendi-utung bema be hà te lè bii he he 'undyell le: "Kibang a, bel lí yii ndō ikeb ibibi ana mbeè ye?"
40017020	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Atan-lengi uma ù yi le, má yi fe lityam ha ami gbungg ye. Mà ngye le 'í yi yi le lityam angi ma fe ha ami lì fel kee-kee dyam ná ùtǒng 'ikwukwan angwu a zen hwò puu or, hang ma da ukwell le ù kwuo, u kwuo, hang ma sha biwom puu mbeè. [
40017021	Kiwom ashi 'ı kee-kee ke undigye ikeb le ù ndō ikeb ibibi angi 'itaa i 'ì yi akongale ha Unim lè itung andoale a.]"
40017022	Nya a na Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa so-i tan he Ugalili, Ujeso a ma de be le: "Kunyong 'u ndo fel há ahwu undi u be kwu-m, mi Unwaa Undigye, fe bendigye he abwo.
40017023	Be ba gwa-m, ukpor mi be tem wum lè he lihwu he liti angi lekie." Bendi-utung bema be ma fel lè 'imbwee kangg.
40017024	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be lè wu he Ukapanyam wu-wu, bendi abe be maa tan kpē úndē Ushom Unim angwu he Ujeruselem be lè bii Ipita le: "Ukaandi ūmen u dya úndē Ushom Unim a?"
40017025	Ipita a bong le u dya. Ipita a hà te lè hwaa lè Ujeso he ushom. Ujeso a kpi 'ikwu bii Ipita le: "Kibang ashi wo gim gbe lè ukpanda atyele? Ayang ù yi le ù tye ukpanda, begyang 'ubong â, hà begaandi á?"
40017026	Ipita a kung de-e le, begaandi na 'ì yi le bè tye ukpanda. Ujeso a hà kong le: "Ashin 'i ze le begyang 'ubong be tya ye.
40017027	Le bwo bel ufe, li kee le li sha ashi 'ì shi ābe bè mbu linaa ha abel ye, wo-ò gye he umbwo ukaandi lè tyang ukwugya. Ukpi-ikwu ūkwǎn angwu wo kwu, wo buu he ungwu, wo fem úndē lè ha angwu u kpè dye lishi ligi or, ligang or. Kung úndē ana lè dye lishi lityan."
40018001	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi-utung bema be be hwaa lè he, bii he le: "Ayang a dyam hwò bendi puu abe bè yi ke Kiteng-usu Unim?"
40018002	A hà kpē unwani lè naa he liwu libell.
40018003	A kung de be le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le, gbe ma keb 'uhwo-men tem fel ná inwaabwan ye, mà hà ndo kpa Unim ná Usu ūmen ye.
40018004	Undi uyang-yang angwu a keb 'uhwo-ma tem fel ná unwani, hà ù yi undi angwu a dyam hwò bendi puu abe bè yi ke Kiteng-usu Unim.
40018005	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kpē unwani 'itel i or he lizen ligi, hà a kpe-m mi a."
40018006	Ujeso a de le: "Bebwani abe be bong ha ami nyin, gbe undi a shi ābe, undi ken or, a shi 'iban, hà 'i ban kangg. Ashi le bè kung 'ukor 'ukaandi tye tyuu undi angwu há he umbell lè tye he umbwo ukaandi, ki ngbebb hwò ashi le ù shi undi ù shi 'iban.
40018007	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka bendigye likorye biwom abi bı shi bendi be shi 'iban bi go hen he igye kangg. Kì yi kpe-kpe le igilale angi ı shi undi u shi 'iban i ba, ukpor 'i ba kwa 'ibibi ka undi angwu a be lè ngi.
40018008	"Undi angwu 'ubwo 'uma a or, kubee 'uma a or, ku shi-e u shi 'iban, ù tang āhwu tyang hell. Ki ngbebb le undi ù kwu lè likpan lè 'ubwo ken lè 'ubee ken hwò ashi le ù kwu lè abwo afee lè abee afee, gye he 'ìndē ashi 'ı nim ye ngyor igye kpamm.
40018009	Undi angwu utong-shi uma na u shi-e u shi 'iban, ù yii waa he tyang hell. Ki ngbebb le undi ù kwu lè likpan lè utong-shi ken hwò ashi le ù kwu lè itong-shi ifee, gye he 'inde."
40018010	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Mà baa teng ma kong le bendi abe be ngyor he ashi inwaabwan inwaabwan bè yi ilaa-ilaa. Bè yi lè idengell angi he lifung-atabe angi ı kwu ìtım gbe lè be ha Atyagi mbee 'unyong kpamm. [
40018011	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi be mî kpan bendi abe be nim a.]
40018012	"Men ma nya gim le, gbe undi ù yi lè ìtiā asi adyong, angwu ken a waa nim, u sha ná a?" A de be le: "U tyang angi asi ande lè ngi lihwo lè ngi idyong-inde ndor he 'ipi ı zī abia, gya la shun angwu a nim ana.
40018013	Mi kee le mà ngye le, gbe a nde-e, u yal gor kangg he 'uhwo utia ken ana hwà ìtiā asi ande lè ngi lihwo lè ngi idyong-inde angi i nim ye.
40018014	Kitaa 'imen ana Atyetyan angwu he lifung-atabe a kee le bendi bemen abe be ngyor he ashi inwaabwan inwaabwan i, bè waa nim ken or ye."
40018015	"Gbe unwanaa a shi ban-a, wo te lè hwaa lè he he ashi afee de-e 'ibibi ashi a shi. Gbe a dang 'utyung gyo-a, hà wo kpan unwanaa.
40018016	Ukpor gbe a dang 'utyung gyo-a ye, wo lè kee undi ken or, bendi befee or, fe he 'ikwu mbee lè hwaa lè he, hè likong lì mbee he ungwu bendi befee.
40018017	Gbe a dang 'utyung gyo ābe ye, wo lè bun āshi de liwu bendi abongale. Gbe a mbee gyo ābe befe or ye, wo shi-e nya a na be shi undi angwu a bong ha Unim ye, ha undi angwu u kpē ukpanda."
40018018	"Mi kee le men puu mà ngye le, kiwom ashi ma tel āshi he igye anyin, Unim u tel āshi he lifung-atabe or. Àshi ma tel āshi he igye ye, Unim u tel āshi he lifung-atabe or ye.
40018019	"Mà mbee ngye le, gbe bendi befee he igye i be tim lè bii mi 'iwom ken, Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe u sha āshi.
40018020	He 'iteng ashi bendi befee or, bekie or, be kpee he lizen ligi mi kwa utung ha abe há."
40018021	Ipita a die be hwaa lè Ujeso, bii he le: "Atyagi, gbe unwandagi a shi ban mi, mì tyang ke-e 'ugbe 'afung? Mì tyang ke-e 'ugbe 'adyong-ifee a?"
40018022	Ujeso a kung fan he le: "E-e-eng, kugbe 'adyong-ifee a ye, tyang ke-e 'ugbe asi akie lè hwu lihwo 'ugbe 'adyong-ifee.
40018023	"Gim gbe lè Kusu Unim 'itaa i. Ki ma yi lè usu angwu a maa kee le u ngya 'ugii úndē uma angwu bendi aki bema bè yi lè he.
40018024	A keb akwuale. Be hà be lè undi aki ken angwu a zi-e lihwua igaa unde asisilisi asisilisi.
40018025	A ma yi lè úndē u hwee he ye. Ukaandi uma a de le bè kwu-e ufe-gyang lè ungye-ma lè bebwaa-ma lè biwom puu abi ù yi lè bi, lè ndyebb zi kpē úndē uma hè be bè hwee he lihwua.
40018026	Undi ana a bel tim anung he itang, u de ukaandi uma le: 'Ukaandi, kusi mi tim-a anung le wò ngib lityam, mbee ke-m 'anwaa 'unyong zangg. Mi ba hwee-a unde ugang puu.'
40018027	Beshi be shi ukaandi uma lè he. A de-e le ù ndo gye, a tyang lihwua ke-e.
40018028	"Undi umen i a gbe ligye lè kpee lè unde-ma ken angwu a zi-e lihwua úndē zangg. A kwu-e, u hwom he abwo he umbell, u de-e le ù hwee he unde uma 'unyin.
40018029	Unde-ma a tim anung he itang, tim he anung le kusi ù ngib lityam, mbee ke-e 'anwaa 'unyong zangg. U ba hwee he unde uma puu.
40018030	A swan, a kwu-e lè fe he igaadye le ù kwu há kpamm u gbe hwee he unde uma.
40018031	Bende-ma, bendi aki abe be teng, be ndè ashi a shi. Ki nyung ābe he lityam kangg. Be lè bun de ukaandi ubell ashi a shi puu.
40018032	"Ukaandi uma a ko he de-e le: 'Wò yi ubibi, mi tyang lihwua angi wo zi-m ka-a, likorye wo tim mi anung.
40018033	Hang wo kwu lè beshi ha unde-gang ná mí ma yi lè beshi ha awo.'
40018034	Ki nyung ukaandi anwuna he lityam kangg. A de le bè kwu undi aki anwuna lè fe he igaadye, be ke-e 'ingie há kpamm u gbe hwee he unde uma puu."
40018035	Ujeso a fe lishi ityang anyin le: "Kitaa ana na Atyagi angwu he lifung-atabe u be shi amen, gbe undi-undi u tyang ke unwanam lè he lityam ye."
40019001	Ujeso a kong ashin puu, a bo lè há he 'ubong Ugalili gye he igbindi umbwo Ujodan he 'ubong ahwu be ko le Ujudia.
40019002	Bendi be ma kwuo pwom he. A mbee bendi-angmam abe be be há.
40019003	Bendi Iferesis besuso be be kung he lè he 'usi, be bii he le: "Iten ityan i bong le undi ù ban libee, gbe ù yi lè atan-lengi a?"
40019004	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ma wa bo àshi be fee leěti le, kung lè há he ukpi-ikwu Unim a ma mbe ungikye lè ungingye ye a?
40019005	Unim a mbee de le: 'He atan-lengi anwun ungikye ù tyang atyam lè anam he-e ù gwaa ha ungye-ma. Ufe or, ungye-ma or, be fel ná undi ken.'
40019006	Bè tem yi bendi befee a ye, be fel anung ken. Bwo Unim na a shi ābe le bè bee, undigye ù shi ban ābe libee ye."
40019007	Bendi Iferesis bemen i be tem lè shi bii he le: "Fe 'i shi ná a, nyong Umosis a ma ke li uten le, ungikye angwu a kee le u ban libee ù fee 'ushia libee abanale ke ungye-ma de-e le ù ndo gye?"
40019008	Ujeso a mbee fan ābe le: "Umosis a ma ke men ikeb anyin le bwo ma teb àtyám, ma kpē àshi be hwua amen ye a. Ukpor kung lè he ukpi-ikwu igye anyin 'i ma yi ná ye.
40019009	Mi de men le ungikye uyang-yang angwu a ban libee he atan-lengi uyang-yang fem ashi le a kwu ungye-ma ha ungikye ususo tyang, hà a shi 'iban agbele ipel a, gbe a lè kpebb ungye ususo."
40019010	Bendi-utung bema be kung de-e le: "Gbe libee lì yi ashi 'itaa ana á, hà 'i ngbebb le undi ù kyebb ungye ye."
40019011	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Àshi be kong i, bendi puu na be shi āshi mbeè ye. Bendi abe bè yi lè ikeb Unim na be kee-kee shi 'imen i mbeè.
40019012	Bendi gbamm be kee libee ye. Atan-lengi uma na ù yi i. Besuso be hwō 'ikwu lè he lifung andabell. Besuso, bendi be feé ābe ífee. Besuso be swan libee he 'uhwo Kusu Unim. Undi angwu u shi ashin mbeè, ù bong utebb anwun."
40019013	Bendi besuso be ma be lè bebwaa-bell le Ujeso ù pwom ābe abwo, u bii Unim le ù ke be 'ukwun. Bendi-utung bema be swan ndō ābe.
40019014	Ki ngbebb Ujeso ye. A kung de be le: "Mà tyang bebwani bè be hwaa lè mi. Mà swan ndō ābe ye, likorye abe 'itaa i na Unim ù yi Usu ubell."
40019015	A hà kung abwo ama pwom ābe, u bo gbe lè há.
40019016	He 'unyong ken ungikye ususo a ma be hwaa lè Ujeso, u bii he le: "Ukaandi, kibang 'itaa 'inunung ashi mì nya shi mî kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm?"
40019017	Ujeso a tem lè shi bii he le: "Kibang a, wo bii mi gbe lè 'inunung? Unim ufe-ufe na ù kee-kee yi ununung. Gbe wo kee le wo kwa lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm, wo ndor iten Unim."
40019018	A mbee bii Ujeso le: "Bibang 'itaa iten a?" Ujeso a de le: "Iten angi há na ì yi i. Gwu undi ye. Gbe ipel ha undi ususo fem ungye-gang tyang ye. Zì 'azi ye. Bè uman fe undi ye.
40019019	Fe atia lè anaa. Kì nyin-a lè unde-gang ná 'i nyin-a lè 'uhwo-gang."
40019020	Ungikye umen ana a mbee fan le: "Mi shi iten anyin puu. Kisuso 'i mbee teng le mì shi, mi hà kwu lè likpan limen i a?"
40019021	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Gbe wo kee le wo fel gelalala, wo ndo gye ha awo ushu lè kung biwom bigang puu ndyebb zi, kung úndē ábi ke bendi-likaa, mà wo kwa lè 'ingbebb he lifung-atabe. Gbe wo shi ná, mà wo hà tem be pwom mi."
40019022	A gyo ashin gyo-gyo, a gbe ligye 'imbwee-imbwee likorye a ma mbu 'ingbebb kangg.
40019023	Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le, ki ba kwa lè 'ingie kangg ka bendi-ingbebb le bè keb 'uhwo-bell ke Unim le ù kwu Usu ubell.
40019024	Mà mbee ngye le, kì yi pie-pie le 'igundu 'ì gbe he ligia uwo hwò ashi le undi-ingbebb ù keb 'uhwo-ma ke Unim le ù kwu Usu uma."
40019025	Bendi-utung bema be gyo ashin, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel bii bende le: "Fe ayang ù ha be kwu lè likpan 'unyong?"
40019026	Ujeso a bel àshì ndè be kporr, kung de be le: "Undigye u kpan 'uhwo-ma mbeè ye. Ukpor biwom puu, Unim u sha ābi pie-pie."
40019027	Gyo Ipita le: "Ndè, li tyang biwom puu, fel bendi-utung begang. Kibang 'ì ha be kwu lifem lityan?"
40019028	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le, mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba fel Usu ukaandi, kwa he 'idem 'usu he igye ifufe angi ı be lè há 'ushu. Men bendi-utung begi, abe lihwo lè be befee i, ma ba kwa utung ha ami he bidem 'usu titi, maa àshì Izwell angi lihwo lè ngi afee ushe."
40019029	A mbee de be le: "Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi undi a gbe tyang āshi he 'uhwo 'ugi, mà 'ì yi ushu or, bebwaa or, bebwende or, atyam or, anam or, ùtiá or, u ba kpa lifem hwà abina tyang 'usi-usi, u mbee kpē likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm.
40019030	Bendi gbamm abe bè yi 'ushu 'anaa-anaa i, be ba fel item; abe bè yi item 'anaa-anaa i, be be fel 'ushu."
40020001	Ujeso a ma bun ityang anyin de le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi 'itaa ken ha ungikye ken angwu a ma yi lè ùtiá. A bo leèti-leèti lè kpē bendi le bè lè shi-e aki ha ahe utia.
40020002	A bong le u ka ābe undi-undi únde nya a na be ke he liti. A kong, be gbe lè kpi aki ashele ha ahe utia.
40020003	A mbee gye he ushokwo he inde idyong-inde lè ndè bendi-iso bè yi naa hà likor.
40020004	A kung de be le: 'Men or titi mà ndo te lè shi-m aki he utia. Mi ba ka amen únde nya a na 'ì yi le bè ke.' Be mà gbe ndǒ he aki ashele.
40020005	He libwee 'udyan lishi a mbee kpē bendi aki 'itaa a ken. He inde ikie u mbee lè kpē besuso.
40020006	He inde idyong angi likwulukwu a mbee gye he ushokwo lè ndè bendi-iso bè yi naa há likor. A bii ābe le: 'Kibang a, ma kung liti libo ban naa nyin?'
40020007	Be kung fan he le: 'Likorye 'ì yi lè undi angwu a kpé li he aki ye a.' Ufe a kung de be le: 'Mà ndo te lè shi-m aki ha ami utia.'
40020008	"Likwulukwu li kung gyebb angi bè wee aki. Ugyang utia a kung de undi angwu a maa ndè gbe lè bendi aki bema le ù lè de bendi aki le bè ma wee, u ko ābe be ukem he-e ù ke undi-undi únde uma. U kpi 'ikwu lè abe be be umbee-likel, hà gye ha abe be be 'ushu.
40020009	Bendi abe be ma kpi aki he inde idyong, a ke be undi uyang-yang únde ná be ke undi he liti libo.
40020010	Bendi abe be kpi aki 'ushu be be le be kpa úndē. Be maa kong le befe be ba kpa únde u go hwà abe be be umbee-likel. Ukpor a ke undi-undi 'itaa ken.
40020011	Be kpē unde ubell keb inem anemale fe ugyang utia.
40020012	Be kong le: 'Bel abe li shi aki liti libo gbangg, ishu i bi li na wo ke li únde 'itaa ken ha abe be kee-kee shi aki he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg a?'
40020013	A kung de undi ken le: 'Udim-gi, gyo mi. Mi sha-a zī izi ye, likorye wo-gyang na wó yi bong le wo sha aki he liti he únde 'itaa ana.
40020014	Kanaa-anaa i wò kung únde ugang ndo gye. Mi ke men a puu 'itaa ken, mà angwu há a kpi 'ushu or, umbee-likel or.'
40020015	Atyam a hà bii he le: 'Mì nya yi lè ikeb le mi sha 'iwom lè únde ugi 'itaa mi kee ye a? Wo bung ashi le bwo mi ke faale 'akwukwell â?' "
40020016	Ujeso a kung kong le: "Ashin na 'ı tyung amen le bendi abe bè yi item, be ba fel 'ushu; abe bè yi 'ushu, be be fel item."
40020017	Nya a na Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa ndor àshì gye he Ujeruselem, a ko ābe lihwo lè be befee gye he ufaa kung de be le:
40020018	"Mà gyo, li gya he Ujeruselem he 'ipi ashi undi u be kung mi ke bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten. Be ba ka ikeb le bè gwu-m.
40020019	Be ba kung mi ka bendi abe bè yi 'ubong 'utyan a ye. Bendi bemen i be ba nyan mi, be kpam mi ikwun, be hà maa gwu-m bee he 'ikpakpaa. Ukpor he liti angi lekie mi ba tem wum lè he lihwu."
40020020	Ungye Uzebedi a ma hà be lè bebwaa-ma, bengikye befee, be hwaa lè Ujeso. A keb he itang fe Ujeso, u bii he ukpell.
40020021	Ujeso a kung bii he le: "Kibang ukpell angwu wo kee." A fan Ujeso le: "Mi kee le wò ke-m úkyébb le he 'unyong ahwu wo be fel Usu, bebwaa-gi abe befee i be ba kwa utung ha awo, undi ken u kwu-a lè he 'ubwo lizen, angwell lè he 'ubwo limbell."
40020022	Ujeso a hà de be le: "Má ngye ashi ma bii ye. Men ma nya kpa 'ingie ashi mi ndo be kpē i mbeè a?" Be bong le be kpa āshi mbeè.
40020023	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Ma kpa 'ingie he 'uhwo 'ugi, ukpor mi-ì yi lè ikeb le mi waa undi angwu u be kwu-m lè he 'ubwo lizen or, kwu-m lè he 'ubwo limbell or ye. Atyagi ugyang u ba kung biteng bimen i ka bendi abe a shi ābi ndor ābe."
40020024	Bendi-utung Ujeso abe be teng lihwo be gyo 'iwom ashina. Be fel he ingywo fe bebwaa Uzebedi ana.
40020025	Ujeso a kung ko ābe befe puu be he 'iteng ken, u de be le: "Má ngye ná bendi abe be kee le be kwa bekaandi abe be ndè gbe lè bendi be tyung ikeb ibell. Be sha bendi be fel ná ifee.
40020026	Ukpor men mà shi ná ye. Men ufe, undi angwu a kee le u kwa ukaandi, ù bel fel uboyi bendi abe be teng.
40020027	Undi he liwu līmen angwu a kee le u kwa atie-lishi ūmen puu, undi umen ana ù keb 'uhwo-ma fel ufee bendi,
40020028	nya a na mi Unwaa Undigye, mi be le bendi bè kwu iboyi igi a ye. Mi be le mî kwu uboyi bendi a, mi mbee kung 'uhwo-gi ke, mî pong bendi gbamm."
40020029	Nya a na Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa ndo gbe lè he Ujeriko, bendi be ma ti kwuo pwom he.
40020030	Bendi befee abe be ma hwuà ashi be ma yi kwu he 'ukwo. Be gyo le Ujeso u ba lè há, ba gba nya he 'ukwo 'umen ana. Be fel gaa le: "Ukaandi, igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha abel."
40020031	Bendi gbamm be fel gaa fa ābe le bè naa lè 'ihwee. Behwua-ashi aben be hà mbee kung gaa kangg le: "Igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha abel."
40020032	Ujeso a hà naa, u de be le bè be. A bii ābe le: "Kibang ma kee le mì shi ke men?"
40020033	Be fan he le: "Ukaandi, li kee le wò buu li atong-shi."
40020034	Beshi be shi Ujeso lè be. A tyua ābe abwo he atong-shi. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo be fel nda. Be gbe utung ha ahe.
40021001	Nya a na Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa ndo wu he Ujeruselem, be lè wu he ushokwo Befeji he liten ukwell angwu be ko le Olif. Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema, bendi befee, le u la som ābe gya he 'ushu.
40021002	A de be le: "Mà gye he 'ubong ahwu 'ù yi he 'ushu ana. Ma la wa há, ma ndà 'ukaa-inyia tyuu há lè ahwu umbe. Mà pell ābe a puu befee be lè be ke-m.
40021003	Gbe undi a bii amen atan-lengi angwu ma pell kung ābe, mà de-e le, ki fong Atyamen lè be, mà u tyang amen ma ba lè be."
40021004	Ashin 'i shi nya a na undi angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong leěti a.
40021005	A ma de le: "Mà de bendi Uzayon le, usu ubell u ba lè há. Ù yi mbiloo. U pwom he ushom 'ukaa-inyia."
40021006	Bendi-utung Ujeso be te lè shi nya a na Ujeso a de be.
40021007	Be lè be lè 'ukaa-inyia lè unwaa ahwu be ke-e. Be kung bihwom bibell kie āhwu he item. Ujeso a hà bel kwu há.
40021008	Bendi gbamm be kung bihwom bibell kie he 'ukwo kpuludududu. Besuso be kpi akikie 'iwua kie he 'ukwo.
40021009	Bendi abe be maa te Ujeso lè he 'ushu lè abe be maa pwom he lè he item be maa gaa kong le: "Ipee ì kwu ke igia Udebid. Kukwun 'ù kwu ke undi angwu u be he lizen Atyetyan Unim. Ipee ì kwu ke Unim."
40021010	He 'unyong ahwu a wu há he Ujeruselem, ki kwu bendi puu abe há he 'ukwo kangg. Be fel bii le: "Ù yi 'ibang 'itaa undi a?"
40021011	Bendi abe be ma yi utung ha Ujeso be fan le: "Ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim angwu u be lè he Unazaret he 'ubong Ugalili a."
40021012	Ujeso a gye he afee Ushom Unim há he Ujeruselem. A ndè bendi abe be ndyebb biwom zi lè abe be ndyebb há he Ushom Unim, a ndō ābe wu he igye. U nyii itebul bendi abe be gie únde lè bidem bendi abe be ndyebb inwaa ukwuo abakpa zi wu hell.
40021013	A hà kung de be le: "Be ma fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le Unim a de le, be ba ko Ushom uma le 'iteng ashi bendi be kong ha ahe, ukpor men ma shi-e a bel 'iteng ashi ma ndyell zì 'azi."
40021014	Bendi abe be hwuà ashi lè abe be hwō abee be be hwaa lè Ujeso há he Ushom Unim. A mbee ābe puu.
40021015	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be ndè bikwele-uhwo abi Ujeso a shi, be mbee gyo ná inwaabwan be fel gaa le: "Ipee ì kwu ke igia Udebid." Befe be fel he ingywo.
40021016	Be kung bii Ujeso le: "Wo gyo ashi inwaabwan i gaa ana a?" Ujeso a bong, u de be le: "Men ma wa bo àshi be fee he 'ushia Unim mà ye a? Be fee le: 'Wó hwua inwaabwan lè abe bè so-i nyia àbí hè be bè pee-a.' "
40021017	Ujeso a gbe tyang bekaandi bemen i há he Ujeruselem bo ndo he Beteni. A ngyor há he Beteni taa ashi.
40021018	Ashi a taa, nya a na Ujeso a maa tem lè há Beteni u gye he Ujeruselem, itung i maa fel ndo he.
40021019	A bel àshì ndè ùkwán angwu be ko le ufik naa he ufaa ubo. A gbe gye há lè nde-e ù yi lè agbe ye, ù yi ashia-ashia. A kung de ùkwán ana le ù hà tem wum agbe ye kpamm. Ùkwán ana a mà hwō nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
40021020	Bendi-utung bema be ndè ashin, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel bii he le: "Ki shi ná a, ùkwán anwuna a hwō 'ukwo-ukwo 'itaa ana?"
40021021	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le gbe ma fe lityam ha ami faale atyāngale, ma sha ashi mi shi ùkwán ana mbeè, ma mbee sha gba gyong ashi mi shi ana or, ma da ukwell le ù kwuo lè wu he umbwo ukaandi or, u kwuo.
40021022	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma de Unim lè lishi andorale le ù shi ke men, ma kpa āshi."
40021023	Ujeso a ma mbee gye he Ushom Unim há he Ujeruselem. Nya a na a maa hwua bendi biwom há, bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong be lè bii Ujeso le: "Lè hung wo be lè ikeb angi wō-ò shi biwom bimen i? Ayang a ka-a ikeb imen i?"
40021024	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi bii amen 'ibibi ken ukpong. Gbe ma fan āshi, mi or mi da amen undi angwu a ke-m ikeb angi mı kung shi biwom abin.
40021025	Ayang a ke Ujon ikeb angi a maa kib bendi he umbwo? Unim na a ke-e a, hà bendigye a?" Be maa fel tyāng lè bende le: "Lì fan 'imen i le ana? Gbe li fan he le Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb Unim a, u bii li le, fe 'ibang 'i tan lè shi li bong ha Ujon ye?
40021026	Ukpor lì nya de-e le Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb angi undigye â? Li shell àshi bendi betyan be be shi li, likorye befe puu be bong le Ujon ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a na afong."
40021027	Be hà kung fan Ujeso le be ngye ye. Ujeso a de be le ufe or u da ābe undi angwu a ke-e ikeb angi u shi biwom bimen i ye.
40021028	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà gyo mi hè men mà ndè 'iwom ashi ityang anyin i tyung amen. Ungikye ken a yi lè bebwaa bengikye befee. He liti ken a lè de angwu gbel le ù gye-e he útiá.
40021029	A ma swan de atyam le u ta há ye. Ukpor lè he 'ushu a gie ugim uma, u fel te átyám he utia.
40021030	Ungikye umen i a hà mbee lè de unwaa-ma angwu 'isun le ù gye-e he utia. A bong de-e le: 'Ukaandi, mi ta.' Ukpor a te ye."
40021031	Ujeso a hà bii ābe le: "Bebwaa abe befee i, angwu yang a shi ashi átyám a kee?" Be fan he le angwu gbel a. Ujeso a kung de be le: "Bendi abe be kpē 'ukpanda or, bendi akpela or, be ba kpa Unim ná Usu ubell teng amen.
40021032	Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a be bun 'ukwo Unim de men ná mà kwu kpa-kpa, ma kpe ngi ye. Bendi abe be kpē ukpanda lè abe akpela be bong ha ashi a ma bun de be. Mà na men ma ndè bendi aben be bong ha ashi a bun, kife-ife or 'i fel shi amen ma gie igim īmen, hè men mà bong ha ashi a bun ye."
40021033	Ujeso a de le: "Mà gyo ityang isuso lè. Ungikye ususo a ma nam ùtiá, kwan ìkwán angi be bung agbe ángi shì 'utyuo; a kaa ugbe fe-e kel-kel; u tem 'ania he 'ipi be shor agbe ikwan ana kung umbwo ángi; u shi udye angwu bendi be kwu kang he ùtiá. A kung ùtiá uma fe bendi le bè ndè gbe lè he. A hà bo ndo litan gye he 'ubong 'ususo.
40021034	Kunyong 'u ma fel ahwu bendi be bung agbe ikwan. A hà som ifee ima hwaa lè bendi be bung agbe ikwan. A hà som ifee ima hwaa lè bendi abe be ndè gbe lè utia uma ana le bè lè kpē ūkpō uma be ke-e.
40021035	Bendi abe be ndè gbe lè ùtiá ana be kwu ufee angwu ken kpam. Be maa angwu ken akor. Be hà kwu angwu ken gwu.
40021036	Ungikye umen ana a som ifee ima fel gbe gyong abe 'ushu hwaa lè bendi utia bemen ana. Bendi utia bemen ana be mbee shi ābe 'itaa ken ná be shi abe 'ushu.
40021037	He umbee-likel a hà kung unwaa-ma ugyang som hwaa lè be, lè ugim le 'ì shi ná ana or be ba ka he ufe ife.
40021038	He 'unyong ahwu bendi utia ana be bel àshì ndè unwaa ugyang utia ana, be de bende le: 'Anwun na u be zī lishi átyám. Mà lì gwu-e, mà ùtiá anwun u fel utyan.'
40021039	Be kwu-e fem lè he lè he utia tang gye he igye, lè gwu-e tyang há."
40021040	Ujeso a hà kung bii àbe be gyo he le: "Gbe ugyang utia umen i a hà te lè hwaa lè bendi utia bemen ana, u sha ābe 'ibang a?"
40021041	Befe be fan Ujeso le: "U gwa mbeè bendi bebibi bemen ana puu faale ifung. U kong ùtiá uma ke bendi besuso abe be be ke-e ūkpō uma he 'unyong 'uyang-yang."
40021042	Ujeso a mbee bii ābe le: "Ityang angi be fee he 'ushia Unim leěti, ma wa bo āngi ngye ye a? Be fee le: 'Kukor ahwu bendi abe be tye ushom be swan āhwu le 'u ngbebb he ushom atyele ye, kufe na 'u tem fel kwu ushom naa, genn. Atyetyan Unim na a shi ashin. Ki kwu li he 'uhwo kangg.' "
40021043	Ujeso a hà kung de be le: "Mà nem ba kwa lè abwo he Kusu Unim ye; Unim u ba waa kung bendi abe be shi biwom abi a kee le bè kwu lè abwo he Kusu uma. [
40021044	Undi angwu a mbu pwom nya he likwu 'ukor 'umen ana, u ba bun he ate-ate. Ukpor gbe 'ukor 'umen ana 'u mbu kpǒ he, ku kpò mbyor he.]"
40021045	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bendi Iferesis be gyo ityang imen i puu, be ngye le Ujeso u kong gba lè befe a.
40021046	Be fel kee 'ukwo ahwu be kwu-e. Be shell bendi likorye bendi be bong le Ujeso ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a.
40022001	Ujeso a mbee kong ha bendi gbe he ityang.
40022002	A de be le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná usu ken angwu a ma kam le u ndo kpebb ungye ka unwaa-ma.
40022003	Usu umen i a ma som iboyi ima le ì lè de bendi abe a ko be he 'ipam libee limen i le 'unyong 'u fel há. Ukpor be swan le be ba ye.
40022004	A mbee som iboyi ima isuso le ì lè de bendi bemen ana le: 'Lizi li bi. Biwom puu bi fel ukem. Mà be lè.'
40022005	Ki gbee bendi bemen ana ye. Undi ken a gbe ndo ha ahe utia; angwell u gbe ndo he 'ate.
40022006	Abe be teng be kwu iboyi ana kpam gwu.
40022007	Usu a fel he ingywo kangg. A som ishogya ima, i lè gwu bendi bemen abe be gwu iboyi ima ana, i ting shī ābe 'ubong 'ubell puu.
40022008	A hà ko iboyi ima angi i teng de be le: 'Mi kam 'ipam libee 'igi 'i mbee. Bendi abe mi ma ko ana be kpè ye.
40022009	Kanaa-anaa i, mà tang he igbaakwo lè ko bendi gbamm 'itaa ma ndè be he 'ipam ashin.'
40022010	Iboyi ima ana i bo ndo há he igbaakwo lè ko bendi puu abe be ndè. Be ko àbe bebibi or, abe benunung or. Bendi be sho há he 'ipam gbamm.
40022011	"He 'unyong ahwu usu a be shun inditen begaandi bema, a ndè undi ken angwu a ma fe inditen angi libee ye.
40022012	Usu a kung bii undi umen ana le: 'Udim-gi, ki shi ná a, wo fe inditen libee a ye, wo bel be kwu ko nyin?' Ungikye umen ana a kwu kpii.
40022013	Usu a kung de iboyi ima le: 'Mà kwu-e bua he indi he abwo lè abee, kwu-e gye lè he he igye lè tye he 'ipi 'ifufebb 'ì yi. Nya na u be kwu ki kem ishang.' "
40022014	Ujeso a hà fe ityang imen i lishi le bendi gbamm na ufe a ko, ukpor bendi zangg na u be gia kung.
40022015	Bendi Iferesis be ma gbe he ufaa lè tim azu ná be be kung Ujeso lè he 'usi hè be bè gyo le u mbwa lè he līngmam a.
40022016	Be gia bende lè bendi Usu Uherod som hwaa lè Ujeso. Be lè hwaa lè Ujeso, de-e le: "Ukaandi, bel li ngye le wò yi undi angwu u kong 'igyang a. Li ngye le wo hwua bendi 'igyang gba lè ashi Unim a kee le bè shi faale 'ushell likorye wo maa anung gbe lè 'iwom ashi bendi be gim ye. Bendi puu bè yi-a 'itaa ken."
40022017	Be hà bii he le: "De li ugim ugang. Iten ityan i bong le lì tye ukpanda ke Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom à, hà lì tye ke-e ye?"
40022018	Ujeso a ngye beshu bebell. A kung de be le: "Men bendi-ilam, kibang a, ma kung mi lè he 'usi?
40022019	Mà tyung mi ukwudi ūmen angwu ma tye ukpanda ana." Be be lè ukwudi tyung he.
40022020	A hà bii ābe le: "Lìshī ayang lè lizen ayang, be fee fe nyin?"
40022021	Be fan he le: "Angi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom a." Ujeso a kung de be le: "Àshi 'ì yi ashi Usu, mà kung ke Usu. Àshi 'ì yi ashi Unim, mà kung ke Unim."
40022022	Be gyo ashin gyo-gyo, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. Be gbe lè há tyang he.
40022023	Bendi Isadusis be bong le undi u tem wum lè he lihwu ye. Nya he liti limen ana bendi besuso lè he liwu limen i be ma lè hwaa lè Ujeso.
40022024	Be de-e le: "Ukaandi, Umosis a hwua li le, 'Gbe undi a hwō tyang ungye faale unwaa, unwanam ù kpebb kung ungye-uhwuu hè ūbū ungwende angwu a hwō ù nim ye.' "
40022025	Be gye 'ushu kong le: "Ki ma yi lè bengikye bedyong-ifee abe be ma yi bebwanam bende ha abel i nyin. Angwu gbel a ma kpebb ungye. A hwō tyang he faale unwaa. Angwu a pwom lè he, a kpebb kung ungye-uhwuu ana.
40022026	Ufe or a hwō tyang he faale unwaa. Ki shi fe bebwanam bende bedyong-ifee ana nya 'itaa ken.
40022027	Angwu ungingye a hà hwō.
40022028	Nyong bendi be be wum lè he lihwu, ungingye anwun u ba kwa ungye ayang a, bwo befe a puu bedyong-ifee be kpebb he, hwō tyang he?"
40022029	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ma mbeb! Ma bii ashin le bwo ma ngye igie Unim or, ngwu mà ngye ikeb ima or ye a."
40022030	A hà de be le: "He 'unyong ahwu bendi be be wum lè he lihwu, libee lì tem ba kwa ye, likorye bendi puu be ba fel nya a na idengell Unim angi he lifung-atabe a.
40022031	Ma bii mi gbe lè awumale lè he lihwu; ma wa bo igie Unim angi Umosis a fee ye a?
40022032	A fee le Unim a kong le: 'Mì yi Unim angwu Ebraham lè Azik lè Ujekob.' Ufe ù yi Unim bendi bewum a. He 'unyong ahwu Unim a kong ashin, bendi bemen ana be ma hwō he agwo mà, ukpor bè so bewum he ashi Unim."
40022033	Bendi puu abe be gyo ashin, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg gbe lè biwom abi u hwua ābe.
40022034	Bendi Iferesis be ma gyo le Ujeso a shī Isadusis ungwu, be tem fan Ujeso mbeè ye. Befe be hà be hwaa lè Ujeso.
40022035	Undi ubell ken angwu u hwua bendi Iten a kung 'ìbībī liketye bii Ujeso he-e ù mbu lè he līngmam.
40022036	A bii he le: "Ukaandi, uten angwu yang a dyam hwò puu?"
40022037	Ujeso a kung fan le: " 'Kì nyin-a lè Atia Unim lè lityam ligang puu, lè 'ūnyōng 'ugang puu, lè ugim ugang puu.'
40022038	Uten anwun na ù yi 'indee-indee, u dyam hwò puu.
40022039	Utepwom uma u shi le: 'Kì nyin-a lè unde-gang ná 'i nyin-a lè 'uhwo-gang.'
40022040	Iten angi Umosis a ma ke lè biwom abi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be ma de men, bife puu bi pwom lishi he iten imen ifee i a."
40022041	Nya a na bendi Iferesis be ma so ukem, Ujeso a bii ābe le:
40022042	"Kibang men ma gim gbe lè Ukristi? Ù yi igia ayang a?" Be fan he le ù yi igia Udebid a.
40022043	Ufe a mbee bii ābe le: "Ki shi ná a, Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ma shi Udebid a ko he le Atyam?"
40022044	A gye 'ushu kong le, "Udebid ugyang a ma de le: 'Unim a de Atyagi le: "Be bel kwu-m he 'ubwo lizen kpamm mi gbe tem bendi-linaa begang abee fe he itang." '
40022045	Gbe Udebid or a ma ko Ukristi le Atyam, ki nya sha ná a, ufe ù ha fel igia ima?"
40022046	Undi ken or lè he liwu libell a nem fan Ujeso likpe ken or mbeè ye. Kung lè há he liti limen ana gye 'ushu, undi ubell ken or a tem mbe lityam bii he 'ibibi ye.
40023001	Ujeso a hà kong ha bendi-utung bema lè bendi gbamm.
40023002	A de be le: "Bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten befe lè Iferesis na be kpē lishi Umosis, hà kong gbe lè Iten.
40023003	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi be hwua amen, mà shi āshi. Mà shī hwua kung likpe libell ye, likorye ashi befe be hwua na be shi ye.
40023004	Be kwuo biwom swa bendi abi bi ngbebb gbe be gbe he akele ubell iten angi i go gbe be, befe-gyang be tyua 'ubwo or há ye.
40023005	Be sha biwom le hè bendi bè nde be a. Be fee iten Unim fa he 'iwom bua bee he 'ushu lè igbebwo, be shā aliga wulututu hè bendi bè ndè shob le be fa Unim.
40023006	Ki nyin ābe le bè kwu he bidem abi be kie ndor bekaandi bendi he bipam or, he ishom angi be kwu liwu or.
40023007	Bè yi lè bigyor le hang bendi be kong lè be lè ife he ishokwo 'ate, ko ābe le bekaandi.
40023008	Mà shī bong undi ù ko amen le Ukaandi ye, likorye men puu mà yi bebwanam bende a. Bel puu lì kee-kee yi lè Ukaandi ken a.
40023009	Mà shī ko undi le Atyamen he igye anyin ye, likorye lì kee-kee yi lè Atyetyan he lifung-atabe ufe-ufe a.
40023010	Mà shī bong undi ù shī ko amen le Atie-lishi ye, likorye Ujeso Ukristi ufe-ufe na ù yi atie-lishi utyan.
40023011	Undi angwu a dyam hwò puu he liwu līmen, na u kwu uboyi ūmen.
40023012	Undi angwu u kung 'uhwo-ma gye he 'usi, Unim u ba keb he ba he itang. Angwu u keb 'uhwo-ma be he itang na Unim u be kung he gye he 'usi."
40023013	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen bendi abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis, likorye mà yi bendi-ilam a. Ma kwuu bendi 'ukwo he angyele gbe lè Kusu Unim gbe he ahwuale Iten he 'ukwo ahwu igie Unim ì nung ābe ye, ì hà ndo nung amen agyang ye. [
40023014	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis, likorye mà yi bendi-ilam a. Ma ngyuu bengye-uhwuu. Ma hà kong ha Unim gbe 'igbe hè bendi bè de le mà yi bendi benunung a. He atan-lengi anwun men ma kpē 'ingie hwò bendi abe be teng puu.]
40023015	"Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis, likorye mà yi bendi-ilam a. Ma tan ha abee, ma ngwee binong lishor hè men mà shi undi ken or ù bong àshi men ma bong. Gbe ma ndè undi angwu a bong, ma shi-e u fel ndor àshì gye he 'índē hwò amen.
40023016	"Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen bekaandi abe ma teng bendi, ki shi lè ashi ma ngye ye. Ma hwua bendi le gbe be tàm Ushom Unim angwu he Ujeruselem, bè yi porr le be ban utamale ubell. Ukpor gbe be tàm bigbor igold abi bì yi há he Ushom Unim, kì ha kwa kpe-kpe le bè shi utamale ubell.
40023017	Men bikpel-ye bekaandi abe ma ngye 'iwom ye. Bigbor igold na bi dyam hwò à, hà Ushom Unim angwu a shì ābi bi hà fel ta-ta ke Unim a?
40023018	Ma mbee hwua bendi le gbe be tàm 'iteng ashi be shang Unim, bè yi porr le be ban utamale ubell. Ukpor gbe be tàm 'ityuale ashangale a, kì ha kwa kpe-kpe le bè shi utamale ubell.
40023019	Má ngye 'iwom ye. Kityuale na 'i dyam hwò à, hà 'iteng ashangale ashi 'i shi āshi i hà fel ta-ta ke Unim a?
40023020	Ashin 'i ze le gbe undi a tàm 'iteng ashangale, hà a tàm lè 'ityuale ashi be shang há or titi.
40023021	Gbe undi a tàm Ushom Unim, hà a tàm lè Unim ugyang angwu ù yi há he ushom umen i or titi.
40023022	Gbe undi a tàm lifung-atabe, hà a tàm lè 'idem 'usu Unim lè Unim ugyang angwu ù yi kwu há.
40023023	"Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis, likorye mà yi bendi-ilam a. Biwom ná afufeb or, gbe a hwaa, ma hwua āngi he biteng lihwo, ma ke Unim likwu ken, ukpor ma mor iten isuso angi ì yi 'indee-indee lè ashele. Iten imen i na ì yi i: Amaale bendi ishe kpa-kpa, atyungale beshi, lè akongale 'igyang. Mà shi bimen abin puu, gia bisuso shi, tyang bisuso ye.
40023024	Men bekaandi abe ma teng bendi, ki shi lè ashi ma ngye ye, ma fem uteteng lè he 'utyuo tyang he itang, ukpor ma kung 'utyuo su ngwo lè 'igundu.
40023025	"Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis, likorye mà yi bendi-ilam a. Ma to item igbaala lè indor īmen ife-ife, ukpor afee ábi a shi sho lè biwom abi ma ngyuu bendi kpē kung.
40023026	Men Iferesis, ki nung amen ye ná bihwua-ashi nà. Mà kpi 'ikwu to bigbor bīmen lè he afee hè bi bì fel bitaa-bitaa, mà item ábi i taa.
40023027	"Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis, likorye mà yi bendi-ilam a. Mà yi 'itaa ken ha akwun angi be gbaa āngi ùnìm ufung. Item ángi i ngbebb he ashi kangg. Afee ángi a shi sho lè ikeb bendi lè 'īnung.
40023028	Kitaa 'imen i na men mà yi ngbebb-ngbebb he ashi bendi, ukpor àtyám āmen a shi sho lè ilam lè bibibi."
40023029	"Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma hwua bendi Iten lè men Iferesis. Mà yi bendi-ilam a. Ma tye akwun bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim abe betiemen be ma gwu, ma kōng àngi bendi benunung abe bètım.
40023030	Mà yii kòng le mà be kwu he 'unyong 'utim a, hang ma ma gwu bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim ná betiemen be maa shi ye.
40023031	Ashin 'i tyung le ma bong le mà yi igia bendi abe be ma gwu bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim a.
40023032	Mà ndo gye 'ushu mbee shì 'iwom ashi betiemen be ma shi ndor 'igem.
40023033	Men mà yi bebibi ná ìshiı, ki shi ná a, ma gim le ma ba buu hwaa agyele he 'índe?
40023034	He atan-lengi anwun mi kee le mà ngye le mi ba gya 'ushu som amen bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim lè abe bebi-ashi lè bendi abe be hwua bendi biwom. Ukpor ma ba gwa besuso, ma maa besuso bee he 'ikpakpaa, ma be kpam besuso he ishom īmen angi ma kwu liwu. Ma be ndeb lè besuso mbee bipi sa-sa.
40023035	He atan-lengi anwun men ma ba kpa 'ingie he 'uhwo undi ununung uyang-yang angwu be gwu kung lè ha Ebell kpamm be wu ha Uzakaraya, unwaa Ubarakia. Uzakaraya na be ma gwu he Ushom Unim he 'udyan 'imbe ashi be shang Unim lè 'ipo ashi be ndor ta-ta ke Unim.
40023036	Mi kee le mà ngye le 'ingie bihwu bimen abin puu 'i fel ke bendi abe ati anyin a."
40023037	Ujeso a de le: "Aye, men bendi Ujeruselem, kunyong 'uyang-yang Unim u som undi le ù be tye ugie 'isom 'ima, ma gwa besuso, ma maa besuso akor. Mbee 'unyong kpamm mi kee le hang mi kpe men fe he uko ná ukwuo u kpē inwaa ima fe ha ahe abebaa, ukpor ma bong ye.
40023038	Kanaa-anaa i, mi kung abwo agi lè he 'uhwo-men.
40023039	Mi kee le mà ngye le kung lè he 'unyong ahwun gye 'ushu mà tem nda-m ye kpamm 'unyong 'u gbe fel ahwu ma de le, 'Kukwun 'ù kwu ke undi angwu u be he lizen Atyetyan Unim.' "
40024001	Ujeso a ma bo lè há he Ushom Unim le u ndo gya he 'iteng 'isuso. Bendi-utung bema be ma lè tyúng he Ushom Unim lè bipo bima gbamm nya he Ujeruselem.
40024002	Ujeso a bong le a ndè, u de be le: "Ushom angwu ma ndè i, u ba gyebb sha he itang kpemm. Kukor ken-ken or 'u ba ngyor pwom he 'ipi be pwom āhwu ye. A ba gyebb wa he itang puu."
40024003	Nya a na Ujeso a ma yi kwu he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif, bendi-utung bema be ma nyia te lè hwaa lè he. Be de-e le ù de be 'unyong ahwu biwom abi a kong bı be shi. Ù mbee de be 'iwom ashi 'ı be tyung le u ndo ba, ki tyung le igye i ndo mbee.
40024004	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mà baa teng undi u ba lam amen.
40024005	Bendi gbamm be ba ba he lizen ligi da le befe bè yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan a, be fe bendi gbamm umbeb.
40024006	Ma ba gyo bekye abe kpee-kpee ha amen, ma gyo gbe lè bekye abe 'igbe-igbe. Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana mà shell ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le abin bì shì ukpor umbee-likel igye anyin a wa fel a ye.
40024007	Abong-abong a ba ndo ha bende. Lishi-lishi li be ndo ha bende. Isun i be kwuo mbee bipi. Itung i be ndo bendi kangg.
40024008	Abin puu bi ba kwa 'anwaa 'ingie nya a na ukpi-ikwu uzwaa a.
40024009	"Bendi puu be ba tel amen he 'uhwo 'ugi. Be ba kwa amen la ka bendi be ka amen 'ingie, be be gwu amen.
40024010	He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi gbamm be tyang 'ukwo Unim, be tel bende, be ndyebb bende zi.
40024011	Bendi abe be bè iman le be bong 'isom Unim be hà ndo be fe bendi lisom.
40024012	Bìbíbı bi ba go kangg le 'i nem ba nyin bendi gbamm lè mi ye.
40024013	Undi angwu a be ngyor naa genn fe Unim lè wu he umbee-likel, u ba kwa lè likpan 'unyong.
40024014	Bendi be ba bun 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Kusu Unim de bendi mbee abong he igye puu, hè bendigye puu bè gyo 'isom 'inunung 'imen i. Igye anyin i hà mbeè."
40024015	"Ti ma ba nda ukong ubibi angwu u nim lè abong. Kimen i na Udaniyell angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong gbe lè shi nya a na a ma yi naa he 'iteng ashi be ndor ta-ta ke Unim. (Undi angwu u bo ashin, ù mā ma ngye likpe lima o.)
40024016	He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi abe bè yi he 'ubong Ujudia bè buu gye he ikwell 'usi.
40024017	Undi angwu ù yi he ushom 'usi, ù tem ban 'unyong le u shul gya he afee ushom la kung biwom bima ye.
40024018	Undi angwu ù yi he utia, ù tem ban 'unyong gye he ushaale le u là kung 'ihwom 'ima ye.
40024019	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka bengingye azam lè abe bè yi lè bebwaa he abwo.
40024020	Mà kong ha Unim le 'iwom ashin 'ì be shi lè 'akwuo, ngwu he liti uwell Ijuus or ye.
40024021	Kingie ashi bendi be be kpē he 'unyong 'umen ana, 'i ba dyam hwà 'ingie 'iyang-yang ashi undi a kpē kung lè há 'unyong ahwu Unim a shi igye anyin. Ki tem ba kwa lè 'ingie 'isuso ná ye.
40024022	Unim a shi ugim ndor le u die lè ati 'ingie 'imen i gem he 'uhwo bendi bema abe a waa kung a. Ù die lè ati 'ingie 'imen i gem ye, hang undi ken or u ba kpan ye.
40024023	"Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, gbe undi uyang-yang u be de men le, 'Mà ndè, Ukristi ù yi nyin,' ususo u be de men le, 'Mà nde-e ù yi há ana,' mà bong ye.
40024024	Bendi gbamm abe be ko 'uhwo-bell le Ukristi lè abe be bè iman le be tya ugie 'isom Unim be ba ba. Be ba sha bikwele-uhwo hè gbe 'ì yi ābe pie-pie, hè be bè lam bendi abe Unim a waa kung.
40024025	Mà kwu gbelakaa ye! Mi-i de men biwom abin puu ndor he itang mà.
40024026	"Mà bè be de men le ù yi he afee libeb or, mà shī kee he gye há ye. Mà bè de men 'iteng ashi ù yi ndyell or, mà shī bong ye.
40024027	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba ba 'itaa ashi 'indeb-nwaa 'ı ndeb he 'usi kung lè he 'igie ashin lè wu he 'igie ashell.
40024028	He 'ipi likwom lì yi, bipuuzabung bi gbong ba shwa há."
40024029	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "He 'unyong ahwu bingie bibibi abi bì yi ke bendi ati anyin bı be mbee-mbee, libwee li ba gya 'ifufebb, kufell 'ù tem be taa ye. Ikpen i ba mbwa lè he 'usi ba he itang. Biwom puu abi bì yi he 'usi bi ba gie.
40024030	Kitaa ashi 'ı tyung abele ugi, mi Unwaa Undigye, 'i ba fem he 'usi. Bendi ashi abong puu he igye anyin be ba kya. Be hà nde-m mi Unwaa Undigye ná mı be lè he 'usi lè ikeb lè 'ikung-gbo kangg.
40024031	Mi ba da idengell igi i gwee usom ukaandi, mi hà som āngi gye mbee igye puu lè gbong bendi abe Unim a waa kung, be kpee he 'iteng ken."
40024032	"Kì yi lè 'iwom ashi mi kee le mi hwua amen he ityang gbe lè ùkwán angwu be ko le ufik. He 'unyong ahwu ibubu ima i ndo hwaa ashia, ma ngya le 'ifong 'i ndo shul.
40024033	Kitaa 'imen na he 'unyong ahwu ma be ndè biwom bimen i bı shi, ma ngye le 'unyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be 'u fel he abwo.
40024034	Mi kee le mà ngye le biwom abin puu bi ba sha mà ukpong ugbe bendi abe bè yi he igye 'unyin i, u hà be hwō mbeè.
40024035	Lifung-atabe lè igye bi ba mbee, ukpor igie igi ife ì hà ndo mbeè ye, i kwa ngyor igye kpamm."
40024036	"Kì yi lè undi angwu a ngye liti or, ngwu ù ngye 'unyong or ahwu biwom abin bı be shi ye. Idengell angi he lifung-atabe or, mi Unwaa or, li ngye ye. Atyagi ufe-ufe na a ngye liti limen ana.
40024037	Kunyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be be 'i ba kwa 'itaa ken ná 'i ma yi he 'unyong Unuwa.
40024038	He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi be maa za bizizi, be ngwo bingwungwo, be kpebb bengye, be gye abee, kpamm lè kwom he liti angi Unuwa a ma mbo ngwee he 'inong lishor 'ikaandi, saa umbwo a hà ndor kangg sho mbee bipi.
40024039	Ki ma nung ābe ashi 'i maa shi ye kpamm umbwo u gbe sho gwu abe be teng puu. Kitaa 'imen na 'ı be kwu nyong mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be be.
40024040	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana bengikye befee be ba sha aki he útiá ken. Unim u ba waa kung undi ken, angwu ken u ngyor.
40024041	Bengingye befee be ba ko biwom he 'iteng ken. Unim u ba waa kung undi ken, angwu ken u ngyor.
40024042	Mà kwu lè 'akang, le bwo ma ngye 'unyong ahwu mi Atyamen, mı be be ye.
40024043	Mi kee le mà ngye le 'í yi yi le ugyang ushom u ngya 'unyong ahwu uzi u ngwee he he ushom, hang u kang ushom uma le hè uzi ù ngwee he ushom ana ye.
40024044	He atan-lengi anwun men or titi mà kam he 'unyong 'uyang-yang likorye mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba ba he 'unyong ahwu ma ndor lishi ye."
40024045	"Ayang ù yi ná undi aki angwu u shi aki lityam ken, u bi lishi? Angwu há na átyám a ke-e ikeb le ù ndè gbe lè bendi aki abe be teng, u ke be lizi nya he 'unyong ahwu kpa-kpa.
40024046	Undi aki umen ana u ba kwa lè igor, gbe átyám a tem be nde-e a shi-e biwom bimen i dell-dell.
40024047	Mi kee le mà ngye le ātyām undi umen i u ba ka he ikeb le ù fel ndè gbe lè biwom bima a puu.
40024048	Ukpor gbe ù yi undi aki angwu ubibi a, u gim le atyam u ba ba akikye ye.
40024049	U keb bende-ma ikwun akpamale, u zī bizizi, u ngwo bingwungwo utung ha bendi ibwom.
40024050	Átyám u hà be tye-e imbul.
40024051	Átyám u kwa he ka he 'ingie kangg. U kwu-e lè ngib lishi fe ipel ha bendi-ilam. Nya na u be ki kem ishang."
40025001	Ujeso a ma hwua bendi le: "Kusu Unim 'u ba kwa ná bebwaasul lihwo abe be ma kwu nyong ùkyebb ungye angwu a ma shi 'ipam libee. Be ma gbē bimor-inde kwu ha abwo puu.
40025002	Abe bedyong be ma yi dangg ye; abe bedyong be shi dangg.
40025003	Abe dangg ye bedyong ana be ma kwu behwu besuso fem abe he bimor-inde tyang ye.
40025004	Ki shi le àbe dangg bedyong ana be ma kwu behwu he itooto ipel ha abe he bimor-inde.
40025005	Ukyebb ungye a ma shwie be ye, ki shi ābe a puu be gbe he 'unde.
40025006	"Lè 'ididyan 'usu be gbel ububo le ungye ufufe a be mà.
40025007	Bebwaasul lihwo ana be wum lè he 'unde. Be bo 'inaa nyung bimor-inde bibell.
40025008	Bebwaasul abe dangg ye be fel nyong àbe dangg behwu, hè be bè fe he bibell bimor-inde, likorye binde bi la nim.
40025009	Abe dangg be swan de be le bè ndo lè shun ndyebb lè he 'iteng 'isuso, likorye bè kee-kee yi he ungwu ubell a.
40025010	He 'unyong ahwu be gbe le be la shun behwu ndyebb, ukyebb ungye ufufe a be. Abe dangg abe bedyong be gbe utung ha ukyebb ungye ufufe ana gye he ushom. Be hà kung lìshì ngib.
40025011	"Lè he 'ushu abe dangg ye be tem. Be kong le: 'Ukaandi! Ukaandi! Buu li lìshì!'
40025012	Ukyebb ungye ana a de be le: 'Dia! Mi ngye men ye gbangg.' "
40025013	Ujeso a fe ityang anyin lìshī le: "Mà kwu lè 'akang likorye ma ngye 'unyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be be ye."
40025014	Ujeso a bun ityang le: "Kitaa ashin na 'ì yi ná Unim u kwu Usu. He 'unyong ken ungikye ususo a ma kam litan. A ko bendi aki bema kung biwom ushom uma fe be he 'ubwo.
40025015	A fem undi-undi ūshī lè únde 'itaa a ngye-e le u kwa mbeè. A ke angwu ken igaa ikwudi asi afee lè ngi lihwo. U ke angwell igaa lisi. U mbee ke angwu ken igaa lihwo. A hà bo ndo litan.
40025016	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo undi aki angwu a kpe igaa asi afee lè ngi lihwo a shi ūshī lè ngi. A ndè alada ashia-ashia ha únde angwu átyám a ma ke-e.
40025017	Undi aki angwu a kpē igaa lisi or a ndè alada ashia-ashia ha únde angwu a ma kpē.
40025018	Ukpor undi aki angwu a kpē igaa lihwo, a kung āngi lè tem ndyell he itang.
40025019	"Ki gbe 'igbe kangg, ukaandi bendi aki ana a hà ngyu. A ko bendi aki bema puu bii ābe 'itaa undi-undi a shi aki lè únde uma.
40025020	Angwu a ma kpē igaa asi afee lè ngi lihwo a be lè ngi ke atyam. A hà de-e le: 'Ukaandi, ndè alada agang na à yi igaa asi afee lè ngi lihwo i.'
40025021	Atyam a kung de-e le: 'Wo shi dell-dell. Wò yi undi aki ununung a. Kiwom ashi mi ka-a zangg i, wo kam āshi ngbebb-ngbebb, mi fel ba ka-a gba gyong ashina. Be gor igor utung ha ami.'
40025022	Angwu a ma kpe igaa lisi a be lè ngi be ke atyam. U de-e le ù ndè alada na à yi igaa angi lisi.
40025023	Atyam a de-e le: 'Wo shi nya dell-dell. Wò yi undi aki ununung a. Kiwom ashi mi ka-a zangg i, wo kam āshi ngbebb-ngbebb, mi fel ba ka-a gba gyong ashina. Be gor igor utung ha ami.'
40025024	Angwu a ma kpē igaa lihwo ana, a tem lè ngi be ke atyam. U de-e le: 'Ukaandi, mi ngye ná wò yi ukaa-ukaa, mi ngye le wo za 'iwom undi likor-likor.
40025025	Kife na mi shell-a, mi ma kung únde ugang lè tem ndyell he itang. Kpē únde ugang!'
40025026	Átyám a kung de-e le: 'Wo usu lihwun, wò yi ubibi a. Ndè le wo ngye le mi za 'iwom undi likor?
40025027	Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le hang wo ma kung únde angwu mi ka-a lè fe he ubank, he 'unyong ahwu mi tem i, hang mi kpē únde ugi lè lifem.'
40025028	A hà de bendi bema le: 'Mà kpē únde undi ubibi ana lè ke angwu a be lè igaa asi adyong.
40025029	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'iwom, Unim u mbee ba ka he le û fel lè shi 'ì go. Ukpor angwu ù yi lè 'iwom ye, ake ù yi lè ke zangg or, Unim u ba pan kpa kúng he áke.
40025030	Usu lihwun anwun ufe, mà kwu he lè tye he 'ipi 'ifufebb 'ì yi. Nya na u be kwu ki kem ishang.' "
40025031	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Nyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be be he 'usu 'ugi, mi ba ba lè idengell Unim puu utung ha ami, mi be kwu he 'idem 'usu 'igi.
40025032	Mi ba gbong bendigye puu he igye anyin ba ukem. Mi taā ābe ndor he akwu afee nya a na ukang-itia u taā ìtiā ndor atyetye lè ha ibuu.
40025033	Mi ba kung àbe bè yi ná ìtiā ndor ha ami 'ubwo lizen. Mi kung àbe bè yi ná ibuu ndor he 'ubwo 'ugi ahwu limbell.
40025034	Mi Usu, mi ha ba da abe be kwu-m he 'ubwo lizen le: 'Men abe Atyagi a ke men 'ukwun mà be kwu he Kiteng-usu 'igi. Atyagi a kam Kiteng-usu 'igi 'imen i ndor amen kung lè há he 'unyong ahwu a ma shi igye anyin a.
40025035	He 'unyong ahwu itung i maa ndo mi, ma ma ke-m lizi. He 'unyong ahwu umbwo a maa gyor mi, ma ma ke-m umbwo. He 'unyong ahwu mi ma be he ishu īmen ná ugaandi, ma ma shi-m ngbebb-ngbebb.
40025036	He 'unyong ahwu mi ma yi uten-ibong, ma ma fe-m inditen. He 'unyong ahwu mi ma yi gogo ye, ma ma ndè gbe lè mi he lingmam. He 'unyong ahwu mi ma yi he igaadye, ma tan lè kong lè mi.'
40025037	Bendi benunung be ba bii mi le: 'Atyetyan, he 'unyong ahwu yang bel li ma ndè le itung i ma ndo-a, li ka-a lizi, umbwo u gyor-a, li ka-a umbwo?
40025038	He 'unyong ahwu yang wo ma yi ugaandi, li shi-a ngbebb-ngbebb ha abel ishu, wo shi uten-ibong, li fa-a inditen?
40025039	He 'unyong ahwu yang wo ma yi gogo ye, wo mbee shi he igaadye, li tan kong lè wo?'
40025040	Mi Usu, mi ba tem lè shi fan ābe le: 'Mà ngye dangg le 'inunung ashi ma ma shi ha unwandagi angwu ù yi ilaa-ilaa or, ma ma shi āshi ha ami a.'
40025041	"Mi Usu, mi hà be de abe lè he 'ubwo limbell le: 'Mà gbe-m lè nyin, ingywo Unim ì yi ke men. Mà ndo gye he 'inde ashi 'ı nim ye ngyor igye, ashi Unim a ma kam ndor usu bibibi lè idengell ima.
40025042	He 'unyong ahwu itung i maa ndo mi, ma ma nyim mi lizi. He 'unyong ahwu umbwo u gyor mi, ma nyim mi umbwo.
40025043	He 'unyong ahwu mi ma be ha amen ishu ná ugaandi, ma ma shi-m ngbebb-ngbebb ye; he 'unyong ahwu mi shi uten-ibong, ma fe-m inditen ye. He 'unyong ahwu mi ma yi gogo ye, mi shi he igaadye, ma tan lè kong lè mi ye.'
40025044	Bendi bebibi bemen i bè ha ba bii mi le: 'Atyetyan, kunyong ahwu yang bel li ma ndè le itung or i ma ndo-a, umbwo or u gyor-a, wo shi ugaandi, wo shi uten-ibong, wo shi gogo ye, wo shi he igaadye, ukpor li ma hà mor-a akpellale?'
40025045	Mi Usu, mi ba fan ābe le: 'Mà bendi begi abe be ma zen hwò puu or, abe men ma ma mor ābe ukpell i, ma ma mor i-mi a.'
40025046	Bendi bebibi bemen i be ba kpa 'ingie ashi 'ı ngyor igye. Bendi benunung be be kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm."
40026001	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma hwua bendi 'i mbee puu, a hà kung kong ha bendi-utung bema le:
40026002	"Má ngye le 'i teng ati afee hè be bè shi 'ipam ashi be ko le Kipam Agbele-gyong. Undi u ba kung mi ka bendi-linaa abe be maa mi bee he 'ikpakpaa."
40026003	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana na bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong be kpee he ushom Ukayafas angwu a ma yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim.
40026004	Be kpee nya kwu ìtım ná bè nyia kwu Ujeso gwu.
40026005	Be tim le bè kwu-e lè gwu he 'unyong 'ipam a ye, teng bendi be pel ha ahe ndò ha abe.
40026006	Ujeso a ma yi he Beteni he ushom Usaimun angwu akpaa a tang he.
40026007	Ungingye ususo a ma be lè 'itityuo behwu abe be kaa 'ate kangg, be mbee nung nyin, be mbò wu Ujeso he lishi nya a na a maa zī lizi.
40026008	Bendi-utung Ujeso be ndè ashina, ki ban ābe he lityam. Be bii le, kibang a, u ban behwu abena 'itaa ana?
40026009	Hang be kung behwu abena ndyebb zi kaa 'ate kangg, kung únde ábe hwua ke bendi-likaa.
40026010	Ujeso a ngye ashi be kong ha bende gbe lè shi. Ufe a hà kung de be le: "Kibang a, ma ben ungingye anwun 'itaa ana? A shi 'iwom 'inunung a ha ami.
40026011	Bendi-likaa befe bè yi ha amen i mbee 'unyong, ukpor mi ufe mi ba kwa utung ha amen i mbee 'unyong ye.
40026012	A wu-m behwu le û kam agwo agi nyong 'unyong angyèle ugi a.
40026013	Mi kee le mà ngye le he 'iteng 'iyang-yang mbee igye puu be be bun 'isom 'inunung, be ba kong gba lè 'inunung ashi ungingye anwun a shi i, hè bendi bè well gbe lè he."
40026014	Ujudas Isikariyot angwu a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung Ujeso abe lihwo lè be befee a lè hwaa lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim,
40026015	u bii ābe le: "Ma nya ka-m 'ibang 'iwom a, mî kung Ujeso ke men?" Be ke-e ikwudi lisi lè ngi lihwo.
40026016	Kung lè há he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujudas a maa fel kee 'ukwo ahwu ù kwu Ujeso ke be.
40026017	He ukpi-ikwu liti Kipam Agbele-gyong bendi-utung Ujeso be ma bii he le, kiteng ashi yang a kee le bè kwu shi Kipam Agbele-gyong?
40026018	A de be le: "Mà gye he lifung-ushu lè hwaa lè ungikye ususo, de-e le Atyamen a de le 'unyong 'uma 'u fel kpee-kpee. A kee le ufe lè bendi-utung bema bè kwu shi Kipam Agbele-gyong ha ahe ushom."
40026019	Bendi-utung bema be lè shi nya a na Ujeso a de be. Be lè shi lizi angi be zī he 'ipam 'imen ana.
40026020	Likwulukwu li gyebb, Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be kwu 'iteng ken keb lizi azele.
40026021	Nya a na be maa zī lizi, a kung de be le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le undi ken he liwu līmen a kam le u ndo ndyebb mi za."
40026022	Be fel lè 'imbwee kangg. Undi-undi a maa fel bii he le: "Ada, ashi wo kong ana, kì nya yi-m mi â?"
40026023	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Undi angwu há na u ndo gye lè 'ubwo he 'igbor uhwee utung-utung ha ami."
40026024	A mbee de be le: "Mi Unwaa Undigye ufe a, mi ba hwa nya a na be fee gbe lè mi he 'ushia Unim. Ukpor, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka undi angwu a ndyebb mi zi. Bè hwan undi umen ana ye, hang 'ì yi deng."
40026025	Ujudas angwu a ma ndyebb he zi, a kung bii he le: "Ukaandi, kì nya yi-m mi â?" Ujeso a de-e le: "Kì yi nya a na wo kong."
40026026	Nya a na Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be maa zī lizi, Ujeso a kung ibred kwu he 'ubwo, u pee Unim. A bun āngi kung ke bendi-utung bema, u de be le: "Mà kpe ibred anyin zī, ì yi inyiahwo igi a."
40026027	A kung ugbaala 'utyuo kwu he 'ubwo, mbee pee Unim. A hà kung ke be, u de be le: "Men puu mà kpē ngwo.
40026028	Ashin 'ì yi anung agi angi mi wu ke bendi gbamm hè Unim ù tyang biban ke be a. Anung amen i a tyung le Unim u ba sha ashi a kong ndor ha bendi abe be bong ha ami.
40026029	Mi kee le mà ngye le mì tem ngwa udung agbe ukwan anwun ye kpamm la kwom he liti angi mı be lè ngwo angwu ufufe utung ha amen he 'unyong ahwu Atyagi u be fel Usu bendi puu."
40026030	Be hà gyam 'ugyam pee Unim. Be gbe gye he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif.
40026031	Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema bemen ana le: "Kùsū ahwu 'unyin i men puu ma buu tyang mi ututeb. Be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le: 'Unim u ba gwa ukang-itia, mà ìtiā i paa he abwo.' (Mì yi ná ukang-itia, men ma shi ná ìtiā.)
40026032	Ukpor 'unyong ahwu mı be wum lè he lihwu, mi ba gya he Ugalili teng amen."
40026033	Ipita a kung de Ujeso le: "Mà abe be teng puu bè buu tyang-a or, mi-i ba tyang-a ye."
40026034	Ujeso a hà kung de Ipita le: "Mî da-a le 'ùsū ahwu 'unyin i, nyin wo swan 'ugbe 'akie le wo ngye-m ye mà ukpong kigia ukwuo 'i hà ko."
40026035	Ipita a tem lè shi de-e le: "Mì hà ndo swan le mi ngya-a ye ye. Mà 'ì yi lè lihwu or, mi hwa utung ha awo." Bende-ma puu be maa kong 'itaa ken.
40026036	Ujeso a ma te lè bendi-utung bema gye he 'iteng ashi be ko le Ugesemani. A de be le bè kwu nyong he, he-e ù die gye he 'ushu lè kong ha Unim.
40026037	A waa kung Ipita lè bebwaa Uzebedi abe befee te lè be utung ha 'uhwo-ma. A fel lè 'utor lè 'imbwee kangg.
40026038	A kung de bendi-utung bema abe bekie ana le: "Kutor ahwu 'ù yi-m he lityam 'u dyam kpè ahwu le 'u gwa-m. Mà kwu nyin hè men mà kang lè mi."
40026039	Ufe-gyang a mbee die te he 'ushu lè tim anung he itang keb akongale ha Unim le: "Ada, gbe 'ì yi-a pie-pie, wo kung 'ingie ashin lè ha ami. Kì shi ná mi-i kee a ye, ukpor kì shi ná wo-o kee a."
40026040	A tem lè hwaa lè bendi-utung bema bemen abe bekie. A nde be be mbwa 'unde. A kung bii Ipita le: "Ki shi ná a, ma mbu 'unde nyong ma bè kang lè mi he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg or mbeè ye?
40026041	Mà kwu lè 'akang, ma kong ha Unim teng ma mbwa he ugilale. Men mà yi lè 'igyor he ashele, ukpor ma baa lè ikeb."
40026042	A mbee tem lè kong ha Unim le: "Ada, gbe 'i ngbebb-a le mì kpē 'ingie ashin, mi kam le mi sha 'iwom ashi wo kee a."
40026043	Ujeso a hà mbee tem lè ndè bendi-utung bema ana be mbee tem fel he 'unde. Atong-shi abell a ma sho lè 'unde.
40026044	A tyang ābe, tem gye he 'iteng ashi há, mbee lè kong ha Unim 'ugbe ahwu lekie 'itaa ken.
40026045	A hà tem item lè hwaa lè bendi-utung bema, u de be le: "Mà so-i mbwa 'unde a? Mà nde kunyong 'u fel há ahwu be kung i-mi Unwaa Undigye, ke bendi-biban.
40026046	Mà bo, lî gye. Mà ndè, undi angwu a ndyebb mi zi ha abe, a fel i."
40026047	Nya a na Ujeso a maa so-i kong ashin, Ujudas angwu a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung Ujeso abe lihwo lè be befee a be. Bendi gbamm be be utung ha ahe lè lishwia lè ìkwán he abwo. Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong na be som ābe.
40026048	Undi angwu a ndyebb he zi ha abe a ke be 'itaa lè há. A de be le: "Undi angwu nyin mı gaa he lè uko na ma kee, mà kwu-e."
40026049	Ujudas a be gbe lè hwaa lè Ujeso de-e le: "Ukaandi, ikwun ì kwu ka-a." U gaa he lè uko.
40026050	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Udim-gi, shi ashi wo be i le wo sha." Bendi be ma be lè hell be kwu kung Ujeso, be kwu-e kangg.
40026051	Undi ken angwu a ma yi utung ha Ujeso, a waa 'ashwia lè he 'ubor kpi shia ungikye ken 'utyung. (Ungikye umen be kpi shiá he 'utyung ana a maa sha Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a aki.)
40026052	Ujeso a de-e le: "Kung 'ashwia 'agang kil he 'ubor. Undi angwu a gwu undi lè 'ashwia, be ba gwa he lè 'ashwia.
40026053	Wó ngye le gbe mi bii Atyagi ukpell, u som idengell ima asisilisi asisilisi nya 'ukwo-ukwo le ì be kpe-m 'utyong ye a?
40026054	Gbe mi shi ná a, hà ashi be fee he 'ushia Unim le 'ì shi, kì tem ba sha ye."
40026055	Ujeso a kung bii liwu bendi le: "Mì yi uzi a, ma be le ma kwu-m lè lishwia lè ìkwán he abwo a? Mi maa kwa utung ha amen he Ushom Unim hwua bendi mbee ati, ukpor ma kwu-m ye.
40026056	Biwom puu abi bi shi fe-m i, bi shi hè 'ì kwu ná bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti a." Bendi-utung bema puu be paa he abwo tyang he.
40026057	Bendi abena be kwu Ujeso gye lè he he ushom Ukayafas, Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim. Bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten lè abe he 'ubong be ma yi sho há.
40026058	Ipita a fel tan pwom Ujeso lè he item 'igbe-igbe. A pwom he lè wu há he ushaale Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim ana. A lè fel bel ndyebb ha bendi abe be kang ushaale umen ana le he-e ù ndè umbee-likel likong limen gbe lè Ujeso i.
40026059	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bikem ukoto puu be kee bendi abe be naa ushada fe Ujeso hè be bè gwu-e.
40026060	Mà na bendi gbamm be be naa ushada iman fe-e or, be ndè 'iwom ashi bè kong fe-e ye. Bendi befee be hà bo 'inaa,
40026061	de le: "Undi umen ana a de le ufe ù yi lè ikeb le u gyebb Ushom Unim wa he itang, u tem lè he tya puu he ati akie."
40026062	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a bo 'inaa bii Ujeso le: "Biwom abi bendi aben be kong fa-a i, wò yi lè ashi wò fan ye a?"
40026063	Ujeso a kwu kpii. A mbee bii Ujeso le: "Wò yi Ukristi angwu ù yi Unwaa Unim â?" A de-e le a kee he le ù de-e 'igyang he lizen Unim angwu uwum.
40026064	Ujeso a hà fan he le: "Kì yi ná wo kong. Mi ufe mi da amen puu le kung lè he 'unyong ahwun gye 'ushu ma ba nda-m, Unwaa Undigye, kwa he 'ubwo lizen Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu. Ma mbee ba nda-m he 'unyong ahwu mı be tem lè he lifung-atabe be he bibu."
40026065	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim ana a fel he ingywo shwia gie 'uhwo-ma bihwom, u de le: "Unwaa anwun a ban Unim gbe he bigwobale he ashi. Likong li mbee, li tem kee ushada ye. Men puu ma gyo bimanale abi a kong.
40026066	Men ma gim le ana?" Be fan he le a zī libi le bè gwu-e.
40026067	Be fel shwa akung wa he he ashi; be kpam he abwo he anaa.
40026068	Abe be kpam he abwo ana be de-e le: "Ukristi, gbe wo ngye undi angwu a kpam-a, bun de li."
40026069	Ipita a ma so kwu há he 'udyan ushaale. Unwaasul angwu u shi aki há a ndè Ipita, u de le: "Wo or titi, wo ma yi utung ha Ujeso angwu u be lè he Ugalili."
40026070	He ashi bendi gbamm, Ipita a swan le a bè ngye-e or ye. A ngye 'iwom ashi unwaasul ana u kong or ye.
40026071	Ipita a gbe lè há gye he ungwu likong. Unwaasul ken angwu a ma shi ukaandi umen ana aki a mbee ndè Ipita, u de bendi abe bè yi há le: "Ungikye anwun a maa tan utung ha Ujeso angwu Unazaret."
40026072	Ipita a mbee swan tam behwu de-e le bwo ukong-ukong a bè ngye ungikye umen ana or ye gbangg.
40026073	He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg bendi abe be ma yi naa há he ungwu likong be de Ipita le: "Kì shi ná ana, wò yi undi-utung ungikye anwuna. Igie igang or i tyung le wò yi undi-utung uma."
40026074	Ipita a kpam abwo he itang tam behwu le: "Unim a ngye le mi ngye angwu ma kong ana ye. Gbe mı bè uman a, Unim ù gwu-m." Nya 'ukwo-ukwo kigia ukwuo 'i kung ko.
40026075	Ipita a well le Ujeso a ma de-e le nyin u swan 'ugbe 'akie le a ngye-e ye, mà ukpong 'igia ukwuo 'i hà ko. A kung gbe lè há lè ki kangg.
40027001	Ashi a taa leèti-leèti, bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong be gbong 'iteng ken tim le bè gwu Ujeso.
40027002	Be hà kwu-e bua indi he abwo te lè he lè ke Upontiyes Upalet. (Upalet a ma yi ukaandi Urom angwu u ndè gbe lè ufam Ujudia a.)
40027003	He 'unyong ahwu Ujudas angwu a ma ndyebb Ujeso zi a ndè le be kam le be gwa Ujeso, úndē angwu bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong be ma ke-e ndyebb Ujeso, a tem lè he lè ke be likorye 'i tem fel ban he.
40027004	Ujudas a de bekaandi ana le ufe a shi 'ibibi a he andyebbale undi ununung zi le bè gwu. Befe be de-e le: "Ashina 'i gbee li bel ye. Ashina 'ì yi ka awo ututeb a."
40027005	Ujudas a zob únde ana wu ābe há he Ushom Unim. A gbe lè há lè shwia 'uhwo-ma.
40027006	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim be kung úndē umen ana. Be de le uten ubell a bong le bè kung únde angwu be ndyebb undi lè gwu fe he 'igbor 'uke he Ushom Unim ye.
40027007	Be kwu azu gbe lè únde umen ana. Be kung he ndyebb 'iteng ashi be fel ngi begaandi. Be ndyebb 'iteng ashi há lè ha undi angwu u mbe biki a.
40027008	Kung lè he 'unyong 'umen ana kpamm be wu 'unyin nyin, be ko 'iteng 'imen ana le 'iteng anung.
40027009	Ki shi nya a na Ujeremaya angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim, a ma kong a. A ma de le: "Be kung ikwudi lisi lè ngi lihwo. (Ikwudi imen ana i ma yi angi bendi Izwell be ma bong le be ka ndyebb he a.)
40027010	Be kung únde umen ana ndyebb itang nya a na Atyetyan Unim a ma de-m a."
40027011	Be te lè Ujeso lè hwaa lè Usu Upalet. Upalet a bii Ujeso le: "Wò yi usu Ijuus â?" Ujeso a fan he le: "Kì yi ná wo kong."
40027012	Biwom puu abi bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong be kong fe Ujeso, a fan ābe 'ikpukpo 'ukung or ye.
40027013	Upalet a hà kung bii he le: "Wo gyo biwom abi be kong fa-a i ye a?"
40027014	Ujeso a hà fan he zangg or ye. Ki kwu Upalet he 'uhwo kangg ná a kwu-e he ungwu kpii.
40027015	He lize liyang-yang he 'unyong ahwu be shi Kipam Agbele-gyong, Upalet u shiı tyang undi igaadye ken abwo angwu ufam itang a waa le ù tyang he.
40027016	He 'unyong 'umen ana undi ken a ma yi he igaadye, be ma ko he le Ubarabas. A maa sha bibibi kangg.
40027017	Ufam itang puu a kpee liwu. Upalet a bii ābe le ù waa ayang a tyang abwo? Ù waa Ubarabas â, hà ù waa Ujeso angwu be ko le Ukristi a?
40027018	Ufe-gyang or a ma ngye dangg le be kwu Ujeso be ke-e he 'atel a.
40027019	Nya a na Upalet a ma so kwu he 'idem ashi u kwu maa ishe, ungye-ma a som 'isom hwaa lè he le, ù ndè le a shi undi ununung angwu u maa he ushe ana 'iwom 'iyang-yang ye. Ufe a shī shi itam gbe lè he i ngbebb he ye.
40027020	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong be fe bendi ingie le bè lè de Upalet le ù waa Ubarabas tyang abwo, ù gwu Ujeso.
40027021	Usu Upalet a hà bii liwu bendi le: "Bendi befee abena, ayang angwu ma kee le mì waa he tyang abwo?" Be de-e le ù waa Ubarabas a.
40027022	Upalet a bii ābe le, ù hà shi Ujeso angwu be ko le Ukristi ná a? Be de-e le: "Maa gwu-e bee he 'ikpakpaa!"
40027023	Upalet a bii ābe le, kibang 'ibibi ashi a shi ukpor? Be kung gaa kangg le: "Maa gwu-e bee he 'ikpakpaa!"
40027024	Upalet a ndè le u fel ban 'unyong likor a, likorye bendi be ma fel he āshi linaa-linaa. A hà kong, be be lè umbwo ke-e. He ashi bendi puu a to abwo ama, u de be le: "Mi na mi ke men ikeb le mà gwu-e ye. Gbe ma gwu-e, hà mì yi amen lè abwo há ye."
40027025	Befe puu be tem lè shi fan Upalet le: "Bel li gwa he; kingie 'iyang-yang ashi 'i be lè há 'ì kwu ke li bel lè bebwaa-tyan."
40027026	Upalet a hà waa Ubarabas lè he igaadye tyang abwo. U de ishogya le ì lè kwu Ujeso kpam. A hà kwu-e ke be le bè maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa.
40027027	Ishogya Upalet i kwu Ujeso te lè he gye he 'udyan ushaale Upalet. I ko bebell ishogya puu be ukem.
40027028	Be waa he aliga lè he inyiahwo ndor he itang, be tem lè aliga uwulu abwaa shi-e.
40027029	Be tim 'ishilishi ītōng shi-e he lishi. Be kung udong-si fe-e he 'ubwo lizen. Be nyan he lè bel tim anung he itang le be fa he. Be de-e le: "Usu Ijuus, kukwun 'u kwa-a he 'uhwo."
40027030	Be sho akung wu-e. Be kpē kung udong-si lè ha ahe, be tem lè he kpam he he lishi.
40027031	Be nyan he puu, be hà waa he aliga uwulu abwaa tem lè ama agyang shi-e. Be hà ndo gbe lè he gye he 'iteng ashi be lè maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa.
40027032	Nya a na be maa ndor àshì gye, be kpee lè ungikye ken angwu be ko le Usaimun. A ma yi 'ubong Usarin a. Ishogya i kwu-e he ikeb le ù so 'ikpakpaa ashi be lè maa Ujeso bee.
40027033	Be lè wu he 'iteng ashi be ko le Ugorgorta ashi 'i ze le 'iteng 'ikpukpo lishi.
40027034	Nya na be kung 'utyuo bell pel ha 'iwom ashi 'ı zu, ke Ujeso le ù ngwo. Be kung ābi tyua Ujeso he ungwu, ukpor a ngwo ye.
40027035	Be kwu-e lè maa bee he 'ikpakpaa, kung āshi beb he itang. Be kung inditen ima hwua ke bende gbe he isasa atyele.
40027036	He 'unyong ahwu be hwua inditen ima puu, be ngyor kwu há, be kang he.
40027037	Be fee fe-e nya 'usi 'ikpakpaa gbe lè 'iwom ashi be de le a shi le: "Anwun na ù yi Ujeso, Usu Ijuus."
40027038	Be maa bezi befee bee utung ha Ujeso. Be maa angwu ken bee he lè he 'ubwo lizen, be maa angwell bee he lè he 'ubwo limbell.
40027039	Bendi abe be gbe he 'ukwo ndè Ujeso bee há he 'ikpakpaa, be bong he lishi kpeke-kpeke-kpeke, be kong bia he.
40027040	Be de-e gye há le: "Eng-heng, wo angwu wo de le wo gyebb Ushom Unim tem lè he tya he ati akie. Gbe wò mā ma yi Unwaa Unim a, wo shul lè he 'ikpakpaa be he itang ha-a à kpan 'uhwo-gang."
40027041	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten lè abe he 'ubong be fel nyan he 'itaa ken.
40027042	Be kong ha bende le: "U kpan bendi, ukpor u kpan 'uhwo-ma mbeè ye. Indele Usu Izwell a? Ù shul lè he 'ikpakpaa be he itang 'anaa-anaa i, mà bel li bong ha ahe.
40027043	Gbé u kee-kee fe lityam ha Unim ufe-ufe a, u de le ù yi Unwaa Unim a, bel li kee le li ndà ná Unim u kpan he 'anaa-anaa i."
40027044	Bezi abe be maa ābe bee he bikpakpaa utung ha ahe or titi, be kong bia he.
40027045	He libwee 'udyan lishi, kifufebb 'i ma gye kpenn he 'ubong 'umen ana kpamm lè kwom he inde ikie lè ishu likwulukwu.
40027046	He inde ikie Ujeso a kùng kangg he igie ibell le: "Eli, Eli, lema sabaketani," ashi 'i ze le, "Unim ugi, Unim ugi, kibang a, wo mor mi?"
40027047	Bendi besuso abe bè yi naa há, abe be gyo he, be fel da le, u ko Ilaja a.
40027048	Undi ken a buu lè kung 'udedell lè kib he 'imia 'utyuo, kung kil he úkwān lè ndaa tyua Ujeso he 'ikpungwu le he-e ù ngwo.
40027049	Bendi abe be teng be de bende le: "Mà lì kwu hè li lì ndè le Ilaja u ba kpan he à?"
40027050	Ujeso a mbee kùng kangg, a hà hwō.
40027051	Kihwom 'ikaandi ashi be tye tang 'ipo he afee Ushom Unim, ki gie kung lè he 'usi be tang he itang. Isun i ma kwuo. Akor a kpam gie bigie.
40027052	Akwun a buu ingwu fel hwuo. Bendi Unim gbamm abe be ma hwō leěti, be tem wum.
40027053	Lè he 'ushu he 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a wum lè he lihwu, befe or titi be fem be he igye lè ha abe akwun, gbe ndo he Ujeruselem he 'ipi bendi gbamm be nde be.
40027054	Ukaandi ishogya lè ishogya ima abe be ma yi naa há, be kang Ujeso, be ndè ná isun i kwuo lè biwom puu abi bi shi. Be fel he 'ushell kangg. Be de le: "Ungikye anwun ù yi Unwaa Unim a 'igyang."
40027055	Ki ma yi lè bengingye gbamm abe be ma kpell Ujeso he Ugalili. Be ma fe utung ha ahe lè há Ugalili lè wu he 'iteng ashi be gwu-e. Be ma yi naa he 'igbe-igbe be ndà gya he 'ikpakpaa he 'ipi be bee he.
40027056	Umeri Umadelen lè Umeri, anam Ujems befe lè Ujosef, lè anam bebwaa Uzebedi be ma yi he liwu bengingye abena.
40027057	Likwulukwu li gyebb, undi-ingbebb ken angwu be ko le Ujosef, angwu a ma yi undi-utung Ujeso, u shi 'ubong Alimatia, a ma wu há.
40027058	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a hwō, a lè hwaa lè Upalet, u bii he le u ke-e ikeb he-e ù lè gye lè likwom Ujeso. Upalet a ke ikeb le bè ke Ujosef 'ukwo he-e ù gye lè likwom Ujeso.
40027059	Ujosef a lè kung likwom ana, kung 'ihwom 'ifung 'ifufe kung nii āngi.
40027060	A te lè likwom Ujeso ana lè ngi he likwun angi a tem lifufe he 'ukor ndor 'uhwo-ma. A mung 'ukor 'ukaandi lè shī há ungwu likwun. A hà gbe ligye.
40027061	Umeri Umadelen lè Umeri ususo be ma yi kwu há, be nda àshì gya he likwun.
40027062	He utepwom liti angi lì yi liti uwell Ijuus, bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bendi Iferesis be ma tye fe ukem gye ìtım hwaa lè Upalet.
40027063	Be de-e le: "Ukaandi, li well le he 'unyong ahwu undi-ilam anwuna a ma so uwum, a maa da bendi le, ufe u hwa, u tem wum he liti lekie.
40027064	Kè uten le bè kang likwun ana kpamm lè kwom ati akie teng bendi-utung bema be ba lè 'usu be zà fem likwom lima, be bè uman le a wum lè he lihwu. Gbe ná a, hà uman ubell anwun u fel ban àshì hwà angwu a maa bè he 'unyong ahwu a ma yi uwum."
40027065	Upalet a ke be uten le be lè gia kung ishogya ima te lè ngi, i lè kang likwun limen ana li-li-li.
40027066	Be bo ndo há lè shī ungwu likwun lè 'ukor, be ndor undi le ù kang āngi.
40028001	Liti uwell Ijuus li gbe. He Usundee, ukpi-ikwu liti utyong Beke leèti-leèti, Umeri Umadelen befe lè Umeri angwu ken be ngyù lè ndè likwun Ujeso.
40028002	Isun i kwuo há kangg, likorye udengell Unim a shul lè he lifung-atabe be nya. A mung 'ukor 'ukaandi lè he ungwu likwun ndor gye he ufaa, u bel kwu há he 'ukor 'umen ana.
40028003	A maa taa ná 'indeb-nwaa. Bihwom bima bi fel bifung-bifung kpeladada.
40028004	Ishogya angi i ma kang likwun, i nde-e, i fel he 'ushell kangg. Kushell 'u shì ābe be fel tung for-for-for, be mbu shī he itang fel he ashi akwom-akwom.
40028005	Udengell Unim a hà kung de abe bengingye ana le: "Mà shell ye. Mi ngye le ma kee Ujeso angwu be ma maa bee he 'ikpakpaa a.
40028006	Ù yi hen ye. A wum lè he lihwu nya a na a kong. Mà be ndè 'iteng ashi be ma kie he.
40028007	Mà ndo te akikye lè de bendi-utung bema le a wum lè he lihwu mà. Mà de be le a gbe he Ugalili teng ābe mà. Há na be be lè nde-e. Mà well biwom abi mi de men i."
40028008	Mà na be ma yi lè 'ushell or, nya 'ukwo-ukwo be gbe lè há lè igor le be la bun abin puu da bendi-utung Ujeso.
40028009	Nya a na be maa buu gye lè akwo, Ujeso a nde be há he 'ukwo, u kong lè be le: "Ikwun ì kwu amen he 'uhwo." Be die gwaa ha ahe tim anung he itang kwu-e abwo he abee, be fe-e.
40028010	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà shell ye. Mà te lè de bebuye le bè gbe tang mi he Ugalili. Há na be be nde-m."
40028011	Nya a na bengingye abena be maa so he 'ukwo, ishogya angi i kang likwun i wu he lifung-ushu lè bun de bekaandi abe be shang Unim biwom puu abi bi shi.
40028012	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim be ko bekaandi abe he 'ubong be ukem, be kwu ìtım gbe lè likong limen ana. Be tim kung únde kangg lè ndyebb abwo lè ishogya.
40028013	Be de ngi le: "Mà de bendi le, bendi-utung bema na be be zì fem likwom lima lè 'usu he 'unyong ahwu ma ma yi he 'unde.
40028014	Gbe usu a gyo le ma de le be zì fem he he 'unyong ahwu ma ma yi he 'unde, bel li kong ha ahe, mà u ka amen 'ingie ye."
40028015	Ishogya i kpē únde, i fel kong da bendi le he 'unyong ahwu befe bè yi he 'unde na bendi-utung bema be zì fem he lè he likwun. Kitaa ashina na Ijuus puu i fel kong kpamm nyong 'unyin nyin.
40028016	Bendi-utung Ujeso abe lihwo lè undi ken be gye he ukwell Ugalili angwu Ujeso a ma de be le be lè kpee ha ahe.
40028017	Nya a na be ma yi há, be nde-e, be fe-e. Ukpor bendi bebell besuso be bong le Ujeso a ye.
40028018	Ujeso a hà die gwaa ha abe kpee-kpee, u de be le: "Unim a kung ikeb puu angi he lifung-atabe or, angi he igye anyin or ke-m.
40028019	Mà gye mbee abong igye puu lè hwua bendi ná bè kwu bendi-utung begi. Ma kib ābe he umbwo he lizen angi Atyetyan Unim lè angi Unwaa lè angi Ukatia Kunyong.
40028020	Mà hwua ābe bè shi biwom puu abi mi de men. Mà well le mi kwa utung ha amen mbee 'unyong kpamm igye i gbe mbee."
41001001	Kitaa i na 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi, Unwaa Unim, ki ma kpi.
41001002	Ki ma kpi nya a na Azaya angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a fee ha ahe 'ushia a. A fee le Unim a de le: "Nde, mi ndo som unwaa-isom ugi ta-a lè he 'ushu, u la kam àtyám bendi ndor-a.
41001003	Undi umen ana u ba gaa lè he libeb le, 'Mà kam 'ukwo Atyetyan ndor he, mà shi 'ukwo ahwu 'u ngbebb ndor he he-e ù be gbe.' "
41001004	Undi angwu be ko le Ujon a ma be nya a na Azaya a kong. A be fel há he libeb keb bendi umbwo akibale. A maa bun da bendi le, bè bel àtyám lè he biban bibell he-e ù kib ābe he umbwo, mà Unim u tyang biban ka ābe.
41001005	Bendi lè he Ujudia lè Ujeruselem be ma gye lè gyo Ujon. Be maa bun biban bibell, Ujon u kib ābe he umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Ujodan.
41001006	Ujon a maa fa inditen angi be shì āngi lè indib 'itokaba; u bua ukwob inyia he anyong. Lizi lima li ma yi igwom lè ìhwaà.
41001007	A ma bun de bendi abena le: "Undi ususo angwu u be-m lè há item ù yi undi ukaandi hwo-m. Mi kpee he he 'ubee or ye.
41001008	Mi-i kib amen he umbwo a, ukpor ufe u ba kib amen he Ukatia Kunyong Unim."
41001009	Ki gbe 'igbe ye, Ujeso a ma be lè he Unazaret he 'ubong Ugalili be he 'ipi Ujon ù yi. Ujon a kib he he umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Ujodan.
41001010	Nya a na Ujeso a maa fem lè há he umbwo, u be he igye, a nde lifung-atabe li buu gboo. U nde Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be ná 'alulu so-e he lishi.
41001011	A gyo lingmam Unim lè he lifung-atabe le: "Wò yi 'iken Unwaa-gi a. Ki nyin mi lè wo 'indee-indee."
41001012	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo Ukatia Kunyong Unim a shi Ujeso a bo gbe ndo he libeb.
41001013	Inyia i ma yi há he libeb. A kwu há ati asi afee. Nya he libeb Usetan, usu bibibi, a gil he, ukpor Unim a som idengell ima i ma lè kpell Ujeso.
41001014	Uherod a kwu Ujon fe he igaadye. Ki gbe 'igbe ye, Ujeso a kung gye há 'ubong Ugalili lè bun 'isom 'inunung ashi Unim.
41001015	A de le: "Kunyong 'u fel kpee-kpee ahwu Unim u fem Kusu 'uma he igye. Mà bel àtyám āmen lè he biban, hè men mà bong ha 'isom 'inunung ashin."
41001016	He liti ken Ujeso a maa tan gba he ungwu umbwo Ugalili. Nya a na a maa gbe há, a nde bekwu-ikwan bendi befee, be ko ābe le Usaimun lè Andru. Bè yi bebwanam bende a. Be maa tan lè litaa kwa ìkwǎn.
41001017	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà be pwom mi, mî hwua amen ná mà tan ko bendi ke-m."
41001018	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo be tyang litaa libell ndor he itang pwom he.
41001019	A mbee die gye 'ushu zangg lè nde bebwanam bende besuso, Ujems lè Ujon, bebwaa Uzebedi. Bè yi he afee 'inong, be bwee litaa libell.
41001020	Ujeso a nde be, a ko ābe. Be ma bo tyang atyabell lè bendi abe be shi-e aki há he afee 'inong. Be pwom Ujeso.
41001021	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be gye he 'ubong Ukapanyam. He liti uwell Ijuus, Ujeso a gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu lè hwua bendi biwom.
41001022	Bendi bemen ana be gyo ashi u hwua ābe, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo. A hwua ābe nya a na undi angwu ikeb puu ì yi he 'ubwo 'uma a. A maa hwua ābe ná bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten a ye.
41001023	He 'unyong 'umen ana ungikye ususo a be há he ushom. Ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe. I kwu gaa kangg le:
41001024	"Ujeso angwu Unazaret, wo le lì sha-a ná a? Wo be nyin ha-a à gwu li igwu a? Mi ngya-a, wò yi Unwaa Unim a, wò yi faale uben."
41001025	Ujeso a kung gaa fe ikeb ibibi ana le: "Naa lè 'ihwee! Fem be he igye!"
41001026	Ikeb ibibi ana i shi ungikye anwuna u fel tung for-for-for. I gaa kangg; i hà fem be he igye.
41001027	Ki ma kwu bendi puu he 'uhwo. Be fel kong ha bende le: "Kibang i? Li wa gyo uhwuale angwu 'itaa ashin ngye ye. Undi anwun ù yi lè ikeb le u da ikeb ibibi le ì fem be he igye. I ka he ife."
41001028	Be maa fel tya ipong Ujeso mbee 'ubong Ugalili puu.
41001029	Ujeso a ma gbe lè há he ushom angwu be kwu liwu ana gbe ligbe-ligbe gye he ushu Usaimun lè Andru. Ujems befe lè Ujon be ma te utung ha ahe.
41001030	Anam ungye Usaimun a ma yi gogo ye. Inyiahwo i maa shá he. Be de Ujeso gbe lè he.
41001031	A gbe gye há he 'ipi ù yi. A kwu-e 'ubwo he 'ubwo bo 'inaa. Ki kwun he. U fel sha ābe 'ugaa.
41001032	Nya leekwulukwu he 'unyong ahwu libwee lı ngwee, be be lè bendi-angmam gbamm lè abe ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha abe be hwaa lè Ujeso.
41001033	Bendi be gbong lè sho he ungwu lishi.
41001034	Ujeso a mbee bendi gbamm abe be mbu bitaa angmam atyetye-atyetye. U mbee ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi, ukpor u bong āngi le ì kong likong ye likorye gbé i ngye-e.
41001035	Ujeso a ma ngyù bo lè há ushom lè 'usu lè 'usu gye he 'ipi u lè kwu ututeb kong ha Unim.
41001036	Usaimun lè abe be ma yi utung ha ahe be tang he igye keb he ashunale.
41001037	Be lè nde-e; be de-e le bendi gbamm be kee he.
41001038	Ujeso a de be le: "Lì gye he abong angi à yi kpee-kpee mî lè bun igie Unim há titi likorye kife na mi be."
41001039	A tan mbee biteng he Ugalili puu, bun 'isom 'inunung he ishom ibell angi be kwu liwu. U ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi.
41001040	He liti ken undi-akpaa a ma be tim anung he itang ke Ujeso. A tim he anung le: "Kusi, gbe 'i nyin-a, hā mbee mi."
41001041	Beshi be shi-e. A ndaa 'ubwo tyua he de-e le: "Ki nyin mi. Kanaa-anaa i wo mbee!"
41001042	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo akpaa ama a taa.
41001043	Ujeso a tye-e uten le ù kong undi angwu a mbee he ye gbangg. Ù gbe ligbe-ligbe lè hwaa lè undi angwu u shang Unim he-e ù nde-e. Ù shang Unim ná Umosis a ma kong hè 'ì tyung bendi puu le a mbee.
41001045	A gbe lè há. U fel kong āshi gboo da bendi gba lè 'inunung ashi Ujeso a shi ha ahe. A kong gbe gyong le Ujeso a maa tem gya há he lifung-ushu gboo ye. A ma lè kwu he 'ipi ishaale ì yi ye. Ukpor bendi be maa ba mbee biteng puu, ba hwaa lè he nya.
41002001	Ki gbe 'igbe ye, Ujeso a tem be he Ukapanyam. Bendi be fel kong gba lè he le ù yi há he ushu.
41002002	Bendi be gbong be sho há he ushom gbamm tang he ungwu lishi. Undi ù tem nda 'ukwo gba he ungwu lishi ye. Ujeso a maa bun igie Unim da ābe.
41002003	He 'unyong 'umen ana be maa ba lè ungikye ken lè há angwu a hwō abwo lè abee. Bendi bende na be kung he he 'ataa bê be hwaa lè Ujeso.
41002004	Le bwo bendi gbamm be sho há, bendi abena be tem nde 'ukwo hè be bè kung uhwo-abee ana lè hwaa lè Ujeso ye. Be hà mbo lè he gye he 'uto he 'usi. Be lè shi libwo he 'uto keè àshì hē 'ipi Ujeso ù yi. He 'unyong ahwu be shi libwo, be kung ungikye anwuna he 'ataa gbe lè he be kie he 'ipi Ujeso ù yi.
41002005	Ujeso a nde le be bong le u mbee he mbeè. A hà kung de uhwo-abee ana le: "Unwaa-gi, mi tyang biban bigang ka-a."
41002006	Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten be ma yi kwu há. Be maa gim he atyam abell le:
41002007	"Ki shi ná a, ungikye anwun a kong ban Unim 'itaa i? Kì yi lè undi angwu u tyang biban ke undi ye, Unim ufe-ufe a."
41002008	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo Ujeso a ngye le be gim ná ha abe atyam. A hà kong ha abe le: "Kibang 'ı shi amen ma gim 'itaa ana?
41002009	Ashi le mì de uhwo-abee anwun le biban bima bi tyang ke-e na 'ì yi pie-pie hwo à, hà ashi le ù bo 'inaa, kung 'ataa ama ndo tan á?
41002010	Mî shi tyung amen puu le mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè ikeb he igye anyin le mì tyang biban ka bendi."
41002011	A hà kung de uhwo-abee anwuna le, ù bo 'inaa, kung 'ataa 'ama ndo gye he ushu.
41002012	Nya a na be maa nde-e puu, a bo 'inaa, kung 'ataa 'ama tan gye he igye. Ki ma kwu bendi abena he 'uhwo kangg. Be maa fel pee Unim, be de le bwo ukong-ukong be wa nde 'iwom 'itaa ashin ngye ye.
41002013	Ujeso a ma mbee tem gye he ungwu umbwo ukaandi Ugalili. Bendi gbamm be be hwaa lè he. A hwua ābe biwom.
41002014	Ujeso a bo lè há. Nya a na a maa tan te 'ushu, a nde ukaandi angwu u kpe ukpanda. Be maa ko he le Ulibai. Ù yi unwaa Alfiyes a. A ma yi kwu he ufishi uma. Ujeso a de-e le ù be pwom he. A bo 'inaa pwom he.
41002015	He 'unyong ken Ujeso a maa za lizi he ushom Ulibai. Bendi gbamm abe be kpe ukpanda or, bendi-biban or, be pwom he. Besuso be zī lizi utung ha Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema.
41002016	Bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten abe be ma yi he likwu bendi abe be ko le Iferesis be ma yi há. Be nde le Ujeso u za lizi utung ha bendi-biban lè bendi abe be kpe ukpanda. Be bii bendi-utung bema le, kibang a, u zī lizi utung ha bendi abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi-biban?
41002017	Ujeso a gyo ābe. A hà kung fan ābe le: "Bendi abe bè yi gogo na be kee undi-usi ye, bendi-angmam a. Mi be le mî kee bendi benunung a ye; mi be le mî kee bendi-biban a."
41002018	He 'unyong 'ususo bendi-utung Ujon lè bendi abe lè he likwu Iferesis be maa ndo itung kong ha Unim. Bendi besuso be be hwaa lè Ujeso, bii he le: "Ki shi ná a, bendi-utung Ujon lè bendi Iferesis be ndo itung kong ha Unim, ngwu begang bè shi ná ye?"
41002019	Ujeso a hà kung fan ābe de le: "Ma gim le begaandi abe be be he 'ipam libee bè kwu itung he 'unyong ahwu ukyebb ungye ù yi utung ha ahe a? Dia! Nya a na ukyebb ungye ù so há, be kwa itung ye.
41002020	Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu be be kwu kung ukyebb ungye gbe lè he lè ha abe, saa bè ha ndo itung."
