41002021	Ujeso a mbee tim ityang le: "Kì yi lè undi angwu u kung 'ihwom 'ifufe, kpī shī ligia aliga angi atim ye. Gbe undi a shi ná, kihwom ashi 'ifufe 'i gie aliga angi atim, ligia angi lifufe li fel go hwà angi litim.
41002022	Ki shi lè undi angwu u kung 'utyuo ahwu 'ù so-i tim fe he 'ito ukwob inyia angwu u ndo kaa ye. Gbe a shi ná, hà 'utyuo 'u tya paa ukwob inyia wa he itang, kutyuo or lingyor, kito ukwob inyia or lingyor. Kì yi le bè kung 'utyuo ahwu 'u tīm, fe he 'ito ukwob inyia angwu ù so ufufe."
41002023	Ujeso a maa tan gba he utia he liti uwell Ijuus. Bendi-utung bema be maa tan gba nya utung ha ahe. Be keb atangale biwom abi bì yi ìtǒng ná abung.
41002024	Bendi Iferesis be de Ujeso le ù nde ná bendi-utung bema be ban uten ubell angwu liti uwell.
41002025	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ma wa bo 'iwom ashi Usu Udebid a ma shi ye a? He 'unyong ken nyong ahwu Abiata a ma yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim, itung i ma ndo Udebid befe lè bendi-utung bema. Be ma kee àshi be zī. Udebid a gye he Ushom Unim lè kung ibred angi ì yi ta-ta ke Unim kung zī. Iten ityan i de le undi angwu u shang Unim ufe-ufe na u zī ibred anyina. Ukpor Udebid a ma zī āngi ke bendi-utung bema or."
41002027	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Unim a ma shi liti uwell le he-e ù kpell undigye a. A ma mbe undigye le he-e ù ndor liti uwell life-life a ye.
41002028	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè ikeb le mi da bendi ashi bè shi he liti uwell."
41003001	Ujeso a tem gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu. Undi ken angwu a hwō 'ubwo a ma yi há.
41003002	Bendi besuso be shi há be maa kang he, hè be bè nde le u mbee uhwo-ubwo ana he liti uwell Ijuus à, hè be bè kwu 'ubwo kwu Ujeso le a mbu he iten.
41003003	Ujeso a de undi angwu a hwō 'ubwo le ù be he 'ushu.
41003004	Ujeso a kung bii bendi le: "Kibang Iten ityan i de le lì shi he liti uwell? Lì kpell undi ikpell à, hà lì do he ido? Lì kpan undi ikpan à, hà lì gwu-e igwu." Be kwu kpii.
41003005	Ujeso a bel àshì shun ābe kel-kel, u ngywo fe be. Ki ban he he lityam likorye be kwom 'utyung. Ujeso a hà kung de ungikye anwuna le ù ndaa 'ubwo 'uma. A ndaa āhwu; ku tem fel kang-kang ná 'u ma yi.
41003006	Bendi Iferesis be bo gbe lè há, gye azu ha bendi Uherod. Be kong gbe lè 'itaa bè shi hè be bè gwu Ujeso.
41003007	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be bo gye he umbwo Ugalili. Bendi be kwuo pwom he. Bendi bemen ana besuso be ma be lè he Ugalili lè Ujudia.
41003008	Besuso be be lè he Ujeruselem; besuso be be lè he 'igie Idumia; besuso be be lè he igbindi umbwo Ujodan; besuso be be lè he 'igie Utaya lè Usaidon. Be be likorye be gyo biwom abi Ujeso u shi.
41003009	Bendi be ma sho há gbamm. Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema le bè lè bé lè 'inong lishor ndor he kpee-kpee he-e ù lè ngwee há teng bendi be nyii he.
41003010	Ujeso a ma mbee bendi-angmam gbamm. Bendi-angmam besuso be kin 'uhwo hè be bè tyua Ujeso abwo.
41003011	He 'unyong 'uyang-yang ahwu ikeb ibibi ı nde-e, i tim anung he itang he 'ushu 'uma. I gaa kangg kong le: "Wò yi Unwaa Unim a."
41003012	Ujeso a kung gaa fe ikeb ibibi ana le ì de bendi 'itaa undi ashi ù yi ye.
41003013	Ujeso a hà bo gye he ukwell, lè ko bendi abe a kee. Be be hwaa lè he.
41003014	A waa kung bendi lihwo lè be befee, le bè kwu utung ha ahe he-e ù som ābe le bè lè bun 'isom 'inunung.
41003015	A ke be ikeb le bè ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi.
41003016	Bendi abe lihwo lè be befee nyin na a ma waa: Usaimun angwu Ujeso a ma kwù le Ipita,
41003017	lè Ujems befe lè unwanam Ujon, (Be ma yi bebwaa Uzebedi a. Ujeso a ko ābe le Ubowanejis ashi 'i ze le Bendi-ītaà),
41003018	lè Andru, lè Ufilip, lè Ubatilomi, lè Umatyuo, lè Utormas, lè Ujems angwu a ma yi unwaa Alfiyes, lè Utadyus, lè Usaimun, angwu ù yi he liwu Ijuus angi li kee le be kwa lè 'uhwo-bell,
41003019	lè Ujudas Isikariyot angwu a ma ndyebb Ujeso zi ha bendi-linaa bema.
41003020	Ujeso a bo gye he ushu. Bendi be ma mbee pwom he gbamm. Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be nde 'unyong zī lizi ye.
41003021	He 'unyong ahwu bendi bema be gyo ashin, be bo le be la kwa he, likorye bendi be maa fel kong le u ngyor lityuo.
41003022	Bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten abe be ma be lè he Ujeruselem be maa fel kong le Ubielzebul na a kwu-e. Besuso be de le usu bibibi na a ke-e ikeb le ù ndō ikeb ibibi.
41003023	Ujeso a ko bendi abe bè yi há. A de be ityang le: "Usetan, usu bibibi, u ndeb lè 'uhwo-ma ná á?
41003024	Gbe 'ubong ken 'u tang he abwo keb andòale ha bende, kubong 'umen ana 'u naa ye.
41003025	Gbe 'ikwu-lihwan 'i tang he abwo keb andòale ha bende, kikwu-lihwan 'imen ana 'i naa ye.
41003026	Gbe Usetan a ndò ha 'uhwo-ma, kusu 'uma 'u mbee.
41003027	"Kì yi lè undi angwu u gye he ushom undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb lè kung biwom bima faale afaale a kwu-e bua indi ukpong ye. U kwa he bua indi; ù hà ndo kung biwom bima lè há ushom."
41003028	Ujeso a de be le: "Mi-ì de men, biban puu lè bibibi biyang-yang abi bendi be kong, Unim u tyang ābi ka ābe 'igyang-igyang.
41003029	Ukpor undi angwu u kong bibibi fe Ukatia Kunyong Unim, Unim ù hà ndo tyang ka he ye likorye a shi 'iban ashi 'ı ngyor igye kpamm a."
41003030	(Ujeso a ma kong ashin likorye besuso be ma de le ikeb ibibi ì yi ha ahe.)
41003031	Bebwanam Ujeso abe bengikye lè anam be hà be. Be ma naa he igye, som le ù be.
41003032	Bendi gbamm be ma yi kwu kel-kel fe Ujeso. Be de-e le: "Anaa lè bebwanaa bè yi há he igye. Be kee-a le wò te."
41003033	Ujeso a fan le: "Ayang ù yi andagi? Beyang bè yi bebwandagi?"
41003034	A bel àshì nde bendi abe bè yi kwu ha ahe há. A de le: "Aben na bè yi andagi lè bebwandagi.
41003035	Undi angwu u shi 'iwom ashi Unim a kee he le ù shi, na ù yi andagi lè unwandagi."
41004001	Ujeso a maa hwua bendi he ungwu umbwo Ugalili. Bendi be ma be sho há gbamm. He ashina a bo lè ngwee he 'inong lishor, bel kwu há gye 'ushu hwua ābe. Kinong 'i ma yi he 'udyan umbwo, bendi be shi sho he ugo-igye.
41004002	Ujeso a ma hwua ābe biwom gbamm gbe he ityang. He 'unyong ahwu a hwua ābe biwom abina, a de le:
41004003	"Mà dang 'utyung. Ki ma yi lè ungikye ken angwu a ma gye ìtǒng bikwukwan awele.
41004004	Nya a na a maa wu ìtǒng há utia, isuso i mbu wu lè ubi-ukwo lè ubi-ukwo. Linyun li be kpi āngi mbell.
41004005	Isuso i mbu pwom he 'ukor he 'ipi itang ì yi gbungg ye. I ma mbi akikye likorye itang ì yi zangg a.
41004006	Ishu i bi gwu āngi likorye idaa ángi i gye he itang ye.
41004007	Isuso i mbu wu he 'ipi ikwu agasham ì yi. He 'unyong ahwu agasham a mbi, a mbell nim bikwukwan ana, he ashina bi wum ye.
41004008	Isuso i mbu wu he itang inunung. He 'unyong ahwu i mbi, i kaa shi ìtǒng. Aten asuso a shi ìtǒng lisi lè ngi lihwo, asuso a shi ìtǒng asi akie, asuso a shi ìtǒng asi adyong."
41004009	Ujeso a de le: "Undi angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo!"
41004010	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma tem yi he liwu a ye, bendi besuso abe be ma gyo he, be be utung ha bendi-utung bema be hwaa lè he bii he likpe ityang puu angi a bun.
41004011	Ujeso a de be le: "Men na Unim a tyung amen 'undyell gbe lè Kusu 'uma. Ukpor abe bè yi bendi-utung begi a ye, mi bun biwom da ābe gba he ityang le hè 'ì shi ná undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma fee he 'ushia leěti.
41004012	A ma fee le: 'Be ba nda andele ufe-ufe, ki nung ābe ye; be gyo agyoale ufe-ufe-ufe, be be ngye likpe lima ye. Bè ngye likpe lima, hang be bel hwaa lè Unim, he-e ù tyang biban bibell ke be.' "
41004013	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Gbe ma gyo likpe ityang anyin ye, ma ba sha ná a, hè men mà gyo angi i teng?"
41004014	A hà de le: "Undi utia angwu u wu ìtǒng bikwukwan ana na ù yi undi angwu u bun igie Unim.
41004015	Bendi besuso bè yi ná ìtǒng angi i mbu wu he ubi-ukwo. He 'unyong ahwu be gyo igie Unim gyo-gyo, Usetan u ba kung igie angi undi a bun de be gba lè ngi.
41004016	Bendi besuso bè yi ná ìtǒng angi i mbu pwom he 'ukor. Be gyo igie Unim gyo-gyo kpa āngi lè igor.
41004017	Ukpor i kwa ha abe atyam gba 'igbe ye. Gbe be kpe 'ingie, bendi be ndo tel ābe le bwo be bong ha igie Unim, be tyang abwo nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
41004018	Besuso bè yi ná ìtǒng angi i ma mbu wu he 'ipi ikwu agasham ì yi. Bendi aben be gyo igie Unim,
41004019	ukpor be keb ufung awaale gbe lè biwom igye anyin; bingbebb igye bi mbee nyin ābe hwò biwom puu. Kigyor biwom gbamm 'i sha ābe be naa lityam igie Unim. I tem kpell ābe ye.
41004020	Besuso bè yi ná ìtǒng angi i ma mbu wu he itang inunung. Be gyo igie Unim, be kpe ngi. Be ba lè lifem li kwa ná àtén angi a shi ìtǒng lisi lè ngi lihwo; asuso ìtǒng asi akie, asuso asi adyong."
41004021	Ujeso a mbee de be ityang isuso le: "Undi u gba 'imor-inde kung 'igbor shā āshi a? Dia! U kung āshi pwom he 'ugbo.
41004022	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi be ndyell, be ba nda āshi. Kiwom ashi 'i nung bendi ye, ki ba nung ābe.
41004023	Undi angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo!"
41004024	Ujeso a mbee de be le: "Mà nde le ma shi ashi ma gyo. Kitaa ashi ma kung 'iwom ke bendi, kitaa 'imen na Unim u be ke men. U ba ka amen 'i go hwà.
41004025	Undi angwu ù yi lè 'iwom, Unim u fa shwá he áshi, ukpor undi angwu ù yi lè shi ye, ake ù yi lè ke zangg or, Unim u pan kpa kúng he áke."
41004026	Ujeso a ma gye 'ushu de be le: "Kitaa ashin na 'ì yi ná Unim u kwu Usu. Kì yi ná undi angwu u wu ìtǒng bikwukwan he utia nà.
41004027	He 'unyong ahwu u wu i mbee, u tem gya he ushu la mbwa 'unde. He ashi a taa u shi aki asuso. Ìtǒng bikwukwan anyina ì yii mbya, i kaa. Undi utia u ngya ná ìtǒng imen ana ı mbi ye.
41004028	Itang na ı shi ìtǒng bikwukwan ı kaa keb agbe awumale. I kpya 'ikwu sha ashia; i shi azam hwan; i bi.
41004029	He 'unyong ahwu i bi, u som bendi be keb āngi atamale."
41004030	Ujeso a mbee de bendi le: "Kibang lı kung paa ha 'ukwo ahwu Unim u fel Usu? Lì bun 'ibang ityang a gbe lè hwu?
41004031	Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná ùtǒng angwu be ko he igie Beke le umustad. Ùtǒng umen i a zen hwò ìtǒng bikwukwan he igye anyin puu. Undi u kung he kwan he 'ukatang;
41004032	ùtǒng ana u mbya, u kaa dyam hwò bikwukwan puu. U yal ibubu kangg, u kwu lè 'upel le linyun li lè shi agwu he ibubu ima."
41004033	Ujeso a bun igie Unim de bendi gbe he ityang gbamm angi 'itaa ana. A maa kong ha abe 'itaa ashi bè nya gyo 'ı nung ābe.
41004034	U kong ha abe he ityang-ityang. Ukpor gbe bendi-utung bema befe-befe na bè yi utung ha ahe, u bun da ābe àshi ityang angi há i ze.
41004035	Leekwulukwu he liti limen ana Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le: "Mà lì gyong gye he igbindi umbwo angwell."
41004036	Be hà gbe tyang bendi abena há. Bendi-utung bema be lè ngwee he afee 'inong ashi Ujeso ù yi kwu. Befe puu be ma bo. (Binong bisuso bi ma yi há.)
41004037	Kufem 'u keb ashele kangg. Umbwo a maa fel tab fa he afee 'inong. Ki ma teng zangg hè umbwo ù sho há.
41004038	Ujeso a ma yi ndē he item 'inong; a ma mbu 'unde pwom lishi he ipilo. Bendi-utung bema be ma lè wum he, bii he le: "Ukaandi, li nim inim dii! Ki tib-a ye a?"
41004039	Ujeso a bo 'inaa, a kung gaa fe 'ufem lè umbwo le: "Mà naa lè 'ihwee!" Bi kwun atyung shangg. Umbwo u naa katia.
41004040	Ujeso a hà kung bii ābe le: "Kibang a, ma shell? Ma wa fe lityam ha ami ye a?"
41004041	Be maa fel shell kangg. Be fel bii bende le 'ibang 'itaa undi ashi ù yi? Kufem or, umbwo or, bi ka he ife.
41005001	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be tem gyong gye he igbindi umbwo Ugalili he 'ipi bendi Ugerasa be maa ndē.
41005002	Ujeso a fem lè he 'inong fem-fem be kpee ha ungikye angwu a ma be lè he 'ipi be ngi akwom. Ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ungikye umen i.
41005003	A maa ndā he 'ipi akwun à yi a kpamm. Ki ma tem yi lè undi angwu u kwu-e fe ashishilika mbee ye.
41005004	Be bè fe-e lifung lè ashishilika 'ugbe ibwan-ibwan, ukpor a shwia tang ashishilika, u ban lifung. Ki gal lè he kangg le undi ù tem kwa he mbee ye.
41005005	Ishu or, kusu or, u tan he akwun lè ikwell gaa 'igegaa, u bung akor gbel pyebb 'uhwo-ma.
41005006	Ungikye ana a nde Ujeso lè he 'igbe-igbe. A buu lè tim anung he itang fe Ujeso.
41005007	U gaa kangg le: "Ujeso, Unwaa Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu, wo la sha-m ná a? Mi kung Unim tim-a anung le wò ke-m 'ingie ye."
41005008	(Ungikye anwun a ma de Ujeso ná likorye Ujeso a de ikeb ibibi le ì fem lè ha ahe.)
41005009	Ujeso a hà kung bii he le be ko he le ana? Ungikye ana a de Ujeso le be ko he le 'ugii likorye be go.
41005010	A maa fel tim Ujeso anung kangg le ù ndō ikeb ibibi ana lè há 'ubong ye.
41005011	Ikagbo gbamm i ma yi há he 'igugo kpee-kpee, i tan za.
41005012	Ikeb ibibi ana i tim Ujeso anung le ù tyang āngi ì lè ngwee ikagbo anyina.
41005013	Ujeso a bong. Ikeb ibibi anyina i fem lè ha ungikye anwuna lè ngwee ikagbo. Ikagbo ana i buu lè há 'igugo lè mbu hwō fe he umbwo. (Ikagbo imen ana i maa mbee asi lihwo 'ugbe lihwo.)
41005014	Bendi abe be kang ikagbo imen ana be buu gye he lifung-ushu or, he ìtiá or, lè bun de bendi. Bendi be be, hè be bè be nde ashi 'i shi.
41005015	Be be hwaa lè Ujeso, be nde ungikye angwu ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe ana. A fel fe inditen kwu há. A tem fel dangg. Bendi bemen ana puu be fel he 'ushell.
41005016	Bendi abe be nde lè àshì abell ashi Ujeso a ma shi, be bun de bendi abena 'iwom ashi 'i shi ha ungikye angwu ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe, lè ikagbo.
41005017	Be tim Ujeso anung le ù gbe lè ha abe 'ubong.
41005018	Nya a na Ujeso a maa mbo ngwee 'inong, ungikye angwu ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe a tim Ujeso anung le ù tyang he he-e ù gye utung ha ahe.
41005019	Ujeso a swan, u de-e le: "Tem lè hwaa lè bendi begang he ushu ha-a à bun de be 'itaa Unim ugang a nda-a beshi, lè 'iwom ashi a shi ka-a."
41005020	Ungikye ana a bo gye he 'igie 'ubong ashi be maa ko le Ishokwo Lihwo, lè tan bun de bendi ashi Ujeso a shi ke-e. Ki ma kwu undi uyang-yang he 'uhwo.
41005021	Ujeso a tem gye he igbindi umbwo angwell. Bendi be ma gbong be sho há gbamm.
41005022	Ujaares, ukaandi angwu a maa nde gbe lè ushom ken angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu, a ma be hwaa lè Ujeso, u tim anung he itang,
41005023	tim he anung kangg de-e le, unwaa-ma ungingye ù yi gogo ye kangg. Ù be tyua he 'ubwo he-e ù mbee, teng u hwa.
41005024	Ujeso a bo gbe utung ha ahe. Bendi gbamm be ma pwom he. Be maa fel nyii he indi hen indi hen.
41005025	Ki ma yi lè ungingye ken angwu a wu anung, ki fel aze lihwo lè ngi afee. A ma kpe 'ingie kangg.
41005026	Mà na a ma zī usi he biteng gbamm ban únde uma puu or, ki die he ye. Lingmam lima li gal lè he.
41005027	A ma gyo gbe lè Ujeso. A kung gim le gbe a tyua he abwo he aliga afe-afe or, u mbee. A hà gye há he liwu bendi lè naa Ujeso lè he item. A kung 'ubwo tyua he he aliga.
41005029	Anung ama a tang nya 'ukwo-ukwo. Inyiahwo ima i ma tyung he le a mbee.
41005030	He 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a ngye le ikeb ima i mbee undi. A bel àshì shun kel-kel há he liwu bendi, kung bii le: "Ayang a tyua mi abwo he aliga?"
41005031	Bendi-utung bema be fan le a nde bendi be sho fe-e gbamm. Kibang a, u bii le ayang a tyua he abwo?
41005032	Ujeso ù yi há ashunale he-e ù nde undi angwu a tyua he.
41005033	Ungingye anwuna a ngye ashi 'i shi ha ahe. Kushell 'u shi-e a fel tung for-for-for. A be tim anung he itang he 'ushu Ujeso de-e àshi 'i shi puu.
41005034	Ujeso a hà kong ha ahe le: "Unwaa-gi, wo mbee likorye wo fe lityam ha ami. Gye lè 'ukwun. Lingmam anyina lì tem mbwa-a ye."
41005035	Nya a na Ujeso a maa so-i kong ashina, bendi besuso be be lè he 'ipi úkaandi angwu u nde gbe lè ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu ana. Be be de ukaandi ana le unwaa-ma a hwo. Kibang a, u so fell Ukaandi 'uhwo?
41005036	Ujeso a ma kpam atyung wu àshi be kong ana. A kung kong ha ukaandi anwuna le: "Shell ye. Fe lityam ha ami ufe-ufe."
41005037	Ujeso a ma swan le undi ù te utung ha ahe fem Ujems lè Ipita lè Ujon, unwanam Ujems, tyang ye. Be bo ndo há he 'ipi úkaandi ana.
41005038	Be lè wu há, Ujeso a nde bendi be kya, kung agelibe, kwom 'ihwuhwee kangg.
41005039	A gbe gye há he afee ushom lè bii ābe le 'ibang a, be kwom 'ihwee 'itaa ana? U de be le unwaa anwuna a hwō ihwo ye, a mbu 'unde a.
41005040	Be fel gwee he; Ujeso a ma ndō ābe puu gye he igye, kung atyam unwaa anwuna befe lè anam lè bendi-utung bema, bendi bekie ana, gye he afee 'ipo ashi likwom unwaa anwuna lì yi kie.
41005041	A kung 'ubwo kwu likwom unwaa ana he 'ubwo. A kong ha angi he igie ibell le: "Talita kum," ashi 'i ze le, "Unwaa-gi, bo 'inaa."
41005042	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo a bo 'inaa; u fel tan. Ki ma kwu bendi he 'uhwo kangg. (A ma yi aze lihwo lè ngi afee.)
41005043	Ujeso a tye be uten le bè bun de undi ye gbangg. A hà kung de le bè ke unwaa umen ana lizi he-e ù zi.
41006001	Ujeso a bo lè nya tem gye he 'ubong 'uma. Bendi-utung bema be ma te utung ha ahe.
41006002	He liti uwell Ijuus, a gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu lè hwua bendi biwom. Bendi gbamm abe be ma gyo he, ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo. Be fel kong le: "Hà ungikye anwun a ngye biwom abin puu ná a or? Kibang 'itaa lishi abyele angi ù yi lè ngi? U sha bikwele-uhwo abin ná a?
41006003	Mi kong le ù yi ukapenta, unwaa Umeri á? Nde le bebwanam na bè yi baà Ujems lè Ujosis lè Ujudas lè Usaimun? Bebwanam abe bengingye na lì yi lè bende i puu ye a?" Be maa fel tel he.
41006004	Ujeso a kung de be le bendi be ka undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim ife mbee bipi puu, ukpor 'ubong 'uma lè bebwende lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima be ka he ife ye.
41006005	Ujeso a ma tem shi bikwele-uhwo gbamm há he 'ubong 'uma ye. A ma kee-kee pwom bendi-angmam zangg a 'ubwo mbee ābe.
41006006	Ki ma kwu Ujeso he 'uhwo likorye be fe lityam ha ahe ye. Ujeso a ma gye he abong angi à yi há kpee-kpee lè hwua bendi.
41006007	A ko bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee be he 'iteng ken. U som ābe he befee-befee gye he igye. A ke be ikeb le bè ndō ikeb ibibi;
41006008	u tye be uten le: "Mà kung 'iwom 'isuso-isuso gye lè shi há pel ha utyuu ye. Mà kung lizi ye; mà faa ibam ye; ma fe únde he ibam ye.
41006009	Mà fe ikwob he abee. Mà te lè aliga afee ye."
41006010	A mbee de be le: "He 'iteng 'iyang-yang ma gye, mà kwu he ushom undi angwu a kpe men kpamm ma gbe gbe lè há he 'ubong 'umen ana.
41006011	Gbe ma gye he 'ipi be kpe men ye, be ndor 'utyung gyo amen ye, mà gbe lè há, ma shell 'umbulmbul lè he abee āmen wu he itang. Ashina 'i tyung ābe 'ibibi ashi be shi."
41006012	Bendi-utung Ujeso be bo lè bun de bendi le bè bel àtyám lè he biban bibell.
41006013	Be ndō ikeb ibibi gbamm; bendi gbamm abe be ma yi gogo ye, be gbaa ābe behwu mbee ābe.
41006014	Usu Uherod a ma gyo ná bendi be maa fel kong gbe lè Ujeso mbee bipi puu. Bendi besuso be de le Ujon angwu a maa kib bendi he umbwo a wum lè he lihwu. Kife na 'i tan lè shi u shi bikwele-uhwo bimen i 'itaa i.
41006015	Besuso be de le Ilaja a. Besuso be de le ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim ná abe betim be maa shi a.
41006016	Uherod a hà de le: "Ù yi Ujon angwu mi ma de le bè tang he lishi a. A tem wum lè he lihwu."
41006017	Leěti Uherod ugyang a ma som bendi be lè kwu Ujon fe-e ashishilika lè fe he igaadye. Uherod a ma shi ashin hè 'ì ngbebb Uherodias. Uherodias a ma yi ungye unwanam Uherod angwu be ko le Ufilip; Uherod a ma kpe kung he fe unwanam nya.
41006018	Ujon a maa da Uherod le: "Uten a bong le wò kpe kung ungye unwanaa ye."
41006019	Ki ma ban Uherodias he lityam lè Ujon kangg. A maa fel kee 'ukwo ahwu be gwu-e. Uherod a ma bong ye.
41006020	Uherod a maa shell Ujon likorye a ma ngye le Ujon ù yi undi ununung a, u shi ta-ta ke Unim. Uherod a ma waa bendi le bè kang Ujon teng be gwa he. A ma yi lè 'igyor le u gyo Ujon. Ukpor he 'unyong ahwu a maa gyo he, u kwa lè ufung awaale.
41006021	He umbee-likel Uherodias a ma nde 'ukwo ahwu u shi hè be bè gwu Ujon. Ki ma yi he liti angi be ma hwan Uherod a. Uherod a ma ko bendi abe be nde gbe lè 'ubong lè bekaandi īshogya lè bekaandi abe he Ugalili shi ābe 'ipam.
41006022	Unwaa Uherodias angwu ungingye a ma be ngyor angyor angi a nyin Uherod lè begaandi bema. Uherod a kung bii he le 'ibang a kee le ù tyuu he? U ke-e úkyébb le u tyuu he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi a kee.
41006023	A tam le: "Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi wo kee, mà wò de le mì kung 'igie 'ubong 'ugi or tyuu-a, mi tyuu-a."
41006024	Unwaa ana a gbe lè bii anam le 'ibang a kee he le ù bii lè ha usu? Anam a de-e le ù lè bii lìshī Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo.
41006025	Unwaa ana a buu tem lè hwaa lè Uherod de-e le: "Mi kee le wò tang lìshī Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo fe he undor tyuú mi 'anaa-anaa i."
41006026	Uherod a keb ambweeale kangg. A ma swan ye likorye a kyebb he ashi begaandi bema le u tyuú he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi a kee.
41006027	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo a som undi ishogya le ù lè be lè lìshī Ujon. Undi ishogya ana a bo gye he igaadye lè tang lìshī Ujon fe he undor be tyuu unwaa anwuna. A kpe ngi lè ke anam.
41006029	Bendi-utung Ujon be gyo gbe lè shi, be lè kung 'ìkèm 'ima lè ngì.
41006030	Bendi-utung Ujeso abe a ma som gye he igye, be tem be hwaa lè he. Be de-e biwom puu abi be shi, lè abi be hwua bendi.
41006031	Bendi be ma sho há gbamm. Ki ma yi wuliya-wuliya-wuliya. Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be ma nde 'unyong zī lizi ye. Ujeso a hà kung de be le: "Mà lì gye he 'ipi ashi 'ì yi kpatiaa hè li lì lè kwu há bel-agyang ufe-ufe sho 'unyong he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg."
41006032	Befe puu be lè ngwee he afee 'inong lishor gye he 'ipi ashi 'ì yi kpatiaa.
41006033	He 'unyong ahwu be bo, bendi gbamm be nde be, be mbee shob ābe. Bendi abena be buu gbe he abee lè tang há, mà ukpong Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be hà wu há.
41006034	Ujeso a ma fem lè he afee 'inong, be ndè bendi be sho há gbamm. Beshi be ma shi-e lè be kangg, likorye be ma yi ná ìtiā angi ì yi faale undi angwu u kang āngi nà. A maa fel hwua ābe biwom gbamm.
41006035	Likwulukwu li maa ndo gyebb. Bendi-utung bema be ma be hwaa lè he de-e le: "Likwulukwu li gyebb mà. Bendi be ndē he 'iteng ashin ye.
41006036	De bendi le bè ndo gye he ishaale angi ì yi kpee-kpee hè be bè kee lizi ndyebb zī."
41006037	Ujeso a fan bendi-utung bema le: "Men-agyang mà ke be ashi be zī." Be kung bii he le: "Kung li ndor igaa ikwudi ifee angi lì lè ndyebb ibred be ke be?"
41006038	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Mà yi lè bíkém ibred há bifung? Mà lè shun." Be lè shun nde. Be tem be de-e le be nde bíkém ibred bidyong lè ìkwǎn ifee.
41006039	Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema le bè hwua bendi aben he akwu akwu akwu akwu kwu he bikpam.
41006040	Bendi abena be kwu ugbe ugbe ugbe; he akwu asuso bè yi bendi asi adyong; he akwu asuso be shi bendi asi afee lè be lihwo.
41006041	Ujeso a hà kung bíkém ibred bidyong lè ìkwǎn ifee ana kwu he 'ubwo; u kung àshì gye he lifung-atabe pee Unim. A kung ibred bun ibun ibun kung ke bendi-utung bema le bè kpe ke bendi abena. A mbee kung ìkwǎn ifee hwua ke be puu.
41006042	Befe puu be ma zī gwul.
41006043	Bendi-utung Ujeso be ma gbong bigem ibred lè ìkwǎn abi be zī bi ma teng. Bi sho bitetel lihwo lè bi bifee.
41006044	He liwu bendi abe be ma zī lizi ana, bekaandi bengikye befe-befe be ma yi asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'afee lè bendi asi lihwo.
41006045	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema le bè ngwee he 'inong há tan nyóng he gye he igbindi Besaida, ù de bendi le bè ndo gye.
41006046	He 'unyong ahwu a de be le ishu ì so, a bo gye he ukwell lè kong ha Unim.
41006047	Kusu 'u gye. Kinong 'i ma fel he 'udyan umbwo. Ujeso a ma so he ugo-igye.
41006048	A nde le 'ufem 'u sha, be kpa 'ingie he 'inong anaale. He ashì liti a ma tan he likwu umbwo lè hwaa lè be. A maa ndo ba gba ābe.
41006049	Be nde-e, u tan he likwu umbwo. Be fel shell kangg likorye be maa kong le uhwutang a. Be fel kùng. Ujeso a hà de be le: "Mi a; mà shell ye!"
41006051	A hà lè kwu he afee 'inong utung ha abe. Kufem 'u kwun. Ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg.
41006052	Kikwele-uhwo bíkém ibred abi Ujeso a bun ke bendi ana, ki nung ābe ye.
41006053	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be ma gyong umbwo ukaandi gye he 'ipi ashi be ko le Ugenesaret. Be tyang 'inong 'ibell tyung he ungwu 'ibam.
41006054	Be gbe tyang 'inong ana tyang-tyang, bendi be shob Ujeso nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
41006055	Be buu gye mbee bipi puu ha abe 'ubong lè bé lè bendi-angmam he litaa be hwaa lè Ujeso he 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi be ma gyo le Ujeso ù yi.
41006056	He 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi Ujeso a maa gye, be ta lè bendi-angmam la tang he ushokwo. Be tim Ujeso anung le ù tyang ābe bè tyua he 'ubwo he ungwu aliga afe-afe or. Bendi puu abe be tyua he 'ubwo bé mbeē.
41007001	Bendi Iferesis lè bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten abe be ma be lè he Ujeruselem, be ma gbong liwu he 'ipi Ujeso a ma yi.
41007002	Be nde bendi-utung bema be za lizi faale abwo atoale he 'ukwo ahwu bendi Iferesis be hwua bendi le bè shi.
41007003	(Iferesis lè Ijuus abe be teng be ndor itetel angi betiebell be maa ndor. Be to abwo he 'ukwo ahwu kpa-kpa ná itel ibell ì yi mà ukpong be hà zī lizi.
41007004	Be to biwom abi be ndyebb lè he 'ate mà ukpong be hà zī ābi. Be ndor itel gbamm he atoale igbaala lè biki lè indor lè biwom bínde he 'ukwo itel ibell.)
41007005	Kife na Iferesis befe lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be bii Ujeso le: "Kibang 'i tan lè shi bendi-utung begang be ndor itel angi betietyan be ke li ye? Be zī lizi faale abwo atoale."
41007006	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Azaya a kong 'igyang a, nyong a kong 'iwom ashin gbe lè men bendi abe mà yi àshì lè benyin, lityam lè bebong. Azaya a fee le Unim a de le: 'Bendi aben be ka-m ife he ungwu ufe-ufe a. Ukpor àtyám abell à yi lè 'igbe lè ha ami.
41007007	Ìfé angi 'itaa i ì yi 'idideng. Be hwua iten angi bendigye nya a na ì yi àngi igi a.' "
41007008	Ujeso a de be le: "Má kung Iten Unim ndor he itang, keb ahwuale iten angi bendigye."
41007009	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Ma kong le ma sha 'inunung a he 'unyong ahwu ma kung àbi Unim a kong ndor he itang, ma fel hwua bendi abi betiemen be kong a?
41007010	Umosis a ma ke uten le: 'Fe atia lè anaa.' U mbee ke uten ususo le: 'Undi angwu a kong ban atyam or, anam or, bè gwu-e.'
41007011	Ukpor men ma hwua bendi le gbe undi ù yi lè 'iwom ashi hang a kung kpell atyam lè anam, gbe a ko āshi he igie Beke le ukoban, ashi 'i ze le kuke Unim,
41007012	kì tem yi le ù kung āshi kpell atyam lè anam ye.
41007013	He 'ukwo ahwun ma ban igie Unim gbe he biwom abi ma hwua bendi. Kì yi lè bisuso abi ma shi gbamm 'itaa ana."
41007014	Ujeso a mbee ko bendi abe bè yi há be hwaa lè 'uhwo-ma de be le: "Men puu mà dang 'utyung gyo mi hè ashi mı kong 'ì nung amen.
41007015	Kì yi le 'iwom ashi 'ı te lè he igye gye he lifung undi na 'ı ban he ye. Kiwom ashi 'ì yi he lityam undi ashi 'ı be he igye na 'ı ban he. [
41007016	Undi angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo.]"
41007017	Ujeso a bo tyang bendi aben gye he afee ushom. Bendi-utung bema be bii he likpe ityang anyin.
41007018	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Men or titi ma ngye ye a? Ki wa nung amen le 'iwom ashi 'ı te lè he igye gye he lifung undi na 'ı ban he ye, ye a?
41007019	Ki ban he ye likorye 'i gya he lityam a ye, ki gya he lifung a. Undi u hà tem lè shi ngyè." (Ujeso a tyung le lizi liyang-yang li ngbebb azele.)
41007020	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Kiwom ashi 'ı be lè he lityam undi na 'ı ban he.
41007021	Igim ibibi angi ı be lè he lityam undi na ı shi undi u wul ná bityuale bı wul nà, u zì 'azi, u gwu undi,
41007022	u kee ungye undi, u ban lityam fe 'iwom undi, u shi 'ibibi, u lam undi, u shi likpe liketye-liketye, u bung ashi, u bè iman fe undi, u dim idim, u fel shi likpe akpel-ye akpel-ye.
41007023	Àshī 'ì yi he lityam undi na 'ı shi-e u shi bibibi abin puu, bi ban he."
41007024	Ujeso a hà bo lè nya gye he 'igie Utaya. A gye he afee ushom ken. A kee le bendi bè ngye le ù yi há ye. Ukpor bendi be ngye kpor-kpor.
41007025	Ki ma yi lè ungingye ususo angwu a ma yi ugaandi a. A ma be lè he 'ubong Ufenishia he 'igie Usiria. Ungingye umen i, ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha unwaa-ma angwu ungingye. A gyo gbe lè Ujeso, a lè tim anung he 'ushu Ujeso. A tim Ujeso anung le ù ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha unwaa-ma.
41007027	Ujeso a fan he gbe he ityang le: "Tyang li-ì ke bebwani lizi ukpong. Ki ngbebb le bè kung lizi bebwani tyang ibua ye."
41007028	Ungingye ana a kung fan Ujeso le: "Atyagi, kì yi ná. Ibua or i bung àbi bebwani be zī wu he itang za."
41007029	Ujeso a de-e le: "He ashi wo kong nyin, ndo gye. Ikeb ibibi i tyang unwaa-gang abwo mà."
41007030	A tem gye he ushaale lè nde unwaa-ma ù yi ndē he unong. Ikeb ibibi i tyang he abwo mà.
41007031	Ujeso a hà bo lè he 'igie Utaya lè gbe he Usaidon lè 'igie 'ubong ashi be ko le Ishokwo Lihwo gye he umbwo Ugalili.
41007032	Bendi besuso be be lè 'ikporkpor hwaa lè Ujeso, tim he anung le ù kung 'ubwo 'uma pwom ungikye anwuna.
41007033	Ujeso a kpe-e ufe ututeb gbe lè he lè há liwu. A kung 'ubwo tyua he he atyung. A sho akung, u kung 'ubwo tyua he he 'abell.
41007034	Ujeso a nde àshì gye he lifung-atabe kung bebb kangg. U de ungikye anwuna he igie ibell le: "Efata," ashi 'i ze le buu!
41007035	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo atyung ungikye anwuna a buu, kabell 'ama 'a bor. U fel kong nwongg.
41007036	Ujeso a tye be uten le bè de undi áshi ye. Ukpor mà na a ma tye be uten or, be kong gbe lè shi kangg.
41007037	Bendi abe be ma gyo āshi, ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel kong le: "Aye! U sha biwom puu bi ngbebb! U sha bikwom-atyung bi gyo; u shi bikwom-umbell bi kong!"
41008001	Ki gbe 'igbe ye, bendi gbamm be mbee be hwaa lè Ujeso. Be ma yi lè ashi be zī ye. Ujeso a ko bendi-utung bema de be le:
41008002	"Bendi aben be kwu utung ha ami, ki fel ati akie. Beshi be fel sha-m lè be likorye bè tem yi lè ashi be zī ye.
41008003	Gbe mi de be le bè ndo gye he ushu faale lizi azele be la tyan itung he 'ukwo likorye besuso be be lè 'igbe."
41008004	Bendi-utung bema be bii he le: "He hung nyin undi ù ha nde lizi hen libeb angi lì kpè ke bendi aben puu?"
41008005	Ujeso a bii ābe le bè yi lè bíkém ibred bifung? Be fan he le bè yi lè bíkém ibred bidyong-ifee.
41008006	A de bendi puu le bè kwu ko. A hà kpe ibred ana, pee Unim, kung āngi bun ibun ibun ke bendi-utung bema le bè ke bendi abena. Bendi-utung bema be kpe ke be.
41008007	Be ma mbee yi lè inwaa īkwǎn zangg. Ujeso a kung ipee ke Unim. U de bendi-utung bema le bè kung āngi ke bendi abena.
41008008	Undi uyang-yang a ma zī gwul. Be gbong bigem abi bi zī bi teng. Bi ma sho bitetel bidyong-ifee.
41008009	Bendi abe be ma zī lizi ana, be maa mbee asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo. Ujeso a ma de bendi abena le bè ndo gye.
41008010	A mbo ngwee he afee 'inong lè bendi-utung bema bo ndo he 'igie ashi be ko le Udalmanuta.
41008011	Bendi besuso lè he likwu Iferesis be be há, keb ifung afungale ha Ujeso. Be kee le be gil he. Be de-e le ù shi 'ikwele-uhwo tyung ābe hè be bè ngye le Unim na a som he.
41008012	Ujeso a kung bebb kangg, u bii le: "Kibang 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu bendi abe ati anyin be kee le be nda 'ikwele-uhwo?" A hà de le: "Mî de men 'igyang le, mi tyung amen 'ikwele-uhwo ná ye."
41008013	Ujeso a gbe tyang ābe lè ngwee he 'inong gye he igbindi umbwo.
41008014	Bendi-utung Ujeso be ma well kung ibred ye. Be ma yi lè 'íkém ibred ken a he afee 'inong.
41008015	Ujeso a de be gbe he ityang le bè baa 'uhwo-bell lè ha iyist angi ı shi ibred ı mbwee angi ı be lè ha Iferesis lè Uherod.
41008016	Be fel kong ha bende le: "Ujeso a kong ashin, le bwo li be lè ibred ye a."
41008017	Ujeso a ma ngye ashi be kong. A kung bii ābe le: "Kibang a, ma kong gbe lè ibred angi ma be lè ngi ye? Ki wa nung amen ye a? Ma hwun lihwun 'igyo atyuo.
41008018	Mà yi lè itong-shi 'inde ye a? Mà yi lè atyung 'igyo ye a? Ma well ye a?
41008019	He 'unyong ahwu mi ma kung bíkém ibred bidyong bun ke bendi asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'afee lè bendi asi lihwo be zī, bigem abi be ma zī bi teng bi ma sho bitetel bifung?" Be fan he le bi ma sho bitetel lihwo lè bi bifee.
41008020	A bii ābe le: "He 'unyong ahwu mi ma mbee kung bíkém ibred bidyong-ifee bun ke bendi asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo be zī, bigem abi be ma zī bi teng bi ma sho bitetel bifung?" Be fan he le bi ma sho bitetel bidyong-ifee.
41008021	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Nyong 'ì yi i or, ki wa nung amen ye a?"
41008022	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be be he Besaida. Bendi besuso be be lè uhwua-ashi ken be hwaa lè he. Be tim he anung le ù tyua he 'ubwo.
41008023	Ujeso a kung 'ubwo kwu uhwua-ashi anwuna he 'ubwo gbe lè he lè há ushokwo. Ujeso a kung akung sho wu-e he atong-shi. A kung abwo pwom he bii he le: "Wo nda há a?"
41008024	Ungikye ana a kung àshì gye he 'usi. A kung de Ujeso le u nda bendi, bè yi ná ìkwán, ukpor be tan litan.
41008025	Ujeso a hà mbee kung abwo pwom he he atong-shi. Ungikye ana, atong-shi ama a buu; u fel nda nwongg.
41008026	Ujeso a de-e le ù ndo gye. Ù tem gye he ushokwo ye.
41008027	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be bo ndo he lishi Usesaria Ufilipai. Be lè fel he 'ukwo, Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Bendi be ko mi le ayang?"
41008028	Be fan he le: "Besuso be da le wò yi Ujon angwu a maa kib bendi he umbwo a. Besuso be de le wò yi Ilaja a. Besuso be de le wò yi undi angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim leěti a."
41008029	Ujeso a hà kung bii ābe le: "Men ufe ma de le mì yi ayang a?" Ipita a kung fan le: "Wò yi Ukristi a." (Ukristi na Unim a kyebb le u ba som ba he igye anyin le ù kwu Undi-likpan.)
41008030	Ujeso a hà tye be uten le bè de undi gbe lè he ye.
41008031	Ujeso a keb bendi-utung bema biwom ahwuale le, kì yi kpe-kpe le ufe Unwaa Undigye, u ba kpa 'ingie kangg. Bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be ba swan he lè he liwu libell. Be ba gwa he. Ukpor he liti lekie u tem ba wum lè he lihwu.
41008032	Ujeso a ma kong ashin nya gboo. Ipita a ko he gye he item lè swan de-e le ù tem kong ná ye.
41008033	Ujeso a bel àshì nde bendi-utung bema kung ben Ipita titi. A de-e le: "Usetan, gbe-m lè nyin. Ugim ugang ù yi angwu undigye a, ù yi angwu Unim a ye."
41008034	Ujeso a ko liwu bendi lè bendi-utung bema be he 'iteng ken. A kung de be le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le u pwom mi, ù zob 'uhwo-ma. Ù bong lihwu kung 'ikpakpaa ashi be be maa he bee so, pwom mi.
41008035	Undi angwu a kee le u kpan lishi lima, hà u nim lè 'uhwo-ma. Undi angwu a bong lihwu he 'uhwo ahwu 'ugi lè 'isom 'inunung, na u be kwu lè likpan.
41008036	Kibang lifem angi lì yi ke undi le ù kwu lè biwom puu he igye anyin, ukpor u nim 'ūnyōng 'uma?
41008037	Kì yi lè 'iwom ashi undi u be ke kpe 'ūnyōng 'uma ahwu 'u nim ye.
41008038	Undi angwu ishwia ı shi-e lè mi lè igie igi he liwu bendi bebibi he igye anyin pi be ndor iten Unim ye i, na ishwia ı be shi-m mi Unwaa Undigye lè he he 'unyong ahwu mı be be lè ikeb Unim lè idengell ima."
41009001	Ujeso a mbee kung de be le: "Mi-ì de men, kì yi faale ifung le men besuso abe mà yi naa nyin, ma ba hwa ye kpamm ma gbe nde Kusu Unim ahwu 'u be be lè ikeb."
41009002	Ati a gbe adyong, he ledyong-ken Ujeso a kpe Ipita lè Ujems lè Ujon gye lè be he lishi ukwell hè befe-befe bè lè kwu há. Be lè wu há, be nde Ujeso a gie.
41009003	Bihwom bima bi keb ataale; bi fel bifung-bifung kpeladada. Kì yi lè undi he igye anyin angwu u shì 'ihwom 'ı fel bifung ná mbee ye.
41009004	Bendi-utung Ujeso be nde Ilaja lè Umosis be fem be kong ha Ujeso.
41009005	Ipita lè bendi abe befee be ma fel he 'ushell; Ipita a ma tem ngye ashi ù kong ye. A kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, kiteng ashin 'i ngbebb ashi lı ngyor kwu i. Tyang li lì kaa bebuu bekie, kugang ken, Umosis ken, Ilaja ken."
41009007	Kibu 'i be lè he 'usi, be shī baà Ujeso kpemm. Baà Ipita be gyo lingmam Unim lè há 'ibu ana le: "Anwun na ù yi 'iken Unwaa-gi. Mà gyo he."
41009008	Be bel àshì shun kel-kel, be tem nde undi ususo pel ha Ujeso ye.
41009009	Nya a na be maa shul ukwell be 'utan, Ujeso a tye be uten le bè de undi 'iwom ashi be nde ye kpamm ufe Unwaa Undigye, u gbe hwō wum.
41009010	Be ma ndor uten umen i. Ukpor be maa fel bii bende begyang le awumale lè he lihwu ufe a ze le ana?
41009011	Be kung bii Ujeso le: "Kibang 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten be de le Ilaja na 'ì yi kpe-kpe le ù be be 'ushu?"
41009012	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le Ilaja ù be 'ushu 'igyang he-e ù be kam biwom puu. Kibang 'i ma hà yi atan-lengi angwu be ma fee he 'ushia le mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba kpa bingie kangg, bendi be mbee zob mi?
41009013	Mi de men le Ilaja a be mà. Bendi be shi-e 'iwom ashi be kee nya a na be fee gbe lè he."
41009014	Be ma tem be hwaa lè bendi-utung Ujeso abe be teng. Be ma nde bendi gbamm sho há. Bekaandi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten bè yi sho há, be fa ifung ha bendi-utung Ujeso.
41009015	Bendi abena be nde Ujeso, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. Be buu lè kong lè he.
41009016	Ujeso a kung bii bendi-utung bema le: "Ma fa ifung ha abe gba lè 'ibang a?"
41009017	Undi ken lè há liwu bendi abena a kung fan he le: "Ukaandi, mi be lè unwaa-gi hwaa lè wo likorye ikeb ibibi ì yi ha ahe. I kwom he umbell.
41009018	He 'unyong 'uyang-yang ahwu ı kwu-e, i sha he u mbwa he itang. U zī bihwu he ungwu putu-putu-putu; u shib ishang fe ha bende; inyiahwo ima i kwell semm. Mi de bendi-utung begang le bè ndō ikeb ibibi ana, be ndō āngi mbee ye."
41009019	Ujeso a kung bii bendi-utung bema le: "Mì kwu utung ha amen lè 'igbe ná a, ma hà fe lityam ha ami? Ma kee le mì ngib lityam lè men lè 'igbe ná a?" U de be le: "Mà be lè unwaa umen ana ke-m."
41009020	Be te lè he lè ke-e. Ikeb ibibi anyina i nde Ujeso nde-nde, i shi unwan ungikye umen ana a mbu he itang. U fel mung he itang, u tim gbel zī bihwu he ungwu putu-putu-putu.
41009021	Ujeso a kung bii ātyām unwaa anwuna le: "Ki kpi-e, ki gbe 'igbe ná a?" A fan he le: "Ki kpi-e kung lè há 'isun a.
41009022	Kunyong 'ususo i kwa he fa he 'inde; kunyong 'ususo i kwu-e fe he lishor hè ngi ì gwu-e. Beshi bè shi-a lè bel; gbe wò nya shi lingmam limen i mbee, wo hā kpell li."
41009023	Gyo Ujeso le: "Kibang a, wo de le gbe mi-ì nya shi ná mbeè? Biwom puu bì yi pie-pie ke undi angwu ù yi lè abongale ha Unim."
41009024	Ātyām unwaa ana a kung kùng kangg le: "Mi bong ha Unim, ukpor abongale ugi a dyam ye! Hā kpell mi!"
41009025	Ujeso a nde le bendi be ndo die ba hwaa lè be. A kung gaa fe ikeb ibibi angi i kwom unwaa umen ana umbell le ì fem lè ha ahe, ù tem be hwaa lè he ye.
41009026	Ikeb ibibi ana i kùng kangg, i shi unwaa ana a tung for-for-for mbu shī he itang. I hà fem be he igye. Unwaa umen ana a ma fel ná likwom nà. Bendi gbamm abe bè yi há, be fel kong le a hwō.
41009027	Ujeso a kung 'ubwo kwu-e he 'ubwo bo 'inaa.
41009028	Ujeso a bo gye he afee ushom. Bendi-utung bema be hà be bii he há he 'undyell le: "Kibang a, bel lí yii ndō ikeb ibibi ana mbee ye?"
41009029	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le be ndō ikeb ibibi angi 'itaa ana gba he akongale ha Unim ufe-ufe a.
41009030	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be bo lè há ana lè gbe he Ugalili. Ujeso a ma kee le undi ù ngye he 'ipi ù yi ye, likorye a maa hwua bendi-utung bema biwom há abwo. A maa bun da ābe le undi u ba kung he ufe Unwaa Undigye, ka bendi le bè gwu-e. Ukpor he liti angi lekie u ba tem wum lè he lihwu.
41009032	Ashi a kong 'i ma nung bendi-utung bema ye, ukpor be ma yi lè 'ushell ná bè bii he.
41009033	Be be he 'ubong ahwu be ko le Ukapanyam. He 'unyong ahwu be ma yi he ushom, Ujeso a bii ābe le 'ibang bé yii fe ifung gbe lè shi lè 'ukwo?
41009034	Be ma fan ye likorye be maa fa ifung lè 'ukwo gba lè undi angwu ù yi ukaandi hwò he liwu libell.
41009035	Ujeso a bel kwu ko, u de bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee le bè die be hwaa lè he. A de be le undi angwu a kee le u kwa ukaandi ù shi 'uhwo-ma ù tem fel unwaasun hwò bendi puu.
41009036	A kpe unwani be naa he liwu libell. U kung he wom he abee, u de be le:
41009037	"Undi angwu a kpe unwani angwu 'itaa i he lizen ligi, hà a kpe-m mi a. Undi angwu a kpe-m, hà a kpe-m mi-mi a ye; a kpe Ada angwu a som mi or titi."
41009038	Ujon a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, li nde undi-iso u ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi he lizen ligang. Li swan le ù ndō āngi ye likorye ù yi he liwu lityan a ye."
41009039	Ujeso a de-e le: "Swan he ye, likorye undi angwu u shi bikwele-uhwo he lizen ligi, u kong 'ibibi gba lè mi akikye ye.
41009040	Undi angwu ù yi linaa ha abel ye, hà ù yi ke li bel a.
41009041	Mí-ì de men, undi angwu a ke men umbwo or le mà ngwo le bwo mà yi bendi-utung begi mi Ujeso Ukristi a, u ba kpa lifem kpe-kpe-kpe."
41009042	Ujeso a de le: "Bebwani abe be bong ha ami nyin, gbe undi a shi ābe, undi ken or, a shi 'iban, hà 'i ban kangg. Àshī le bè kung 'ukor 'ukaandi tye tyuu undi angwu há he umbell lè tye he umbwo ukaandi, ki ngbebb hwò ashi le ù shi undi ù shi 'iban.
41009043	Gbe 'ubwo 'ugang na 'u sha-a wo shi 'iban, wò tang āhwu tyang hell. Ki ngbebb le wò kwu lè likpan faale 'ubwo ken hwò ashi le wò kwu lè abwo afee gye he 'inde ashi 'ı nim ye ngyor igye kpamm. [
41009044	He 'iteng ashina be ba kpa 'ingie kpamm, kinde 'i nim ye kpamm.]
41009045	Gbe 'ubee 'ugang na 'u sha-a wo shi 'iban, wo tang āhwu tyang hell. Ki ngbebb le wò kwu lè likpan faale 'ubee ken hwò ashi le wò kwu lè abee afee gye he 'inde. [
41009046	He 'iteng ashina be ba kpa 'ingie kpamm, kinde 'i nim ye kpamm.]
41009047	Gbe utong-shi ugang na u sha-a wo shi 'iban, wo waa he. Ki ngbebb le wò gye he lifung-atabe lè utong-shi ken hwò ashi le wò kwu lè itong-shi ifee gye he 'inde.
41009048	He 'iteng ashina bendi be ba kpa 'ingie kpamm, kinde 'i nim ye kpamm."
41009049	Ujeso a kung ityang bun de be le: "Bendi be fa bendo he biwom abi be shang Unim. Kitaa 'imen i na undi uyang-yang u kpe 'ingie ashi 'ì yi ná 'inde he-e ù fel kang-kang.
41009050	Bendo be ngbebb. Ukpor gbe bè tem nyin he ungwu ye, undi u sha ná a hè be bè tem nyin? Mà kwu ná bendi abe be nyin, hè men mà kwu lè ikwun ha bende."
41010001	Ujeso a bo lè he 'iteng ashina lè gbe he Ujudia gye he igbindi umbwo Ujodan. Bendi gbamm be mbee be hwaa lè he. A hwua ābe biwom nya a na u shaa shi.
41010002	Bendi besuso lè he likwu Iferesis be be hwaa lè Ujeso be kung he lè he 'usi. Be bii he le: "Iten ityan i bong le undi ù ban libee a?"
41010003	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Kibang uten angwu Umosis a tye men?"
41010004	Be fan he le Umosis a ma ke ikeb le undi ù fee 'ushia libee abanale ke ungye-ma de-e le ù ndo gye.
41010005	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Umosis a ma fee uten anwun ke men le bwo ma tēb àtyám, ma kpa àshi be hwua amen ye a.
41010006	Be ma fee he 'ushia Unim le: 'Lè há linde-linde he 'unyong ahwu Unim a ma shi igye anyin, a mbe ungikye lè ungingye.
41010007	He atan-lengi anwun ungikye ù tyang átyám lè anam he-e ù gwaa ha ungye-ma.
41010008	Bendi bemen befee ana be fel nya a na undi ken a.' Bè tem yi bendi befee a ye, be fel anung ken.
41010009	Bwo Unim na a shi ābe le bè bee, undigye ù ban ābe libee ye."
41010010	Be ma tem gye he afee ushom. Bendi-utung Ujeso be ma bii he gbe lè likong libee ana.
41010011	Ujeso a de be le ungikye angwu a ndō ungye-ma lè kpebb ungye ususo, hà a shi 'iban agbele ipel fe ungye-ma.
41010012	Kitaa 'imen gbe ungingye a tyang ukyema lè bee lè ungikye ususo, hà a shi 'iban agbele ipel fe ukyema.
41010013	Bendi besuso be be lè bebwaa-bell le Ujeso ù tyua ābe abwo. Bendi-utung Ujeso be ma swan ndō ābe.
41010014	Ujeso a ma nde ashi bendi-utung bema be shi. Ki ma nyung he he lityam. A kung de be le: "Mà tyang bebwani bè be hwaa lè mi. Mà swan ndō ābe ye, likorye abe 'itaa i na Unim ù yi Usu ubell.
41010015	Mí-ì de men, kì yi faale ifung le undi uyang-yang angwu a keb 'uhwo-ma ke Unim le ù kwu Usu uma ná unwani ye, u kwa lè libwo he Kusu Unim ye."
41010016	Ujeso a hà kung bebwani wom he abee. U kung abwo pwom ābe ke be 'ukwun.
41010017	Ujeso a ma bo lè fel he 'ukwo, ungikye ususo a buu be hwaa lè he, tim anung he itang ke-e, kung bii he le: "Ukaandi ununung, mì shi ná a, mî kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm?"
41010018	Gyo Ujeso le: "Kibang a, wo ko mi le undi ununung? Kì yi lè undi ununung ye, Unim ufe-ufe na ù yi ununung.
41010019	Wo ngye iten angi i de le: 'Gwu undi ye. Gbe ipel ha undi-iso fem ungye-gang tyang ye. Zì 'azi ye. Bè uman fe undi ye. Shi undi zī ye. Fe atia lè anaa.' "
41010020	Ungikye anwuna a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, mi ndor iten anyin kung lè há 'isun 'igi a."
41010021	Ki ma nyin Ujeso he lityam kangg lè he, a bel àshì nde-e, kung de-e le, "Kiwom 'i teng ken ashi wò shi. Lè kung biwom bigang puu ndyebb zi, kung únde hwua ke bendi-likaa, mà wo ba kwa lè 'ingbebb he lifung-atabe. Mà wò hà be pwom mi."
41010022	A ma gyo ashina gyo-gyo, a fel 'ushu 'ushi-ushi likorye a ma mbu 'ingbebb kangg. A gbe ligye 'imbwee-imbwee.
41010023	Ujeso a bel àshì nde bendi-utung bema, u de be le, ki ba kwa lè 'ingie kangg ka bendi-ingbebb le bè keb 'uhwo-bell ke Unim he-e ù kwu Usu ubell.
41010024	Kiwom ashi Ujeso a kong, ki kwu bendi-utung bema he 'uhwo. Ujeso a mbee de be le: "Bebwaa-gi, kì yi lè 'ingie ke undi le ù keb 'uhwo-ma ke Unim he-e ù kwu Usu uma.
41010025	Kì yi pie-pie ke 'igundu le 'ì gbe he ligia uwo hwò ashi le undi-ingbebb ù fel undi angwu Unim ù yi Usu uma."
41010026	Ashina 'i ma kwu bendi-utung bema he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel bii bende le: "Fe ayang ù ha be kwu lè likpan 'unyong?"
41010027	Ujeso a bel àshì nde be kporr, kung de be le, undigye u kpan 'uhwo-ma mbee ye. Unim ufe-ufe na u kpan undi. Biwom puu, Unim u sha ābi pie-pie.
41010028	Ipita a de-e le: "Nde, li tyang biwom puu, fel bendi-utung begang."
41010029	Ujeso a de be le: "Ki ngbebb. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi undi a gbe tyang āshi he 'uhwo 'ugi lè 'isom 'inunung, mà 'ì yi ushu or, bebwaa or, bebwanam or, átyám or, anam or, ùtiá or, mi da-a 'igyang le,
41010030	u kpa lifem hwà abina tyang 'usi-usi hen he igye anyin. U ba kpa beke ākwū asi adyong hwà ushu uma lè bebwende lè anam lè bebwaa-ma lè ùtiá uma. U mbee kpe 'ingie titi. He igye angi ı be lè há 'ushu u ba kwa lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm.
41010031	Bendi gbamm abe bè yi 'ushu 'anaa-anaa nyin, be ba fel item; abe bè yi item 'anaa-anaa nyin, be be fel 'ushu."
41010032	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa gya he Ujeruselem. Be lè fel he 'ukwo, Ujeso a gbe tang ābe lè he 'ushu gbe tyang ābe. Ki kwu bendi-utung bema he 'uhwo kangg. Bendi abe be maa pwom ābe, be fel he 'ushell. Ujeso a ko bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee gye he ufaa, kung de be ashi 'ı be shi fe-e.
41010033	A de be le: "Mà gyo, li gya he Ujeruselem he 'ipi ashi undi u be kung mi Unwaa Undigye, ke bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten. Be ba ka ikeb le bè gwu-m. Be ba kung mi ka bendi abe bè yi 'ubong 'utyan a ye.
41010034	Bendi bemen i be ba nyan mi; be sho akung wu-m; be kpam mi ikwun; be hà gwu-m. Ukpor he liti angi lekie mi ba tem wum lè he lihwu."
41010035	Ujems befe lè Ujon, bebwaa Uzebedi, be lè hwaa lè Ujeso, be de-e le: "Ukaandi, kì yi lè 'iwom ashi bel lı kee le wò shi ke li."
41010036	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Kibang ma kee le mì shi ke men?"
41010037	Be fan he le: "Li kee le wò ke li ikeb le undi ken ù be kwa-a lè he 'ubwo lizen, angwu ken u kwa-a lè he 'ubwo limbell he 'unyong ahwu wo kwu he 'idem 'usu 'igang."
41010038	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Má ngye ashi ma bii ye. Men ma nya kpa 'ingie ashi mi ndo kpe i mbeè a?"
41010039	Be bong de-e le be kpa āshi mbee. Ujeso a kung de be le: "Ma kpa 'ingie he 'uhwo 'ugi.
41010040	Ukpor mi-ì yi lè ikeb le mi waa undi angwu u be kwu-m lè he 'ubwo lizen, kwu-m lè he 'ubwo limbell ye. Unim u ba kung biteng bimen i ka bendi abe a shì ābi ndor ābe."
41010041	Bendi-utung bema abe be teng lihwo be gyo 'iwom ashina. Be fel he ingywo fe Ujems befe lè Ujon.
41010042	Ujeso a ko ābe befe puu be he 'iteng ken, kung de be le: "Má ngye ná bendi abe be kee le be kwa bekaandi abe be nde gbe lè bendi be tyung ikeb ibell. Be sha bendi be fel ná ifee.
41010043	Ukpor men mà shi ná ye. Undi he liwu līmen angwu a kee le u kwa ukaandi, ù bel fel uboyi bendi abe be teng.
41010044	Undi angwu a kee le u kwa atie-lishi bendi, ù keb 'uhwo-ma fel ufee bendi puu.
41010045	Mi Unwaa Undigye or, mi be le hè bendi bè kwu iboyi igi a ye, mi be le mî kwu uboyi bendi a, mi mbee kung 'uhwo-gi ke, mî pong bendi gbamm."
41010046	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be ma gye he Ujeriko. He 'unyong ahwu be maa gye lè há, bendi be ma ti kwuo pwom ābe. He 'unyong 'umen ana uhwua-ashi ken angwu be ko le Ubatimiyes, unwaa Utimiyes, a ma yi kwu he 'ukwo, u nyong 'inyong.
41010047	A gyo le Ujeso angwu Unazaret u ba lè há, u fel gaa le: "Ujeso, igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha ami!"
41010048	Bendi gbamm be gaa fe-e le ù naa lè 'ihwee. A hà kung gaa kangg le: "Igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha ami!"
41010049	Ujeso a hà naa, som ko he. Be ko he de-e le ù kwu lè igor. Ù bo 'inaa. Ujeso u ko he.
41010050	Uhwua-ashi anwuna a tie bo 'inaa, kung 'ihwom 'ima pell tyang he itang gbe lè hwaa lè Ujeso.
41010051	Ujeso a bii he le: "Kibang wo kee le mì shi ka-a?" Uhwua-ashi anwuna a fan he le: "Ukaandi, mi kee le mi mbee nda."
41010052	Ujeso a de-e le ù ndo gye. A mbee likorye a fe lityam ha ahe. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo ungikye anwuna u fel nda. A gbe utung ha Ujeso.
41011001	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be fel kpee-kpee he Ujeruselem, be wu he ashi Ujeruselem angi be ko le Befeji lè Beteni he liten ukwell angwu be ko le Olif. Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema, bendi befee, le u la som ābe gya he 'ushu.
41011002	A de be le: "Mà gye he 'ubong ahwu 'ù yi he 'ushu ana. Ma la wa há, ma nda ūshōm 'ukaa-inyia ahwu undi a wa pwom āhwu ngye ye tyuu há. Mà pell āhwu be lè hwu.
41011003	Gbe undi a bii amen atan-lengi angwu ma pell kung āhwu, mà de-e le, 'Ki fong Atyetyan lè hwu. Gbe a mbee, u som undi u tem lè hwu.' "
41011004	Bendi-utung bema bendi befee ana be bo lè nde 'ukaa-inyia tyuu he ungwu lishi gwaa ha 'ukwo. Be pell āhwu.
41011005	Bendi besuso abe bè yi naa há, be bii ābe le 'ibang a, be pell kung 'ukaa-inyia?
41011006	Bendi-utung Ujeso be fan nya a na Ujeso á yi de be. Be tyang ābe.
41011007	Be be lè 'ukaa-inyia ana ke Ujeso. Be waa bihwom bibell shī āhwu he item. Ujeso a bel kwu há.
41011008	Bendi gbamm be kung bihwom bibell kie he ugbaakwo kpuludududu. Besuso be bia bifufeb lè he libeb, be kie há he 'ukwo.
41011009	Bendi abe be maa te Ujeso lè he 'ushu lè abe lè he item, be maa fel gaa kong le: "Mà lì pee Unim. Kukwun 'ù kwu ke undi angwu u be he lizen Atyetyan Unim.
41011010	Kukwun 'ù kwu ke undi angwu u be kwu usu ná atietyan Udebid a ma yi. Ipee ì kwu ke Unim angwu he lifung-atabe."
41011011	Ujeso a wu he Ujeruselem. A hà gbe gye he Ushom Unim lè nde biwom puu abi bì yi há. Bwo likwulukwu li ma gyebb mà, a gbe lè bendi-utung bema tem gye he Beteni.
41011012	Ashi a taa, nya a na be maa tem be lè há Beteni, itung i maa fel ndo Ujeso.
41011013	A kung àshì nde gye he 'ushu, a nde ùkwán angwu be ko le ufik a hwaa ashia naa há. A te he-e ù lè nde le a wum agbe à he-e ù gbung ndeb? A lè wu há, a nde-e ù yi ashia-ashia, likorye 'unyong ahwu u wum 'u wa fel ye.
41011014	Ujeso a kung de ùkwán umen ana le ù hà tem ba wum agbe le bendi bè ndeb ye. Bendi-utung bema be gyo ashi a kong.
41011015	Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be be wu he Ujeruselem. Ujeso a gye he afee Ushom Unim. A nde bendi abe be ndyebb biwom zī lè abe be ndyebb biwom há he Ushom Unim, a ndō ābe wu he igye. U nyii itebul bendi abe be gie únde lè bidem bendi abe be ndyebb inwaa ukwuo abakpa zī wu hell.
41011016	Ujeso a tye be uten le: "Undi ù tem lè gbe lè 'iwom 'itaa ana he Ushom Unim ye."
41011017	U fel hwua ābe le: "Be ma fee ndor he 'ushia Unim le Unim a de le, be ba ko Ushom uma le 'iteng ashi bendi abe he abong puu be kong ha Unim. Ukpor men ma shi-e a bel 'iteng ashi ma ndyell zì 'azi."
41011018	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten be gyo ashin. Be fel kee 'ukwo ahwu be gwu-e. Ukpor be maa shell he likorye ki ma kwu bendi puu he 'uhwo gbe lè ashi a hwua ābe.
41011019	Likwulukwu li gyebb, Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be gbe lè há Ujeruselem.
41011020	Ashi a taa, Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be mbee lè gbe he 'ukwo 'umen ana. Be nde ùkwán umen ana a hwō lè idaa lè idaa.
41011021	Ipita a well àshi Ujeso a ma kong. A kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, nde ùkwán angwu wo ma ke ushang ubibi fe-e, a hwō!"
41011022	Ujeso a kung de be puu le: "Mà fe lityam ha Unim.
41011023	Kì yi 'igyang a le undi uyang-yang angwu a de ukwell le ù kwuo lè wu he umbwo ukaandi, gbe ù yi faale atyāngale ha ahe lityam, u bong le ashi a kong ana 'i sha, Unim u sha āshi ka he.
41011024	He ashin, mà ngye dangg le, he 'unyong ahwu ma kong ha Unim, gbe ma bii he biwom, mà bong le ma kpe bi mà, Unim u ka amen ábi puu.
41011025	He 'unyong ahwu undi u kong ha Unim, ù tyang ke undi angwu a shi 'ibibi ha ahe, hè Atyam angwu he lifung-atabe ù tyang biban bima ke-e ufe or titi. [
41011026	Gbe undi a tyang ke bendi ye, Atyam angwu he lifung-atabe or u tyang ka he ye.]"
41011027	Be hà tem be he Ujeruselem. Be gbe gye he Ushom Unim. Nya a na Ujeso a maa tan há he Ushom Unim, bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong be be hwaa lè he.
41011028	Be bii he le: "Lè hung wo be lè ikeb angi wō-ò shi biwom bimen i? Ayang a ka-a ikeb le wò shi biwom bimen i?"
41011029	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi bii amen 'ibibi ken. Gbe ma fan āshi, mi da amen undi angwu a ke-m ikeb angi mı shi biwom bimen i.
41011030	Ayang a ma ke Ujon ikeb angi a maa kib bendi he umbwo? Unim na a ma ke-e à, hà bendigye á? Mà fan mi."
41011031	Be maa fel tyāng lè bende le: "Lì hà fan le ana? Gbe li fan he le Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb Unim a, u bii li le, fe 'ibang 'i tan lè shi li bong ha Ujon ye?
41011032	Ukpor lì nya de-e le Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb angi undigye â?" Be maa shell likorye bendi puu be bong le Ujon ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a na afong.
41011033	Be hà kung fan Ujeso le be ngye ye. Ujeso a de be le ufe or u da ābe undi angwu a ke-e ikeb angi u shi biwom bimen i ye.
41012001	Ujeso a ma bun ityang de be le: "Ungikye ususo a ma nam ùtiá, kwan ikwan angi be bung agbe ángi shi 'utyuo; u kung ugbe kaa fe-e kel-kel; u tem 'ania he 'ipi be shor agbe ikwan ana kung umbwo ángi; u shi udye angwu bendi be kwu kang ùtiá. A kung utia ana ke bendi le bè nde gbe-e lè he. A hà bo ndo litan gye he 'ubong 'ususo.
41012002	Kunyong 'u fel ahwu bendi be bung agbe ikwan, a som ufee uma hwaa lè bendi abe be nde gbe lè ùtiá le ù lè kpe ūkpō uma be ke-e.
41012003	Bendi abena be kwu-e kpam, be ndó he tem abubwo.
41012004	Ugyang utia a mbee som ufee ususo te. Bendi abena be kwu-e kpam nem, shi-e u fel ibia-ibia.
41012005	A mbee som ufee ususo te. Be kwu-e gwu. Be shi ifee gbamm 'itaa ken; be kpam isuso, be gwu angi i teng.
41012006	Ki teng 'agbung unwaa-ma ufe-ufe. A gim le be ba ka unwaa-ma ufe ife. He umbee-likel a kung som he hwaa lè be.
41012007	Bendi abe be nde gbe lè ùtiá ana be de bende le: 'Anwun na u be zī lishi atyam, mà lì gwu-e, hè utia anwun ù fel utyan.'
41012008	Be kwu unwaa-ma ana gwu há he utia, be kung likwom lima lè tyang gye he igye."
41012009	Ujeso a hà kung bii àbe be gyo he le: "Ugyang utia u nya sha ná a?" A tem lè shi fan le: "U la gwa bendi abena, u tem kpe bendi besuso le bè nde gbe lè utia.
41012010	Ityang angi be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti i, ma wa bo āngi ngye ye a? Be fee le: 'Kukor ahwu bendi abe be tye ushom be swan le 'u ngbebb he ushom atyele ye, kufe na 'u tem fel kwu ushom naa genn.
41012011	Atyetyan Unim na a shi ashin. Ki kwu li he 'uhwo kangg.' "
41012012	Bekaandi Ijuus be fel kee 'ukwo ahwu be kwu-e, likorye be ngye le Ujeso a bun ityang anyin gbe lè befe a. Ukpor be ma shell liwu bendi, be tyang he, be gbe lè há.
41012013	Be som Iferesis isuso lè bendi Uherod le bè lè kung Ujeso lè he 'usi hè be bè gyo le u mbwa lè he līngmam a.
41012014	Be be hwaa lè he de-e le: "Ukaandi, li ngye le wò yi undi angwu u kong 'igyang a. Bendi puu bè yi-a 'itaa ken. Wo maa anung gba lè 'iwom ashi bendi be gim ye. Wo hwua bendi 'igyang gba lè ashi Unim a kee le bendi bè shi. Iten ityan i bong le bè tye ukpanda ke Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom à, hà bè tye ke-e ye? Lì tye à, hà lì tye ye?"
41012015	Ujeso a ngye beshu bebell. A kung de be le: "Kibang a, ma kung mi lè he 'usi? Mà be lè ukwudi mî nde."
41012016	Be be lè he. A kung bii ābe le: "Lìshī ayang lè lizen ayang, be fee fe nyin?" Be fan he le: "Angi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom a."
41012017	A kung de be le: "Àshī 'ì yi ashi Usu, mà kung ke Usu; àshī 'ì yi ashi Unim, mà kung ke Unim." Ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg gbe lè Ujeso.
41012018	Bendi Isadusis be bong le undi u wum lè he lihwu ye. Bendi besuso lè he likwu libell be be hwaa lè Ujeso. Be de-e le:
41012019	"Ukaandi, Umosis a ma fee uten ndor li le: 'Gbe undi a hwō tyang ungye faale unwaa, unwanam ù kpebb kung ungye-uhwuu hè ūbū ungwende angwu a hwō ù nim ye.'
41012020	Ki ma yi lè bengikye bedyong-ifee abe be ma yi bebwanam bende. Angwu gbel a kpebb ungye. A hwō tyang he faale unwaa.
41012021	Angwu a pwom lè he a kpebb kung ungye-uhwuu ana. Ufe or a hwō tyang he faale unwaa.
41012022	Ki shi fe angwu lekie lè abe be teng nya 'itaa ken. Puu ubell, bendi bedyong-ifee, be kpebb ungingye umen ana, hwō tyang he faale unwaa. Angwu ungingye a hà hwō.
41012023	He 'unyong ahwu bendi puu be be wum lè he lihwu, ungingye anwun u ba kwa ungye ayang a, bwo puu ubell, bendi bedyong-ifee, be ma kpebb he?"
41012024	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ma mbeb, likorye ma ngye igie Unim or, ngwu mà ngye ikeb ima or ye.
41012025	He 'unyong ahwu be be wum lè he lihwu, be ba fel nya a na idengell Unim angi he lifung-atabe a. Bengikye bè tem ba kpebb bengye ye, bengingye be tem be gye abee ye.
41012026	Ma bii mi gbe lè awumale lè he lihwu. Be fee he 'ushia Umosis gbe lè ùkwán angwu Unim a ma kong ha Umosis. Ma wa bo āshi ye a? He 'iteng 'imen ana be fee le Unim a de Umosis le: 'Mì yi Unim angwu Ebraham lè Azik lè Ujekob.' "
41012027	Ujeso a gye 'ushu de le: "Unim ù yi Unim bendi bewum, u shi Unim bendi abe bendi be de le be hwō, ukpor bè yi bewum he ashi ama a. Ugim ūmen ù yi dell-dell ye."
41012028	Ukaandi ken angwu u hwua bendi Iten a be gyo ashi be kong. A gyo le Ujeso a fan Isadusis ngbebb-ngbebb. A hà kung bii Ujeso le uten angwu yang a dyam hwò puu?
41012029	Ujeso a de-e le: "Uten anwun na a dyam hwò puu: 'Bendi Izwell, mà gyo. Atyetyan Unim ufe-ufe na ù kee-kee yi Atyetyan.
41012030	Kì nyin-a lè Atia Unim lè lityam ligang puu, lè 'ūnyōng 'ugang puu, lè ugim ugang puu, lè ikeb igang puu.'
41012031	Uten anwun na a pwom lè he: 'Kì nyin-a lè unde-gang ná 'i nyin-a lè 'uhwo-gang.' Kì yi lè uten angwu a dyam hwò angi ifee i ye."
41012032	Ukaandi angwu u hwua bendi Iten a kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, wo kong ngbebb-ngbebb. Wo kong 'igyang a le Atyetyan ufe-ufe na ù yi Unim. Kì yi lè Unim ususo pel ha ahe ye.
41012033	Kì yi le 'ì nyin undi lè Unim lè lityam lima puu, lè ugim uma puu, lè ikeb ima puu; ki nyin he lè unde-ma ná 'i nyin he lè 'uhwo-ma. Ki ngbebb le undi ù ndor iten angi ifee i, hwò ashi le ù be lè 'itaa 'iwom 'iyang-yang be ting shi 'inde ke Unim, u shang he."
41012034	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a gyo le a fan he dell-dell, Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Ki teng zangg ha-a à fel he liwu bendi abe Unim ù yi Usu ubell." Kung lè he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi be maa fel shell ná be mbee bii he bibibi.
41012035	Nya a na Ujeso a maa hwua bendi biwom he Ushom Unim, a bii abe le: "Kibang 'i tan lè shi bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten, be de le Ukristi ù yi igia Udebid á?
41012036	Udebid ugyang a kong he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim le: 'Unim a de Atyagi le, "Be kwu ha ami 'ubwo lizen kpamm mi gbe tem bendi-linaa begang abee fe he itang." '
41012037	Udebid ugyang a ko Ukristi le Atyam. Ná 'ì nya shi ngwu Ukristi u tem fel igia ima?" Bendi gbamm abe be sho há be maa gyo Ujeso, ki nyin ābe he lityam.
41012038	He 'unyong ahwu a ma hwua ābe biwom, a de le: "Mà baa 'uhwo-men lè ha bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten. Ki nyin ābe le bè shī agbada, tan he 'ate hè bendi bè ko ābe le bekaandi.
41012039	Be kee bidem abe be ndor bekaandi bendi he ishom angi be kwu liwu or, he bipam or.
41012040	Be kpa bengye-uhwuu biwom za. Be kong ha Unim gba 'igbe hè bendi bè de le bè yi bendi benunung a. Be ba kpa 'ingie hwà bendi abe be teng puu."
41012041	Ujeso a ma yi kwu gwaa ha 'igbor ashi be fe únde he Ushom Unim. A nde ná bendi be be lè unde fe há. Bendi-ingbebb gbamm be fe únde há kyoo.
41012042	Ungye-uhwuu ken angwu a mbu likaa, a hà be lè ideli ifee fe há.
41012043	Ujeso a hà ko bendi-utung bema be he 'iteng ken, kung de be le: "Mî de men 'igyang le, ungye-uhwuu angwu ù yi likaa-likaa i, a ke hwò bendi abe be teng puu.
41012044	Bendi abe be teng be gia igia be ke, ukpor undi-likaa anwun a kung 'iwom ashi ù yi lè shi puu, be ke. Ù tem yi lè ashi u ndyebb lizi zi ye."
41013001	Nya a na Ujeso a maa ndo gbe lè há Ushom Unim, undi-utung uma ken a shi he ungwu le, "Kpash," u de-e le: "Ukaandi, nde akor angi be tye ushu anwun 'ikekaa! Nde ishom igyang 'ikekaa!"
41013002	Ujeso a de-e le: "Wo nde ishom ikaandi anyin a? Kì yi lè 'ukor nyin nyin ahwu 'u be ngyor pwom he 'ipi be pwom āhwu ye. A ba gyebb wa he itang puu."
41013003	Ujeso a ma yi kwu he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif, u nda àshì gya he Ushom Unim. He 'unyong 'umen ana Ipita lè Ujems lè Ujon lè Andru be lè nyia bii he 'iwom he 'undyell.
41013004	Be de-e le: "De li 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı be shi. Wo mbee de li 'iwom ashi 'ı be shi tyung li le 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı shi 'u fel."
41013005	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mà baa teng undi u lam amen.
41013006	Bendi gbamm be ba ba he lizen ligi, da le bè yi Ujeso Ukristi a, hè be bè fe bendi gbamm umbeb.
41013007	Ma ba gyo bekye abe kpee-kpee ha amen; ma gyo gbe lè bekye abe 'igbe-igbe. Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, mà shell ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le abin bì shi, ukpor umbee-likel igye anyin a wa fel ye.
41013008	Abong-abong a ba ndo ha bende; lishi-lishi li be ndo ha bende. Isun i ba kwuo mbee bipi; itung i be ndo bendi kangg. Abin puu bi ba kwa 'anwaa 'ingie nya a na ukpi-ikwu uzwaa a.
41013009	"Men mà baa 'uhwo-men, kunyong 'ingie 'ikaa-ikaa 'u ba lè há. Bendi be ba kwa amen la ka bekaandi hè be bè maa amen ushe. Be ba kpam amen ikwun he ishom angi be kwu liwu. He 'uhwo 'ugi be ba la ko amen ushe ha bekaandi lè besu hè men mà naa ushada ugi.
41013010	Kì yi kpe-kpe le bendi be ba bun 'isom 'inunung da bendi he abong puu mà ukpong igye i hà mbee.
41013011	He 'unyong ahwu be kwu amen gye lè men he 'ipi be maa ushe, mà waa ufung gbe lè ashi ma lè kong ye. Mà kong igie angi mı be ke men he 'unyong 'umen ana. Men na ma be kong ye, Ukatia Kunyong Unim a.
41013012	Bendi be fel ba kung bebwandabell ka le bè gwu; betyam bebwaa be be kung bebwaa-bell ke le bè gwu; bebwaa bè tem ba fa betyabell lè bendabell ye; be be kung ābe ke le bè gwu.
41013013	Bendi puu be ba tel amen he 'uhwo 'ugi. Ukpor undi angwu a be ngyor naa genn fe Unim lè wu he umbee-likel u ba kwa lè likpan 'unyong."
41013014	"Ti ma ba nda ukong ubibi angwu u nim lè abong. U ba kwa he 'ipi ashi hang a kwu ye. (Undi angwu u bo ashin, ù ngye likpe lima o.) He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi abe bè yi he 'ubong Ujudia bè buu gye he ikwell 'usi.
41013015	Undi angwu ù yi he ushom 'usi, ù tem ban 'unyong le u shul gya he afee ushom la kung biwom bima ye.
41013016	Undi angwu ù yi he utia, ù tem ban 'unyong gye he ushaale le u la kung 'ihwom 'ima ye.
41013017	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka bengingye azam lè abe bè yi lè bebwaa he abwo.
41013018	Mà kong ha Unim le 'iwom ashin 'ì be shi lè 'ifong a ye.
41013019	Kingie ashi bendi be be kpe há he 'unyong 'umen ana, ki ba dyam hwà 'ingie 'iyang-yang ashi undi a kpe, kung lè he 'unyong ahwu Unim a shi igye anyin. Kì tem ba kwa lè 'ingie 'isuso ná ye.
41013020	Unim a shi ugim ndor le u die lè ati amen ana gem he 'uhwo bendi bema abe a waa kung a. Ù die le ati 'ingie ana gem ye, hang undi ken or u ba kpan ye.
41013021	"Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana gbe undi uyang-yang u be de men le, 'Mà nde, Ukristi ù yi nyin,' ususo u de men le, 'Mà nde-e ù yi há ana,' mà bong ye.
41013022	Bendi gbamm abe be ko 'uhwo-bell le Ukristi lè abe be bè iman le be tya ugie 'isom Unim be ba sha bikwele-uhwo hè gbe 'ì yi ābe pie-pie hè be bè lam bendi abe Unim a waa kung.
41013023	Ukpor mà ngye ná mà kam 'uhwo-men. Mi-i de men biwom abin puu ndor he itang mà."
41013024	"Kung lè he liti angi bingie bimen ana bi mbee, libwee li ba gya 'ifufebb, kufell 'u tem be taa ye.
41013025	Ikpen i ba mbwa lè he 'usi ba he itang. Biwom puu abi bì yi he 'usi bi ba gie.
41013026	Bendi be ba nda-m mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba lè he 'usi lè ikeb ikaandi lè 'ikung-gbo.
41013027	Mi ba som idengell igi gya mbee igye puu la gbong bendi abe Unim a waa kung ba kpee he 'iteng ken."
41013028	"Kì yi lè 'iwom ashi mi kee le mi hwua amen he ityang gbe lè ùkwán angwu be ko le ufik! He 'unyong ahwu ibubu ima i ndo hwaa ashia, ma ngya le 'ifong 'i ndo shul.
41013029	Kitaa 'imen na he 'unyong ahwu ma be nde biwom bimen i bı shi, ma ngye le 'unyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye, mı be 'u fel he abwo.
41013030	Kigyang na mı de men i, biwom abin puu bi ba sha mà ukpong ugbe bendi abe bè yi he igye 'unyin i, u hà be hwō mbee.
41013031	Lifung-atabe lè igye bi ba mbee. Ukpor igie igi ife ì hà ndo mbee ye, i kwa ngyor igye kpamm."
41013032	"Kì yi lè undi angwu a ngye liti or, ngwu ù ngye 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı be shi ye. Idengell angi he lifung-atabe or, mi Unwaa or, li ngye ye. Atyagi ufe-ufe na a ngye liti limen ana.
41013033	Mà nde le ma kam 'uhwo-men, ma kwu lè 'akang le bwo ma ngye 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı be shi ye.
41013034	Ki ba kwa ná ungikye angwu a kam le u gya litan. A kung aki ke iboyi ima le undi-undi ù shi ama. A kung de undi angwu u kang ushaale le ù kwu lè 'akang.
41013035	Men mà kwu lè 'akang likorye ma ngye 'unyong ahwu mi ugyang ushaale, mı be be ye. Pisoye mi ba ba leekwulukwu a, pisoye lè 'ididyan 'usu a, pisoye he ashi liti a, pisoye leèti a.
41013036	Mà baa teng mi ba imbul-imbul nda amen ma sha ashi mi kee a ye.
41013037	Ashi mı de men i, mi de bendi puu a le mà kwu lè 'akang."
41014001	Ki teng ati afee hè be bè shi 'ipam ashi be ko le Kipam Agbele-gyong, ashi be shi zī ibred angi i mbwee ye. Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be maa kee 'ukwo ahwu be kwu Ujeso he 'undyell gwu.
41014002	Be de le bè shi āshi he 'unyong 'ipam ye, teng bendi be pel ha ahe ndo ha abe.
41014003	Ujeso a ma yi he Beteni he ushom Usaimun angwu akpaa a tang he. He 'unyong ahwu a maa zī lizi, ungingye ususo a be lè 'itityuo behwu abe be kaa 'ate kangg. Be kung ashia angi be ko le unad a, shi behwu bemen abe be nung nyin ana. Ungingye anwuna a ma kung 'itityuo 'imen ana bun 'ityung, kung behwu wu Ujeso he lishi.
41014004	Bendi besuso be ma fel he ingywo, be fel bii bende le 'ibang 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu u ban behwu abena 'itaa ana?
41014005	Hang be kung ābe ndyebb zi gbe gyong igaa ikwudi ikie kung ke bendi-likaa. Be shwan lè he.
41014006	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà tyang ungingye anwun. Kibang a, ma ben he? A shi 'iwom 'inunung a ke-m.
41014007	Bendi-likaa bè yi utung ha amen mbee 'unyong. He 'unyong ahwu ma kee, ma sha 'inunung ha abe. Ukpor mi-i ba kwa utung ha amen mbee 'unyong ye.
41014008	Ungingye anwun a shi ashi ù nya shi mbee. A shi ashin kam mi likwom a ndor iti-ishi.
41014009	Mî de men likong likaandi, he 'iteng 'iyang-yang mbee igye puu be be bun 'isom 'inunung, be ba kong gba lè 'inunung ashi a shi, hè bendi bè well gbe lè he."
41014010	Ujudas Isikariyot angwu a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung Ujeso, abe lihwo lè be befee, a lè hwaa lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim he-e ù ndyebb Ujeso zi ha abe.
41014011	Be fel lè igor he 'unyong ahwu be gyo ashi a de be. Be ke-e úkyébb le be ka he únde. Ujudas a maa fel kee 'ukwo ahwu u kwu Ujeso ke be.
41014012	He ukpi-ikwu liti 'ipam ashi be zī ibred angi i mbwee ye, be maa gwa inwaa itia angi Kipam Agbele-gyong. He liti limen ana bendi-utung Ujeso be bii he le, he hung a kee le bè kwu shi Kipam ashi Agbele-gyong?
41014013	Ujeso a ko bendi-utung bema, bendi befee, he-e ù som ābe. A de be le bè gye he lifung-ushu. Be ba nda ungikye ken angwu a so 'ishang umbwo.
41014014	Bè pwom he gye he ushaale angwu u gye. Bè lè de ugyang ushaale le, ukaandi a bii le ushom angwu hung nyin befe lè bendi-utung bema be be kwu shi Kipam Agbele-gyong?
41014015	Nyin u tyung ābe 'ipo ashi 'i dyam he ushom 'usi ashi be kam biwom ndor há. Bè shi lizi ndor há nyong ābe.
41014016	Be bo gye he lifung-ushu, lè nde biwom puu nya a na Ujeso a de be. Be shi lizi angi be zi he Kipam ashi Agbele-gyong.
41014017	Likwulukwu li gyebb. Ujeso a be lè bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee nya.
41014018	He 'unyong ahwu be maa zī lizi, Ujeso a de be le: "Mî de men likong likaandi, undi ken lè he liwu līmen a kam le u ndo ndyebb mi za. Undi umen ana u za lizi utung ha ami nyong 'ì yi i."
41014019	Be fel lè 'imbwee. Undi-undi u fel bii he le: "Kì nya yi-m mi â?"
41014020	A fan le: "Undi umen ù yi he i liwu līmen bendi lihwo lè be befee i. Ufe na u tib ibred ima he uhwee utung-utung ha ami.
41014021	Mi Unwaa Undigye ufe a, mi ba hwa ná be fee gbe lè mi he 'ushia Unim. Ukpor 'i ba kwa 'ibibi ka undi angwu a ndyebb mi zi. Bè hwan undi umen ana ye, hang 'ì yi deng."
41014022	Nya a na be maa zī lizi, Ujeso a kung ibred kwu he 'ubwo. A pee Unim. A kung ibred bun ibun ibun kung ke bendi-utung bema. A de be le: "Mà kpē. Ashin 'ì yi inyiahwo igi a."
41014023	A kung ugbaala 'utyuo kwu he 'ubwo, mbee pee Unim. A mbee kung ke be. Befe puu be kpe ngwo.
41014024	Ujeso a de le: "Ashin 'ì yi anung agi angi mi wu ke bendi gbamm, angi a tyung le Unim u ba sha ashi a kong ndor ha bendi abe be bong ha ami.
41014025	Mi da amen 'igyang a le mì tem ngwa udung agbe ukwan anwun ye kpamm la kwom he liti angi mı be lè ngwo angwu ufufe he 'unyong ahwu Unim u be fel Usu bendi puu."
41014026	Be hà gyam 'ugyam pee Unim. Be gbe gye he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif.
41014027	Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema bemen ana le: "Men puu ma ba paa he abwo tyang mi. Be ma fee he 'ushia Unim le, 'Unim u ba gwa ukang-itia; mà ìtiā i paa he abwo.'
41014028	Ukpor 'unyong ahwu mı be wum lè he lihwu, mi ba gya he Ugalili teng amen."
41014029	Ipita a fan he le: "Mà abe be teng puu bè buu tyang-a or, mi-i ba tyang-a ye."
41014030	Ujeso a de-e le: "Mî da-a 'igyang, kunyin 'ugyang i, mà ukpong nyin 'igia ukwuo 'i hà ko 'ugbe 'afee, wo swan 'ugbe 'akie le wo ngye-m ye."
41014031	Ipita a kung fan he zam le: "Mì hà ndo swan le mi ngya-a ye ye. Mà 'ì yi lè lihwu or, mi hwa utung ha awo." Bende-ma puu be kong 'itaa ken.
41014032	Be be he 'iteng ashi be ko le Ugesemani. Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le bè kwu nyin nyong he, he-e ù lè kong ha Unim.
41014033	A de Ipita lè Ujems lè Ujon le bè te utung ha ahe. Be bo. Ufung a ma waa he, u fel tyang 'ūnyōng ishu ken 'afee.
41014034	A kung de be le: "Kutor ahwu 'ù yi-m he lityam 'u dyam kpè ahwu le 'u gwa-m. Mà kwu nyin kang."
41014035	A mbee die te he 'ushu zangg, lè tim anung he itang keb akongale ha Unim le, gbe 'ì yi pie-pie he-e ù kpe 'ingie ashin ye.
41014036	A de le: "Ada, biwom puu bì yi-a pie-pie, kung 'ingie ashin lè ha ami. Kì shi ná mi-i kee a ye, ukpor 'ì shi ná wo-o kee a."
41014037	Ujeso a tem lè hwaa lè bendi-utung bema abe bekie. A nde be be mbwa 'unde. A kung bii Ipita le: "Usaimun, wo mbwa 'unde â? Wo kwa àshì nyong he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg or mbee ye a?"
41014038	A de be le: "Mà kwu lè 'akang, ma kong ha Unim teng ma mbwa he ugilale. Men mà yi lè 'igyor he ashele, ukpor ma baa lè ikeb."
41014039	A tem mbee lè kong ha Unim 'itaa ken.
41014040	A tem lè nde bendi-utung bema ana, be mbee tem fel he 'unde. Atong-shi abell a ma sho lè 'unde. Be tem ngye ashi bè de-e ye.
41014041	Ujeso a tem be 'ugbe ahwu lekie. A bii ābe le: "Mà so-i mbwa 'unde a? Ma mbu 'u kpè men. Kunyong 'u fel há mà. Mà nde, be kung i-mi Unwaa Undigye, ke bendi-biban.
41014042	Mà bo lì gye. Mà nde, angwu a ndyebb mi zi ha abe a fel i."
41014043	Nya a na Ujeso a maa so-i kong ashin, Ujudas angwu a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee a be. Bendi gbamm be be utung ha ahe lè lishwia lè ìkwán he abwo. Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong na be som ābe.
41014044	Undi angwu a ndyebb Ujeso zi ha abe, a ke be 'itaa lè há. A de be le: "Undi angwu nyin mı gaa he lè uko na ma kee. Mà kwu-e gye lè he. Mà kang he."
41014045	Ujudas a be bé gbe lè hwaa lè Ujeso. A ko he le "Ukaandi," u gaa he lè uko.
41014046	Be kung kwu Ujeso.
41014047	Undi ken angwu a ma yi naa há, a waa 'ashwia lè he 'ubor kpi shia ungikye ken 'utyung kell. (Ungikye umen be kpi shia he 'utyung ana a maa sha Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a aki.)
41014048	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Mì yi uzi a, ma be le ma kwu-m lè lishwia lè ìkwán he abwo à?
41014049	Mi maa kwa utung ha amen he Ushom Unim hwua bendi mbee ati, ukpor ma kwu-m ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le 'ì shi nya a na be ma fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti."
41014050	Bendi-utung bema puu be ma paa he abwo tyang he.
41014051	Ushomate ususo angwu a ma shī 'ihwom 'ifung 'ife-ife, a maa pwom Ujeso. Be maa kaa le be kwa he.
41014052	A hà buu gbe uten-ibong tyang 'ihwom fe be he abwo.
41014053	Bendi abena be kwu Ujeso gye lè he he ushom Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim. Bekaandi puu abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be ma yi sho há.
41014054	Ipita a maa fel tan pwom Ujeso lè he item 'igbe-igbe. A pwom he lè wu há he ushaale Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim ana. A ngyor kwu he 'udyan ushaale utung ha bendi abe be kang ushaale, u gwee 'inde.
41014055	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bìkēm ukoto puu, be kee bendi abe be naa ushada fe Ujeso le a shi 'iwom 'iban hè be bè gwu-e. Be nde 'iwom ye.
41014056	Be nde 'iwom ye likorye bendi gbamm be ma naa ushada iman a fe-e, ukpor biwom abi be kong bì yi igie ken ye.
41014057	Bendi besuso be bo 'inaa be uman fe Ujeso le:
41014058	"Li gyo he lè 'utyung 'utyan, a de le ufe u gyebb Ushom Unim angwu bendi be tye nyin; he ati akie u tya ususo angwu undi na a tye-e ye."
41014059	Mà na or, biwom abi befe or be maa kong bi ma yi igie ken ye.
41014060	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim, a bo 'inaa bii Ujeso le: "Àshī bendi aben be kong fa-a i, wò yi lè ashi wò fan ye a?"
41014061	Ujeso a kwu kpii. A fan he ye. Ukaandi umen ana a mbee bii he le: "Wò yi Ukristi, Unwaa Unim ifem â?"
41014062	Ujeso a fan le: "Mi a! Ma ba nda-m mi Unwaa Undigye, kwa he 'ubwo lizen Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu. Ma mbee ba nda-m he 'unyong ahwu mı tem be lè he lifung-atabe be he 'ibu."
41014063	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim ana a fel he ingywo shwia gie 'uhwo-ma aliga. U kong le: "Likong li mbee, li tem kee ushada ye.
41014064	Ma gyo 'ibibi ashi a kong. Men ma gim le ana?" Befe puu be de le a zī libi; a kpè agwele.
41014065	Bendi besuso be fel shwa akung wa Ujeso. Be kung 'ihwom bua he he ashi. Be tim he 'ishwia de-e le ù shob undi angwu a tim he. Bendi abe be kang 'ipi be keb he akpamale.
41014066	Ipita ù so kwu há he 'udyan ushaale. Unwaasul angwu u shi aki he ushaale Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim, a be u gba.
41014067	A nde Ipita u gwee 'inde, a naa nde-e kporr, kung kong le: "Wo or titi wo ma yi utung ha Ujeso angwu u be lè he Unazaret."
41014068	Ipita a swan le a ngye Ujeso ye. A ngye 'iwom ashi unwaasul ana u kong or ye. Ipita a bo lè há lè naa he ungwu likong naa-naa, kigia ukwuo 'i kung ko.
41014069	Unwaasul anwun a mbee nde Ipita. A kung de abe bè yi naa há le Ipita ù yi undi-utung Ujeso a.
41014070	Ipita a mbee swan. He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg bendi abe bè yi naa há, be mbee de Ipita le, kì shi ná ana ù yi undi-utung Ujeso a, likorye ufe or titi u ba lè he Ugalili a.
41014071	Ipita a kpam abwo he itang tam behwu le: "Unim a ngye le mi ngye angwu ma kong ana ye. Gbe mı bè uman a, Unim ù gwu-m."
41014072	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo 'igia ukwuo 'i kung ko 'ugbe ahwu lefee. Ipita a well le Ujeso a ma de-e le nyin u swan 'ugbe 'akie le a ngye-e ye, mà ukpong 'igia ukwuo 'i hà ko 'ugbe 'afee. Ipita a fel he 'ukye.
41015001	Ashi a taa leeti-leeti, bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be hwua bendi Iten lè bìkēm ukoto abi bi teng, be gbong hè be bè tim àshi nyin be shi. Be tim puu, be kung indi bua Ujeso he abwo gbe lè he lè ke Upalet. (Upalet a ma yi ukaandi Urom angwu u nde gbe lè ufam Ujudia a.)
41015002	Upalet a bii he le: "Wò yi usu Ijuus â?" Ujeso a fan he le: "Kitaa ashin na wo kong."
41015003	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim, be de le Ujeso a shi bibibi gbamm.
41015004	Upalet a mbee bii he le: "Gyo biwom abi be kong fa-a. Wò yi lè ashi wò fan ye a?"
41015005	Ujeso a mbee fan ye. Ki kwu Upalet he 'uhwo mbee bitetaa puu.
41015006	He 'unyong ahwu be shi Kipam Agbele-gyong, Upalet u shii tyang undi igaadye ken abwo angwu be waa le ù tyang he.
41015007	He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi abe be ban iten 'ubong, be gwu bendi, be tan lè 'akwa-ushu, be ma yi he igaadye. Ungikye ken angwu be ko le Ubarabas a ma yi he liwu libell há he igaadye.
41015008	Bendi gbamm be be hwaa lè Upalet de-e le ù fem undi ken tyang abwo nya a na u shaa shi.
41015009	Upalet a bii ābe le be kee le ù fem usu Ijuus a tyang abwo a?
41015010	A ma bii ābe ná likorye a ngye dangg le bekaandi abe be shang Unim be tel Ujeso itel. Kife na 'i tan lè shi be kwu-e be ke-e.
41015011	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim be tebb bendi le bè kong le Upalet ù fem Ubarabas hwan tyang abwo.
41015012	Upalet a mbee bii bendi abena le: "Kibang ma hà kee mi le mì shi undi angwu ma ko le Usu Ijuus?"
41015013	Befe puu be gaa kong le: "Maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa! Maa gwu-e!"
41015014	Upalet a bii ābe le 'ibang 'ibibi ashi a shi? Be mbee gaa kangg le: "Gwu-e agwele ufe-ufe-ufe."
41015015	Upalet a ma kee le u sha nyin bendi abena. A tyang Ubarabas abwo. A de ishogya le ì kpam Ujeso kangg, a hà kung he ke be le bè lè maa bee he 'ikpakpaa.
41015016	Ishogya imen ana i kpe Ujeso gye he 'udyan ushaale Upalet, lè ko ishogya likwu libell puu angi i teng.
41015017	Be kung aliga uwulu abwaa shī Ujeso ná usu. Be tim 'ishilishi ītōng shi-e he lishi.
41015018	Be fel nyan kong ha ahe le: "Usu Ijuus, kukwun 'ù kwa-a he 'uhwo!"
41015019	Be kpam he udong-si he lishi, be sho akung wu-e, be tim anung he itang fe-e.
41015020	Be nyan he puu, be hà waa he aliga uwulu abwaa tem lè ama agyang shi-e. Be hà ndo gbe lè he gye he 'ipi be lè maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa.
41015021	Be lè fel he 'ukwo, be kpee lè ungikye ken angwu be ko le Usaimun. U ba lè he libeb gya he ushaale. Ishogya i kwu-e he ikeb le ù so 'ikpakpaa ashi be lè maa Ujeso bee. (Usaimun umen i a maa ba lè he Usarin a. Ù yi ātyām Alezanda befe lè Urufus a.)
41015022	Be te lè Ujeso he 'iteng ashi be ko le Ugorgorta. (Ugorgorta ù yi 'igugo ashi be ko le 'iteng 'ikpukpo lishi.)
41015023	Nya na be kung ùsī angwu be ko le umuru, fe he 'utyuo ke Ujeso le ù ngwo. A swan le u ngwa ye.
41015024	Be kwu Ujeso maa bee he 'ikpakpaa, kung āshi beb he itang. Be kung inditen ima hwua ke bende gbe he isasa atyele.
41015025	He inde idyong-inde leèti na be ma maa Ujeso bee he 'ikpakpaa.
41015026	Be ma fee fe he 'usi 'ikpakpaa gbe lè 'iwom ashi be de le a shi le: "Anwun na ù yi Usu Ijuus."
41015027	Be ma maa bezi befee bee utung ha Ujeso há. Be maa angwu ken bee he lè he 'ubwo lizen, be maa angwell bee he lè he 'ubwo limbell. [
41015028	Ashin 'i shi nya a na be ma fee gbe lè he he 'ushia Unim leěti le be bo he he liwu bendi abe be bia iten.]
41015029	Bendi abe be maa gbe he 'ukwo nde Ujeso bee há he 'ikpakpaa, be bong he lishi kpeke-kpeke-kpeke, be kong bia he. Be de-e le: "Eng-heng, wo angwu wo de le wo gyebb Ushom Unim tem lè he tya he ati akie, kpe 'uhwo-gang tyang abwo shul lè he 'ikpakpaa be he itang."
41015031	Kitaa 'imen na bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten be maa fel nyan he. Be kong ha bende le: "U kpan bendi, ukpor u kpan 'uhwo-ma mbee ye.
41015032	Ufe angwu ù yi Ukristi, Usu Izwell, ù shul lè he 'ikpakpaa be he itang 'anaa-anaa i hè li lì nde, mà li bong ha ahe!" Bezi abe be ma maa bee há utung ha ahe or titi, be ma kong bia he.
41015033	He libwee 'udyan lishi, kifufebb 'i ma gye kpenn he 'ubong 'umen ana kpamm lè kwom he inde ikie lè ishu likwulukwu.
41015034	He inde ikie Ujeso a kùng kangg he igie ibell le: "Eli, Eli, lema sabaketani," ashi 'i ze le, "Unim ugi, Unim ugi, kibang 'i tan lè shi wo mor mi?"
41015035	Bendi besuso abe be ma yi naa há, abe be gyo he, be fel da le, u ko Ilaja a.
41015036	Undi ken a buu lè kūng 'udedell lè kib he 'imia 'utyuo, kung kil he úkwān lè ndaa tyua Ujeso he 'ikpungwu. A de le: "Mà lì kwu hè li lì nde le Ilaja u ba shul he lè há 'ikpakpaa ba he itang a?"
41015037	Ujeso a kùng kangg, hà hwō.
41015038	Kihwom 'ikaandi ashi be tye tang 'ipo he afee Ushom Unim, ki gie kung lè he 'usi be tang he itang.
41015039	Ukaandi ishogya angwu a ma yi naa, u nde gye há he 'ipi be maa Ujeso bee, a nde ná Ujeso a hwō. A hà de le: "Ungikye anwun ù yi Unwaa Unim a 'igyang."
41015040	Bengingye besuso be ma yi naa 'igbe-igbe, be nda gya há. Bè yi Usalomi lè Umeri Umadelen lè Umeri, ānām Ujosis befe lè Ujems angwu 'isun, lè abe be teng.
