41015041	Be maa tan utung ha Ujeso kpell he he 'unyong ahwu a ma yi he Ugalili, be gia pwom he gye he Ujeruselem.
41015042	Ungikye angwu be ko le Ujosef, u shi 'ubong Alimatia, a ma yi undi angwu be ke-e ife he liwu bikem ukoto. A maa ndor lishi he 'unyong ahwu Unim u fel Usu bendi puu. Leekwulukwu he liti angi be kam nyong liti uwell Ijuus, Ujosef umen ana a hà lè hwaa lè Upalet faale 'ushell, u tim he anung le ù kung likwom Ujeso ke-e.
41015044	Ki kwu Upalet he 'uhwo he 'unyong ahwu a gyo le Ujeso a hwō mà. A ko ukaandi ishogya bii he le Ujeso a nya hwō mà a?
41015045	Ukaandi ishogya ana a bong. Upalet a de Ujosef le ù lè kung likwom Ujeso.
41015046	Ujosef a ma ndyebb 'ihwom 'ifung ashi 'i ngbebb 'unung. A shul likwom Ujeso lè he 'ikpakpaa kung 'ihwom ana kung nii he te lè he lè ngi he likwun angi be ma tem he 'ukor. A mung 'ukor 'ukaandi lè shī há ungwu likwun.
41015047	Umeri Umadelen lè Umeri, anam Ujosis, be ma nde he 'ipi Ujosef a ngi Ujeso.
41016001	Liti uwell Ijuus li gbe. Umeri Umadelen lè Usalomi lè Umeri, anam Ujems, be ndyebb behwu le be la wa likwom Ujeso.
41016002	He ukpi-ikwu liti utyong Beke, he 'unyong ahwu libwee li ndo fem, be bo be gya há he likwun Ujeso.
41016003	Be fel bii bende lè 'ukwo le: "Ayang nyin ù mung li 'ukor lè he ungwu likwun?"
41016004	(Ku ma yi 'ukor ahwu 'u dyam kangg a.) Be kung àshì gye he 'ushu, be nde 'ukor 'u mung lè há ungwu likwun mà.
41016005	Be gbe gye he afee likwun lè nde ushomate a shī 'ihwom 'ifung kwu há he 'igie likwun ashi he 'ubwo lizen. Be ma fel he 'ushell kangg.
41016006	Ungikye anwuna a de be le: "Mà shell ye. Mi ngye le ma kee Ujeso angwu Unazaret angwu be ma maa bee he 'ikpakpaa a. Ù yi hen ye. A wum lè he lihwu mà. Mà nde he 'ipi be ma kie he.
41016007	Mà te lè ashin lè de Ipita lè bendi-utung bema abe be teng le, a gbe he Ugalili teng ābe. Há na be lè nde-e nya a na a ma de be."
41016008	Be buu fem lè há afee, be buu gbe lè há likwun, likorye biwom abin puu bi kwu ābe he 'uhwo, bi shi ābe 'ushell, be fel tung for-for. Be bun de undi ye, likorye be maa shell.
41016009	[He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma wum lè he lihwu, he ukpi-ikwu liti utyong Beke leèti-leèti, a ma kpi 'ikwu lè kpee ha Umeri Umadelen. (Umeri umen i na Ujeso a ma ndō ikeb ibibi idyong-ifee lè ha ahe.)
41016010	Bedim Ujeso be ma yi sho he 'iteng ken, besuso be mbwee, besuso be ki. Umeri umen i a lè de be le, Ujeso ù yi uwum, ufe-gyang a nde-e. Be gyo āshi, be ma bong ye.
41016012	He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, nyong ahwu bendi-utung Ujeso bendi befee be maa ndor àshì be gye he ushu, Ujeso a ma fem kpee ha abe nya he 'ukwo. Kunyong ahwun a ma fem he 'ukwo atyetye.
41016013	Be tem lè de bendi-utung bema abe be teng. Be mbee bong àshi befe or be kong ye.
41016014	He umbee-likel Ujeso a lè hwaa lè bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè undi ken he 'unyong ahwu be maa zī lizi. A ma ben ābe likorye bè yi lè abongale ye, be mbee bong àshi bendi abe be nde-e ù yi uwum be de be ye.
41016015	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mà gye mbee igye puu lè bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi puu.
41016016	Undi angwu a bong ha ami, ma kib he he umbwo, u kwa lè likpan 'unyong. Ukpor undi angwu a bong ha ami ye, hà a nim.
41016017	Bendi abe be bong ha ami, be ba kwa lè ikeb Unim angwu be shi biwom abi bı kwu he 'uhwo. Be ba ndō ikeb ibibi he lizen ligi. Be ba kong igie isuso angi be ngye ngi ye.
41016018	Gbe be kwu ùshiı he abwo, u sha ābe 'iwom ye, be ngwo 'iwom ashi 'ı do undi or, ki do ābe ye. Be kung abwo pwom bendi-angmam, be mbee."
41016019	He 'unyong ahwu Atyetyan Ujeso a kong ha bendi-utung bema puu, Unim a kpe-e gye lè he he lifung-atabe lè kwu he 'ubwo lizen 'uma.
41016020	Bendi-utung Ujeso be lè bun 'isom 'inunung mbee bipi puu. Atyetyan Ujeso a maa kpell ābe, sha aki utung ha abe, u shi biwom abi bı tyung bendi le 'isom ashi be bun 'ì yi 'igyang a.]
42001001	Utiafilus ugi: Wó-wo ngye le bendi gbamm be ma kaa hè be bè fee gbe lè biwom abi bi ma shi he liwu lityan, abi li bong le bi shi 'igyang-igyang.
42001002	Be fee abi bendi abe be ma nde biwom abin lè he ukpi-ikwu be de li. Bendi bemen i be ma bun gbe lè bi.
42001003	Ukaandi, le bwo mi sor 'ikwu biwom bimen i puu, mi gim le 'i ngbebb le mì fee da-a gbe lè bi kung lè há he ukpi-ikwu tyuo-tyuo-tyuo lè tang he umbee-likel.
42001004	Mi sha ashin ha-a à ngye dangg le biwom abi be hwua-a bì yi 'igyang.
42001005	He 'unyong ahwu Uherod a ma yi usu Ujudia, ki ma yi lè ungikye ususo angwu a maa shang Unim. Be maa ko he le Uzakaraya. A ma yi he 'ikwu-lihwan Abia ashi be maa shang Unim. Be maa ko ungye-ma le Alizabet. Ufe or titi a ma yi nya 'ikwu-lihwan Eron ashi 'ı shang Unim.
42001006	Puu abe befee be ma yi bendi benunung a he ashi Unim. Be maa ka iten Atyetyan Unim puu ife hè be bè shi faale uben.
42001007	Be ma yi lè unwaa ye, likorye Alizabet a ma ngyor 'ukwom. He 'unyong 'umen i befe lè Uzakaraya be ma kaa.
42001008	He liti ken Uzakaraya a maa sha aki ama he Ushom Unim ná undi angwu u shang Unim ù shi. Ki ma fel 'unyong 'uma a.
42001009	Be ma tye isasa a waa he ná be shaa shi. Be ma waa he le ù kung inyim ikwan ting shi a. A kung gbe gye he Ushom Unim.
42001010	Bendi abe lè he igye be maa kong ha Unim he 'unyong ahwu Uzakaraya a ma ting inyim ikwan shi 'inde.
42001011	Udengell Unim a be fem ha ahe há. A ma yi naa lè he 'igie 'ubwo lizen he 'iteng ashi be ting inyim ikwan shi 'inde ke Unim.
42001012	Uzakaraya a nde-e, a fel he 'ushell, u tung for-for-for.
42001013	Udengell umen i a kung de-e le: "Uzakaraya, shī shell ye. Wo kong ha Unim, a gyo-a. Alizabet, ungye-gang, u ba sha lizam hwan-a unwaa ungikye. Kì yi le wo ba kwa he lizen le Ujon.
42001014	Wo or, bendi or, ma ba gor kangg he 'unyong ahwu be bé hwan he.
42001015	U ba kwa undi ukaandi a he ashi Unim. U ba ngwa 'ingwungwo 'iyang-yang ashi 'ı bwom ye. U ba kwa lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim kung lè há he lifung anam a.
42001016	U ba sha bendi Izwell gbamm be tem item ba hwaa lè Unim Atyabell.
42001017	U ba tie Atyetyan Ujeso 'ushu ná undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim. U ba kwa lè ikeb lè 'ūnyōng Unim ná Ilaja a ma yi. U ba sha bebwaa lè betyabell 'i fel nyin ābe lè bende. U be shi bendi abe be kpo lishi be fel bendi benunung. He 'ukwo ahwun u ba kam bendi ndor Atyetyan."
42001018	Uzakaraya a kung bii udengell ana le: "Bel lè ungye-gi li kaa; kì ha ba sha ná he-m mì ngye le ashi wo kong 'ì yi 'igyang a?"
42001019	Udengell a kung de-e le: "Be ko mi le Ugebrell. Mi naa he ashi Unim mbee 'unyong. A som mi le mì be da-a 'isom 'inunung ashin.
42001020	Kisom ashi mı da-a i, ki ba sha he 'unyong ahwu Unim a ndor. Le bwo wo kpe 'isom 'imen i ye, wo ba kwom umbell kpamm la kwom he liti angi úkyébb angwu mi ka-a i a be shi 'igyang."
42001021	Bendi abe he igye be ma yi kwu, be nyong Uzakaraya nya he 'unyong 'umen ana. Be maa fel tyāng atan-lengi angwu a shi-e a kwu há afee 'i gbe 'igbe 'itaa ana.
42001022	He 'unyong ahwu a ma be he igye, a maa nem kong mbee ye. Be kung shob le Unim a tyung he 'iwom lè há he 'ipo. Le bwo a kwom umbell, a maa fel kong ha abe he abwo a.
42001023	Ati angi a shi aki he Ushom Unim a mbee, a tem gye he ushaale.
42001024	Ki kung zī ati zangg, ungye-ma Alizabet a kung fel lè lizam. A ma nem gye he igye ye afell adyong.
42001025	A kung de le: "Kitaa i na Atyagi Unim a shi 'inunung ha ami. A nde-m beshi le mì nem kwu lè ishwia he ashi bendi ye."
42001026	He 'unyong ahwu Alizabet a ma shi lizam ki fel afell adyong-ken, Unim a ma som udengell uma ken angwu be ko le Ugebrell gye he lishi angi be ko le Unazaret he 'ubong Ugalili.
42001027	A som he hwaa lè Umeri, unwaasul angwu a wa ngye ungikye ye. Ungikye ken angwu be ko le Ujosef a maa naǎ he. Ujosef ù yi lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Usu Udebid a.
42001028	Udengell ana a be hwaa lè Umeri de-e le: "Kukwun 'ù kwu ka-a. Atyetyan Unim ù yi utung ha awo. A ka-a 'ukwun 'ukaandi."
42001029	Nyong Umeri a gyo ashi udengell a de-e, ufung a waa he kangg. A ma tyāng àshi 'isom ashin 'i ze.
42001030	Udengell a ma de-e le: "Umeri, shī shell ye. Unim a shi inunung ha awo kangg.
42001031	Wo ba sha lizam hwan unwaa ungikye; kì yi le wò kwu-e lizen le Ujeso.
42001032	Unwaa umen ana u ba kwa undi ukaandi a. Be ba ko he le Unwaa Unim angwu a dyam hwò puu. Atyetyan Unim u ba kwá he usu ukaandi ná atiema, Udebid, a ma yi.
42001033	U ba kwa usu 'ikwu-lihwan Ujekob ngyor igye kpamm. Kusu 'uma 'u ba fa lishi ye."
42001034	Umeri a ma kung de udengell le: "Mi wa ngye ungikye ye. Ashin 'i nya kwa ná a?"
42001035	Udengell a ma fan he le: "Ukatia Kunyong Unim u ba ba hwaa lè wo. Ikeb Unim angwu a dyam hwò puu i ba kwa ha awo. He atan-lengi anwun, wo ba hwan unwaa angwu gelalala faale 'iban i; be ba ko he le Unwaa Unim.
42001036	Well gbe lè uhwan-gang, Alizabet, angwu be maa da le a ngyor 'ukwom. Mà na a kaa or, a shi lizam ki fel afell adyong-ken. U ba hwan unwaa ungikye.
42001037	Kì yi lè ashi 'i hwò Unim ye."
42001038	Umeri a ma de le: "Mì yi he 'ubwo Atyagi Unim a. Kì shi ke-m nya a na wo kong." Udengell a hà gbe ligye.
42001039	Nyong udengell a gbe-gbe, Umeri a kung bo lè akye he abee ndo he 'igie 'ubong Ujudia ashi 'ì yi bigugo-bigugo.
42001040	A lè wu há, a gye he ushom Uzakaraya lè kong lè Alizabet.
42001041	He 'unyong ahwu Alizabet a gyo Umeri u kong lè he, unwaa-ma a ma ti-e he lifung kpu. Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be hwaa lè Alizabet.
42001042	A hà kung kong he ikeb Unim fem he igye kangg le: "Kukwun 'ù yi-a he 'uhwo hwò bengingye puu! Ku shi ha unwaa angwu ù yi he 'utyor 'ugang.
42001043	Ki kwu-m he 'uhwo ná wo, anam Atyagi, na wo be kong lè mi.
42001044	Mi gyo-a gyo-gyo, unwaa a ti-m he lifung kpu lè igor."
42001045	Alizabet a mbee kong le: "Igor ì yi ka-a kangg likorye wo bong le 'isom ashi Atyetyan Unim a som hwaa lè wo 'i ba sha nya a na a som."
42001046	Umeri a kung de le: "Mi pee Unim he lityam ligi.
42001047	Mi shi lè igor he lityam ligi he 'uhwo Unim angwu ù yi Undi-likpan ugi.
42001048	A tyung benyin ha ami, unwaa-ma angwu mì yi he 'ukpo ye. Kung lè he 'unyong ahwun gye 'ushu bendi puu be fel da le mì yi undi 'ukwun a,
42001049	likorye Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu a shi biwom bikaandi ke-m. A kpè le lì dyam lizen lima.
42001050	Bendi puu abe be fe-e, u nda ābe beshi he ugbe uyang-yang kpamm.
42001051	Ufe a tyung ikeb ima he apebale liwu bendi idim lè igim ikaa-ikaa ibell.
42001052	Unim u shul besu lè he bidem 'usu bibell. U kung bendi abe bè yi he 'ukpo ye gye he 'usi.
42001053	U ka bendi-indee biwom binunung 'itaa be kee; u ndō bendi-ingbebb wu he igye abubwo.
42001054	A kpell bebwaa-ma Izwell nya a na a ma kong ndor ha betietyan.
42001055	U nda Ebraham lè igia ima beshi bel àshì he item ye. Beshi bema bemen i bè yi ngyor igye kpamm."
42001056	Umeri a kwu ha Alizabet lè wu le 'i ndo fel afell akie, a hà tem gye he ushu uma.
42001057	Kunyong 'u kung fel ahwu Alizabet u hwan; a kung unwaa ungikye hwan.
42001058	Bende-ma lè behwan-ma be gyo ná Unim a shi 'inunung ha ahe, be gor utung ha ahe.
42001059	Unwaa-ma, nyong a fel ati adyong-ikie, bendi be be le be ten he. Be de le bè kung he kwù átyám Uzakaraya.
42001060	Anam a swan, u de le bè kwu-e le Ujon hwan.
42001061	Be kung de-e le: "Uhwan-gang ken or a ze lizen anyina ye."
42001062	Be yor abwo bii ātyām unwaa le a kee le bè ko unwaa le ana?
42001063	A kung yor abwo de le bè ke-e 'ikpakpaa. Be ke-e, a kung fee fe há le bè ko he le Ujon. Befe puu, ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg.
42001064	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo umbell Uzakaraya a bor. A keb Unim apeeale.
42001065	Bende-ma puu be fel he 'ushell. Bendi puu he 'igie Ujudia 'imen ashi lè he 'usi 'igugo ana be fel kong gba lè ashi 'i shi.
42001066	Befe puu abe be ma gyo gbe lè biwom abi bi shi, be gim gbe lè bi, be bii le: "Unwaa umen i u ba kwa 'ibang 'itaa undi a?" Ki ma nung nwongg le ikeb Atyetyan Unim ì yi ha ahe.
42001067	Uzakaraya, ātyām Ujon, a ma yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim kangg; a ma kpe 'isom lè ha Unim kong gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim le:
42001068	"Mà lì pee Atyetyan angwu ù yi Unim Izwell. A be kpell bendi bema, u shi ābe be fel porr.
42001069	A ke li undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u kpan li. Angwu há ù yi igia Udebid angwu u fe Unim a.
42001070	Leěti a ma ke úkyébb kong gbe ha abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima le u kpan li lè ha bendi-linaa betyan, u mbee kpan li lè ha bendi puu abe be tel li.
42001072	A ma de le u nda betietyan beshi, u shi ashi a kong ndor le u ba sha ka bendi bema.
42001073	A ma ke atietyan Ebraham úkyébb, u tam le,
42001074	u ba kpan li lè ha bendi-linaa betyan hè li lì fe-e faale 'ushell,
42001075	li kwu bendi abe bè yi betaa-betaa, be shi benunung he ashi ama kpamm ngyor igye.
42001076	Unwaa-gi Ujon, Unim angwu a dyam hwò puu u ba ko-a awo le undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim. Wo na wo be tie 'ushu lè kam 'ukwo ndor Atyetyan.
42001077	Wo be de bendi abe u kam le be ba kwa lè likpan 'unyong angi lı tyung le Unim a tyang biban bibell ke be.
42001078	Unim utyan ù yi lè beshi, u shi lè benyin. U ba sha 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ı be lè likpan 'unyong 'i taa ha abel ná libwee lı fem lı taa.
42001079	Ú be shi 'ikung-gbo ashi lè he lifung-atabe 'i taa tyung bendi puu abe be shell lihwu hè 'î nong li le lì gbe he 'ukwo ahwu ikwun."
42001080	Unwaa ana a kaā he agwo lè 'ūnyōng. A ma yi he libeb kpamm lè kwom he liti angi a kpi aki ama ashele gboo he liwu bendi Izwell.
42002001	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana undi ken angwu be ko le Agostes a ma yi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom. A ma tye uten le bè fee azen bendi puu he ufam uma fe he 'ushia hè be bè bo ābe.
42002002	Kunyong 'umen ana na be ma kpi 'ikwu bo bendi, Ukwiriniyes u shi usu he 'ubong Usiria.
42002003	Bendi beyang-yang be ma bo gye he lishi libell hè be bè lè ke azen abell.
42002004	Ujosef a ma bo lè he Unazaret he 'ubong Ugalili, gye he lishi angi be ko le Betelehem he 'ubong Ujudia. He lishi limen ana na be ma hwan Udebid. Ujosef a ma gye há, le u la ka lizen lima, likorye a ma yi lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Udebid a.
42002005	Umeri angwu Ujosef a maa naa a ma te utung ha ahe. A ma yi lè lizam.
42002006	He 'unyong ahwu be ma yi há, ki ma fel 'unyong ahwu le Umeri u ndo hwan.
42002007	A ma hwan uhwaa unwaa-ma, a ma yi ungikye. A ma kung bihwom mbo shi-e lè kie he 'ipo bityuale. Kukwo 'u ma yi he afee he 'ipi bè kwu ye.
42002008	Ki ma yi lè bendi abe be kang ìtiā he 'ubong 'umen ana, be maa kang ìtiā ibell he afee libeb lè 'usu.
42002009	Udengell Unim a fem ha abe nya. Kikung-gbo Unim 'i taa kel-kel fe be nya. Be fel lè 'ushell 'igyang na afong.
42002010	Udengell a de be le bè kwu lè 'ushell ye. A be lè 'isom 'inunung ashi 'ı shi bendi beyang-yang be kwu lè igor.
42002011	Kusu ahwu 'unyin be hwan ābe Undi-likpan he lishi Udebid. Ù yi Atyetyan angwu Unim a waa som.
42002012	Ashin 'ì yi 'iwom ashi 'ı tyung ābe le ufe a. Be ba la nda unwaa ufufe. Be mbò bihwom shi-e kie he 'ipo bityuale.
42002013	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo idengell Unim i fem gbamm, be fe ipel ha udengell angwu a be lè 'isom ashina. I maa fel gyam agyam pee Unim le:
42002014	"Ipee ì kwu ke Unim angwu he lifung-atabe. Kukwun 'ù kwu ha bendigye abe be shi nyin he."
42002015	Idengell imen i i tem gbe ligye gye he lifung-atabe. Bekang-itia be de bende le bè gye he Betelehem lè nde ashi Unim a de be le 'ì shi.
42002016	Be bo nya 'ukwo-ukwo lè nde Umeri lè Ujosef há lè unwaa kie he 'ipo bityuale.
42002017	Bekang-itia ana be hà kung bun de be 'itaa ashi udengell Unim a de be gbe lè unwaa umen i.
42002018	Biwom abi bekang-itia be kong, bi kwu bendi puu abe be gyo ābi he 'uhwo.
42002019	Umeri a kwu abin puu fe he lityam, u shi ugim kangg gbe lè bi.
42002020	Bekang-itia be tem ligye. Be gyam agyam pee Unim he biwom puu abi be gyo lè abi be nde. Bi ma yi nya a na udengell a ma de be.
42002021	He ati adyong-ikie be hà ten unwaa umen i. Be kwù-é lizen le Ujeso. Lizen limen ana na udengell Unim a ma de le bè kwù-é mà ukpong be hà shi lizam lima.
42002022	Kunyong 'u ma fel le Ujosef befe lè Umeri bè shi ná Iten angi Unim a ma ke Umosis i kong hè be bè fel betaa-betaa. Be kung unwaa gye lè he he Ujeruselem le be la fa Unim he 'ubwo.
42002023	Be ma fee he 'ushia Iten Unim le: "Utie-ushu unwaa ungikye uyang-yang, bè ndor he ta-ta ke Atyetyan Unim."
42002024	Be te hè be bè mbee shang Unim ná Iten ima i kong le gbe be shang inwaa ukwuo abakpa ifee ye, bè shang lilulu lifee.
42002025	Ungikye ususo a ma yi he Ujeruselem. Be maa ko he le Usimiyen. A ma yi undi ununung a, u shell Unim. A maa ndor lishi le Unim u ba kpan bendi Izwell. Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ma yi ha ahe,
42002026	u shi-e u ngye dangg le u hwa ye kpamm u gbe nde Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Atyetyan Unim a ma kyebb ndor.
42002027	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a shi-e a bo gye he Ushom Unim. Há he 'unyong ahwu ātyām Ujeso befe lè anam be be lè he he Ushom Unim hè be bè kung he fe Unim he 'ubwo nya a na Iten i kong,
42002028	Usimiyen a kpe-e kwu he abwo, u pee Unim le:
42002029	"Atyagi, wo shi úkyébb ugang. Kanaa-anaa i tyang i-mi unwaa-gang, mì hwō lè 'ukwun.
42002030	Mi nde undi-likpan angwu wo som mà.
42002031	Wo kam likpan limen i ndor bendi puu.
42002032	Likpan limen i lì yi 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ı tyung bendi abe lè he abong asuso abe be ngye-a ye 'ukwo 'ugang, ki ke Izwell bendi begang ifem."
42002033	Ki ma kwu ātyām Ujeso befe lè anam he 'uhwo gbe lè biwom abi Usimiyen a kong gbe lè he.
42002034	Usimiyen a ke be 'ukwun. A hà de Umeri angwu ù yi ānām unwaa le: "Ngye le Unim a waa unwaa anwun le gbe a shi bendi gbamm he Izwell be nim inim ye, ù shi ābe bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong a. U ba kwa 'itaa a lè ha Unim ashi bendi gbamm be be kong ban.
42002035	Biwom bibibi abi be kong bi fem igim ibell angi he 'undyell be he igye. Ki ba nyam-a he lityam nweng-nweng-nweng."
42002036	Ki ma mbee yi lè ungingye ususo angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim. Be maa ko he le Ana. U shi unwaa Ufanuwell angwu he 'ikwu-lihwan Asha. A ma kashi fel aze asi ande lè ngi ande. A ma gye libee lè kwu aze adyong-ifee; ùkyēbb u kung hwō tyang he. A maa kwa he Ushom Unim a kpò hwà. Ishu or, kusu or, a maa fa Unim, u kong ha Unim lè itung andoale.
42002038	A be he Ushom Unim he 'unyong 'umen ana, u pee Unim. U fel kong gba lè unwaa umen i da bendi puu abe be ma ndor lishi le Unim u ba kpan bendi Ujeruselem.
42002039	He 'unyong ahwu Ujosef befe lè Umeri be mbee biwom puu abi Unim a kong he Iten ima, be tem gye he lishi libell, Unazaret, he 'ubong Ugalili.
42002040	Unwaa ana a ma kaā he agwo, u fel kang-kang. A ma bi lishi, u shi lè 'ukwun Unim.
42002041	Ātyām Ujeso befe lè anam be maa gya he Ujeruselem la sha Kipam Agbele-gyong he lishi lize liyang-yang.
42002042	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma fel aze lihwo lè ngi afee, be gye 'ipam nya a na be shaa shi.
42002043	Be mbee lè 'ipam puu, be tem ligye, bē gya he ushu, ukpor Ujeso a ngyor kwu há he Ujeruselem. Atyam lè anam be ngye ye.
42002044	Be maa kong le ù yi he liwu bendi. Be tan litan liti libo, be hà keb he ashunale ha behwan-bell lè bende-bell.
42002045	Be nde-e ye, be tem gye he Ujeruselem lè kee he. Be shun he ati afee.
42002046	He liti angi lekie be lè nde-e he Ushom Unim utung ha bekaandi Ijuus abe be hwua bendi Iten. A maa gyo ābe, ù yii bii ābe bibibi.
42002047	Bendi puu abe be gyo he, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo ná a ngye 'iwom, u fan ābe dell-dell-dell.
42002048	Ki kwu baà atyam he 'uhwo he 'unyong ahwu be nde-e. Anam a kung shi le, "Heng, unwaa-gi." U bii he le: "Ki shi ná a, wo shi li 'itaa i? Ufung a waa li, bel ha atia, lì yii tan kee-a."
42002049	A bii ābe le: "Má yii shun mi le ana á? Má ngye le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le mì kwu he Ushom Atyagi ye a?"
42002050	Ashi a kong 'i nung ābe ye.
42002051	Ujeso a bo gbe utung ha abe gye he Unazaret. A maa ka ābe ife mbee 'unyong. Anam a kpe biwom abi a kong puu fe he lityam.
42002052	Ujeso a kaā likaa lè lishi abyele. Ki maa ngbebb Unim or, bendigye or, lè he mbee 'unyong.
42003001	Ki ma fel aze lihwo lè ngi adyong ná Utaiberias a ma yi Usu ukaandi he Urom. Upontiyes Upalet a ma yi usu Ujudia; Uherod u shi usu Ugalili; ungwende Ufilip u shi usu he 'igie ashi Ituria lè Utrakonitis; Ulasanias u shi usu he Abilen.
42003002	Anas lè Ukayafas be shi bekaandi abe be shang Unim. Nyin he 'unyong 'umen i na Unim a ma kong ha Ujon, unwaa Uzakaraya, he afee libeb de-e le ù bun igie ima.
42003003	Ujon a ma hà lè tan mbee àshì angi gwaa ha umbwo Ujodan puu bun 'isom Unim le bendi bè bel àtyám lè he biban bibell hè-e ù kib ābe he umbwo, mà Unim u tyang biban bibell ka abe.
42003004	Ki shi nya a na Azaya, undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim, a ma fee ha ahe 'ushia. A fee le: "Undi u ba gaa lè he libeb le, 'Mà kam 'ukwo Atyetyan ndor he. Mà shi 'ukwo ahwu 'u ngbebb ndor he he-e ù be gbe.
42003005	Unim u ba shan bibebell, u dyell ikwell lè bigugo, u shi akwo angi a niam a fel sii. U shi akwo angi à yi akor-akor a fel tele-tele.
42003006	Bendigye puu be ba nda 'ukwo ahwu Unim u kpan bendi.' "
42003007	Bendi gbamm be ma be le Ujon ù kib ābe he umbwo. A bii ābe le: "Ayang a tebb amen abe mà yi ná ìshiı ibibi le mà buu hwaa lè he ingywo Unim angi i ndo be ukpor?
42003008	Mà shi biwom abi bı tyung le ma bel àtyám lè he biban bīmen. Mà fel tam pwom ungwu le bwo Ebraham ù yi atiemen a ye. Mà ngye le Unim u sha akor anyin a bel igia Ebraham mbee.
42003009	Lìkee li fel kwu nyong lî wob ìkwán lè idaa lè idaa a. Ukwan uyang-yang angwu a wum agbe anunung ye, be ba wob he fa he 'inde."
42003010	Bendi bemen i be bii he le: "Lì hà shi ná a?"
42003011	A kung fan ābe le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè aliga afee, ù waa ken ke undi angwu ù yi lè ngi ye; angwu ù yi lè lizi u zī ke bendi."
42003012	Bendi besuso abe be kpe ukpanda be be le ù kib ābe he umbwo, be bii he le: "Ukaandi, lì hà shi ná a?"
42003013	A de be le: "Mà nem kpe ukpanda lè ha bendi ù gbe gyong 'itaa uten a kong ye."
42003014	Ishogya isuso i bii he le: "Hà bel ufe, lì shi ná a?" A de be le: "Mà kwu kpe bendi únde he ikeb or, ngwu mà kpe he likpam or ye. Kì kwun amen 'igyor lè únde angwu be ke men he 'ufell."
42003015	Bendi be fel lè 'igyor abele Undi-likpan; be keb be fel gim gba lè Ujon le hà ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan a òr.
42003016	Ujon a kung de be le: "Undi angwu a dyam hwo-m u ba lè há. Mi kpee he he 'ubee ye. Mi-i kib amen he umbwo a; ufe u ba kib amen he Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu lè 'ìndē.
42003017	Men mà yi ná ityungkafa. Ufe ù yi lè 'udiya 'uma kwu he 'ubwo. U ba kpam ityungkafa, u puu kung igyang angyell fe he libel, ukpor u ba kung abia ting sha he 'inde ashi 'ı nim ye ngyor igye kpamm."
42003018	Ujon a maa bun 'isom 'inunung gba lè Ujeso da bendi, u bun āshi he akwo atyetye-atyetye hè 'ì nung ābe.
42003019	Ujon a maa kong ban Uherod angwu a ma yi usu, likorye a kpebb kung Uherodias angwu a ma yi ungye ungwende, u shi bibibi bisuso gbamm.
42003020	Ashi a ma hà mbee shi 'i fel ban hwò puu 'ì yi le a ma kwu Ujon fe he igaadye.
42003021	Ujon a ma kib bendi abe há he umbwo puu, Ujeso a hà be. A kib he ufe or. Nya a na a maa kong ha Unim, lifung-atabe li buu.
42003022	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a kung inyiahwo ná 'alulu be so-e he lishi. Be gyo lingmam lè he lifung-atabe le: "Wò yi 'iken Unwaa-gi a. Ki nyin mi lè wo 'indee-indee."
42003023	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma kpi aki ama ashele, a fel aze lisi lè ngi lihwo. Bendi be maa kong le Ujeso ù yi unwaa Ujosef, Ujosef u shi unwaa Uheli.
42003024	Uheli a ma yi unwaa Umatat, Umatat u shi unwaa Ulibai; Ulibai a ma yi unwaa Umelki, Umelki u shi unwaa Ujanayi; Ujanayi a ma yi unwaa Ujosef,
42003025	Ujosef u shi unwaa Umatatiyes; Umatatiyes a ma yi unwaa Amos, Amos u shi unwaa Unahum; Unahum a ma yi unwaa Ezeli, Ezeli u shi unwaa Unagayi;
42003026	Unagayi a ma yi unwaa Umaat, Umaat u shi unwaa Umatatiyes; Umatatiyes a ma yi unwaa Usemen, Usemen u shi unwaa Ujosek; Ujosek a ma yi unwaa Ujoda,
42003027	Ujoda u shi unwaa Ujohanan; Ujohanan a ma yi unwaa Uresa, Uresa u shi unwaa Uzerebabel; Uzerebabel a ma yi unwaa Ushiatell, Ushiatell u shi unwaa Uneri;
42003028	Uneri a ma yi unwaa Umelki, Umelki u shi unwaa Adi; Adi a ma yi unwaa Ukosam, Ukosam u shi unwaa Elmadam; Elmadam a ma yi unwaa Ar,
42003029	Ar u shi unwaa Ujoshua; Ujoshua a ma yi unwaa Eliyeza, Eliyeza u shi unwaa Ujorim; Ujorim a ma yi unwaa Umatat, Umatat u shi unwaa Ulibai;
42003030	Ulibai a ma yi unwaa Usimiyen, Usimiyen u shi unwaa Ujuda; Ujuda a ma yi unwaa Ujosef, Ujosef u shi unwaa Ujonam; Ujonam a ma yi unwaa Eliakim,
42003031	Eliakim u shi unwaa Umelia; Umelia a ma yi unwaa Umena, Umena u shi unwaa Umatata; Umatata a ma yi unwaa Unatan, Unatan u shi unwaa Udebid;
42003032	Udebid a ma yi unwaa Ujesi, Ujesi u shi unwaa Ubed; Ubed a ma yi unwaa Ubowaz, Ubowaz u shi unwaa Usalmon; Usalmon a ma yi unwaa Unashon,
42003033	Unashon u shi unwaa Aminadab; Aminadab a ma yi unwaa Adimin, Adimin u shi unwaa Ani; Ani a ma yi unwaa Uhezeron, Uhezeron u shi unwaa Uperez; Uperez a ma yi unwaa Ujuda,
42003034	Ujuda u shi unwaa Ujekob; Ujekob a ma yi unwaa Azik, Azik u shi unwaa Ebraham; Ebraham a ma yi unwaa Utera, Utera u shi unwaa Unahor;
42003035	Unahor a ma yi unwaa Usereg, Usereg u shi unwaa Uriyu; Uriyu a ma yi unwaa Upeleg, Upeleg u shi unwaa Iba; Iba a ma yi unwaa Ushila,
42003036	Ushila u shi unwaa Ukenan; Ukenan a ma yi unwaa Afakisad, Afakisad u shi unwaa Ushem; Ushem a ma yi unwaa Unuwa, Unuwa u shi unwaa Ulamek;
42003037	Ulamek a ma yi unwaa Umetusela, Umetusela u shi unwaa Inok; Inok a ma yi unwaa Ujared, Ujared u shi unwaa Umahalaliyell; Umahalaliyell a ma yi unwaa Ukenan,
42003038	Ukenan u shi unwaa Inos; Inos a ma yi unwaa Uset, Uset u shi unwaa Adam; Adam a ma yi unwaa Unim.
42004001	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ma yi ha Ujeso he 'unyong ahwu a ma fem lè he umbwo Ujodan. Ukatia Kunyong Unim ana a teng he gye he libeb.
42004002	Usu bibibi a ma gil he ati asi afee. Ujeso a ma zī lizi he 'unyong 'umen ana ye. Itung i maa fel ndo he.
42004003	Usu bibibi a de-e le: "Ndo shi 'ukor ahwun 'ù bel lizi ka-a ha-a à zi ā, gbé wo de le wò yi Unwaa Unim a."
42004004	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Be fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le undigye u kwa uwum gba he lizi life-life a ye."
42004005	Usu bibibi ana a teng he gye he 'ipi ashi 'ì yi he 'usi-usi lè tyung he abong igye puu he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg akikelilii.
42004006	U de-e le: "Mi ba ka-a ikeb abong anyin puu lè bingbebb bibell puu. Bì yi ha ami 'ubwo. Mi-i kung ābi ka undi uyang-yang angwu mi kee.
42004007	Gbe wo tim anung he itang fe-m, biwom abin puu bi ba fel bigang a."
42004008	Ujeso a de-e le: "Be fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le undigye ù fe Atyam Unim, ù ke-e ufe-ufe a ife."
42004009	Usu bibibi a hà teng he gye he Ujeruselem. A te lè he lè pwom he lishi 'uto 'usi he Ushom Unim, u de-e le: "Geb lè nyin gye he itang, gbé wo de le wò yi Unwaa Unim a,
42004010	likorye be fee fe he 'ushia Unim leěti le: 'Unim u ba da idengell ima le ì kpa-a tyang.'
42004011	Be mbee fee le i ba kwa undi he abwo ndor he 'usi he-e ù ti 'ubee or fe he 'ukor ye."
42004012	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Be fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le undi ù shī gil Atyam Unim ye."
42004013	Usu bibibi a gil Ujeso mbee akwo anyin puu, a tyang he ndor 'unyong 'ususo.
42004014	Ujeso a ma tem gye he Ugalili he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim. Bendi puu he 'ubong 'umen ana be ma gyo gbe lè he.
42004015	A ma hwua bendi Ijuus he ishom ibell angi be kwu liwu. Bendi puu be ma pee he.
42004016	Ujeso a kung gbe gye he lishi Unazaret he 'ipi a kwu kpè. He liti uwell a gye he ushom angwu be kwu liwu nya a na u shaa shi. A bo 'inaa he-e ù bo lè he 'ushia Unim.
42004017	Be kung 'ushia ahwu Azaya a ma fee ke Ujeso. A pell āhwu lè bo 'iteng ashi be ma fee le:
42004018	"Ukatia Kunyong Unim ù yi ha ami, likorye a ke-m ikeb le mì bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi-likaa. A som mi le mì be de bendi abe bè yi he lifee le be fel porr, mi mbee de bendi abe be hwuà ashi le bè fel nde. A som mi le mì kpan bendi lè ha bendi-linaa bebell,
42004019	mi mbee bun de bendi le 'unyong 'u fel ahwu Unim ù tyung inung ha bendi bema."
42004020	Ujeso a tem lè 'ushia ana kan kung ke undi angwu u shi aki há he ushom angwu be kwu liwu tem lè kwu ko. Bendi puu há he ushom be fel nda he kporr.
42004021	A keb akongale ha abe le: "Kiwom ashi 'imen be fee leěti nyin, ki shi 'unyin nya a na má yi gyo mi bo āshi."
42004022	Igie inunung angi a bun i kwu ābe befe puu he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel kong le ashi a kong ana 'ì yi 'igyang a. Be bii le unwaa Ujosef a ye a?
42004023	A kung de be le: "Mi ngye le ma kam le ma bun ityang angi le undi-usi ù mbee 'uhwo-ma da-m. Ma mbee de-m le biwom abi ma gyo le mi shi he Ukapanyam, mì shi ābi hen ha amen 'ubong."
42004024	A mbee de be le: "Mi da amen 'igyang a le bendi be kpa undi-isom Unim he 'ubong 'uma ye.
42004025	Mà ngye dangg ashi 'i ma shi he 'unyong ahwu Ilaja a maa bun 'isom Unim he 'unyong ahwu umbwo a maa nem ndor ye aze akie lè afell adyong-ken. He 'unyong 'umen ana ubwaa ukaandi a ma kwu 'ubong puu. Bengye-uhwuu be ma yi hen he Izwell gbamm,
42004026	ukpor Unim a ma som Ilaja hwaa lè ungye-uhwuu ken he Izwell a ye. A kee-kee som he hwaa lè ungye-uhwuu angwu he lishi Uzarefat angi he 'igie Usaidon a.
42004027	Ki mbee shi lè bendi gbamm abe be tang akpaa he Izwell he 'unyong ahwu Ilasha a maa bun 'isom Unim, ukpor undi ken or, akpaa ama a ma taa fem Uneman angwu a maa be lè he Usiria tyang ye."
42004028	Bendi abe be ma yi há he ushom angwu be kwu liwu be gyo ashin, be fel he ingywo kangg.
42004029	Be bo 'inaa ndeb lè Ujeso lè há he lifung-ushu lè pwom he lishi ukwell angwu be ndē hè be bè nyii he lè há tye gye he 'ibebell.
42004030	Ukpor a tan gbe há he liwu libell gbe gye he 'ipi 'i fong he.
42004031	Ujeso a hà shul gye he lishi Ugalili angi be ko le Ukapanyam. He liti uwell a gye he ushom angwu be kwu liwu lè hwua bendi.
42004032	Ki kwu bendi he 'uhwo 'itaa ashi a maa hwua ābe, likorye a kong ná undi angwu ikeb puu ì yi he 'ubwo 'uma a.
42004033	Ungikye ususo a ma yi há he ushom umen ana, ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe. A gaa kangg le:
42004034	"Aye, wo Ujeso angwu Unazaret, wo le lì sha-a ná a? Wo be nyin ha-a à gwu li igwu a? Mi ngya-a; wò yi Unwaa Unim, wò yi faale uben."
42004035	Ujeso a kung gaa fe ikeb ana le ì naa lè 'ihwee, i fem be he igye. Ikeb ana i shi ungikye ana a mbu kpam he itang nya he ashi abell, i fem be he igye, i do he ye.
42004036	Ki kwu bendi puu he 'uhwo. Be fel kong ha bende le igie anyin i kwu he 'uhwo dii. Ungikye anwun u kong ha ikeb ibibi lè ikeb le ì fem he igye. I fem.
42004037	Bendi gbamm he 'igie 'imen ana be maa fel kong gba lè Ujeso mbee bipi.
42004038	Ujeso a gbe lè há he ushom angwu be kwu liwu gye he ushu Usaimun. Ānām ungye Usaimun a ma yi gogo ye. Inyiahwo i maa shá he kangg. Be de Ujeso gbe lè he.
42004039	Ujeso a lè naa ha ahe ungwu agodo de lingmam ana le lì tyang he. A mbee. A kung bo nya 'ukwo-ukwo, u fel sha ābe 'ugaa.
42004040	Libwee li ngwee. Bendi puu há he Ukapanyam abe bendi bebell be maa mbu bitaa angmam atyetye-atyetye be be lè be hwaa lè Ujeso. A pwom ābe abwo puu, u mbee ābe.
42004041	Ikeb ibibi or titi i maa fem lè ha bendi gbamm. I gaa kong le: "Wò yi Unwaa Unim a." Ujeso a tye ngi uten le ì kong likong ye likorye i ngye le ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan a.
42004042	Ashi a taa, Ujeso a gbe lè há he lifung-ushu gye he 'ipi undi ù yi ye. Bendi be keb he ashunale. Be lè nde-e, be kaa hè be bè shi-e ù nem gbe tyang ābe ye.
42004043	Ukpor a fan ābe le: "Kì yi kpe-kpe le mì bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi he abong asuso or le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye, likorye kife na Unim a som mi le mì be shi."
42004044	A ma bun 'isom Unim de bendi he ishom angi be kwu liwu angi he Ujudia.
42005001	He liti ken Ujeso a ma yi naa he ungwu umbwo angwu be ko le Ugenesaret. Bendi be maa kin 'uhwo la hwaa lè he hè be bè gyo igie Unim.
42005002	A nde binong lishor bifee ndor he ungwu umbwo. Bendi abe be kwu ìkwǎn be tyang ābi ndor há gbe, be to litaa libell.
42005003	Ujeso a lè ngwee he 'inong ashi ken. Ki ma yi àshi Usaimun a. A de Usaimun le ù die lè 'inong lè he 'ibam gye he 'udyan umbwo. Ujeso a kwu lè há hwua bendi biwom.
42005004	A hwua puu, a hà de Usaimun le: "Die lè 'inong gye he 'indib umbwo hè men ha bende-gang mà kung litaa līmen tyang há kwu ikwan."
42005005	Usaimun a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, li kaa na na na lè 'usu kpamm taa ashi li kwu 'iwom ye. Ukpor gbe wo de le mì kung 'ataa tyang he umbwo, mà mi kung tyang."
42005006	Be kung litaa tyang gye há. Be kwu ikwan i fel go kangg le litaa li maa la tya gie.
42005007	Be kib abwo ko bende-bell abe lè he 'inong ashell le bè be kpell ābe. Be be kung ìkwǎn fe he binong. Binong a puu bifee bi ma sho lè ikwan. Ki ma teng zangg hè bi bì nim gye he liten.
42005008	Usaimun Ipita a nde ashi Ujeso a shi, a tim anung he itang de-e le: "Atyagi, die gye he item, likorye mì yi undi-iban a."
42005009	Ufe or, bendi-utung bema or, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo ná be kwu ikwan i go.
42005010	Bende-ma abe be maa ko le Ujems lè Ujon abe bè yi bebwaa Uzebedi, befe or, ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo. Ujeso a de Usaimun le: "Shī shell ye. Kung lè he 'unyong i gye 'ushu wo fel ba ba lè bendigye a ba ka-m."
42005011	Be die lè binong bibell lè ndor he ungwu umbwo; be tyang biwom bibell puu ndor há gbe utung ha Ujeso.
42005012	He liti ken Ujeso a gye he lishi lisuso he 'ipi undi angwu a ma yi akpaa-akpaa a ma yi. Undi-akpaa ana a nde Ujeso, a be tim anung he itang de-e le: "Ukaandi, ki nya nyin-a le wò mbee mi a?"
42005013	Ujeso a ndaa 'ubwo tyua he, de-e le: "Ki nyin mi. Kanaa-anaa i wo mbee." Akpaa ama a kung taa nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
42005014	Ujeso a kung uten tye-e le ù de undi áshi ye gbangg. A de-e le ù gbe ligbe-ligbe lè hwaa lè undi angwu u shang Unim he-e ù nde-e. Ù shang Unim ná Umosis a ma ke uten hè 'ì tyung bendi puu le a mbee.
42005015	Mà na Ujeso a de-e le ù de undi ye or, bendi be fel gyo gbe lè Ujeso gbe gyong. Bendi gbamm be be hwaa lè he hè be bè gyo he, u mbee ābe angmam.
42005016	Ukpor a maa gba tyang ābe gya he 'ipi undi ù yi ye, la kong ha Unim.
42005017	He liti ken Ujeso a maa hwua bendi. Iferesis isuso lè bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten abe be be lè he ashi Ugalili puu lè ashi Ujudia puu lè abe be be lè he Ujeruselem be ma yi kwu há. Ikeb Atyetyan Unim i ma yi utung ha ahe le u mbee bendi-angmam.
42005018	Bendi besuso be be lè uhwo-abee he 'ataa le be ba hwaa lè he. Be kee 'ukwo hè be bè gbe lè he lè hwaa lè Ujeso he afee ushom.
42005019	Be nde 'ukwo ye, likorye bendi be sho há gbamm. Be kung mbo lè he gye he 'uto 'usi lè shi libwo há he 'uto, hà kúng he he 'ataa 'ama gbe lè he lè kie Ujeso he 'ushu he 'ipi ù yi kwu há he 'udyan 'ubell.
42005020	Ujeso a nde le be bong le u mbee he. A kung de ungikye ana le: "Udim-gi, mi tyang biban bigang ka-a."
42005021	Bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten lè abe lè he likwu Iferesis abe bè yi há be keb akongale ha bende le: "Ayang ù yi ùnèmálē angwu u kong ban Unim 'itaa i? Kì yi lè undi angwu u tyang biban ke undi ye; Unim ufe-ufe a."
42005022	Ujeso a ma ngye igim ibell. A kung bii ābe le: "Ki shi ná a, ma gim 'itaa i?
42005023	Ashi le mì de-e le biban bima bi tyang ke-e na kì yi pie-pie hwò à, hà ashi le ù bo 'inaa ndo tan á?
42005024	Mi tyung amen puu le mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè ikeb he igye anyin le mi tyang biban ka bendi." A kung de uhwo-abee ana le ù bo 'inaa kung 'ataa 'ama ndo gye he ushu.
42005025	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo a bo 'inaa he ashi abell puu. A kung 'ataa 'ama ake á yi ndē gbe ligye, ù yi pee Unim.
42005026	Ki ma kwu bendi abena he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel he 'ushell. Be pee Unim, be de bende le be nde 'ikaa 'iwom 'unyin.
42005027	Ashin 'i shi puu, Ujeso a hà bo u gya, a nde undi angwu a maa kpe ukpanda. Lizen lima lì yi le Ulibai. A ma yi kwu he ufishi uma. Ujeso a de-e le ù pwom he.
42005028	A kung bo tyang biwom puu gbe utung ha ahe.
42005029	Ulibai a ma shi Ujeso 'ipam ha ahe ushom. Bendi gbamm abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi besuso abe be ma yi há, be za lizi utung ha abe.
42005030	Iferesis isuso lè bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten abe bè yi he likwu libell be kong ban bendi-utung Ujeso, be bii ābe le 'i shi ná a, be zi bizizi, be ngwo bingwungwo utung ha bendi abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi-biban?
42005031	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Bendi abe bè yi gogo na be kee undi-usi ye, bendi-angmam a.
42005032	Mi be le mî ko bendi benunung a ye, ukpor mi be le mî ko bendi-biban a hè be bè bel àtyám lè he biban."
42005033	Bendi besuso lè há likwu ana be de Ujeso le: "Bendi-utung Ujon lè abe Iferesis be kong ha Unim lè itung andoale mbee 'unyong, ukpor begang be za bizizi, be ngwo bingwungwo."
42005034	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Ma kong le ma sha begaandi abe be be he 'ipam libee bè kwu itung he 'unyong ahwu ukyebb ungye ù yi utung ha abe a? Dia!
42005035	Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu be be kwu kung ukyebb ungye gbe lè he lè ha abe, saa be hà ndo itung."
42005036	Ujeso a bun ityang de be le: "Kì yi lè undi angwu u gie aliga afufe kpi shī ligia aliga angi atim ye. Gbe a shi ná, hà a ban aliga angi afufe, kihwom ashi 'ifufe 'i keè ha ashi 'itim ye.
42005037	Ki shi lè undi angwu u kung 'utyuo ahwu 'ù so-i tim fe he 'ito ukwob inyia angwu u ndo kaa ye. Gbe a shi ná, hà 'utyuo 'u tya paa ukwob inyia wa he itang, kutyuo lingyor, kito ukwob inyia lingyor.
42005038	Kì yi le bè kung 'utyuo ahwu 'u tim fe he 'ito ukwob inyia angwu ù so ufufe.
42005039	Kì yi lè undi angwu, gbe a ngwo 'utyuo ahwu 'u bi he ungwu, u mbee kee 'ibwaa 'utyuo ye. U da le 'utyuo ahwu 'u bi he ungwu 'u ngbèbb hwò 'ibwaa 'utyuo."
42006001	Ujeso a maa tan gba he utia lè bendi-utung bema he liti uwell Ijuus. Bendi-utung bema be tang biwom abi bì yi ìtǒng ná abung gbel ābi he abwo keb azēle.
42006002	Iferesis isuso i bii ābe le: "Ki shi ná a, ma shi 'iwom he liti uwell ashi Iten ityan i de le lì shi ye?"
42006003	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Ma wa bo gbe lè 'iwom ashi Usu Udebid a ma shi he 'unyong ahwu itung i maa ndo ābe, befe lè bendi-utung bema, ye a?
42006004	A ma gye he Ushom Unim. Ibred angi ì yi ta-ta ke Unim, a ma kung āngi zī teng ke bendi-utung bema. Ki shi le Iten ityan i bong le undi-iso ù zī āngi pel ha bendi abe be shang Unim ye."
42006005	A hà mbee de be le: "Mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi lè ikeb le mi da bendi ashi bè shi he liti uwell."
42006006	He liti uwell lisuso Ujeso a gye he ushom angwu be kwu liwu lè hwua bendi biwom. Ungikye ususo a ma yi há angwu a hwō 'ubwo lizen.
42006007	Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten lè bendi Iferesis abe be ma yi há be maa fel kang Ujeso hè be bè nde le u mbee undi nya he liti uwell a? Be ma kang he ná likorye be kee àshi be kwu 'ubwo kwu-e le a mbu he iten.
42006008	Ujeso a ngye igim ibell. A hà de ungikye umen angwu a hwō 'ubwo ana le ù bo gye he 'ushu. Ungikye ana a bo lè naa há.
42006009	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Iten ityan i bong le lì shi 'ibang a he liti uwell? I bong le lì ke undi ukpell à, hà lì do he ido? Lì kpan undi ikpan à, hà lì gwu-e igwu?"
42006010	A bel àshì shun ābe kel-kel. A hà de ungikye ana le ù ndaa 'ubwo 'uma. A ndaa āhwu, ku tem fel kang-kang ná 'u ma yi.
42006011	Be ma fel he ingywo kangg, be fel tim ha bende 'iwom ashi bè shi Ujeso.
42006012	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a mbo gye he ukwell lè kong ha Unim. A kwu há kong ha Unim kpamm ashi a gbe taa.
42006013	Ashi a taa, a ko bendi abe be maa pwom he lè waa kung bendi lihwo lè be befee le bè kwu utung ha ahe he-e ù som ābe. Aben na a ma waa:
42006014	Usaimun angwu a kwù le Ipita, lè ungwende, Andru, lè Ujems lè Ujon lè Ufilip lè Ubatilomi,
42006015	lè Umatyuo lè Utormas lè Ujems angwu ù yi unwaa Alfiyes lè Usaimun angwu ù yi he liwu Ijuus angi li kee le be kwa lè 'uhwo-bell,
42006016	lè Ujudas angwu ù yi unwaa Ujems lè Ujudas Isikariyot. (Ujudas Isikariyot na a fel undi ubibi angwu a ndyebb Ujeso zi ha bendi-linaa bema.)
42006017	Ujeso a be lè bebwaa-isom bema lè he ukwell, a be naa he udidyang 'ipi. Bendi gbamm abe be maa pwom he lè abe be be lè he Ujudia puu lè Ujeruselem lè bipi abi be ko le Utaya lè Usaidon abi bì yi gwaa ha umbwo ukaandi be ma yi há.
42006018	Be ma be le hè be bè gyo he, u mbee ābe. Bendi abe ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha abe or be ma be hwaa lè he le ù mbee ābe.
42006019	Bendi puu be maa kaa hè be bè tyua he abwo likorye ikeb i maa ba lè ha ahe mbee ābe puu.
42006020	Ujeso a bel àshì nde bendi-utung bema, u de be le: "Men bendi-likaa, igor ì yi ke men le bwo men mà yi lè abwo he Kusu Unim a.
42006021	Men abe itung ı ndo amen 'anaa-anaa i, igor ì yi ke men le bwo ma be gwul. Men abe ma ki 'anaa-anaa nyin, igor ì yi ke men le bwo ma be yal gor.
42006022	He 'unyong ahwu bendi be tel amen, be mor amen, be buu amen atye, be kong 'ibibi gbe lè men likorye mà yi ke-m mi Unwaa Undigye, hà igor ì yi imen.
42006023	Mà kwu lè igor he 'unyong ahwu abin puu bı shi fe men, mà yal gor likorye 'uke 'ukaandi 'ù yi ndor amen he lifung-atabe. Kitaa ashin na betiebell be maa teb lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim.
42006024	"Ukpor 'i ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma mbu 'ingbebb 'anaa-anaa nyin likorye ma gor igor īmen i mbee.
42006025	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma gwul 'anaa-anaa nyin likorye lè he 'ushu itung i ba ndo amen. Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen abe ma gor igor 'anaa-anaa nyin likorye ma ba kya, ma fe akpen.
42006026	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen he 'unyong ahwu bendi puu be kong 'inunung gbe lè men. Bendi abe be maa tye ugie uman gbe lè Unim or, betiebell be maa kong 'inunung gbe lè be."
42006027	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Mi da amen abe ma dang 'utyung gyo mi le 'ì nyin amen lè bendi-linaa bēmen; ma shi 'inunung ha bendi abe be tel amen.
42006028	Mà de Unim le ù ke bendi abe be buu amen atye 'ukwun; mà kong ha Unim ke bendi abe be teb lè men.
42006029	Gbe undi a kpam-a 'ubwo he 'unaa, bel àhwu ken ndor he he-e ù mbee kpam. Gbe undi a waa kpa-a aliga, tyang he ù waa kpe 'igem ikpukpaa or titi.
42006030	Gbe undi a nyong-a 'iwom, wo ke-e áshi. Gbe undi a kung-a 'iwom, de-e le ù tem lè shi ka-a ye.
42006031	Biwom puu abi wo kee le bendi bè shi ka-a, wò kung ābi shi ke be.
42006032	Gbe bendi abe 'ı nyin ābe lè wo befe-befe na 'ı nyin-a lè be, hà wo kpè le wo kpa 'ukwun ye. Bendi-biban or, ki nyin ābe lè bendi abe 'i nyin ābe lè be.
42006033	Gbe bendi abe be shi 'inunung ha awo befe-befe na wo shi 'inunung ha abe, hà wo kpè le wo kpa 'ukwun ye. Bendi-biban or be sha ashina.
42006034	Gbe wo pwee bendi abe wo gim le be ba tem lè ashi be pwee-a ka-a á, hà wo kpè le wo kpa 'ukwun ye. Bendi-iban or be pwee bende biwom, be ndor lishi le be tem lè bi ka ābe ná be pwee.
42006035	Kì nyin amen lè bendi-linaa bēmen; ma shi 'inunung ha abe. Mà pwee ābe 'iwom lè lishi andorale le bè tem lè shi ke men ye, mà ma ba kpa 'uke 'ukaandi, ma kwu bebwaa Unim angwu a dyam hwò puu. Ufe u sha 'inunung ha bendi abe be pee he ye lè abe bebibi.
42006036	Mà kwu lè beshi ha bendi nya a na Atyamen Unim ù yi lè be."
42006037	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Mà maa undi ushe ye, mà Unim or u maa amen ushe ye. Mà ke undi libi ye, mà Unim or u ka amen libi ye. Mà tyang ke bendi, mà Unim or u tyang ka amen.
42006038	Mà ke bendi 'uke, mà Unim u ba ka amen. U ba keè 'iwom shwa lu-lu-lu ngyà abwo, u yiì āshi, u keè sho bwell-bwell-bwell bel fe men. Kigbor ashi ma keè ke undi na Unim u be keè ke men."
42006039	Ujeso a bun ityang de be le: "Uhwua-ashi u nya teng uhwua-ashi a? Dia! Gbe a shi ná, hà befe puu befee be mbwa fa he libell.
42006040	Unwaa ushukwul u dyam hwà undi angwu u hwua he ye. Gbe angwu a mbee lè ahwuale puu, u fel ná undi angwu u hwua he.
42006041	"Ki shi ná a, wo nde 'anwaa 'ibia ake 'à yi unde-gang he utong-shi, ki gbee-a gbe lè ubim ukwan angwu ù yi kie he ugang utong-shi ye?
42006042	Ná wò nya de unde-gang le, 'Ndor, mi-ì fem-a 'anwaa 'ibia lè he utong-shi,' ukpor wo nde ubim ukwan angwu ù yi kie he ugang utong-shi ye? Wo undi-ilam, wo-ò fem ubim ukwan lè ha awo utong-shi, mà wo nda nwongg fem unde-gang 'anwaa 'ibia lè he utong-shi."
42006043	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Ùkwán ununung u wum agbe abibi ye, ukwan ubibi ù wum agbe anunung ye.
42006044	Be ngya ùkwán uyang-yang gba he agbe angi u wum a. Wò hà ndo bung agbe 'ushu lè he ītōng, ngwu wò bung ilyom lè he ītōng ye.
42006045	Undi ununung u ba lè 'inunung lè ha ahe lityam angi li sho lè biwom binunung; undi ubibi u be lè 'ibibi lè ha ahe lityam angi li sho lè biwom bibibi. Ungwu undi u kong 'iwom ashi 'i sho ha ahe lityam a."
42006046	Ujeso a bii le: "Kibang a, ma ko mi le Atyamen, ukpor ashi mi de men le mà shi, ma shi āshi ye?"
42006047	U de be le: "Mí-ì tyung amen 'itaa undi u kwu, gbe a be hwaa lè mi, u dang 'utyung gyo igie igi, u shi āngi.
42006048	Ù yi ná ungikye angwu a tye ushom angwu a tem libell gye he liten lè kpee ha 'ukor, u hà tye lìshií ushom pwom há. Umbwo a ndor kangg sho lè wu há he 'ipi ushom ù yi. A ma gyebb he ye, likorye ungikye ana a tye-e ngbebb-ngbebb.
42006049	Ukpor undi angwu a gyo igie igi shi āngi ye, ù yi ná undi angwu a tye ushom faale lìshií atyele. He 'unyong ahwu umbwo a sho be kib ushom anwun, a gyebb shī he itang kpemm. Agyebbale ushom anwun a ma ban kangg."
42007001	Ujeso a kong biwom abin de bendi puu, a hà gye he Ukapanyam.
42007002	Ukaandi ishogya ususo angwu a maa be lè he Urom a ma yi há. Uboyi uma angwu 'i nyin he lè he kangg a ma ngmam teng he lihwu-lihwu.
42007003	Ukaandi umen ana a gyo gbe lè Ujeso. A som bekaandi Ijuus besuso le bè lè de-e le ù be mbee he uboyi.
42007004	Be be hwaa lè Ujeso, be tim he anung kangg, de-e le: "Ungikye anwun a kpè le wò kpell he.
42007005	Ki nyin he lè bendi betyan. Ufe-gyang a tye li ushom angwu lı kwu liwu."
42007006	Ujeso a kung bo utung ha abe. A lè fel kpee-kpee ha ahe ushom, ukaandi ana a som bedim-ma le bè lè de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, shi ban 'unyong 'ugang ye. Mi kpè angwu wo be ha ami ushu ye.
42007007	Mi nde 'uhwo-gi le mi kpè angwu mı naa-a he 'ushu ye. Wo-ò kong he ungwu ufe-ufe, mà uboyi ugi u mbee.
42007008	Mi or titi, mì yi he 'ubwo bekaandi ishogya abe bè yi-m lè he 'ushu, mi shi ishogya isuso lè he 'ushu. Mi da undi ken le ù gye há ana, u gya há. Mi da anwun le ù be nyin, u ba. Mi da uboyi ugi le ù shi 'iwom, u sha āshi."
42007009	Ujeso a gyo ashin, ki kwu-e he 'uhwo. A bel àshì nde liwu bendi abe bè yi utung ha ahe, a de be le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le mi wa nde undi lè abongale 'itaa i he Izwell or ngye ye."
42007010	Bendi-isom abena be tem gye he ushom úkaandi ana lè nde uboyi anwuna a mbee.
42007011	Ki gbe 'igbe ye, Ujeso a gye he 'iteng ashi be ko le Unen. Bendi gbamm be fel te utung ha ahe lè bendi-utung bema.
42007012	Nya a na a maa ndo wu he ungwu likong 'iteng 'imen ana, a kpee lè bendi be so likwom undi be la ngya. Ungikye umen angwu a ma hwō ana a ma kee-kee yi anam a unwaa nya ken a. Anam u shi ungye-uhwuu a. Bendi gbamm be ma yi utung ha ahe be lè há he lifung-ushu.
42007013	Nyong Atyetyan Ujeso a nde ungye-uhwuu ana, beshi be shi-e lè he kangg. A kung de-e le ù shī ki ye.
42007014	A hà gbe lè tyua 'akpa likwom 'ubwo. Bendi abe be so-e be kung naa. Ujeso a kung kong le: "Ushomate, bo 'inaa."
42007015	Ungikye umen angwu a hwō ana a bo 'inaa, u fel kong likong. Ujeso a tem lè he fe anam he 'ubwo.
42007016	Befe puu, ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo. Be pee Unim de le: "Undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim ugyang angwu ukaandi a fem ha abel liwu. Unim a be he-e ù kpell bendi bema."
42007017	Bendi be ma gyo gbe lè Ujeso mbee 'ubong Ujudia puu lè abong angi à yi nya kel-kel.
42007018	Bendi-utung Ujon be de-e gbe lè biwom bimen ana puu. Ujon a kung ko bendi-utung bema, bendi befee.
42007019	A som ābe le bè lè bii Atyetyan Ujeso le: "Wo na Ujon a maa de le wo ba à, hà lì ndor lishi undi-iso?"
42007020	Be lè nde Ujeso, be de-e le: "Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a som li le lì be bii-a le wo na a maa de le wo ba à, hà lì ndor lishi undi-iso?"
42007021	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a ma mbee bendi gbamm lè he angmam atyetye-atyetye, u ndō ikeb ibibi, u shi bihwua-ashi gbamm bi fel nde.
42007022	A fan bendi abe Ujon a som le: "Mà tem lè de-e biwom abi ma nde lè abi ma gyo. Mà de-e ná abe be hwuà ashi be fel nde, abe be hwō abee be fel tan, abe akpaa be taa, abe be kwom atyung be fel gyo, akwom a wum, bendi-likaa be gyo 'isom 'inunung.
42007023	Undi angwu u tyāng ityang gbe lè mi ye, ù yi undi igor."
42007024	Bendi abe Ujon a som be gbe ligye gbe-gbe, Ujeso a keb akongale gbe lè Ujon de bendi gbamm abe bè yi há le: "He 'unyong ahwu ma maa lè hwaa lè Ujon he afee libeb, ma maa ndor lishi le ma la nda 'ibang a há? Abia angi 'ufem 'u shi nii āngi â?
42007025	Hà ma maa ndor lishi le ma la nda 'ibang a? Ma maa la nda undi angwu a fe bihwom binunung â? Bendi abe be fe bihwom 'itaa ana, be mbu 'ingbebb, be nda he ishaale besu a.
42007026	Ma maa ndor lishi le ma la nda 'ibang á? Undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ye à?" A tem lè shi fan le: "Eng, ukpor ma ma nde undi angwu a dyam hwò angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim.
42007027	Ujon na be fee he 'ushia Unim gbe lè he leěti le, Unim a de le, 'Unwaa-isom ugi ù yi nyin. Mi som he ta-a lè he 'ushu he-e ù lè shi 'ukwo ndor-a.' "
42007028	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le Ujon ù yi he 'ukpo hwò bendigye puu. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a kpe Unim ná Usu uma, mà na undi umen ana ù yi he 'ukpo ye or, a fel he 'ukpo hwò Ujon."
42007029	Bendi abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi besuso gbamm be gyo he. Be ma bong le 'ukwo Unim 'ù yi 'ununung, Ujon u kib ābe he umbwo.
42007030	Iferesis lè bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten be mor 'iwom ashi Unim a ma kam ndor ābe. Be swan le Ujon ù kib ābe he umbwo ye.
42007031	Ujeso a mbee bii le: "Mì kung bendi abe ati anyin paa ha 'ibang a? Bè yi ná 'ibang a?"
42007032	A tem lè shi fan le: "Bè yi ná inwaabwan ı kwu he ushokwo 'ate. Likwu ken li gaa da abell le: 'Li kem libee fe men, ma ngyor ye; li ki lihwu, ma ki ye.'
42007033	Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a ma be kwu itung, u ngwo 'utyuo ye. Ma maa ko he le Ungyor-lityuo.
42007034	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi be, mi zī bizizi, mi ngwo bingwungwo, ukpor ma kong le, 'Mà nde ungikye anwun. Ù yi undi-ipuu, u ngwo betyuo kangg. A ngwee 'udim ha bendi abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi-iban.'
42007035	Bendi abe bè yi lè lishi abyele Unim, likpe libell li tyung le lishi abyele Unim lì yi 'igyang a."
42007036	Undi ken lè he likwu Iferesis a ko Ujeso lizi. Ujeso a gye ha ahe ushom lè kwu ko he-e ù zī lizi.
42007037	Ungingye akpela ususo a ma yi he lishi limen ana. A gyo le Ujeso u za lizi he ushom ungikye umen angwu ù yi he likwu Iferesis ana. A hà be lè 'itityuo behwu abe be nung nyin.
42007038	A be Ujeso lè he item, u die ngie abee ama keb akye akyele wu-e he abee; u bel lè igil ima shell he ángi, u fe-e angi ungwu, u kung behwu abena wu he he abee hè shi 'ì tyung ife.
42007039	Undi angwu a ma ko Ujeso lizi a nde ashi ungingye umen i a shi, a kung kong ha ahe lityam le: "Ungikye anwun ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a ye. Ù kwu ufe a, hang a ngye 'itaa undi ashi ungingye angwu u tyua he abwo ana ù yi, u ngye 'itaa u shi 'iban."
42007040	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Usaimun, mí-ì da-a or." Usaimun a bong.
42007041	Ujeso a hà kung de-e le: "Bendi befee be ma zī undi angwu u pwee bendi únde lihwua. Angwu ken a ma zi-e igaa ikwudi idyong; angwell u zi-e 'igem igaa ikwudi.
42007042	Puu abe, undi ken or, a ma yi lè únde le ù hà ndo hwee he ye. A tyang ke be le bè nem hwee he ye. Ayang angwu 'ì nya nyin he lè ungikye anwuna hwò?"
42007043	Usaimun a kung fan le: "Mi gim le angwu lihwua lima li dyam hwò a." Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Wo fan dell-dell."
42007044	A bel àshì nde angwu ungingye, u de Usaimun le: "Wo nda ungingye anwun a? Mi be ha awo ushom; wo ke-m umbwo le mì to abee ná 'ì yi ka-a le wò shi ye, ukpor ufe a wu akye ama to mi abee, u kung igil ima shell mi ángi.
42007045	Wo gaa mi lè uko hè 'ì tyung le wo kpe-m ye, ukpor gbé mi be na ufe a keb u fe abee agi ungwu 'ugbe ibwan-ibwan.
42007046	Wo wu mi behwu he lishi ye, ukpor ufe a wu mi behwu abe be kaa 'ate he abee.
42007047	Ngye le benyin bekaandi abe a tyung nyin be tyung le biban bima puu bi tyang ke-e. Undi angwu Unim a tyang 'iban zangg a ke-e, u tyung benyin zangg a."
42007048	Ujeso a kung de angwu ungingye ana le: "Mi tyang biban bigang ka-a."
42007049	Bendi abe bè yi kwu há be zī lizi utung ha ahe be keb akongale ha abe atyam le: "Ayang angwu u tyang biban or ke bendi i?"
42007050	Ujeso a kung de ungingye anwuna le a fel lè likpan 'unyong likorye a bong ha ahe. Ù ndo gye lè 'ukwun.
42008001	Nyong ashina 'i mbee, Ujeso a ma gye mbee bipi bun 'isom 'inunung le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye. Bendi-utung a puu lihwo lè be befee be maa tan utung ha ahe.
42008002	Bengingye abe a ma mbee ābe angmam lè abe a ma ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha abe be ma yi utung ha ahe te há. Bengingye aben na be ma te utung ha ahe: Umeri Umadelen angwu Ujeso a ma ndō ikeb ibibi idyong-ifee lè ha ahe,
42008003	lè Ujohana angwu ukyema, Ukuza, a ma yi ukaandi he ushom Uherod lè Usuzana lè bengingye besuso gbamm abe befe-gyang lè 'uhwo-bell be maa hwua igben Ujeso lè angi bendi-utung bema.
42008004	Bendi be be mbee bipi le be ba hwaa lè Ujeso. He 'unyong ahwu be ma gbong liwu, Ujeso a bun ityang de be le:
42008005	"Ungikye ken a ma gye ìtǒng bikwukwan awele. Nya a na a maa wu ìtǒng bikwukwan he utia, isuso i mbu wu he ubi-ukwo. Bendi be gbe tem āngi abee. Linyun li be kpi āngi mbell.
42008006	Isuso i mbu pwom he 'ukor he 'ipi itang ì yi gbungg ye. He 'unyong ahwu i mbi, i hwō likorye umbwo ù hwaa yi há he itang ye.
42008007	Isuso i mbu wu he 'ipi ikwu agasham ì yi. I mbi utung ha ikwu agasham. Agasham a mbell nim āngi.
42008008	Isuso i mbu wu he itang inunung. I mbi, i kaa shi ìtǒng asi adyong-dyong puu angi." Ujeso a hà kung kong fem he igye le angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo.
42008009	Bendi-utung Ujeso be bii he ashi ityang anyin i ze.
42008010	Ujeso a de be le: "Men na Unim a tyung amen 'undyell gbe lè Kusu 'uma. Mi bun biwom da bendi abe be teng he igye anyin gba he ityang hè be bè nde, kì nung ābe ye; be gyo, be ngye likpe lima ye."
42008011	"Ashin na 'ì yi likpe ityang anyin. Ìtǒng ì yi ná igie Unim.
42008012	Itong angi i mbu wu he ubi-ukwo ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo igie Unim gyo-gyo, usu bibibi u be kung āngi lè ha abe atyam hè be bè bong ye, teng be kwa lè likpan 'unyong.
42008013	Ìtǒng angi i mbu pwom he 'ukor ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo igie Unim kpe ngi lè igor. Ukpor i ngwee ha abe atyam ye. Be bong he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg á. Gbe ugilale a be, be tyang abongale.
42008014	Ìtǒng angi i mbu wu he 'ipi ikwu agasham ì yi, ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo igie Unim. Ukpor ufung awaale gbe lè biwom igye anyin lè bingbebb lè benyin igye anyin bi tim gwu āngi mà ukpong be hà kpè, nya a na 'ikwukwan ashi agbe ama a bi ye.
42008015	Ìtǒng angi i mbu wu he itang inunung ì yi ná bendi abe be gyo igie Unim kwu āngi fe he lityam linunung angi lı ke ife kaa kpè nya a na 'ikwukwan ashi 'ı wum agbe."
42008016	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Undi ù hà ndo gba 'imor-inde kung 'igbor shā āshi or, ngwu ù kung lè ndor he liten ibeedye or ye. U kung āshi la ndor he 'usi he 'udyan ushom hè bendi abe be be há afee hè be bè nde há.
42008017	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi he 'undyell, be ba ba lè shi he 'ugbo hè bendi bè nde shi, be gyo āshi.
42008018	Mà baa 'uhwo-men ná ma gyo 'igyo, likorye undi angwu u yi lè 'iwom, Unim u ba fa shwa he áshi; ukpor undi angwu ù yi lè 'iwom ye, ake a gim le ù yi lè ke or, Unim u ba kpa kung he áshi."
42008019	Bebwanam Ujeso lè anam be be le be ba hwaa lè he, ukpor bendi be sho gbe abe bè nde 'ukwo gbe lè hwaa lè he ye.
42008020	Undi-iso a de Ujeso le: "Anaa lè bebwanaa bè yi naa he igye, be kee-a."
42008021	Ujeso a kung de be befe puu le: "Bendi abe be gyo igie Unim, be ke ngi ife na bè yi andagi lè bebwandagi."
42008022	He liti ken Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be lè ngwee 'inong lishor. A de be le: "Mà lì gye he igbindi umbwo angwell." Be bo.
42008023	Nya a na be maa nde àshì te, Ujeso a lè ndē gbam gbe he 'unde. Kufem 'u keb apuale. Umbwo a maa fel tab fa he 'inong. Puu ubell be ma fel he begyong bebibi.
42008024	Bendi-utung Ujeso be lè wum he de-e le: "Ukaandi, ukaandi, li nim inim!" Ujeso a kung bo 'inaa kong ha 'ufem lè umbwo le bì kwun atyung. Bi kung kwun atyung shangg.
42008025	Ujeso a bii bendi-utung bema le: "He hung abongale ūmen ù yi?" Ki ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo, be fel shell. Be bii bende le: "Kibang 'itaa undi ashi ù yi? U kong ha 'ufem lè umbwo, bi ka he ife."
42008026	Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be gyong gye he igbindi umbwo Ugalili he 'ipi bendi Ugerasa be ndē.
42008027	Ujeso a fem lè he 'inong fem-fem kpee ha ungikye angwu a maa be lè he lifung-ushu, ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe. Ungikye umen i a maa tan uten-ibong 'i gbe 'igbe, u ndē he ushu ye. A maa nda he 'ipi akwun à yi a kpamm.
42008028	A nde Ujeso, a kung kùng kangg, u tim anung he itang kong ikaa-ikaa le: "Ujeso, Unwaa Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu, wo la sha-m ná a? Mi tim-a anung le wò ke-m 'ingie ye."
42008029	(Ungikye ana a ma kong ashin le bwo Ujeso a ma de ikeb ibibi le ì fem lè ha ahe a.) Ikeb ibibi ana i maa kwa he mbee 'unyong. Mà na be maa fe-e lifung he abee lè ashishilika he abwo hè be bè kang he or, a maa shwia tang āngi. Ikeb ibibi ana i sha he u geb tya he libeb.
42008030	Ujeso a bii he le be ko he le ana? A fan Ujeso le be ko he le 'ugii likorye ikeb ibibi gbamm ì yi ha ahe.
42008031	I tim Ujeso anung le, ù ndō āngi gye he libell angi li faa lè likel a ye.
42008032	Ikagbo gbamm i ma yi há he 'igugo kpee-kpee, i tan za. Ikeb ibibi ana i tim Ujeso anung le ù tyang āngi ì lè ngwee ikagbo anyina. A bong.
42008033	Ikeb ibibi anyina i fem lè ha ungikye anwuna lè ngwee ikagbo. Ikagbo ana i buu gbe lè mbu hwō fe he umbwo.
42008034	Bendi abe be maa kang ikagbo be nde ashi 'i shi, be buu gye he lifung-ushu lè ìtiá lè bun gbe lè shi de bendi.
42008035	Bendi be gye há le be la nda ashi 'i shi. Be be hwaa lè Ujeso, be nde ungikye umen angwu ikeb ibibi i ma fem lè ha ahe ana ù yi kwu gwaa ha Ujeso. A fel fe inditen, u shi lè ugim. Puu ubell be ma fel he 'ushell.
42008036	Bendi abe be ma yi nya nde ashi 'i shi be ma bun de bende-bell ná ungikye anwuna a mbee.
42008037	Le bwo befe puu be maa shell kangg, be de Ujeso le ù gbe lè há. Ujeso a lè ngwee he 'inong lishor he-e ù ndo gye.
42008038	Ungikye angwu ikeb ibibi i ma fem lè ha ahe ana a tim Ujeso anung le ù tyang he ù gye utung ha ahe. Ujeso a swan, u de-e le:
42008039	"Tem gye he ushaale lè de bendi ashi Unim a shi ka-a." Ungikye anwuna a bo lè tan mbee lishi anyina puu bun de bendi ashi Ujeso a shi ke-e.
42008040	Nyong Ujeso a lè wu he igbindi umbwo angwell, bendi be ma kpe-e igor-igor, likorye be ma yi kwu be nyóng he inyong.
42008041	Ungikye angwu be ko le Ujaares a be lè hell. A ma yi ukaandi a he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu. A be tim anung he itang tim Ujeso anung le ù gye ha ahe ushaale,
42008042	likorye unwaa-ma ungingye nya ken u la hwa. Unwaa umen i ù yi aze lihwo lè ngi afee. Ujeso a gbe, u ndo há. Nya a na a maa te lè 'ukwo, bendi be maa kin 'ukwo tya nyii he indi hen indi hen.
42008043	Ungingye ususo a ma yi há he liwu angwu a ma wu anung kpamm lè wu he aze lihwo lè ngi afee. A ban únde uma puu ke bendi-usi, ukpor undi ken or, usi uma a ma nyin he ye.
42008044	Ungingye ana a tan tel Ujeso há he liwu bendi. A kung 'ubwo tyua he he ungwu aliga. Anung ama a tang nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
42008045	Ujeso a kung bii le: "Ayang a tyua mi abwo?" Undi-undi a de le ufe a ye. Ipita a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, bendi be sho fa-a kel-kel, bè yii nyii-a."
42008046	Ujeso a kung de le: "Undi a tyua mi 'ubwo, likorye mi ngye le ikeb í yi gbe lè ha ami."
42008047	Ungingye umen ana a nde le a tem ndyell āshi mbee ye, u fel tung for-for. A be tim anung he itang he 'ushu Ujeso. He ashi bendi puu, a de Ujeso atan-lengi angwu a tyua he abwo lè 'itaa ashi a mbee nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
42008048	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Unwaa-gi, abongale ugang a shi-a wo mbee. Gye lè 'ukwun."
42008049	Nya a na Ujeso a maa so-i kong ashin, undi a be lè he 'ipi ukaandi anwuna be de ukaandi umen ana le unwaa-ma a hwō. Ù tem fem Atyetyan 'ushun ye.
42008050	Ujeso a gyo ashi be kong, a de Ujaares le ù shī shell ye. Ù kee-kee fe lityam he ahe, mà unwaa-ma u mbee.
42008051	Be lè wu há he ushaale úkaandi umen i, Ujeso a bong le bendi bè te utung ha ahe he afee ushom yam-yam ye, a kee-kee bong le Ipita lè Ujon lè Ujems lè ātyām unwaa lè anam bè te.
42008052	Bendi puu abe be ma yi há be maa kya kung agelibe. Ujeso a de be le bè shī ki ye. Unwaa anwun a hwō ihwo ye, a mbu 'unde a.
42008053	Befe puu be maa fel gwee he likorye be ngye dangg le a hwō ihwo.
42008054	Ujeso a gye lè be he afee, a kung 'ubwo kwu-e he 'ubwo de-e le: "Unwaa-gi, bo 'inaa."
42008055	Unwaa ana a tem wum, nya 'ukwo-ukwo a kung bo 'inaa. Ujeso a tye be uten le bè ke unwaa umen ana lizi he-e ù zi.
42008056	Ki ma kwu átyám lè anam he 'uhwo kangg, ukpor Ujeso a de be le bè de undi ashi 'i shi ye.
42009001	Ujeso a ko bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee be he 'iteng ken. U ke be ikeb le bè ndō ikeb ibibi le ha bendi, be mbee bendi-angmam.
42009002	A hà som ābe le bè lè tan bun de bendi le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye, be mbeē bendi lè he angmam.
42009003	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà kwu 'iwom gye há ye. Mà kung utyuu or, ngwu mà faa ibam or, ngwu lizi or, ngwu únde or ye. Mà te lè aliga afee ye.
42009004	He 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi ma gye, mà kwu he ushu undi angwu a kpe men kpamm ma gbe gbe lè há he lishi limen ana.
42009005	He 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi ma te bendi be kpe men ye, mà gbe lè há he lishi limen ana shell 'umbulmbul lè ha amen abee wu he itang hè 'ì tyung ābe 'ibibi ashi be shi."
42009006	Be bo lè tan he lishi liyang-yang bun 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Ujeso, be mbee bendi.
42009007	Nyong Uherod, usu Ugalili, a gyo gbe lè biwom puu abi bi maa shi, a maa fel tyāng gba lè bi, likorye bendi besuso be ma de le Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo a tem wum lè he lihwu.
42009008	Besuso be de le Ilaja na a tem be. Besuso be de le undi angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim na a tem wum lè he lihwu.
42009009	Uherod a kung kong ha ahe lityam le: "Mi ma kong, be gwu Ujon tang lìshī. Ayang ù hà yi ungikye angwu mı gyo gbe lè he i?" U fel kee 'ukwo ahwu u nde Ujeso.
42009010	Bendi-utung Ujeso abe a ma som gye he igye be tem be de-e biwom puu abi be shi. A kpe be gye lè be he 'ipi ashi 'ì yi gwaa he lishi angi be ko le Besaida, befe-befe be lè kwu há.
42009011	Nyong bendi be gyo ashin, be ti kwuo pwom he. A kpe be, u bun de be le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye. U mbee àbe be ma yi gogo ye.
42009012	Libwee li ndo ngwee, bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee be be hwaa lè he de-e le ù de bendi le bè ndo gye he ishaale lè ìtiá angi ì yi kpee-kpee hè be bè kee lizi lè 'iteng ashi be ndē, likorye undi a ndē he 'iteng ashina ye.
42009013	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Men-agyang mà ke be ashi be zī." Be de-e le: "Lì kee-kee yi lè bíkém ibred bidyong lè ìkwǎn ifee a. Wo kee le lì lè ndyebb lizi be ke 'igegang liwu bendi ashin a?"
42009014	(Bengikye befe-befe be maa mbee asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe afee.) Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le bè de bendi bè be kwu ko he akwu-akwu. Likwu-likwu lì kwu bendi asi afee lè be lihwo.
42009015	Be kpe be kwu ko he akwu-akwu.
42009016	Ujeso a kung bíkém ibred bidyong lè ìkwǎn ifee ana kwu he 'ubwo, nde àshì gye he lifung-atabe, u pee Unim. A kung āngi bun ibun ibun ke bendi-utung bema le bè kpe ke bendi.
42009017	Befe puu be ma zī gwul. Bendi-utung Ujeso be kung gbong bigem abe be zī bi teng. Bi sho bitetel lihwo lè bi bifee.
42009018	He liti ken Ujeso a maa kong ha Unim ututeb. Bendi-utung bema be be hwaa lè he. A hà kung bii ābe le: "Bendi be kong le mì yi ayang a?"
42009019	Be fan he le: "Bendi besuso be da le wò yi Ujon angwu a maa kib bendi he umbwo a, besuso be de le wò yi Ilaja a, besuso be de le undi angwu leěti a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim na a tem wum lè he lihwu."
42009020	A kung bii ābe le: "Men ufe ma hà gim le mì yi ayang a?" Ipita a fan le: Wo-ò yi Ukristi a." (Ukristi na Unim a kyebb le u ba som ba he igye anyin le ù kwu Undi-likpan.)
42009021	Ujeso a tye be uten le bè de undi áshi ye.
42009022	A mbee de be le: "Kì yi kpe-kpe le mi Unwaa Undigye, mì be kpe 'ingie kangg, bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be be zob mi. Be ba gwa-m, ukpor mi ba tem wum lè he lihwu he liti angi lekie."
42009023	A hà kung de be befe puu le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le u pwom mi ù zob 'uhwo-ma. Ù bong lihwu kung 'ikpakpaa 'ima ashi be be maa he bee so, pwom mi mbee ati.
42009024	Undi angwu a kee le u kpan lishi lima, hà a nim lè 'uhwo-ma; undi angwu a bong lihwu he 'uhwo ahwu 'ugi na u be kwu lè likpan.
42009025	Kibang lifem angi lì yi ke undigye le ù kwu lè biwom puu he igye anyin, ukpor u nim 'ūnyōng 'uma?
42009026	Undi angwu ishwia ı shi-e lè mi lè igie igi na ishwia ı be shi-m mi Unwaa Undigye lè he he 'unyong ahwu mı be be lè ikeb ityan, bel lè Atyagi lè angi idengell ima.
42009027	Mi da amen 'igyang le, men besuso abe ma naa i ma ba hwa ye kpamm ma gbe nde Unim u fel Usu mbee bipi puu."
42009028	Ki zī ati mbee adyong-ikie ná Ujeso a kong ashin, a kpe Ipita lè Ujon lè Ujems gye lè be he ukwell le u la kong ha Unim.
42009029	Nya a na a maa kong ha Unim, kushu 'uma 'u gie. Bihwom bima bi fel bifung-bifung kpeladada. Bi fel tim he ashi ngyal-ngyal-ngyal.
42009030	Bendi befee be kung fem nya imbul-imbul be kong ha ahe. Be ma yi Umosis befe lè Ilaja a.
42009031	Be be lè ataale angwu lè he lifung-atabe, be kong ha Ujeso gbe lè 'itaa u ndo be shi ugim Unim gbe he ahwēle he Ujeruselem.
42009032	Ipita befe lè bende-ma be nim 'unde tebe, ukpor be wum nde ataale Ujeso lè bendi befee abe be ma yi utung ha ahe.
42009033	Nya a na bendi abena be maa ndo gbe tyang Ujeso, Ipita a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, kiteng ashin 'i ngbebb ashi lı ngyor kwu i. Tyang li lì kaa bebuu bekie, kugang ken, Umosis ken, Ilaja ken." (A ngye ashi a kong ana ye gbangg.)
42009034	Nya a na a maa so-i kong ashin, kibu 'i be lè he 'usi, be shī baa Ujeso kpemm. Baa Ipita be fel shell.
42009035	Be gyo lingmam Unim lè há he 'ibu ana le: "Anwun na ù yi Unwaa-gi angwu mi waa som. Mà dang 'utyung gyo he."
42009036	Be gyo lingmam puu, Ujeso a fel ututeb. He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi-utung Ujeso be fan gbe lè shi ye. Be de undi 'iwom ken or ashi be nde ye.
42009037	Ashi a taa, be shul lè há he ukwell. Bendi gbamm be be kpee lè Ujeso.
42009038	Ungikye ken lè há he liwu a kung gaa le: "Ukaandi, mi tim-a anung le wò nde unwaa-gi. Mì kee-kee yi lè ufe-ufe a!
42009039	Ikeb ibibi i kwa he, u gaa kangg. Ikeb ibibi ana i hà shi-e u mbu he itang fel tim gbel, u zi bihwu he ungwu. I do he gba 'igbe kangg, i shwie tyang he ye.
42009040	Mi tim bendi-utung begang anung le bè ndō ikeb imen i, ukpor be ndō āngi mbee ye."
42009041	Ujeso a kung fan le: "Men bendi-umbeb, mì kwu utung ha amen lè 'igbe ná a, ma hà fe lityam ha ami? Ma kee le mì ngib lityam lè men lè 'igbe ná a?" A hà kung de ungikye ana le ù be lè unwaa-ma hwaa lè he.
42009042	He 'unyong ahwu unwaa umen ana a maa nde àshì gye hwaa lè Ujeso, ikeb ana i shi-e a mbu he itang, u tim gbel. Ujeso a gaa fe ikeb ibibi ana le ì fem lè ha ahe, u mbee unwaa tem lè he ke atyam.
42009043	Ki ma kwu bendi abena puu he 'uhwo gbe lè ikeb ikaandi Unim. He 'unyong ahwu 'i maa so-i kwu ābe he 'uhwo gbe lè biwom puu abi Ujeso a maa shi, Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le,
42009044	bè naa lityam lè ashi u la de be i ye. Undi u ba kwu-e ufe Unwaa Undigye, fe bendigye he abwo.
42009045	Ashi a kong, ki nung ābe ye. Unim a ndyell āshi lè ha abe teng 'i nung ābe. Be maa shell ná bè bii he gbe lè shi.
42009046	Bendi-utung Ujeso be keb be kin 'ukaandi lè bende gbe lè undi angwu a dyam hwò he liwu libell.
42009047	Ujeso a ma ngye ashi be maa gim, a hà kpe unwani be naa ha ahe ufaa.
42009048	A kung de be le: "Undi angwu a kpe unwaa anwun he lizen ligi, hà a kpe i-mi a. Undi angwu a kpe-m, hà a kpe Ada angwu a som mi a. Undi angwu a zen hwò puu he liwu līmen na ù yi ukaandi."
42009049	Ujon a de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, lí yi ndè undi-iso u ndō ikeb ibibi he lizen ligang. Li swan le ù ndō āngi ye, likorye ù yi he liwu lityan a ye."
42009050	Ujeso a de be befe lè bendi-utung bema abe be teng le: "Mà swan he ye. Undi angwu ù yi linaa ha amen ye, ù yi ke men a."
42009051	He 'unyong ahwu 'i ma fel kpee-kpee le Ujeso u ndo gya he lifung-atabe, a shi ugim le hang a gye he Ujeruselem.
42009052	A som bebwaa-isom bema gbe 'ushu. Be gye he lishi 'ubong Usameria le be la kam biwom ndor he.
42009053	Ukpor bendi abe há be bong kpe-e ye, likorye be ngye dangg le u gya he Ujeruselem a.
42009054	Ujems lè Ujon abe bè yi bendi-utung Ujeso be gyo ashi 'i shi, be bii he le: "Ukaandi, wo kee le lì ko Unim he-e ù som 'ìndē lè he lifung-atabe be shī gwu ābe a?"
42009055	Ujeso a bel àshì nde be, u swan fe be he abwo.
42009056	Be kung gbe ndo he lishi lisuso.
42009057	Be gbe be gya lè 'ukwo. Ungikye ususo a be de Ujeso le: "Mi kee le mi pwom-a gya he 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi wo gye."
42009058	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Ífé ì yi lè abell angi ı ndē, linyun li shi lè agwu, ukpor mi Unwaa Undigye mì yi lè 'iteng ashi mı ndē gbam mbu 'unde ye."
42009059	A de undi-iso le ù pwom he. Angwu há a de-e le: "Ukaandi, ndor mi lè ngi atyagi mà ukpong."
42009060	Ujeso a fan he le: "Tyang akwom à ngi akwom abell. Wo-o gye lè bun de bendi le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye."
42009061	Angwu ken a de-e le: "Ukaandi, mi-i pwom-a, ukpor ndor mi lè de bendi begi le ishu ì so mà ukpong."
42009062	Ujeso a fan he le: "He aki ashele, undi uyang-yang angwu a kung 'igbor aki kwu he 'ubwo, u tem fel nde gye he item a gbungg, hà ù yi lè lifem ke Kusu Unim ye."
42010001	Ujeso a hà waa bendi asi akie lè bendi lihwo lè be befee. A som ābe gye he igye he befee he befee le bè lè bun gye he biteng abi ufe-gyang u ndo gye.
42010002	A de be le: "Agbudyu a go, ukpor bendi abe be fem be go ye. Mà kong ha ugyang ùtiá le ù som bendi aki gbamm hè be bè fem agbudyu.
42010003	Mà ndo te. Mi som amen le mà te lè kwu ná inwaa ítiā ı kwu he liwu inyia ibibi."
42010004	U mbee de be le: "Mà kung ibam unde or, ngwu ibam lizi or, ngwu ikwob abee or ye. Mà naa kong lè undi he 'ukwo ye.
42010005	Ushom uyang-yang angwu ma gye, mà kpi 'ikwu de bendi abe he ushom angwu há le: 'Unim ù ke men 'ukwun.'
42010006	Gbe undi angwu 'i ngbebb he lè 'ukwun ù yi há, kukwun 'umen i 'ù ngyor kwu nya. Ukpor gbe ná a ye, be tem kwu lè 'ukwun ye.
42010007	Mà kwu há he ushom umen angwu bendi be kpe men ana kpamm, mà zī lizi liyang-yang angi be ke men, likorye undi aki a kpè le u za he 'ingie 'ima. Mà tan zī lizi or, ngwu mà tan ndē mbee ishom ye, ma kwu he ushom ken.
42010008	Kubong 'uyang-yang ahwu ma gye, bendi be kpe men, mà zī lizi angi be ke men.
42010009	Mà mbeē bendi-angmam nya he 'ubong 'umen ana. Mà bun de bendi nya le baale be ndè ná Unim u fem Kusu 'uma he igye.
42010010	Ukpor 'ubong 'uyang-yang ahwu ma te, bendi be kpe men ye, mà gbe lè há gye he ushokwo, ma de be le,
42010011	'Mà 'umbulmbul lè ha 'ubong ahwu 'u bee amen he abee, ma shell āhwu wu ābe he itang hè 'ì tyung ushe ubibi ke be. Ukpor mà shi ābe bè ngye le bè yi lè libwo angi be nde ná Unim u shi biwom tyung ikeb Kusu 'uma.' "
42010012	Ujeso a kung de le: "Mà ngye le he Liti angi Unim u be tang bendi puu ushe, kingie 'ubong 'umen ana 'i ba dyam hwà ashi 'ubong Usodem."
42010013	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen, bendi abe he Ukorazin lè abe he Besaida. Mì shi bikwele-uhwo he Utaya lè Usaidon ná mi shi ha amen 'ubong nyin hang bendi abe há be kwu ko fe akpen, kwuo atyung kem wu 'uhwo-bell leěti hè 'ì tyung le be bel àtyám lè he biban bibell.
42010014	He atan-lengi anwun, he Liti angi Unim u be tang bendi puu ushe u ba nda Utaya lè Usaidon beshi hwà amen.
42010015	Men bendi Ukapanyam befe, ma kong le Unim u ba kung amen gya he 'usi-usi a? Dia! U ba keb amen gya há he itang gungg."
42010016	Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le: "Undi angwu a dang 'utyung gyo amen, hà a gyo i-mi a; undi angwu a swan amen, hà a swan i-mi a. Undi angwu a swan mi, hà a swan Ada angwu a som mi a."
42010017	Ki gbe 'igbe, bendi bemen asi akie lè be lihwo lè be befee ana be tem be lè igor. Be de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, ikeb ibibi or i ke li ife he 'unyong ahwu li ko lizen ligang."
42010018	Ujeso a de be le: "Mí yi ndè Usetan, usu bibibi, a mbu lè he lifung-atabe imbul-imbul ná 'indeb-nwaa 'ı ndeb nà.
42010019	Nde le 'i nung amen le mi ke men ikeb le mà tem ìshiı lè ìnòng abee, ma hwò Usetan, undi-linaa ūmen, ukpor 'iwom 'ì do amen ye gbangg?
42010020	Mà gor le bwo ikeb ibibi i ke men ife a ye, ukpor mà gor le bwo be fee azen āmen fe he 'ushia he lifung-atabe a."
42010021	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ma shi Ujeso a fel lè igor kangg. Ujeso a hà de le: "Atyagi angwu ù yi lè lifung-atabe lè igye, mi pee-a ná wo kung biwom abi wo ndyell lè ha bendi abe be bi lishi lè abe be ngye biwom tyung bendi abe be ngye 'iwom ye. Atyagi, ki ngbebb-a wo-gyang le wò shi ashin."
42010022	A hà de be le: "Atyagi a ke-m biwom puu. Kì yi lè undi angwu a ngye-m mi Unwaa-ma dangg fem Atyagi tyang ye; ki shi lè undi angwu a ngye Atyagi dangg fem i-mi Unwaa-ma, lè bendi abe mi kee le mi tyung ābe áhe tyang ye."
42010023	Ujeso a bel àshì nde bendi-utung bema, u nyia de be le: "Liti li ngbebb amen ná ma nde biwom abi ma nde i.
42010024	Mà ngye le bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim gbamm lè besu gbamm be maa kee le hang be nde abi ma nde i, be mbee gyo abi ma gyo i, ukpor be maa nda or, ngwu bè gyo or ye."
42010025	Undi ken angwu u hwua bendi Iten a bo be he 'ushu he-e ù kung Ujeso lè he 'usi gyo ashi u kong. A bii Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, mì shi ná a, mî kwu lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm?"
42010026	Ujeso a bii he le 'ibang be fee he 'ushia Iten Unim? Kibang a bo lè há?
42010027	Ungikye ana a kung fan le: "Be fee le, 'Kì nyin-a lè Atia Unim lè lityam ligang puu, lè 'ūnyōng 'ugang puu, lè ikeb igang puu, lè ugim ugang puu. Ki mbee nyin-a lè unde-gang ná 'i nyin-a lè 'uhwo-gang.' "
42010028	Ujeso a de-e le: "Wo fan 'ì yi dell-dell. Shi ná, mà wo kwa lè likpan 'unyong."
42010029	Ungikye anwuna a ma kee le u kong ngbebb 'uhwo-ma he ashi. A hà kung bii Ujeso le: "Ayang ù hà yi unde-gi?"
42010030	Ujeso a fan he le: "Ungikye ken a ma bo lè he Ujeruselem, u nda àshì gya he Ujeriko. A be mbu fe bezi he abwo he 'ukwo. Be kwu-e, kpam do kangg, be waa kúng he bihwom lè he 'uhwo, kwu kpe-e biwom abi a ma yi lè bi puu. Be kpam he teng he lihwu-lihwu buu gbe.
42010031	Nya a na a ma yi tyang há he 'ukwo, undi angwu u shang Unim a be gbe há. A nde-e. A lè baà gbe he 'igie 'ukwo ashell.
42010032	Nya 'itaa ken undi angwu ù yi he 'ikwu-lihwan ashi be ko le Ulibai a mbee be wu há. A lè naa nde ungikye anwuna. A mbee lè baà gbe he 'igie 'ukwo ashell.
42010033	Ungikye ususo angwu a maa be lè he Usameria a hà be gbe he 'ukwo 'umen ana. A nde-e ù yi tyang há he 'ukwo. Beshi be shi-e lè he.
42010034	A lè hwaa lè he. A kung 'utyuo to he bibaa, u tyua he ábi behwu, u kung ileyi bua he ábi. A kung he pwom he 'ukaa inyia 'uma gye lè he he ushom angwu be kpē begaandi ndor, u mbee ndè gbe lè he há.
42010035	He ashi a taa, a kung ikwudi lihwo lè ke ugyang ushom. A de-e le ù nde gbe-e lè he hen. Gbe a ban 'iwom he 'uhwo ungikye anwun gbe gyong únde angwu a ke-e ana, u tem, mà u ka he."
42010036	Ujeso a hà fe ityang anyin lishi le: "He bendi bekie abena, ayang angwu wo gim le a ma yi unde-ma?"
42010037	Undi angwu u hwua bendi Iten ana a fan Ujeso le undi angwu beshi be ma shi-e lè he a. Ujeso a de-e le ufe or titi ù lè shi nya a na ungikye anwuna a ma shi.
42010038	Nya a na Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa te lè 'ukwo, be lè fel he lishi 'ubong angi ungingye angwu be ko le Umata a ma kpe-e ha ahe ushu.
42010039	A ma yi lè ungwende ungingye angwu be ko le Umeri. Umeri a ma kwu Ujeso he 'ushu, u gyo ashi u hwua.
42010040	Umata a maa waa ufung gba lè 'ugaa ahwu 'ù yi le ù shi. A be hwaa lè Ujeso de-e le: "Atyagi, ki ngbebb-a ná unwandagi a gbe tyang mi le mì shi lizi ututeb a? Hā de-e le ù be kpell mi."
42010041	Atyetyan Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Unwaa-gi Umata, ki ngie-a likorye wo waa ufung gba lè biwom abin puu,
42010042	ukpor 'iwom ken na 'ì yi 'indee-indee. Umeri na a waa 'iwom 'imen ashi 'i ngbebb i. Undi ù hà ndo kpa he áshi ye."
42011001	He liti ken Ujeso a maa kong ha Unim he 'iteng 'isuso. A kong ha Unim puu, undi-utung uma ken a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, hwua li bel or ná lì kong ha Unim ná Ujon a hwua bendi-utung bema."
42011002	Ujeso a de be le: "Nyong ma kong ha Unim, mà kong 'itel i: 'Atyetyan Unim, Ipee ì kwu ke lizen ligang; Bendi bè hà kpa-a ná Usu.
42011003	Ke li lizi angi lı zi he liti-liti.
42011004	Tyang biban bityan ke li, ná bel li tyang ke bendi abe be shi ban li. Tyang li lì mbu he ugilale ye.' "
42011005	A mbee de bendi-utung bema le: "Kí yi yi le undi ken lè he liwu līmen ú nya la hwaa lè udim-ma lè 'ididyan 'usu da he le: 'Udim-gi, pwee mi bíkém ibred bikie.
42011006	Udim-gi angwu u gye litan, a bel gbe ha ami nyin. Mì yi lè ashi mì ke-e ye.'
42011007	Udim-ma angwu há u nya da he lè há afee le: 'Shī fem mi 'ushun ye, mi ngib lishi mà, bel lè bebwaa-gi li ngwee, mì nem bo le mi ka-a 'iwom ye' a?
42011008	Mà ngye le 'ì kwu-e le ù bo ke-e ibred he 'uhwo 'udim 'ubell ye or, u bo ka he 'iwom ashi a kee likorye ishwia i shi-e ná u bii he nya nya nya ye.
42011009	He atan-lengi anwun mi-i de men le, kiwom ashi 'i fong amen, mà bii, mà ma kpa āshi; mà kee, mà ma nda āshi; mà kem abwo he lishi, mà Unim u buu amen ángi.
42011010	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bii 'iwom, u kpa āshi; angwu a kee 'iwom, u nde shi; angwu a kem abwo he lishi, Unim u buu he ángi.
42011011	Men betyam bebwaa, ayang he liwu līmen ù nya kwu ùshiı ke unwaa-ma, gbe a bii he ùkwǎn? Hà u kwa ùnòng a ka he, gbe a bii he liti ukwuo?
42011013	Men abe ma ban i, má ngye le ma ka bebwaa-men biwom binunung teng-teng lè Atyamen angwu he lifung-atabe a? Ufe u ba kung Ukatia Kunyong uma ka bendi abe be bii he."
42011014	Ujeso a ndō undi ikeb ibibi angi i kwom he umbell, undi angwu há a keb likong akongale. Ki kwu bendi abe bè yi há he 'uhwo kangg.
42011015	Bendi besuso be de le Ubielzebul angwu ù yi usu bibibi na u ke-e ikeb le ù ndō āngi.
42011016	Besuso be kee le be gil Ujeso. Be hà be de-e le ù shi 'ikwele-uhwo tyung ābe hè be bè ngye le Unim na a som he.
42011017	Ujeso a ngye igim ibell, a hà de be le: "Kubong ahwu 'u tang he abwo keb andoale ha bende 'ù hà ndo naa ye. Kikwu-lihwan ashi 'i tang he abwo keb andoale 'i naa ye.
42011018	Fe gbe bendi Usetan be tang he abwo be fel ndo ha bende, be ba naa ná a? Nyong 'ì yi nyin, ma de le mi ndō ikeb ibibi le bwo Ubielzebul a ke-m ikeb a.
42011019	Gbe 'ì yi le ufe na u ke-m ikeb le mì ndō āngi, bendi bēmen befe be ndō āngi ná a? Bendi bēmen be tyung le ma mbeb.
42011020	Bwo 'ì yi le mi ndō ikeb ibibi gbe he ikeb Unim, ki nung amen le ikeb Kusu Unim i fel he liwu līmen.
42011021	"Gbe undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb a kam biwom bedye kwu, u kang ushaale uma, biwom bima bi nim ye.
42011022	Gbe undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb hwo-e a kwu-e, u hwo-e, u kpa kung he biwom bedye abi a fe lityam ha abi, u zī 'ute kung biwom bima lè hwua ke bema bendi.
42011023	Undi angwu ù yi utung ha ami ye, ù yi linaa ha ami; undi angwu u kpell mi kam ikam ye, u peb ipeb."
42011024	Ujeso a mbee de be le: "He 'unyong ahwu ikeb ibibi i fem lè ha undi, i la tan mbee libeb kee 'iteng ashi ì kwu sho 'unyong. Gbe i nde ye, i tem kong ha 'uhwo-ngi le: 'Mi ba tem gya he 'ipi mi ma be.'
42011025	Gbe i tem lè nde 'ipi 'imen ana 'ì yi 'itaa-itaa, bigbor bi shi ndor he 'iteng ábi,
42011026	i hà tem la ba lè ikeb ibibi idyong-ifee angi i ban hwò angi igyang. Be be fel ha undi umen ana, be shi-e u fel ban hwò 'itaa a ma yi lè he ukpi-ikwu."
42011027	Ujeso a kong ashin kong-kong, ungingye ususo a kung kong de-e lè há he liwu le: "Ungingye angwu a hwan-a, u kwob-a, ù yi lè igor kangg."
42011028	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Undi angwu a gyo igie Unim, u ke ngi ife, ufe na ù yi lè igor igyang angyell."
42011029	Nya a na bendi be maa sho fe Ujeso kel-kel, a gye 'ushu de be le: "Bendi abe ati anyin be fel bebibi atyuo. Be kee le be nda 'ikwele-uhwo ashi 'ı tyung le Unim na a som mi, ukpor bè hà ndo nda 'isuso fem ashi Ujona tyang ye.
42011030	Nya a na Ujona a ma yi 'itaa ke bendi Uninibe, na mi Unwaa Undigye, mì yi 'itaa ke bendi abe ati anyin.
42011031	He Liti angi Unim u be tang bendi ushe, usu ungingye angwu u be lè he Ushiba, u ba bo 'inaa nya, u ke bendi abe ati anyin libi likorye a ma tan lè he 'ubong 'uma ukong-ukong-ukong lè gyo biwom abi Usu Usolomon u hwua lè lishi abyele. Undi ususo ù yi nyin 'anaa-anaa i a dyam hwò Usolomon.
42011032	He Liti limen ana, bendi Uninibe be ba bo 'inaa nya, be ke men libi likorye befe be ma tyang abwo lè biban bibell he 'unyong ahwu be ma gyo Ujona a bun igie Unim. Undi ususo ù yi nyin a dyam hwò Ujona."
