42011033	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Undi u gba 'imor-inde tem lè shi shā ndyell or, ngwu ù kung 'igbor shā āshi or ye. U kung āshi la ndor he 'usi he 'udyan ushom a, hè bendi abe be gye há he afee bè nde gboo.
42011034	Atong-shi à yi nya a na 'imor-inde a ke inyiahwo. Gbe ashi āmen à yi gelalala, inyiahwo īmen puu i kwa lè 'ikung-gbo. Ukpor gbe ashi āmen à yi anunung ye, inyiahwo īmen puu i kwa he 'ifufebb.
42011035	Mà nde le 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ì yi ha amen 'ì yi 'ifufebb a ye.
42011036	Gbe inyiahwo īmen puu ì yi he 'ikung-gbo teng ligwo ken or ye, hà inyiahwo īmen puu i taa nya a na 'imor-inde 'ı taa kung gboo a."
42011037	Ujeso a kong ashin puu, undi ken angwu ù yi he likwu Iferesis a ko he lizi. Ujeso a kung gbe ndo há lè kwu ko he-e ù ndo zī.
42011038	Ki ma kwu angwu Iferesis he 'uhwo likorye a nde Ujeso a to abwo ná itel ibell ì yi mà ukpong u hà zī lizi ye.
42011039	Atyetyan Ujeso a hà kung de-e le: "Men Iferesis ma to item igbaala lè indor, ukpor àtyám āmen a sho lè bitaa bibibi atyetye-atyetye.
42011040	Mà yi kpel ye. Unim angwu a shi item na a shi afee ye a?
42011041	Mà kung àshi ma fe he igbaala lè indor lè ke bendi-likaa, mà bigbor puu bi fel bitaa-bitaa ná iten ityan ì yi.
42011042	"Men bendi Iferesis, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen. Biwom ná afufeb i or, gbe a hwaa, ma hwua āngi he biteng lihwo, ma ke Unim likwu ken, ukpor ma mor 'inunung ashele, ki nyin amen lè Unim ye. Mà shi bimen i puu, gia bisuso shì, tyang bisuso ye.
42011043	"Men bendi Iferesis, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen. Ki nyin amen lè bidem abi be kie ndor bekaandi bendi he ishom angi ma kwu liwu. Ki nyin amen le bendi bè kong lè men lè ife he ishokwo 'ate.
42011044	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen. Mà yi nya a ná akwun angi bendi be tan gbe há he likwu, be ngye le akwun a ye a."
42011045	Undi ken angwu u hwua bendi Iten a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, ashi wo kong i, wo bia li bel or titi."
42011046	Ujeso a kung fan le: "Eng, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen or titi. Ma kwuo biwom swa bendi abi bi ngbebb gbe be gbe he akele ubell iten angi i go gbe be. Men-agyang ma tyua 'ubwo or há ye.
42011047	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen. Ma tye akwun bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim abe betiemen be ma gwu.
42011048	Men-agyang ma tyung le ma bong le ashi betiemen be ma shi 'i ngbèbb. Befe be gwu bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim, men ma tye akwun abell.
42011049	He atan-lengi anwun Unim angwu a bi lishi a de le: 'Mi ba som bendi-isom begi hwaa lè bendi. Be ba gwa bendi-isom besuso, be ke besuso 'ingie.'
42011050	Unim u ba ka bendi abe ati anyin 'ingie he 'uhwo bendi-isom bema abe be gwu kung lè he 'unyong ahwu a shi igye anyin, kung lè há 'unyong ahwu be gwu Ebell be wu he 'unyong ahwu be gwu Uzakaraya. Uzakaraya na be gwu he Ushom Unim he 'udyan 'imbe ashi be shang Unim lè 'ipo ashi be ndor ta-ta ke Unim. Bendi ati angi 'unyin be ba kpa 'ingie he 'uhwo 'ubell puu.
42011052	"Men abe ma hwua bendi Iten, ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka amen. Ma waa kung ukukol angwu ù yi lingye igie Unim gbe he ahwuale iten he 'ukwo ahwu igie Unim ı ngwee bendi ye, i ngwee amen ye."
42011053	A gbe lè há, bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten lè bendi Iferesis be fel ben he, be bii he bibibi gbe lè biwom gbamm,
42011054	kaa hè be bè nde le ù kong 'iban à, hè be bè kwu-e.
42012001	Nya a na bendi asisilisi asisilisi be ma sho he 'iteng ken, be maa fel tem hwom bende, Ujeso a kpi 'ikwu de bendi-utung bema le: "Mà baa 'uhwo-men lè ha iyist Iferesis, mi kong ilam ibell a.
42012002	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi be nyia shì, ki ba fem he igye. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi he 'undyell, bendi be ba ngya āshi.
42012003	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi mā kong lè 'usu, be ba gyo āshi lè ishu. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma nyia kong he afee 'ipo, be ba gaa kong āshi he 'ugbo."
42012004	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Bedim-gi, bendi abe bè yi lè ikeb le be gwa agwo afe-afe, bè yi lè ikeb le be sha 'isuso mbee ye ana, mà shell ābe ye.
42012005	Mî de men undi angwu 'ì yi le mà shell. Mà shell Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb le gbe a gwu undi, u kung he fa he 'inde. Ufe na 'ì yi kpe-kpe le mà shell.
42012006	Be ka lishishe lidyong ikobo ifee ye a? Mà na or, Unim u naa lityam tyang angi ken or ye.
42012007	Unim a bo ngye 'ugii igil he lishi līmen ken-ken-ken. Mà shī shell ye. Undigye ken ù yi Unim he 'ukpo hwò lishishe gbamm."
42012008	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le undi uyang-yang angwu a kong de bendi gboo le ù yi ke-m mi Unwaa Undigye a, mi or mi ba sha he ná he ashi idengell Unim.
42012009	Ukpor undi angwu a swan gboo le ù yi ke-m mi a ye, mi or mi ba swan he he ashi idengell Unim.
42012010	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kong ban i-mi Unwaa Undigye, Unim u ba tyang ka he. Ukpor undi angwu a kong biwom bibibi gbe lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim, Unim u ba tyang ka he ye.
42012011	"Gbe be te lè men he ishom angi be kwu liwu lè he ashi bekaandi lè besu abe he 'ubong, mà shī waa ufung gbe lè 'iwom ashi ma be kong lè 'itaa ma be maa ushe ye.
42012012	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ukatia Kunyong Unim u ba nong amen àshi mà kong."
42012013	Undi ken lè há liwu ana a kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, de unwandagi le ù hwua lishi atyetyan he-e ù ke-m 'igi."
42012014	Ujeso a kung bii he le: "Angikye, ayang a ke-m ikeb le mì naa amen ikpe, mi mbee kung lishi atyamen hwua amen?"
42012015	A kung de bendi abe be sho há le: "Mà baa 'uhwo-men lè he ashi abungale biwom bendi. Undi u kwa lè likpan ligyang angyell le bwo ù yi lè biwom gbamm a ye, mà u mbu 'ingbebb na ana or."
42012016	Ujeso a kung ityang anyin bun de le: "Usu 'ingbebb ken a ma yi lè ùtiá angwu biwom bi mbu-e há kangg.
42012017	U fel gim ugim le: 'Mì yi lè 'ipi ashi mı ndor azi agi ye. Mi ha ba ndor āngi kung a?
42012018	Ashi mı be shi 'ì yi le mi tya abel agi anyin wa he itang, mî tye abel asuso angi a dyam kangg. Há na mı be ndor azi agi puu.
42012019	Mi hà kung de 'uhwo-gi le, eng-heng, mi angwu liti li ngbebb, mi fel lè biwom gbamm abi mı be zī he aze gbamm angi a be lè he 'ushu. Ki fel ashi mì sho 'unyong, zī bizizi, ngwo bingwungwo, gor igor.'
42012020	Unim a hà de-e le: 'Wo 'ikpel-ye undi, kusu ahwu 'unyin i mi kpa likpan ligang. Ayang ù ha be kung biwom abi wo kam ndor 'uhwo-gang nyin?' "
42012021	Ujeso a fe ityang anyin lishi le: "Kitaa 'imen na 'ı be shi fe bendi abe be kam biwom zwan 'uhwo-bell he igye i, be mbu 'ingbebb he ashi Unim ye."
42012022	Ujeso a kung de bendi-utung bema le: "Ashin na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu mı de men le ufung ù be men gbe lè lizi angi mà zī kwu bewum, ngwu gbe lè inditen angi mà fe ye.
42012023	Likpan li dyam hwò lizi, agwo a dyam hwò inditen.
42012024	Mà ndè linyun, li kwan ùtiá, ngwu lì fem 'iwom ye; lì yi lè libel ye. Unim na u kwob āngi, ki shi le men mà yi he 'ukpo hwò linyun ibwan-ibwan.
42012025	Ayang ù nya zī igye gbe gyong ati ama, le bwo u shell lihwu?
42012026	Gbe men ma shi 'iwom ashi zangg nyin mbee ye, 'ibang a, ma be ufung gbe lè bisuso?
42012027	Mà ndè ná abia a shi bibubo. A sha aki or, ngwu à tye inditen lè 'uhwo-ngi ye. Mi kee le mà ngye dangg le mà na Usolomon a ma mbu 'ingbebb 'indee-indee or, a ma bwee idem áshiá ha 'ubia ken or ye.
42012028	Unim na u bwee abia. Abia angi a hwaa ashia 'unyin, te-te 'uhwo a fel angi be ting āngi shī 'inde or, u bwee āngi teng-teng lè men a? Má fe lityam ha ahe gbungg ye.
42012029	Mà shī waa ufung gbe lè ashi mà zī lè ashi mà ngwo ye.
42012030	Kitaa i na bendi abe be bong ha Unim ye abe he igye anyin be kee biwom bimen i mbee 'unyong. Atyamen a ngye le 'i fong amen lè biwom bimen i.
42012031	Ashi mà shi 'ì yi le mà ke Unim angwu ù yi Usu ūmen ife, mà u kung biwom bimen i ka amen."
42012032	"Bebwaa-gi, mà na ma go ye or, mà shell ye, likorye Unim Atyamen a nde shi 'i ngbebb he le ù shi amen mà fel besu he Kiteng-usu 'ima.
42012033	"Mà kung biwom puu abi mà yi lè bi ndyebb zi, ma kung únde ábi ke bendi-likaa. Gbe ma shi ná, hà ma kam ibam angi ı kaa ye ndor 'uhwo-men, ma kam bingbebb bīmen ndor he lifung-atabe he 'ipi bì hà ndo mbeè ye. Uzi ù hà ndo gya há, ngwu ikung ì zī ban ābi ye.
42012034	He 'iteng ashi bingbebb bīmen bì yi, há na àtyám āmen a kwu titi."
42012035	"Mà bua bibuale, mà gbe bimor-inde ndor, hè men mà kam nyong 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ı be.
42012036	Mà kam kwu nya a na iboyi angi ı kwu be nyong atyabell lè he 'ipam libee. Gbe a be kem abwo he lishi, be buu he lishi nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
42012037	Iboyi angi atyabell a be nde be be kam kwu há ashi nyong, be kwa lè igor. Atyabell u gie inditen, u de be be kwu ko, u shi ābe 'ugaa.
42012038	Iboyi angi atyabell u be he 'ididyan 'usu or, he ashi liti or, u nde be be kam, hà be kwa lè igor.
42012039	Mà ngye le ugyang ushom á yii ngya 'unyong ahwu uzi u be, hang u bong he le ù ngwee he ye.
42012040	Men or mà nde le ma kam likorye mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba ba he 'unyong ahwu ma ndor lishi ye a."
42012041	Ipita a kung bii le: "Atyagi, wo bun ityang anyin de li bel-bel â, hà wo bun āngi de undi uyang-yang a?"
42012042	Ujeso a fan he le: "Ayang ù yi ná undi aki angwu u shi aki lityam ken, u bi lishi? Angwu há na átyám u ke-e ikeb le ù nde gbe lè ushaale uma, u mbee hwua azi ke bendi aki abe be teng he 'unyong kpa-kpa.
42012043	Undi umen i, gbe átyám a tem be nde-e u shi ashin, hà u kwa lè igor.
42012044	Mi da amen 'igyang le ātyām undi umen i u ba ka he ikeb le ù fel nde gbe lè biwom bima a puu.
42012045	Ukpor gbe undi umen ana a gim le, átyám a kwu há; u keb bende-ma bengikye or, bengingye or, ikwun akpamale, u zī bizizi, ngwo bingwungwo bwom,
42012046	hà átyám u ba tya he imbul a. Átyám u kwa he ka he 'ingie kangg, hà som he he-e ù gye kpe 'ingie utung ha bendi abe be kpo utebb.
42012047	"Undi aki angwu a ngye ashi atyam a kee he le ù shi, ukpor a shi āshi ye, be ba kpam he ikwun kangg.
42012048	Ukpor undi aki angwu le bwo a ngye 'iwom ashi atyam a kee he le ù shi ye, a lè shi 'iwom ashi le bè kpam he, be ba kpam he ikwun zangg a. Gbe Unim a ke undi 'iwom 'i go, Unim u ndor lishi le undi angwu há u ka 'i go; gbe Unim a ke undi 'iwom 'i go kangg, u ndor lishi le undi angwu há u ka 'i go kangg titi."
42012049	Ujeso a kong le: "Mi be le mî ting igye anyin 'inde a. Kanaa-anaa i mi fel da le, ayang a kpe le mi ting āshi mà or.
42012050	Kì yi kpe-kpe le mì kpe 'ingie. Ki ba-m gben-gben kpamm mi gbe kpe shi 'i mbee.
42012051	Ma kong le mi be lè ikwun a he igye anyin bee? Mi be lè ikwun a ye gbangg, mi be lè atangale he abwo a.
42012052	Kung lè he 'unyong ahwun gye 'ushu bendi abe bè yi bedyong he 'ikwu-lihwan 'ibell be tang he abwo. Bendi abe bekie be tel abe befee, abe befee be tel abe bekie.
42012053	Ātyām unwaa u tel unwaa-ma angwu ungikye, unwaa u tel atyam. Anam unwaa u tel unwaa-ma angwu ungingye, unwaa u tel anam. Anam-ushu u tel ungye unwaa-ma, ungye unwaa-ma u tel anam-ushu."
42012054	Ujeso a mbee de bendi abe be sho há le: "Gbe ma ndè 'ibu 'ìshi lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı ngwee, ma da le umbwo u la ndor. U mà ndor 'igyang.
42012055	Kunyong ahwu 'ufem 'u fel shi lè he 'igie ashi lè he ufaa, ma de le baale ubem u tem. U mà tem 'igyang.
42012056	Men bendi-ilam, ma nda itang lè 'usi, ma ngya àshi 'i ndo shi. Ki shi ná a, ma ngye ashi 'unyong ahwun 'u ze ye?"
42012057	"Ki shi ná a, men-agyang ma gim 'iwom ashi 'ì yi 'inunung ke men le mà shi ye?
42012058	Gbe undi a ka-a 'ushia, wo kaa kangg ha-a à shi ikwun ha ahe mà ukpong ma hà wu há he ukoto. Gbe ná a ye, u kwa-a ta lè wo la ka umaa-ishe, umaa-ishe u kwa-a ke angwu idashanda, angwu idashanda u kwa-a lè fe he igaadye.
42012059	Ngye le gbe wo gye igaadye, wo ba kwa há kpamm wo gbe hwee únde angwu be tang-a puu."
42013001	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi besuso be ma yi há abe be ma de Ujeso gbe lè bendi Ugalili abe Upalet a gwu he 'unyong ahwu be maa shang Unim.
42013002	Ujeso a kung bii ābe le: "Ma kong le ashi le bwo be ma gwu ābe he 'ukwo ahwuna a, ki fel tyung le be maa sha biban hwà bendi Ugalili abe be teng bee?"
42013003	A tem fan le: "Dia, ukpor gbe men ma bel àtyám lè he biban bīmen ye, hà men puu ma hwa nya a na befe be hwō a.
42013004	Hà bendi lihwo lè be bedyong-ikie abe he Usalom abe ushom angwu be kang 'ukye a ma mbu gwu befe? Ma kong le ashin 'i tyung le be sha biban hwà bendi puu abe be teng he Ujeruselem a?"
42013005	U mbee tem lè shi fan le: "Dia, ukpor mà ngye le gbe ma bel àtyám lè he biban bīmen ye, hà men puu ma ba hwa nya a na befe be hwō a."
42013006	Ujeso a ma bun ityang anyin de be le: "Ungikye ususo a ma kwan ùkwán angwu befe be ko le ufik ha ahe utia. A hà te le u la shun nda le a wum agbe à, a nde ye.
42013007	A hà kung de undi angwu u nde gbe lè ùtiá uma le: 'Ki fel aze akie ná mı be hen he liten ukwan i le mi ba kee agbe ama, mi nde ye. Ging he. Ki shi ná a, ù yi naa nyin u kwuu 'ukwo?'
42013008	Undi umen ana a hà kung de-e le: 'Ukaandi, tyang he ù mbee kwu nyin lize ken, mî kpi ùgbé fe-e kel-kel, mi kwuo itang ishi fe-e.
42013009	Gbe uze a wum, hà 'i ngbebb; gbe a wum ye, mà mi ging he.' "
42013010	He liti uwell Ijuus ken Ujeso a maa hwua bendi he ushom angwu be kwu liwu.
42013011	Ungingye ususo a ma yi há angwu ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe. I ma shi-e a mbu lingmam aze lihwo lè ngi adyong-ikie. A ma keb, ù nem tan kpa-kpa mbee ye.
42013012	Ujeso a nde-e, a kung ko de-e le: "Iye, wo mbee lè he lingmam ligang."
42013013	A ndaa 'ubwo tyua he, ungingye ana a bo naa kpa-kpa nya 'ukwo-ukwo, u fel pee Unim.
42013014	Ukaandi angwu u nde gbe lè ushom umen ana a fel he ingywo le Ujeso a mbee undi he liti uwell. Ukaandi umen ana a de bendi abe bè yi há le: "Ati à yi adyong-ken he utyong angi le lì shi aki. Mà be hè Ujeso ù mbee amen he ati amen ana; mà be he liti uwell ye."
42013015	Atyetyan Ujeso a de-e le: "Men bendi-ilam, undi-undi u pell bityuale bima lè he 'ipo he liti uwell ta lè bi le bì lè ngwo umbwo.
42013016	Ukpor ungingye anwun ù yi igia Ebraham a, Usetan a tye-e lìngmam aze lihwo lè ngi adyong-ikie nyin. Má gim le ù mbee he liti uwell ye a?"
42013017	Ufanale uma a ma shi ishwia i shi bendi-linaa bema lè 'uhwo-bell. Bendi abe be teng bè yii gor fa 'ikwele-uhwo 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi u shi.
42013018	Ujeso a bii le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná 'ibang a? Mì kung āhwu paa ha 'ibang a?"
42013019	A hà kung de le: "Kù yi ná ùtǒng angwu a zen hwò puu angwu be ko he igie Beke le umustad. Undi a kung he kwan ha ahe utia. Ùtǒng umen i a mbi kaa fel ùkwán. Linyun li lè shi agwu he ibubu ima."
42013020	Ujeso a mbee bii le: "Kibang mi kung tie ná Unim ù yi Usu?"
42013021	U de le: "Kusu Unim 'ù yi ná iyist angi ı shi ibred ı mbwee. Ungingye a bell āngi ipel ha itasa ifelawa ikie he 'ikpetye, i gbo kpe mbee āngi puu."
42013022	Ujeso a gbe ndo he Ujeruselem. A bel he ashi 'ubong asuso hwua bendi lè akwo.
42013023	Undi-iso a bii he le: "Ukaandi, bendi zangg befe-befe na be be kwu lè likpan 'unyong a?" Ujeso a kung de be le:
42013024	"Mà kaa hè men mà gbe he ungwu lishi angwu shib-shib, likorye bendi gbamm be ba kaa le be ngwee he 'iteng-usu Unim, ukpor be ngwee mbee ye.
42013025	Ugyang ushom u ba sha lìshì. He 'unyong ahwu ma be naa he igye kem abwo he lishi, ma de-e le, 'Ukaandi, buu li lìshì,' u ba da amen le, 'Mi ngye he 'ipi ma be ye.'
42013026	Men mà ha ba fan he le: 'Li maa za bizizi, li ngwo bingwungwo utung ha awo; wo ma hwua bendi ha abel ishokwo.'
42013027	U mbee be de men le: 'Men bendi bebibi, mi ngye he 'ipi ma be ye. Mà gbe-m lè hen.'
42013028	He 'unyong ahwu ma be nde Ebraham lè Azik lè Ujekob lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim kwu ipel ha Unim he Kiteng-usu 'ima he lifung-atabe, ukpor men ufe, be ndō amen lè há, ma ba kya kem ishang.
42013029	Bendi be ba ba puu lè he bigie igye a puu bìndè ba kwa he 'ipam nya he Kiteng-usu Unim.
42013030	Bendi abe bè yi item 'anaa-anaa nyin, bè ha ba fel 'ushu, abe bè yi 'ushu 'anaa-anaa nyin, be be fel item."
42013031	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi besuso abe bè yi he likwu Iferesis be be de Ujeso le: "Ki ngbebb le wò gbe lè hen gye he 'iteng 'isuso, likorye Usu Uherod a kee le u gwa-a."
42013032	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà lè de undi umen angwu a ngye beshu ná anywiasu ana le, 'Mi ndō ikeb ibibi lè ha bendi, mi mbee bendi-angmam 'unyin lè 'uhwo, he liti lekie mì ha mbee aki agi.'
42013033	Ki shi kpe-kpe le mì kwu he 'ukwo 'unyin lè 'uhwo lè ashi-ataa, likorye 'i ngbebb le bè gwu undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim he 'iteng 'isuso-isuso fem Ujeruselem tyang ye.
42013034	"Aye, men bendi Ujeruselem, kunyong 'uyang-yang Unim u som undi le ù be tye ugie 'isom 'ima, ma gwa besuso, ma maa besuso akor. Mbee 'unyong kpamm mi kee le hang mi kpe men fe he uko ná ukwuo u kpe inwaa ima fe he abebaa, ukpor ma bong ye.
42013035	Kanaa-anaa i mi kung abwo agi lè he 'uhwo-men. Mà ngye le mà nem ba nda-m ye kpamm 'unyong 'u gbe fel ahwu ma de le: 'Kukwun 'ù kwu ke undi angwu u be he lizen Atyetyan Unim.' "
42014001	He liti uwell lisuso Ujeso a gye le u la za lizi he ushom undi ken angwu ù yi ukaandi he likwu Iferesis. Bendi be maa fel kang he kangg.
42014002	Ungikye ken angwu a ma mbwee abwo lè abee a be hwaa lè Ujeso.
42014003	Ujeso a kung bii bekaandi abe be hwua bendi Iten lè abe Iferesis le: "Iten ityan i bong le lì mbee undi he liti uwell à, hà lì mbee ye?"
42014004	Be kwu kpii. Ujeso a mbee ungikye anwuna, u de-e le ù ndo gye.
42014005	A mbee bii ābe le: "Gbe undi he liwu līmen ù yi lè unwaa or, ùkyēbb 'igundu or, gbe a mbu fe he libell he liti uwell, u la fem he nya liti uwell ye a?"
42014006	Kìbībī ashin or, be ma fan he áshi kaa.
42014007	Ujeso a ma nde ná bendi besuso abe be be há he 'ipam be kin kwu he bidem binunung. A hà bun ityang de be le:
42014008	"Gbe undi a ko-a gye he 'ipam libee, wo lè kwu he 'idem ashi 'i ngbebb 'indee-indee a ye. Pisoye a ko undi angwu a dyam hwo-a awo or titi.
42014009	Undi angwu a ko āmen ana ù ha ba da-a awo le wo-ò bo ke angwell 'idem. Wo bo ishwia-ishwia la kwa he 'idem ashi 'i zen hwò puu.
42014010	Ukpor gbe undi a ko-a gye he 'ipam, wo lè kwu he 'idem ashi 'i zen hwò puu hwan, hè undi angwu a ko-a ù be da-a le: 'Udim-gi, be kwu he 'idem ashi 'i ngbebb hwò nyin.' Ashin 'i dyam-a he ashi begaandi abe be teng puu.
42014011	Atan-lengi ù yi le undi angwu a kung 'uhwo-ma gye he 'usi, Unim u ba keb he ba he itang. Angwu a keb 'uhwo-ma be he itang na Unim u be kung he gye he 'usi."
42014012	Ujeso a hà kung de undi angwu a ko he 'ipam le: "Gbe wo shi 'ipam, wò shī ko bedim-gang lè bebwanaa lè behwan-gang lè bende-gang abe bè yi bendi-ingbebb a ye, likorye be ba hwee-a he akoale ugang lizi titi.
42014013	Gbe wo shi 'ipam, wo ko bendi-likaa lè bigwun.
42014014	Mà wo ba kwa lè 'ukwun likorye bè yi lè shi hè be bè hwee-a ye. Unim u ba hwee-a he 'unyong ahwu bendi benunung be be wum lè he lihwu."
42014015	He 'unyong ahwu undi ken he liwu bendi abe be maa zī lizi há, a gyo ashi Ujeso a kong ana, a kung de Ujeso le bendi abe be be kwu he 'ipam he Kiteng-usu Unim he lifung-atabe, be ba kwa lè igor.
42014016	Ujeso a kung ityang bun de-e le: "Ungikye ken a ma kam 'ipam 'ikaandi ashele. A ko bendi gbamm le bè be nya.
42014017	Kunyong 'u ma fel há, a som uboyi uma le ù lè de bendi abe a ko le: 'Mà be lè. Mi kam biwom puu mà.'
42014018	Undi-undi u fel ka atan-lengi angwu a shi-e u be ye. Ukpi-ikwu undi a de uboyi ana le: 'Mi ndyebb 'upung; kì yi kpe-kpe le mì lè nde hwu. Lè de-e le, kusi, ù hā shī ngywo ye.'
42014019	Angwell u de le: 'Mi ndyebb bigundu lihwo. Mi ndo gya lè bi la kaa nda ná bı shi aki a. Lè de-e le, kusi, ù hā shī ngywo ye.'
42014020	Angwell u de le: 'Mi hà kpebb ungye ikpebb, mi ba wa há ye.'
42014021	Uboyi ana a tem lè de ukaandi uma abin puu. Ukaandi ana a ma fel he ingywo kangg. A de uboyi uma le ù te akikye gye he igbaakwo lè be lè bendi-likaa or, bigwun or.
42014022	He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg uboyi ana a tem be de-e le: 'Ukaandi, mi shi ashi wo kong mà, ukpor 'ukwo 'u teng le bendi bè mbee be kwu.'
42014023	Ukaandi ana a de-e le ù mbee gye he ibo or, ibi-ukwo angi be gbe gye he ùtiá or, lè de bendi le bè be kpe-kpe hè be bè sho ha ahe ushom.
42014024	A kung de le: 'Mî de men le bendi abe mi kpi 'ikwu ko, be ba tyua lizi he ungwu or ye.' "
42014025	He 'unyong ken bendi gbamm be ma fe utung ha Ujeso. Ujeso a hà bel àshì ndor ābe, u de be le:
42014026	"Undi uyang-yang angwu a be hwaa lè mi na u kwu undi-utung ugi ye, hà angwu há a swan atyam, anam, ungye-ma, bebwaa-ma, bebwanam lè 'uhwo-ma or titi a a.
42014027	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong lihwu, kung 'ikpakpaa 'ima so pwom mi ye, ù hà ndo kwa undi-utung ugi ye.
42014028	Gbe undi ken há he liwu līmen i a kam ushom 'usi atyele, u kpya 'ikwu kwa ko bo únde uma he-e ù nde le únde uma u ba kpǎ he tya ushom a?
42014029	Gbe a shi ná ye, u fa lìshií life-life a, ù nem tya ushom ugyang mbee ye. Bendi puu abe be nde 'igem aki ashi a shi be ndo nyan he le:
42014030	'Ungikye anwun a tye ushom be ndor 'igem, ù nem mbeě he mbeè ye.' "
42014031	U mbee bii le: "Kibang 'itaa usu angwu ù nya bo lè bendi asi lisi 'ugbe lisi lè bendi asi lisi 'ugbe adyong le u la ndo ha usu angwu ù yi lè bendi áshiá ha bema 'ugbe 'afee? U kpya 'ikwu kwa ko sha ugim le ù yi lè ikeb le u ndo ha undi-linaa uma a?
42014032	Gbe a nde le ù yi lè ikeb ye, u som bendi le bè lè de usu angwell he 'unyong ahwu ù so 'igbe-igbe le a kee le bè shi ikwun."
42014033	Ujeso a hà fe lishi le: "Kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi le undi he liwu līmen angwu a tyang biwom bima puu ye, u kwa undi-utung ugi ye."
42014034	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Bendo be ngbèbb, ukpor gbe bè tem nyin he ungwu ye, kì tem yi lè 'itaa be shi ābe bè nyin ye.
42014035	Bè nem yi lè lifem he itang or, ngwu 'izie or ye. Bendi be kung ābe wa lè hell. Undi angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo."
42015001	He liti ken bendi gbamm abe be kpe ukpanda lè bendi-biban be ma be gyo Ujeso.
42015002	Bendi Iferesis lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be maa fel zim he ungwu fa Ujeso le u kpa bendi-biban fa he liwu, u zī lizi utung ha abe.
42015003	Ujeso a hà bun ityang de be le:
42015004	"Gbe undi he liwu līmen ù yi lè ìtiā asi adyong, gbe a waa nim ken, u sha ná a? U tyang angi asi ande lè ngi lihwo lè ngi idyong-inde há he 'ipi ı zī abia, la shun he kpamm u gbe nde-e.
42015005	Gbe a nde-e nde-nde, u kung he pwom he 'igbong tem lè he ba he ushu lè igor. U ko bedim-ma lè bende-ma da ābe le bè be gor lè he, likorye a nde ùtiā uma angwu a ma waa nim.
42015007	Mi da amen le 'itaa 'imen na igor ı be kwu he lifung-atabe kangg he 'uhwo undi-iban ken angwu a shi beshi he biban bima, u tyang ābi ashele hwò bendi benunung abe asi ande lè be lihwo lè be bedyong-inde abe be kee le bè tyang abwo lè biban ye."
42015008	"Hà gbe ungingye ken ù yi lè ikwudi lihwo, gbe a waa nim ken, u sha ná a? U gba 'imor-inde, tie 'ipi he afee ushom shun he mbee 'ipi tyuo-tyuo-tyuo u gbe nde-e.
42015009	Gbe a nde-e nde-nde, u ko bedim-ma lè bende-ma da ābe le bè be gor lè he. A gia ukwudi uma angwu a ma waa nim.
42015010	Mi da amen le kitaa 'imen na idengell Unim ı be yal gor he 'uhwo undi-iban ken angwu a shi beshi he biban bima, u tyang ābi ashele."
42015011	Ujeso a mbee bun ityang isuso le: "Ki ma yi lè ungikye ken angwu a ma yi lè bebwaa bengikye befee.
42015012	Angwu 'isun a lè de atyam le ù kung biwom bima hwua ābe he-e ù waa bima ke-e. Atyam a kung biwom bima hwua ābe.
42015013	Ki kung zī ati zangg, unwaa umen ana a kung biwom abi atyam a ke-e ndyebb zi, u gbe lè he ushaale atyam gye beke lè 'igbe kangg. A lè zī ban únde uma puu.
42015014	A ma nem yi lè 'iwom ye. Ubwaa ukaandi a hà kwu há.
42015015	A lè hwaa lè undi ken he 'ubong 'umen ana. Undi umen ana a kung aki ke-e le ù nde gbe lè ikagbo.
42015016	Unwaa anwuna a ma kee le u za ako biwom angi ikagbo ı zī or; ki shi lè undi angwu a ma ke-e ye.
42015017	Unwaa ana ù ha fel gim gba lè bendi abe be shi atyam aki ná bè yi lè azi be zī teng ndor hell. Fe ufe ù yi gbe fe nyin, u hwō itung.
42015018	A shi ugim fe 'uhwo-ma le u ba bo la hwaa lè atyam da he le ufe a shi 'iban fe Unim lè ufe.
42015019	A tem kpè le ù ko he le unwaa-ma ye. U fel kpe-e ná bendi abe a kpe le bè shi-e aki a.
42015020	"A kung bo 'inaa gbe, u la hwaa lè atyam. He 'unyong ahwu unwaa anwuna a ma so lè he agia 'ukwo, atyam a nde-e u ba lè há. Beshi be ma shi-e lè unwaa-ma kangg. A buu lè kpee lè he gaa he lè uko.
42015021	Unwaa-ma a de-e le: 'Atyagi, mi shi 'iban fe Unim lè wo. Mi tem kpè le wò ko mi le unwaa-gang ye.'
42015022	Ukpor atyam a ko iboyi ima, de be le bè te akikye lè be lè aliga akaandi angi a ngbebb 'unung hwò puu a, be shi-e. Bè be lè unwaande fe-e he udyong-bwo, be fe-e ikwob he abee.
42015023	Bè lè kwu ūshōm api angwu a dyam hwò īshōm api puu, be gwu hè be bè shi 'ipam gor fe-e.
42015024	Atyam a mbee de le: 'Mi ma kong le unwaa-gi a ma hwō, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i ù yi uwum. A ma nim, ukpor mi tem nde-e.' Be kpi 'ipam ashele lè igor.
42015025	"He 'unyong 'umen ana unwaa-ma angwu gbel ù yi he útiá. He 'unyong ahwu a tem be fel kpee-kpee he ushaale, a gyo agyam lè angyor.
42015026	A ko uboyi atyam ken bii he le be sha 'ibang a?
42015027	Uboyi a fan he le: 'Unwanaa a tem be he ushu. Atia a kung ūshōm api angwu a dyam hwò puu gwu, le bwo a tem be he ushu. Ù yi uwum; u shi dangg.'
42015028	Unwanam angwu gbel a ma fel he ingywo. A swan le ù nem gya he ushu ye. Átyám a gye he 'ukwo lè tim he anung le ù gye he ushu.
42015029	A kung de atyam le: 'He aze gbamm mi shi aki ka-a ná ufee. Mi bia uten ugang ken or ye. Kibang wo bè shi ke-m ngye? Wo ke-m ubuu or le mì gwu shi 'ipam gor igor utung ha bedim-gi ye.
42015030	Ukpor unwaa-gang anwun a zī ban-a únde he 'uhwo akpela. Kanaa-anaa i a tem be, wo gwu-e ūshōm api angwu a dyam hwò puu.'
42015031	Átyám a de-e le: 'Unwaa-gi, wò yi hen he ushu mbee 'unyong kpamm. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi mì yi lè shi 'ì yi 'igang a.
42015032	Ki ngbebb le lì shi 'ipam gor igor, le bwo unwanaa angwu mi ma kong le a hwō, ù yi uwum. A ma nim, mi tem nde-e.' "
42016001	Ujeso a mbee de bendi-utung bema le: "Ki ma yi lè undi-ingbebb ken angwu a ma yi lè ukaandi aki. Bendi be hà de undi umen ana le ukaandi aki umen i u ban he únde.
42016002	A ko ukaandi aki umen ana de-e le: 'Mi gyo ashi wo shi dii. Tyung mi ná wo shi aki agang. Wò nem kwa ha ami i ye.'
42016003	Ukaandi aki anwuna a kung kong ha ahe lityam le: 'Ukaandi ugi u ndo waa mi lè he aki. Mì ha ba sha ná a? Mi nam ùtiá mbee ye; ishwia i shi-m lè 'inyong anyongale.
42016004	Mi ngye ashi mì shi mà. Nyong mı tem be kwu lè aki ye, mi kwa bedim abe be be kpe-m gye he ishaale ibell.'
42016005	A ko bendi puu abe be zī ukaandi uma ahwua be he 'iteng ken. A bii ukpi-ikwu undi le, a zī ukaandi uma lihwua 'ibang a?
42016006	A de-e le a zi-e lihwua bigbangbang behwu asi adyong. Ukaandi aki umen ana a de-e le ù kpe 'ushia 'uma kwu ko fee fe há le a zi-e lihwua bigbangbang behwu asi afee lè bi lihwo a.
42016007	A bii angwell le: 'Wo-o zi-e 'ibang a?' Anwuna a de-e le a zi-e lihwua igaa ābung asi 'adyong. Ukaandi aki ana a mbee de-e le ù kpe 'ushia 'uma fee le a zi-e lihwua igaa asi 'ande a.
42016008	Undi-ingbebb a pee ukaandi aki ubibi ná a shi beshu. Bendi abe he igye anyin be bi lishi he biwom abi be nde gbe lè bi ke 'uhwo-bell hwò abe bè yi he 'ikung-gbo Unim."
42016009	Ujeso a gye 'ushu de be le: "Mí-ì de men ashin. Mà kung bingbebb bīmen abi he igye i kwu bedim. Gbe wo gbe tyang ābi, Unim u kpa amen gya ha ahe ushu angwu u ngyor igye kpamm.
42016010	Undi angwu a kpè le bè fe lityam ha ahe he 'anwaa 'iwom zangg, a kpè le bè fe lityam ha ahe he ashi 'i dyam or titi. Undi angwu a kpè le bè fe lityam ha ahe he 'anwaa 'iwom zangg ye, a kpè le bè fe lityam ha ahe he ashi 'i dyam or titi ye.
42016011	Gbe bendi be fe lityam ha awo he 'ukwo ahwu wo kam bingbebb abe he igye anyin or ye, ayang ù nya be fe lityam ha awo he bingbebb bigyang abi he lifung-atabe?
42016012	Gbe wo kam àshi undi-iso ngbebb-ngbebb ye, ayang ù ka-a àshi 'igang a?
42016013	"Ufee ken ù hà ndo fa bétyám befee ye. Gbe ná a ye, hà u tel angwu ken, ki nyin he lè angwell. U ka angwu ken ife, u bia angwell. Wò hà ndo fa Unim or, bìngbèbb or, nya 'ugbe ken ye."
42016014	Bendi Iferesis be gyo ashin. Be fel nyan Ujeso likorye 'i nyin ābe lè únde.
42016015	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Men na ma shi 'uhwo-men le mà kwu benunung he ashi bendigye. Unim a ngye àtyám āmen. Kiwom ashi undi u gim le 'i dyam kangg, kì yi Unim ufe 'iwom 'ibibi a.
42016016	"Iten angi Unim a ma ke Umosis or, biwom abi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be ma fee or, bi ma yi lè ikeb kpamm be kwom he 'unyong Ujon angwu u kib bendi he umbwo. Kung lè nya he 'unyong Ujon ana be fel bun 'isom 'inunung le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye. Undi uyang-yang ū kaa kangg he-e ù kwu lè abwo he 'usu 'umen ana.
42016017	Kì yi pie-pie ke lifung-atabe lè igye le bì mbee hwò ashi le ūwun or ù waa lè he afee Iten.
42016018	"Undi angwu a ndō ungye-ma lè kpebb ungye ususo, hà a shi 'iban agbele ipel ha undi. Undi angwu a kpebb ungingye angwu ukyema a ndō, hà a shi 'iban agbele ipel ha undi."
42016019	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "Ki ma yi lè undi-ingbebb ken. A maa fa bihwom binunung abi bı kaa 'ate kangg. U zī lizi linunung he liti liyang-yang.
42016020	Ki ma mbee yi lè undi-likaa ken angwu be maa ko le Ulazorlos. Inyiahwo ima i ma yi bibaa-bibaa. Be maa ba lè he ba ndor he ungwu likong undi-ingbebb,
42016021	he-e ù pan azi angi be wu lè hell zī. Ibua i ma be ndeb he bibaa.
42016022	He liti ken undi-likaa ana a hwō. Idengell Unim i ma be kung he lè kwu he ufaa Ebraham he 'ipi be shi 'ipam he lifung-atabe. Undi-ingbebb or titi a hwō; be ngi-e.
42016023	A ma yi he 'utor 'ukaandi he 'usu behwu. A bel àshì gye he 'usi ndè Ebraham lè Ulazorlos ha ahe ufaa há 'igbe-igbe hell.
42016024	A kung Ebraham ko, u de-e le: 'Atyagi, kusi kwu lè beshi ha ami, hā som Ulazorlos le ù lè tyua lishi udyong-bwo he umbwo be nung tye-m he 'abell, bwo mì yi he 'utor 'ukaandi he 'inde ashin.'
42016025	Ebraham a kung de-e le: 'Unwaa-gi, well le he 'unyong ahwu wo ma so uwum, wo ma yi lè binunung bigang puu, Ulazorlos u kpe bingie puu. Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i ufe u fel za 'inunung, wo-o shi he 'utor.
42016026	Fem ashin tyang, ùgbé ukaandi angwu a shul lungg ù yi li he 'udyan, le undi u gyong lè he 'ipi bel lì yi gya he 'ipi mà yi, ngwu undi ù gyong lè he 'ipi mà yi be ha abel nyin ye.'
42016027	Undi-ingbebb a fan le: 'Òr, Atyagi, mi tim-a anung le wò hā som Ulazorlos gye he ushaale atyagi he 'ipi mì yi lè bebwandagi bedyong.
42016028	Tyang he he-e ù lè ke be utebb kangg hè be bè nem be he 'iteng ashi 'utor nyin ye.'
42016029	Ebraham a kung de-e le: 'Umosis lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim bè yi há. Kì yi le bebwanaa bè gyo ashi abena be kong.'
42016030	Undi-ingbebb ana a fan le: 'Atyagi Ebraham, ashina 'ife-ife 'i kpè ye. Gbe undi a wum lè he lihwu, a lè de be, be ba sha beshi he biban, be tyang ābi ashele.'
42016031	Ebraham a de-e le: 'Gbe be dang 'utyung gyo Umosis lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim ye, hà undi ù wum lè he lihwu or, bè hà ndo gyo he ye.' "
42017001	Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le: "Kì yi kpe-kpe le igilale angi ı shi undi u shi 'iban i ba, ukpor 'i ba kwa 'ibibi ka undi angwu a be lè ngi.
42017002	Ki ngbebb le bè kung 'ukor 'ukaandi tye tyuú hē he umbell lè tye he umbwo ukaandi hwò ashi le ù shi unwan ken or ù shi 'iban.
42017003	He ashin mà baa 'uhwo-men he ashi ma shi. Gbe unwanaa a shi ban-a, wo ben he. Gbe a shi beshi, u tyang abwo, wo tyang ke-e.
42017004	Mà ù shi ban-a 'ugbe 'adyong-ifee or he liti ken or, gbe a be hwaa lè wo 'ugbe á 'adyong-ifee da-a le a shi beshi, kì yi kpe-kpe le wò tyang ke-e."
42017005	Bebwaa-isom Atyetyan Ujeso be de-e le: "Shi abongale utyan ha awo, ù dyam."
42017006	Atyetyan Ujeso a kung de le: "Gbe abongale ūmen a zen ná ùtǒng angwu a zen hwò puu or, ma da ùkwán ukaandi anwun le ù wob lè idaa lè kwan he umbwo ukaandi, u ka amen ife."
42017007	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Gbe undi ken he liwu līmen ù yi lè uboyi angwu pisoye u teb he abwom a, pisoye u kang he ìtiā a, kunyong ahwu uboyi ana a wee lè há be he ushu, átyám u da he le ù lè kwu ko akikye he-e ù zī lizi a?
42017008	Ù hà ndo da he ná ye. Ashi u de uboyi uma 'ì yi le ù shi lizi kung ndor he, ufe-gyang u za, u ngwo 'ingwungwo, saa uboyi ana u hà zī lima.
42017009	Uboyi ana a kpè le u kpa ipee lè he ashi atyam a de-e le ù shi ye.
42017010	Kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi lè men or. Gbe ma shi biwom puu abi be de men le mà shi, mà de le: 'Lì yi iboyi a, lì kee-kee shi ashi 'ì yi le iboyi ì shi a.' "
42017011	Ujeso a ma gbe he 'usu Usameria lè Ugalili gye he Ujeruselem.
42017012	Nya a na a maa ndo wu he ushokwo ususo a kpee lè bendi-akpaa lihwo. Be naa há 'igbe-igbe keb akyele fe Ujeso le: "Atyetyan Ujeso, hā kwu lè beshi ha abel."
42017014	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà te lè 'uhwo-men hè bendi abe be shang Unim bè nde men." Nya a na be te lè akwo, akpaa abell a taa.
42017015	Undi ken a nde le a mbee, a tem item lè 'igegaa he ungwu, u pee Unim.
42017016	A be tim anung he itang he 'ushu Ujeso pee he. Ungikye umen ana a maa ba lè he Usameria a.
42017017	Ujeso a kung bii le: "Mí yi mbee bendi lihwo ye a? Abe bedyong-inde bè yi hung a?
42017018	Undi angwu u be lè he ugugem ufe-ufe na a tem be pee Unim a?"
42017019	Ujeso a kung de ungikye ana le ù bo 'inaa ndo gye. Abongale uma a shi-e a mbee.
42017020	Bendi Iferesis be bii Ujeso 'unyong ahwu Unim u be be ná Usu. A fan ābe le: "Unim ù yi Usu he 'ukwo ahwu bendi be nde a ye.
42017021	Undi ù hà ndo da le, 'Mà nde, ù yi nyin!' or, ngwu 'Ù yi ana!' or ye, likorye Kusu Unim 'ù yi ha amen hen mà."
42017022	Ujeso a hà kung de bendi-utung bema le: "Kunyong u ba lè há ahwu ma fel be bell ibell le hang ma nde-m mi Unwaa Undigye liti ken or, ukpor ma ba nda-m ye.
42017023	Ki ba kwa lè bendi besuso abe be be de men le: 'Mà nde-e ù yi nyin, ma nde-e ù yi ana.' Gbe be be de men ná, mà pwom ābe le ma la nda-m ye,
42017024	likorye liti angi mi Unwaa Undigye mı be be li ba kwa gboo a ná 'indeb-nwaa 'ı ndeb he 'usi kung lè he 'igie ashin lè wu he 'igie ashell.
42017025	Kì yi kpe-kpe le mì kpe 'ingie kangg, bendi abe ati anyin be swan mi mà ukpong liti limen ana li hà be.
42017026	Nya a na 'i ma yi he 'unyong Unuwa, kitaa 'imen 'ı be kwu he 'unyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye mı be be.
42017027	Nya he 'unyong Unuwa bendi be maa za bizizi, be ngwo bingwungwo, bengikye be kpebb bengye, bengingye be gye abee kpamm lè kwom he liti angi Unuwa a ma mbo ngwee he afee 'inong lishor, umbwo u bé sho gwu abe be teng puu.
42017028	Ki mbee ba kwa ná he 'unyong Ulot nà. Bendi beyang-yang be maa za bizizi, be ngwo bingwungwo, be ndyebb biwom, be ndyebb biwom zi, be kwan ìtiá, be tye ishom.
42017029	He liti angi Ulot a ma bo lè he Usodem, Unim a som 'inde lè ubi be lè he lifung-atabe be shī gwu mbee ābe puu.
42017030	Kitaa 'imen na 'ı be kwu he 'unyong ahwu mi Unwaa Undigye mı be be.
42017031	"Gbe 'imen ana 'i be shi fe undi ha ahe ushom 'usi, ù tem shul gye he afee ushom le u la kung biwom bima ye. Kitaa 'ìmén undi angwu ù yi ha ahe útiá, ù tem gye he ushu ye.
42017032	Mà well ashi 'i ma shi ha ungye Ulot!
42017033	Undi angwu u kaa le u kpan lishi lima u ba nim likpan lima, ukpor angwu u bong lihwu u be kwu lè likpan.
42017034	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi befee be ba ndā he 'iteng ken lè 'usu. Unim u ba waa kung undi ken, angwu ken u ngyor.
42017035	Bengingye befee be ba ko biwom he 'iteng ken. Unim u ba waa kung undi ken, angwu ken u ngyor. [
42017036	Bengikye befee be ba kwa he útiá. Unim u ba waa kung undi ken, angwu ken u ngyor.]"
42017037	Bendi-utung bema be hà kung bii he le: "Atyetyan, he hung ashi 'imen ashin 'ı be kwu?" Ujeso a fan ābe he ityang le: "He 'ipi likwom lì yi, bipuuzabung bi gbong ba shwa há."
42018001	Ujeso a ma hà de be ityang anyin he-e ù hwua ābe le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le bè kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong, be wee abwo ye.
42018002	A de le: "Ki ma yi lè undi ken angwu u maa ishe he 'ubong 'ususo angwu a maa shell Unim or, ngwu 'ì gbee he lè undi or ye.
42018003	Ki ma mbee yi lè ungye-uhwuu há he 'ubong 'umen ana angwu a maa lè hwaa lè he mbee 'unyong kpamm le ù kpe-e tyang lè ha undi-linaa uma gbe he amaale ushe uma dell-dell.
42018004	"Umaa-ishe ana a kam le u fan he ye kpamm 'i lè gbe 'igbe. A hà kung kong ha 'uhwo-ma le: 'Mà na mı shell Unim ye, ki gbee mi lè undi ye or,
42018005	le bwo ungye-uhwuu anwun u fell mi 'uhwo 'indee-indee, mi ba nda le mi gyo ushe uma. Gbe ná a ye, u ba sha-m mi fel gogo ye gbe he abele uma hen mbee 'unyong.' "
42018006	Atyetyan Ujeso a hà mbee gye 'ushu kong le: "Mà gyo ashi undi ubibi umen angwu u maa ishe i a ma kong.
42018007	Unim u nya ka bendi bema abe be ki hwaa lè he ishu or, kusu or, likpong ye a? U nya fan ābe akikye ye a?
42018008	Mi da amen le u ka ābe likpong ban 'unyong ye. Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi nya ba nda bendi abe bé fe lityam ha ami he 'unyong ahwu mı be tem be a?"
42018009	Ujeso a ma mbee kung ityang anyin bun de bendi abe be pee 'uhwo-bell ná bè yi benunung, be bia bendi abe be teng puu ná bè yi bebibi.
42018010	A bun ityang ana de be le: "Bendi befee be ma gye he Ushom Unim le be la kong ha Unim. Undi angwu ken a ma yi undi Iferesis; angwu ken u kpe ukpanda.
42018011	Angwu Iferesis a lè naa utata keb akongale ha Unim lè 'uhwo-ma le: 'Unim, mi pee-a ná mì yi ná bendi abe be teng bè yi a ye. Mi sha uwub 'iwom ye; mi sha undi za ye; mi gba ipel ha undi-iso fem ungye-gi tyang ye. Mi mbee pee-a le mì yi ná undi angwu u kpe ukpanda ana a ye.
42018012	Mi ndo itung kong ha awo ati afee he utyong uyang-yang. He biwom puu, gbe mì yi lè biwom lihwo, mi waa ken ka-a.'
42018013	"Undi angwu u kpe ukpanda a lè naa há he item 'igbe-igbe keb àshì be he itang; u bua abwo he 'akem kung kong le: 'Unim, beshi bè sha-a lè mi undi-iban.' "
42018014	Ujeso a hà kung kong le: "Mi da amen le ungikye anwun na a gye he ushaale lè likpong he ashi Unim, angwu ù yi Iferesis a ye. Undi angwu a kung 'uhwo-ma gye he 'usi, Unim u keb he ba he itang. Angwu a keb 'uhwo-ma be he itang, Unim u kung he gye he 'usi."
42018015	Bendi besuso be be lè bebwaa-bell le Ujeso ù tyua ābe abwo. Bendi-utung Ujeso be nde be. Be ma swan ndō ābe.
42018016	Ujeso a ko bebwani hwaa lè 'uhwo-ma. U de bendi-utung bema le: "Mà tyang bebwani bè be hwaa lè mi. Mà ndō ābe ye, likorye abe 'itaa i na Unim ù yi Usu ubell.
42018017	Mi kee le mà ngye le undi uyang-yang angwu a keb 'uhwo-ma ke Unim le ù kwu Usu uma ná unwani ye, u kwa lè libwo he Kusu Unim ye."
42018018	Ukaandi Ijuus ususo a bii Ujeso le: "Ukaandi ununung, mì shi ná a, mî kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm?"
42018019	Ujeso a kung bii he le: "Kibang a, wo ko mi le undi ununung? Kì yi lè undi ununung ye, Unim ufe-ufe na ù yi ununung.
42018020	Wo ngye iten angi i de le: 'Gbe ipel ha undi-iso fem ungye-gang tyang ye. Gwu undi ye. Zì 'azi ye. Bè uman fe undi ye. Fe atia lè anaa.' "
42018021	Ungikye anwuna a de-e le a ndor iten anyin puu kung lè há he 'isun 'ima.
42018022	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a gyo he a kong ashin, a de-e le: "Ki teng le wò shi 'iwom ken. Lè kung biwom bigang puu ndyebb zi, kung únde hwua ke bendi-likaa, mà wo ba kwa lè 'ingbebb he lifung-atabe. Mà wò hà be pwom he."
42018023	He 'unyong ahwu a gyo ashin, a fel lè 'imbwee, likorye a ma mbu 'ingbebb kangg.
42018024	Ujeso a nde le a fel he 'imbwee, a kung de le: "Kì yi lè 'ingie kangg ke bendi-ingbebb le bè keb 'uhwo-bell ke Unim le ù kwu Usu ubell.
42018025	Ashi le 'igundu 'ì gbe he ligia uwo 'ì yi pie-pie hwò ashi le undi-ingbebb ù keb 'uhwo-bell ke Unim le ù kwu Usu uma nà."
42018026	Bendi abe be gyo he be bii le: "Fe ayang ù ha be kwu lè likpan 'unyong?"
42018027	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Biwom abi bendigye be shi ābi mbee ye, Unim u sha ābi pie-pie."
42018028	Ipita a de-e le: "Nde, li tyang biwom bityan puu, fel bendi-utung begang."
42018029	Ujeso a de be le: "Ki ngbebb. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi undi a gbe tyang āshi he 'uhwo Kusu Unim, mà 'ì yi ushu or, ungye or, bebwaa or, bebwanam or, átyám or, anam or, mi da amen 'igyang le undi umen ana u kpa lifem hwà abina tyang 'usi-usi he igye i, u be kpe likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm he igye angi ı be lè há 'ushu."
42018031	Ujeso a ko bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee gye he ufaa, kung de be le: "Mà gyo, li gya he Ujeruselem he 'ipi ashi biwom puu bı be shi nya a na bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be fee gbe lè mi Unwaa Undigye.
42018032	Undi u ba kung mi ka bendi abe bè yi 'ubong 'utyan a ye. Bendi bemen i be ba nyan mi, be bia mi, be sho akung wu-m.
42018033	Be ba kpam mi ikwun, be hà gwu-m. He liti angi lekie mi ba tem wum lè he lihwu."
42018034	Ki nung bendi-utung Ujeso lè biwom abin ye. Kiwom ashi igie anyin i ze 'i ma yi he 'undyell lè ha abe. Be ma ngye 'iwom ashi Ujeso u kong gbe lè shi ye.
42018035	Ujeso a ma be fel kpee-kpee he Ujeriko. Uhwua-ashi ken a ma yi kwu he 'ukwo, u nyong 'inyong.
42018036	A gyo bendi gbamm be gbe há. A bii le: "Kibang 'i baa?"
42018037	Be de-e le Ujeso angwu Unazaret u ba lè há.
42018038	U fel gaa le: "Ujeso, igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha ami!"
42018039	Bendi abe ha ahe 'ushu be gaa fe-e le ù naa lè 'ihwee. A mbee gaa kangg le: "Igia Udebid, kwu lè beshi ha ami!"
42018040	Ujeso a hà naa, som ko he. He 'unyong ahwu a be hwaa lè he, Ujeso a bii he le:
42018041	"Kibang wo kee le mì shi ka-a?" A de le: "Ukaandi, mi kee le mi mbee ndà."
42018042	Ujeso a de-e le: "Abongale ugang a sha-a wo mbee."
42018043	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo u fel ndà. A pwom Ujeso, u pee Unim. Bendi puu abe be nde ashi 'i shi be pee Unim.
42019001	Ujeso a ma lè gbe he Ujeriko.
42019002	Ki ma yi lè ungikye ken angwu be maa ko le Uzakiyos há. A ma yi ukaandi angwu u kpe ukpanda a; u shi undi-ingbebb.
42019003	A maa kaa he-e ù nde Ujeso, he-e ù ngye 'itaa undi ashi ù yi. A maa nda he ye, likorye bendi be ma sho há kangg, u shi undi ugem a.
42019004	A hà buu gbe tyang liwu bendi abena lè mbo so he ukwan ukaandi angwu be ko le usikamor he-e ù nde Ujeso, bwo 'i ma yi le Ujeso u gba he 'ukwo 'umen ana a.
42019005	Nyong Ujeso a be fel há he 'ipi ukwan ana ù yi, a bel àshì nde Uzakiyos gye há he 'usi. U de-e le: "Uzakiyos, shul be he itang akikye, likorye ha awo ushom na mı lè kwu 'unyin."
42019006	Uzakiyos a shul be he itang nya 'ukwo-ukwo be kong lè Ujeso, u kpe-e lè igor gye he ushu.
42019007	Bendi puu abe be nde ashina be keb inem anemale le ungikye anwun a gbe le u la ngyor he ushom undi-iban.
42019008	Uzakiyos a die lè naa Ujeso he 'ushu de-e le: "Ukaandi, gyo mi. Mi kung biwom bigi puu hwua he biteng bifee; mi kung likwu ken ka bendi-likaa. Gbe mi ma shi undi zī, mi fel hwee undi angwu há bun bee 'ugbe 'ande."
42019009	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Likpan 'unyong li fel ha bendi abe he ushom ugang anwun 'unyin, likorye wo or wò yi igia Ebraham a.
42019010	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi be he igye anyin le mî kee àbe be nim, mi kpan ābe a."
42019011	Bendi abe be maa gyo he be maa fel gim le, gbe Ujeso a wu he Ujeruselem wu-wu á na 'i fel 'unyong ahwu Unim ù fel Usu mbee bipi puu. Bwo Ujeso a ma ngye ashi be gim, a kung ityang bun de be he-e ù shi 'ì nung ābe gbe lè 'unyong ahwu Unim ù fel Usu.
42019012	A de le: "Ukaandi ken a ma kam le u gya litan he 'ubong ahwu 'ù yi lè 'igbe kangg hè be bè lè kwu-e 'usu, u hà tem be.
42019013	Mà ukpong u hà gbe, a ko bendi aki bema, bendi lihwo. A ke undi-undi ugaa ukwudi. A hà de be le bè shi ūshī lè únde umen ana kpamm nyong he lè he 'ipi u gye.
42019014	Bendi bema be maa tel he. Be hà som bendi gye há lè de ukaandi angwu u kwu-e 'usu le be kee le ungikye umen i ù kwu usu ubell ye.
42019015	"Mà na or, be ma kwu-e 'usu. A hà tem be he ushu. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo a ko bendi aki bema abe a ma ke be únde le bè be he-e ù nde lifem libell.
42019016	Ukpi-ikwu undi a be de-e le: 'Ukaandi, mi shì ūshī lè ugaa ukwudi angwu wo ma ke-m. Lifem angi li be lè há, lì yi igaa ikwudi lihwo.'
42019017	Átyám a de-e le: 'Wo shi dii. Wò yi undi aki ununung a. Le bwo wo shi aki angi zangg lityam ken, mi sha-a wo fel usu abong lihwo.'
42019018	"Angwu lefee u bé de-e le: 'Ukaandi, lifem angi li be lè he ugaa ukwudi angwu wo ma ke-m lì yi igaa ikwudi idyong.'
42019019	A de anwun le: 'Mi sha-a wo fel usu abong adyong.'
42019020	"Angwu lekie a be. A de atyam le: 'Ukaandi, nde ugaa ukwudi ugang. Mi bua he fe he 'ihwom ndor-a.
42019021	Mi shell-a likorye wò yi ukaa-ukaa. Wo kpā kung biwom lè ha bendi abi bì yi bigang a ye; wo zī biwom bendi likor-likor.'
42019022	Átyám a kung de-e le: 'Wo undi aki ubibi, igie igang igyang na ı be lè libi ka-a. Wo ngye le mì yi ukaa-ukaa. Mi kpā kung bendi biwom abi bì yi bigi a ye; mi zī 'iwom undi likor-likor.
42019023	Kibang a, wo ma te lè únde angwu mi ka-a lè fe he ubank ye? Hang nyong 'ì yi i, mi tem kpa únde ugi lè lifem.'
42019024	"A hà kung de bendi abe be ma yi naa há le: 'Mà kpe kung ugaa ukwudi angwu ù yi lè he ke undi angwu ù yi lè igaa ikwudi lihwo.'
42019025	Be kung de-e le: 'Ukaandi, ufe a fel lè igaa ikwudi lihwo mà.'
42019026	A kung de be le: 'Mi kee le mà ngye le undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'iwom na Unim u mbee be ke-e he-e ù fel lè shi 'ì go; ukpor undi angwu ù yi lè 'iwom ye, ake ù yi lè ke zangg or, Unim u ba pan kpa kúng he áke.
42019027	Bendi-linaa begi abe be ma kee le mì kwu usu ubell ye nyin, befe, mà be lè be gwu ābe he atong-shi agi.' "
42019028	Ujeso a mbee lè ashi a maa kong nya abwo, a hà gbe tyang ābe ndo he Ujeruselem.
42019029	Nya a na a maa ndo wu he ishokwo Befeji lè Beteni he liten ukwell angwu be ko le Olif, a som bendi-utung bema, abe befee, gye he 'ushu.
42019030	A de be le: "Mà gye he 'ubong ahwu 'ù yi he 'ushu ana. Ma la wa há, ma nda ūshōm 'ukaa-inyia ahwu undi a wa pwom āhwu ngye ye, tyuu há he ungwu likong. Mà pell āhwu be lè hwu.
42019031	Pi undi a bii amen atan-lengi angwu ma pell kung āhwu, mà de-e le 'i fong Atyamen lè hwu."
42019032	Bendi-utung bema bemen befee ana be te lè nde 'iwom 'iyang-yang nya a na Ujeso a de be.
42019033	Nya a na be maa pell ūshōm 'ukaa-inyia ana, bendi abe bè yi lè hwu be bii ābe le 'ibang a, be pell kung āhwu?
42019034	Be fan le: "Ki fong Atyetyan lè hwu."
42019035	Be be lè 'ukaa-inyia ana ke Ujeso. Bendi-utung Ujeso be kung bihwom bibell shī āhwu he item, be kwu Ujeso abwo mbo kwu há.
42019036	Bendi be kung bihwom bibell kie lè 'ukwo lè 'ukwo hè Ujeso ù pwom 'ukaa-inyia gbe há.
42019037	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma fel kpee-kpee he Ujeruselem he 'ipi be shul ukwell angwu umen be ko le Olif nyin, bendi abe be ma ti kwuo pwom he, be ma keb Unim apeeale lè igor. Be gaa pee he he biwom bikaandi puu abi be ndè.
42019038	Be maa pee le: "Unim ù ke usu 'ukwun angwu u be he lizen lima ufe Atyetyan Unim. Ikwun ì kwu he lifung-atabe; ipee ì kwu ke Unim."
42019039	Iferesis isuso lè há he liwu i kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, de bendi-utung begang bè naa lè 'ihwee."
42019040	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà ngye le gbe bendi aben be kwun atyung, akor a kpa ābe lishi gaa pee Unim."
42019041	Ujeso a mbee die fel kpee-kpee he Ujeruselem a nde 'ubong, u fel kya bendi abe há,
42019042	de le: "Ayang a kpē le ma ngye 'ukwo ahwu mà kung shì be lè ikwun or! Ukpor ma nda āhwu 'anaa-anaa i ye.
42019043	Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu bendi-linaa bēmen be be kaa kel-kel fe men le mà nem gbe be he igye ye.
42019044	Be be gwu mbee amen puu, be kem ban biwom puu. Kukor ken or ahwu ma tye uging, ku ba ngyor pwom he 'ipi be pwom āhwu ye, likorye ma ma ngye 'unyong ahwu Unim a som Undi-likpan le he-e ù kpan amen ye."
42019045	Ujeso a gye he afee Ushom Unim lè ndeb lè bendi-ūshī lè há he Ushom Unim wu he igye.
42019046	U de be le be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le Unim a de le be ba ko Ushom uma le 'iteng ashi bendi be kong ha ahe. Ukpor be shi-e a bel 'iteng ashi be ndyell zì 'azi.
42019047	Ujeso a hwua bendi he Ushom Unim mbee ati. Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten, lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong be kee le be gwa he,
42019048	ukpor be maa nda 'ukwo ahwu be gwu-e ye, likorye bendi puu be gya 'ushu gyo he. Be kee le be gyo he teng likpe ken or ye.
42020001	He liti ken nyong Ujeso a maa hwua bendi he Ushom Unim, u bun 'isom 'inunung de be, bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten, lè abe he 'ubong be be ukem ken hwaa lè he,
42020002	bii he le: "De li, lè hung wo be lè ikeb angi wō-ò shi biwom abi bimen i? Ayang a ka-a ikeb imen i?"
42020003	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi bii amen 'ibibi ken ukpong. Mà de-m,
42020004	Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb angi Unim â, hà angi undigye á?"
42020005	Be maa fel tyāng lè bende le: "Lì hà fan le ana? Gbe li de le Ujon a kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb Unim a, Ujeso u bii li le fe 'ibang 'i tan lè shi li bong ha Ujon ye?
42020006	Ukpor gbe li de le Ujon a kib bendi he umbwo he ikeb angi undigye a, bendi aben be ba maa akor gwa li, likorye be bong le Ujon u tya ugie 'isom Unim a na afong."
42020007	Be hà kung fan le be ngye he 'ipi ikeb imen ana i be ye.
42020008	Ujeso a de be le: "Mi or mi da amen undi angwu a ke-m ikeb angi mı shi biwom bimen i ye."
42020009	Ujeso a kung de bendi ityang anyin: "Ungikye ususo a ma nam ùtiá, kwan ikwan angi be bung agbe ángi shi 'utyuo. A kung ùtiá ana ke bendi le bè nde gbe lè he. A hà bo ndo litan lè kwu há gbe 'igbe.
42020010	He 'unyong ahwu ikwan anyina i wum, a som ufee uma hwaa lè bendi abe be nde gbe lè ùtiá le ù kpe ūkpō uma be ke-e. Bendi abena be kwu-e kpam, ndó he tem abubwo.
42020011	A mbee som ufee ususo te. Bendi abena be kpam he ikwun, shi-e u fel ibia-ibia, ndó he tem abubwo.
42020012	A mbee som ufee angwu lekie. Be do he ufe or titi, be mbee ndó he.
42020013	Ugyang útia a de le: 'Mì shi ná a? Mi ba som unwaa-gi lityam. Kì shi na ana or, be ba ka he ufe ife.'
42020014	Bendi abe be nde gbe lè ùtiá ana be nde-e, be de bende le: 'Anwun na u be zī lishi lima; mà lì gwu-e hè ùtiá anwun ù fel utyan.'
42020015	Be ndó he lè há útiá, be lè kwu-e gwu." Ujeso a hà bii àbe be gyo he le: "Ugyang utia u nya sha ābe ná a?"
42020016	A tem lè shi fan le: "U la gwa bendi abena tem kpa bendi besuso le bè nde gbe lè ùtiá." Nyong ahwu be gyo ashin, be de le: "Unim ù bong ye."
42020017	Ujeso a nde be kporr, u bii le: "Ashi be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le, 'Kukor ahwu bendi abe be tye ushom be swan āhwu le 'u ngbebb he ushom atyele ye, kufe na 'u tem fel kwu ushom naa genn,' ki ze le ana?
42020018	Undi uyang-yang angwu a mbu pwom nya he likwu 'ukor 'umen ana u ba bun he ātè-ātè. Gbe 'ukor 'umen ana 'u mbu kpǒ he, ku kpò mbyor he."
42020019	Bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten befe lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim be ma kee le be kwa Ujeso nya he abwo-abwo likorye be ngye le a maa bun ityang anyin gba lè befe a. Be maa shell bendi ná be kwu-e.
42020020	Be maa fel kang hè be bè nde libwo kwu-e. Be hà ndyebb abwo ha bendi besuso le bè lè tyua Ujeso hè be bè gyo ashi u kong. Pisoye u fan umbeb hè be bè kwu-e lè ke usu angwu u nde gbe lè 'ubong 'ubell.
42020021	Bendi bemen i be kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, li ngye le biwom abi wo kong lè abi wo hwua bendi bì yi bigyang. Li ngye le bendi puu bè yi-a 'itaa ken, wo hwua bendi puu 'igyang gbe lè 'ukwo Unim.
42020022	De li ashin, Iten ityan i bong le lì tye ukpanda ke Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom à, hà lì tye ke-e ye?"
42020023	Ujeso a ngye beshu bebell, a hà kung de be le:
42020024	"Mà tyung mi ukwudi." Be be lè he, a bii ābe le: "Lìshī ayang lè lizen ayang, be fee fe nyin?"
42020025	Be fan he le: "Angi Usu ukaandi he Urom a." Ujeso a kung de be le: "Gbe 'ì yi ná, ashi 'ì yi ashi Usu, mà kung ke Usu, ashi 'ì yi ashi Unim, mà kung ke Unim."
42020026	Nya he liwu bendi, kì yi lè ashi a kong shang hè be bè kwu-e ye. Be ma fel kwu kporr, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo ná a fan ābe ashin.
42020027	Bendi Isadusis be bong le undi u wum lè he lihwu ye. Bendi lè he liwu libell be be hwaa lè Ujeso.
42020028	Be de-e le: "Ukaandi, Umosis a ma fee uten ndor li le: 'Gbe undi a hwō tyang ungye faale unwaa, kì yi kpe-kpe le unwanam ù kpebb kung ungye-uhwuu ana hè ūbū ungwende angwu a hwō ù nim ye.'
42020029	He 'unyong 'ususo, ki ma yi lè bengikye bedyong-ifee abe bè yi bebwanam bende. Angwu gbel a kpebb ungye. A hwō tyang he faale unwaa.
42020030	Angwu a pwom lè he, a kpebb kung ungye-uhwuu ana mbee hwō tyang he.
42020031	Angwu lekie 'itaa 'imen. Ki shi fe bebwanam bende bedyong-ifee ana nya 'itaa ken. Puu ubell undi-undi a kpebb he hwō tyang he faale unwaa.
42020032	Angwu ungingye a hà hwō.
42020033	He 'unyong ahwu be bé wum lè he lihwu, ungingye anwun u ba kwa ungye ayang a, bwo befe a puu bedyong-ifee be kpebb he, hwō tyang he?"
42020034	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Bengikye abe he igye anyin be kpebb bengye, bengingye be gye abee.
42020035	Ukpor bendi abe be kpè le be wum lè he lihwu abe be bé kwu he igye angi ı be lè há, bè tem ba bee abee ye.
42020036	Be ba fel nya a na idengell Unim a, be hwa ye likorye ná bebwaa Unim be wum lè he lihwu.
42020037	Umosis a tyung nwongg le bendi be ba wum lè he lihwu. He 'iteng 'ushia ashi a fee gbe lè ùkwán angwu 'inde 'i maa mor a ko Atyetyan le Unim angwu Ebraham, lè Azik lè Ujekob.
42020038	He 'unyong ahwu a kong ashin, bendi bemen ana be hwō he agwo mà, ukpor bè yi bewum he ashi Unim. Ashin 'i tyung le ù yi Unim bendi abe bè yi bewum ngyor igye a."
42020039	Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten be de-e le: "Ukaandi, wo fan nya dell-dell."
42020040	Be maa tem mba lityam bii he bibibi ye.
42020041	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Ki nya tan ná a, be de le Ukristi a fel igia Udebid?
42020042	Be fee he 'ushia Usam le Udebid a kong le: 'Unim a de Atyagi le ù be kwu ha ahe 'ubwo lizen
42020043	kpamm u gbe tem bendi-linaa bema abee fe he itang.'
42020044	Udebid a ko Ukristi le Atyam. Ná 'ì nya shi Ukristi u tem fel igia ima?"
42020045	Nya a na bendi abe be sho há be maa gyo Ujeso, a de bendi-utung bema le:
42020046	"Mà baa 'uhwo-men lè ha bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten. Ki nyin ābe le bè shī agbada tan he 'ate hè bendi bè ko ābe le bekaandi. Be kee bidem abi be ndor bekaandi bendi he ishom angi be kwu liwu or, he bipam or.
42020047	Be kpa bengye-uhwuu biwom za. Be kong ha Unim gba 'igbe hè bendi bè de le bè yi bendi benunung a. Be ba kpa 'ingie hwà bendi abe be teng puu."
42021001	Ujeso a ma bel àshì nde ná bendi-ingbebb be be lè únde ubell fe he 'igbor ashi be fe únde he Ushom Unim.
42021002	A mbee ndè ungye-uhwuu angwu ù yi likaa-likaa a be lè ideli ifee fe há.
42021003	A hà de le: "Mí-ì de men 'igyang, ungye-uhwuu angwu ù yi likaa-likaa nyin, a ke hwò bendi abe be teng puu.
42021004	Bendi abe be teng be già igia be ke, ukpor undi-likaa anwun a kung 'iwom ashi 'i teng le ù ndyebb lizi or, be ke puu."
42021005	Bendi besuso be maa kong gba lè 'itaa be tye Ushom Unim a ngbebb. Be kong gbe lè akor angi be kung shi-e lè beke abe be ke. Ujeso a hà kung de be le:
42021006	"Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu ushom angwu ma nde i u be gyebb, kukor ken or 'u tem be ngyor pwom he 'ipi be pwom āhwu ye. A ba gyebb wa he itang puu."
42021007	Be bii he le: "Ukaandi, kunyong ahwu yang 'iwom ashin 'ı be shi? Kibang 'iwom ashi 'ı be shi tyung li le 'unyong ahwu 'iwom ashin 'ı shi 'u fel?"
42021008	Ujeso a de le: "Mà baa teng undi u lam amen. Bebwaa-isom gbamm be ba ba he lizen ligi, da le bè yi Ukristi a, kunyong 'u fel mà. Mà shī be pwom ābe ye.
42021009	Mà shell he 'unyong ahwu ma gyo gbe lè bekye lè ànaà ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le abin bì shi, ukpor umbee-likel ati igye anyin a wa fel ye."
42021010	A gye 'ushu de be le: "Abong-abong a ba ndo ha bende; ufam-ufam u be ndo ha bende.
42021011	Isun i ba kwuo mbee bipi; itung i be ndo bendi kangg; angmam angi a gbe undi a ba kwa mbee bipi. Biwom bibibi lè abi bı shi bendi be fel shell bi ba kwa he 'usi.
42021012	"Mà ukpong biwom abin puu bi hà shi mbee, bendi be ba kwa amen, be ke men 'ingie. Be ba kung amen ka bekaandi hè be bè maa amen ushe he ishom ibell angi be kwu liwu. Be fa amen he igaadye. Be ba ta lè men la hwaa lè besu lè bekaandi he 'uhwo 'ugi.
42021013	Ashin 'i ba kwa libwo ka amen le mà bun 'isom 'inunung de be.
42021014	Igim ì kwu amen kpatiaa, mà fel waa ufung gbe lè 'itaa ashi ma lè maa ushe ye,
42021015	likorye mi ba ka amen igie angi dangg hè bendi-linaa bēmen bè be hwò amen or, ngwu bè swan igie īmen or ye.
42021016	Betyamen or, bendamen or, bebwandamen or, behwan-men or, bedim-men or, be ba kung amen ka le bè gwu, be be gwu amen besuso.
42021017	Bendi puu be ba tel amen he 'uhwo 'ugi.
42021018	Ukpor udal ugil ūmen ken or u waa nim ye.
42021019	Mà ngyor naa genn hè men mà be kwu lè likpan 'unyong."
42021020	Ujeso a mbee kong le: "He 'unyong ahwu ma be nde ishogya ı kaa kel-kel fe Ujeruselem ma ngye le baa be ban he.
42021021	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi abe bè yi he 'ubong Ujudia bè buu gye he ikwell 'usi. Bendi abe bè yi he Ujeruselem bè buu lè há, bendi abe bè yi he igye bè tem gye he Ujeruselem ye.
42021022	Kunyong 'umen ana 'u ba kwa 'unyong 'ingie a, hè abi be fee fe he 'ushia Unim leěti bì shi nya a na be fee.
42021023	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka bengingye azam lè abe bè yi lè bebwaa he abwo. Kingie 'ikaandi 'i ba kwa hen he 'ubong 'ūmen; ingywo Unim i ba kwa ha bendi bemen i.
42021024	Bendi-linaa be ba gwa besuso he 'ukye, be be kwu besuso gye lè be he abwo lifee mbee abong. Bendi abe be ngye Unim ye be ba ngwee Ujeruselem kpa kung he kpamm 'unyong bēndi bemen abe be ngye Unim ye i 'u gbe mbee."
42021025	"Bitaa bi ba fem he libwee lè 'ufell lè ikpen. Àtyám bendi abe he abong puu he igye i a ba ngyor ābe he 'usi-usi-usi, be be shell 'ihwee ashi umbwo ukaandi u hwee kangg. Bè nem ba ngya ná be shi or ye.
42021026	Kushell 'u ba kwun bendi abwo nya a na be kwu nyong 'iwom ashi 'i ndo shi he igye anyin, likorye ikeb angi he 'usi i paa he abwo.
42021027	Bendi be ba nda-m mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ba lè he 'usi lè ikeb lè 'ikung-gbo.
42021028	He 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı keb ashele mà bo 'inaa nde àshì gye he 'usi likorye 'unyong ahwu Unim u be kpan amen 'u fel he abwo."
42021029	Ujeso a hà de bendi-utung bema ityang le: "Mà gim gbe lè ùkwán angwu be ko le ufik lè ìkwán angi i teng puu.
42021030	He 'unyong ahwu ma nde ngi i ndo hwaa ashia a, ma ngya le 'ifong 'i ndo shul.
42021031	Kitaa a ken, kunyong ahwu ma nde biwom abin bı shi, ma ngye le Unim u ndo fem Kusu 'uma he igye.
42021032	"Mi da amen 'igyang a le biwom abin puu bi ba sha mà ukpong ugbe bendi abe bè yi he igye 'unyin i u hà be hwō mbee.
42021033	Lifung-atabe lè igye bi ba mbee, ukpor igie igi ife ì hà ndo mbee ye, i kwa ngyor igye kpamm."
42021034	"Mà baa 'uhwo-men, ma tyang bipam, lè bingwungwo lè biwom igye anyin bi kpe kung àtyám āmen ye. Gbe ma baa ye, liti limen ana li ba tya amen imbul
42021035	ná 'ikpamkpor. Liti limen ana li ba hwaa lè bendi puu mbee igye.
42021036	Mà kwu lè 'akang, ma kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong hè men mà be kwu lè ikeb hwò biwom puu abi bı be shi, ma naa he ashi agi mi Unwaa Undigye mbee."
42021037	Ujeso a maa kung ati amen ana hwua bendi he Ushom Unim. Nyong likwulukwu li gyebb, u tem gye he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif lè ngyor há.
42021038	Ashi a taa leèti-leèti, bendi be ngywà gya he Ushom Unim la gyo he.
42022001	Kunyong 'u ma fel kpee-kpee le bè shi 'ipam ashi be zi ibred angi i mbwee ye, ashi be ko le Kipam Agbele-gyong.
42022002	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be maa shell bendi. He ashina be maa kee 'ukwo ahwu be kwu Ujeso gwu he 'undyell.
42022003	Usetan a ma kpe kung lityam Ujudas angwu be mbee ko le Isikariyot, angwu a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung Ujeso, bendi lihwo lè be befee.
42022004	Ujudas a lè hwaa lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi bendi abe be kang Ushom Unim, he-e ù kong ha abe gbe lè 'itaa u be ndyebb Ujeso zi ha abe.
42022005	Be ma fel lè igor, be ke-e úkyébb le be ba ka he únde.
42022006	Ujudas a bong, u fel kee 'ukwo ahwu u kwu Ujeso ke be hè bendi bè ngye gbe lè shi ye.
42022007	Nya he 'unyong ahwu be maa zī ibred angi i mbwee ye ana, liti li hà fel angi be gwu inwaa itia angi Kipam Agbele-gyong.
42022008	Ujeso a som Ipita lè Ujon gye he igye. A de be le: "Mà lè kam li Kipam Agbele-gyong hè li lì zī."
42022009	Be bii he le, he hung a kee le bè kwu shi Kipam Agbele-gyong?
42022010	A de be le: "Mà gyo. Nya a na ma gye he lifung-ushu, ma la kpee ha ungikye ken angwu a so 'ishang umbwo. Mà pwom he gye he ushaale angwu u gye.
42022011	Mà lè de ugyang ushaale le ukaandi a bii le ushom angwu hung nyin befe lè bendi-utung bema be be kwu shi Kipam Agbele-gyong?
42022012	Nyin u tyung amen 'ipo ashi 'i dyam he ushom 'usi ashi be kam biwom ndor há. Mà lè shi lizi ndor há."
42022013	Be bo lè nde biwom puu nya a na Ujeso a de be. Be shi lizi angi be zī he Kipam Agbele-gyong.
42022014	Kunyong 'u fel há, Ujeso a kwu ko utung ha bebwaa-isom bema abe lihwo lè be befee hè be bè zī lizi.
42022015	A de be le: "Mì yi lè 'igyor kangg le mi za Kipam Agbele-gyong utung ha amen mà ukpong mi hà kpe 'ingie.
42022016	Mi da amen le, mì tem ba sha 'ipam ashin ye kpamm atan-lengi 'ipam 'imen i u shi he 'unyong ahwu Unim u fel Usu bendi puu."
42022017	Ujeso a hà kpe ugbaala kwu he 'ubwo pee Unim. A de le: "Mà kpe ngwo teng ke bende.
42022018	Mi da amen le kung lè há 'unyin, mì tem ngwa udung agbe ukwan anwun ye kpamm Unim u fel Usu mbee bipi puu."
42022019	A hà kpe ibred kwu he abwo, mbee pee Unim. A kung ibred bun ibun ibun ibun ke be. U de be le: "Ashin na 'ì yi agwo agi [ angi mı bun ke he 'uhwo 'umen. Mà gye 'ushu shi ashi mi shi hè men mà well gbe lè mi."
42022020	Be zī lizi puu, a kung ugbaala 'utyuo ke be 'itaa ken. U de be le: "Ugbaala anwun u tyung 'iwom 'ifufe ashi Unim a kong ndor le u sha ka amen gbe he anung agi angi mi wu ke men.]
42022021	Mà gyo! Undi angwu a ndyebb mi zi ù yi hen he itebul utung ha ami.
42022022	Mi Unwaa Undigye, mi hwa ná Unim a kong a. Ukpor 'i ba kwa 'ibibi ka undi angwu a ndyebb mi zi."
42022023	Be keb bende abiale le ayang he liwu libell ù nya be shi 'imen i?
42022024	Bendi-utung Ujeso be hà keb be kin undi angwu u be kwu ukaandi hwò puu he liwu libell.
42022025	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Besu abe he igye anyin bè yi lè ikeb hwò bendi bebell; be ko 'uhwo-bell le bedim bendi bemen ana.
42022026	Ukpor men mà yi 'itaa ana a ye. Men ufe, undi angwu ù yi ukaandi hwò puu ù kwu ná unwani nà. Undi angwu ù yi atie-lishi ūmen ù kwu ná uboyi.
42022027	Undi angwu ù yi kwu ko u zi lizi befe lè undi angwu u kung lizi ke-e, angwu ayang a dyam hwò? Undi angwu a kwu ko a. Ukpor mi-ì yi utung ha amen ná undi angwu u kung lizi ke nà.
42022028	Mā ngyor kwu utung ha ami he 'unyong ahwu mí kpe bingie.
42022029	Nya a na Atyagi a ke-m ikeb le mì nde gbe lè bendi, na mi or titi mı ke men 'itaa ikeb imen ana.
42022030	Men ma ba za bizizi, ma ngwo bingwungwo utung ha ami he Kiteng-usu 'igi. Ma be kwu he bidem 'usu maa ashi Izwell angi lihwo lè ngi afee ushe."
42022031	Ujeso a kung Ipita ko le Usaimun, u de-e le: "Usetan a kpe ikeb le he-e ù gil amen puu ná undi-utia u puu ityungkafa.
42022032	Ukpor mi kong ha Unim ka-a, awo Usaimun, le wò tyang abongale ye. He 'unyong ahwu wo be tem hwaa lè mi, wo fe bebwanaa ingie."
42022033	Ipita a kung de-e le: "Atyagi, mi kam le mi gya igaadye or, mi hwō or utung ha awo."
42022034	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Ipita, mî da-a le 'unyin wo swan 'ugbe 'akie le wo ngye-m ye mà ukpong 'igia ukwuo 'i hà ko."
42022035	Ujeso a kung bii ābe nya puu le: "He 'unyong ahwu mi ma som amen gye he igye faale ibam únde lè ibam lizi lè ikwob abee, kiwom 'i ma baa amen há a?" Be fan he le: "Kiwom ken or 'i ma baa li ye."
42022036	Ujeso a de be le: "Kanaa-anaa i ufe angwu ù yi lè ibam unde or, ibam lizi or, ù kung ābi. Undi angwu ù yi lè 'ashwia ye ù waa aliga ama ndyebb zi he-e ù ndyebb 'ashwia.
42022037	Mà ngye dangg le ashi be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le, 'Be bo he fe he liwu bendi-iban,' ki ba sha fa-m. Kiwom ashi be ma fee gbe lè mi 'i ndo sha."
42022038	Bendi-utung bema be kung de-e le: "Atyetyan, nde lishwia lì yi i lifee." A de be le: "Anyina li kpè."
42022039	Ujeso a kung bo gye he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif nya a na u shaa shi. Bendi-utung bema be gbe utung ha ahe.
42022040	A lè wu há, a de be le: "Mà kong ha Unim hè men mà mbu he ugilale ye."
42022041	A gbe tyang ābe nya lè 'igbe ná hang undi u maa 'ukor 'u lè mbu. A bel tim anung he itang keb akongale ha Unim.
42022042	A de le: "Ada, gbe 'ì yi he ugim ugang a, wo kung 'ingie ashin lè ha ami. Kì shi ná mi-i kee a ye, ukpor kì shi ná wo-o kee a."[
42022043	Udengell Unim a be lè he lifung-atabe be hwaa lè he, u fe-e ingie.
42022044	Ujeso a maa fel kong ha Unim kangg likorye a ma yi lè 'utor he lityam kangg. Kushi ahwu 'u maa nung lè ha ahe 'uhwo 'u ma yi ná anung.]
42022045	A bo 'inaa lè he 'ipi u kong ha Unim lè hwaa lè bendi-utung bema. A nde be be mbu 'unde, be ma yi lè 'imbwee kangg.
42022046	A bii ābe le: "Ma mbwa 'unde â? Mà bo 'inaa kong ha Unim hè men mà mbu he ugilale ye."
42022047	Nya a na Ujeso a maa so-i kong ashin, bendi gbamm be be. Ujudas angwu a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee a maa teng ābe. A be gbe lè hwaa lè Ujeso he-e ù gaa he lè uko.
42022048	Ujeso a hà de-e le: "Ujudas, wo gaa mi tyung 'itaa le wo ndyebb i-mi, Unwaa Undigye, zi â?"
42022049	Bendi-utung bema abe be teng be nde ashi 'i laa shi, be bii Ujeso le: "Atyetyan, lì kpi undi 'ashwia a?"
42022050	Undi-utung Ujeso ken a kung 'ashwia kpi shia ungikye ken 'utyung ahwu lizen. Ungikye umen ana a maa sha Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a aki.
42022051	Ujeso a kung de le: "Taa!" A kung 'ubwo tyua ungikye anwuna há he 'ibaa 'utyung, u mbee he.
42022052	Ujeso a hà kong ha bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi bendi abe be kang Ushom Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong abe be be hè be bè kwu-e. A de le: "Mì yi uzi a, ma be le ma kwu-m lè lishwia lè ìkwán he abwo a?
42022053	Mi maa kwa utung ha amen he Ushom Unim mbee ati, ukpor ma kaa le ma kwu-m ye. Kunyong ahwun 'u fel 'ūmen a, nyong ahwu Usetan, usu 'ifufebb, u tyung ikeb ima."
42022054	Bendi abena be kwu Ujeso gye lè he he ushom Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim. Ipita a maa fel tan pwom he lè há item 'igbe-igbe.
42022055	Be ma hwee 'inde he 'udyan ushaale. Ipita a lè kwu u gwee 'inde há utung ha bendi.
42022056	Unwaasul angwu u shi aki há a nde Ipita kwu gwaa ha 'inde. A naa nde-e kporr, kung kong le: "Ungikye anwun or titi a ma yi utung ha Ujeso."
42022057	Ipita a de le: "Unwaasul, mi ngye-e or ye."
42022058	He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg ungikye ususo a nde-e, a de le: "Wo or titi wò yi he liwu bendi-utung bema." Ipita a de le: "Dia. Mi a ye."
42022059	Awa ken a gbe, ungikye ususo a kwell fe-e le: "Kì yi 'igyang a le ungikye anwun a ma yi utung ha Ujeso a, likorye ufe or titi u ba lè he Ugalili a."
42022060	Ipita a de le: "Mi hà ngye angwu wo kong ana or ye." Nya a na a maa so-i kong ashin, kigia ukwuo 'i kung ko.
42022061	Ujeso a bel àshì nde Ipita kporr. Ipita a kung well igie angi Atyam a de-e le nyin u swan 'ugbe 'akie le a ngye-e ye mà ukpong kigia ukwuo 'i hà ko.
42022062	Ipita a kung gbe lè há lè ki kangg.
42022063	Bengikye abe be maa kang Ujeso be nyan he, be kung 'ihwom bua he he ashi, be tim he bishwia. Be de-e le ù shob undi angwu a tim he.
42022065	Be kong biwom gbamm bia he.
42022066	Ashi a taa, bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be lè kpee ukem. Be te lè Ujeso lè hwaa lè be.
42022067	Be kung bii le: "Wò yi Ukristi â? Fan li." Á fan ābe le: "Gbe mi de men or, ma ba bong ye.
42022068	Gbe mi bii amen 'ibibi or, ma fan mi áshi ye.
42022069	Ukpor kung lè he 'unyong 'umen i gye 'ushu mi, Unwaa Undigye, mi kwa he 'ubwo lizen Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu."
42022070	Befe be bii he le: "Ashin 'i ze le wò yi Unwaa Unim â?" A fan ābe le: "Ma kong nya dell-dell."
42022071	Be de le: "Li nem kee ushada ye. Bel-agyang li gyo ashi 'i be lè ha ahe ungwu."
42023001	Bendi bemen ana puu be bo 'inaa te lè Ujeso lè hwaa lè Upalet.
42023002	Be lè wu há, be keb akongale fe Ujeso le: "Li gyo ungikye anwun u hwua bendi biwom abi bì yi kpa-kpa ye. U da bendi le bè tem tye ukpanda ke Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom ye. U de le ufe ù yi usu angwu be ko le Ukristi a."
42023003	Upalet a hà kung bii he le: "Wò yi usu Ijuus â?" Ujeso a fan he le: "Kitaa ashina na wo kong."
42023004	Upalet a kung de bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè liwu bendi abena le, a nde 'ibibi ashi ungikye anwun a shi, he-e ù de le bè gwu-e ye.
42023005	Be fel kong gbe gyong le: "Biwom abi u hwua bendi na bı be lè linaa. A kpi 'imen ashin lè he Ugalili a mbee Ujudia ana. Kanaa-anaa i a fel ha abel nyin."
42023006	Upalet a ma gyo ashina gyo-gyo, a kung bii le ungikye anwun ù yi Ugalili â?
42023007	Be bong. A hà ngye le Ujeso u ba lè há 'igie 'imen ashi Uherod ù yi usu ana á. Upalet a de le bè te lè Ujeso lè hwaa lè Uherod angwu a ma yi he Ujeruselem há 'unyong 'umen ana titi.
42023008	Uherod a nde Ujeso, a fel lè igor kangg likorye a gyo gbe lè he. Ki gbe 'igbe ná a keb u kee le hang a nde-e likorye ù yi lè 'igyor le he-e ù nde 'ikwele-uhwo ashi Ujeso u shi.
42023009	Uherod a ma bii Ujeso bibibi gbamm, ukpor Ujeso a ma fan he likpe ken or ye.
42023010	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be die te he 'ushu lè naa maa ushe kangg fe Ujeso.
42023011	Uherod lè ishogya ima be nyan Ujeso, be shi-e u fel ilaa-ilaa. Be kung aliga angi a ngbebb 'unung kangg shi-e. Uherod a hà tem lè he som lè hwaa lè Upalet.
42023012	Nya he liti limen ana na Uherod befe lè Upalet be ma fel bedim bende. Ki shi le be ma yi bendi-linaa bende a kpamm lè he item.
42023013	Upalet a ma ko bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong lè bendi abe be teng be he 'iteng ken.
42023014	A de be le: "Má be lè ungikye anwun hwaa lè mi le ù hwua bendi biwom abi bì yi kpa-kpa a ye. Mi shun likong lima he ashi āmen puu; mi nde le a zī libi he biwom abi ma de le a shi ana ye.
42023015	Uherod or a nde le a zī libi ye a, fe a tem lè he som ke hwaa lè bel. Má ngye le ungikye anwun a shi 'iwom ashi 'ì yi le bè gwu-e ye.
42023016	Mi da undi ù kpam he, mi tyang he abwo he-e ù gye."[
42023017	He 'unyong 'uyang-yang ahwu be shi Kipam Agbele-gyong Upalet u shii tyang undi igaadye ken abwo angwu bendi Ijuus be waa le ù tyang he.]
42023018	Liwu bendi anyin li keb agaale utung-utung le: "Gwu-e, waa Ubarabas hwan tyang abwo."
42023019	Be ma fe Ubarabas he igaadye he 'uhwo linaa lè undi angwu be ma gwu nya he 'ubong.
42023020	Upalet a kee le u tyang Ujeso a abwo. A hà mbee kong ha abe 'itaa ken.
42023021	Ukpor be mbee gaa de-e le: "Maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa. Maa gwu-e!"
42023022	Upalet a mbee bii ābe 'ugbe ahwu lekie le: "Kibang 'ibibi ashi a shi? Mi nde 'ibibi ashi a shi ngwu mì gwu-e ye. Mi da undi le ù kpam he, mi tyang he abwo he-e ù gye."
42023023	Be gye 'ushu mbee lingmam libell puu gaa kangg le bè maa Ujeso bee he 'ikpakpaa. Be gaa nya nya nya 'igegaa 'ibell 'i kpo hwò usu.
42023024	Upalet a hà tang ushe Ujeso ná be kee.
42023025	Undi angwu be waa, a tyang he abwo. Undi umen i na be ma fe-e he igaadye he 'uhwo linaa lè undi angwu be ma gwu nya. A kung Ujeso ufe ke be le bè shi-e ashi be kee.
42023026	Be kpe Ujeso gbe lè he. Be lè kpee lè ungikye angwu be ko le Usaimun. A ma yi 'ubong Usarin a. A maa ba lè he libeb, u nda àshì gya he ushaale. Be kwu-e kung 'ikpakpaa so-e le ù so pwom Ujeso.
42023027	Bendi be ma ti kwuo pwom he. Bengingye abe be ma yi há he liwu limen ana be maa kya, be mbwee kangg he 'uhwo 'uma.
42023028	Ujeso a bel àshì nde be. A de be le: "Bengingye abe lè he Ujeruselem, mà ki-m mi a ye. Mà ki 'uhwo-men lè bebwaa-men hwan,
42023029	likorye 'unyong 'u ba lè há ahwu bendi be fel be de le: 'Bengye-ukwom lè abe be wa hwan ngye ye, be ke bebwaa àbí ye, befe aben unwaa-bell.'
42023030	Kunyong 'umen ana na bendi be fel be de ikwell le: 'Mà mbu shí li.' Be de bigugo le: 'Mà ndyell li.'
42023031	Gbe 'imen ashin 'ı be shi i-mi angwu mì yi ná ùkwán ukwun or, ki nya ba sha amen abe mà yi ná ùkwán unwom ná a?"
42023032	Be ma be lè bendi befee abe be bia iten le bê gwu utung ha Ujeso.
42023033	Be ma be fel he 'iteng ashi be ko le 'iteng 'ikpukpo lishi, be hà kung Ujeso maa bee he 'ikpakpaa. Be kung bendi abe be bia iten befee ana, maa angwu ken bee he 'ikpakpaa lè ha ahe 'ubwo lizen, be maa angwell lè ha ahe limbell.
42023034	Ujeso a de le: "Atyagi, tyang ke bendi abena! Be ngye ashi be shi ye a." Ishogya i kung inditen ima hwua ke bende gbe he isasa atyele.
42023035	Bendi be ma naa nde ná bekaandi Ijuus be nyan Ujeso le: "A kpan bendi; gbe ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a waa som a, ù kpan 'uhwo-ma."
42023036	Ishogya or i ma nyan he. I die lè 'imia 'utyuo ke-e.
42023037	I de-e le gbe ù yi Usu Ijuus a, ù kpan 'uhwo-ma.
42023038	Be ma fee fe-e nya 'usi 'ikpakpaa le: "Anwun na ù yi Usu Ijuus."
42023039	Undi angwu ken angwu be maa bee utung ha ahe a keb u fel bia he le: "Wò nem yi Ukristi a ye a? Kpan 'uhwo-gang, wo kpan li bel or titi."
42023040	Angwell a ben he le: "Wo shell Unim or ye a? Bwó lı kpe 'ingie a ken a.
42023041	Bel ufe, 'ityan 'ì yi dell-dell likorye li kpa 'ingie he 'iwom ashi li shi a. Ukpor ufe a shi 'iwom 'i ban ye."
42023042	A kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, well mi he 'unyong ahwu wo be fel Usu."
42023043	Ujeso a de-e le: "Mi ka-a úkyébb le 'unyin wo kwa utung ha ami he 'ipi igor ashi be ko le Uparadas."
42023044	He libwee 'udyan lishi, kifufebb 'i ma kpam nim libwee, gye kpenn he 'ubong 'umen ana kpamm lè kwom he inde ikie lè ishu likwulukwu.
42023045	Nya a na libwee li ma gye 'ifufebb, kihwom 'ikaandi ashi be ma tye tang 'ipo he Ushom Unim 'i ma gie bigie bifee.
42023046	Ujeso a kùng kangg kong le: "Atyagi, mi kung 'ūnyōng 'ugi fa-a he 'ubwo." A kung hwō.
42023047	Ukaandi ishogya a nde ashi 'i shi. A pee Unim, u de le ungikye umen i ù yi undi ununung a 'igyang.
42023048	He 'unyong ahwu bendi abe be sho há be nde inde, be nde ashi 'i shi, be so abwo he lishi tem gye he ushaale.
42023049	Bendi gbamm abe be ma ngye Ujeso lè bengingye abe be ma fe utung ha ahe lè he Ugalili be ma naa 'igbe-igbe, be nda biwom bimen i.
42023050	Ki ma yi lè ungikye ken angwu be ko le Ujosef. U shi lishi Ijuus angi be ko le Alimatia a. Ù yi he liwu bikem ukoto. A ma yi undi ununung angwu a maa ndor lishi he 'unyong ahwu Unim u be kwu Usu bendi puu. Mà na a ma yi he liwu bendi abe be ma tim lihwu Ujeso or, a ma bong lihwu lima ye.
42023052	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a hwō, Ujosef a lè hwaa lè Upalet tim he anung le ù kung likwom Ujeso ke-e. Upalet a bong.
42023053	Ujosef a lè shul likwom Ujeso lè há 'ikpakpaa, kung 'ihwom 'ifung ashi 'i ngbebb 'unung, nii Ujeso te lè he lè ngi he likwun angi be ma tem he 'ukor. Be ma wa ngi undi há he likwun limen ana ngye ye.
42023054	Liti limen ana na be kam nyong liti uwell Ijuus angi li maa ndo kpi.
42023055	Bengingye abe be ma be utung ha Ujeso lè he Ugalili, be ma pwom Ujosef lè nde likwun, be mbee nde 'itaa be ngi-e.
42023056	Be hà tem gye he ushu lè shi behwu abe be nung nyin hè be bè lè wu-e. He liti uwell Ijuus be sho 'unyong nya a na Iten ibell i kong.
42024001	He ukpi-ikwu liti utyong Beke he ashi liti bengingye abena be bo lè behwu abe be nung nyin abe be shi, gye há he likwun.
42024002	Be lè nde 'ukor 'u buu lè he ungwu likwun.
42024003	Be shul gye há afee, ukpor be nde likwom Atyetyan Ujeso ye.
42024004	Kikekaa 'i kaa ābe. Be ngyor naa há kporr, be fel tyang ná likwom lima li shi. Be nde bengikye befee abe be shī aliga angi a taa ngyal-ngyal-ngyal, be fem naa ha ahe há imbul-imbul.
42024005	Bengingye ana be ma fel he 'ushell, be keb atong-shi he itang. Bengikye abena be kung bii ābe le: "Kibang a, ma shun undi angwu ù yi uwum he 'ipi akwom a kwu?
42024006	Ù yi hen ye. A wum lè he lihwu. Mà well ashi a ma de men he 'unyong ahwu a ma so utung ha amen he Ugalili.
42024007	A ma de le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le ufe Unwaa Undigye ù fel he abwo bendi-iban, be maa gwu-e bee he 'ikpakpaa. He ati akie u wum lè he lihwu."
42024008	Bengingye abena be hà well igie ima.
42024009	Be tem lè há likwun lè de bebwaa-isom Ujeso abe be teng lihwo lè he ken, be de bendi puu abe be teng biwom bimen i puu.
42024010	Umeri Umadelen lè Ujohana lè Umeri, anam Ujems, lè bengingye abe be teng na be ma de bebwaa-isom Ujeso biwom bimen i.
42024011	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso be maa kong le bengingye aben be kong ukong-likor a. Be bong àshi be kong ye.
42024012	Ukpor Ipita a ma buu gye há likwun lè nii nde gye he afee. A nde 'iwom 'isuso pel ha bihwom likwom ye. A tem gye he ushu lè atyāngale gbe lè ashi 'i shi.
42024013	Nya he liti limen ana bendi befee lè he liwu bendi abe be ma pwom Ujeso be maa nda àshì gya he lishi 'ubong angi be ko le Imayes. Kung lè he Ujeruselem gye há 'ì yi mbee ilamba idyong-ifee.
42024014	Be maa kong ha bende gba lè biwom puu bimen abi bi shi i.
42024015	Nya a na be maa kong te lè 'ukwo, Ujeso ugyang a die ngie ābe, u fel tan utung ha abe.
42024016	Be nde-e, ukpor be shob he ye.
42024017	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Ma kong 'ibang a ha bende ta lè 'ukwo?" Be bel naa lè 'ushu 'imbwee-imbwee.
42024018	Undi ken angwu be maa ko le Ukeliyopas a kung de-e le: "Mi gim le wo-wo na wò kee-kee yi ugaandi he Ujeruselem angwu a ngye biwom abi bi shi há he ati amen i ye."
42024019	Ujeso a kung bii he le: "Bibang biwom a?" Be fan he le: "Biwom abi bi shi Ujeso angwu he Unazaret a. Ungikye umen i a ma yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a. Unim lè bendi puu be bong le ù yi lè ikeb he likong or, he aki ashele or.
42024020	Ukpor bekaandi betyan abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong be kung he ke le bè maa ushe le bè gwu-e. Be maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa.
42024021	Bel li maa ndor lishi le ufe na u be kpan bendi Izwell. Fem ashina tyang, ki fel ati akie 'unyin ná ashin 'i shi.
42024022	Bengingye besuso lè he liwu lityan be shi 'i kwu li he 'uhwo. Be bo he ashi liti gye há he likwun lima,
42024023	ukpor be nde likwom lima ye. Be tem be de li le be nde idengell Unim, i de be le a wum mà.
42024024	Bendi besuso lè ha abel liwu be mbee lè nde likwun nya a na abe bengingye be kong. Be nde-e ye."
42024025	Ujeso a hà kung de be le: "Mà yi kpel-ye. Ma shwie bong biwom puu abi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be kong ye.
42024026	Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le Ukristi ù kpe bingie bimen i, ù hà fel usu."
42024027	Ujeso a hà bun de be biwom abi be ma fee fe he ashia Unim gbe lè he. A ma kpi lè ashia Umosis be he ashia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim puu.
42024028	Nyong be fel kpee-kpee ha lishi 'ubong angi be maa gye, Ujeso a tyung likpe agyele 'ushu.
42024029	Be swan gbangg le ù gye ye, ù kwu ha abe há kpe-kpe likorye libwee li ngwee, kifufebb 'i ndo gya. A kung gbe lè kwu utung ha abe.
42024030	A lè kwu he-e ù zī lizi utung ha abe, u kung ibred kwu he abwo, u pee Unim, u hà kung āngi bun ke be.
42024031	Atong-shi abell a mà buu, be nde shob he. A mà nyong kàng.
42024032	Be de bende le: "He 'unyong ahwu á yii kong ha abel he 'ukwo, u bun de li gbe lè biwom abi be fee fe he ashia Unim leěti, kí yi kung li he atyam nwongg ná 'inde 'i taa."
42024033	Be kung bo nya 'ukwo-ukwo tem ndo he Ujeruselem. Be lè nde bendi-utung Ujeso abe lihwo lè undi ken bè yi kwu há utung ha bendi gbamm.
42024034	Be de bendi bemen ana le Atyabell Ujeso a wum lè he lihwu 'igyang a. A te lè 'uhwo-ma lè tyung Usaimun.
42024035	Bendi abe befee ana be bun 'iwom ashi 'i shi fe be he 'ukwo de be, be mbee de be ná bé yi shob Atyetyan Ujeso he 'unyong ahwu a bun ibred ke be le bè zī.
42024036	Nya a na bendi abe befee ana be maa so-i de be ashin, nya imbul-imbul Ujeso ugyang a fem naa ha abe nya, u de be le: "Ikwun ì kwu amen he 'uhwo."
42024037	Be fel he 'ushell kangg, likorye be kong le be nde uhwutang a.
42024038	A kung bii ābe le: "Kibang a, ma waa ufung? Ki shi ná a, ma fel lè atyāngale he atyam āmen?
42024039	Mà nde abwo agi lè abee agi hè men mà ngye le mi a. Mà tyua mi abwo hè men mà nde likorye uhwutang u kwa lè inyiahwo lè ikeb ná ma nde-m mì yi lè ngi nyin ye."
42024040	A kong ashin, u hà tyung ābe abwo ama lè abee ama.
42024041	Be ma wa bong le ufe a ye he 'uhwo igor angi i ma sho ābe he atyam, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. A kung bii ābe le bè yi lè 'iwom ashi be zī há a?
42024042	Be kung ùkwǎn angwu be kor ke-e.
42024043	A kpe zī nya a na be maa nde.
42024044	A hà de be le: "Biwom abin na mi maa de men he 'unyong ahwu mi ma so utung ha amen. Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le biwom puu abi be ma fee gbe lè mi he ashia Iten Umosis lè ashia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim lè 'ushia Usam bì shi."
42024045	A shi biwom abi be fee he 'ushia Unim leěti bi nung ābe.
42024046	U de be le: "Ashi be ma fee 'ì yi le Ukristi ù kpe 'ingie hwō, u wum lè he lihwu he ati akie.
42024047	He lizen lima bè bun de bendi he abong puu le bè shi beshi he biban, be tyang ābi ashele, mà Unim ù tyang ke be. Bè kpi abunale lè he Ujeruselem.
42024048	Men ma nde abin, ma bun de bendi gbe lè bi.
42024049	Mi-gyang mi ba som àshi Atyagi a ma ke men úkyébb hwaa lè men. Mà kwu he Ujeruselem kpamm ma gbe kpe ikeb angi ı be lè he lifung-atabe."
