42024050	A gbe lè he Ujeruselem te lè be lè wu he Beteni. A kung abwo ama gye he 'usi ke be 'ukwun.
42024051	Nya a na a maa ke be 'ukwun, a gbe tyang ābe gye he lifung-atabe.
42024052	Be fe-e, be hà gbe ndo he Ujeruselem lè igor kangg.
42024053	Be lè kwu he Ushom Unim pee Unim mbee 'unyong.
43001001	Lè há linde-linde nyong igye anyin i ma wa fel ye, igie Unim i ma yi. Ufe angwu ù yi igie imen ana, a ma yi ipel ha Unim, u shi Unim ugyang a.
43001002	Kung lè há linde-linde ufe lè Unim be ma yi ubibi ken.
43001003	Unim a mbe bendi lè biwom puu gbe ha ufe a. Kì yi lè 'iwom 'iyang-yang or ashi Unim a mbe faale he ye.
43001004	Ufe na a be lè likpan ke bendi puu. Kikung-gbo 'i be lè ha likpan limen ana a, ki shi bendigye be ngye 'igyang.
43001005	Kikung-gbo ana 'i taa he 'ifufebb, ukpor 'ifufebb 'i nim āshi mbee ye.
43001006	Leěti, Unim a ma som undi ususo angwu be maa ko le Ujon.
43001007	Unim a ma som he le ù be bun de bendi gbe lè 'ikung-gbo ana, le hè bendi puu bè gyo, be bong kpe 'isom 'imen ashi Ujon a maa bun ana.
43001008	Ufe-gyang na a ma yi 'ikung-gbo 'imen ana ye, ufe a kee-kee be le he-e ù bun de bendi gbe lè 'ikung-gbo 'imen ana a.
43001009	Kikung-gbo 'imen 'igyang ashell ashi 'ı ke bendi puu 'ikung-gbo i, ki ma ndor àshì 'i ba he igye anyin.
43001010	Ufe angwu ù yi 'ikung-gbo 'igyang ashell a be he igye i. Mà na Unim a mbe igye anyin gbe ha ufe a or, bendigye be ngye-e ye.
43001011	A be he 'ubong 'uma, ukpor bendi bema be swan he.
43001012	Ukpor abe be kpe-e, be mbee bong ha ahe 'igyang-igyang, u buu 'ukwo ke be le bè fel bebwaa Unim.
43001013	Lihwan libell limen ana li be lè he ubu a or, ngwu lì be gbe he ugim undigye a or ye. Unim ugyang na a hwan kung ābe.
43001014	Igie angi i ma yi Unim ana i bel undigye, a be kwu ipel ha abel he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg. Li nde ìfém ima angi i be lè ha Unim Atyam angwu a hwan he a he unwaa ken. A ngbebb inung kangg, kigyang 'i shi ha ahe mbee 'unyong.
43001015	Ujon a de bendi gbe lè he le: "Mà nde undi angwu leěti mi maa de men gbe lè he le angwu u be-m lè há item a dyam hwo-m likorye ufe ù yi mà ukpong be hà hwan mi."
43001016	Le bwo a ngbebb inung kangg, a ke li bel puu 'ukwun 'ugbe ibwan-ibwan.
43001017	Unim a ke li Iten ima gbe ha Umosis, ukpor gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi, igie ima, na a tyung inung lè beshi ha abel, u mbee fem 'igyang he igye gboo tyung li.
43001018	Kung lè há ukpi-ikwu igye anyin, kì yi lè undi angwu a wa nde Unim lè ashi ngye ye. Ujeso Ukristi 'ugbe Unwaa-ma a ken angwu ù yi gwaa lè Atyam, ufe na a tyung li 'itaa Atyam ù yi.
43001019	He 'unyong ken bekaandi Ijuus abe he Ujeruselem be som bendi abe be shang Unim lè bendi abe be be ubu lè ha 'ikwu Ulibai le bè lè bii Ujon 'itaa undi ashi ù yi.
43001020	Ujon a ma fan ābe le: "Mì yi Ukristi angwu Unim a waa le ù kwu Undi-likpan igye anyin a ye." A ma kong igie anyina gboo he atyung bendi abena puu.
43001021	Be mbee bii he le: "Fe wò hà yi ayang a? Wo na wò yi Ilaja a?" Ujon a swan. Be mbee kung bii he le: "Wo na wò yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim angwu 'ushia Unim 'u kong gbe lè he ana a?" Ujon a swan le ù yi ufe a ye.
43001022	He ashina be mbee kung bii he le: "Fe wò hà yi ayang a? De li lî lè de abe be som li. Kibang ashi wo de li gbe lè 'uhwo-gang?"
43001023	A fan ābe le: "Mi na Azaya angwu leěti a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a maa kong gbe lè mi nyong a ma de le, 'Undi u ba gaa lè he libeb le, Atyetyan u ba lè há, mà shi 'ukwo ahwu 'u ngbebb ndor he he-e ù be gbe.' "
43001024	He liwu bendi abe be som ana, Iferesis i ma gia yi há;
43001025	be kung bii Ujon le: "Bwo wò yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye a ye, wo shi Ilaja a, ngwu wò kwu undi umen angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim angwu 'ushia Unim 'u kong gbe lè he ana a ye, bang a, wò hà kib bendi he umbwo?"
43001026	Ujon a fan ābe le: "Mi kib bendi he umbwo, ukpor undi ususo ù yi naa he liwu līmen angwu ma ngye-e ye.
43001027	Ù yi undi angwu u be-m lè há item a, mi kpee he he 'ubee or ye."
43001028	Leěti biwom abin bi ma shi he Beteni he igbindi umbwo angwu be ko le Ujodan he 'ipi Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo a.
43001029	Ashi a fem taa, Ujon a nde Ujeso u ba hwaa lè he, Ujon a kung de le: "Mà nde Unwaa Utia Unim angwu a mbee lè biban bendigye.
43001030	Ufe na mi ma kong gbe lè he nyong mi ma de le angwu u be-m lè há item a dyam hwo-m kangg, likorye ufe ù yi-m lè he 'ushu.
43001031	Leěti mi or mi ma ngye-e ye; ukpor atan-lengi angwu mi maa kib bendi he umbwo ù yi le hè men bendi Izwell mà ngye-e a."
43001032	Ujon a ma mbee kong gboo gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi le: "Mi ma nde Ukatia Kunyong Unim ná a shul lè he lifung-atabe be he itang. A ma shul ná 'alulu be so-e he lishi.
43001033	Kpamm be wu he 'unyong 'umen ana, mi ma wa ngye-e ye, ukpor Unim angwu a ma som mi le mì be kib bendi he umbwo, a ma de-m le, mi ba nda Ukatia Kunyong Unim ná u shul lè he 'usi be he itang be so undi-iso he lishi. Kitaa ana na mi shī ngye undi ùmén angwu u be kung Ukatia Kunyong Unim kib bendi i.
43001034	Mi nde biwom abin puu 'itaa a ma de-m. Kife na mi de men gboo le ufe anwun ù yi Unwaa Unim a."
43001035	Ashi a mbee kung taa, Ujon a ma mbee yi naa nya lè bendi-utung bema befee.
43001036	A nde Ujeso a be, u gba, a de be le: "Mà nde Unwaa Utia Unim ana."
43001037	Bendi-utung Ujon befee ana be gyo he a kong ashin, be mà bo pwom Ujeso.
43001038	Ujeso a bel àshì he item nde be be pwom he, a bii ābe le: "Mā kee 'ibang a?" Be fan he le: "Urabai, wò yi he hung a?" (Likpe angi le Urabai li ze le Itisha.)
43001039	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà bé nde." Be ma gbe utung ha ahe lè nde he 'ipi ù yi, be ngyor kwu ha ahe há kpamm gyebb likwulukwu. (Kunyong ahwu Ujeso a kong ha abe, ku ma yi índē ìndè angi ishu likwulukwu a.)
43001040	Bendi bemen befee abe be ma gyo Ujon, be gbe pwom Ujeso ana, be ko angwu ken le Andru. Ù yi unwanam Usaimun Ipita a.
43001041	Andru ana a buu akye lè ndè ungwende Usaimun, a kung de-e le: "Bel li ndè Umizaya." (Likpe angi le Umizaya lì yi itaa ken ha likpe angi le Ukristi. Likpe anyin lì yi le Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin.)
43001042	Andru a ma te lè Usaimun lè hwaa lè Ujeso. Ujeso a nde-e, a kung de-e le: "Usaimun, unwaa Ujon, lizen ligang angi ken li fel le Usifas." (Lizen angi le Usifas lì yi 'itaa ken ha angi le Ipita; puu angi afee a ze le kukor.)
43001043	Ashi a fem taa, Ujeso a bo u gya he 'igie Ugalili. A nde Ufilip angwu ù yi 'ubong Besaida ahwu Andru lè Ipita be be. A de Ufilip le: "Bo lì gye."
43001045	Ufilip a bo lè nde Unatandyell, u de-e le: "Li nde undi angwu leěti Umosis a ma fee gbe lè he he 'ushia Iten Unim, bendi abe be maa tye ugie 'isom Unim or titi be fee gbe lè he. Be ko he le Ujeso; ù yi 'ubong Unazaret, u shi unwaa Ujosef a."
43001046	Unatandyell a bii he le: "Kinunung 'isuso 'i ba lè he Unazaret â?" Ufilip a de-e le: "Be, mà wo nda ā!"
43001047	Ujeso a nde Unatandyell u ba hwaa lè he, a kung kong gbe lè he le: "Angwu u be ana ù yi undi Izwell ugyang kpa-kpa faale uman a."
43001048	Unatandyell a bii he le: "Ná wo shi nyong wo ngye-m?" Ujeso a fan he le: "Mí yi nda-a he 'unyong ahwu wó yi yi he liten ukwan angwu be ko le ufik, mà ukpong Ufilip u hà lè ko-a."
43001049	Unatandyell a kung de-e le: "Urabai, wò yi Unwaa Unim a; wo shi Usu Izwell a!"
43001050	Ujeso a de-e le: "Wo tia bong le mì yi Unwaa Unim a le bwo mi da-a le mí yi nda-a he liten ukwan a? Kigyang-igyang, wò hà ndo nda biwom bi gba gyong ashin."
43001051	Ujeso a mbee de be le: "Mi da amen 'igyang a le, ma ba nda lifung-atabe li buu ndor gboo, ma nde idengell Unim ná ı gye he 'usi, i tem shul be he itang gbe ha ami Unwaa Undigye."
43002001	Ati a gbe afee, ki ma yi lè 'ipam libee he lishi Ugalili angi be ko le Ukena. Anam Ujeso a ma yi há.
43002002	Be ma hwaà Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema gye 'ipam 'imen ana.
43002003	Be shi 'ipam fel he 'ukwo, kutyuo ahwu be maa ngwo 'u mbee. Anam Ujeso a kung bo lè de Ujeso le: "Kutyuo 'u mbee."
43002004	Ujeso a fan he le: "Iye, wo fel da-m mi â? Kunyong 'ugi 'u wa fel ye."
43002005	Anam a tem lè de abe be ke lizi he 'udyan le: "Kiyang-yang ashi a de men le mà shi, mà shi āshi."
43002006	Ki ma yi lè itetel Ijuus a le be to bituto. He ashina, nya 'iteng 'imen ana be ma tyung bishang umbwo bidyong-ken abi be fe umbwo shi itetel ibell. Bishang abina bi ma dyam kangg le 'ishang ken 'i za igung-gung umbwo kung lè ha lisi gya ha lisi lè ngi lihwo.
43002007	Ujeso a kung de abe be ke lizi nya he 'udyan le: "Mà fe umbwo sho bishang abina puu." Be ma fe umbwo sho ābi puu ndor he atyung yilidididi.
43002008	Ujeso a hà kung de be le: "Mà ndo kwan umbwo lè he bishang ana lè ke angwu a kwu lishi 'idem." Be mà kwan umbwo angwu a bel 'utyuo ana lè ke-e.
43002009	Abe be ke lizi nya he 'udyan be ngye he 'ipi 'utyuo 'u be, ukpor angwu a kwu lishi 'idem a ngye ye. Nyong a tim āhwu he ungwu, ki kwu-e he 'uhwo kangg. A ko ukyebb ungye,
43002010	de-e le: "Bendi be kung 'utyuo ahwu 'u ngbebb a ka bendi 'ushu. He 'unyong ahwu be ngwo 'utyuo kangg, be hà be lè ahwu 'u ngbebb ye be ke be. Ukpor, wo ufe wo shi ná ye, wo be lè ahwu 'u ngbebb hwò a ke likel."
43002011	Kikwele-uhwo ashi Ujeso a ma shi he Ukena he 'ubong Ugalili i na 'i ma yi ukpi-ikwu 'ikwele-uhwo ashi a shi. Gbe he 'ikwele-uhwo ashina Ujeso a ma tyung ikeb ima. He 'uhwo ashi bendi-utung bema be bong le ù yi Unwaa Unim a.
43002012	Be mbee 'ipam puu, Ujeso lè anam lè bebwanam lè bendi-utung bema be bo gye he Ukapanyam. Be kwu há ati zangg a.
43002013	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, kunyong 'ipam Ijuus ashi be ko le Kipam Agbele-gyong 'u ma fel kpee-kpee. He ashina, Ujeso a ma bo gye 'ipam ana he Ujeruselem.
43002014	A lè wu há, a gbe gye he Ushom Unim lè nde bendi há abe be maa ndyebb bityuale lè inwaa ukwuo abakpa zi, lè abe be maa gie únde.
43002015	A kung udong-si ndeb lè bendi puu lè bityuale lè há wu he igye. U nyii itebul bendi abe be gie únde wu hell, paa únde ubell wu shaha-shaha-shaha.
43002016	A kung de abe be maa ndyebb inwaa ukwuo abakpa zi le: "Mà kung biwom bīmen be gbe gye! Mà mā ma tyang abwo lè ashele ushom Atyagi le ù fel 'ipi ūshī o."
43002017	Nyong bendi-utung bema be nde ashina, be well le be fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le: "Benyin abe mì yi lè be ha Ushom Unim, be dyam gbe ūkee."
43002018	Bekaandi Ijuus be ngib na nya bii he le: "Kikwele-uhwo ashi hung wò nya shi hè 'ì tyung li le wò yi lè ikeb le wo sha ashin?"
43002019	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Gbe ma kem ti Ushom Unim anwun, mi kung ati akie a tem lè he tya."
43002020	Be fan he le: "Kpash! Wó ngye le be kung aze asi afee lè ngi adyong-ken hà tye-e ukpor? Wo gim le wo kung ati akie a tya he a?"
43002021	Ushom angwu Ujeso a maa kong gbe lè he a ma yi inyiahwo ima a. A maa kong gba lè 'ukwo ahwu u be hwō, lè 'itaa u be wum a.
43002022	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma wum lè he lihwu, bendi-utung bema be ma well igie angi a kong ana. He 'uhwo ashin be ma bong biwom abi be fee he 'ushia Unim lè igie Ujeso.
43002023	Nyong Ujeso a ma yi he Ujeruselem he 'unyong Kipam Agbele-gyong, a ma shi bikwele-uhwo. He 'uhwo abi, bendi gbamm be ma bong ha ahe.
43002024	Ukpor Ujeso a ma fe lityam ha abe ye,
43002025	likorye a ngye àtyám bendigye puu. Kì yi le undi na ù ha de-e ashi 'ì yi he atyam bendi ye, likorye ufe-gyang a ngye biwom puu abi bì yi he atyam abell.
43003001	Ki ma yi lè ungikye Ijuus angwu be maa ko le Unikodimes. A ma yi usu a, u shi undi likwu Iferesis a.
43003002	He liti ken lè 'usu, a ma bo lè hwaa lè Ujeso, de-e le: "Urabai, li ngye le Unim na a som-a le wò be hwua bendi biwom. Kì yi le undi angwu ù hà ndo kwu lè ikeb shi bikwele-uhwo abi wo shi kpam-kpam i mbee ye, hà gbe Unim na a ke-e ikeb a a."
43003003	Ujeso a fan he le: "Ndor mi da-a 'igyang 'ima. Gbe undi a tem lè 'uhwo-ma hwan 'ugbe 'afee ye, ù hà ndo nda Kiteng-usu Unim ye."
43003004	Unikodimes a kung bii he le: "Ná undi gbel u tem lè 'uhwo-ma hwan mbee? U nya tem la ngwee he 'utyor anam, u hà mbee tem hwan â?"
43003005	Ujeso a fan he le: "Mi da-a 'igyang a le, gbe undi ù yi lè lihwan angi gbe he umbwo lè ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim ye, ù hà ndo gya he Kiteng-usu Unim ye.
43003006	Undigye u hwan unde-ma undigye, u fel lè likpan angi he agwo. Ukpor he 'unyong ahwu Ukatia Kunyong Unim u tem lè undi hwan, undi umen ana u fel lè likpan lifufe angi lı be lè ha Unim.
43003007	Ashi le mi de le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le bendigye bè kwu lè lihwan 'ugbe 'afee, kì shī kwa-a he 'uhwo ye.
43003008	Ndè, kiwom ná 'ufem i, ku shà gya he 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi 'i nyin āhwu. Undi u gyo 'ihwee ashi 'u shi, ukpor u ngya he 'ipi 'u be or, ngwu ù ngye he 'ipi 'u gye or ye. Kitaa 'imen ana na 'ì yi ha undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè lihwan gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim."
43003009	Unikodimes a bii he le: "Ashi wo kong ana 'i hà ze le ana a?"
43003010	Ujeso a fan he le: "Wo itisha ubo-ubo he Izwell i, fe likong anyin lı nung-a ye a?
43003011	"Mi da-a le, bel li kong gba lè biwom abi li ngye, li mbee de men gbe lè biwom abi li nde lè ashi atyan, ukpor men ma bong abi li kong ye.
43003012	Nyong mi de men gbe lè biwom abi he igye anyin, mà ha bong ye i, ki nya sha ná a, ma be bong gbe mi de men gbe lè abi he lifung-atabe?
43003013	Kì yi lè undi angwu a bè mbo lè wu he ushu Unim ye, kee-kee kwom ha ami Unwaa Undigye angwu mi shul be he itang ufe-ufe a.
43003014	"Nya a na leěti Umosis a ma kung ùshiı angwu be kung 'índe a shi-e faa he ukwan kung ndor he 'usi nyong be ma yi he libeb, kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi kpe-kpe le ìtí-ishi bè be kung i-mi Unwaa Undigye ndor he 'usi.
43003015	Be ba sha ná le hè undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami ù kwu lè likpan ligyang angyell ngyor igye kpamm."
43003016	Ki nyin Unim lè bendigye kangg. Benyin be shi-e a som 'iken Unwaa-ma be he igye anyin le hè undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe 'igyang-igyang ù nim ye, ukpor ù kwu lè likpan ligyang angyell ngyor igye kpamm.
43003017	Unim a kee le ushe uma ù kwu bendigye i ye. He ashina a som Unwaa-ma be le he-e ù kpan bendigye puu gbe ha ahe.
43003018	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe, ushe Unim u ba kwa he ye. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe ye, ushe Unim a kwu-e or mà, likorye a bong ha 'iken Unwaa Unim ana ye.
43003019	Atan-lengi angwu ushe Unim a kwu bendi abe be bong ha Unwaa-ma ye, ù yi le 'ikung-gbo 'i be he igye anyin, ukpor 'i nyin bendi lè 'ifufebb hwo 'ikung-gbo ashina, likorye be shi bibibi a.
43003020	Undi uyang-yang angwu u shi bibibi u tel 'ikung-gbo, u pam āshi le hè bendi bè ndè bibibi abi u shi ye.
43003021	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu u shi biwom kpa-kpa, ki nyin he lè 'ikung-gbo le hè bendi be ndè gboo le u sha biwom abi bi ngbebb Unim.
43003022	Nyong ashin 'i mbee, Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be bo gbe ndo he 'igie Ujudia. A kwu lè be há, ù yii kib bendi he umbwo.
43003023	He 'unyong 'umen ana Ujon ufe a ma yi he Anon gwaa he Uselim, ufe or a maa kib bendi he umbwo. A ma yi kwu he 'iteng 'imen ana likorye umbwo a ma go há. Bendi be maa gya hwaa lè he há, u kib ābe he umbwo.
43003024	(Nya 'unyong 'umen ana be ma wa kwu Ujon fe he igaadye ye.)
43003025	He liti ken, bendi-utung Ujon be maa fa ifung ha undi Ijuus ken gba lè itetel bituto.
43003026	Be hà bo lè hwaa lè Ujon, be de-e le: "Itisha, undi angwu a ma be hwaa lè wo he igbindi umbwo Ujodan, angwu wo maa kong gbe lè he ana, ù yi há, u kib bendi he umbwo. Bendi puu be gbe tyang li gye lè hwaa lè he."
43003027	Ujon a kung de be le: "Kì yi lè undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u sha 'iwom 'iyang-yang fem angi Unim na a ke-e tyang ye.
43003028	Men-agyang ma gyo mi nyong mi de le mì yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan a ye. Mi ufe mì kee-kee yi unwaa-isom angwu u te-e lè he 'ushu kam 'ukwo a.
43003029	Ùkyēbb na ù yi lè ungye. Ukpor udim ukyebb angwu u kwu gyo udim-ma, u kwa lè igor kangg nyong a gyo igie ima. Kitaa ana na 'ì yi-m mi fel lè igor kangg likorye mi gyo igie ima mà.
43003030	Kì yi kpe-kpe le ufe ù fel dyam, mi-i fel zen."
43003031	"Undi angwu a be lè ha Unim ana a dyam hwò puu. Mi angwu mì yi he igye i a, mì yi ke igye a, mi kee-kee kong gba lè biwom igye anyin a. Ukpor undi angwu a be lè ha Unim ana a dyam hwò puu.
43003032	U da bendi gba lè biwom abi ufe-gyang a nde lè ashi, lè abi a gyo lè 'utyung 'uma, ukpor bendi be kpa he áshi ye.
43003033	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a kpe ashi a kong, hà a bong le Unim ù yi 'igyang.
43003034	Undi umen angwu Unim a som ana u kong 'itaa Unim a de-e a, likorye Unim a ke-e Ukatia Kunyong uma faale 'akwukwell.
43003035	Ki nyin Atyam Unim lè Unwaa-ma, a kung biwom puu fe-e he 'ubwo.
43003036	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha Unwaa Unim, u kwa lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu u ke Unwaa Unim ana ife ye, u kwa lè likpan limen i ye, ingywo Unim i so-e he lishi ngyor igye kpamm."
43004001	Bendi Iferesis be gyo le bendi abe be fel pwom Ujeso abe a kib ābe he umbwo be fel go hwà abe Ujon.
43004002	Ukpor Ujeso ugyang a ma kib bendi he umbwo ye, bendi-utung bema na be maa kib ābe he umbwo.
43004003	Nyong Ujeso a ngye le Iferesis i fel kong ashin, a bo lè he Ujudia tem ndo he Ugalili.
43004004	Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le ù lè gbe he Usameria a.
43004005	Nya a na Ujeso a tan gbe he Usameria, a lè wu he 'iteng Usameria ashi be ko le Usakaa. Kiteng ashina 'ì yi gwaa lè ufel angwu leěti Ujekob a ma kung ke unwaa-ma, Ujosef.
43004006	Libell umbwo Ujekob li ma yi nya. Nyong Ujeso a ma wu nya libell umbwo ana, libwee li maa ndo pwom he 'udyan lishi. A bel kwu ko nya likorye litan li ma ngie he.
43004007	Ungingye angwu ù yi 'ubong Usameria a be nya le hè-e ù tyuo umbwo. Ujeso a de-e le: "Bè umbwo ke-m mî ngwo."
43004008	(Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi-utung Ujeso be ma gbe lè há tyang he ututeb, be ma gye he ishu angi ì yi há kpee-kpee hè be bè lè ndyebb lizi.)
43004009	Gyo ungingye ana le: "Kpash! Wo angwu wò yi Ijuus, fe wo de-m mi angwu mì yi Usameria le mì ka-a umbwo a?" Ki kwu-e he 'uhwo likorye Ijuus lè abe he Usameria, be gba kpee bende ye.
43004010	Ujeso a fan he le: "Kì kwu le wo ngye gbe lè 'uke ahwu Unim u ke bendi, wo mbee ngye-m mi angwu mi bii-a le wò ke-m umbwo mî ngwo i, hang wo na wo de-m le mì ka-a umbwo angwu u ke likpan, hang mi ka-a ahe."
43004011	Ungingye ana a de-e le: "Ukaandi, libell umbwo anyin li shul lishi, wo mbee shi lè 'igbor ashi wo kung tyuo ye, he hung nyin wo be lè umbwo angwu há angwu u ke likpan?
43004012	Wo kong i le ugang umbwo a fel ngbebb hwò anwun â? Atietyan Ujekob ugyang na a ma tem li libell umbwo limen i. Ufe or, bebwaa-ma or, be maa ngwa umbwo umen i a, bityuale bima or bi ngwo-e titi."
43004013	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngwo umbwo lè he libell anyin, umbwo a mbee gyor he;
43004014	ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a ngwo umbwo angwu mī-ì ke-e, ù tem kwa lè 'igyor ususo ye ngyor igye kpamm. Umbwo angwu mı ke-e ana ù yi ná lishi umbwo, u ka he likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm."
43004015	Ungingye ana a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, kusi hā ke-m umbwo umen ana, mî ngwo hè umbwo ù tem gyor mi ye, mi tem be he lishor or ye."
43004016	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Tem lè de ukyegang ù be."
43004017	Angwu ungingye a fan he le: "Mì yi lè ùkyēbb ye."
43004018	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Wo kong dell-dell a le wò yi lè ùkyēbb ye. Wo bee lè bekyebb be fel bedyong. Angwu wò yi kwu ha ahe há nyin or, ù yi ukyegang a ye. Wo kong 'igyang."
43004019	Ungingye umen ana a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, ki nung mi gboo le wò yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a.
43004020	Leěti betietyan be maa fa Unim he ukwell anwun a, ukpor men bendi Ijuus ma de le bè fel gye he Ujeruselem hwan."
43004021	Ujeso a fan he le: "Iye, kunyong 'u ndo fel ahwu be tem be fe Atyagi Unim he biteng abin bife-bife a ye.
43004022	Men bendi Usameria ma ngye angwu ma fe ye. Ukpor bel Ijuus li ngye angwu lı fe, likorye gbe ha abel Ijuus na Unim u be kpan bendi puu.
43004023	Kunyong 'u ba ba ahwu bendi be fe Unim he 'ukwo kpa-kpa, be fe-e lityam ken 'igyang-igyang. Mi de le 'unyong ahwu há 'u fel or mà. Unim u kee bendi abe be fe-e 'itaa ana a.
43004024	Unim ù yi 'ūnyōng a. He ashin 'ì yi kpe-kpe le abe be fe-e bè fe-e lityam ken he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong uma."
43004025	Ungingye umen ana a de-e le: "Mi ngye le Ukristi angwu Unim u som le ù be kpan bendi u ba lè há. Nyong u be be, u sha biwom puu bi nung li."
43004026	Ujeso a de-e le: "Mi angwu mı kong ha awo i mì yi ufe a."
43004027	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi-utung Ujeso be tem be. Nyong be nde-e u kong ha ungingye, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo. Ukpor undi ubell ken or a bii angwu ungingye ashi a kee, ngwu bè bii Ujeso atan-lengi angwu u kong ha ahe ye.
43004028	Ungingye umen ana a hà tyang 'iki 'ima ndor nya gbe ligbe-ligbe gye he lifung-ushu, u fel da bendi le:
43004029	"Mà be nde undi angwu a de-m biwom abi mi shi kung lè há 'isun 'igi. Hà ù nya yi Ukristi angwu Unim a som le ù kwu Undi-likpan a or?"
43004030	Bendi be mà ti kwuo ndo he 'ipi Ujeso ù yi.
43004031	Nyong angwu ungingye a gbe ndo há he lifung-ushu, bendi-utung Ujeso be tim he anung le ù zī lizi.
43004032	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mì yi lè lizi angi men ma ngye ngi ye."
43004033	Bè ha fel kong ha bende le: "Hà undi a be lè lizi ke-e hen or?"
43004034	Ujeso a de be le: "Dia! Lizi ligi lì yi le mì shi nyin Atyagi angwu a som mi le mì shi aki ama kpamm mi gbe mbee āngi.
43004035	Men ma bun ityang le 'i teng afell ande mà ukpong bikwukwan bi hà bi, ukpor mi da amen le, mà bel àshì nde gye he útiá hè men mà nde ná bikwukwan bi bī fel atamale.
43004036	Undi angwu u tam a nde lifem aki ama, le hè undi angwu a ma kwan lè angwu u tam bè kwu ukem yal gor. Kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi ke bendi abe be be lè bendi le bè be kwu lè likpan ligyang angyell angi lı ngyor igye.
43004037	Kì yi nya a na ityang i kong a le, undi-iso u kwan, unde-ma u fem.
43004038	Mi som amen le mà lè fem biwom abi men na ma kwan ye. Bendi besuso na be kwan ābi, men ma fel la za lifem abi bendi be shi a."
43004039	Bendi Usameria gbamm abe be ma be lè he lifung-ushu, be ma bong ha Ujeso le bwo ungingye umen ana a de be le Ujeso a de-e biwom puu abi a shi.
43004040	He ashina be tim he anung le ù ngyor kwu ha abe há. A bong ngyor kwu há ati afee.
43004041	He 'uhwo igie Ujeso, bendi besuso gbamm be mbee bong ha ahe.
43004042	Be kung de ungingye umen ana le: "Igie igang na i tem shi li li bong ha ungikye anwun ye, li bong likorye bel-agyang li gyo he lè atyung atyan a. He ashina li ngye le 'igyang-igyang a, ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan bendigye a."
43004043	Ujeso a kwu nya ati afee, a hà bo tem ndo he 'igie Ugalili.
43004044	A gye he Ugalili 'ubong 'uma 'ugyang, likorye a ngye le, "Angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim u kwa lè ife he 'ubong 'uma ye," nya a na ufe-gyang u shii kong a.
43004045	Nyong a wu há he Ugalili, bendi be kpe-e igor-igor likorye befe or be ma yi há he Ujeruselem he Kipam Agbele-gyong, be nde bikwele-uhwo abi a ma shi há he 'unyong 'umen ana.
43004046	Nya 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a hà tem item gye he Ukena he 'igie Ugalili ashi leěti a ma kung umbwo bel 'utyuo. Ki ma yi lè unwaa úkaandi ususo angwu a ma yi gogo ye he Ukapanyam.
43004047	Nyong ukaandi umen ana a gyo le Ujeso a gbe lè he Ujudia be fel he Ugalili, a lè hwaa lè he há, u tim he anung le ù gye he Ukapanyam he-e ù lè mbee he unwaa, likorye a kwun teng he lityam lityam.
43004048	Ujeso a kung de ukaandi ana le: "Men ma swan le ma bong ha ami faale afaale ma nde bikwele-uhwo ye."
43004049	Ukaandi ana a kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, bé lì hā gye akikye teng unwaa-gi u hwa."
43004050	Ujeso a de-e le: "Tem ndo gye he ushu, unwaa-gang u hwa ye." Ungikye ana a bong igie angi Ujeso a kong, u gbe ligye.
43004051	A lè fel kpee-kpee he ushu, bebwaa-ushom bema be be kpee lè he, be de-e le unwaa-ma a mbee.
43004052	A bii ābe le: "Kunyong ahwu hung inyiahwo ima i kwun he?" Be fan he le: "Uhwuhwo lè ishu nyong libwee li bel 'ubwo bel-bel na inyiahwo i ma kwun he."
43004053	Ātyām unwaa umen ana a ngye le nya he 'unyong 'umen ana na Ujeso a ma de-e le unwaa-ma u hwa ye. He 'uhwo ashina, ufe lè bendi bema puu be bong ha Ujeso.
43004054	Kikwele-uhwo ashi Ujeso a ma shi he Ugalili he 'unyong ahwun nyong a be lè he Ujudia na 'ì yi utepwom 'ikwele-uhwo ashi a shi, hè 'ì tyung bendi ikeb ima.
43005001	Nyong ashin 'i mbee, le bwo 'i ma fel 'unyong ahwu Ijuus i maa shi 'ipam 'ibell, Ujeso a mbee gye he Ujeruselem.
43005002	Ki ma yi lè umbwo ususo há he Ujeruselem gwaa he ungwu likong 'ipo itia. Be maa ko umbwo umen ana he igie Ihibru le Betezeta. He nya, ki ma yi lè bigigyo bidyong há ungwu likong.
43005003	Nya na bendi-angmam gbamm be maa ndē, abe be hwuà ashi or, abe be hwō abee or, abe be hwō agwo atyetye-atyetye or. [Be maa kwa nyong 'unyong ahwu umbwo u nyùng he abwo.
43005004	He 'unyong-unyong udengell Unim u shul ba he itang ba nyùng umbwo ana. Nyong umbwo a nyùng, ukpi-ikwu undi angwu a shul gye há umbwo, u mbee, mà ù mbu 'itaa lingmam 'iyang-yang or.]
43005005	Ki ma yi lè ungikye ususo angwu a ngmam 'i fel aze lisi lè ngi lihwo lè ngi adyong-ikie.
43005006	Ujeso a lè wu nya, a nde-e ù yi ndē nya, a ngye le a ngmam 'i gbe 'igbe mà. A kung bii he le: "Wo kee le wo mbee a?"
43005007	A fan he le: "Ukaandi, nyong umbwo u nyùng, kì yi lè undi angwu u kwu-m abwo gye he umbwo ye, te-te mi kaa le mi shul gya há, undi-iso a tang teng mi."
43005008	Ujeso a de-e le: "Bo 'inaa, kan ugaa ugang ndo gye."
43005009	Nya abwo-abwo a bo, kung ugaa uma tan gbe ligye. Liti angi Ujeso a ma mbee ungikye umen i li ma yi liti uwell Ijuus a.
43005010	He ashina, bekaandi Ijuus be de angwu a ma mbee ana le: "Kpash! Wó ngye le 'unyin 'ì yi liti uwell lityan a ye a? Ugaa angwu wo kung, wo tan lè he ana, wo kpe linaa."
43005011	Undi umen ana a fan ābe le: "Undi angwu a mbee mi, ufe na a de-m le mì kung ugaa ugi ndo gye."
43005012	Be kung bii he le: "Ayang a da-a le wò kung ugaa ugang ndo gye?"
43005013	Ungikye umen i a ngye undi angwu a mbee he ye, likorye Ujeso a shang gbe, le bwo bendi be ma sho há gbamm.
43005014	Ki gbe 'igbe ye, Ujeso a hà lè nde-e he Ushom Unim, a kung de-e le: "Nde, wo mbee mà. Tem shi 'iban ye, teng 'ibibi ashi 'i ban hwò ashin 'i ba hwaa lè wo."
43005015	Ungikye umen i a lè de bekaandi Ijuus le Ujeso na a mbee he.
43005016	He 'uhwo ashi le Ujeso a mbee ungikye umen i na bekaandi Ijuus be maa fel tel Ujeso.
43005017	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a ma de Ijuus le: "Atyagi u sha aki mbee 'unyong, kì yi kpe-kpe le mi or mì shi aki ná ufe."
43005018	Igie anyina i ban bekaandi Ijuus, be fel kam le be gwa he likorye a ban uten liti uwell libell, u mbee ko Unim le Atyam, ashi 'i ze le a kung 'uhwo-ma le a fel bizang ha Unim.
43005019	Ujeso a fan bekaandi Ijuus ana le: "Kigyang-igyang na mı de men i le mi Unwaa Unim, mì yi lè ikeb le mi sha 'iwom 'iyang-yang lè 'uhwo-gi ye, mi kee-kee sha abi mi nde Atyagi u shi a, likorye 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi Unim u shi na mi Unwaa-ma or mı shi.
43005020	Le bwo 'i nyin Unim lè mi, Unwaa-ma, u tyung mi biwom puu abi ufe-gyang u shi. U ba tyung mi biwom abi bi dyam hwò abi ma nde i or, hè 'ì kwu amen he 'uhwo.
43005021	Nya a na Unim u shi bendi abe be hwō be tem wum, u ke be likpan, kitaa a ken na mi Unwaa-ma or mı kung likpan ke undi uyang-yang angwu ufe-gyang a kee.
43005022	Ufe-gyang u tang ushe undi ye, a kung ikeb ke-m, mi Unwaa-ma a, le mì tang ushe bendi puu.
43005023	A shi 'itaa ana le hè bendi puu bè ke-m, mi Unwaa-ma, ife nya a na be ke Unim Atyagi. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ke-m, mi Unwaa-ma, ife ye, hà a ke Atyagi or ife ye, likorye Atyagi na a ma som mi be he igye anyin."
43005024	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Mî de men le undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo igie igi, u bong ha Atyagi Unim angwu a som mi be he igye i, u kwa lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye. Ù tem hwa ye ngyor igye kpamm. Ù tem gya he ushe Unim ye.
43005025	Kigyang-igyang na mı de men le 'unyong 'u ba lè há, mi de le 'u fel or mà, ahwu bendi abe be hwō be gyo lingmam ligi, mi Unwaa Unim. Bendi abe be gyo lingmam limen i be wum.
43005026	Nya a na Unim Atyetyan ù yi lè ikeb le u ka likpan, kitaa 'imen na a ke-m, mi Unwaa-ma, ikeb le mì ke likpan.
43005027	A mbee ke-m, mi Unwaa-ma, ikeb le mì tang ushe bendi likorye mì yi Unwaa Undigye a.
43005028	Ashi mi kong i 'ì kwu amen he 'uhwo ye. Baale 'unyong 'u fel ahwu bendi puu abe be hwō be gyo lingmam ligi,
43005029	be wum lè he lihwu. Bendi abe be maa shi binunung, be wum ba fel lè likpan ligyang angyell angi lı ngyor igye. Abe be maa shi bibibi, be wum gya he ushe Unim angwu be lè kpe 'ingie."
43005030	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Mi-gyang mì yi lè ikeb le mi sha 'iwom 'iyang-yang lè 'uhwo-gi ye, mi kee-kee sha 'iwom he ikeb Unim angwu a som mi be he igye i a. Mi tang ushe or ná a de-m le mì tang a. He ashin, ushe ugi ù yi kpa-kpa likorye mi sha ashi 'ı nyin mi a ye, mi sha ashi 'ı nyin Atyagi angwu a som mi a.
43005031	"Gbe mi de le mi kong 'igyang, mi bà uman ye, ki nya sha ná a bendi be bong le mi kong 'igyang a?
43005032	Kì yi lè undi-iso angwu u kong gbe lè mi le mì yi Unwaa Unim a. Mí ngye le u kong 'igyang gba lè mi.
43005033	Undi umen ana na ù yi Ujon. Ufe na leěti men ma ma som 'isom bii he le ù de men ashi 'ì yi 'igyang, a mà de men 'igyang.
43005034	"Mi-i kee undi a le ù kong ke-m ye, mi kung igie angi undigye u kong gbe lè mi a 'indee-indee ye. Ukpor mi kee-kee kong abin le hè men mà fel lè likpan 'unyong a.
43005035	Ujon a ma yi ná 'imor-inde ashi 'ı taa kangg, ma kpe igie ima he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, ma ma yi lè igor likorye 'ikung-gbo 'ima 'i tyung amen 'igyang.
43005036	Ukpor 'ì yi lè biwom bisuso abi bi dyam hwò igie Ujon abi bı tyung le Atyagi na a som mi. Bikwele-uhwo abi Atyagi a ke-m ikeb le mı shi, bi tyung le 'igyang-igyang Atyagi na a som mi.
43005037	Atyagi angwu a som mi, ufe-gyang a kong gbe lè mi le mì yi Unwaa-ma a. Ukpor men ma wa gyo lingmam lima ngye ye, ma wa nde-e ngye ye,
43005038	ma shi lè igie ima he atyam āmen ye, likorye ma bong ha ami, Unwaa-ma angwu a som, ye.
43005039	Men má kung 'unyong kangg shun 'ushia Unim li-li-li-li-li lè ugim le 'ushia ana 'ù tyung amen 'ukwo likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm. Kigyang-igyang, kushia ahwuna 'u kong gba lè mi.
43005040	Mà na or, ma swan le ma ba hwaa lè mi hè men mà kpe likpan limen ana ye.
43005041	"Mi-i kung ipee bendigye ná 'iwom a ye. Unim na mi ndor ugim le mi sha nyin he.
43005042	Ukpor mi ngye amen, mi ngye le 'i nyin amen lè Unim ye.
43005043	Ki nung nwongg le 'i nyin amen lè Unim ye likorye ma swan i-mi angwu mi be he lizen Unim Atyagi. Ukpor gbe undi a be hwaa lè men he lizen lima ligyang, ma kpá he.
43005044	Men ma kee-kee ndor àshì he ipee bende a. Unim angwu ufe-ufe na ù yi he 'ukpo, ki gbee amen le u pee amen ye or ye. Kife na 'i shi amen ma bong ha ami or ye.
43005045	"Mi na mı bé bun 'ibibi 'īmen de Unim ye, Umosis angwu ma fe lityam ha ahe a.
43005046	Gbe ma bong igie Umosis mà, hang ma bong ha ami a, likorye Umosis a ma fee gbe lè mi a.
43005047	Gbé ma bong àbi a fee ye, ki sha ná a, ma bong igie igi ife?"
43006001	Nyong ashin 'i mbee, Ujeso a bo gbe ndo he igbindi umbwo angwu be ko le Ugalili. Bé mbeē ko umbwo umen ana le Utaiberias.
43006002	Nya a na a maa ndor àshì gye há, bendi be ti kwuo pwom he likorye be nde bikwele-uhwo biwom abi a shi he bendi-angmam ambeeale.
43006003	Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be ma mbo 'igugo tang he 'usi, bel kwu ko.
43006004	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, kunyong 'ipam Ijuus ashi be ko le Kipam Agbele-gyong 'u ma fel kpee-kpee.
43006005	Ujeso a bel àshì shun kel-kel-kel, a nde le bendi be ti kwuo be ba hwaa lè he. A kung bii Ufilip le: "He hung nyin lì ndè ibred ndyebb ke bendi aben puu bè zi?"
43006006	Ujeso a kung Ufilip lè he 'usi he-e ù gyo ashi u kong a. Ujeso ugyang a ngye ashi nyin ù shi or mà.
43006007	Ufilip a fan he le: "Mà lì kung igaa ikwudi ifee or ndyebb ibred, i kpà ka ābe le undi-undi ù zī zangg na ana or ye."
43006008	Undi-utung Ujeso ken angwu be ko le Andru, u shi unwanam Usaimun Ipita, a kung de Ujeso le:
43006009	"Unwan ungikye ù yi nyin angwu ù yi lè bíkém ibred bidyong, u shi lè ìkwǎn ifee. Ukpor inwaa biwom anyin i kpell 'igegang bendi ashina ná a?"
43006010	Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le bè de bendi abena le bè kwu ko. Bendi puu be bel kwu ko. He liwu libell, bekaandi bengikye befe-befe be maa mbee asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'afee. (Bikpam bi ma go nya kangg.)
43006011	Ujeso a kung ibred ana kwu he 'ubwo, u pee Unim. A kung āngi bun puu kung ke bendi abe be kwu ko. A mbee kung ìkwǎn shi 'itaa a ken. Undi uyang-yang a zī gwul 'itaa a kee.
43006012	Be gwul puu, Ujeso a de bendi-utung bema le: "Mà gbong bigem abi be zī bi teng, hè uwun ken or ù ban 'idideng ye."
43006013	Bendi-utung bema be gbong ābi puu, bi sho bitetel lihwo lè bi bifee.
43006014	Bendi puu abe bè yi nya, be nde 'ikwele-uhwo ashi Ujeso a shi, be kung de le: "Kigyang-igyang, ungikye anwun ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim angwu leěti Unim a ma de le u ba ba he igye anyin a."
43006015	Ujeso a ngye le bendi abena be ma kam le be kwa he 'usu he ikeb. He ashina a bo gbe lè há gye he 'igie 'igugo ashi lè hell ututeb.
43006016	Likwulukwu li gyebb, bendi-utung Ujeso be shul gye he ungwu umbwo ukaandi,
43006017	lè ngwee he 'inong lishor tem, be gya he igbindi umbwo angwell, hè be bè gye he Ukapanyam. Nya a na be maa gye, kusu 'u gye be. Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, Ujeso a ma wa lè hwaa lè be ye.
43006018	Kufem 'u keb apuale a, umbwo u keb atōale 'ibibi-ibibi-ibibi.
43006019	Be gye 'ushu wu mbee ilamba ikie ha inde, be nde Ujeso u tan he likwu umbwo ndor àshì hwaa lè be. Be fel he 'ushell kangg.
43006020	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Kì yi-m mi a, mà shell ye."
43006021	Be ma gor igor kpe-e ngwee há he 'inong. Nyong a ngwee há ngwee-ngwee, kinong 'i wu he ugo-igye he 'ipi be maa ndor àshì gye.
43006022	Ashi a kung taa, bendi abe be ma so lè he igbindi umbwo he 'ipi Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be ma be, be nde le 'inong 'i ma teng nya ken a, be ngye le nyong bendi-utung Ujeso be ma kung 'inong ashina gbe, Ujeso a ma gye utung ha abe ye.
43006023	Binong bisuso bi ma be lè he Utaiberias be naa gwaa ha 'iteng 'imen ashi uhwuhwo bendi be ma zī lizi angi Atyetyan Ujeso a ma pee Unim he 'uhwo angi.
43006024	Nyong bendi abena be nde le Ujeso ù tem yi nya ye, bendi-utung bema or be tem shi nya ye, be mbo ngwee he binong abina bo ndo he Ukapanyam, be la shun Ujeso.
43006025	Nyong bendi abena be wu he ungwu umbwo, be gbe kpe igbindi, be nde Ujeso há, be bii he le: "Itisha, kunyong ahwu hung wo gbe tang hen?"
43006026	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi da amen 'igyang-igyang, ma tan kee mi likorye ma ma zī ibred angyell gwul a, ma kee mi le bwo ma nde bikwele-uhwo abi mi shi a ye.
43006027	Mà mbu gbèl kee lizi angi he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg li mbee i a ye, ma mbu gbèl kee angi lı ngyor igye kpamm hwan. Life li ka bendi likpan ligyang angyell angi lì yi lè likel ye. Kitaa lizi ashina na mi Unwaa Undigye, mi ke men abe Unim Atyagi a tyung amen gboo le ufe na a som mi."
43006028	Be kung bii Ujeso le: "Kibang 'itaa 'iwom ashi lì shi hè 'ì nyin Unim?"
43006029	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Kiwom ashi mà shi hè 'ì nyin Unim 'ì yi le mà bong ha ami angwu ufe a som be he igye anyin."
43006030	Be kung de-e le: "Gbe 'ì yi 'itaa ana, 'ibang 'ikwele-uhwo ashi wo shi lî nde shi lè ashi atyan, li hà bong ha awo? Kibang ashi wo shi tyung li?
43006031	Leěti nyong betietyan be maa tan he 'igbaa-libeb, be ma zī lizi angi lı be lè he 'usi angi be ko le imana, nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim le, 'Unim a som lizi lè he 'usi ke be le bè zī.' "
43006032	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Ndor mî de men 'igyang, lizi angi leěti Umosis a ma ke betiemen ana, lì yi ligyang angi lè he lifung-atabe a ye. Atyagi na u ke men ligyang angi lè he lifung-atabe.
43006033	Lizi angi Unim u ke bendi, lì yi angi lı be lè he lifung-atabe, bé lè likpan ke bendigye a."
43006034	Be kung de-e le: "Atyetyan, ke li lizi limen ana mbee 'unyong."
43006035	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi na mì yi lizi limen ana angi lı ke bendi likpan. Undi uyang-yang angwu a be hwaa lè mi, itung i tem ndó he ye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami, kigyor 'i tem gyor he ye.
43006036	Ukpor, kì yi nya a na mi bè de men a. Mà na men ma nde-m lè ashi or, ma bong ha ami ye.
43006037	Bendi puu abe Atyagi a kung fe-m he 'ubwo, be ba hwaa lè mi. Undi uyang-yang angwu a be hwaa lè mi, mi ndó he tem item ye,
43006038	likorye mi be lè he lifung-atabe le mî shi nyin Atyagi angwu a som mi a, mi be le mî shi nyin 'uhwo-gi a ye.
43006039	Kiwom ashi 'i nyin Atyagi angwu a som mi 'ì yi le mì nim undi ken or lè he liwu bendi abe a kung fe-m he 'ubwo ye, mi kam ābe, mi be wum ābe he liti angi igye anyin ı be mbee.
43006040	Atyagi a kee le bendi puu abe be nde-m, mi Unwaa-ma, be bong ha ami, bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye. Mi ba wum ābe lè he lihwu he liti angi igye anyin ı mbee."
43006041	Bekaandi Ijuus be keb inem anemale gbe lè Ujeso likorye a de le ufe ù yi lizi angi lı shul lè he lifung-atabe be he itang.
43006042	Be de le, "Ujeso ugyang, nde le unwaa Ujosef a ukpor? Li ngye atyam lè anam. Fe, ki shi ná a, u fel de le ufe a be lè he lifung-atabe a?"
43006043	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà tyang inem anemale he liwu līmen.
43006044	Kì yi lè undi angwu ù hà ndo be hwaa lè mi faale afaale Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye anyin na a be lè he ye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a be hwaa lè mi, mi ba wum he lè he lihwu he liti angi igye anyin ı mbee.
43006045	Bendi abe be maa tye ugie 'isom Unim be ma fee ndor leěti le: 'Unim u hwua bendi puu.' Undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo Igie Atyagi, u hwua kpe 'iwom lè há, u ba hwaa lè mi.
43006046	Mi fel kong i le undi-iso a bè nde Atyagi lè ashi a ye, mi angwu mi be lè ha ahe ufe-ufe na mi nde-e.
43006047	Mi da amen 'igyang a le undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami u kwa lè likpan angi lì yi lè likel ye.
43006048	Mi na mì yi lizi angi lı ke bendi likpan.
43006049	Mà na leěti betiemen be maa zī lizi angi be ko le imana he 'igbaa-libeb or, befe puu be ma hwō.
43006050	Ukpor lizi ligyang angyell angi lı be lè he lifung-atabe be he itang, undi uyang-yang angwu a zi āngi, u tem hwa ye.
43006051	Mi na mì yi lizi limen angi li be lè he lifung-atabe be he itang angi lı ke bendi likpan. Undi uyang-yang angwu a zī lizi limen i, u kwa lè likpan ngyor igye kpamm. Lizi angi mı ke bendi le hè be bè kwu lè likpan lì yi inyiahwo igi a."
43006052	He 'uhwo igie angi Ujeso a kong ana, bekaandi Ijuus be ma fel he ingywo keb abiale bende le: "Ki shi ná a, u de le u kung inyiahwo ima ka li lî zī?"
43006053	He ashina, Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mi da amen 'igyang a le, gbe ma zī inyiahwo igi ye, ma ngwo anung agi ye, hà ma kwa lè likpan ligyang angyell ye.
43006054	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a zī inyiahwo igi, u ngwo anung agi, u kwa lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm, mi be wum he lè he lihwu he liti angi igye anyin ı mbee.
43006055	Inyiahwo igi na ì yi lizi ligyang angyell, anung agi a shi 'ingwungwo 'igyang ashell.
43006056	Undi uyang-yang angwu a zī inyiahwo igi, u mbee ngwo anung agi, hà ù yi ūbībī ken ha ami, mi shi ūbībī ken ha ahe.
43006057	Atyagi angwu a som mi na u ke likpan. Nya a na mi kpe likpan lè ha ufe a, na undi uyang-yang angwu a zī inyiahwo igi u kwu lè likpan gbe ha ami.
43006058	Mi mbee bwan da amen le, inyiahwo igi na ì yi lizi ligyang angyell angi lı be lè he lifung-atabe be he itang; lizi angi betiemen be ma zī he libeb ana na lì yi lizi ligyang angyell ye, likorye mà na be ma zī āngi or, be ma hwō, ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a zī lizi angi mi ke-e, u tem hwa ye."
43006059	Ujeso a ma kong igie anyina leěti nyong a maa hwua bendi he ushom angwu be kwu liwu he 'ubong Ukapanyam.
43006060	Bendi-utung Ujeso gbamm abe be ma gyo igie angi Ujeso a kong ana, be de le: "Igie anyin ì yi ikaa-ikaa o. Ayang ù shi imen ana mbee?"
43006061	Ujeso a ngye ha lityam lima le be nem inem gba lè igie ima. A kung bii ābe le: "Ashi mi kong i i wee amen abwo a?
43006062	Kibang ashi ma be kong, gbe ma be nde-m mi Unwaa Undigye mi tem item gye he 'ipi mi be?
43006063	Ukatia Kunyong Unim na u ke undigye likpan, undigye ù yi lè ikeb le u ka likpan ye. He igie angi mi kong ha amen i na ma nde Ukatia Kunyong Unim, ma nde likpan.
43006064	Ukpor men besuso ma bong ha ami ye." (Kung lè há linde-linde, Ujeso a ngye bendi abe be be bong ha ahe ye, u mbee ngye angwu u be ndyebb he zi.)
43006065	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Fe na 'i tan lè shi mī de men le, kì yi lè undi angwu ù hà ndo be hwaa lè mi faale afaale Atyagi na a ke-e ikeb ná ye."
43006066	He ashin bendi gbamm abe be maa pwom Ujeso be tem item, tem pwom he gye 'ushu ye.
43006067	Ujeso a kung bii bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee le: "Hà men ufe? Men or ma mbee tem a?"
43006068	Usaimun Ipita a fan he le: "Atyetyan, ayang angwu bel ufe li mbee tem lè hwaa lè he, bwo wo ufe-ufe na igie igang i ke li likpan angi lı ngyor igye.
43006069	Bel li bong ha awo, li mbee ngye le wò yi undi gelalala angwu a be lè ha Unim a."
43006070	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Nde le ma ngye le mi na mi waa amen bendi lihwo lè be befee? Ukpor undi ken ù yi undi ubibi lè ha Usetan a."
43006071	(Ashi a ma kong ana, u kong gbe lè Ujudas, unwaa Usaimun Isikariyot a. Mà na Ujudas a ma yi he liwu bendi-utung bema abe lihwo lè be befee or, a maa kam le u ndyebb he za.)
43007001	Nyong ashin 'i mbee, Ujeso a maa tan mbee bipi he Ugalili. A ma kee le u gya he 'igie Ujudia ye, likorye bekaandi Ijuus be maa kee 'ukwo ahwu be gwu-e.
43007002	Kunyong ahwu Ijuus i shi 'ipam 'ibell ashi be ko le Kipam Kubuu 'u ma fel.
43007003	He ashin, bebwanam Ujeso be de-e le ù gye he Ujudia hè bendi-utung bema abe há bè nde bikwele-uhwo abi u shi.
43007004	Be mbee de-e le: "Undi angwu a kee le bè ngye-e, u ndyell 'uhwo-ma ye. Bwo wo shi bikwele-uhwo abin, shi ābi he 'ugbo hè bendi bè ngya-a."
43007005	(Bebwanam begyang or be bong ha ahe ye.)
43007006	Ujeso a fan bebwanam le: "Kunyong ahwu Unim a ndor le mì shi ná 'u wa fel ye. Ukpor men ufe, kunyong 'uyang-yang 'u ngbebb amen.
43007007	Bendi abe igye anyin be tel amen a ye, be tèl i-mi a, likorye mi da ābe le biwom abi be shi bì yi bibibi.
43007008	Men ma ndo te há he 'ipam, mi ufe mi waa ta ye, likorye 'unyong ahwu mi te há 'u wa fel ye."
43007009	A ma kong 'itaa ana ngyor kwu he Ugalili.
43007010	Nyong bebwende be gbe puu ndo há 'ipam, ufe or a hà bo. Ukpor a te há gboo a ye, a nyia inyia te.
43007011	Bekaandi Ijuus be maa shun he há he 'ipam, be maa bii le: "A be ye a?"
43007012	Bendi gbamm be maa kem Ujeso há he liwu. Besuso be da le: "Ù yi undi ununung a." Besuso be de le: "Dia! U mbeb bendi 'i go."
43007013	Kì yi lè undi angwu a maa kong gbe lè he gboo ye, likorye be shell bekaandi Ijuus.
43007014	Nyong be shi 'ipam fel he bedye-bedye, Ujeso a bo gbe he Ushom Unim, u fel hwua bendi biwom há.
43007015	Ki kwu bekaandi Ijuus he 'uhwo kangg, be kung bii le: "Ki shi ná a, a ngye 'iwom 'itel i, gbé a ngye 'ushia ye?"
43007016	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Biwom abi mı hwua bi ba lè he lingye ligi a ye, Unim angwu a som mi na u tyung mi ábi.
43007017	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le u sha nyin Unim 'igyang-igyang a, u ngya le hà abi mı hwua bi ba lè he ugim ugi ugyang or, hà bi ba lè ha Unim or.
43007018	Gbe undi u kong 'iwom he ikeb ima igyang, ashina 'i ze le a kee ipee bendi a. Ukpor gbe undi a kee le bendi be pee angwu a som he a, ashina 'i ze le u kong 'igyang a, u kwu lè uben ye."
43007019	"Nde le Umosis na a ma ke men Iten? Mà na or, he liwu līmen, kì yi lè undi ken or angwu a ndor āngi puu ye. Fe 'ibang a, ma kee 'ukwo ahwu ma gwu-m?"
43007020	Bendi be kung fan he le: "Wo ngyor lityuo! Baà ayang be kee le be gwa-a?"
43007021	Ujeso a de be le: "Ki kwu amen puu he 'uhwo likorye mi shi 'ikwele-uhwo he liti uwell.
43007022	Mà nde atenale, Umosis na a ma ke men uten le mà ten bebwaa-men bengikye. (Umosis na a ma kpi 'ikwu de bendi le bè ten ye, betietyan na be ma kpi 'ikwu lè lìten.) He 'uhwo uten umen i, ma ten bebwaa-men he liti uwell.
43007023	Bwo men ma ten bebwaa-men he liti uwell hè men mà ban Iten Umosis ye, ki shi ná a, ma mbu linaa ha ami le bwo mi mbee undi he liti uwell?
43007024	Mà tyang abwo lè ushe angwu ma maa he likpam nyin, mà maa ushe he 'igyang hwan."
43007025	Bendi besuso lè he Ujeruselem be de le: "Undi anwun na be kee le be gwa.
43007026	Mà nde-e, a naa u kong nya gboo, kì yi lè undi angwu u fan he or ye. Pisoye 'i nung bekaandi betyan le ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin a 'igyang.
43007027	Li ngye le nyong Undi-likpan umen i u be be, undi u ngya he 'ipi a be ye, ukpor ungikye anwun ufe, li ngye he 'ipi u be."
43007028	Nyong Ujeso a maa hwua bendi he Ushom Unim, a gaa kong kangg le: "Men ma de le ma ngye-m, ma mbee de le ma ngye he 'ipi mı be a? Nde le ma ngye le mi be he ikeb igi igyang a ye? Mi be he ikeb ángwu ù yi 'igyang, ukpor men ma ngye-e ye.
43007029	Mi ngye-e likorye mi be lè ha ufe a, ufe na a som mi be he igye anyin or."
43007030	He ashina be kaa le be kwa he, ukpor 'ì yi lè undi angwu a tyua he 'ubwo ye likorye 'unyong 'uma 'u ma wa fel ye.
43007031	Bendi gbamm be bong ha ahe. Be de le: "Kigyang-igyang ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan ùmén angwu Unim a som a. Ki nya sha ná a, undi-iso u mbee shi bikwele-uhwo hwò abi u shi i?"
43007032	Bendi Iferesis be gyo 'itaa bendi be kem Ujeso. Be lè tim ha bekaandi abe be shang Unim som bendi abe be kang Ushom Unim le bè lè kwu Ujeso.
43007033	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ujeso a de le: "Mi mbee kwa ipel ha amen he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, mi tem lè hwaa lè Atyagi angwu a som mi.
43007034	Men ma ba shun mi shun-shun kaa likorye mi ba kwa he 'ipi men ma wu há mbee ye a."
43007035	Bekaandi Ijuus be ma kong ha bende le: "Ukyebb ungikye anwun u kong le u gya hung a, bel lì wu há mbee ye? U ba gya he 'ubong Igrik he 'ipi bendi betyan bè yi a, he-e ù lè hwua bendi Igrik a?
43007036	Nyong a de le li ba shun he kaa, li mbee wu he 'ipi ù yi mbee ye, u kong 'ibang ikong?"
43007037	Ki ma fel he umbee-likel liti 'ipam, liti limen ana li ma dyam 'indee-indee. Nya he liti limen ana, Ujeso a bo naa 'inaa kung kong fem he igye gboo le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu umbwo u gyor he, ù be hwaa lè mi, mi ke-e umbwo he-e ù ngwo.
43007038	Ki yi nya a na be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami, umbwo angwu u ke likpan u ba ko u go kangg lè ha ahe lityam."
43007039	Ashi Ujeso a ma kong ana a maa kong gba lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu Unim u be som ke abe be bong ha ufe Ujeso a. Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Unim a ma wa ke bendi Ukatia Kunyong uma mà ye, likorye Ujeso a ma wa kwu ko he 'idem 'usu 'ima ye.
43007040	Nyong be gyo igie anyina, bendi besuso há he liwu be de le: "Kigyang-igyang a, ungikye anwun ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim angwu li kwu lı nyong a."
43007041	Bendi-iso be de le: "Eng, ungikye anwun ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som a." Besuso be de le: "Kpaa ye! Ukristi ù hà ndo ba lè he Ugalili a ye.
43007042	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le Ukristi u ba kwa igia Usu Udebid a, u ba ba lè he Betelehem he 'ipi leěti Usu Udebid a ma yi."
43007043	Kitaa ana na bendi be tang he abwo fel akwu-akwu he 'uhwo Ujeso.
43007044	Bendi-iso be ma kee le be kwa he, ukpor undi ken or a ma tyua he 'ubwo ye.
43007045	Bendi abe be kang Ushom Unim abe be ma som be tem be hwaa lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bendi Iferesis. Bekaandi ana be hà kung bii ābe le: "Ki shi ná a, ma be lè he ye?"
43007046	Be de bekaandi ana le: "Bwo ukong-ukong li wa gyo undi a kong 'iwom ná ungikye anwun ye."
43007047	Bendi Iferesis be de le: "Men aben or, a mbee mbeb amen a?
43007048	Kì nya yi lè undi ken or lè he liwu bekaandi Ijuus, mbee lè ha bendi Iferesis angwu a bong ha ahe a? Dia,
43007049	ukpor bendi item zii abe be ngye Iten Umosis ye na be bong ha ahe, Unim a zob ābe."
43007050	Unikodimes angwu leěti a ma gye lè hwaa lè Ujeso a ma yi he liwu bendi Iferesis limen i. Ufe a kung de bema le:
43007051	"Nya a na Iten ityan ì yi, li tang ushe undi faale afaale li gyo he igie ye. Li gyo he, saa lì ha ngya ashi a shi."
43007052	Be de le: "Hā ndo wo or wò yi 'ubong Ugalili á? Shun he 'ushia Unim li-li-li, wo nda le be fee 'iwom há le undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim u ba lè he Ugalili a ye."
43007053	Bendi puu be gbe ligye.
43008001	Nya a na bendi be maa gye, Ujeso a gye he ukwell angwu be ko le Olif.
43008002	Ashi a taa nya leèti-leèti, a tem gye he Ushom Unim, bendi be mbee gbong be sho ha ahe nya. A bel kwu ko, u fel hwua ābe biwom.
43008003	Bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten, lè abe Iferesis, be be lè ungye libee angwu be kwu-e ha ungikye, be kpe-e lè naa he he 'ushu.
43008004	Be kung de Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, li kwu ungingye anwun ha ungikye.
43008005	He 'ushia Iten, Umosis a fee nya le, gbe undi a shi 'itete 'iwom ashin, lì maa akor gwu-e. Kibang 'ì yi ugim ugang he likong anyin?"
43008006	Be kong ashin kee 'ukwo ahwu bè kwu-e, gbe a kong pwell a. Ujeso a keb, u fel fee udyong-bwo he itang.
43008007	Be gye 'ushu bii he bibibi kpamm a bo 'inaa, u de be le: "He liwu līmen, undi angwu a wa shi 'iban ngye ye, ufe ù kpi 'ikwu kung 'ukor maa he."
43008008	A mbee keb, u fee udyongbwo he itang.
43008009	Nyong be gyo igie anyina, be gbe lè há he 'uken-uken kpi lè ha bekaandi. Ujeso ufe-ufe na a teng naa nya lè angwu ungingye naa he lè he 'ushu.
43008010	Ujeso a bo 'inaa, kung de-e le: "Iye, abe be ben-a bè yi hung a? Kì yi lè undi angwu a tem maa-a ushe le bè gwu-a ye a?"
43008011	A fan Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, kì yi lè undi ye." Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Mi or mi ben-a ye. Ndo gye, tem shi 'iban ye."]
43008012	Ujeso a mbee kong ha bendi le: "Mi na mì yi 'ikung-gbo ke igye anyin. Undi uyang-yang angwu u pwom mi, u tan he 'ifufebb ye, u kwa lè 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ı ke bendi likpan."
43008013	Bendi Iferesis be de-e le: "Wo-o naa 'uhwo-gang ushada, ushada ugang ù yi 'igyang ye."
43008014	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi naa ushada gba lè 'uhwo-gi, ushada ugi u shi 'igyang likorye mi ngye he 'ipi mı be, mi mbee ngye he 'ipi mı tem gye. Men ma ngye he 'ipi mı be or, ngwu mà ngye he 'ipi mı gye or ye.
43008015	Men bendi igye anyin, ma maa undi ushe he ugim undigye a, mi ufe mi be mi maa undi ushe a ye.
43008016	Mà mi maa undi ushe or, ugi u kwa 'igyang, likorye mì yi ututeb ye. Bel lè Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye anyin na li maa.
43008017	Men mà ndè he 'ushia Iten īmen, be fee nya le, gbe bendi befee be naa ushada he 'iwom ken, hà 'iwom ashi há 'ì yi 'igyang a.
43008018	Mà nde, mi naa 'uhwo-gi ushada, Atyagi angwu a som mi or u naa ushada ugi le mi kong 'igyang."
43008019	Be bii he le: "Atia ugyang ù yi hung a?" Ujeso a fan le: "Ma ngye-m ye, ma ngye Atyagi or ye. Kí yi yi le má ngye-m, hang ma ngye Atyagi or titi."
43008020	Ujeso a ma kong igie anyina nyong a maa hwua bendi biwom he Ushom Unim, u shi kwu gwaa he 'ipi be fe únde. Undi a ma kwu-e ye, likorye 'unyong 'uma 'u ma wa fel ye.
43008021	Ujeso a de be le: "Mi ndo gya; ma ba shun mi kaa. Nyong ma hwō, biban bīmen bi ba ngyor amen he abwo. Ma ba kwa lè ikeb le ma gya he 'ipi mı gye ye."
43008022	Bekaandi Ijuus be de le: "Ashi u de le u gya he 'ipi bel lı be gye mbee ye ana, ki ze le ana a? Hà u ba gwa 'uhwo-ma or?"
43008023	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Men mà yi ke igye anyin a, ukpor mi-ì yi ke igye anyin a ye. Ushu ūmen ù yi igye anyin a, ukpor ushu ugi ù yi igye anyin a ye, ù yi he lifung-atabe a.
43008024	Mi bè de men le biban bīmen bi ba ngyor amen he abwo. Mi kong 'igyang a, gbe ma bong le mì yi undi angwu mì yi i a ye, ma ba hwa, biban bīmen bi ngyor amen he abwo."
43008025	Be bii he le: "Ayang ù yi-a wo?" A de be le: "Mì yi undi angwu kung lè he ukpi-ikwu mi de men le mì yi a.
43008026	Men ma zī libi he biwom gbamm abi hang mi nya de le ma nim. Ukpor mi mbee bwan da amen le Atyagi angwu a som mi ù yi 'igyang. Mi da bendi biwom abi a tyung mi a."
43008027	Ki ma nung ābe le u kong ha abe gba lè Unim Atyam a ye.
43008028	He ashina Ujeso a kung de be le: "Nyong ma be kung i-mi Unwaa Undigye ndor he 'usi, na mà ha be ngye le mì yi undi angwu mi de men le mì yi a, ma mbee ngye le mi sha 'iwom he ikeb igi a ye, mi kong ashi Atyagi a tyung mi a.
43008029	Angwu a som mi ù yi utung ha ami, u tyang mi ututeb ye, likorye mbee 'unyong puu mi sha ashi 'i nyin he."
43008030	Bendi gbamm abe be gyo igie angi Ujeso a kong ana, be bong ha ahe.
43008031	Ujeso a hà kung kong ha abe be bong ha ahe le: "Gbe ma gye 'ushu ke igie igi ife, hà mà yi bendi begi a 'igyang.
43008032	Ma ba ngya 'igyang, mà 'igyang 'i ba sha amen ma kwa porr."
43008033	Bendi-iso be fan he le: "Bel lì yi igia Ebraham a, li ma bè yi he lifee ngye ye. Ki shi ná a, wo de le li ba kwa porr?"
43008034	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mà ngye dangg le undi uyang-yang angwu u shi 'iban ù yi ufee 'iban a.
43008035	Ufee u kwa he ushu atyam ngyor igye ye; unwaa na u kwu he ushu atyam ngyor igye.
43008036	Gbe mi Unwaa Unim, mi fem amen lè he lifee, ma fel porr na afong.
43008037	Mi ngye le mà yi igia Ebraham a. Mà na or, ma kee 'ukwo ahwu mà gwu-m, likorye ma bong igie igi ye.
43008038	Mi-i da amen ashi mi nde lè he 'ipi Atyagi a, ukpor men ma sha abi umen atyamen a de men a."
43008039	Be de-e le: "Bel ufe, Ebraham na ù yi atyetyan." Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mà kwu igia Ebraham a 'igyang, hang ma sha ná Ebraham a maa shi.
43008040	Ukpor ma fel kam le ma gwa-m, mi undi angwu mi de men 'igyang ashi mi gyo lè ha Unim. Ebraham a maa shi 'itete 'iwom ashina ye.
43008041	Ma sha likpe bya atyamen a." Be de-e le: "Atyetyan ù yi ken a, Unim ufe-ufe a. Be hwan li he akpela a ye."
43008042	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Kì be kwu 'igyang a le Unim na ù yi atyamen, hang 'i nyin amen lè mi, likorye mi be lè ha ufe a be nyin. Mi be he ikeb igi igyang a ye, ufe na a som mi.
43008043	Ki shi ná a, abi mi kong bı nung amen ye? Atan-lengi uma ù yi le igie igi i keè ha amen ye.
43008044	Usetan, usu bibibi, na ù yi atyamen. Biwom abi bi nyin atyamen le mà shi na bi nyin amen or titi. Ù yi undi 'ihwu a uwell-uwell. U kong 'igyang ye, likorye 'igyang 'i keè ha ahe ye gbang-gbang. Nyong u bè uman, u sha ashi 'ì yi likpe lima a, likorye ù yi undi-uman a, u shi usu uman a.
43008045	Bwo mi ufe, mi de men 'igyang gbe lè biwom Unim, kife na 'i tan lè shi ma bong ha ami ye.
43008046	Kì nya yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu ù nya tyung 'iban ashi mi shi a? Kì yi lè undi ye. Gbé mi de men 'igyang a, ki shi ná a, ma bong ha ami ye?
43008047	Undi angwu ù yi unwaa Unim a, u dang 'utyung gyo igie ima. Atan-lengi angwu men ma dang 'utyung gyo āngi ye ù yi le mà yi bebwaa Unim a ye."
43008048	Bekaandi Ijuus be bii Ujeso le: "Bel li de le wò yi 'ubong Usameria a, ikeb ibibi i ngwee-a, i bel-a lishi. Li bà uman a?"
43008049	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ikeb ibibi ì yi ha ami ye. Atyagi angwu mi fe-e na ù yi ha ami, ukpor men ma fa-m ye.
43008050	Mi na mi kee le bendi bè fe-m ye. Atyagi na u kee le bendi bè fe-m; ufe na u be tang ushe biwom puu.
43008051	Mi da amen 'igyang, undi uyang-yang angwu u shi igie igi u tem hwa ye ngyor igye kpamm."
43008052	Be kung de-e le: "Igie igang i shi li li ngye dangg le ikeb ibibi i ngwee-a, i bel-a lishi. Ebraham ugyang or a hwō; abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim or be hwō. Fe, ki shi ná a, wo de le undi angwu a shi igie igang ù tem hwa ye?
43008053	Atietyan Ebraham a hwō. Wo-o dyam hwo-e a? Abe leěti be maa tye ugie 'isom Unim be hwō. Wo kung 'uhwo-gang le wò yi ayang a?"
43008054	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Kì kwu le mi-gyang na mı lem 'uhwo-gi, hang ilem igi ì yi 'idideng. Ukpor Atyagi na u lem mi; ufe umen na men ma de le ù yi Unim ūmen.
43008055	Mà na ma de le ufe ù yi Unim ūmen or, ma ngye-e ye. Mi na mi ngye-e. Gbe mi de le mi ngye-e ye, hà mi fel undi-uman nya a na men a. Ukpor mi da amen le mi ngye-e, mi ke igie ima ife.
43008056	Atiemen Ebraham a ma yi lè igor, nyong Unim a ma de-e le u ba nda liti angi mı be. A mà nde ngi, u yal gor kangg."
43008057	Be kung fan he le: "Wo a? Wo angwu wo wa wu aze asi afee lè ngi lihwo or ye, wo ma nde Ebraham ugyang he bifem â?"
43008058	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Mi da amen le mi-ì yi, mà ukpong be hà hwan Ebraham."
43008059	Be bung akor hè be bè maa gwu-e, ukpor be tem nde-e ye. A nyia gbe lè há Ushom Unim.
43009001	He liti ken, Ujeso a maa tan gba he 'ukwo, a nde undi-iso angwu a hwuà ashi kung lè he lifung anam.
43009002	Bendi-utung bema be bii he le: "Itisha, kiban ayang 'i shi be hwan ungikye anwun ashi kpi-kpi? Kiban 'ima 'igyang â, hà ashi átyám lè anam a?"
43009003	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "A hwuà ashi he 'iban ashi 'ima 'igyang or, ngwu atyam lè anam a or ye. A hwuà ashi le hè bendi bè ndè ikeb Unim ha ahe a.
43009004	Kì yi kpe-kpe le lì shi aki Atyagi angwu a som mi ná kusu 'u wa gye ye i. Baale 'usu 'u gye. Nyong u gye, undi u tem sha aki mbee ye.
43009005	Nya a na mì so he igye i, mì yi 'ikung-gbo a ke igye anyin."
43009006	A kong igie anyina i mbee, a sho akung wu he itang, kung udyong-bwo naa āngi. A hà shi āngi gbaa uhwua-ashi ana he itong-shi.
43009007	A kung de-e le: "Ndo gye lè to àshì he umbwo angwu be ko le Usalom." (Lizen angi le Usalom li ze le asomale.) Uhwua-ashi ana a bo gbe ndo há, a lè to àshì puu. Nyong a tem be, u fel nda.
43009008	Bendi bema lè bendi puu abe be bè nde-e nyong u kwu he 'ukwo nyong 'inyong, be de le: "Aye, uhwua-ashi angwu u shaa kwu he 'ukwo nyong 'inyong i ye a?"
43009009	Bendi-iso be de le ufe a. Besuso be de le ufe a ye. A bi-e ibi. Ufe-gyang a hà kung kong le: "Mi a."
43009010	Be kung bii he le: "Ná wo shi nyong ashi agang a buu?"
43009011	A fan ābe le: "Undi angwu be ko le Ujeso, a naa itang shi gbaa mi he ashi; u de-m le mì gye lè to āngi he umbwo Usalom. Mi lè to āngi to-to, a mà buu, mi fel nda."
43009012	Be kung bii he le: "Ungikye umen ana ù yi hung a?" A fan ābe le: "Mi ngye ye."
43009013	Bendi abe be ma yi há be kpe kung ungikye umen angwu leěti a ma hwuà ashi ana gbe lè he lè hwaa lè bendi Iferesis.
43009014	He liti uwell Ijuus na Ujeso a ma naa itang shi atong-shi ungikye anwuna a ma buu.
43009015	Bendi Iferesis or titi be bii he ná a shi atong-shi ama a buu. A de be le: "A shi itang gbaa mi he ashi, mi lè to āngi, mi fel nda."
43009016	Bendi Iferesis besuso be de le: "Ungikye anwun a be lè ha Unim a ye. Ù be lè ha Unim a, hang u ndor uten liti uwell." Besuso be de le: "Ù kwu undi ubibi a, hang u sha 'ikwele-uhwo ashi 'itel i mbee ye." He ashin be tang he abwo fel akwu-akwu.
43009017	Be mbee kung bii he le: "Wo de le ungikye anwuna na a sha-a wo fel nde, wo-gyang ufe, wo nya gim le ù yi 'ibang 'itaa undi a?" A fan ābe le ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a.
43009018	Bekaandi Ijuus be swan le ungikye anwun a bè hwuà ashi, saa u hà fel nde ana ye. Be som ko atyam lè anam,
43009019	be bii ābe le: "Unwaa-men i a? Kigyang a le a ma hwuà ashi kung lè há liti angi ma hwan he a? Ná 'i shi u fel nde?"
43009020	Atyam lè anam be fan le: "Li ngye le ù yi unwaa-tyan a. Ki shi 'igyang a le nyong li ma hwan he, a hwuà ashi.
43009021	Ukpor li ngye ná a shi nyong u fel nde ye. Li ngye undi angwu a buu he ashi ye. Mà bii he ufe-gyang. Ù nem yi unwani a ye. Ufe-gyang u da amen."
43009022	Atyam lè anam be ma kong igie anyina, likorye be maa shell bekaandi Ijuus. Be shell ābe likorye be ma kong ndor le undi angwu a kong gboo le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som a, be tem bong he u gba he ushom ubell angwu be kwu liwu ye.
43009023	Ashina na 'i tan lè shi be de le: "A kpè, bii he ufe-gyang."
43009024	Be hà ko he ufe-gyang 'ugbe ahwu lefee, be de-e le: "Unim ù yi nyin, kong 'igyang. Ndè le undi angwu wo de le a sha-a wo fel nda i ù yi undi-iban a?"
43009025	A fan ābe le: "Hà ù yi undi-iban a or, hà ù yi undi-iban a ye or, mi ngye 'ife ye. Kiwom ken ashi mi ngye 'ife 'ì yi le, leěti mi ma hwuà ashi, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i mi fel nda."
43009026	Be kung bii he le: "Ná a shi nyong ashi agang a buu?"
43009027	A fan ābe le: "Mi bè de men mà, ukpor ma kee le ma kpa ye. Kibang a, ma mbee bii mi? Sha-m ná men or ma la fel bendi-utung bema nà?"
43009028	Be buu he atye de-e le: "Wo na wò yi undi-utung uma; bel ufe, lì yi bendi-utung Umosis a.
43009029	Li ngye le leěti Unim a maa kong ha Umosis. Ungikye anwun ufe, li ngye he 'ipi u be ye."
43009030	Ungikye anwuna a fan le: "Wô! Wo! Ma kong 'iwom 'i ban he 'utyung! Men ma ngye he 'ipi u be ye or, ufe na a shi-m mi fel nde.
43009031	Li ngye le Unim u gyo undi-iban ye. Bendi abe be fe-e, be mbee shi ashi a kee na u gyo ābe.
43009032	Bwo ukong-ukong li wa gyo he 'ipi undi a shi undi angwu a hwuà ashi u fel nde ngye ye. Undi a wa gyo ashina ngye ye.
43009033	Kigyang-igyang, ungikye anwun u ba lè ha Unim a. Kì kwu ná a ye, hang u sha biwom abin mbee ye."
43009034	Be de le: "Wô! Wo! Wo angwu be ma hwan lè 'iban, wo kaa le ha-a à hwua li bel ihwua a?" Be ndó he lè há ushom ubell angwu be kwu liwu tyang he igye.
43009035	Ujeso a gyo le be ndō ungikye anwuna. A kee he kpamm lè nde-e, u bii he le: "Wo bong ha Unwaa Undigye a?"
43009036	A fan Ujeso le: "Ukaandi, de-m undi angwu há, mî bong ha ahe."
43009037	Ujeso a de-e le: "Wo nde undi umen ana or mà. Ufe na u kong ha awo i."
43009038	A kung de le: "Atyagi, mi bong ha awo." A bel tim anung he itang nya he 'ushu Ujeso.
43009039	Ujeso a de le: "Atan-lengi angwu mi be he igye anyin ù yi le, hè be bè ngye abe be fe Unim lè abe be fe-e ye. U shi le, hè bendi abe be nde ye bè fel nde, abe be kung 'uhwo-bell le be nda, hè be bè fel àshì kpi-kpi."
43009040	Bendi Iferesis besuso abe bè yi há be gyo igie anyin, be kung bii he le: "Wo kong i le bel or li hwuà ashi â?"
43009041	Ujeso a fan le: "Kì kwu le ma hwuà ashi, ma ngye ashi ma shi ye, hang ma za libi ye. Ukpor bwo ma de le ma nda, mā zī libi."
43010001	Ujeso a de le: "Mi da amen 'igyang a le, undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le u ngwee he 'ipo itia, gbe a gbe he ungwu lishi a gye há afee ye, a bel gbe he 'iteng 'isuso a gye há, hà ù yi uzi korlorkpokpo a.
43010002	Undi angwu a gbe he ungwu lishi a gye há afee, hà ù yi undi angwu u kam ìtiā a.
43010003	Undi angwu u kang ungwu lishi u buu he ufe lishi he-e ù gbe. Ìtiā ima or i shob igie ima nyong u ko āngi he azen, u mbee teng āngi gye he igye.
43010004	Nyong a tang lè ngi he igye, u gba āngi 'ushu, ife i pwom he, likorye i shob igie ima.
43010005	Ukpor i bong pwom undi-iso ye, i buu he ibuu, likorye i ngye igie ima ye."
43010006	Ujeso a bun ityang anyin de be, ukpor ashi a maa kong 'i nung ābe ye.
43010007	He ashina Ujeso a de be le: "Mi da amen 'igyang a le mi na mì yi ná ungwu lishi 'ipo itia.
43010008	Bendi puu abe be be teng mi, bè yi ná bezi a, ìtiā i gyo ābe ye.
43010009	Mi na mì yi ná ungwu lishi. Undi uyang-yang angwu a gbe ha ami a gye he afee, u kwa lè likpan 'unyong. U tan gya he afee tan ba he igye 'itaa a kee, u kwa lè biwom puu abi 'i fong he lè bi he igye.
43010010	Uzi u kee-kee ba le he-e ù zì kung biwom, u gwu bendi, u ban biwom a. Ukpor mi ufe, mi be le hè bendi bè kwu lè likpan ligyang angyell angi lı ngyor igye, be kwu lè ngi mbee akekel puu.
43010011	"Mì yi ná undi angwu u kam ìtiā ngbebb-ngbebb. Undi angwu u kam ìtiā ngbebb-ngbebb u bong lihwu he 'uhwo itia ima.
43010012	Undi angwu be hwaà ihwaa, ù yi undi angwu u kam itia a ye, itia imen ana i shi ima ye. Gbe undi angwu 'itaa i a nde ùkpòng u be lè hell, u buu tyang āngi. Ùkpòng u be kwu itia zi, angi i teng i paa he abwo.
43010013	Undi angwu be hwaà ihwaa ana, u buu tyang ìtiā likorye 'i gbee he lè ngi ye, i shi ima a or ye.
43010014	Mì yi undi angwu u kam ìtiā ngbebb-ngbebb, mi ngye ìtiā igi, ife i ngye-m,
43010015	nya a na Atyagi a ngye-m, mi ngye-e. Mi kam le mi hwa he 'uhwo angi.
43010016	Mi teng lè ìtiā isuso angi i wa fel he liwu i ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le mì be lè ngi ife or titi. I ba dang 'utyung gyo mi, i be fel ipel ha anyin hè ngi ì fel ukem, undi ken u kam āngi.
43010017	"Ki nyin Atyagi lè mi likorye ma kam le mi hwa, mî kpe likpan he umbee-likel.
43010018	Kì yi le undi u fel kwa-m he ikeb a kpa kung likpan ligi ye. Mi-gyang na mi bong le mi hwa. Gbe mi kee le mi hwa, mi hwa; gbe mi kee le mi tem wum, mi tem wum. Ashin na Atyagi a de-m le mì shi."
43010019	Ashi a kong ana 'i shi bekaandi Ijuus be mbee tang fel akwu-akwu.
43010020	He liwu libell, besuso be maa da le: "Ikeb ibibi i ngwee he, i bel he lishi, u fel ngyor lityuo. Bel li ndor 'utyung gyo anwuna ye o."
43010021	Besuso be de le: "Undi angwu ikeb ibibi i ngwee he, i bel he lishi, u kong 'itaa i a ye. Ikeb ibibi i sha bihwua-ashi bi nda a? Kpaa ye."
43010022	Kunyong 'u ma fel ahwu be shi 'ipam he awellale 'unyong ahwu be ma kung Ushom Unim angwu he Ujeruselem fe Unim he 'ubwo. Ki ma yi 'unyong 'akwuo a.
43010023	He liti ken Ujeso a maa tan he Ushom Unim he 'iteng ashi be ko le 'igigyo Usolomon.
43010024	Bendi Ijuus be be há, be lè sho fe-e. Be de-e le: "Wo ko le 'i gbe 'igbe ná a, wo hà de li 'itaa undi ashi wò yi? De li gboo, hà wò yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan or."
43010025	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Mi bè de men undi angwu mì yi, ukpor ma bong ye. Bikwele-uhwo abi mi shi he ikeb Atyagi, bi tyung amen undi angwu mì yi,
43010026	ukpor ma swan le ma bong ha ami ye, likorye mà yi bendi begi a ye.
43010027	Bendi begi befe, be ngye igie igi, bè yi ná ùtiā angwu a ngye igie atyam be pwom he. Mi mi ngye be, befe be pwom i-mi.
43010028	Mi ka ābe likpan ligyang angyell angi lì yi ngyor igye, bè hà tem ndo hwa ye; ki shi lè undi angwu u kpe kung ābe lè ha ami mbee ye.
43010029	Atyagi na a kung ābe fe-m he 'ubwo, ufe a dyam hwò puu. He ashin, kì yi lè undi angwu u kpe kung ābe lè he 'ubwo Atyagi mbee ye.
43010030	Bel ha Atyagi lì yi ken."
43010031	Bendi Ijuus be mbee bung akor hè be bè maa gwu-e.
43010032	Ujeso a de be le: "Men ma nde binunung gbamm abi mi shi he ikeb Atyagi. He liwu binunung abin, ashi yang ma kee le ma maa mi akor he 'uhwo ashi?"
43010033	Be fan he le: "Kì yi he 'uhwo binunung abi wo shi na li maa-a akor i ye, li maa-a likorye wo kong bia Unim a. Wo angwu wò yi undigye a, fe wo de le wò yi Unim a."
43010034	Ujeso a de be le: "He 'ushia Iten īmen, be fee há le Unim a de le, 'Mi Unim, mi de le men mà yi ìnīm a.'
43010035	Kì yi lè uman he 'ushia Unim zangg or ye. He ashin, bwo Unim a de le bendi aben abe be gyo igie ima bè yi 'itaa ken ha ufe-gyang,
43010036	fe 'i shi ná a ngwu mà de le mi bia Unim, nyong mi de le mì yi Unwaa Unim a? Mi na Atyagi Unim a waa som be he igye anyin.
43010037	Gbe mi shi ná Atyagi a de-m a ye, ma bong ha ami ye.
43010038	Ukpor gbe mi shi ná Atyagi a de-m a, mà ma bong ha ami ye or, kì yi le mà bong ha ami he 'uhwo biwom abi mi shi, abi ma nde lè ashi, hè 'ì nung amen le Atyagi ù yi ipel ha ami, mi shi ipel ha ahe."
43010039	Bendi abena be mbee kaa le be kwa Ujeso, ukpor a shang hwaa ābe lè he abwo.
43010040	Ujeso a mbee tem tia umbwo Ujodan kpe indi tem gye he 'ipi leěti Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo, a ngyor kwu nya.
43010041	Bendi gbamm be ma be hwaa lè he nya. Be de le: "Mà na Ujon a ma shi 'ikwele-uhwo ye or, ukpor 'iyang-yang ashi a ma kong gbe lè ungikye anwun 'ì yi 'igyang."
43010042	He ashina bendi gbamm be bong ha Ujeso nya he 'iteng 'imen ana.
43011001	Ki ma yi lè ungikye ususo angwu be ko le Ulazorlos he 'ubong Beteni. Nya na bebwende, bendi befee, be ma yi. Be maa ko angwu ken le Umeri, be ko angwell le Umata. Umeri umen i na leěti a ma kung behwu benunung wu Ujeso ha abee, u bel lè igil ima shell he ángi. Ungwende Ulazorlos a ma yi gogo ye.
43011003	He ashin bebwende be som 'isom hwaa lè Ujeso le udim-ma lityam ù yi gogo ye.
43011004	Nyong Ujeso a gyo 'isom ashin, a de le: "Lingmam anyin lì yi angi lihwu a ye, li mbu-e le hè bendi bè nde ikeb Unim, be kung ipee puu ke Unwaa Unim a he 'uhwo angi."
43011005	Mà na 'i nyin Ujeso lè Umata lè ungwende Umeri lè Ulazorlos or, nyong a gyo le Ulazorlos ù yi gogo ye, a ngyor kwu nya 'iteng 'imen ana ati afee.
43011007	Ati a gbe afee, a hà de bendi-utung bema le: "Mà lì tem gye he Ujudia."
43011008	Be fan he le: "Itisha, nde le nyin ingyesu-ingyesu i na bendi Ijuus be maa kaa le be maa akor gwa-a lè há, fe wo de le wo tem gya há a?"
43011009	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ki kwa gboo kung leèti gyebb likwulukwu. He 'unyong 'umen i, gbe undi u tan litan, u tya abee fa 'iwom ye, likorye kikung-gbo ashi igye anyin 'ì yi ha ahe.
43011010	Ukpor undi angwu u tan lè 'ifufebb na u ti fe, likorye kikung-gbo 'ì yi ha ahe ye."
43011011	Nyong a kong ashina, a mbee kong le: "Udim-tyan Ulazorlos a mbu 'unde, mi ta la wum he."
43011012	Be de-e le: "Ukaandi, gbe a mbu 'unde a, hà 'i ndo die he."
43011013	Ukpor Ujeso a maa kong ashi le Ulazorlos a hwō a; befe be ma kong le u mbwa 'unde 'ugyang a.
43011014	Ujeso a hà tem lè igie anyina kong gboo le: "Ulazorlos a hwō.
43011015	He 'uhwo 'umen mì yi lè igor le mi ma yi há ye, likorye biwom abin bi shi le hè men mà bong ha ami a. Mà bo, li gye lè nde-e."
43011016	Utormas (angwu be mbee ko le bégbé) a de bende-ma le: "Mà be, li te utung ha ahe, hè li bel puu lì lè hwō 'ugbe ken."
43011017	Ujeso a lè wu há, be de-e le be ngi Ulazorlos 'i fel ati ande mà.
43011018	Kung lè he Ujeruselem gye he Beteni 'ì yi lè 'igbe ye, ki mbee ilamba ifee a.
43011019	Ijuus gbamm i ma gye Umata befe lè Umeri lihwu.
43011020	Nyong Umata a gyo le Ujeso u ba lè há, a bo lè kpee lè he lè he 'ukwo; ukpor Umeri a ngyor kwu há he ushom.
43011021	Umata a kung de-e le: "Atyagi, wò bé kwu nyin, hang unwandagi a hwō ye.
43011022	Ukpor mi ngye le mà na a hwō mà or, Unim u ka-a 'iyang-yang ashi wo bii he."
43011023	Ujeso a de-e le: "Unwanaa u wum lè he lihwu."
43011024	Umata a de-e le: "Mi ngye le u ba wum lè he lihwu nyong bendi puu be be wum he liti angi igye anyin ı mbee."
43011025	Ujeso a de-e le: "Mi na mı wum bendi lè he lihwu, ke be likpan. Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami, mà ù hwō or, u tem kwa uwum ngyor igye kpamm.
43011026	Undi angwu a bong ha ami, u shi lè likpan anyin, u tem hwa ye ngyor igye kpamm. Wo bong igie anyin a?"
43011027	A fan Ujeso le: "Atyagi, mi bong. Mi bong le wò yi Ukristi, Unwaa Unim angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin a."
43011028	Umata a kong ashin puu, a hà tem lè nyia de ungwende Umeri le: "Ukaandi a fel i, a le wò te."
43011029	Umeri a gyo igie anyin gyo-gyo, a tie bo buu gbe gye he 'ipi Ujeso ù yi.
43011030	Ujeso a ma wa wu ha ahe ushu ye. A ma so lè he 'ukwo he 'ipi Umata a ma kpee lè he.
43011031	Bendi abe be ma sho há he ushom be tie lè Umeri, be nde ná a tie bo tang he igye, be pwom he, likorye be maa kong le u gya he likwun Ulazorlos he-e ù lè ki a.
43011032	Umeri a lè wu há, nyong a bel àshì nde Ujeso, a gyebb shī he itang, kung de-e le: "Atyagi, wò bé kwu nyin, hang unwandagi a hwō ye."
43011033	Ujeso a nde ná Umeri u ki, u nde ná bendi abe be te utung ha Umeri be ki, ki ban he he lityam kangg.
43011034	A kung bii ābe le: "Ma ngi-e hung a?" Be de-e le: "Atyetyan, bé nde."
43011035	Ujeso or a ki.
43011036	Bendi abena be de le: "Kpash! Ki ma nyin he lè he dii."
43011037	Besuso be de le: "Ndè le ufe na a ma shi uhwua-ashi u fel nde? Fe, ki shi ná a, hang a ma nya mbee Ulazorlos kaa?"
43011038	Ki mbee ban Ujeso he lityam kangg. A kung gbe gye he likwun Ulazorlos angi li ma yi ubung a. Be mung 'ukor shī há he ungwu ángi.
43011039	A de be le: "Mà kung 'ukor lè há." Umata, unwanam Ulazorlos angwu a hwō ana, a de-e le: "Atyagi, kikpong likwom nyin 'i go gba gyong, likorye be ngi-e 'i fel ati ande."
43011040	Ujeso a de-e le: "Mí yi bè da-a 'igyang a le, gbe wo bong ha ami, wo nda ikeb Unim."
43011041	Be mung 'ukor lè há likwun. Ujeso a nde àshì gye he 'usi kung kong le: "Ada, mi pee-a ná wo gyo mi.
43011042	Mi ngye le wo gyo mi mbee 'unyong. Mi fel kong ashin le hè bendi abe be sho i bè bong le wo na wo som mi be he igye anyin a."
43011043	Nyong a kong ha Unim 'i mbee puu, a kung gaa kangg le: "Ulazorlos! Bo be he igye!"
43011044	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo, Ulazorlos angwu a ma hwō ana a bo be he igye. Bihwom bi ma yi nii he he abwo lè abee lè lishi. Ujeso a de be le: "Mà pell he ábi he-e ù gye."
43011045	Bendi Ijuus abe be ma yi utung ha Umeri be nde ashi Ujeso a shi, be bong ha ahe gbamm.
43011046	Ukpor besuso be gbe lè há lè bun de bendi Iferesis ashi Ujeso a shi.
43011047	Nyong be gyo āshi, Iferesis lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim be ko liwu bekaandi puu. Nyong be kpee ukem, be bii bende le: "Lì ha sha ná a? Ungikye anwun ù so-i sha bikwele-uhwo gya 'ushu.
43011048	Gbe li tyang he le ù gye 'ushu shi biwom abin, hà bendi puu be ba bong ha ahe. Ashin 'i ze le bendi Urom be ba ban li Ushom Unim, be mbee ban li 'ubong puu."
43011049	Undi-iso a ma yi há, be ko he le Ukayafas. Ufe na a ma yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim nya lize limen ana. A bo 'inaa de be le: "Má ngye 'iwom ye gbangg!
43011050	Ki wa nung amen le 'ì yi ngbebb-ngbebb le undi ken ù hwō he lishi bendi puu hwò ashi le 'ubong 'ubo-ubo 'ù nim ye a?"
43011051	Ufe-gyang na a gim igie anyina kong ye, i be lè ha Unim a, bwo ufe na a ma yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim nya lize limen ana. A ma de bendi 'iwom ashi 'ı shi, ashi 'ì yi le Ujeso u hwa he lishi Ijuus puu.
43011052	Kì yi le u hwa ka Ijuus ife-ife a ye, u hwa ka bendi Unim puu he-e ù be lè be lè he biteng puu abi be paa wu, be gbong ābe ukem.
43011053	He 'uhwo igie Ukayafas, kpi kung lè nya liti limen ana, bekaandi Ijuus be maa fel kee 'ukwo ahwu bè gwu Ujeso.
43011054	He ashina Ujeso a tem tan há he Ujudia gboo ye. A bo gbe lè há he Ujudia gye he 'ubong ahwu be ko le Ifram. Ku ma yi 'anwaa 'ubong a, ku shi gwaa ha 'iteng ashi undi a ndē há ye a. Ujeso a fel kwu nya lè bendi-utung bema.
43011055	Kunyong ahwu Ijuus ì shi Kipam Agbele-gyong 'u ma fel kpee-kpee. Bendi be ma bo mbee biteng puu há ufam ubell gye he Ujeruselem. Be maa ta hè be bè lè shi 'uhwo-bell be fel betaa-betaa ná likpe 'ubong 'ubell lì yi, mà ukpong 'ipam 'i hà fel.
43011056	Be maa shun Ujeso. Nyong be gbong ukem he Ushom Unim, be bii bende le: "Ma gim le ana a? U nya ba 'ipam ashin ye a?"
43011057	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bendi Iferesis be ma ke uten le, undi angwu a ndè he 'ipi Ujeso ù yi, ù be de be hè be bè lè kwu-e.
43012001	Nyong 'i ma teng ati adyong-ken gye he Kipam Agbele-gyong, Ujeso a ma tem gye he Beteni, kipi ashi ushu Ulazorlos ù yi. Ulazorlos umen i na Ujeso a ma wum lè he lihwu.
43012002	Nya likwulukwu limen ana be shi Ujeso lizi ngbebb-ngbebb. Umata na a maa kung lizi be ke be. Ulazorlos a maa za lizi ipel ha baa Ujeso.
43012003	Umeri a be nya, a be lè 'itityuo behwu abe be kaa 'ate kangg. Be kung ashia angi be ko le unad a shi behwu bemen abe be nung nyin ana. A kung behwu ana bel wu Ujeso he abee, u bel lè igil ima shell he ángi. Kinung ábe 'i sho kpe mbee ushom puu.
43012004	Undi-utung Ujeso ken, angwu be ko le Ujudas Isikariyot, angwu a ma fel ndyebb he zi, a kung de le:
43012005	"Behwu abena be wa igaa ikwudi ikie. Ndè le hang li kung behwu abena ndyebb zi kung únde anwuna ke bendi-likaa?"
43012006	Ujudas a maa kong 'azi a, a maa kong le bwo 'i gbee he lè bendi-likaa a ye. Ufe na a maa kam únde, ù yii zà gia sha bima bifong.
43012007	Ujeso a de-e le: "Tyang he. Ki ngbebb ná a ndor nyong 'unyong angyele ugi á.
43012008	Bendi-likaa bè yi utung ha amen mbee 'unyong, ukpor mi ufe, mi ba kwa utung ha amen mbee 'unyong ye."
43012009	Nyong bendi be gyo le Ujeso ù yi he Beteni, bendi 'ipam be ti kwuo be há. Ujeso ufe-ufe na be ma kee le be nda ye. Be ma kee le be nda Ulazorlos angwu Ujeso a wum lè he lihwu or titi.
43012010	He ashin bekaandi abe be shang Unim be tim le bè gwu Ulazorlos or titi,
43012011	likorye he 'uhwo 'uma bendi gbamm be maa fel gba tyang ābe la bong ha Ujeso.
43012012	Ashi a taa, bendi abe be gye Kipam Agbele-gyong he Ujeruselem be gyo le Ujeso a ndor àshì u ba há he Ujeruselem.
43012013	He ashina be gbel akikie biwua kwu he abwo bo, be la kpee lè Ujeso. Be maa gyam agyam hwaa temm le: "Ipee ì kwu ke Unim. Unim ù ke undi angwu u be he lizen Atyetyan Unim ana 'ukwun. Unim ù ke Usu Ijuus 'ukwun."
43012014	Ujeso a nde ūshōm 'izaaki, u pwom āshi nya a na leěti be ma fee he 'ushia Unim a. Be fee le:
43012015	"Men bendi Uzayon, mà shī shell ye. Usu ūmen u ba lè há, u pwom ūshōm 'izaaki."
43012016	He 'unyong ahwu a shi ashin, ki nung bendi-utung bema nya abwo-abwo ye. Ukpor nyong ifem Ujeso i tyung gboo lè he lifung-atabe na ki hà nung ābe. Be hà well le be ma fee he 'ushia Unim le ashin 'i sha, be mbee well le 'itaa abin puu bi shi.
43012017	Bendi puu abe be ma yi há nyong Ujeso a wum Ulazorlos lè he lihwu, be fel bun da bendi ashi be ma nde.
43012018	Bendi gbamm be bo lè hwaa lè Ujeso likorye be gyo gbe lè 'ikwele-uhwo ashi a shi.
43012019	Nyong Iferesis i ndè ná bendi be ti kwuo lè hwaa lè Ujeso, be de bende le: "Mà nde, aki atyan a fel 'idideng. Bendi puu be ti kwuo pwom he."
43012020	Bendi Igrik be ma yi he liwu bendi abe be ma gye he Ujeruselem hè be bè fe Unim há 'ipam.
43012021	Igrik ana i lè hwaa lè Ufilip angwu u be lè he 'igie Ugalili, ashi be ko le Besaida. Be de-e le: "Ukaandi, li kee le li nda Ujeso."
43012022	Ufilip a kung lè de Andru gbe lè shi, befe ha ahe a, puu befee, be hà te lè de Ujeso gbe lè shi.
43012023	Gyo Ujeso le: "Kunyong 'u fel ahwu bendi be ke-m mi Unwaa Undigye ife.
43012024	Mi da amen 'igyang, gbe utong ukwul a mbu tyang he itang, gbe a hwō ye, u ngyor 'itaa ù yi, u ba lè isuso ye. Ukpor gbe a mbu tyang he itang, a hwō, ù ha ba lè isuso gbamm.
43012025	Undi uyang-yang angwu 'i nyin he lè likpan lima he igye i, u ba nim likpan lima ligyang angyell. Ukpor angwu 'i nyin he lè likpan lima he igye i ye, u ba kwa lè likpan ligyang angyell ngyor igye kpamm.
43012026	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kong le u kwa undi aki ugi a, ù pwom mi. Kiteng ashi mı gye, u gya utung ha ami há. Undi angwu a be pwom mi le he-e ù shi-m aki, Atyagi u fem he ufe or titi."
43012027	Ujeso a de le: "Lityam li ngbebb mi ye. Mì hà de le ana a? Mì de Atyagi le ù kpe kung 'ingie ashin lè ha ami â? Ki ngbebb ná ye, likorye kife kpa-kpa na mi be.
43012028	Ashi mi fel kong 'ì yi le, 'Atyagi, shi ashi 'ì shi bendi bè fem lizen ligang.' " A hà gyo igie lè he lifung-atabe le: "Mi tyung ifem igi mà, mi mbee ba tyung āngi."
43012029	Bendi abe be ma yi naa nya, besuso be de le, itaa na i tye; besuso be de le, udengell Unim na a kong ha ahe.
43012030	Ujeso a kung de be le: "Igie anyina i kong he 'uhwo 'ugi a ye, i kong he 'uhwo 'umen a.
43012031	Kunyong 'u fel ahwu Unim u tang ushe bendigye. Kunyong 'u fel ahwu Unim u waa Usetan lè he 'usu he igye anyin.
43012032	Mi ufe, nyong be kung mi ndor he 'usi, kunyong 'umen ana na mı be lè bendi puu hwaa lè 'uhwo-gi."
43012033	(Ujeso a kong igie anyina le hè bendi bè ngye 'itaa lihwu ashi u be hwō a.)
43012034	Bendi abena be de-e le: "Be fee he 'ushia Iten Unim le, Ukristi u kwa ngyor igye. Fe, ki shi ná a, wò so-i de le be ba kung Unwaa Undigye ana ndor he 'usi? Ayang ù yi Unwaa Undigye angwu há?"
43012035	Ujeso a de le: "Kikung-gbo 'i fel taa ha amen he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg a. Ná 'ikung-gbo 'ì so utung ha amen i, mà ndo tan akikye, le hè 'ifufebb 'ì gye tel amen he 'ukwo ye. Undi angwu u tan he 'ifufebb u ngya he 'ipi u gye ye.
43012036	Ná 'ikung-gbo 'ì so utung ha amen i, mà bong ha ashi, hè men mà fel bendi 'ikung-gbo." Ujeso a kong igie anyin puu, a hà buu lè ndyell he 'ipi undi u ngye ye.
43012037	Mà na be ma nde bikwele-uhwo gbamm abi Ujeso a shì or, be bong ha ahe ye.
43012038	Biwom abina bi shi nya a na leěti Azaya angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong a. A ma kong le: "Atyagi, kì nya yi lè undi angwu a bong ha ashi li kong a? Kì nya yi lè undi angwu a nde shob ikeb igang a?"
43012039	Bendi abena be maa bong ha Ujeso mbee ye nya a na Azaya a kong le:
43012040	"Unim a hwuà ābe àshì, u teb ābe àtyám, le hè be bè nde ye, hè biwom abin or bì nung ābe ye, hè be bè bel àtyám abell hwaa lè he le ù kpan ābe ye."
43012041	Azaya a ma kong igie anyin le bwo a nde ìfém Ujeso, a kong gbe lè ufe a.
43012042	Mà na or, bekaandi Ijuus gbamm be bong ha Ujeso. Ukpor be shell ná be kong gboo le be bong ha ahe teng bendi Iferesis be ndō ābe lè he ushom ubell angwu be kwu liwu.
43012043	Ki nyin ābe befe Ijuus lè ipee bendigye hwò angi Unim.
43012044	Ujeso a kung gaa kangg kong le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami, a bong ha ami ufe-ufe a ye, a bong ha Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye i or titi.
43012045	Undi uyang-yang angwu a nde-m, hà a nde Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye i.
43012046	Mi be he igye i ná 'ikung-gbo, le hè undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami he-e ù ngyor kwu he 'ifufebb ye.
43012047	Undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo igie igi, ukpor a ke ngi ife ye, mi na mi maa ushe uma ye. Mi be he igye i le mî be maa bendigye ishe a ye, mi be le mî kpan ābe a.
43012048	Ukpor undi angwu a swan mi, u kpe igie igi ye, u ba naa he ushe he liti angi Unim u tang ushe bendi puu. Igie igi na ı be tang libi ke undi umen ana,
