43012049	likorye igie angi mı kong i ba lè he ugim ugi a ye. Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye i na u de-m ashi mì kong.
43012050	Mi ngye le likpan angi lı ngyor igye li ba lè he igie ima. Ashin na 'i tan lè shi igie angi mi kong ì yi angi a de-m le mì kong a."
43013001	Kunyong 'u ma fel le 'uhwo be sha Kipam Agbele-gyong. Ujeso a ngye le 'i fel 'unyong ahwu ù tyang igye anyin tem lè hwaa lè Atyam. Kung lè há ukpi-ikwu 'i nyin he lè bendi bema abe be ma yi he igye anyin. He 'unyong ahwun a tyung ābe benyin bema sho yilidididi.
43013002	Likwulukwu li gyebb, Ujeso befe lè bendi-utung bema be maa za lizi abwo ukem. Ki ma yi le Usetan a ma kung ugim ubibi fe Ujudas Isikariyot, Unwaa Usaimun, he lityam lè he item le ù ndyebb Ujeso zi.
43013003	Ujeso a ma ngye le Atyam a kung biwom puu fe-e ufe he 'ubwo, u ngye le a be lè ha Unim a, u ba tem la hwaa lè ufe umen a.
43013004	Nya a na be ma yi ukem, a bo 'inaa waa ùkpè aliga ken ndor he itang, u kung igedie nii fe he uten;
43013005	a kung umbwo bel fe he 'igbor, keb bendi-utung bema abee atoale, u kung igedie shell ābe ángi.
43013006	A to be fel ha Usaimun Ipita, Ipita a kung de-e le: "Atyagi, wo na wò tem to i-mi abee a?"
43013007	Ujeso a fan he le: "Ki nung-a ashi mı shi i mà ye. Ukpor kunyong 'u ba lè ha ahwu 'ı be nung-a."
43013008	Ipita a kung de-e le: "Mì hà ndo bong le wò to i-mi abee ye." Ujeso a de-e le: "Gbe mi to-a abee ye, hà bel ha awo li mbee."
43013009	Gyo Ipita le: "Atyagi, tem to mi abee afe-afe a ye, fel to mi abwo or, lishi or."
43013010	Ujeso a de-e le: "Undi angwu a kwob umbwo mà, a fel utaa-utaa; abee ama afe-afe na a fel teng le bè to. Men puu mà yi betaa-betaa, kee-kee teng undi ken ufe-ufe a."
43013011	Ujeso a ma ngye undi angwu u be ndyebb he zi, fe na a de le befe puu na bè yi betaa-betaa ye.
43013012	A to ābe abee puu, a tem lè aliga ama shī, tem lè kwu ko. A bii ābe le: "Ashi mi shi amen nyin 'i nung amen a?" A kung de be le:
43013013	"Men ma shi 'i ngbebb ná ma ko mi le Itisha, ma mbee ko mi le Atyamen. Mì yi ufe a 'igyang.
43013014	Bwo mi angwu mì yi Itisha ūmen, mi shi Atyamen, mi to amen abee, kì yi le men or mà shi ha bende ná mi shi i.
43013015	Mi tyung amen ashi 'ì yi le mà shi mà, ki fel teng le mà shi ha bende ná mi shi a.
43013016	Mi da amen 'igyang, unwaa ushom u dyam hwà atyam ye, unwaa-isom u dyam hwà angwu a som he ye.
43013017	Má ngye biwom abin. Unim u ka amen 'ukwun, gbe ma shi ābi.
43013018	Ashi mi kong i 'ì yi ke men puu a ye. Mi ngye bendi begi abe mi gia. Kigyang-igyang, ashi be fee he 'ushia Unim 'i sha ná be fee āshi. Be ma fee le: 'Undi angwu bel ha abe li zī lizi abwo ukem, a bel fel linaa ha ami.'
43013019	Mi da amen biwom abin ndor he itang 'anaa-anaa i, le nyong bı be shi, hè men mà bong le mì yi undi angwu mì yi a.
43013020	Mi da amen 'igyang, undi uyang-yang angwu a kpe unwaa-isom angwu mi som, hà a kpe-m mi a. Undi uyang-yang angwu a kpe-m, hà a kpe Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye i a."
43013021	Ujeso a kong igie anyin puu, lityam li ban he kangg. A kung kong gboo le: "Mi da amen 'igyang, undi ken lè he liwu līmen i a kam le u ndo ndyebb mi za."
43013022	Bendi-utung bema be bel àshì shun bende, fel tyāng undi angwu u kong gbe lè he.
43013023	Undi-utung Ujeso angwu 'i nyin Ujeso lè he kangg ana, a ma yi kwu gwaa ha Ujeso.
43013024	Usaimun Ipita a kung 'ubwo tyung hwaa lè he de-e le, ù bii Ujeso undi angwu u kong igie anyina gbe lè he.
43013025	He ashina undi-utung ana a die ngie Ujeso kung bii he le: "Atyagi, ayang a?"
43013026	Ujeso a fan le: "Undi angwu há na mi ndo tib 'ahwaa lizi ke-e i." A ndaa 'ubwo kung lizi tib ke Ujudas, unwaa Usaimun Isikariyot.
43013027	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo nyong Ujudas a ndaa 'ubwo kpe lizi ana, Usetan a ngwee he. Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Ndo shi ashi wo kam le wo sha ana akikye, shī ban 'unyong ye."
43013028	Bendi-utung bema abe be teng, ki nung ābe ashi a de-e ana ye.
43013029	Bwo Ujudas na a maa kam ābe únde, besuso be maa kong le Ujeso a som he le ù lè ndyebb biwom abi nyin be shi 'ipam a, besuso be gim le hà Ujeso a de-e le ù lè ke bendi-likaa biwom a or.
43013030	Ujudas a kpe lizi ana kpe-kpe, a shul gbe he igye. (Ki ma yi lè 'usu a.)
43013031	Nyong Ujudas a shul gbe, Ujeso a kung de bendi-utung bema abe be teng le: "Kunyong 'u fel ahwu bendi be nde ifem igi, mi Unwaa Undigye, be mbee nde ifem Unim gbe ha ami.
43013032	Bwo bendi be nde ifem Unim gbe ha ami Unwaa Undigye a, Unim or, u ba kung mi ndor he lībwò likaandi he-e ù tyung bendi ifem igi, mi Unwaa Undigye. Kunyong ahwu u shi ashin 'u fel or mà.
43013033	Bebwaa-gi, mi ndo tyang amen, kunyong 'ugi 'u mbee puu. Ukpor 'ì yi nya a na mi ma de bekaandi Ijuus a. Ma ba shun mi kaa, ma ba wa he 'ipi mi ndo gye i ye.
43013034	Uten ufufe angwu mi ke men ù yi le, kì nyin amen lè bende. Kitaa benyin abe mi-ì yi lè be ha amen, na 'ì yi kpe-kpe le mà kwu lè be ha bende.
43013035	Gbe he ashi le 'i nyin amen lè bende, bendi puu be ngya le mà yi bendi-utung begi a."
43013036	Usaimun Ipita a kung bii Ujeso le: "Atyetyan, wo gya hung a?" Ujeso a fan he le: "Kiteng ashi mı gye, kanaa-anaa i ufe, ma wa gye há utung ha ami mbee ye. Ukpor liti li ba lè há angi ma be lè hwaa lè mi há."
43013037	Ipita a de-e le: "Atyagi, kibang a, mı pwom-a 'anaa-anaa i ye? Mi kam le mi hwa he 'uhwo 'ugang."
43013038	Ujeso a fan he le: "Wo kam 'igyang-igyang a le wo hwa he 'uhwo 'ugi a? Mi da-a 'igyang le nyin wo swan 'ugbe 'akie le wo ngye-m ye, mà ukpong 'igia ukwuo 'i hà ko."
43014001	Ujeso a mbee de be le: "Ufung ù tem be men ye, mà gye 'ushu bong ha Unim, ma gye 'ushu bong ha ami or titi.
43014002	He ushu Atyagi, ishom ì yi há gbamm. Kì kwu ná ye, hang mi de men. Mi gya há, mî lè kam 'iteng ndor amen.
43014003	Nyong mi kam amen áshi 'i mbee puu, mi tem ba gbong amen la hwaa lè 'uhwo-gi, le he 'ipi mi-ì yi, hè men mà kwu ipel ha ami nya.
43014004	Men ma ngye 'ukwo ahwu mà gbe lè wu he 'ipi mı gye i."
43014005	Utormas a fan he le: "Atyetyan, li ngye he 'ipi wo gye ye, ki sha ná a, lı ngye 'ukwo lè wu há?"
43014006	Ujeso a de be le: "Mi na mì yi 'ukwo, mi shi 'igyang, mi shi likpan. Kì yi lè undi angwu u gbe lè hwaa Atyagi fem i-mi tyang ye.
43014007	Gbe ma ngye-m, hà ma ba ngya Atyagi or titi. Kung lè há 'unyin, ma ngye-e, ma mbee nde-e lè ashi."
43014008	Ufilip a de-e le: "Atyetyan, tyung li Atia. Ashin 'ife-ife na 'ı kee-kee kwun li 'igyor."
43014009	Ujeso a fan he le: "Ufilip, kongukpaa angwu mì yi utung ha amen i, wo wa ngye-m ye a? Undi uyang-yang angwu a nde-m, hà a nde Atyagi. Ki shi ná a, wo de-m le mì tyung amen Atyagi?
43014010	Wo bong le mì yi ipel ha Atyagi, Atyagi u shi ipel ha ami a? Igie angi mi kong, mi kong āngi he ikeb igi a ye, mi kong he ikeb Atyagi angwu ù yi ha ami, u shi aki ama gbe ha ami a.
43014011	Men mà bong le bel ha Atyagi lì yi ubibi ken. Gbe ma kee le ma bong he 'uhwo igie igi ye or, mà bong he 'uhwo biwom abi ma nde-m mi shi.
43014012	"Mi da amen 'igyang, undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ami u sha biwom abi mı shi. U sha abi bi dyam hwà abi mı shi or, likorye mi gya hwaa lè Atyagi a.
43014013	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma bii mi he lizen ligi, mi sha āshi ka amen, hè bendi bè fem Atyagi gbe ha ami, Unwaa-ma.
43014014	Gbe ma bii mi 'iwom 'iyang-yang he lizen ligi, mi sha āshi."
43014015	Ujeso a kong gye 'ushu le: "Gbe 'i nyin amen lè mi, mà ndor iten igi.
43014016	Mi ba kong ha Atyagi, mà u ba som amen Undi-Ukpell ususo. U ba kwa ipel ha amen ngyor igye kpamm.
43014017	Undi-Ukpell umen i ù yi Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu u be tyung amen 'igyang, u shi àtyám āmen a kwu genn. Bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin, be kpa he ye, likorye be nda he or, ngwu bè ngye-e or ye. Men ufe, ma ngye-e, likorye ù yi ipel ha amen, u shi he atyam āmen.
43014018	"Mi gba tyang amen le ma fel ututeb a ye. Mi mbee tem ba hwaa lè men.
43014019	Ki teng zangg, bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin be tem nda-m ye, ukpor men ma nda-m. Le bwo mì yi uwum, men or titi ma ba kwa bewum.
43014020	He liti limen Ukatia Kunyong Unim u be hwaa lè men ana, mà ha ngya le bel ha Atyagi lì yi ubibi ken, bel ha amen li shi ubibi ken, mì yi he atyam āmen.
43014021	Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngye iten igi, u shi āngi, ufe na 'i nyin he lè mi. Undi angwu 'i nyin he lè mi, ki nyin Atyagi lè he, ki nyin mi lè he titi, mi kung 'uhwo-gi tyung he."
43014022	Ujudas (angwu Isikariyot a ye) a bii he le: "Atyetyan, he 'ukwo ahwu yang wo be kung 'uhwo-gang tyung li bel ufe-ufe, wo tyung àbe bè yi ke igye anyin ye?"
43014023	Ujeso a fan he le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu 'i nyin he lè mi, u sha ashi mı kong. Ki nyin Atyagi lè he, bel ha ahe li ba kwa ipel ha undi umen ana.
43014024	Undi angwu 'i nyin he lè mi ye, ù hà ndo sha ashi mı kong ye. Mà well le igie angi ma gyo i, i ba lè ha ami a ye, i ba lè ha Atyagi angwu a som mi a.
43014025	"Mi de men biwom abin nya a na mì so utung ha amen i.
43014026	Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu ù yi Undi-Ukpell, Atyagi u ba som he ka amen he lizen ligi, u ba hwua amen 'igyang puu, u mbee shi amen ma well biwom puu abi mi de men.
43014027	"Nyin i ná mi ndo tyang amen, ikwun igi na mı kung ke men. Ikwun imen anyin i ba lè he biwom igye a ye. Ufung ù tem bè men ye, ma tem kwu lè 'ushell or ye.
43014028	Mi bè de men le mi ndo gya, ukpor mi tem ba hwaa lè men. Gbe 'i nyin amen lè mi, hà mà yal gor lè ibubo he ungwu likorye mi gya hwaa lè Atyagi a, ma ngye le Atyagi a dyam hwo-m.
43014029	Mi de men abin kie he itang, le he 'unyong ahwu bı shi, hè men mà bong igie igi.
43014030	Mi tem kong ha amen lè 'igbe ye, likorye baale Usetan, usu igye anyin, u fel i. Ukpor ù yi lè ikeb le u da-m ashi mì shi ye.
43014031	Mi kee-kee sha ná Atyagi a ke-m uten a, le hè undi uyang-yang ù ngye le 'i nyin mi lè Atyagi. Mà bo 'inaa, li gye he 'iteng 'isuso."
43015001	Ujeso a mbee de bendi-utung bema le: "Mì yi ná ùkwán ugyang. Atyagi u shi ná undi angwu u kam ùkwán ana.
43015002	Ububu ugi uyang-yang angwu a wum agbe ye, u tang he tyang hell. Angwu u wum, u kam he he-e ù fel wum kangg.
43015003	Men mà yi ná 'ibubu 'imen ana. Igie igi angi mi bun de men i kam àtyám āmen, i shi āngi a fel ataa-ataa.
43015004	Mà ngyor gwaa ha ami kpebaa, mi or mi ngyor gwaa ha amen kpebaa. Ububu ufe-ufe faale liten ukwan u wum agbe ye, u kee-kee wum agbe, gbe ù yi gwaa he ubim a. Kitaa 'imen na men or, gbe ma ngyor gwaa ha ami ye, ma kwu lè lifem ye.
43015005	"Mi yi ná ùkwán ana, men ma shi ná ibubu igi. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor gwaa ha ami kpebaa, angwu mi or mì yi gwaa ha ahe kpebaa, u kwa ná ububu angwu u wum shal-shal-shal nà. Ukpor gbe men ma tang lè ha ami, kì yi lè ashi mà tem shi mbee ye.
43015006	Undi uyang-yang angwu a tang lè ha ami, Unim u tem sha lè he 'iwom ye, nya a na ububu angwu be tang tyang lè hell, u hwa a. Be gbong ibubu angi 'itaa i fa he 'inde, i shī dim bel atyung.
43015007	Ukpor, gbe ma ngyor gwaa ha ami kpebaa, igie igi i ngyor kwu ha amen atyam, ma bii Atyagi 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma kee, u ka amen áshi.
43015008	Gbe ma shi binunung mbee 'unyong, hà ma sha bendi be fem Atyagi. Kitaa i na ma tyung bendi gboo le mà yi bendi-utung begi a.
43015009	Kitaa benyin abe Atyagi ù yi lè be ha ami, na mì yi lè be ha amen. Mà ngyor kwu he benyin begi.
43015010	Gbe ma shi abi mi de men, hà ma ngyor kwa he benyin begi, nya a na mi shi biwom abi Atyagi a de-m, mi ngyor kwu he benyin bema i.
43015011	Mi de men ashin le hè men mà kwu lè 'itaa igor angi mì yi lè ngi, le hè igor īmen ì sho yilidididi.
43015012	"Uten angwu mi ndo ke men ù yi le: Kì nyin amen lè bende ná 'i nyin i-mi lè men.
43015013	Benyin abe be dyam hwò puu na bè yi le undi ù hwō he 'uhwo udim-ma.
43015014	Men ma kwa bedim-gi a, gbe ma shi ashi mi de men.
43015015	Mì tem kung amen ná bebwaa-isom a ye, likorye unwaa-isom u ngya ugim atyam ye. Mi fel kung amen ná bedim-gi hwan, likorye mi de men biwom puu abi Atyagi a de-m.
43015016	Men na ma gia mi le mì kwu atyamen ye; mi na mi gia amen le mà kwu bebwaa-isom begi. Mi mbee som amen le mà tan shi aki lishi ligi. Lifem aki āmen li dyam, li kwu ngyor igye. He ashin, kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma bii Atyagi he lizen ligi, Atyagi u sha āshi ka amen.
43015017	Ashin na 'i shi-m mi ke men uten le 'ì nyin amen lè bende."
43015018	Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Gbe bendi abe bè yi ke igye i be tel amen, mà well le be tel i-mi a mà ukpong be hà tel amen.
43015019	Mà kwu ke igye anyin a, hang 'i nyin àbe bè yi ke igye i lè men, likorye mà yi bendi bebell a. Ukpor mi gia kung amen, mi tang amen he abwo lè ha abe, mà tem yi ke igye anyin a ye. Ashina na 'ı shi bendi abe bè yi ke igye i be fel tel amen.
43015020	Mà well le, mi ma de men le, unwaa-ushom u dyam hwà átyám ye. Bendi aben be ma ke-m 'ingie, faale ifung be ba ka amen or 'ingie. Abe be ke igie igi ife, be ba ka amen or ife.
43015021	Bingie abi be be ke men, be ka amen ábi he 'uhwo 'ugi likorye be ngye angwu a som mi be he igye i ye.
43015022	Kì kwu le mi bè kong ha abe ye, hang undi u da le be zī libi ye. Ukpor, bwo mi bè tyung ābe ashi 'ì yi 'iban, gbe be fel gye 'ushu shi 'iban, be kwa lè 'ikwu 'ubwo hwaa ye.
43015023	Undi angwu a tel mi, hà u tel Atyagi or titi.
43015024	Kì kwu le mi shi bikwele-uhwo he ashi abell abi undi a bè shi ngye ye ye, hang undi u da le be zī libi ye. Ukpor, mà na be nde biwom abin lè ashi abell or, bè so-i tel mi or, be tel Atyagi or titi.
43015025	Biwom abin, kì yi le bì shi, hè 'ì kwu ná be ma fee he 'ushia Unim le: 'Be tel mi faale ashi mi shi.'
43015026	"Mà well le Undi-Ukpell u ba lè há. Nyong mí gye hwaa lè Atyagi, mi ba som he hwaa lè men. Undi-Ukpell umen ana ù yi Ukatia Kunyong Unim, u ba lè ha Atyagi a. U ba tyung amen 'igyang puu. U ba tyung amen 'igyang gba lè mi.
43015027	Men ma ndo bun de bendi 'igyang gbe lè mi, likorye mà yi utung ha ami kung lè há he ukpi-ikwu kpamm.
43016001	"Mi de men abin le he 'unyong ahwu 'ingie 'ı be be hwaa lè men, hè men mà naa genn fe-m a.
43016002	Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu bè hà be ndō amen lè he ishom angi ma kwu liwu. Kunyong 'u ba ahwu be be gwu amen, be gim le be sha ashi Unim a kee a.
43016003	Be ba sha abin likorye be ngye Atyagi or, ngwu bè ngye-m mi or ye.
43016004	Ukpor mi de men biwom abin kie he itang, le gbe 'unyong 'u fel ahwu be shi amen biwom bimen i, hè men mà well le mi ma de men abin ndor he itang." Ujeso a gye 'ushu kong le: "Lè he ukpi-ikwu, mi ma de men biwom abin ye, likorye mi ma yi ipel ha amen.
43016005	Kanaa-anaa i, mi fel da amen ábi likorye mi ndo tem la hwaa lè Atyagi angwu a som mi be he igye anyin. Ukpor 'ì yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu u bii mi le mi gya hung a ye a?
43016006	Le bwo mi de men biwom abin, ma tem fel he 'imbwee a.
43016007	Mi de men 'igyang a le 'i kwa ngbebb-ngbebb ka amen gbe mi gbe tyang amen, likorye gbe mi gbe tyang amen ye, Undi-Ukpell anwuna u ba hwaa lè men ye. Ukpor gbe mi gbe lè nyin, lè wu he 'ipi Atyagi, mi som he hwaa lè men.
43016008	Nyong a be, u ba tem fem 'igyang tyung bendi abe igye anyin hè be bè ngye le be shi 'iban, be ngye le bè yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim ye. Be mbee ngye le be za libi he ushe Unim.
43016009	U ba tyung bendi gboo le be shi 'iban likorye be bong ha ami ye.
43016010	U mbee tyung bendi gboo le mì yi ununung gelalala gbe he atemale ugi lè hwaa lè Atyagi, he 'ipi mà tem nde-m ye.
43016011	A mbee ba tyung bendi gboo le Unim u ba maa bendigye ushe, likorye be nde ná a tang ushe Usetan angwu ù yi usu igye anyin.
43016012	"Kì yi lè biwom gbamm abi mi kee le mi da amen, ukpor mi wa da amen ábi ye, likorye bi go gbe men.
43016013	Nyong Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu u fem 'igyang tyung amen u be, u ba tyung amen 'igyang puu. U ba naa kong 'iwom he ikeb ima a ye, u ba kong nya a na u gyo lè ha Atyagi a. U ba tyung amen biwom abi bı be shi lè he 'ushu or.
43016014	Ukatia Kunyong ana u ba sha bendi be fem mi, likorye biwom abi u be tyung amen bi ba lè ha ami a.
43016015	Biwom Atyagi puu bì yi bigi a. Kife na 'i shi-m mi de le Ukatia Kunyong ana u ba kung biwom bigi a tyung amen."
43016016	Ujeso a mbee de bendi-utung bema le: "Ki teng 'anwaa 'unyong zangg ma tem ba nda-m ye. Nyong 'unyong ana 'u mbee, ma tem be nde-m he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg."
43016017	Bendi-utung bema besuso be kong ha bende le: "Ashi a kong ana 'i ze le ana a? Kibang a, u de le li tem ba nda he ye he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg li tem nde-e? Ashi le u tem la hwaa lè Atyam 'imen â?
43016018	Ashi u de le, 'Kanwaa 'unyong zangg,' kife 'i ze le ana? Igie anyina i nung li ye."
43016019	Ujeso a ngye le be kee le be bii he 'ibibi gbe lè likong limen ana, a kung de be le: "Igie igi i nung amen ye a? Kife na ma bii bende gbe lè shi a?
43016020	Mi da amen 'igyang le ma ba kya, fa akpen, ukpor bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin be ba yal gor. He ukpi-ikwu na ma be mbwee, ukpor 'ùkye 'ūmen 'u ba gie bel fel igor.
43016021	Ki ba kwa ná ungingye u shi uzwaa nà. He ukpi-ikwu u mbwee likorye 'unyong 'utor 'uma 'u fel. Ukpor gbe unwaa a shul, u naa lityam 'utor 'uma, u fel gor likorye a shi ugaandi.
43016022	Kitaa ana na 'ì yi ha 'uhwo-men or. Kanaa-anaa i ma fel lè 'imbwee, ukpor 'unyong 'u ba lè há ahwu bel ha amen lì mbee be nde bende. He 'unyong 'umen ana ma ba yal gor lè ububo he ungwu. Igor īmen i tem ba mbee ye.
43016023	"He liti limen ana ma tem ba bii mi 'iwom ye. Mi da amen 'igyang le 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma bii Atyagi he lizen ligi, u sha āshi ka amen.
43016024	Kpamm be wu 'unyin i, ma wa bii Atyagi 'iwom he lizen ligi ye. Ma ndo bii he biwom he-e ù shi ābi ke men, hè igor īmen ì sho yilidididi."
43016025	Ujeso a mbee de bendi-utung bema le: "Mi shaa kong biwom ha amen he ityang a. Baale 'unyong 'u fel ahwu mı tem kong ha amen he ityang ye. Mi ba bun da amen gba lè Atyagi gboo.
43016026	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana ma ba bii Atyagi biwom he lizen ligi. Mi de le, mi ba bii Atyagi biwom ka amen a ye.
43016027	Ki nyin Atyagi lè men, likorye 'i nyin amen lè mi, ma bong le mi ba lè ha ufe a.
43016028	Kigyang a, mi be lè ha ufe á be he igye i. Kanaa-anaa i 'unyong 'u fel ahwu mi tem ndo gye hwaa lè Atyagi."
43016029	Bendi-utung bema be de-e le: "Eng-hengg! Wo fel kong gboo, wo tem kong he ityang a ye.
43016030	Ki nung li le wo ngye biwom puu. Bìbībī abi li kam le li bii-a or, wo ngya ābi tang teng. He ashina li bong le 'igyang-igyang a, wo ba lè ha Unim a."
43016031	Ujeso a fan ābe le: "Ki ze le ma bong he 'uhwo ashin â?
43016032	Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu men puu ma be paa he abwo, undi uyang-yang u gye he ushu uma. Ma ba buu tyang mi ututeb. Ukpor mi ba kwa ututeb ye, likorye Atyagi ù yi utung ha ami mbee 'unyong. Mi de le 'unyong 'umen i 'u fel or mà.
43016033	Mi de men ashin le hè men abe ma gwaa ha ami kpebaa hè 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa. He igye i, ma kpa 'ingie, ukpor mà ngyor naa genn. Mi hwò igye anyin mà!"
43017001	Nyong Ujeso a kong igie anyin puu, a kung àshì nde gye he lifung-atabe kung kong le: "Atyagi, kunyong 'u fel ahwu wò tyung bendi ifem igi, mi Unwaa-gang, le hè mi Unwaa-gang or mì tyung bendi ifem igang.
43017002	Wo kung bendigye puu fe-m he 'ubwo, le mì kung likpan angi lı ngyor igye ke bendi abe wo kung fe-m he 'ubwo.
43017003	Likpan angi lı ngyor igye lì yi le undi ù ngya-a wo angwu wo ufe-ufe na wò yi Unim ugyang, u mbee ngye-m, mi Ujeso Ukristi angwu wo som be he igye i.
43017004	Nyong mì yi he igye i, mi tyung bendi ifem igang. Mi shi mbee aki angi wo som mi le mì be shi.
43017005	He ashin, Atyagi, kpe-m mî tem be hwaa lè 'uhwo-gang, tem lè mi kwu he ifem ipel ha 'uhwo-gang nya a na leěti mi ma yi lè ngi nyong igye anyin i ma wa fel ye.
43017006	"Mi kung-a tyung bendi begang abe wo fem kung lè he igye i kung ke-m. Bè yi bendi begang a, wo kung ābe fe-m he 'ubwo a. Be ke igie igang ife.
43017007	Ki fel nung ābe le 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi mì yi lè shi, 'i be lè ha awo a.
43017008	Mi bun de be 'isom ashi wo som mi, be kpe shi, be mbee ngye dangg le mi be lè ha awo a. Be bong le wo na wo som mi.
43017009	"Mi ka ushang ka ābe, mi ka ka abe bè yi ke igye anyin a ye, mi ka ka abe wo kung ke-m a, likorye bè yi ka-a wo a.
43017010	Bendi puu abe bè yi begi bè yi begang a; puu abe bè yi begang, be shi begi a. Bendi be nda ifem igi gba ha abe.
43017011	Kanaa-anaa i 'unyong 'u fel ahwu mì tem be hwaa lè wo. Mi-i tyang igye anyin, ukpor befe bè so hen. Atyagi, wo angwu wò kee-kee yi Unim, bong 'iwom 'ì do ābe ye. Kam ābe gbe he lizen ligang angi wo kung kwǔ-m. Kam ābe hè be bè kwu ūbībī ken nya a na bel lè wo lì yi ūbībī ken.
43017012	Nyong mi ma yi ipel ha abe, mi kung lizen ligang angi wo kung kwǔ-m kam ābe. Mi kam ābe le hè 'iwom 'ì do ābe ye. He ashina undi ken or lè he liwu libell a waa nim ye, kee-kee kwom ha angwu be fee ndor le ù nim ufe-ufe. Ki shi nya a na leěti be ma fee he 'ushia 'ugang le 'ì shi a.
43017013	Mi ndo tem ba hwaa lè wo, mi kong abin nyin ná mì so he igye i, le hè be bè kwu lè 'itaa igor angi mì yi lè ngi, be kwu lè ngi i go kangg a.
43017014	Mi de be 'isom 'igang, bè tem yi ke igye anyin a ye, nya a na mi or mì yi ke igye i a ye a. He ashin bendi abe bè yi ke igye i be tel ābe.
43017015	Mi ka ushang le wò gbe lè be lè he igye anyin a ye, mi ka ushang le wò kam ābe ha-a à bong Usetan, usu bibibi, ù do ābe ye.
43017016	Bè yi ke igye anyin a ye, nya a na mi or mì yi ke igye anyin a ye a.
43017017	To ābe ndor betaa-betaa gbe he 'igyang 'igang le hè be bè fel bendi begang abe bè yi gelalala. Igie igang na ì yi 'igyang.
43017018	Nya a na wo som mi be he igye i, na mi or mi ndo som ābe le bè shi-m aki he igye i.
43017019	Mi kung 'uhwo-gi gbangg fa-a he 'ubwo le hè be befe or bè kung 'uhwo-bell gbangg fa-a he 'ubwo.
43017020	"Mi ka ushang ka abe bè yi i befe-befe a ye, mi ka ka bendi puu abe be be bong ha ami gbe he igie igang angi be be bun de bendi lè he 'ushu or.
43017021	Mi ka ushang le befe puu bè kwu ūbībī ken. Atyagi, mi ka ushang le nya a na wo gwaa ipel ha ami, mi gwaa ipel ha awo, na befe or be gwaa ipel ha abel, hè bendi abe igye i bè bong le wo na wo som mi 'igyang.
43017022	Nya a na wo fem mi na mi or mi fem ābe, hè be bè gwaa ūbībī ken ná bel lè wo li gwaa.
43017023	Mi kwa ipel ha abe nya a na wò yi ipel ha ami. Kitaa ana na befe puu be be gwaa ubibi ken kpebaa, hè bendi abe igye i bè ngye le wo na wo som mi, be ngye le 'i nyin-a lè be ná 'i nyin-a lè mi.
43017024	"Atyagi, mi kee le bendi aben abe wo kung ke-m, bè kwu ipel ha ami he 'ipi mì yi, hè be bè nde ifem igi angi wo ke-m leěti mà ukpong wo hà mbe igye anyin. Wo ke-m ifem anyina likorye 'i nyin-a lè mi.
43017025	Atyagi, wò yi gelalala hwò puu. Bendi abe igye anyin be ngya-a ye, ukpor mi ngya-a; bendi begang aben be ngye le wo na wo som mi be he igye i.
43017026	Mi shi ābe be ngya-a, mi gya 'ushu sha ābe be ngya-a, le hè be bè kwu lè 'itaa benyin abe wò yi lè be ha ami, mi or mi kwu ha abe atyam."
43018001	Nyong Ujeso a kong ha Unim 'i mbee puu, a bo lè bendi-utung bema lè tia umbwo angwu be ko le Ukidron, be gbe gye he utia angwu a ma yi nya.
43018002	Ujudas angwu a ndyebb Ujeso zi or, a ngye ùtiá umen ana, likorye Ujeso lè bendi-utung bema be shaa kpee nya kpam-kpam.
43018003	He ashina Ujudas a bo lè likwu ishogya lè abe be kang Ushom Unim gye nya. (Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè Iferesis na be ma som ābe.) Be kwu bishinde lè agor lè biwom bedye gye nya.
43018004	Ujeso a ma ngye ashi 'ı be-e lè há 'ushu. He ashin a die hwaa lè be, bii ābe le: "Ma shun ayang a?"
43018005	Be fan he le: "Li shun Ujeso angwu Unazaret a." A kung de be le: "Mà nde-m." Ujudas ugyang angwu a ndyebb he zi a ma yi naa nya ipel ha abe.
43018006	Nyong Ujeso a de be le, "Mà nde-m," be gbaa gye item item lè mbu he itang.
43018007	Ujeso a mbee kung bii ābe le: "Ma shun ayang a?" Be fan he le: "Li shun Ujeso angwu Unazaret a."
43018008	Ujeso a de be le: "Bwo mi de men le ma nde-m i, gbe ma shun i-mi a, ma tyang bendi-utung begi bè gye."
43018009	Ujeso a kong 'itaa ashina le hè 'ì ngyor he igie ima angi ingyesu a de Atyam Unim. A ma de-e le: "He liwu bendi abe wo kung fe-m he 'ubwo i, undi ken or a waa nim ye."
43018010	Usaimun Ipita angwu a ma yi lè 'ashwia, a shwia waa āke lè he 'ubor kpi shia ungikye ken 'utyung ahwu lizen. Ungikye umen be kpi shia he 'utyung ana a maa sha Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim aki. Lizen lima lì yi le Umalkes.
43018011	Ujeso a kung de Ipita le: "Kung 'ashwia 'agang kil he 'ubor. Wo kee le mì kpe 'ingie ashi Atyagi a ke-m le mì kpe ye a?"
43018012	Ukaandi ishogya lè ishogya ima be kwu Ujeso, be bua he indi he abwo. Abe be kang Ushom Unim or be ma kpell ābe.
43018013	Be kpi 'ikwu te lè he lè hwaa lè Anas. Anas umen i na a ma yi ātyām ungye Ukayafas; Ukayafas a ma yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim nya he lize limen ana a.
43018014	Ukayafas na a ma tebb bekaandi Ijuus le 'i ngbebb le undi ken ù hwō he lishi bendi puu.
43018015	Usaimun Ipita lè undi-utung Ujeso ususo be pwom Ujeso. Undi-utung uma umen ana, Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a ngye-e dangg. He ashina a pwom Ujeso lè wu he ushu Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim.
43018016	Ukpor, Ipita a ngyor naa he ungwu likong. He ashin undi-utung umen angwu Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a ngye ana a tem gye há lè kong ha unwaasul angwu u kang ungwu likong, a hà kpe kung Ipita gye he afee.
43018017	Unwaasul ana a de Ipita le: "Kigyang a, wò yi undi-utung ungikye anwuna a." Ipita a fan he le: "Mi ye o!"
43018018	Nya he 'usu 'umen ana ligwu li maa sha 'ibibi-bibi-bibi. He ashina iboyi úkaandi angwu u shang Unim lè bendi abe be kang Ushom Unim be ma hwee 'inde nya, be gwee. Ipita or a lè naa utung ha abe nya, u gwee 'inde.
43018019	Anas angwu a ma yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a bii Ujeso gbe lè bendi-utung bema, u bii he gbe lè abi u hwua bendi.
43018020	Ujeso a fan he le: "Mi-i bun 'isom 'igi de bendi puu gboo. Mbee 'unyong mi hwua bendi he ishom angi be kwu liwu, mi hwua he Ushom Unim angwu he Ujeruselem, biteng abi Ijuus ı gbong ukem. Kì yi lè ashi mi kong he 'undyell ngye ye.
43018021	Fe, ki shi ná a, wo bii i-mi ashi mı hwua bendi? Bii ābe be gyo mi hwan, hè be bè da-a abi mi hwua ābe. Be ngye abi mi hwua puu."
43018022	Nyong a kong igie anyina, undi ken lè he liwu abe be kang Ushom Unim a ma yi naa nya, a kung 'ubwo kpam Ujeso he 'unaa. A kung de-e le: "Kpash! Ki shi ná a, wo mbe lityam fan ukaandi 'itaa ana?"
43018023	Ujeso a fan he le: "Gbe 'ì yi le mi kong 'ibibi a, bun āshi be he igye. Gbe mi kong 'ibibi a ye, ki shi ná a, wo kpam mi 'ubwo he 'unaa?"
43018024	Anas a mà tem lè he nya lè indi angi be ma bua he som lè ke Ukayafas, Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim.
43018025	Usaimun Ipita a ma so naa nya u gwee 'inde, bendi-iso be de-e le: "Li ngye dangg le wo or wò yi undi-utung ungikye anwuna a." Ipita a mbee swan de le: "Mi ye o!"
43018026	Uboyi Úsu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a ma yi nya, u shi unwanam undi angwu Ipita a ma kpi shia he 'utyung a. Uboyi ana a de Ipita le: "Nde le wo na mi ma ndè he utia utung ha ahe?"
43018027	Ipita a mbee swan le ufe a ye. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo kigia ukwuo 'i kung ko.
43018028	Leèti-leèti be bo lè Ujeso lè he ushu Ukayafas gbe ndo he ukoto he ushaale Upalet angwu a ma yi ukaandi Urom. Ijuus ife i ngwee he afee ukoto ye, likorye be kee le bè ndor 'uhwo-bell betaa-betaa, le hè be bè shi Kipam Agbele-gyong.
43018029	Upalet a fem lè há afee be hwaa lè be nya, kung bii ābe le: "Ungikye anwun a shi 'ibang a?"
43018030	Be fan he le: "Ù shi 'ibibi a ye, hang li kwu-e be lè he hwaa lè wo ye."
43018031	Upalet a de le: "Men-agyang mà te lè he lè maa he ushe ná iten īmen ì yi." Be fan le: "Bel lì yi lè ikeb le li tang ushe le bè gwu undi ye."
43018032	(Ashin 'i shi 'itaa i le hè Ujeso ù hwō lihwu angi a maa de bendi le u ba hwa a.)
43018033	Upalet a tem lè ngwee he ukoto, a ko Ujeso be naa nya, u bii he le: "Wo na wò yi usu Ijuus a?"
43018034	Ujeso a fan he le: "Kìbībī ashin, wo-gyang na wo gim bii āshi a, hà igie angi bendi be kong na i shi-a wo bii 'itaa ana?"
43018035	Upalet a fan le: "Nde le wo ngye le mì yi Ijuus a ye? Bendi begang lè bekaandi bebell abe be shang Unim na be be lè ushe ugang hwaa lè mi. Bun de-m ashi wo shi ngwu be kwa-a."
43018036	Ujeso a fan he le: "Mi za 'ùsù he igye anyin a ye. Kì kwu le mi za 'ùsù he igye anyin a, hang bendi-utung begi be kpe-m 'utyong ndo 'undo le hè Ijuus ì shi-m 'iwom ye. Ukpor mi da amen 'igyang a le mi za 'ùsù he igye i a ye."
43018037	Upalet a fan he le: "Ashin 'i ze le wò yi usu â?" Ujeso a fan he le: "Wo kong nya. Atan-lengi angwu mi be he igye anyin ù yi le mî fem 'igyang tyung bendi. Ashina na 'i shi be hwan mi he igye i. Undi uyang-yang angwu 'i nyin he lè 'igyang, ù dang 'utyung gyo mi."
43018038	Upalet a bii he le: "Kibang 'ì yi 'igyang?" Upalet a hà mbee bo gye he igye lè hwaa lè bendi Ijuus abe bè yi há, a de be le: "Mi nde 'ibibi ashi ungikye anwun a shi ye.
43018039	Ná likpe 'ubong 'umen lì yi, he lishi lize nyong 'i fel le mà shi Kipam Agbele-gyong, mi shaa waa undi ken lè he igaadye tyang abwo. Ki nya ngbebb amen le mì waa usu Ijuus tyang abwo a?"
43018040	Be kwu gaa kangg le: "Kpaa ye o! Ufe na wo waa tyang abwo ye. Waa Ubarabas hwan tyang abwo." (Ki shi le Ubarabas umen i a maa zà lè biwom bedye he abwo. A maa mòr imor.)
43019001	Upalet a hà kung Ujeso ke le bè lè kpam.
43019002	Ishogya i tim 'ishilishi ītōng shi-e he lishi. Be kung aliga uwulu abwaa shi-e ná usu.
43019003	Be keb be fel nyan he, be keb tim anung he itang de-e le: "Usu Ijuus, kukwun 'u kwa-a he 'uhwo." Be kpam he abwo he anaa.
43019004	Upalet a mbee tem lè hwaa lè bendi Ijuus há he igye, u de be le: "Mà gyo, mi ndo la ba lè ungikye anwun he igye hè men mà ngye dangg le mi nde 'ibibi ashi a shi ye."
43019005	Ujeso a fem be he igye, a ma so lè 'ishilishi ītōng shī, u so lè aliga usu uwulu abwaa shī. Upalet a de be le: "Mà ndè undi ūmen."
43019006	Nyong bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe be kang Ushom Unim be nde-e, be gaa le: "Maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa. Maa gwu-e." Upalet a kung de be le: "Men-agyang mà te lè he lè maa bee he 'ikpakpaa. Mi ufe mi ndè 'ibibi ashi a shi ye."
43019007	Ijuus i fan he le: "Ná 'ì yi he iten ityan, kitaa undi 'itel i, kì yi le ù hwō, likorye u kung 'uhwo-ma le ù yi Unwaa Unim a."
43019008	Igie anyin i shi Upalet a fel he 'ushell kangg.
43019009	A mbee tem gye he afee ukoto, a bii Ujeso le: "Wo ba lè hung a?" Ujeso a fan he ye.
43019010	Upalet a kung de-e le: "Kibang a, wo fan mi ye? Nde le wo ngye le mi-ì yi lè ikeb le mi tyang-a abwo le wò gye, mi shi lè ikeb le mi gwa-a?"
43019011	Ujeso a fan he le: "Unim na a ka-a ikeb anyin. Kì kwu ná ye, hang wò yi lè ikeb le wo sha-m 'iwom ye. Kife na 'i tan lè shi ngwu 'iban undi angwu a be lè ushe ugi hwaa lè wo 'i ban hwò ashi 'igang."
43019012	Nyong Upalet a gyo igie anyin, a la tyang Ujeso abwo, ukpor Ijuus i fel gaa kangg le: "Gbe wo hà tyang ungikye anwun abwo, hà wo fel undi-linaa Usiza, Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom a, likorye gbe undi uyang-yang a de le ufe ù yi usu a, ashina 'i ze le u kin 'ùsù lè Usiza a."
43019013	Upalet a hà be lè Ujeso he igye be bel kwu he 'idem ashi u kwu maa ushe, he 'iteng ashi be ko le Kigigyo 'ukor. Be ko āshi he igie Ihibru le Ugabata.
43019014	Liti limen ana li ma yi liti angi liti uwell libell li pwom lè ngi a, he 'unyong ahwu be maa shi Kipam Agbele-gyong. Libwee li maa ndo pwom he 'udyan lishi. Upalet a de be le: "Mà kpe usu ūmen nyin."
43019015	Be gaa de-e le: "Mà kpe-e gbe lè he lè há, ma maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa." Upalet a bii ābe le: "Ma kee le bè kung usu ūmen maa bee he 'ikpakpaa a?" Bekaandi abe be shang Unim be fan he le: "Lì kee-kee yi lè usu ken a, Usiza ufe-ufe a."
43019016	He ashina Upalet a kung Ujeso ke le bè ndo lè maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa. Ishogya i kpe Ujeso gbe lè he.
43019017	Ufe-gyang a so 'ikpakpaa 'ima gye he 'iteng ashi be ko le Kiteng 'ikpukpo lishi. Be ko āshi he igie Ihibru le Ugorgorta.
43019018	Nya na be maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa. Be mbee kung bendi befee, maa angwu ken bee he 'ikpakpaa lè ha ahe 'ubwo limbell, be maa angwell lè ha ahe 'ubwo lizen. Ujeso a ma yi he 'udyan.
43019019	Upalet a ma fee 'iwom ke be lè bee nya he 'ikpakpaa. A fee le: "Ujeso angwu Unazaret, Usu Ijuus a."
43019020	Be fee āshi he igie abong akie—he igie Ihibru, Ilatin lè Igrik. Bendi gbamm be bo ashi be fee bee ana likorye 'i ma yi he ungwu 'ukwo a.
43019021	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim be nde ashina, be lè de Upalet le: "Fee le ù yi Usu Ijuus a ye; fee le a de le ufe ù yi Usu Ijuus a."
43019022	Upalet a de be le: "Ashi mi fee, undi ù gie āshi ye."
43019023	Nyong ishogya i maa Ujeso bee he 'ikpakpaa 'i mbee puu, be kung inditen ima hwua akwu ande le undi ishogya uyang-yang ù kung likwu ken. Ukpor be kung aliga ama angi be tim faale agwaale he 'iteng ken or,
43019024	be de bende le: "Aliga anyin a ngbebb gbe gyong, lì gie āngi ye. Mà lì tye isasa a zī āngi." Ashin 'i shi nya a na leěti be ma fee he 'ushia Unim a. Be fee le: "Be kung inditen igi hwua ha bende; be tye isasa zī aliga agi." Kitaa ana na ishogya i shi.
43019025	Bendi abe be ma yi naa kpee-kpee gye he 'ikpakpaa ashi be maa Ujeso bè yi anam Ujeso lè unwanam anam Ujeso, lè Umeri angwu a ma yi ungye Uklopas lè Umeri Umadelen.
43019026	Ujeso a bel àshì nde anam befe lè undi-utung uma angwu 'i nyin he lè he be naa gwaa, Ujeso a de anam le: "Iye, ndè unwaa-gang."
43019027	A mbee de undi-utung uma ana le: "Ndè anaa." Kung lè he liti limen ana undi-utung ana a kpe anam Ujeso le ù lè kwu ha ahe ushu.
43019028	Nyong ashina 'i mbee, Ujeso a ngye le aki ama a mbee. A kung kong le: "Umbwo u gyor mi." A kong ashin hè 'ì ngyor ná leěti be ma fee he 'ushia Unim a.
43019029	Ki ma yi lè 'imia 'utyuo fe he 'igbor tyung nya. Be kung 'udedell kib há he 'utyuo, kung kil he úkwān angwu be ko le uhisop. kung ndaa tyua he he ungwu.
43019030	Ujeso a ndeb 'utyuo ana, kung de le: "Ki mbee." A mbo lishi lima be he itang hwō.
43019031	Liti limen ana li ma yi angi be kam nyong liti uwell angi lì yi ābe likaandi a. He likpe libell, ki ma yi le likwom li kwa he 'usi he liti uwell ye. He ashina Ijuus i bii Upalet le ù ke ikeb hè be bè bun abee akwom anyina hè be bè kung āngi lè ngi.
43019032	He ashina ishogya i lè bun abee bendi abe be maa bee utung ha Ujeso.
43019033	Ukpor nyong be fel ha Ujeso, be nde le a hwo mà. Be tem bun ama abee ye.
43019034	Undi ishogya ken a kung likung tim Ujeso he ufaa. Anung lè umbwo bi wu be he igye.
43019035	(Undi angwu a nde ashina lè ashi, a bun āshi kong 'igyang, ufe-gyang a ngye le u kong 'igyang, u da amen ashin le hè men mà bong ha Ujeso a.)
43019036	Abin puu bi shi hè 'ì ngyor ná leěti be ma fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Be ba bun he ukeb ken-ken or ye."
43019037	Be mbee fee he 'iteng 'isuso le: "Be ba nda undi angwu be tim he likung he ufaa."
43019038	Ujosef angwu a be lè he Alimatia a be nya. Ujosef umen i a maa nyia inyia pwom Ujeso likorye u shell Ijuus. A lè tim Upalet anung le ù kung likwom Ujeso ke-e. A kung ke-e. Ujosef a lè shul āngi kung gbe lè ngi.
43019039	Unikodimes angwu a ma bé hwaa lè Ujeso lè 'usu or, a be utung ha Ujosef, a be lè isi angi i nung nyin angi be ko le umuru lè alos. Isi ana i ngbebb áshiá ha igaa bendo ifee.
43019040	Bendi befee ana be kung bihwom bifung abi be gbaa ābi isi nii likwom Ujeso puu, nya a na likpe Ijuus lì yi.
43019041	Nya he 'ipi be maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa, ùtiá a ma yi há. Likwun 'ukor li shi nya he utia angi be ngi undi nya ngye ye.
43019042	Bwo liti uwell na li maa be he ashi-ataa, be kung he lè ngi nya likorye likwun li ma yi nya kpee-kpee.
43020001	He ukpi-ikwu liti utyong Beke, Umeri Umadelen a ngyù bo he ashi liti gye he likwun Ujeso. A lè nde le 'ukor ahwu be shī ungwu likwun, be mung āhwu lè há.
43020002	A buu gbe lè há ligbe-ligbe lè hwaa lè Ipita befe lè undi-utung angwu a ma nyin Ujeso kangg ana, u de be le: "Be fem kung likwom Atyetyan lè he likwun, li ngye 'ipi be gbe lè ngi lè ndor ye."
43020003	Ipita lè undi-utung ana be hà buu gbe ndo há he likwun.
43020004	Undi-utung ana a buu gbe tyang Ipita lè wu há 'ushu.
43020005	A keb nii nde gye he afee likwun, a nde bihwom bifung abi be ma nii he kie há, ukpor a shul gye há afee ye.
43020006	Usaimun Ipita a be wu nya, gbe ligbe-ligbe gye há afee likwun, a nde bihwom bifung wu há.
43020007	Ukpebeshi angwu be ma nii he lishi 'ì yi kan ndor ta-ta.
43020008	Undi-utung Ujeso angwu a wu há 'ushu ana a gbe pwom Ipita gye há afee titi, lè nde biwom abin, u bong le Ujeso a wum 'igyang.
43020009	(Ashi be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le Ujeso u ba wum lè he lihwu ana, ki wa nung ābe ye.)
43020010	Ipita befe lè Ujon be tem gye he ushu.
43020011	Umeri Umadelen a tem gye he likwun, ù yi naa há ungwu likwun, u kya. A nii nde gye he afee likwun,
43020012	a nde idengell Unim ifee angi i shī aliga afung-afung. I ma yi kwu he 'ipi be ma kie Ujeso. Angwu ken a ma yi kwu lè he 'ipi be ma kie he ndor lishi, angwell u shi lè he 'ipi be ma ndor he abee.
43020013	Be bii he le: "Iye, wo kya 'ibang a?" A fan le: "Be fem kung likwom Atyagi lè nyin, mi ngye he 'ipi be kung āngi lè ndor ye."
43020014	A kung bel àshì gye he item nde Ujeso, ukpor u shob he ye.
43020015	Ujeso a bii he le: "Iye, wo kya 'ibang a? Wo shun ayang a?" Umeri u kong le angwu u kang 'iteng 'imen ana. A kung de-e le: "Ukaandi, gbe wo nà wo fem kung he lè i, wò hā tyung mi 'iteng ashi wo kie he mî lè kung he gye lè he."
43020016	Ujeso a kwu-e ko, "Umeri." A bel àshì nde-e, u fan he he igie Ihibru le Uraboni. Ashi le Uraboni 'i ze le itisha.
43020017	Ujeso a de-e le: "Kwu-m abwo ye, likorye mi wa tem gye he 'usi lè hwaa lè Atyagi ye. Ndo te lè de bebwandagi le mi ndo tem la hwaa lè Atyagi angwu ù yi Atyamen or titi. Ùyi Unim ugi, u shi Unim ūmen."
43020018	Umeri a bo gbe lè de bendi-utung Ujeso le a nde Atyabell Ujeso, u bun igie ima puu de be.
43020019	Nya he ukpi-ikwu liti utyong Beke limen ana leekwulukwu bendi-utung Ujeso be gbong bende lè sho he ushom, be ngib àshì fe 'uhwo-bell likorye be maa shell bekaandi Ijuus. Ujeso a hà fem naa nya he liwu libell, u de be le: "Ikwun ì kwu amen he 'uhwo."
43020020	A kong ashin puu, u bel bikpaa abwo lè ufaa uma tyung ābe. Bendi-utung bema be ma yi lè igor kangg ná be nde-e.
43020021	A mbee kung de be le: "Ikwun ì kwu amen he 'uhwo. Nya a na Atyagi a som mi be he igye i, na mi or mi som amen."
43020022	A hà ti 'unyong wu ābe, u de le: "Mà kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim.
43020023	Undi uyang-yang angwu ma tyang biban bima ke-e, Unim or u tyang ābi ka he. Ukpor angwu ma tyang biban bima ke-e ye, Unim or u tyang ābi ka he ye."
43020024	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a kpi 'ikwu te lè 'uhwo-ma lè tyung bendi-utung bema, Utormas angwu be ko le bégbé a ma yi utung ha bende-ma nya ye.
43020025	Nyong a be, be de-e le: "Bel lí yi nde Atyetyan Ujeso." Utormas a fan ābe le: "Gbe mi-gyang mi nde bikpaa ikaa angi be ma maa he lè ashi agi ye, mi kung udyong-bwo ugi tyua há ye, mi tyua 'ubwo ha ahe ufaa he 'ipi be ma tim he likung ye, mì hà ndo bong le ma kong 'igyang a ye."
43020026	Ati a gbe adyong-ikie, bendi-utung Ujeso be mbee gbong nya ushom umen ana. Utormas a ma fel yi utung ha abe há. Mà na be ma ngib àshì or, Ujeso a fem naa nya he liwu libell, u kong de be le: "Ikwun ì kwu amen he 'uhwo."
43020027	A hà kung de Utormas le: "Bel àshì ndè, wo kung udyong-bwo ugang tyua mi he i bikpaa ikaa, wo ndaa 'ubwo tyua mi he ufaa. Tem tyāng ityang ye, fel bong ha ami a."
43020028	Utormas a de le: "Wò yi Unim ugi lè Atyagi a."
43020029	Ujeso a kung de-e le: "Wo fel bong likorye wo nde-m lè ashi agang. Ki kwa 'inunung ka abe be nde abin ye, ukpor be bong ha ami."
43020030	Ujeso a ma shi bikwele-uhwo gbamm he ashi bendi-utung bema. Be fee ābi puu fe he 'ushia ahwun ye.
43020031	Abi be fee fe nyin, be fee le hè bendi bè bong le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, u shi Unwaa Unim, hè be bè fel lè likpan 'unyong gbe he abongale ha ahe.
43021001	He 'unyong 'ususo Ujeso a mbee te lè 'uhwo-ma lè tyung bendi-utung bema besuso he 'unyong ahwu be ma yi gwaa he umbwo angwu be ko le Utaiberias. Ashin na 'i ma shi:
43021002	He liti ken, Usaimun Ipita, lè Utormas angwu be ko le bégbé, lè Unatandyell angwu u be lè he Ukena he 'ubong Ugalili lè bebwaa Uzebedi befee lè bendi-utung bema befee, be ma yi nya ukem.
43021003	Usaimun Ipita a de bema le: "Mi gya ìkwǎn." Abe be teng be de le: "Li te utung." Befe puu be mà bo lè ngwee he 'inong lishor gbe ìkwǎn. Be tan lè 'usu kpamm taa ashi ukpor be kwu ùkwǎn ken or ye.
43021004	Nya leèti-leèti, Ujeso a fem naa há ungwu umbwo. Bendi-utung bema be wa ngye le Ujeso a ye.
43021005	Ujeso a bii ābe le: "Ishomate, ma wa kwu 'iwom ye a?" Be fan he le: "Dia."
43021006	A kung de be le: "Mà kung 'ataa ana tyang lè he 'igie 'inong ashi lizen, mà ma gia kwa ìkwǎn." Be kung āke tyang nya 'igie ana. Ikwan i sho há gbamm. Bè tem yi lè ikeb angi bè shwia fem āke be he ugo-igye ye, likorye ikwan i fel go há afee 'ataa gbe gyong.
43021007	Undi-utung angwu 'i nyin Ujeso lè he ana a de Ipita le: "Atyetyan Ujeso a!" Nyong Ipita a gyo ashin, aliga angi a ma waa ndor he itang le he-e ù shi aki, a tem lè ngi shī, geb tye gye há he umbwo.
43021008	Ukpor bendi-utung bema abell be ma yi he 'inong, be die te, be su lè 'ataa ake 'a sho lè ìkwǎn hwulo-hwulo-hwulo ana. Kung lè he 'ipi be ma yi gye he ungwu umbwo, ki ma yi lè 'igbe ye, ki mbee abee asi adyong 'ugbe akie.
43021009	Nyong be wu he ugo-igye, be nde 'inde úkee nya. Ki ma yi lè ìkwǎn ndor há 'inde lè ibred.
43021010	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà gia ìkwǎn angi ma kwu ana, be lè ngi."
43021011	Usaimun Ipita a tem lè ngwee he 'inong, a su lè 'ataa ana gye he ugo-igye. Ìkwǎn ikaandi i ma go há gbamm. I ma yi asi adyong-ifee lè ikwan lihwo lè ngi ikie. Mà na i ma go 'itaa ana or, kataa 'a ma ti paa ye.
43021012	Ujeso a de be le: "Mà be zī lizi." He liwu libell, undi ken or a ma mbe lityam bii he le, ufe ayang a ye. Be ngye le Atyabell a.
43021013	Ujeso a die hwaa lè be nya, a kung ibred lè ìkwǎn ke be.
43021014	Kung lè he 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a wum lè he lihwu, kugbe ahwun na 'u ma yi àhwu lekie ná u te lè 'uhwo-ma lè tyung bendi-utung bema.
43021015	Be zī lizi li mbee puu, Ujeso a bii Usaimun Ipita le: "Usaimun, unwaa Ujon, ki nyin-a lè mi 'igyang-igyang hwò biwom abin puu a?" Ipita a fan he le: "Eng, Atyagi, wo ngye le 'i nyin mi lè wo." Ujeso a de-e le: "Gbe 'i nyin-a lè mi 'igyang-igyang a, kam mi inwaa ítiā."
43021016	He 'ugbe ahwu lefee, Ujeso a mbee bii Ipita le: "Usaimun, unwaa Ujon, ki nyin-a lè mi 'igyang-igyang a?" A fan he le: "Eng, Atyagi, wo ngye le 'i nyin mi lè wo." A mbee de Ipita le: "Kam mi ìtiā."
43021017	Ujeso a mbee bii Ipita 'ugbe ahwu lekie le: "Usaimun, unwaa Ujon, ki nyin-a lè mi a?" Ki fel ban Ipita he lityam likorye Ujeso a bii he 'ugbe 'akie le 'i nyin he lè he a. A kung de-e le: "Atyagi, wo ngye biwom puu, wo ngye le 'i nyin mi lè wo." Ujeso a mbee de-e le: "Kam mi ìtiā.
43021018	Mi da-a 'igyang le leěti nyong wo ma so ushomate, wo maa kam 'uhwo bo gya he 'ipi wo kee. Ukpor ìtí nyong wo be kaa, wo ba ndaa abwo ndor undi-iso u kung-a gba lè wo gya he 'ipi wo kee ye."
43021019	Ujeso a ma kong ashin hè 'ì tyung Ipita 'itaa lihwu ashi Ipita u be hwō, ashi 'ı be lè ipee ke Unim. A hà de Ipita le: "Pwom mi."
43021020	Ipita a bel àshì nde undi-utung Ujeso angwu 'i nyin Ujeso lè he kangg, u pwom ābe. Ufe umen na leěti a ma die hwaa lè Ujeso nyong be zī lizi bii he le: "Atyetyan, ayang u be ndyebb-a zi?"
43021021	Nyong Ipita a nde-e, a kung de Ujeso le: "Atyagi, hà angwu u be i ufe?"
43021022	Ujeso a de-e le: "Gbe 'i nyin mi le ù kwu uwum kpamm mi gbe tem be he igye i or, ashina 'ì yi likong ligang a ye. Wo-ò pwom mi."
43021023	Ki kung ti 'ihwee gbungg he liwu bendi-utung Ujeso le, Ujeso a de le undi-utung uma umen ana u tem hwa ye. Ujeso a ma de le u hwa ye a ye. Ashi a ma de Ipita 'ì yi le: "Gbe 'i nyin mi le ù kwu uwum kpamm mi gbe tem be he igye i, ashina 'ì yi likong ligang a ye."
43021024	Undi-utung umen angwu a kong ashin gbe lè he ana, na u de men biwom abin, u fee 'ushia ahwun. Li ngye le igie anyin ì yi 'igyang.
43021025	Biwom bisuso abi Ujeso a ma shi bi go gbamm. Bè be fee ābi puu he 'uken-uken, hang igye puu or i kpà ndor ashia angi be fee ābi ye.
44001001	Utiafilus ugi: He ukpi-ikwu 'ushia ahwu mi ma fee-a, mi ma da-a gbe lè biwom abi Ujeso a ma shi lè abi a ma hwua bendi, kung lè he 'unyong ahwu a ma kpi aki ama
44001002	kpamm lè kwom he liti angi a ma gye he 'usi lifung-atabe. Bebwaa-isom bema abe a waa a ma nong ābe ashi bè shi, mà ukpong a ma hà gbe gye he 'usi lifung-atabe. A ma shi ná gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim.
44001003	He 'unyong ahwu a ma wum lè he lihwu a ma kwu hen he igye ati asi afee. Há he 'unyong 'umen ana a maa fem he liwu libell he akwo atyetye-atyetye mbee 'unyong kpamm hè 'ì tyung ābe le ù yi uwum 'igyang a. Be maa nda he, u kong ha abe gbe lè Kusu Unim.
44001004	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma yi utung ha abe há, a ma de be le: "Mà gbe lè he Ujeruselem ye kpamm Atyagi Unim u gbe ke men 'uke ahwu a ma kyebb le u ba ka amen. Mi de men gbe lè hwu he 'unyong ahwu mi de le,
44001005	Ujon ufe a maa kib bendi he umbwo a, ukpor he ati amen i Unim u ba kib amen he Ukatia Kunyong uma."
44001006	He 'unyong ahwu be ma mbee kpee ukem, be bii Ujeso le: "Atyetyan, wo ndo sha bendi Izwell bè tem fel lè 'uhwo-bell 'anaa-anaa i a?"
44001007	Ujeso a kung fan ābe le: "Atyagi ugyang na ù yi lè ikeb le u ndor 'unyong ahwu biwom bì shi. Kì yi kpe-kpe le mà ngye 'unyong ahwu há ye.
44001008	Ukpor mà ngye le ma ba kpa ikeb he 'unyong ahwu UkatiaKunyong Unim u be hwaa lè men. Ma ba bun da bendi gba lè mi he Ujeruselem lè Ujudia lè Usameria lè abong angi a teng iteng puu."
44001009	A kong ashin kong-kong, a kung gbe ndo he lifung-atabe.Be nde-e kpamm a gbe lè nim àshì fe he bibu.
44001010	Nya a na be maa so nde àshì gye he 'usi, bendi befee abe be ma shī aliga afung-afung be be imbul-imbul, be naa ha abe nya.
44001011	Be de bebwaa-isom Ujeso le: "Men bendi Ugalili, mà ngyor naa nyin nde àshì gye he lifung-atabe ye. Ujeso umen angwu ma nde-e u gye he lifung-atabe nyin, u ba tem ba nya a na ma nde-e u gye he lifung-atabe ana."
44001012	Kung lè há ukwell angwu be ko le Olif gye he Ujeruselem, ki maa mbee 'igem ulamba. Bebwaa-isom Ujeso bekung tem lè há ukwell gye he Ujeruselem.
44001013	Be lè wu he Ujeruselem lè kwu he ushom 'usi he 'ipi be maa ndē. Bendi aben na be ma yi há: Ipita lè Ujon lè Ujems lè Andru lè Ufilip lè Utormas lè Ubatilomi lè Umatyuo lè Ujems angwu a ma yi unwaa Alfiyes lè Usaimun angwu ù yi he liwu Ijuus angi li kee le be kwa lè 'uhwo-bell, lè Ujudas, unwaa Ujems.
44001014	Befe puu be maa gbong liwu lè ugim ken kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong kpamm. Bengingye besuso lè Umeri, anam Ujeso lè bebwende be ma gbong utung ha abe.
44001015	He inwaa ati zangg bendi abongale abe be ma mbee bendi asi adyong-ken, be mbee lè kpee. Ipita a kung bo 'inaa, keb akongale ha abe.
44001016	A de le: "Bebuye, ashi be ma fee leěti le UkatiaKunyong Unim a ma kong gbe ha Udebid gbe lè Ujudas, kì yi kpe-kpe le 'ì shi. Mà na Ujudas a ma yi he liwu lityan or, le bwo Ujeso a ma waa he le ù shi aki angi lı shi or, a ma teng bendi abe be kwu Ujeso." (
44001018	Úndē angwu a ma kpe lè he 'ibibi ashi a ma shi, a kung he ndyebb itang. Nya he itang imen ana na a ma mbu lè he 'usi be tim lishi he itang, u paa ìfùng wu he igye.
44001019	Bendi puu he Ujeruselem be gyo gbe lè lihwu lima. Bekung lizen kwu itang imen ana he igie ibell le Akaldama ashi 'i ze le Itang anung.)
44001020	Ipita a gye 'ushu kong le: "Be ma fee ndor he 'ushia Usam le: 'Ushu uma u fel bishii-bishii, undi ù ndē há ye.' Be mbee fee le: 'Undi ususo ù kpe-e lishi he aki.'
44001021	"Kì yi le undi ù be fe utung ha abel hè li lì naa ushada gbe lè awumale Atyetyan Ujeso. Lì waa angwu há lè he liwu bendi abe be tan utung ha abel lè Ujeso mbee 'unyong kpamm, kung lè há 'unyong ahwu Ujon a ma kib bendi he umbwo kpamm be kwom he 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a gbe tyang li gye he lifung-atabe."
44001023	Be kung bendi befee waa. Be waa Umatayas lè Ujosef angwu be maa ko le Ubasabas, be mbee ko he le Ujestes.
44001024	Be hà kung kong ha Unim le: "Atyetyan, wo ngye àtyám bendi puu. He bendi befee i, tyung li undi angwu wo waa
44001025	le ù shi aki ná unwaa-isom Ujeso angi Ujudas a tyang gbe he 'iban 'ima ndo he 'ipi u lè kpe 'ingie ashi 'ì yi ke-e."
44001026	Be keb isasa atyele hè be bè ndè undi angwu 'ì yi le bè waa. Isasa i ma mbu ke Umatayas. A fel undi liwu bebwaa-isom abe lihwo lè he ken.
44002001	He liti Kipam Upentikos bendi abongale be ma so kwu he 'iteng ken.
44002002	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo be gyo 'ihwee 'i be lè he 'usi ná 'ufem 'ukaandi be sho há he ushom.
44002003	Be ndè 'iwom ná umor-inde 'i paa wu he afee ushom le undi uyang-yang a ma yi lè shi pwom ha ahe lishi.
44002004	Befe puu be ma kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim. Be keb akongale he igie isuso nya a na Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ke be ikeb le bè kong.
44002005	Ki ma yi lè Ijuus há he Ujeruselem abe be ma be mbee lè he abong angi à yi he igye i puu. Ijuus imen i i ma yi bendi abe be fe Unim a.
44002006	He 'unyong ahwu be ma gyo 'ihwee ashin, be buu be sho há. Ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo likorye undi uyang-yang u fel gyo bendi abongale be kong igie ima.
44002007	Le bwo 'i ma kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg, be maa fel kong ha bende le: "Bendi aben be be lè he Ugalili a.
44002008	Ná 'i shi ngwu be fel kong igie ityan a?
44002009	Bel aben li ba lè he Upatia, lè Umidia, lè Ilam, lè Umesipotemia, lè Ujudia, lè Ukapadosia, lè Upontes, lè Eshia,
44002010	lè Ufrigia, lè Upamfilia, lè Igyept, lè 'igie Ulibia ashi he Usarin. Bel besuso li ba lè he Urom a.
44002011	Bel besuso lì yi Ijuus a; besuso be shi Ijuus a ye, ukpor be ndor iten Ijuus. Besuso be ba lè he Ukrit lè Arebia. Mà na or, bel puu li gyo ābe be kong igie ityan; be kong gbe lè bikwele-uhwo abi Unim a shi."
44002012	Ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo, be fel tyāng ashi 'i ze. Be bii bende le: "Ashi 'imen ashin 'i ze le ana?"
44002013	Bendi besuso be fel nyan bendi abongale, be de le be bwom 'utyuo a.
44002014	Ipita a kung bo 'inaa he liwu bebwaa-isom Ujeso abe lihwo lè undi ken, kong ha bendi le: "Men bendi Ujudia lè bendi puu abe mà yi ndē he Ujeruselem, mà ndor 'utyung gyo mi mî de men àshi ashin 'i ze.
44002015	Li bwom ibwom a ná ma gim ana ye. Kì so liti 'ì go. Inde idyong-inde na i fel i.
44002016	Ashin na 'ì yi àshi Unim a ma kong leěti gbe ha Ujowell, unwaa angwu u tye ugie 'isom 'ima.
44002017	Ujowell a de le: 'Unim a de le ashi u be shi he 'unyong ahwu igye i ndo be mbee, kì yi le u ba som Ukatia Kunyong uma hwaa lè bendi puu. Bebwaa-men bengikye or, abe bengingye or, be ba kpa 'isom lè ha Unim kong; Unim u be tyung ishomate īmen bifem; bekaashi bēmen be be kong itam.
44002018	He 'unyong 'umen ana u ba som Ukatia Kunyong uma hwaa lè bengikye or, bengingye or, abe be fe-e. Be ba kpa 'isom 'ima kong.
44002019	U ba sha bikwele-uhwo he 'usi; u be shi bikwele-uhwo abi bı tyung ikeb ima he igye i. Anung lè 'inde lè angyu bi ba kwa bitaa hen igye.
44002020	Libwee li ba gya 'ifufebb, kufell 'u be bung fel ná anung, mà ukpong Liti likaandi angi Atyetyan Unim u be tyung ikeb ima li hà be.
44002021	He 'unyong 'umen ana undi uyang-yang angwu a be ko he lizen Atyetyan Unim u ba kwa lè likpan 'unyong.'
44002022	"Men bendi Izwell, mà dang 'utyung gyo igie anyin.Ujeso angwu Unazaret a ma yi undi angwu Unim a som a. Unim a kung tyung amen ashin gbe he bikwele-uhwo abi a ma shi gbe ha ahe. Men-agyang ma ma ngye ashin likorye 'i ma shi ha amen inyin a.
44002023	Unim ugyang a ma ngye le be ba kwa Ujeso lè ka amen, ma shi bendi-iban be maa gwu-e bee he 'ikpakpaa, u bong le bè shí āshi.
44002024	Ukpor Unim a wum he lè he lihwu. A shi-e a hwaa lè he 'utor lihwu, gbé lihwu li ma yi lè ikeb angi lı kwu-e ndor mbee ye.
44002025	Udebid a ma kong lishi Ujeso le: 'Atyagi, mi ngye le wò yi utung ha ami mbee 'unyong. Wò yi he 'ubwo lizen 'ugi le ufung ù waa mi ye.
44002026	Ashin 'i shi-m mi fel lè igor he lityam. Ungwu ugi u shi lè ipee. Mà na mi fel undigye a or, mi kwa lè lishi andorale,
44002027	le wo ba tyang 'ūnyōng 'ugi le 'ù hwō ngyor he 'usu behwu, ngwu wò be tyang i-mi Unwaa-gang angwu wo waa le likwom ligi lì hwee ye.
44002028	Wo tyung mi 'ukwo ahwu mı gbe kwu lè likpan. Wo sha-m mi shwa lè igor le bwo wò yi utung ha ami.'
44002029	"Bebuye, kì yi kpe-kpe le mì kong ha amen porr gbe lè Udebid angwu a ma yi atietyan. A ma hwō, be ngi. Likwun lima lì yi ha abel nyin 'unyin i or.
44002030	A maa tya ugie 'isom Unim a, u mbee ngye ashi Unim a kyebb ndor he. Unim a ma ke ùkyèbb le u ba kwa igia Udebid ken 'usu nya a na Udebid a ma yi.
44002031	Udebid a ma nde ashi Unim u be shi. Kife na akung kong gbe lè awumale Ujeso Ukristi, Undi-likpan, le: 'A ma hwō ngyor he 'usu behwu ye. Inyiahwo ima or i ma hwee ye.'
44002032	Bel puu li naa ushada le Unim a wum Ujeso umen i lè he lihwu.
44002033	Unim a kpe-e gye he 'usi lè fem he he 'ubwo lizen 'uma. Unim u ke-e Ukatia Kunyong uma. Ashi ma nde, ma gyo 'unyin i, kì yi 'uke ahwu Unim a kyebb ahwu Ujeso a som hwaa lè bel a.
44002034	Udebid ufe-gyang a ma gye he lifung-atabe ye. A maa kong gbe lè Ujeso, nyong a de le: 'Unim a de Atyagi le: "Be kwu ha ami 'ubwo lizen
44002035	kpamm mi gbe tem bendi-linaa begang abee fe he itang." '
44002036	"Men bendi Izwell puu, mà ngye ashin dangg le Ujeso umen angwu ma ma maa gwu bee he 'ikpakpaa i na Unim a shi-e a fel Atyetyan, u shi Ukristi." (Ukristi na Unim a kyebb le u ba som ba he igye anyin le ù kwu Undi-likpan.)
44002037	He 'unyong ahwu bendi abena be ma gyo ashi a kong, be fel lè ufung awaale kangg. Be kung bii Ipita lè bebwaa-isom Ujeso abe be teng le: "Bebuye, lì hà shi ná a?"
44002038	Ipita a kung fan ābe le: "Undi-undi ù shi beshi he biban, u tyang ābi ashele, be kib amen he umbwo he lizen Ujeso Ukristi, hè Unim ù tyang biban ke men, mà ma kpa 'uke Unim ahwu 'ù yi Ukatia Kunyong uma.
44002039	Unim a ma shi úkyébb umen i ke men lè bebwaa-men lè igia īmen angi ı be lè há 'ushu. Atyetyan Unim a ke úkyébb umen i hwaa lè bendi puu abe u be ko le bè be hwaa lè he."
44002040	Ipita a gye 'ushu kong kangg de be le, bè baa 'uhwo-bell lè he bendigye bebibi i.
44002041	Bendi gbamm be bong 'isom 'ima, be kib ābe he umbwo.He liti limen ana bendi abe be fel bong utung ha abe be maa mbee asi lisi 'ugbe 'adyong-ifee.
44002042	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso be maa fel hwua ābe biwom 'unyong 'uyang-yang. Be maa sha biwom utung ha bendi abongale besuso. Nyong be zī lizi abwo ipel, be bun ibred zī hè be bè well gbe lè lihwu Atyetyan Ujeso, be kong ha Unim or utung ha abe.
44002043	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso be maa sha bikwele-uhwo gbamm abi bı tyung ikeb Unim, bi shi bendi be fel he 'ushell, be gung he ungwu.
44002044	Bendi abongale puu be maa gya 'ushu sha biwom he utyang ken, be kung biwom bibell fe ukem.
44002045	Be maa kung biwom bibell ndyebb za. Be kung únde umen ana kwuu hwua nya a na 'ifong undi-undi 'ì yi kwom.
44002046	Liti liyang-yang be maa kpee liwu he Ushom Unim. Be tem gye he ishu bende lè bun ibred zī hè be bè well gbe lè lihwu Atyetyan Ujeso. Be zī azi lè igor lè ugim ken.
44002047	Be maa pee Unim. Be shi nyin bendi puu. Mbee ati puu Atyetyan Unim a maa ba lè bendi abe u kpan lè he biban le bè fel bong utung ha abe.
44003001	He liti ken Ipita befe lè Ujon be maa nda àshì gya he Ushom Unim he inde ikie lè ishu hè be bè lè kong ha Unim nya a na be shaa shi.
44003002	Bendi besuso be kung ungikye angwu a ma hwō abee lè há lifung anam lè ndor há he ungwu likong Ushom Unim angwu be ko le Ungwu likong 'unung. Be maa kung he la ndor há liti liyang-yang he-e ù nyong únde lè ha bendi abe be gbe gye he Ushom Unim.
44003003	A nde Ipita befe lè Ujon be gya he afee Ushom Unim, a nyong ābe 'iwom.
44003004	Be nde-e kporr. Ipita a kung de-e le, "Nde li."
44003005	A bel àshì nde be lè lishi andorale le be ka he 'iwom.
44003006	Ipita a kung de-e le: "Mì yi lè únde ye gbangg, ukpor ashi mì yi lè shi mi kung ka-a. He lizen Ujeso Ukristi angwu Unazaret, mi da-a le wò bo ndo tan."
44003007	A kung 'ubwo kwu-e he 'ubwo lizen bo 'inaa. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo abee ama lè bityung abee bima bi fel kang-kang.
44003008	A tie bo 'inaa, u fel tan. A gbe utung ha abe gye he afee Ushom Unim, u fel geb lè he 'usi, u pee Unim.
44003009	Bendi puu be nde-e u fel tan litan, u pee Unim.
44003010	Be shob le undi angwu u shaa kwu he ungwu likong Ushom Unim nyong inyong a. Ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg gbe lè limbee limen ana.
44003011	Ungikye anwuna a maa fel kwa Ipita befe lè Ujon abwo. Ki kwu bendi he 'uhwo kangg, be fel buu la hwaa lè be he Ushom Unim he 'ipi be maa ko le Kigigyo Usolomon.
44003012	Ipita a nde be. A bii ābe le: "Men bendi Izwell, kibang a, 'ı kwu amen he 'uhwo, ma fel ndě li 'itaa i? Ma kong le li shi ungikye anwun a tan gbe he ikeb lè 'inunung ashi 'ityan 'igyang â? Kì yi ná ye.
44003013	Unim angwu ù yi Unim Ebraham lè Azik lè Ujekob lè betietyan puu na a fem Unwaa-ma Ujeso. Má kung he ke bekaandi. Ma swan he he ashi Upalet he 'unyong ahwu Upalet a shi ugim le u tyang he abwo or.
44003014	Men ma mor undi ununung angwu ù yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim. Ma de Upalet le ù waa undi-ihwu a tyang abwo.
44003015	Ma gwu undi angwu u ke likpan, ukpor Unim a tem lè he wum lè he lihwu. Li naa ushada ashin.
44003016	Ikeb lizen Ujeso lè abongale ha ahe na i shi ungikye umen i a mbee, fel kang-kang ná men puu ma nde i.
44003017	"Bebuye, mi ngye le men lè bekaandi bēmen ma ma shi āshi le ma ngye ye a.
44003018	Leěti Unim a ma kong gbe ha bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima le Ukristi, Undi-likpan, u ba kpa 'ingie. A shi āshi 'i shi gbe ha amen.
44003019	Ma shi beshi he biban, ma tyang ābi ashele, be hwaa lè Unim he-e ù kpe kung biban bīmen wu lè hell, u kwu utung ha amen he-e ù fe men ingie, u som Ujeso angwu ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan ùmén angwu a waa ndor ke men.
44003021	Kì yi kpe-kpe le Ujeso ù kwu he lifung-atabe kpamm 'unyong 'u gbe fel ahwu Unim ù tem lè biwom igye anyin puu shi bì fel ná bi ma yi lè he ukpi-ikwu. Ashin na Unim a ma kong gbe ha bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima leěti.
44003022	Umosis a ma de le: 'Atyamen Unim u ba som undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom 'ima hwaa lè men ná a som mi. U ba kwa undi ūmen ugyang a. Mà dang 'utyung gyo 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi u be de men.
44003023	Kì yi le undi uyang-yang angwu u dang 'utyung gyo ashi u kong ye, be ba waa he lè he liwu bendi Unim, be gwu-e.'
44003024	Usamuwell lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim abe be ma pwom he puu be ma kong gbe lè ati anyin.
44003025	Men mà yi igia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim a. He ashin, kiwom ashi Unim a ma kong ndor ha betiemen or 'ì yi ke men a. A ma kong ndor ha Ebraham le: 'Mi ba ka bendi puu he igye 'ukwun gba ha igia igang.'
44003026	Unim a waa Unwaa-ma som hwaa lè men a 'ushu le ù be ke men 'ukwun gbe he ashele ūmen le mà bel lè he bibibi bīmen."
44004001	Ipita befe lè Ujon be maa so-i kong ha bendi he 'unyong ahwu bendi abe be shang Unim lè ukaandi bendi abe be kang Ushom Unim lè Isadusis be be hwaa lè be.
44004002	Lityam li maa nyung ābe likorye bebwaa-isom Ujeso bemen befee ana be maa hwua bendi le Ujeso a tem wum lè he lihwu, ashi 'i tyung le bendi abe be hwō be ba wum.
44004003	Likwulukwu li ma gyebb. Be kwu ābe lè fe he igaadye taa ashi.
44004004	Bendi gbamm abe be ma gyo 'isom 'imen ana be bong. Bengikye befe-befe be maa mbee asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe afee.
44004005	Ashi a taa, besu Ijuus lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè bendi abe be hwua bendi Iten be gbong liwu he Ujeruselem.
44004006	Be lè kpee ha Anas angwu ù yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bendi 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima lè Ukayafas lè Ujon lè Alezanda.
44004007	Be kpe baà Ipita be naa ābe he 'ushu. Be bii ābe le: "Ayang a de men le mà shi 'imen ashi ma shi i? Ma shi āshi he lizen ayang a?"
44004008	Ipita angwu a ma kong gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim a de be le: "Bekaandi,
44004009	má bii li gba lè 'inunung ashi li shi ha uhwo-abee anwun lè 'itaa li shi-e a mbee â?
44004010	Gbe ná a, men lè bendi Izwell puu mà ngye le ungikye angwu ma nde-e a naa nyin a mbee gbe he ikeb Ujeso Ukristi angwu Unazaret angwu ma maa gwu bee he 'ikpakpaa, Unim a wum he lè he lihwu a.
44004011	Ujeso na be ma fee gbe lè he le: 'Kukor ahwu men abe ma tye ushom ma swan āhwu le 'u ngbebb he ushom atyele ye, kufe na 'u tem fel kwu ushom naa genn.'
44004012	Ufe-ufe na u kee-kee kpan li. Kì nem yi lè undi ususo he igye anyin puu angwu Unim a ke le ù kpan li ye."
44004013	Bìkēm ukoto bi nde ná Ipita befe lè Ujon be kong porr faale 'ushell. Ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg likorye bengye le Ipita lè Ujon be ngye 'ushia ye a. Be ndè shob le be maa tan utung ha Ujeso a.
44004014	Kì tem yi lè ashi be kong ye, likorye ugyang angwu a mbee ù yi naa nya.
44004015	Be de Ipita lè Ujon le bè gye he igye. Be keb azu ashele.
44004016	Be bii bende le: "Lì shi bendi aben ná a? Undi uyang-yang he Ujeruselem a ngye le befe na be shi 'ikwele-uhwo ashi 'i dyam kangg nyin. Lì hà ndo fung āshi ye.
44004017	Lì ngywo fe be, li tye ābe uten le bè tem kong gbe lè Ujeso ye teng bendi gbamm be gyo gba lè he."
44004018	Be tem lè be ko, de be le bè tem kong likong or, ngwu bè hwua bendi or he lizen Ujeso ye.
44004019	Ipita befe lè Ujon be kung de be le: "Men-agyang mà gim àshi 'i ngbebb he ashi Unim hwò. Lì fe amen â, hà lì fe Unim á?
44004020	Bel lì hà ndo tyàng akongale ashi li ndè, lè ashi li gyo ye."
44004021	Bìkēm ukoto ana bi mbee kung kong ha abe linaa-linaa. Be hà tyang ābe abwo. Be ngye 'ukwo ahwu be kwu abwo ke be 'ingie ye, likorye bendi puu be maa pee Unim he 'ikwele-uhwo ashi 'i shi.
44004022	Ungikye umen angwu a ma mbee nyin a ma gbe gyong aze asi afee.
44004023	Be tyang Ipita befe lè Ujon abwo tyang-tyang, be tem lè de bebell àshi bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè abe he'ubong be kong ha abe.
44004024	He 'unyong ahwu bebell be gyo ashi be kong, be keb akongale ha Unim he utyang ken le: "Unim Atyetyan angwu ashi lifung-atabe lè itang lè umbwo ukaandi lè bendi or, inyia or, lè biwom puu abi bì yi hen!
44004025	Gbe ha Ukatia Kunyong Unim wo ma kong gbe ha atietyan Udebid angwu a ma yi ha awo 'ubwo le: 'Ingywo angi bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye be ma fel lè ngi i ma yi 'idideng; kiwom 'ibibi ashi bendi be ma tim 'i shi 'idideng.
44004026	Besu abe he igye anyin be kam, bekaandi be gbong ukem tim 'ibibi fe Atyetyan Unim lè Ukristi, Undi-likpan uma.'
44004027	Kì yi 'igyang a le Uherod befe lè Upontiyes Upalet lè bendi Izwell lè abe bè yi Ijuus a ye be gbong ukem hen Ujeruselem a tim 'ibibi fe Ujeso, Unwaa-gang angwu wo waa le ù kwu Undi-likpan.
44004028	Be gbong hè be bè shi 'iwom ashi wo-gyang wo kong ndor gbe he ugim ugang lè ikeb igang le 'ì shi.
44004029	Atyetyan Unim, hā gyo ashi be kong ha abel linaa-linaa. Lì yi ha awo 'ubwo. Shi li hè li lì bun 'isom 'igang faale 'ushell.
44004030	Som ikeb igang angi ı mbee bendi, wò kpell li hè li lì shi bikwele-uhwo gbe he lizen Ujeso, Unwaa-gang angwu wo som be he igye anyin."
44004031	Be kong ha Unim wee puu, ushom angwu be ma be kpee a maa fel nyung. Befe puu be kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim. Be fel bun igie Unim faale 'ushell.
44004032	Bendi abongale puu be ma yi ugim ken lè lityam ken. Undi ken or a maa gim le 'iwom ashi ù yi lè shi ì yi 'ima ufe-ufe a ye. Kiwom ūndi uyang-yang 'i ma fel ābe ukem.
44004033	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso be gye 'ushu bun de bendi lè ikeb kangg gbe lè awumale Atyetyan Ujeso. Unim a ke be befe puu 'ukwun 'ukaandi.
44004034	Ki ma yi lè undi há he liwu libell angwu 'i ma nem gben he ye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ma yi lè itang or, ishom or, a maa ndyebb ābi za ba lè únde ka bebwaa-isom Ujeso.
44004035	Be maa hwua únde umen ana ka undi-undi ná igben ima ì yi kwom.
44004036	Ki ma yi lè ungikye ken lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai angwu be maa ko le Ujosef. Be ma hwan he he Usaipres a. Bebwaa-isom Ujeso be ma kwu-e lizen le Ubanabas ashi 'i ze le Undi angwu u fe ingie.
44004037	Ufe or titi a ma ndyebb itang ima zi be lè únde uma ke bebwaa-isom Ujeso.
44005001	Ungikye ususo angwu be maa ko le Ananayas angwu be maako ungye-ma le Usafara, ufe or titi a ma ndyebb itang ima zi.
44005002	U waa únde ndor 'uhwo-ma kung 'igem be fe bebwaa-isom Ujeso he abwo. Ungye-ma a ma ngye gbe lè shi.
44005003	Ipita a bii he le: "Ananayas, ki shi ná a, wo tyang Usetan, usu bibibi, a kpe kung-a lityam, u shi-a wo bè uman de Ukatia Kunyong Unim, ki shi le wo waa 'igem únde ndor he item?
44005004	Mà ukpong wo hà ndyebb itang imen ana zi, i ma yi igang a. Ná wo ndyebb āngi zi nyin or, únde ángi ù yi ugang a. Ki shi ná a, wo gim le hang wo shi 'itaa i? Wo bè uman de bendi a ye, wo bè de Unim a."
44005005	Ananayas a gyo igie anyin gyo-gyo, a mbu hwō. Bendi puu abe be gyo ashi 'i shi be fel lè 'ushell kangg.
44005006	Ishomate i be kung 'ihwom nii he gbe lè he gye he igye lè ngi.
44005007	Awa a gbe akie, ungye-ma a be. A ngye ashi 'i shi háye.
44005008	Ipita a kung bii he le: "Únde angwu men ha ukyegang ma ndyebb itang zi puu nyin a?" A bong le ufe a.
44005009	Ipita a kung de-e le: "Ki shi ná a, ngwu men ha ukyegang ma gim le hang ma lam Ukatia Kunyong Unim? Ndè, bendi abe be ngi ukyegang bè yi naa he ungwu lishi. Bendo kung-a wo or la ngya."
44005010	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo a mbu hwō he 'ushu Ipita. Ishomate imen ana i be nde-e a hwō; i kung he lè ngi gwaa ha ukyema.
44005011	Liwu bendi abongale abe be ma yi há puu lè abe be teng àbe be gyo igyo or be fel lè 'ushell kangg.
44005012	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso be maa sha bikwele-uhwo abi bı tyung ikeb Unim he ashi bendi. He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi abongale be maa kpee he Ushom Unim he 'ipi ashi be ko le Kigigyo Usolomon.
44005013	Bendi abe he item be maa shell ná be lè hwaa lè be, ukpor befe puu be maa pee bendi abongale.
44005014	Bengikye gbamm lè bengingye gbamm abe be bong ha Atyabell Ujeso be maa fel he liwu libell.
44005015	Kiwom ashi bebwaa-isom Ujeso be shi 'i shi bendi be fel ba lè bendi-angmam ba kie he igaa he 'ukwo le gbe Ipita a be gbe, kushun 'uma 'ufe-ufe or 'ù shī besuso hè be bè mbee.
44005016	Bendi gbamm be maa ba lè bendi-angmam lè abe ikeb ibibi ì yi ha abe lè he ashi 'ubong angi a ndē gwaa ha Ujeruselem. A maa mbee ābe puu.
44005017	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè Isadusis angi ì yi utung ha ahe be fel bung ashi ha bebwaa-isom Ujeso. Be shi ugim ashi be shi ābe.
44005018	Be kwu ābe lè fe he igaadye.
44005019	Nya 'usu 'umen ana udengell Unim a be buu àshì igaadye. U kpe kung bebwaa-isom Ujeso gye lè be he igye de be le:
44005020	"Mà gye lè naa he Ushom Unim de bendi gbe lè likpan lifufe anyin."
44005021	Be bong. Ashi a taa-taa, be gbe gye he Ushom Unim lè hwua bendi biwom. Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bendi-utung bema be ko bìkēm ukoto liwu. Be kung idashanda som gye há he igaadye le bè lè be lè Ipita befe lè Ujon.
44005022	He 'unyong ahwu idashanda i nde bebwaa-isom Ujeso háye, be tem lè de bekaandi le:
44005023	"Li lè wu há, li ndè be ngib àshì. Bendi puu abe be kang ungwu likong be shi há. Ukpor li buu lishi, li ndè undi ha afee ye."
44005024	He 'unyong ahwu ukaandi bendi abe be kang Ushom Unimlè bekaandi abe be shang Unim be gyo ashin, be fel tyāng ná bebwaa-isom Ujeso be shi.
44005025	Ungikye ususo a hà be de be le bendi abe be fe he igaadye bè yi naa he Ushom Unim, be hwua bendi.
44005026	Ukaandi umen ana a bo lè bendi bema lè kwu bebwaa-isom Ujeso be lè be. Be kwu ābe he ikeb a ye, likorye be shell le hà bendi bè kpe bebwaa-isom Ujeso 'utyong maa akor gwu ābe or.
44005027	Be de be le bè be naa há he ashi bikem ukoto. Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a bii ābe bibibi.
44005028	A hà de be le: "Li bè tye men uten le mà tem hwua bendi he lizen ungikye anwun ye. Ma nde ashi ma shi a? Ma tan lè he hwua bendi Ujeruselem puu. Ma kee le ma kung uben lihwu lima swa li bel a?"
44005029	Ipita lè bebwaa-isom Ujeso abe be teng be kung kong le: "Kì yi kpe-kpe le lì fe Unim a, lì fe bendi a ye.
44005030	Unim bétietyan na a wum Ujeso angwu men ma ma maa gwu bee he 'ikpakpaa.
44005031	Unim a kpe-e gye he 'usi lè fem he ha ahe 'ubwo lizen le ù kwu Ukaandi, u mbee kwu Undi-likpan, he-e ù ke bendi Izwell libwo hè be bè shi beshi he biban bibell, bel àtyám abell lè he abi, Unim u tyang ke be.
44005032	Bel lè Ukatia Kunyong angwu Unim u ke bendi abe be fe-e li tyung bendi le biwom abin bì yi 'igyang a."
44005033	He 'unyong ahwu bìkēm ukoto bi gyo ashin, ki nyung ābe he atyam, be tim le bè gwu ābe.
44005034	Ki ma yi lè undi ken há he liwu libell angwu be maako le Ugamaliyell. Ufe or a ma yi he likwu Iferesis. A ma yi undi angwu u hwua bendi Iten a. Bendi puu be maa ka he ife. A bo 'inaa de le, bè gye lè bebwaa-isom Ujeso he igye, be kwu há 'unyong zangg.
44005035	A hà de liwu bikem ukoto le: "Men bendi Izwell, mà baa he 'iwom ashi ma laa shi bendi aben.
44005036	Ítī ungikye angwu be ko le Utyudas a ma be pwom ungwu le ufe ù yi undi ukaandi a. Bendi abe be mbee asi lisi be maa fel tan utung ha ahe. Bendi-iso be ma gwu-e. Bendi-utung bema puu be ma paa wu mbee bipi. Undi a ma tem gyo gbe lè liwu limen ana ye.
44005037	Ashin 'i shi gbe, Ujudas angwu a maa be lè he Ugalili a mbee fem he 'unyong ahwu be bo bendi. Bendi gbamm be maa fel tan utung ha ufe or. Bendi-iso be ma gwu-e ufe or. Bendi-utung bema puu be paa wu mbee bipi.
44005038	Kanaa-anaa i mi da amen le mà shi bendi aben 'iwom ye. Gbe be shi biwom abin he ikeb undi a, liwu libell li ba paa.
44005039	Gbe be shi ābi he ikeb Unim a, mà yi lè ikeb le ma kwom ābe 'ukwo ye. Hà ma ndo ha Unim a." Bìkēm ukoto bi bong àshi Ugamaliyell a kong.
44005040	Be ko bebwaa-isom Ujeso be he afee. Be kpam ābe. Be tye be uten le bè nem kong 'iwom he lizen Ujeso ye. Be hà tyang ābe abwo.
44005041	Be gbe lè há he ukoto lè igor le Unim a gim le be kpè le bendi bè bia ābe he 'uhwo Ujeso.
44005042	He liti liyang-yang be maa gya 'ushu kwa he Ushom Unimlè ishaale bendi bun 'isom 'inunung le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi angwu Unim a waa le ù kwu Undi-likpan. Be mbee hwua ābe.
44006001	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ahwu 'ugii bendi abe be pwom Ujeso 'u maa kaa ana, Ijuus angi ı kong igie Igrik i maa fel nem fa Ijuus angi ı kong igie ibell, Ihibru, le be nyim bengye-uhwuu bebell lizi liti liyang-yang he 'unyong ahwu be hwua azi.
44006002	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso abe lihwo lè be befee be ko liwu bendi abongale be he 'iteng ken kung de be le: "Ki ngbebb le lì mor igie Unim abunale hè li lì fel hwua azi ye.
44006003	Bebuye, mà waa bendi bedyong-ifee lè he liwu līmen abe ma ngye le bè yi gelalala, be shi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim, be bi lishi, hè li lì kung aki àmén i ke be.
44006004	Bel ufe li kung 'unyong kong ha Unim, li bun igie ima."
44006005	Ugim anwun a ngbebb liwu anyina. Be waa Ustibin angwu a bong ha Ujeso kangg, u shi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim. Be mbee waa Ufilip, lè Uprokores, lè Unikanor, lè Utimon, lè Upaminas, lè Unikolas angwu a maa be lè he Antiyok. A ma yi ugaandi angwu a bel fel undi angwu u pwom Unim nya a na Ijuus i shi.
44006006	Be be lè bendi aben hwaa lè bebwaa-isom Ujeso. Be kong ha Unim, be pwom ābe abwo.
44006007	Be ma gye 'ushu bun igie Unim mbee bipi puu. Kugii bendi abe be pwom Ujeso he Ujeruselem 'u maa go igo igo. Bendi gbamm abe be shang Unim be bong ha 'isom ashina.
44006008	Ustibin angwu Unim a ma ke-e 'ukwun lè ikeb, a maa sha bikwele-uhwo abi bı tyung ikeb Unim he liwu bendi.
44006009	Bendi besuso be ma yi kwu he ushom angwu be kwu liwu angwu be maa ko le Ushom bendi abe be fel porr. Bendi bemen i be ma yi Ijuus angi ı be lè he Usarin lè Alezandria a. Befe lè bendi Ijuus besuso abe be maa be lè he Usilisia lè Eshia be ma keb fe ifung ha Ustibin.
44006010	Be fung hwo-e ye, likorye Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ke-e lishi abyele.
44006011	Be ndyebb abwo lè bendi le bè de le be gyo he a kong bia Umosis lè Unim.
44006012	Ashin 'i shi bendi abe be ma yi sho há lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong lè abe be hwua bendi Iten be fel he ingywo. Be kwu-e lè ke bìkēm ukoto.
44006013	Be be lè bendi le bè be bè iman fe-e. Be de le: "Ungikye anwun u kong ban Ushom angwu li ndor ta-ta ke Unim, u kong ban Iten Umosis.
44006014	Li gyo he a de le, Ujeso umen angwu Unazaret i u ba tya Ushom Unim utyan wa he itang, u gie li akpe angi Umosis a hwua li."
44006015	Bìkēm ukoto puu abi bi ma yi sho há, be nde 'ushu Ustibin 'u fel taa ná ahwu udengell Unim nà.
44007001	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a kung bii he le: "Be kong 'igyang â?"
44007002	Ustibin a kung fan le: "Betyagi lè bebuye, mà dang 'utyung gyo mi. He 'unyong ahwu atietyan Ebraham a ma so ndē he Umesipotemia mà ukpong u hà lè ndē he 'ubong ahwu be ko le Uharan, Unim angwu lı fe-e a be hwaa lè he.
44007003	A de-e le ù bo tyang 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima lè 'ubong 'uma gye he 'ubong ahwu u lè tyung he.
44007004	Ebraham a kung bo lè he Ukaldia lè ndē he Uharan. A kwu há kpamm atyam a gbe hwō. Unim a hà de-e le ù be ndē he 'ipi men ma fel ndē 'unyin i.
44007005	Unim a ma wa gem āshi zangg or ke-e le 'ì kwu 'ima 'igyang ye. Unim a ma ke-e úkyébb le u ba kung āshi ka he. A ma mbee de-e le, kipi 'imen i 'i ba kwa 'ibell, befe lè igia ima a. He 'unyong ahwu Unim a ma ke-e úkyébb umen i a ma wa yi lè unwaa ye.
44007006	Unim a ma de-e le: 'Igia igang i ba la ndā he 'ubong bendi. Be ba fel ifee a há. Be ba kpa 'ingie aze asi lisi.
44007007	Mi ba kung 'ingie ka bendi abe be be shi igia igang lifee. Saa be hà be lè há 'ubong 'umen ana be fe-m he 'iteng ashin.'
44007008	Unim a hà de Ebraham le ù ten bebwaa-ma abe bengikye hè 'ì tyung 'itaa 'iwom ashi a kong ndor ha abe. Ebraham a hwan Azik. A ten he he liti ledyong-ikie. Azik a ten unwaa-ma, Ujekob. Ujekob u ten bebwaa-ma lihwo lè be befee abe bè yi betietyan.
44007009	"Ujekob a kwu unwaa ken le Ujosef. Bebwanam be maa bung àshì ha ahe. Be kwu-e ndyebb zi ha bendi abe be te lè he le ù lè kwu ufee he 'ubong Igyept. Unim a ma yi utung ha ahe;
44007010	a fem he lè he bingie puu. Unim a shi Ujosef a shi nyin Ufero, Usu Igyept, u mbee ke Ujosef lishi abyele. Ufero a kung 'ubong Igyept puu lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima ke Ujosef le ù kwu ukaandi.
44007011	"Ubwaa a ma be kwu kangg. Bendi abe he 'ubong Igyept lè abe he Ukenan be ma kpe 'ingie kangg. Betietyan be maa nda lizi za ye.
44007012	He 'unyong ahwu Ujekob a gyo le lizi lì yi he Igyept, a som bebwaa-ma abe bè yi betietyan le bè lè ndyebb be lè ngi.
44007013	Be te 'ugbe ahwu lefee, Ujosef a de be le ù yi unwandabell a. U mbee shi Ufero u ngye 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima.
44007014	Ujosef a som ko atyam, Ujekob, lè bendi bema puu le bè be he Igyept. Puu ubell be ma yi bendi asi akie lè bendi lihwo lè be bedyong.
44007015	Ujekob a gye he Igyept. Nya na befe lè bebwaa-ma be ndē kpamm be gbe hwō.
44007016	Ki gbe 'igbe, mà ukpong bendi be hà gye lè akwom abell he Ushekem lè kie he ubung angwu Ebraham a ma ndyebb lè ha bebwaa Uhamor ndor le ù kwu likwun.
44007017	"He 'unyong ahwu 'i ma fel kpee-kpee le Unim u ndo sha ukyebb uma angwu a ma ke Abraham, betietyan abe bè yi he Igyept be maa fel go 'ugii kangg.
44007018	Kunyong 'u be fel ahwu bendi Igyept be kwu usu ususo angwu a ngye Ujosef ye.
44007019	A fel sha betietyan biwom beshu-beshu, u mbee ban lityam ha abe. A maa sha ābe be tyang bebwaa-bell ndor he igye hè be bè hwō.
44007020	Nyin he 'unyong 'umen i na be ma hwan Umosis. A ngbebb 'unung kangg he ashi Unim. Bendi bema be kwob he he ushu ubell afell akie.
44007021	Be hà te lè he lè ndor he igye. Unwaa Ufero angwu ungingye a nde-e, kung he gye lè he lè kwob le a fel unwaa-ma.
44007022	Be hwua he biwom puu abi bendi abe be bi lishi he Igyept be ngye. A fel undi ukaandi he likong or, aki ashele or.
44007023	"He 'unyong ahwu a ma fel aze asi afee, a shi ugim le u la kong lè bebwende Izwell.
44007024	A lè ndè undi Igyept ken u ndò ha undi Izwell. A lè kpell he, kwu angwu Igyept gwu. (
44007025	A maa kong le bebwende be nda shob le Unim u ba som he le ù lè kpan ābe, ukpor be nde shob ye.)
44007026	He liti angi lefee a nde bendi Izwell befee be ndò. A lè kwu ābe abwo. A de be le: 'Mà yi bebwanam bende a. Ki shi ná a, ma ndo?'
44007027	Angwu a maa zī libi a nyii he gye he item, bii he le: 'Ayang a ka-a ikeb le wò ndè gbe lè bel, wo maa li ushe?
44007028	Kì yi-a le wò gwu-m ná uhwuhwo wo ma gwu angwu Igyept a?'
44007029	Nyong Umosis a gyo ashin, a buu gye he 'ubong Umidyan. A hwan bebwaa há befee.
44007030	"Aze asi afee a gbe. He liti ken Umosis a ma yi he libeb gwaa ha ukwell angwu be ko le Usanai. Udengell Unim a be kong ha ahe lè he úkwán angwu 'ìndē 'i maa mor.
44007031	Umosis a nde shi, ki kwu-e he 'uhwo kangg. A die te he-e ù lè nde shi 'inunung. A gyo lingmam Atyetyan Unim lè há le:
44007032	'Mì yi Unim betiegang a. Mì yi Unim Ebraham lè Azik lè Ujekob.' Umosis a fel he 'ushell, u tung for-for. A nem kaa or le u bel àshì nda ye.
44007033	Atyetyan Unim a kung de-e le: 'Waa ikwob igang lè he abee likorye wò yi naa he ashi agi, mi Unim a.
44007034	Mi nde 'ingie ashi bendi begi be kpe he Igyept dangg. Mi gyo 'ukye 'ubell. Mi be le mî kpan ābe. Bé 'anaa-anaa i, mî som-a gye he Igyept.'
44007035	"Umosis umen i na bendi Izwell be ma mor he, be bii he le, 'Ayang a ka-a ikeb le wò nde gbe lè bel, wo maa li ushe?' Ufe na Unim a ma som udengell angwu a maa kong ha ahe lè he úkwán angwu 'ìndē 'i maa mor, hwaa lè he le ù kwu usu ubell lè undi-likpan ubell.
44007036	A ma shi bikwele-uhwo abi bı tyung ikeb Unim he Igyept lè he umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Umbwo Ubwaa lè he libeb aze asi afee, he 'unyong ahwu a maa be lè bendi lè he Igyept.
44007037	Umosis umen i na a ma de bendi Izwell le: 'Unim u ba som undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom 'ima hwaa lè men ná a som mi. U ba kwa undi ūmen ugyang a.'
44007038	Ufe na a ma yi utung ha bendi Izwell he 'ipi be ma gbong liwu he libeb. A ma yi utung ha udengell angwu a ma kong ha ahe he ukwell Usanai, u shi utung ha betietyan. A ma kpe 'isom Unim ke li, ashi 'i tyung li ná lı kpe likpan.
44007039	"Betietyan be ma ke-e ife ye. Be bel lè ha ahe fel keē le hang be tem gye he Igyept a.
44007040	He 'unyong ahwu Umosis a ma yi he ukwell 'usi be de Eron le: 'Shi li litelakpa angi lì teng li. Li ngye ashi 'i shi Umosis angwu a be lè bel lè he Igyept ye.'
44007041	He 'unyong 'umen ana be shi 'atelakpa bi 'igundu, be fel shang āke. Be shi 'ipam, be gor igor he 'iwom ashi befe-gyang be shi.
44007042	Unim a bel lè ha abe, u tyang ābe le bè ndo fe ikpen angi he lifung-atabe nya a na undi angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma fee leěti le Unim a de le: 'Men bendi Izwell, ma maa gwa bityuale shang i-mi a he libeb aze asi afee ye.
44007043	Ma maa so 'ubuu Umolok angwu ù yi ùnīm ūmen lè 'atelakpa ake ma shi bi ukpen angwu ù yi ùnīm ūmen angwu ma ko le Urefan. Ma ma shi litelakpa anyin hè men mà fe a. He atan-lengi anwun mi ba ndō amen gba gyong Ubabilon.' "
44007044	Ustibin a mbee kong gye 'ushu le: "Betietyan be ma yi lè 'ubuu ahwu be kung bihwom lè ikwob inyia shi, ahwu 'u tyung le Unim a ma yi utung ha abe há he libeb. Be ma shi āhwu nya a na Unim a ma tyung Umosis le ù shi.
44007045	Aze a gbe gbamm, betietyan be kung 'ubuu 'umen i ke igia ibell. Igia ibell i kung āhwu gye lè hwu he 'unyong ahwu Ujoshua a ma teng ābe le bè be kpe itang angi Unim a ndeb lè abong angi a ma yi há, kung itang imen ana ke be. Kubuu 'umen ana 'u ma ngyor kwu há kpamm lè kwom he 'unyong ahwu Udebid a ma fel usu.
44007046	Udebid a shi nyin Unim. A ma de Unim angwu ù yi Unim Ujekob le ù ke-e ikeb he-e ù tye-e ushom.
44007047	Ukpor unwaa-ma Usolomon na a ma tye-e.
44007048	"Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu u kwa he ushom angwu undigye a tye a ye.
44007049	Atyetyan Unim a kong gbe ha undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom 'ima le: 'Lifung-atabe lì yi 'idem 'usu 'igi; igye anyin i shi he 'ipi mi pwom abee agi. Kibang 'itaa ushom ashi wo be tye-m? Mi ba shwa 'unyong hung a?
44007050	Mi-gyang na mi shi biwom bimen i puu ye a?' "
44007051	Ustibin a gye 'ushu kong le: "Ma kpo lishi. Àtyám āmen a teb; ma dang 'utyung gyo 'isom Unim ye. Mà yi nya a na betiemen a. Ma ndo ha Ukatia Kunyong Unim mbee 'unyong.
44007052	Kì yi lè undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim ken or angwu betiemen be ma mor he 'ingie akele ye. Be maa gwa bendi-isom Unim angwu be ma kong leěti le Unwaa-ma ununung u ba ba. A be, ma kwu-e ndyebb zi ha bendi besuso le bè gwu-e.
44007053	Men na ma kpe iten angi Unim a ma ke gbe ha idengell ima, ukpor ma ndor āngi ye."
44007054	Bekaandi Ijuus be gyo ashin, ki nyung ābe lityam, be zī he ungwu fe-e.
44007055	Ustibin angwu a ma yi lè ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim kangg, a kung àshì gye he lifung-atabe, a nde 'ikung-gbo Unim 'i taa, u nde Ujeso ù yi naa he 'ubwo lizen Unim.
44007056	A de le: "Mi nde lifung-atabe lì yi hwuo. Unwaa Undigye ù yi naa he 'ubwo lizen Unim."
44007057	-
44007058	Be gyo ashin gyo-gyo, be kwom 'ihwee tem-tem-tem shī abwo he atyung. Be bo liwu-liwu kwu-e gbe lè he lifung-ushu lè maa akor gwu-e. Bendi abe be naa ushada be waa aliga abell ke ungikye angwu be ko le Usorl le ù kwu ābe.
