44007059	Nya a na be maa Ustibin akor, a maa kong le: "Atyagi Ujeso, kung 'ūnyōng 'ugi."
44007060	A bel tim anung he itang, u kong gboo le: "Atyagi, shi bo 'iban ashin fe be ye." A hà hwō. (1) Ki nyin Usorl ná be gwu-e.
44008001	Kung lè há liti limen i, liwu bendi abongale he Ujeruselem be ma kpi 'ingie akpele kangg. Bendi abongale bemen ana be ma paa wu mbee Ujudia lè Usameria puu, kee-kee teng bebwaa-isom Ujeso befe-befe.
44008002	Bendi besuso abe be fe Unim be kung Ustibin lè ngi, be kung ki-e.
44008003	Usorl a maa kaa le he-e ù paa liwu bendi abongale. A maa gya mbee ishom puu la swà lè bengikye or, bengingye or, la fa he igaadye.
44008004	Bendi abongale abe be ma paa he abwo, be gye mbee bipi bun 'isom 'inunung.
44008005	Ufilip a gye he lishi Usameria, a fel bun da bendi há gba lè Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin.
44008006	Bendi gbamm be dang 'utyung gyo ashi Ufilip u bun. Befe puu be gyo he, be mbee ndè bikwele-uhwo abi a ma shi.
44008007	Ikeb ibibi i fem lè ha bendi gbamm lè 'ikukung he ungwu. Bigwun bendi or, bi mbee.
44008008	Bendi Usameria be fel lè igor kangg.
44008009	Ungikye ususo a ma yi há angwu a maa shi anong a kwu bendi Usameria he 'uhwo. Be maa ko he le Usaimun. A maa lam bendi le ufe na a mbee igye.
44008010	Bekaandi or, bebwan or, be maa dang 'utyung gyo he le bwo 'i gbe 'igbe ná a maa shi anong a kwu ābe he 'uhwo. Be de le: "Ikeb angi be ko le Ikeb Unim angi i dyam na i be fel undigye nyin."
44008012	He 'unyong ahwu bengikye or, bengingye or, be bong àshi Ufilip a bun gbe lè 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Kusu Unim lè Ujeso Ukristi, a kib ābe he umbwo.
44008013	Usaimun ugyang or a bong. A kib he he umbwo, u ngyor kwu utung ha Ufilip. Ki maa kwa he he 'uhwo ná u ndè Ufilip u shi bikwele-uhwo.
44008014	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso abe bè yi he Ujeruselem be gyo le bendi Usameria be kpe 'isom 'inunung. Be kung Ipita befe lè Ujon som hwaa lè be.
44008015	-
44008016	Há he 'unyong 'umen ana Ukatia Kunyong Unim ufe a ma wa be hwaa lè bendi abongale ye. Be kee-kee kib ābe he umbwo he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso a. Ipita befe lè Ujon be lè wu há wu-wu, be kong ha Unim le ù ke bendi abongale Ukatia Kunyong uma.
44008017	Be pwom ābe abwo he lishi; be kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim.
44008018	Usaimun a nde le be kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim he 'unyong ahwu bebwaa-isom Ujeso be pwom ābe abwo. A lè be lè únde he-e ù ke be.
44008019	A de be le: "Ke-m, mi or titi, ikeb imen i hè gbe mì pwom undi uyang-yang abwo, he-e ù kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim."
44008020	Ipita a kung de-e le: "Linim lì kwu ke men ha únde ugang likorye wo gim le wo nya ndyebb 'uke Unim indyebb.
44008021	Wò yi lè libwo he aki atyan ye, likorye lityam ligang lì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim ye.
44008022	Bel lityam ligang lè he agimale 'ibibi ashin, wo kong ha Unim le ù tyang ugim ubibi ugang ka-a.
44008023	Mi ndè lityam ligang li sho lè ashi abungale, wo shi ufee 'iban."
44008024	Usaimun a kung de be le: "Men mà kong ha Atyamen ke-m hè biwom abi ma kong nyin, ken or 'ì shi-m ye."
44008025	Ipita befe lè Ujon be bun 'isom Atyetyan Unim de bendi. Be hà tem gye he Ujeruselem. Be lè fel he 'ukwo, be nda àshì gya he Ujeruselem, be bel he ashi Usameria gbamm bun 'isom 'inunung da ābe.
44008026	Udengell Unim a be de Ufilip le ù bo gbe he 'ukwo ahwu 'u be lè he Ujeruselem gye he Ugaza. (Bè nem gba he 'ukwo 'umen i ye.)
44008027	Ufilip a kung bo 'inaa gbe ndo há. Ungikye Itiopia a ma yi undi ukaandi angwu a maa kam ungingye angwu ù yi usu Itiopia únde a. Be maa ko usu umen i le Ukandas. Ungikye ana a tem lè he Ujeruselem he 'ipi a ma lè fe Unim, u nda àshì gya he ushu.
44008028	Nya a na a maa pwom utrok uma angwu 'ukaa-inyia 'u su lè he, a maa bo 'ushia ahwu Azaya, undi angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim, a ma fee.
44008029	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a kung de Ufilip le ù lè tan gwaa ha utrok ana.
44008030	Ufilip a buu tel he, a gyo ungikye ana u bo 'ushia Azaya. A kung bii he le: "Ashi wo bo ana, ki nung-a há a?"
44008031	Ukaandi anwuna a kung bii he le: "Kì ha nung mi ná a, faale undi angwu u hwua mi?" A kung de Ufilip le ù mbo hwaa lè he.
44008032	Ashi a maa bo lè he 'ushia, ki ma yi le: "A ma yi ná ùtiā angwu be kwu le be la gwa; u shi ná unwaa utia angwu u kwu womm he 'unyong ahwu be shia he indib. A ma kong 'iwom ye.
44008033	Be ma shi-e a fel he ashi ilaa-ilaa; be tang ushe uma 'inunung ye. A hwō lihwu likpo, he ashin a shi ūbū ye. Ayang ù ha be kong gbe lè he?"
44008034	Ukaandi ana a kung bii Ufilip le Azaya a maa kong gba lè ayang á? A maa kong gba lè 'uhwo-ma â, hà a maa kong gba lè undi ususo a?
44008035	Ufilip a keb abunale 'isom 'inunung de-e gbe lè Ujeso, kung lè há he lishi 'ushia limen angi á yii bo ana.
44008036	Be te lè 'ukwo lè 'ukwo lè nde lishor. Ukaandi Itiopia a kung de Ufilip le: "Ndè umbwo. Kibang 'ı mbee kwuu mi 'ukwo umbwo akibale?" [
44008037	Ufilip a kung de-e le, gbe a bong lè lityam lima puu, u kib he he umbwo. Ufe a kung de le a bong le Ujeso Ukristi ù yi Unwaa Unim a.]
44008038	Ukaandi ana a shi 'ukaa-inyia ahwu 'u su lè utrok 'u naa. Puu abe befee be gbe gye he afee lishor. Ufilip a lè kib he he umbwo.
44008039	Be fem tang he igye. Ukatia Kunyong Unim a kung gbe lè Ufilip lè há. Ungikye Itiopia a nem nde-e ye. A gbe ligye igor-igor.
44008040	Ufilip a nde le ù fel yi he Azotes a. A gye 'ushu bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi he ashi angi à yi há kpamm be wu he Usesaria.
44009001	Usorl a maa so-i kong fa bendi abe be bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso 'ushell le u ba gwa ābe. A lè hwaa lè usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim.
44009002	A de-e le ù fee 'ushia he-e ù lè ke bekaandi abe he ishom angi Ijuus ı kwu liwu angi he Udamasikos, gbe a ndè bendi abe be pwom 'ukwo Atyetyan Ujeso há, he-e u kwu lè ikeb kwu ābe gye lè be he Ujeruselem.
44009003	A lè fel he 'ukwo le u ndo wa he Udamasikos. Kikung-gbo 'i taa lè he lifung-atabe fe-e nya imbul-imbul.
44009004	A mbu shī he itang; u gyo lingmam li kong ha ahe le: "Usorl, Usorl, kibang a, wo ke-m 'ingie?"
44009005	Usorl a kung bii le: "Wo ayang a, Atyagi?" Gyo lingmam anyina le: "Mi Ujeso angwu wo ke-m 'ingie a.
44009006	Bo 'inaa gye he lifung-ushu lè kwu nyong undi angwu u be da-a ashi wò shi."
44009007	Bendi abe be ma yi utung ha ahe be fel naa kporr faale likong. Be maa gyo lingmam, ukpor be ndè undi ye.
44009008	Usorl a ma bo 'inaa. Atong-shi ama a ma yi peē, ukpor a maa nda ye. Be fel kwu-e abwo he 'ubwo, gye lè he he Udamasikos.
44009009	Ashi ama a ma hwuà ati akie. U zī lizi or, ngwu u ngwo umbwo or ye.
44009010	Undi abongale ususo a ma yi há he Udamasikos. Be ko he le Ananayas. Atyetyan Ujeso a hà be fem ko he le: "Ananayas." A fan he le: "Atyagi, nde-m mì yi nyin."
44009011	Atyetyan Ujeso a de-e le: "Kam ha-a a gye he 'ukwo ahwu be ko le Kukwo ahwu 'u nong sii, wo gye he ushom Ujudas lè bii gbe lè ungikye angwu u be lè he Utaasos angwu be ko le Usorl. U kong ha ami há.
44009012	Mi tyung he undi angwu be ko le Ananayas. A be pwom he abwo hè atong-shi ama à buu."
44009013	Ananayas a de-e le: "Atyagi, bendi gbamm be de-m gbe lè biwom bibibi puu abi ungikye anwun a shi ha bendi begang abe he Ujeruselem.
44009014	A kpe ikeb lè ha bekaandi abe be shang Unim he-e ù be kwu bendi lè he Udamasikos abe be bong ha awo."
44009015	Atyetyan Ujeso a de-e le: "Ndo te likorye mi waa Usorl le ù kwu-m undi angwu u ke-m ife, u de bendi abe lè he abong asuso lè besu bebell lè bendi Izwell puu gbe lè mi.
44009016	Mi ba tyung he 'itaa ashi u be kpe 'ingie kangg he 'uhwo 'ugi."
44009017	Ananayas a kung bo gye há he ushom umen ana lè pwom he abwo. U de le: "Unwandagi Usorl, Atyetyan Ujeso angwu wo ndè he 'unyong ahwu wó yii ndè àshì be nyin na a som mi. A som mi le mì be shi-a wo mbee ndè, wo mbee kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim."
44009018	A kong ashin kong-kong, biwom bi bor Usorl lè ha atong-shi ná bibubor ukwan tyang he itang. U fel ndà. A bo 'inaa, be kib he he umbwo.
44009019	A zī lizi tem fel kang-kang. A ngyor kwu utung ha bendi abongale he Udamasikos he inwaa ati zangg.
44009020	A gbe ligbe-ligbe gye he ishom angi Ijuus ı kwu liwu lè bun gbe lè Ujeso le ù yi Unwaa Unim a.
44009021	Bendi puu abe be gyo he, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg. Be fel bii le: "Ungikye anwun na u gwu bendi abe be bong ha Ujeso ye a? A be nyin he-e ù be kwu bitaa bendi bimen i lè ke bekaandi abe be shang Unim a ye a?"
44009022	Usorl u fel bun da ābe lè ikeb kangg. A tyung bendi Ijuus abe be ma yi ndē he Udamasikos le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a waa som a. Be nem fan he ye, likorye biwom abi a kong gbe lè Ujeso bi hwò ābe ungwu.
44009023	Ati a gbe gbamm, Ijuus i gbong ukem tim le bè gwu-e.
44009024	A gyo ashi be kam le be sha he. Be maa kang ingwu likong 'ubong, ishu or, kusu or, hè be bè kwu-e gwu.
44009025	Ukpor he liti ken lè 'usu bendi-utung bema be hà kung he fe he 'itetel, be tye indi fe shi, be ngyu gbe lè he he uwindo uging lè ndor he itang lè he igye.
44009026	Usorl a gye he Ujeruselem lè kaa le he-e u kwu utung ha bendi abongale abe há he Ujeruselem. Be maa shell he likorye be ma bong le ufe or ù yi undi abongale a ye.
44009027	Ubanabas a hà kpe-e lè hwaa lè bebwaa-isom Ujeso. A bun de be ná Usorl a ndè Atyetyan Ujeso he 'unyong ahwu a maa nde àshì gye he Udamasikos, u de be le Ujeso a kong ha Usorl, u de be ná Usorl a bun 'isom faale 'ushell he lizen Ujeso he Udamasikos.
44009028	Usorl a maa fel tan utung ha abe mbee Ujeruselem bun 'isom Unim he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso porr.
44009029	A fung ha Ijuus angi ı kong igie Igrik. Be fel kaa hè be bè gwu-e.
44009030	Bendi abongale be gyo ashin. Be kpe-e gye lè he he Usesaria. Be lè wu há, be de-e le u ndo gye he Utaasos.
44009031	Bendi abongale puu he Ujudia or, he Ugalili or, he Usameria or, be fel lè ikwun. Be maa go 'ugii kangg gba he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim. Be maa ka Atyetyan Unim ife.
44009032	Ipita a maa tan mbee bipi. He 'unyong ken a hà lè kong lè bendi abe bè yi ke Unim abe he Ulida.
44009033	A nde ungikye ususo há angwu be maa ko le Anias. A ma yi 'ikwu itang aze adyong-ikie likorye a ma hwō abee.
44009034	Ipita a de-e le: "Anias, Ujeso Ukristi a mbee-a. Bo 'inaa ha-a à kung unong ugang." A kung bo 'inaa nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
44009035	Bendi Ulida lè abe he Usheron gbamm be nde-e. Be bel àtyám ke Atyetyan Ujeso.
44009036	Ungingye ususo angwu a bong ha Ujeso a ma yi he Ujopa. Be maa ko he le Utabita. Bendi Igrik be maa ko he le Udokas ashi 'ı ze le ùtyùng. Mbee 'unyong kpamm a maa sha binunung, u kpell bendi-likaa.
44009037	A hà mbu lingmam hwō. Be kwob he umbwo te lè he lè kie he ushom 'usi.
44009038	Bendi abongale abe há he Ujopa be gyo le Ipita ù yi he Ulida. (Ki ma yi lè 'igbe kung lè he Ujopa gye he Ulida ye.) Be kung som bendi befee hwaa lè he le ù te akikye.
44009039	Ipita a kung kam gbe utung ha abe. A lè wu há wu-wu, be kpe-e gye há he ushom 'usi. Bengye-uhwuu be kaa kel-kel fe Ipita, be kya. Bè yii tyung he aliga angi Udokas a ma kpi ke be he 'unyong ahwu a ma so uwum.
44009040	Ipita a ndō abe, befe puu, gye igye. A tim anung he itang kong ha Unim. A bel àshì ndè likwom, a de le: "Utabita, bo 'inaa." A buu àshì ndè Ipita, u bo bel kwu ko.
44009041	Ipita a lè kwu-e abwo bo 'inaa. A ko bendi abongale lè bengye-uhwuu, tyung ābe áhe uwum.
44009042	Bendi Ujopa puu be gyo gbe lè shi. Bendi gbamm be bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso.
44009043	Ipita a ngyor kwu he Ujopa gbe 'igbe he ushom Usaimun angwu a maa kung ikwob inyia shı biwom.
44010001	Ki ma yi lè ungikye ususo he Usesaria angwu be maa ko le Ukoleniyes. A ma yi ukaandi liwu ishogya angi be ko le Liwu Itali.
44010002	A ma yi undi angwu u fe Unim a. Ufe-gyang lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima be maa shell Unim. A maa kpell bendi Ijuus abe be mbu likaa kangg. A maa kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong.
44010003	He liti ken Unim a tyung he 'iwom lè ishu he inde ikie. A ndè udengell Unim dangg, a be fem ko he le "Ukoleniyes."
44010004	Ukoleniyes a bel àshì nde-e kporr, u fel he 'ushell. A kung bii he le: "Kibang a, Atyagi?" Udengell Unim a de-e le: "Unim a gyo ná wo kong ha ahe. A ndè binunung abi wo shi; u well-a.
44010005	Ndo som bendi gye he Ujopa le bè lè ko-a ungikye ken angwu be ko le Usaimun angwu be mbee ko le Ipita.
44010006	Ù yi he ushom Usaimun angwu a ndē gwaa ha ungwu umbwo ukaandi. Ungikye umen i ù yi undi angwu u kung ikwob inyia shì biwom a."
44010007	Udengell Unim anwuna a kung gbe ligye. Ukoleniyes a kung ko bebwaa ushom bema befee lè undi ishogya angwu u fe Unim, u shi-e aki mbee 'unyong.
44010008	A de be ashi 'i shi; u som ābe gye he Ujopa.
44010009	Ashi a taa, be lè fel kpee-kpee ha Ujopa. Ipita a kung mbo gye he ushom 'usi nya lè ishu he-e ù lè kong ha Unim.
44010010	Itung i maa fel ndo he; u fel gim le hang a ndè lizi zī. Nya a na be maa shi lizi há abwo, Unim a tyung he 'iwom.
44010011	A nde lifung-atabe lì yi hwuo. U nde 'iwom 'i be lè he lifung-atabe ná be kwu 'ihwom abwo he ashi ama puu ande tyang be he itang.
44010012	Bishishi inyia puu angi abee ande or, angi ı su lifung he itang or, linyun or, bi ma yi he afee áshi.
44010013	A gyo lingmam li de-e le: "Ipita, bo 'inaa gwu ha-a à zī."
44010014	Ipita a kung de le: "Dia, Atyagi. Mi wa zī 'iwom ashi iten i kong le 'ì yi lè abel ngye ye."
44010015	A mbee gyo lingmam le: "Kiwom ashi Unim a de le 'ì yi gelalala, wo-ò shi ko āshi le 'iwom abel ye."
44010016	Kimen ashin 'i ma shi 'ugbe 'akie. Kihwom ashina 'i kung tem gye he lifung-atabe.
44010017	Nya a na Ipita a maa tyāng gbe lè ashi 'iwom ashi a ndè 'i ze, bendi abe Ukoleniyes a som, be bii gyo he 'ipi ushu Usaimun ù yi. Be be naa he ungwu likong.
44010018	Be ko bii le: "Ugaandi ù yi nyin nyin angwu be ko le Usaimun Ipita a?"
44010019	Ipita a maa so-i tyāng gba lè 'iwom ashi a ndè he 'unyong ahwu Ukatia Kunyong Unim a de-e le: "Ndè! Bendi bekie be shun-a há he igye.
44010020	Ndo kam ha-a à gye há he liten. Shī kam kamm he agyele utung ha abe ye, likorye mi na mi som ābe."
44010021	Ipita a kung gye há he liten lè de be le: "Mi na ma shun. Kibang a, ma kee mi?"
44010022	Be kung de-e le: "Ukaandi angwu be ko le Ukoleniyes na a som li. Ù yi undi ununung a, u ke Unim ife. Ijuus puu i ka he ife. Udengell Unim a de-e le ù shī ko-a gye ha ahe ushom he-e ù gyo ashi wo kong."
44010023	Ipita a kpe be gye he afee ushom. Be lè ngyor há taa ashi. Ashi a taa-taa, a kam gbe utung ha abe. Bendi abongale besuso lè he Ujopa be te utung ha abe.
44010024	Ashi a mbee taa, be wu há he Usesaria. Ukoleniyes lè bendi bema lè bedim-ma abe a ma ko, be ma yi kwu há, be nyong Ipita.
44010025	Nya a na Ipita a maa ndo gye he afee ushom, Ukoleniyes a be kpee lè he, u bel tim anung he itang, u keb lishi he itang fe-e.
44010026	Ipita a de-e le: "Bo 'inaa atye, mi or titi mì yi undigye a."
44010027	Nya a na be maa gye he afee, Ipita a ma kong ha ahe. A lè nde bendi bè yi sho há kangg.
44010028	A kung de be le: "Men-agyang ma ngye dangg le iten Ijuus i bong le undi Ijuus ù gbe kpee bendi 'ubong 'ususo ye. Ukpor Unim a tyung mi 'iwom he-m mì nem de le undi uyang-yang ù yi undi abel a ye.
44010029	He atan-lengi anwun he 'unyong ahwu ma som ko mi, mi kam kamm he abele ye. Kanaa-anaa i, mà de-m àshi ma som ko mi."
44010030	Ukoleniyes a kung de-e le: "Ati a gbe akie ná 'igbe ashin, mi maa kong ha Unim ná mi shaa shi lè ishu. Undi angwu a shī aliga angi a taa, a be naa mi he 'ushu nya imbul-imbul;
44010031	a de-m le: 'Ukoleniyes, Unim a gyo ná wo kong ha ahe. A ndè 'inunung ashi wo shi, u well-a.
44010032	Som bendi gye he Ujopa hè be bè lè ko-a ungikye angwu be ko le Usaimun Ipita. Ù yi he ushom Usaimun angwu ù yi ndē gwaa he ungwu umbwo ukaandi. Ungikye umen i u kung ikwob inyia shà biwom.'
44010033	Mi kung bendi som nya 'ukwo-ukwo. Wo or wo shi 'indee-indee ná wo bong be. Bel puu lì yi sho nyin he ashi Unim. Li nyong-a hè li lì gyo ashi Atyetyan Unim a da-a le wò kong."
44010034	Ipita a kung de be le: "Kanaa-anaa i mi ngye dangg le 'ì yi 'igyang a le bendi puu bè yi Unim nya 'itaa a ken.
44010035	Undi uyang-yang lè he 'ubong 'uyang-yang angwu u shell Unim, u shi 'inunung na u shi nyin Unim.
44010036	Má ngye 'isom ashi Unim a ma som hwaa lè bendi Izwell le be fel lè ikwun gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi Atyam bendi puu.
44010037	Kì yi kpe-kpe le mì de men ashi 'i ma shi kung lè he Ugalili mbee lè 'ubong Ujudia puu he 'unyong ahwu Ujon a ma kib bendi he umbwo ye. Má ngye shi.
44010038	Ma mbee ngye gbe lè Ujeso angwu Unazaret lè 'itaa ashi Unim a ma ke-e Ukatia Kunyong uma lè ikeb. Le bwo Unim a ma yi utung ha ahe, a maa tan mbee bipi sha binunung, u mbee bendi abe bè yi he abwo usu bibibi.
44010039	Bel li nde biwom abi a maa shi he 'igie Ijuus lè Ujeruselem hè li lì bun de men. Be ma maa gwu-e bee he 'ikpakpaa.
44010040	Unim a ma wum he lè he lihwu he liti lekie, u shi-e u fem hè bendi bè nde-e.
44010041	Bendi puu na be ma nde-e ye. Bel abe Unim a waa le lì bun gbe lè he befe-befe na li ma nde-e. Li ma zī, li ngwo utung ha ahe he 'unyong ahwu a ma wum lè he lihwu.
44010042	A de li le lì bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi, li mbee de be le ufe na Unim a waa le ù tang ushe bendi bewum lè abe be hwō.
44010043	Bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim puu be kong gbe lè he leěti le undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe, Unim u tyang biban bima ka he gbe he ikeb lizen lima."
44010044	Nya a na Ipita a maa so-i kong ashin, Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be hwaa lè bendi abe be maa gyo 'isom 'imen i.
44010045	Bendi Ijuus abe be ma yi bendi abongale abe be be utung ha Ipita, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo ná Unim a ke bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or 'uke 'uma ahwu Ukatia Kunyong uma.
44010046	Be gyo ābe be kong igie angi be hwua āngī ye, be gyo ābe be pee Unim angwu a dyam. Ipita a kung de be le:
44010047	"Bendi aben be kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ná li ma kpe a. Undi u nya mbee kwuu ābe 'ukwo umbwo akibale a?"
44010048	A kung de le bè kib ābe he umbwo he lizen Ujeso Ukristi. Be hà de-e le ù kwu ha abe há he inwaa ati zangg.
44011001	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bendi abongale puu abe he Ujudia be gyo le bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or be gyo igie Unim, be kpe ngi.
44011002	Ipita a gye he Ujeruselem. Bendi Ijuus abe be gim le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye bè ten, be fel ben he le,
44011003	a gye he ushom bendi abe bè yi bididim, u zī lizi or utung ha abe.
44011004	Ipita a kung bun biwom puu abi bi shi kung lè há ukpi-ikwu de be.
44011005	A kong le: "He liti ken mi maa kong ha Unim he Ujopa. Unim a tyung mi 'iwom 'isuso ná 'ihwom 'i be lè he lifung-atabe ashi be kwu abwo he ashi ama puu ande be fel ha ami nyin.
44011006	Mi shun àshì há he afee. Mi nde bityuale lè inyia libeb lè angi ı su lifung he itang lè linyun.
44011007	Mi kung gyo lingmam li kong ha ami le: 'Ipita, bo 'inaa gwu ha-a à zī.'
44011008	Mi-i kung kong le: 'Dia, Atyagi. Kiwom ashi iten ityan i kong le 'ì yi lè abel 'i wa gbe ha ami ungwu ngye ye.'
44011009	Mi mbee gyo lingmam lè he lifung-atabe le: 'Kiwom ashi Unim a de le 'ì yi gelalala, wo-ò shi ko āshi le 'iwom abel ye.'
44011010	Kimen ashin 'i ma shi 'ugbe 'akie. Biwom abin puu bi kung tem gye he lifung-atabe.
44011011	He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi bekie abe be ma som hwaa lè mi lè he Usesaria, be kung fel há he 'ipi mi ma yi.
44011012	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a kung de-m le mì te utung ha abe faale ungwu atimale. Bebuye abe bedyong-ken nyin or be gye há he Usesaria utung ha ami. Bel puu li lè wu he ushu ungikye umen ana.
44011013	A de li ná a ndè udengell Unim a be naa ha ahe ushom de-e le: 'Som bendi gye he Ujopa lè ko ungikye angwu be ko le Usaimun Ipita.
44011014	U ba da-a ná men lè bendi begang mà shi hè men mà kwu lè likpan 'unyong.'
44011015	Nya a na mi maa kong ha abe, Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be hwaa lè be ná a ma be hwaa lè bel he ukpi-ikwu.
44011016	Mi kung well le Atyetyan Ujeso a ma de le: 'Ujon a maa kib bendi he umbwo a, ukpor Unim u ba kib amen he Ukatia Kunyong uma.'
44011017	Ki nung nwongg le Unim a ke bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or 'itaa 'uke ahwu a ma ke li he 'unyong ahwu li bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi. Ayang ù hà yi-m mi angwu mı kaa le mi kwom Unim 'ukwo he ashi a kee le u sha?"
44011018	Be gyo ashin gyo-gyo, be tyǎng he abenale. Be fel pee Unim da le: "Unim a ke bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye libwo le bè bel àtyám lè he biban hè be bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong."
44011019	Bendi abongale be ma paa wu mbee bipi gbe he 'ingie ashi 'i ma be he 'unyong ahwu be ma gwu Ustibin. Besuso be ma gye he Ufenishia, besuso be gye he Usaipres, besuso be gye he Antiyok. Be maa bun igie Unim da Ijuus ife-ife a.
44011020	Bendi abongale besuso abe be maa be lè he Usaipres lè abe be be lè he Usarin be ma gye he Antiyok lè bun 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso de bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or titi.
44011021	Ikeb Atyetyan Ujeso i ma yi ha abe. Bendi gbamm be bong, be bel àtyám ke Atyetyan Ujeso.
44011022	Liwu bendi abongale angi lì yi he Ujeruselem li gyo ashin, be kung Ubanabas som gye há he Antiyok.
44011023	A lè wu há, a nde ná Unim a ke be 'ukwun, a fel lè igor. A fe be ingie le bè kwu bendi abe be kung 'uhwo-bell ke Atyetyan Ujeso lè àtyám abell puu.
44011024	Ubanabas a ma yi undi ununung angwu a ma yi lè ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim kangg, u shi lè abongale. Bendi gbamm be kung 'uhwo-bell fe Atyetyan Ujeso he abwo.
44011025	Ubanabas a hà gbe ndo he Utaasos le u la shun Usorl.
44011026	A lè nde-e; a kpe-e be lè he he Antiyok. Puu abe befee be kwu há he liwu bendi abongale lize libo hwua bendi gbamm. Nyin he Antiyok i na be kpi 'ikwu ko bendi abongale le bendi Ukristi.
44011027	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be bo lè he Ujeruselem gye he Antiyok.
44011028	Undi ken lè he liwu libell angwu be maa ko le Agabes a bo 'inaa kung kong gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim le baale ubwaa ubibi u kwu bendi hen igye puu. (Ubwaa umen i a kwu he 'unyong Ukeladiyes a ma yi Usu ukaandi he Urom.)
44011029	Bendi abongale be tim le undi-undi ù ke 'iwom ashi ù yi lè shi hè be bè kpe fe ukem lè ke bebell abe he Ujudia.
44011030	Be dye puu, be hà kung som Ubanabas befe lè Usorl le bè lè ke bekaandi abe be nde gbe lè liwu bendi abongale he Ujudia.
44012001	Nyin he 'unyong 'umen i Usu Uherod a maa fel teb lè bendi abongale besuso.
44012002	A kong, be kung 'ashwia gwu Ujems, unwanam Ujon.
44012003	A nde le 'i nyin Ijuus. A mbee kong, be kwu Ipita. (Ashin 'i shi he 'unyong ahwu be maa shi 'ipam ashi be zī ibred angi i mbwee ye a.)
44012004	Be kwu Ipita lè fe he igaadye. Be ma som ishogya lihwo lè ngi idyong-ken le ì lè kang he he bēndè-bēndè. Uherod a gim le gbe Kipam Agbele-gyong 'i mbee, u ba lè he ka Ijuus.
44012005	Nya he 'unyong ahwu Ipita a ma yi he igaadye, bendi abongale be maa kong ha Unim kangg ka he.
44012006	He 'usu ahwu 'u ma yi le ashi a taa Uherod u kung he ka bendi, Ipita a ma mbu 'unde ndē he 'udyan ishogya ifee. Be ma fe-e ashishilika afee; ishogya i shì he ungwu likong i kang.
44012007	Kikung-gbo 'i kung taa há he 'ipo igaadye. Udengell Atyetyan Unim a fem há imbul-imbul. A yii Ipita 'ubwo he 'igbong, a wum. A kung de-e le: "Bo 'inaa akikye." Ashishilika a wung he lè he abwo.
44012008	Udengell a kung de-e le: "Kung ukwob ugang bua, wo kung ikwob abee fe." A kung fe. A mbee de-e le ù kung aliga shī, pwom he.
44012009	Ipita a gbe lè há igaadye utung ha udengell. A ngye le 'ì yi 'igyang a ye. A maa kong le itam na ı shi-e.
44012010	Be gbe ukpi-ikwu likwu ishogya angi ı kang igaadye; be gbe ángi lefee. He umbee-likel be be fel he ungwu likong angwu be gbe gye he lifung-ushu. Be shì lishi 'índe a shī há. Lishi limen ana li buu lè 'uhwo-ngi; be gbe tang he igye. Be lè fel he 'ukwo fel-fel, udengell ana a nyong gbe tyang Ipita.
44012011	Ki kung buu Ipita nwongg, a hà ngye 'iwom ashi 'i shi. A kung kong le: "Kanaa-anaa i mi ngye dangg le Atyagi Unim na a som udengell uma le ù be kpan mi lè he abwo Uherod, u kpan mi lè he biwom abi Ijuus i kam le i sha-m."
44012012	Nya a na a gim gbe lè ashin, a gbe ndo he ushu Umeri angwu ù yi anam Ujon Umak. Bendi abongale gbamm be ma yi sho há; be kong ha Unim.
44012013	Ipita a be naa he ungwu likong kem abwo he lishi. Unwaa ushom angwu be maa ko le Uroda a be he-e ù ndè angwu há.
44012014	A shob igie Ipita; a fel lè igor; a tem buu lishi or ye. A buu tem lè de abe be teng le Ipita ù yi naa he ungwu likong.
44012015	Be de-e le: "Wo ngyor lityuo." A de be le u kong 'igyang a. Gyo ābe le: "Ufe a ye, udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè he a."
44012016	Ipita ù yii kem abwo he lishi. Be hà buu lishi nde-e; ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo kangg.
44012017	A yor abwo de be le bè kwun atyung, u de be ná Atyetyan Unim a fem he lè he igaadye. A de be le bè lè de Ujems lè bendi abongale abe be teng or. A hà gbe lè há ndo he 'iteng 'isuso.
44012018	Ashi a taa, ishogya angi ı kang igaadye i maa fel waa ufung, i tyāng ashi 'i shi. Be bii le: "Ipita a shi ná a?"
44012019	Uherod a de ishogya le ì lè shun he. I lè shun he, ukpor i nde-e ye. Uherod a de le bè bii ishogya angi ı kang igaadye bibibi. A hà de be le bè gwu ishogya imen i. Uherod a gbe lè he Ujudia lè kwu he Usesaria.
44012020	He 'unyong ken Uherod a ma ngywo fe bendi Utaya lè abe Usaidon. Be hà te liwu-liwu le be la hwaa lè he. Be kpi 'ikwu kpe kung Ublastus hwaa lè 'uhwo-bell. Ublastus umen i na a maa ndè gbe lè ushom usu. Bendi abena be hà lè hwaa lè Usu Uherod le bè shi ikwun likorye 'ubong 'ubell 'u kpa lizi lè he 'ubong 'uma a.
44012021	He liti angi be ma ndor, Uherod a kung bigbor usu bima shī lè kwu he 'idem 'usu keb akongale ha bendi.
44012022	Be fel gaa kong le: "Undigye na u kong ye, Unim a."
44012023	Udengell Atyetyan Unim a shi Uherod a mbu lingmam nya 'ukwo-ukwo, likorye a ke Unim ife ye. Īnyiǎ i zī gwu-e.
44012024	Bendi abongale be gye 'ushu bun igie Unim mbee bipi puu. Bendi gbamm be bong ha Ujeso.
44012025	Ubanabas befe lè Usorl be mbee aki abell. He Ujeruselem be kpe Ujon Umak gye lè he he Antiyok.
44013001	Bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim lè bendi abe be hwua bendi be ma yi he liwu bendi abongale he Antiyok. Azen abell na à yi nyin: Ubanabas lè Usimiyen (angwu be maa ko le Undi ùshì) lè Ulusiyes (angwu u be lè he Usarin) lè Usorl lè Umanayen (angwu be ma kwob utung ha Usu Uherod).
44013002	Nya a na be maa fe Atyetyan Unim, be fe ukaa kong ha ahe lè itung andoale, Ukatia Kunyong Unim a de be le: "Mà waa Ubanabas befe lè Usorl ndor ta-ta ke-m hè be bè shi aki angi mi ko ābe le bè shi."
44013003	Be kong ha Unim lè itung andoale. Be pwom ābe abwo de be le bè ndo te.
44013004	Le bwo Ukatia Kunyong Unim a som Ubanabas lè Usorl, be bo ndo he Uselusia lè ngwee 'inong lishor lè há gye he 'ubong Usaipres ahwu 'ù yi he 'udyan umbwo.
44013005	Be lè wu há, be gye he lifung-ushu Usalamis; be bun igie Unim he ishom angi Ijuus ı kwu liwu. Ujon Umak a ma yi utung ha abe he-e ù lè kpell ābe.
44013006	Be gbe mbee ashi 'ubong ahwuna puu, be hà gye wu he lishi Upafos. Be nde undi-anong ususo há angwu be ko le Ubaa-ujeso. A ma yi undi Ijuus a, u lam bendi le ufe ù yi undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a.
44013007	A ma yi udim úkaandi angwu be maa ko le Usagiyes Uporles angwu u nde gbe lè 'ubong 'umen ana a. Ukaandi umen i a bi lishi kangg. A ko Ubanabas befe lè Usorl lè hwaa lè he le bwo a kee le u gyo igie Unim.
44013008	Undi-anong umen i a fung fe be. (Be maa ko undi-anong umen i he igie Igrik le Elimas.) A maa kaa he-e ù shi ukaandi ana ù bong ha Ujeso ye.
44013009	Usorl umen angwu be fel ko le Uporl, angwu a ma yi lè ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim kangg, a bel àshì nde-e kporr.
44013010	A de-e le: "Wo unwaa Usetan, wò yi linaa ha 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi 'inunung. Wo sho lè bitaa beshu bebibi puu ha awo lityam. Mbee 'unyong kpamm wo kaa ha-a à shi biwom Atyetyan Unim abi bì yi 'igyang bì fel iman.
44013011	Atyetyan Unim u ndo ba ka-a 'ingie 'anaa-anaa nyin. Wo ba hwuà ashi; wò nem nda libwee ye he ati zangg." Nya 'ukwo-ukwo 'ifufebb 'i kung gye Elimas he atong-shi kpenn, u fel wua mbee bipi keē undi angwu u kwu-e abwo he 'ubwo teng he.
44013012	Ukaandi umen ana a nde ashi 'i shi, a bong ha Ujeso. Ashi be ma hwua bendi gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso 'i kwu-e he 'uhwo.
44013013	Uporl befe lè bendi-utung bema be ngwee 'inong lishor lè he Upafos lè shul he Upaga he 'ubong Upamfilia. Ujon Umak ufe a gbe tyang ābe lè há tem gye he Ujeruselem.
44013014	Be bo lè he Upaga gye he lishi Upisidia angi be ko le Antiyok. He liti uwell Ijuus be lè kwu he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu.
44013015	Bekaandi abe be nde gbe lè ushom umen ana be bo lè he ashia Iten Umosis lè ashia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim puu, be som undi de baa Uporl le: "Bebuye, gbe mà yi lè igie angi ma bun de bendi hè be bè kwu lè ingie, mà bun."
44013016	Uporl a kung bo 'inaa yor ābe abwo le bè tyang 'ihwee, u keb akongale le: "Men bendi begi Izwell lè begaandi puu abe ma fe Unim, men puu mà gyo mi.
44013017	Unim angwu bendi Izwell be fe-e a ma waa kung betietyan, u shi ābe be dyam he 'unyong ahwu be ma yi begaandi he 'ubong Igyept. Unim a fem ābe lè há gbe he ikeb ima angi i dyam.
44013018	Be shi tor he nya a na u nde gbe lè be he libeb aze asi afee.
44013019	A ndo 'ukye hwò abong adyong-ifee he Ukenan kung itang ibell ke bendi Izwell.
44013020	"He 'unyong ahwu be ma kwu há aze asi lisi lè aze asi afee lè ngi lihwo, a ke be bekaandi abe be maa ābe ushe kpamm be kwom he 'unyong ahwu Usamuwell a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim.
44013021	He liti ken be de le Unim ù ke be usu. He ashina Unim a kung Usorl, unwaa Ukish, angwu ù yi he 'ikwu-lihwan Ubenjamen le ù kwu usu ubell. Usorl a kam ābe aze asi afee.
44013022	He 'unyong ahwu Unim a waa he, a kwu Udebid 'usu le ù kpe 'idem 'usu Usorl. Unim a kong gbe lè he le: 'Mi nde le Udebid, unwaa Ujesi, na ù yi 'itaa undi ashi 'ı shi nyin mi he lityam. Ù yi undi angwu u be shi biwom puu abi mi kee he le ù shi a.'
44013023	Udebid umen i na Unim a shi igia ima, Ujeso, le ù kwu Undi-likpan bendi Izwell nya a na a ma ke úkyébb.
44013024	Mà ukpong Ujeso u hà keb bendi ahwuale, Ujon a maa bun da bendi Izwell puu le bè bel àtyám lè he biban bibell, be be he-e ù kib ābe he umbwo.
44013025	Nya a na Ujon a maa ndo mbee aki ama, a maa da bendi le: 'Mā gim le mì yi undi angwu ma baa lishi á. Mi ufe a ye. Ufe u pwom mi lè há. Mi kpee he he 'ubee or ye.' "
44013026	Uporl a mbee gye 'ushu kong le: "Bebuye, men igia Ebraham lè begaandi puu abe ma fe Unim, kisom 'imen ashi gbe lè likpan 'unyong i 'ì yi ke li bel a.
44013027	Bendi abe he Ujeruselem lè bekaandi bebell be ngye le Ujeso ù yi Undi-likpan a, ngwu igie bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim angi be bo he liti uwell liyang-yang ì nung ābe ye. Ukpor be shi igie angi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be ma fee i shi gbe he amaale ushe le bè gwu Ujeso.
44013028	Mà na be maa ndè 'iwom ashi a shi hè be bè gwu-e ye or, be de Upalet le ù de bè gwu-e.
44013029	He 'unyong ahwu be ma shi-e biwom abi be fee gbe lè he he 'ushia Unim leěti puu, be shul he lè he 'ikpakpaa lè ngì.
44013030	Unim a wum he lè he lihwu.
44013031	Bendi abe be ma be utung ha ahe lè he Ugalili be he Ujeruselem be nde-e ati gbamm. Kanaa-anaa i be fel bun da bendi Izwell gba lè he.
44013032	Li be hè li lì bun 'isom 'inunung a de men le, kiwom ashi Unim a ma ke betietyan úkyébb le u sha, a shi āshi ke li, bel abe lì yi igia ibell, gbe he awumale Ujeso lè he lihwu. Ashi Udebid a ma fee he 'ushia Usam lishi angi lefee, kì yi àshi Unim a kong a, kì yi le: 'Wò yi Unwaa-gi a. Kunyin mi fel Atia a.'
44013034	Unim a maa kong gba lè awumale Ujeso lè he lihwu, angwu likwom lima lì hà ndo hwee ye a, he 'unyong ahwu a de le: 'Ki shi na ana mi ba ka-a 'ukwun ahwu mi ma kyebb ndor Udebid.'
44013035	Udebid a mbee kong he 'iteng 'isuso há he 'ushia Usam lishi Ujeso le: 'Wo ba tyang i-mi, Unwaa-gang angwu wo waa, le likwom ligi lì hwee ye!'
44013036	He 'unyong ahwu Udebid a ma so uwum, a maa sha ashi Unim a kee. A hwō; be ngi-e gwaa ha betiema; likwom lima li hwee.
44013037	Likwom undi angwu Unim a ma wum lè he lihwu li hwee ye.
44013038	Bebuye, men puu mà ngye dangg le Ujeso na be bun 'isom ashi gbe lè biban atyangale ke gbe ha ahe i de men.
44013039	Mà ngye le undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe u fel porr lè he biban abi Iten Umosis i ma tyang ke ye.
44013040	Mà baa teng 'iwom ashi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be ma kong 'i sha ha amen. Be de le:
44013041	'Men bendi inyan, mà nde, ufung ù waa gwu amen. Aki angi mı shi nyin nya a na mà so bewum i, à yi aki angi undi u de men gbe lè ngi or, hang ma bong ye á.' "
44013042	He 'unyong ahwu Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be maa ndo gbe lè há he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu, bendi be de be le bè tem be he liti uwell angi li pwom lè ngi, hè be bè mbee de be gbe lè biwom bimen i.
44013043	He 'unyong ahwu bendi be maa ndo gye, bendi Ijuus gbamm lè bendi abe be bong nya a na Ijuus i bong be gbe pwom Uporl befe lè Ubanabas. Bebwaa-isom Ujeso bemen i be kong ha bendi, be fe be ingie le bè gye 'ushu fe Unim angwu a tyung inung ha abe.
44013044	He liti uwell angi li pwom lè ngi, ki teng zangg hang bendi puu há he lishi limen ana be be hè be bè gyo igie Unim.
44013045	Bendi Ijuus be nde liwu bendi, be fel lè ashi abungale. Be maa fel kong ban àshi Uporl a kong, be kong bia he.
44013046	Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be hà bun faale 'ushell de Ijuus le: "Ki ma yi kpe-kpe le lì bun igie Unim de men a 'ushu. Ukpor bel li tyang amen lè hwaa lè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, likorye ma swan āngi, ma mbee gim le ma kpè le ma kwa lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye ye.
44013047	Uten angwu Atyetyan Unim a ke li ù yi le: 'Mi kung amen ndor ná 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ì taa tyung bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye 'ukwo ahwu bendigye puu bè gbe kwu lè likpan 'unyong.' "
44013048	Bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye be ma yi lè igor he 'unyong ahwu be gyo ashin; be mbee pee Unim he 'isom 'imen i. Bendi puu abe Unim a ma waa le bè kwu lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye be bong ha Ujeso.
44013049	Be bun igie Atyetyan Unim mbee bipi puu há he 'igie 'imen ana.
44013050	Bekaandi abe be ndè gbe lè 'ubong lè bengingye abe be fem lizen abe be maa fem Unim, Ijuus i fe be ingie le bè ke Uporl befe lè Ubanabas 'ingie. Be ndeb lè be lè ha abe 'igie.
44013051	Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be hà shell 'umbulmbul lè he abee wu há hè 'ì kwu 'itaa tyung bendi há le be shi 'iban, gbe ndo he Ikoniyem.
44013052	Bendi abongale he Antiyok be ma yi lè ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim lè igor kangg.
44014001	Ki shi 'itaa a ken he Ikoniyem. Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu lè bun igie Unim lè ikeb kangg le bendi Ijuus gbamm lè begaandi be bong ha Ujeso.
44014002	Ukpor Ijuus angi i bong ha Ujeso ye i ma fe begaandi ingie le bè bel fel linaa ha bendi abongale.
44014003	Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be kwu há gbe 'igbe kangg. Be maa kong gboo gba lè Atyetyan Unim angwu a tyung le 'isom ashi be bun gbe lè inung ima 'ì yi 'igyang a, gbe he akele ubell ikeb le bè shi bikwele-uhwo.
44014004	Liwu limen he lishi ana li tang he abwo. Besuso bè yi ke Ijuus; besuso be shi ke Uporl befe lè Ubanabas.
44014005	Bendi Ijuus lè bekaandi bebell lè begaandi be tim le bè shi ābe lifee, be maa ābe akor.
44014006	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso bemen i be gyo gbe lè shi; be buu gye he ashi Ulaikonia angi be ko le Ulistra lè Udaabi lè abong angi a ndē kel-kel fe Ikoniyem.
44014007	Be bun 'isom 'inunung mbee abong amen ana puu.
44014008	Ungikye ususo a ma yi he Ulistra angwu a maa tan mbee ye. A ma hwō abee lè há lifung anam a.
44014009	A dang 'utyung gyo igie angi Uporl u bun. Uporl a nde-e kporr, u ngye le ungikye anwun a fel lè abongale le Unim ú nya mbee he.
44014010	Uporl a kung kong lè ikeb de-e le: "Bo naa 'inaa kpa-kpa." Ungikye ana a tie bo 'inaa keb litan atanale.
44014011	Liwu bendi be nde ashi Uporl a shi, be fel gaa he igie ibell angi Ulaikonia le: "Inīm i bel fel bendigye be hwaa lè bel."
44014012	Be kung ābe kwù ikem ibell. Be kwù Ubanabas lizen le Uzus, be kwù Uporl le Uhemiz, likorye ufe na a maa kong de be.
44014013	Undi angwu u shang Uzus angwu 'iteng ashangale 'ima 'ì yi he item uging, a be lè ìkyēbb bigundu lè bibubo ikwan be naa he ungwu likong. Ufe or, liwu bendi or, be kee le be shang bebwaa-isom Ujeso.
44014014	He 'unyong ahwu Ubanabas befe lè Uporl, bebwaa-isom Ujeso, be gyo ashi be kam le be sha, be shwia gie aliga abell hè 'ì tyung le 'i ngbebb ābe ye. Be buu gye há he liwu bendi keb agaale.
44014015	Be kong lè ikeb le: "Bebuye, kibang a, ma shi ashin? Lì yi bendigye nya a na men mà yi a. Li be nyin hè li lì be de men 'isom 'inunung hè men mà bel lè he biwom ilaa hè men mà ndè àshì hwaa lè Unim angwu ù yi uwum a. Unim umen i na a shi lifung-atabe lè abi bì yi há, itang lè abi bì yi hen, lè umbwo ukaandi lè abi bì yi há.
44014016	Lè he 'unyong ahwu 'u ma gbe lè he item a maa tyàng bendi abe he abong puu le bè shi ashi be kee.
44014017	Ukpor a tyung 'uhwo-ma gbe he binunung abi u shi. U sha umbwo u ndor lè he lifung-atabe. U sha ìtiá īmen i mbwa he 'unyong ahwu 'ù yi kpa-kpa, hè men mà kwu lè lizi angi mà zi gwul. U shi àtyám āmen a sho lè igor."
44014018	Mà na bebwaa-isom Ujeso be kong ashin de be or, bendi be maa la tyàng ābe ashangale ye.
44014019	Bendi Ijuus besuso be ma be lè he lishi Upisidia angi be ko le Antiyok; besuso be be lè he Ikoniyem. Be shi bendi abena be tem fel linaa ha Uporl. Befe puu be maa Uporl akor; be su lè he lè há lifung-ushu lè tyang he igye. Be maa kong le a hwō.
44014020	Bendi abongale be be kaa kel-kel fe-e. A bo 'inaa tem gye há he lifung-ushu. Ashi a taa, befe lè Ubanabas be tem gye he Udaabi.
44014021	Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be lè wu há he Udaabi, be hà bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi. Bendi gbamm be bong ha Ujeso. Be hà tem gye he Ulistra. Be bo lè he Ulistra gye he Ikoniyem. Be hà gye he lishi Upisidia angi be ko le Antiyok.
44014022	Be maa fa bendi abongale ingie le bè tyang abongale ha Unim ye, be naa genn. Be hwua bendi le: "Kì yi kpe-kpe le lì kpe bingie gbamm mà ukpong li hà ngwee Kiteng-usu Unim."
44014023	Be gye he liwu bendi abongale liyang-yang lè waa bekaandi abe be ndè gbe lè be, ka ābe. Be kung àbe be bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso fe-e he 'ubwo gbe he akongale ha Unim lè itung andoale.
44014024	Be tan mbee Upisidia puu. Be hà gye he 'ubong Upamfilia.
44014025	Be bun igie Unim de bendi he lishi Upaga, be hà gye he Atalia.
44014026	Be ngwee 'inong lishor lè há gye he lishi Usiria angi be ko le Antiyok he 'ipi bendi abongale be ma kung ābe fe Unim he 'ubwo le bè shi aki angi be lè shi a mbee nyin.
44014027	Be lè wu he Antiyok, be gbong bendi abongale be he 'iteng ken. Be de be biwom puu abi Unim a shi gbe ha abe; be mbee de be gbe lè libwo angi Unim a shi ke bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye le befe or bè bong ha Ujeso.
44014028	Be kwu ha liwu bendi abongale he Antiyok gbe 'igbe kangg.
44015001	Bendi besuso abe be bo lè he Ujudia be he Antiyok be hwua bendi abongale le bè hà ndo kwa lè likpan 'unyong faale afaale be ten ná Iten Umosis i kong ye.
44015002	Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be fung fe be kangg gbe lè shi. Be shi ugim le Uporl befe lè Ubanabas lè bendi besuso lè há Antiyok bè gye he Ujeruselem lè kong ha bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bekaandi gbe lè likong limen i.
44015003	Liwu bendi abongale li som ābe gbe. Nya a na be maa lè gbe he Ufenishia lè Usameria be maa bun da bendi ná bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye be bel àtyám hwaa lè Unim. Kisom ashin 'i shi bendi abongale puu be fel lè igor kangg.
44015004	Be lè wu he Ujeruselem. Bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bendi abongale lè bekaandi bebell be kpe be lè igor. Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be de be biwom puu abi Unim a ma shi gbe ha abe.
44015005	Bendi abongale besuso abe bè yi he likwu bendi abe bè yi Iferesis be bo 'inaa kung kong le, kì yi kpe-kpe le bè ten bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, be de be le bè ndor Iten Umosis.
44015006	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bekaandi bendi abongale be lè kpee hè be bè shi ugim gbe lè likong anyin.
44015007	Be kong gbe 'igbe. Ipita a hà bo 'inaa kong le: "Bebuye, má ngye le leěti Unim a ma waa mi lè he liwu līmen le mì bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye hè be bè gyo, be mbee bong ha Ujeso.
44015008	Unim umen angwu a ngye àtyám bendi puu i, a tyung le a kpē be gbe he akele ubell Ukatia Kunyong uma nya a na a ma ke li.
44015009	A shi li lì yi atyetye lè ha abe ye. A tyang biban bibell ke be, le bwo be bong ha Ujeso.
44015010	Kibang a, ma haa gil Unim gbe he akungale bèngbébb so bendi abongale? Bèngbébb bemen i, betietyan or be ma so ābe mbee, ngwu bel or lì so ābe mbee ye.
44015011	Bel li bong le li fel lè likpan 'unyong gbe he inung Atyetyan Ujeso nya a na befe be kwu lè ngi."
44015012	Liwu limen ana li kwun atyung shangg. Be dang 'utyung gyo ná Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be de be bikwele-uhwo abi Unim a shi gbe ha abe he abong bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye he-e ù tyung ikeb ima.
44015013	Be kong 'i mbee puu, Ujems a kung kong le: "Bebuye, mà gyo mi.
44015014	Usaimun a kong ná 'i shi nyong Unim a be hwaa lè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye he-e ù waa kung bendi lè ha abe le bè kwu bema.
44015015	Ashin 'i tem lè keè ha igie angi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be fee fe he 'ushia Unim leěti. Be ma fee le:
44015016	'Unim a de le, mi ba tem ba. Mi ba tem lè 'ikwu-lihwan Udebid ashi 'i paa, gbong ukem; mi be tem lè 'ùsù ke undi 'ikwu-lihwan Udebid.
44015017	Mi ba sha biwom abin hè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, abe mi ko le bè kwu begi begyang, bè be kee i-mi, Atyabell Unim.
44015018	Unim angwu a ma shi bendi be ngye gbe lè shi leěti a kong āshi.' "
44015019	Ujems a gye 'ushu de le: "Bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, abe be be hwaa lè Unim, ugi ugim ù yi le lì shī ke be 'ingie ye.
44015020	Lì fee 'ushia hwan hwaa lè be de be le, bè zī biwom ūkèm ye likorye bì yi biwom abel a, bè ndor 'uhwo-bell betaa-betaa lè he akpela atanale, be zī inyia angi be ngib gwu he abwo ye, be zī anung inyia ye.
44015021	Lì de be biwom abin, likorye kung lè há item na li keb lı bo gbe lè bi lè he ashia Iten Umosis he ishom ityan angi lı kwu liwu he liti uwell liyang-yang. Li bun igie ima mbee biteng puu."
44015022	Bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bendi abongale puu lè bekaandi bebell be tim waa bendi lè he liwu libell som le bè te utung ha Uporl befe lè Ubanabas gye he Antiyok. Be waa Ujudas angwu be maa mbee ko le Ubasabas befe lè Usalas. Bendi bemen befee i be ma yi bendi abe bendi abongale be fe lityam ha abe a.
44015023	Be som ābe lè 'ushia ahwu be fee le bè lè ke. Be fee le: "Bel bebwandamen abe lì yi bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bendi abongale lè bekaandi li kong lè men, bendi abongale abe mà yi Ijuus a ye abe he Antiyok lè Usiria lè abe he Usilisia.
44015024	Li gyo le bendi besuso lè he liwu lityan be be hwaa lè men há, be ke men 'ingie, be kong biwom abi bı waa amen ufung. Bel na li som ābe ye.
44015025	Bel puu li kwu liwu tim le lì waa bendi som hwaa lè men. Be ba utung ha Ubanabas befe lè Uporl abe 'i nyin li lè be,
44015026	abe be kung likpan libell ndor he begyong hè be bè shi aki Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
44015027	Li som Ujudas befe lè Usalas hwaa lè men hè be bè be de men biwom abi li fee lè ungwu lè ungwu.
44015028	Bel lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim li bong le lì so amen bèngbébb besuso fem iten angi ì yi kpe-kpe nyin tyang ye.
44015029	Mà zī biwom ūkèm ye; mà zī anung inyia ye; ma zī inyia angi be ngib gwu he abwo ye; mà ndor 'uhwo-men betaa-betaa lè he akpela atanale. Gbe ma ndor 'uhwo-men lè he biwom abin puu, hà ma shi 'inunung. Ki fel mbee ati."
44015030	Bebwaa-isom bemen i be bo ndo he Antiyok. Be lè gbong bendi abongale sho he 'iteng ken kung 'ushia ana ke be.
44015031	Bendi abena be bo 'ushia 'umen i. Be fel lè igor he 'isom ashi 'i fe be ingie nyin.
44015032	Ujudas befe lè Usalas abe be ma yi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim a, be kong ha abe, fe be ingie gbe 'igbe kangg.
44015033	Be kwu ha abe há gbe 'igbe. Ki ma fel le be ndo gya, bendi abongale be de be le bè gye lè 'ukwun lè hwaa lè bendi abe be som ābe. [
44015034	Ukpor Usalas a shi ugim le u ngyor kwa há.]
44015035	Uporl befe lè Ubanabas be ngyor kwu he Antiyok. Befe lè bendi besuso gbamm be bun 'isom gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso de bendi; be mbee hwua ābe.
44015036	Ati a gbe, Uporl a de Ubanabas le: "Lì tem lè kong lè bendi abongale he 'iteng 'iyang-yang he 'ipi li bun 'isom gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso hè li lì ndè ná bè yi há."
44015037	Ubanabas a bong, ukpor a kee le bè te lè Ujon Umak há.
44015038	Uporl a gim le bè te lè he ye, likorye a ma kwu utung ha abe lè kwom he umbee-likel aki abell ye. A ma gbe tyang ābe lè he Upamfilia.
44015039	Be fung fe bende kangg. Be hà tang he abwo lè ha bende. Ubanabas a kpe Umak gbe lè he lè ngwee 'inong lishor gye he Usaipres.
44015040	Uporl u waa kung Usalas gbe. Bendi abongale be kung ābe fe Unim he 'ubwo le ù ke he 'ukwun.
44015041	Baà Uporl be lè gbe he Usiria lè Usilisia fe awu bendi abongale ingie.
44016001	Uporl befe lè Usalas be gye 'ushu tan gbe he Udaabi lè Ulistra. Undi abongale ususo a ma yi há he Ulistra. Be ko he le Utimoti. Anam or a bong ha Ujeso, ù yi undi Ijuus. Átyám u shi Igrik.
44016002	Bendi abongale gbamm he Ulistra lè Ikoniyem be maa kong 'inunung gba lè Utimoti.
44016003	Uporl a kee le u kpa he he-e ù fel tan utung ha ahe. A ten he, le bwo bendi Ijuus puu abe bè yi he biteng bimen ana be ngye le ātyām Utimoti a ma yi Igrik a.
44016004	Nya a na be maa tan mbee he ashi atyetye-atyetye, be maa bun iten da bendi abongale. Iten imen i na bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bekaandi abe he Ujeruselem be ma ke. Be de be le bè ndor iten imen i.
44016005	Awu bendi abongale a fel lè ingie, kugii bendi abongale 'u fel go igo igo.
44016006	Be lè gbe he bigie abi Ifrigia lè Ugalesha. Ukatia Kunyong Unim a bong ābe le bè bun igie Unim he 'ubong Eshia ye.
44016007	Be lè wu he Umisia. Be kaa le be gya he Ubitinia, ukpor Ukatia Kunyong Ujeso a bong ābe ye.
44016008	Be fel gbe há he Umisia ana gye he Utrowas gwaa ha umbwo ukaandi.
44016009	Nya he 'usu 'umen ana Unim a tyung Uporl 'iwom. A ndè undi Umasedonia a be naa, u tim he anung le: "Hā be he Umasedonia ha-a à be kpell li."
44016010	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo, mi Uluk, mi bo utung ha abe ndo he Umasedonia, likorye li gim le Unim a kee le lì lè bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi há.
44016011	Li ngwee 'inong lishor lè he Utrowas gbe ligbe-ligbe gye he 'ubong Usamotras ahwu 'ù yi he 'udyan umbwo. Ashi a kung fem taa, li gye he Uniapolis.
44016012	Li bo lè há gye he Ufilipai. Ufilipai a ma yi lishi angi li dyam kangg he 'ubong Umasedonia. Be ma yi he abwo Urom. Li kwu há zī ati.
44016013	He liti uwell li gbe lè há he lishi gye he ungwu umbwo he 'ipi li maa kong le Ijuus i kong ha Unim há. Li bel kwu ko; li kong ha bengingye abe bè yi kwu há.
44016014	Ungingye ken angwu be ko le Uledia a ma yi há. A maa ba lè he Utayitara a. A maa ndyebb bihwom bibwaa za. A ma yi undi angwu u fe Unim a. Atyetyan Unim a hà shi-e le ù dang 'utyung gyo ashi Uporl a maa kong.
44016015	Ufe-gyang or, bendi bema or, li kib ābe he umbwo. A kung de li le: "Gbe ma gim le mi bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso 'igyang a, mà be kwu ha ami ushom." A fe fe li kangg le lì te. Li te há.
44016016	He liti ken li maa gya he 'iteng ashi be kong ha Unim, li kpee lè unwan ungingye angwu a ma yi ufee. Ikeb ibibi i shi ha ahe. I maa sha he u kong ashi 'ı be shi. A maa sha únde kangg ka bekaandi bema gba he adele bendi ashi 'ı be shi fe be.
44016017	A maa tan pwom li, bel baà Uporl, ù yii gaa kong le: "Bendi aben bè yi bebwaa Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu a. Be da amen 'itaa mà shi, ma hà kwu lè likpan 'unyong."
44016018	A ma shi ná he ati gbamm. Ki hà nyung Uporl he lityam. A bel àshì, u de ikeb ibibi imen ana le: "Mi da-a le wò fem lè ha ahe he lizen Ujeso Ukristi." Ikeb imen ana i fem lè ha ahe nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
44016019	Bendi abe bè yi lè he be nde le ù nem sha únde ka ābe mbee ye. Be kwu Uporl befe lè Usalas, su lè be lè hwaa lè bekaandi he ushokwo 'ate.
44016020	Be te lè be lè hwaa lè bekaandi Urom. Be de le: "Bendi aben bè yi Ijuus a. Bè yii sha linaa ha abel 'ubong.
44016021	Be hwua bendi akpe angi iten ityan i bong le lì shi ye. Lì hà ndo sha akpe amen i ye, likorye bel lì yi bendi Urom a."
44016022	Liwu bendi li fe abwo he linaa limen ana. Bekaandi be shwia gie ābe aliga; be de bendi le bè kpam ābe.
44016023	Be kpam ābe kangg. Be hà te lè be lè fe he igaadye. Be de undi angwu u kang igaadye le ù nde be 'inunung.
44016024	A te lè be lè ngib fe he 'ipo ashi lè he afee-afee, a fe be afung he abee nya a na be tebb he.
44016025	He 'ididyan 'usu, Uporl befe lè Usalas be maa kong ha Unim, be gyam agyam pee Unim. Igaadye angi i teng i fel kwu gyo ābe.
44016026	Itang i nyung he abwo nya imbul-imbul. Lìshií ushom igaadye or li nyung he abwo. Àshì puu a kung buu nya 'ukwo-ukwo; ashishilika a waa igaadye puu lè he abwo.
44016027	Undi angwu u kang igaadye a wum lè he 'unde. A ndè àshì à yi hwuo, u kong le igaadye i paa nim. A shwia waa 'ashwia le u gwa 'uhwo-ma.
44016028	Uporl a kung gaa kangg de-e le: "Shī do 'uhwo-gang ye. Lì yi nyin puu."
44016029	Undi angwu u kang igaadye a de le bè be lè 'imor-inde. A buu gye há afee lè tim anung he 'ushu Uporl befe lè Usalas; ù yii tung.
44016030	A bo kpe be gye lè be he igye. U de be le: "Bekaandi, mì shi ná a, mî kwu lè likpan 'unyong?"
44016031	Be de-e le: "Bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso, mà men lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'igang ma kwa lè likpan 'unyong."
44016032	Be lè bun 'isom gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso de be, befe lè bendi bema abe be teng.
44016033	Nya lè 'usu undi umen angwu u kang igaadye ana a lè to ābe bibaa bibell. Ufe-gyang or, bendi bema or, be ma kib ābe he umbwo nya 'ukwo-ukwo.
44016034	A kpe Uporl befe lè Usalas gye lè be ha ahe ushom lè ke be lizi be zī. Ufe-gyang lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima bè yi lè igor likorye be bong ha Unim.
44016035	Ashi a taa, bekaandi Urom be som idashanda le ì lè de undi angwu u kang igaadye le ù lè de baa Uporl bè ndo gye.
44016036	Undi umen ana a lè de Uporl le: "Bekaandi Urom be som isom le mì tyang amen abwo. Mà ndo gye unwaa-men or."
44016037	Uporl a kung de abe idashanda le: "Kpaa ye. Be kpam li ikwun he udyeshi faale ashi li shi; be te lè bel lè fe he igaadye; ki shi le lì yi bendi Urom a. Kanaa-anaa i be kee le be nyia inyia fem li. Befe-gyang bè be fem li."
44016038	Idashanda i te lè igie anyin lè de bekaandi Urom. He 'unyong ahwu bekaandi be gyo le Uporl befe lè Usalas bè yi bendi Urom a, be fel he 'ushell.
44016039	Be be tim ābe anung le bè tyang ke be. Be fem ābe lè he igaadye. Be de be le bè gbe lè há he 'ubong.
44016040	Uporl befe lè Usalas be gbe gye he ushom Uledia. Be ndè bendi abongale há; be fe be ingie. Be hà gbe lè há.
44017001	Be tan lè gbe he Amfipolis lè Aporlonia be he Utesalonaika he 'ipi ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu ù yi.
44017002	Uporl a ma gbe gye há nya a na u shaa shi. A maa kung ati uwell akie fung fa bendi gba lè biwom abi be ma fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti.
44017003	A maa bun da ābe, u tyung ābe le 'i ma yi kpe-kpe le Ujeso Ukristi ù kpe 'ingie hwō, u wum lè he lihwu. Uporl a de be le: "Ujeso umen angwu mı de men i ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin a."
44017004	Bendi Ijuus besuso lè bendi Igrik gbamm abe be fe Unim lè bekaandi bengingye or be bong àshi Uporl a kong, be fel utyang ha Uporl befe lè Usalas.
44017005	Bendi Ijuus abe be bong ye be ma fel he ashi abungale. Be lè gbong bendi bebibi abe be hwun lihwun be sho liwu. Be shi 'ihwee 'i fel há 'ubong 'umen ana. Be gye he afee ushom Ujesen lè ikeb hè be bè lè kee kwu Uporl befe lè Usalas ke bendi.
44017006	Be be, be nde be ye. Be su lè Ujesen lè bendi abongale besuso lè hwaa lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong, be gaa le: "Uporl befe lè Usalas be tan lè linaa mbee bipi puu. Kanaa-anaa i be fel hen ha abel 'ubong.
44017007	Ungikye umen angwu be ko le Ujesen i, a kpe be ndor ha ahe ushom. Puu ubell be ban iten Usu ukaandi angwu Urom a, nyong be de le usu ususo ù yi nyin, be ko le Ujeso."
44017008	Be kong ashin kong-kong, liwu bendi lè bekaandi bebell be gie he abwo lè ingywo.
44017009	Bekaandi be de Ujesen lè abe be teng le bè ke únde. Be hà tyang ābe abwo.
44017010	Kusu 'u gye-gye, bendi abongale be de Uporl befe lè Usalas, bé gye he Beria. Be lè wu há. Be gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu.
44017011	Bendi abe he Beria be ngbèbb àtyám hwò abe he Utesalonaika. Be dang 'utyung gyo igie Unim lè 'igyor. Be maa bo ashia Unim angi be fee leěti mbee ati kpamm hè be bè nde le biwom abi Uporl u kong bì yi 'igyang â?
44017012	Bendi Ijuus gbamm lè bendi Igrik abe bengikye lè abe bengingye bebell abe be fem lizen be bong ha Ujeso.
44017013	Bendi Ijuus abe bè yi he Utesalonaika be gyo le Uporl u bun igie Unim da bendi he Beria or. Be be há, be shi bendi abena be fel lè Uporl he linaa.
44017014	Bendi abongale be gbe lè Uporl nya 'ukwo-ukwo gye he ungwu umbwo ukaandi. Ukpor Usalas befe lè Utimoti be ngyor kwu há he Beria.
44017015	Bendi abe be gye le be la teng Uporl be lè wu he Atens. Be tem lè de Usalas befe lè Utimoti le Uporl a de le bè pwom he akikye.
44017016	Nya a na Uporl a ma yi kwu he Atens, u nyong Usalas befe lè Utimoti, ki ban he he lityam ná a nde 'ubong 'umen ana 'u sho lè ikem.
44017017	A maa fung fa Ijuus lè bendi besuso abe be fe Unim he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu; u mbee fung fe bendi he ushokwo 'ate liti liyang-yang.
44017018	Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi or titi be fung fe-e, be pwom ahwuale akwu bendi angi be ko le Epikyuriyen lè Istoik. Besuso be bii le: "Ukong-likong undi umen i u kong gba lè 'ibang a?" Besuso be de le: "Pisoye u kong gba lè ìnīm 'ubong 'ususo a." Be maa kong ná le bwo Uporl a maa bun gbe lè Ujeso lè awumale lè he lihwu.
44017019	Be kung Uporl gye lè he he 'ipi bekaandi be kwu ukoto angwu be ko le Aliapages. Be de-e le: "Li kee le li ngya uhwuale ufufe angwu wo kong gbe lè he i.
44017020	Biwom bisuso abi li gyo-a wo kong bì yi li bifufe. Li kee le li ngya àshi bi ze."
44017021	(Bendi Atens puu lè begaandi abe bè yi ndē há be kee le be kung 'ùnyong 'ubell gyo gba lè biwom bifufe biyang-yang, be mbee kong gbe lè bi.)
44017022	Uporl a bo naa há he ukoto angwu be ko le Aliapages kung kong le: "Men bendi abe he Atens, mi ndè le ma kaa le ma fa inim īmen gba he biwom puu abi ma shi.
44017023	Nya a na mı tan gbe ha amen 'ubong, mi nde biteng abi ma fe inim īmen; mi mbee nde 'iteng ashangale ashi ma fee bee há le: 'Ashin 'ì yi ke ùnīm angwu li ngye-e ye a.' Unim angwu ma fe faale afaale ma ngye-e na mı bun de men gbe lè he i.
44017024	Unim umen angwu a shi igye lè biwom puu abi bì yi hen i na ù yi lè lifung-atabe lè itang. U nda he ishom angi be tye ngi he abwo a ye.
44017025	Ki fong he lè 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi undigye u shi gbe he aki ashele ke-e ye. Ufe-gyang na u ke bendigye likpan lè 'ūnyōng ahwu 'u dim lè biwom puu abi bi teng.
44017026	A shi bendigye puu lè ha undi a ken a. A shi ābe be ndē mbee igye puu. Ufe-gyang na a ma ndor 'unyong lè biteng abi be be ndē.
44017027	A ma shi bendi puu le bè kee he, hè be bè ndè le be ndǎ he, he 'unyong ahwu be shun he. Unim ù yi 'igbe-igbe lè ha abel ye,
44017028	likorye 'Ufe na u ke li likpan lè 'iken lè 'ūnyōng.' Kì yi nya a na bendi bēmen abe be bi lishi be ma kong a. Be ma de le: 'Bel or titi lì yi bebwaa-ma a.'
44017029	Gbè lì yi bebwaa-ma a, lì shī gim le Unim ù yi 'atelakpa ake undigye a kung igold lè isiliba lè akor shi gbe he lingye lima lè ugim uma a ye.
44017030	Unim a maa kpam àshì wa biban bendi he 'unyong ahwu be ma wa ngye-e ye, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i a de le bendi puu he 'iteng 'iyang-yang bè bel lè he bibibi bibell.
44017031	A ndor liti angi u be tang ushe bendigye puu kpa-kpa gbe ha undi angwu a waa ndor ta-ta. A tyung le ashin 'ì yi 'igyang a gbe he awumale undi umen i lè he lihwu."
44017032	Be gyo Uporl a kong gbe le awumale lè he lihwu; besuso be fel nyan he. Besuso be de-e le: "Li kee le wò mbee bun likong anyin de li 'unyong 'ususo."
44017033	Uporl a kung gbe lè há he liwu bendi.
44017034	Bendi besuso be fel utyang ha ahe, be bong ha Ujeso. Udayonisiyes angwu a ma yi he liwu bekaandi abe be kwu ukoto angwu be ko le Aliapages lè ungingye angwu be maa ko le Udamaris lè bendi besuso be ma yi he liwu bendi abongale limen i.
44018001	Uporl a hà gbe lè he Atens gye he Ukorint.
44018002	A lè nde undi Ijuus há angwu be ko le Akwila. Be ma hwan he he Upontes a. Befe lè ungye-ma, Uprisila, be ma hà be lè he 'ubong Itali ibe, likorye Usu ukaandi Urom angwu be ko le Ukeladiyes a ma ke uten le Ijuus puu ì gbe lè he Urom. (Urom ù yi he 'ubong Itali a.) Uporl a te le u la kong lè be.
44018003	A ngyor kwu shi aki utung ha abe likorye be maa sha ishom bihwom nya a na ufe or a maa shi a.
44018004	A maa gya he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu he liti uwell Ijuus liyang-yang la fa ifung hè Ijuus or, Igrik or, bè bong àshi u kong.
44018005	Usalas befe lè Utimoti be be lè he Umasedonia. Uporl a kung 'ùnyōng 'uma puu bun 'isom Unim, u de Ijuus le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin a.
44018006	Bendi Ijuus be tel he, be kong ban he. A kem 'umbulmbul lè ha ahe aliga, u de be le: "Gbe ma nim, uben u kwa umen ugyang a. Abwo agi à yi ataa. Mi ndo gya he bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye a."
44018007	A gbe lè há lè ngwee he ushom Utitiyes Ujestes. A ma yi ugaandi angwu u fe Unim a. Ushom uma a ma yi gwaa ha ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu.
44018008	Ukrispes angwu a ma yi ukaandi há he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu befe lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima be bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso. Bendi besuso gbamm he Ukorint be gyo 'isom 'inunung, be bong ha Ujeso, be kib ābe he umbwo.
44018009	He liti ken lè 'usu itam i shi Uporl le Unim a de-e le: "Shī shell ye. Gye 'ushu bun igie igi. Shī tyàng ye.
44018010	Mì yi utung ha awo. Undi ù hà ndo do-a ye, likorye bendi gbamm he 'ubong 'umen i bè yi begi a."
44018011	Uporl a ngyor kwu há lize ken lè afell adyong-ken hwua bendi igie Unim.
44018012	Ugalio angwu ù yi undi Urom a fel usu Akaya. He 'unyong 'umen ana bendi Ijuus be gbong liwu lè kwu Uporl gye lè he he ukoto.
44018013	Be de usu le: "Ungikye anwun a kaa he-e ù shi bendi bè fel fe Unim he 'ukwo ahwu iten ityan i bong ye a."
44018014	Uporl a kung he-e ù kong likong, Ugalio a de Ijuus le: "Men Ijuus, kì kwu le a gwu undi or, ù shi 'itaa 'iban 'isuso a or, hang mi dang 'utyung gyo amen 'inunung.
44018015	Ukpor bwo 'ì yi ifung gbe lè akpe lè azen āmen agyang lè iten īmen a, men-agyang ma kong āshi. Mi-i maa bitaa ishe abina ye."
44018016	A ndō ābe lè há ukoto.
44018017	Puu ubell be kwu Usosteniz angwu a ma yi ukaandi há he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu kpam há he ukoto. Ugalio a kpam àshì wu àshi be shi.
44018018	Uporl a ngyor kwu ha bendi abongale he Ukorint gbe 'igbe. A hà gbe tyang ābe lè há gye he lishi Usinkria utung ha Uprisila befe lè Akwila. Be lè wu há, Uporl a hwaā lishi lima, likorye a ma ke Unim ùkyèbb. Saa be hà ngwee 'inong lishor gye he 'ubong Usiria.
44018019	Be lè wu he Efesos. Uporl a gbe tyang Uprisila befe lè Akwila. A gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu lè fung fe be.
44018020	Be de-e le ù kwu ha abe há zī ati. A swan.
44018021	He 'unyong ahwu a maa ndo gbe ligye, a de be le: "Gbe 'ì yi ugim Unim a, mi ba tem ba." A hà lè ngwee 'inong lishor lè he Efesos gye.
44018022	A lè wu he Usesaria. A gbe gye he Ujeruselem lè kong lè liwu bendi abongale. A hà gbe gye he Antiyok.
44018023	A kwu há he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg a, hà gbe lè há. A lè gbe he 'igie Ugalesha lè Ufrigia fe bendi abongale ingie.
44018024	Undi Ijuus angwu be maa ko le Aporlos a ma be he Efesos. A maa ba lè he Alezandria a. A ngye ná ù kong likong 'indee-indee, u ngye gbe lè igie Unim angi be ma fee leěti kangg.
44018025	Be ma hwuá he 'ukwo Atyetyan Ujeso. A maa hwua bendi 'igyang gba lè Ujeso lè lityam ken, mà na a ngye gbe lè uhwuale Ujon lè umbwo akibale uma ufe-ufe a or.
44018026	A keb 'iwom akongale he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu porr. Uprisila befe lè Akwila be gyo he; be kpe-e gye lè he he ushu mbee lè bun de-e 'inunung gbe lè 'ukwo Unim.
44018027	Aporlos a shi ugim le hang a gye he Akaya. Bendi abongale be kpell he gbe he afeeale 'ushia hwaa lè bebell abe há he Akaya de be le gbe a be, bè kpe-e. A lè wu há, a kpell bendi abe be bong ha Ujeso gbe he inung Unim.
44018028	A fe ifung hwò Ijuus he udyeshi gbe he atyungale ubell lè he ashia Unim angi be fee leěti le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a waa som a.
44019001	He 'unyong ahwu Aporlos a ma yi he Ukorint, Uporl a ma gbe afee-afee be wu he Efesos. A ndè bendi abongale besuso há.
44019002	A bii ābe le: "Gbé ma bong ha Ujeso, ma kpe Ukatia Kunyong Unim ngye a?" Be de-e le: "Li gyo gbe lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim ngye ye."
44019003	Uporl a kung bii ābe le: "Be hà kib amen he umbwo angwu hung a?" Be de-e le: "Umbwo akibale angwu Ujon a."
44019004	A de be le: "Ujon a maa kib bendi abe be bel àtyám lè he biban a he umbwo. A maa da bendi Izwell le bè bong ha undi angwu u pwom he lè há angwu be ko le Ujeso."
44019005	Be gyo ashin gyo-gyo, be kib ābe he umbwo he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso.
44019006	Uporl a kung abwo pwom ābe; Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be hwaa lè be; be fel kong igie 'ubong 'ususo, be kpe 'isom lè ha Unim kong.
44019007	Be maa mbee bendi lihwo lè be befee.
44019008	Uporl a gye he ushom angwu Ijuus ı kwu liwu. A kong ha abe porr afell akie; u fung fe be; u kaa he-e u hwua ābe gbe lè Kusu Unim.
44019009	Besuso be kpo àshi, be kee le be bong ye; be kong ban 'ukwo Atyetyan Ujeso há he liwu bendi. Uporl a kpe bendi abongale gbe lè be lè há. A ko bendi le bè be azu he ushom angwu undi angwu be ko lè Utiranes u hwua bendi.
44019010	A shi ashin aze afee. Bendi Eshia puu abe be ma yi Ijuus or, begaandi or, be gyo 'isom gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso.
44019011	Unim a shi bikwele-uhwo lè ikeb kangg gbe ha Uporl.
44019012	Akatifu lè ábeé 'ihwom angi a gbe tyua Uporl or, be maa kung la ka bendi-angmam lè abe ikeb ibibi ì yi ha abe; be mbee, ikeb ibibi i gbe lè ha abe.
44019013	Bendi Ijuus besuso abe be maa tan mbee bipi ndō ikeb ibibi or, be maa kaa le be fel sha āshi he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso a. Undi-undi a de ikeb ibibi le: "Mi ndo-a he lizen Ujeso angwu Uporl u bun gbe lè he."
44019014	Bebwaa úkaandi angwu be ko le Usiba angwu u shang Unim na be maa shi 'imen i. Be ma yi bedyong-ifee.
44019015	Ikeb ibibi ana i kung de be le: "Mi ngye Ujeso, mi mbee ngye gbe lè Uporl. Ayang ù hà yi amen ufe?"
44019016	Ungikye umen angwu ikeb ibibi i ma yi ha ahe ana a buu lè kwu ābe he abwo kpam. A hwò ābe ikeb. Be fel bibaa-bibaa; bihwom bibell bi gie. Be fel buu ibuu shul lè há he ushom ungikye anwuna.
44019017	Bendi Ijuus puu lè begaandi he Efesos be gyo gbe lè shi, be fel he 'ushell. Bendi be mbee fem lizen Atyetyan Ujeso.
44019018	Bendi abongale gbamm be be, kong de bendi he 'ugbo gbe lè biwom bibibi abi be maa shi mà ukpong be hà bong ha Ujeso.
44019019	Besuso gbamm abe be maa shi anong be gbong àshia anong abell he ukem ting shī 'inde he ashi bendi puu. Be ma kwuu únde ashia amen ana, a ma yi igaa ikwudi asisilisi asisilisi.
44019020	Be gye 'ushu bun igie Atyetyan Unim mbee bipi puu lè ikeb kangg. Bendi gbamm be bong ha Ujeso.
44019021	Biwom abin bi shi gbe puu, Uporl a hà shi ugim le hang a lè gbe he Umasedonia lè Akaya gye he Ujeruselem. A de le: "Gbe mi lè wu há, mi gya he Urom or titi."
44019022	A waa Utimoti befe lè Irastes lè he liwu bendi-utung bema som gye he Umasedonia. Ufe-gyang a ngyor kwu he Eshia.
44019023	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana na linaa li ma yi he Efesos kangg he 'uhwo bendi abe be pwom 'ukwo Atyetyan Ujeso.
44019024	Ungikye angwu be maa ko le Udemitriyes angwu a maa shi aki isiliba a ma kung isiliba shi inwaa litelakpa ná 'atelakpa ake 'à yi he ushom únīm angwu be ko le Atemis. Aki ama a ma be lè únde ke bendi aki bema.
44019025	A ko ābe puu lè bendi abe be maa shi 'itaa aki 'ibell be sho he 'iteng ken, u de be le: "Bebuye, ma ngye le ligbo lityan li be lè he aki amen i a.
44019026	Men-agyang ma ndè, ma mbee gyo ashi ungikye angwu be ko le Uporl i u shi. A de le litelakpa angi bendi be shi he abwo lì yi Unim a ye; u shi bendi gbamm hen he Efesos or, he 'ubong Eshia or, be gie igim ibell.
44019027	Ki sha 'inunung ye, aki atyan a ba lè lizen libibi. Ashina 'ife-ife a ye, ki sha 'inunung ye, ushom únīm angwu be ko le Atemis u ba fel 'idideng, bedyan únīm umen angwu bendi Eshia puu kpe mbeè igye puu be fe-e be ba ban."
44019028	Be gyo he a kong ashin. Lityam li nyung ābe; be fel gaa le: "Atemis angwu he Efesos a dyam!"
44019029	Kihwee 'i ma yi mbeè Efesos puu. Bendi bemen gbamm ana be kwu Ugayas befe lè Alistakes. Bendi bemen befee i be maa ba utung ha Uporl lè he Umasedonia a. Be buu gbe lè be gya he ushokwo.
44019030	Uporl a kung he-e ù gye há he liwu, bendi abongale be bong he le ù te ye.
44019031	Bekaandi 'ubong besuso abe be ma yi bedim-ma be som bendi le bè lè tim he anung le ù shi gye há he liwu ye.
44019032	Bendi puu be maa so-i hwee 'ihwee. Puu ubell, undi-undi a maa kong 'ima, undi-undi u kong 'ima. Bendi gbamm be ngye ná 'i baā nyong be fel há or ye.
44019033	Besuso be de le Alezanda na u tan lè shi likorye Ijuus i ma be lè he, be naa he 'ushu. Alezanda a yor abwo de be le bè tyang lè 'ihwee he-e ù kong ke Ijuus he ashi bendi.
44019034	Be nde shob le ù yi Ijuus a. Be keb agaale kong 'itaa 'iwom a ken le: "Atemis angwu he Efesos a dyam." Be gaa kpamm lè kwom he awa afee.
44019035	He umbee-likel undi angwu a ma yi akawu há he 'ubong na a hà ndo shi ābe be kwun atyung. A kong le: "Men bendi abe he Efesos, bendi puu bé ngye le bendi abe hen he Efesos be fa ùnīm angwu be ko le Atemis angwu a dyam kangg. Ushom uma u yi hen. Há he ushom umen ana na be ma ndor 'ukor ahwu 'u ma mbu lè he lifung-atabe or.
44019036	Undi ù hà ndo fung biwom abin ye. Mà kwun atyung. Mà shi 'iwom faale ugim ye.
44019037	Má kwu bendi aben be lè be nyin. Ki shi le bē zì biwom he ishom Unim a or, ngwu wò ko le be kong ban ùnīm utyan ye.
44019038	Gbe Udemitriyes befe lè bendi aki bema bè yi lè ushe ha undi, kì yi lè ati angi be maa ushe, ki shi lè bendi abe be maa ushe. Bè lè kpee há kong ban bende.
44019039	Gbe 'iwom 'isuso 'ì yi há he afee pel àshi ma kee, mà kwu kpamm bendi Efesos be kpee hè be bè maa ushe, be kong amen áshi.
44019040	Gbe li shi 'inunung ye, bekaandi Urom be ben li le li shi linaa nyin 'unyin. Kì yi lè atan-lengi angwu hang 'ihwee 'i kwu 'itel i ye. Gbe be bii li, li ngya atan-lengi angwu lì ke be ye."
44019041	A kong āshi puu, a hà de be le bè ndo gye.
44020001	Linaa anyin li mbee puu, Uporl a hà ko bendi abongale be he 'iteng ken. A fe be ingie, u de be le: "Ishu ì so." A gbe ndo he Umasedonia.
44020002	A lè tan mbee bipi há he 'igie 'imen ana bun biwom ingie de bendi.
44020003	A gye he Akaya lè kwu há afell akie. He 'unyong ahwu a maa kam le u gya he 'ubong Usiria, a gyo le Ijuus i kam le i gwa he; a shi ugim le u fel la gba he Umasedonia a, gya he Ufilipai.
44020004	Usopata, unwaa Upayires angwu a maa be lè he Beria, a te utung ha ahe. Alistakes befe lè Usekundes abe be be lè he Utesalonaika, lè Ugayas angwu u be lè he Udaabi lè Utikikes befe lè Utrofimes abe be be lè he Eshia be te utung ha ahe lè Utimoti.
44020005	Be lè wu he Ufilipai he 'ipi, mi Uluk, mi ma yi. Puu ubell be ma gbe 'ushu lè kwu he Utrowas nyong li.
44020006	Nyong be mbee lè 'ipam ibred angi i mbwee ye, li hà ngwee 'inong lishor lè he Ufilipai pwom ābe gye há he Utrowas. Li wu há he liti ledyong. Li ngyor kwu há ati adyong-ifee.
44020007	He ukpi-ikwu liti utyong leekwulukwu li lè kpee he 'iteng ken hè li lì bun ibred zī, li well gbe lè lihwu Atyetyan Ujeso nyong lı zī lizi abwo ipel. Uporl a kong ha bendi kpamm lè wu he 'ididyan 'usu lè ugim le ashi a taa u gba lè há.
44020008	Bimor-inde bi ma yi há he ushom 'usi he 'ipi li ma yi.
44020009	Ushomate ususo a ma yi há, be ko le Uyutikes. A ma yi kwu he uwindo. Le bwo Uporl a kong ha bendi gbe 'igbe, Uyutikes a mbu 'unde. Kunde 'u shi-e a mbu lè há he ushom 'usi angwu lekie be he itang. Be lè kung he, a fel likwom a.
44020010	Uporl a shul gye há lè mbu kpo he; u mam kwu-e. A de abe be sho há le: "Ufung ù be men ye. A tem wum."
44020011	A tem mbo gye he ushom 'usi lè bun ibred zī. A kong ha abe kpamm ashi a gbe taa. A hà gbe lè há.
44020012	Bendi be gbe lè ushomate angwu a ma mbu lè he uwindo ana uwum gye lè he he ushu. Bè yi lè igor kangg.
44020013	Li gbe lè ngwee 'inong lishor gye he Asos le li la kung Uporl. A de li le lì lè kwu há nyong he likorye ufe u tan ha abee a gya há.
44020014	A be tel li he Asos. Li kpe-e gye lè he he Umitilini.
44020015	He liti angi lefee li gye lè nya he 'inong lishor lè gbe gwaa ha Ukiyos. Ki zī liti ken, li kung be he Usamos. Ashi a mbee fem taa, li wu he Umalites.
44020016	Uporl a shi ugim le u ngwee 'inong lishor là gba he Efesos abee-abee teng u la ban 'unyong há he Eshia. A maa buu he-e ù nde le u wa he Ujeruselem he liti Kipam Upentikos a.
44020017	Uporl a som 'isom lè he Umalites gye he Efesos le bekaandi bendi abongale bè be hwaa lè he.
44020018	Be be. A de be le: "Má ngye ná mi shi aki lè 'ùnyong 'ugi kung lè há he ukpi-ikwu liti angi mi ma be he Eshia.
44020019	Mi shi aki agi nya a na undi angwu u fe Unim ù shi lè 'uhwo ambwele lè àkye he ashi lè bingie abi mi maa kpe le bwo bendi Ijuus be kam le be gwa-m.
44020020	Ma ngye le mi ma mor amen adele 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi mi ngye le 'i kwa lè lifem ka amen ye. Mi bun igie Unim de men, mi hwua amen he udyeshi or, he ishaale īmen or.
44020021	Mi bun de Ijuus or, begaandi or, le bè bel lè he biban hwaa lè Unim, be bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso.
44020022	Kanaa-anaa i mi ndo ka Ukatia Kunyong Unim ife gya he Ujeruselem. Mi hà ngye 'iwom ashi 'ı be shi-m há or ye.
44020023	Ashi mi kee-kee ngye 'ì yi le 'ubong 'uyang-yang ahwu mı gye, Ukatia Kunyong Unim u da-m le mi ba gya igaadye, mi kpe bingie há.
44020024	Mi di le likpan ligi lì yi-m he 'ukpo ye gbangg, mi kee-kee kee le mì mbee aki angi Atyagi Ujeso a kung ke-m le mì shi. Aki angi há à yi le mì bun 'isom gbe lè inung angi Unim a tyung li gbe ha Ujeso.
44020025	"Mi maa tan mbee 'ubong 'ūmen bun gba lè Kusu Unim. Kanaa-anaa i mi ngye le mà nem ba nda-m ye.
44020026	He atan-lengi anwun mi da amen 'unyin i le gbe undi ken or a waa nim lè he liwu līmen, hà uben ù nem yi ugi a ye.
44020027	Mi mor le mi de men gbe lè ugim Unim puu ye.
44020028	Mà baa 'uhwo-men lè bendi puu abe Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ke men. Bè yi nya a na ìtiā. Mà kam bendi abe Unim a shi ābe be fel bema begyang gbe he lihwu Unwaa-ma.
44020029	Mi ngye le mi gba lè nyin, bendi-ilam be ba ba he liwu līmen, hè be bè lam amen mà tyang abongale. Bè yi nya a na inyia ibibi angi ı gwu ìtiā.
44020030	Kunyong 'u mbee ba lè há ahwu bendi besuso lè ha amen liwu be be bè iman hè be bè shi bendi abongale bè bel fel pwom ābe befe a.
44020031	Mà kwu lè 'akang. Mà well le mi hwua amen lè àkye he ashi mbee 'unyong kpamm lè wu he aze akie.
44020032	"Kanaa-anaa i mi kung amen fe Unim lè igie inung ima he 'ubwo. Ù yi lè ikeb le u sha amen ma naa genn, u ke men 'ukwun ahwu a ndor ke bendi bema puu.
44020033	Mi bell únde undi or, ngwu mì bell inditen undi or ye.
44020034	Men-agyang ma ngye le aki angi mi-gyang mi shi lè abwo agi na a hwua igben ityan, bel ha bendi-utung begi.
44020035	Mi tyung amen gbe he biwom puu abe mı shi le gbe he ashele aki 'itaa i li kpell bendi abe bè yi lè ukpell ke 'uhwo-bell ye. Lì well igie angi Atyetyan Ujeso ugyang a kong le: 'Igor i ba lè he 'iwom akele hwa akpēle.' "
44020036	Uporl a kong puu, a hà tim anung he itang kong ha Unim utung ha abe puu.
44020037	Puu ubell be maa kya nya a na be maa gaǎ he lè uko le u ndo gya.
44020038	Igie angi a ma de be le bè nem ba nda he ye na i maa ban ābe kangg. Be teng he lè wu he 'ipi ù ngwee 'inong.
44021001	Li de be le ishu ì so; li gbe ligye. Li ngwee 'inong lishor gbe ligbe-ligbe gye he Ukos. Ashi a taa, li wu he Urodes. Li bo lè há gye he Upatara.
44021002	Li ma nde 'inong há ashi 'ı ndè àshì gye he Ufenishia he 'ubong Usiria. Li lè ngwee āshi gbe.
44021003	Li lè wu he 'ipi lı naa ndè Usaipres; li gbe he 'igie Usaipres ashi he lizen ndo he 'ubong Usiria. Li lè shul he Utaya he 'ipi be maa ndo lè fem bigbor lè he afee 'inong.
44021004	Li ndè bendi abongale besuso há. Li ngyor kwu ha abe há zī ati adyong-ifee. Be de Uporl gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim le ù shī gye he Ujeruselem ye.
44021005	Kùnyong 'utyan ahwu le lì kwu ha abe nya 'u mbee, li gbe lè há gye 'ushu. Befe puu lè bengye-bell lè bebwaa-bell be teng li. Bel puu li tim anung he itang gwaa ha 'ibam kong ha Unim.
44021006	Li hà de bende le ishu ì so. Bel li lè ngwee 'inong; befe be tem gye he ushu.
44021007	Li bo lè he Utaya he 'inong lishor lè wu he Utolemayes. Li shul lè kong lè bendi abongale abe bè yi há; li kwu ha abe liti ken.
44021008	Ashi a taa, li bo lè há gye he Usesaria. Li gye he ushu Ufilip angwu a maa bun 'isom 'inunung mbee bipi lè kwu ha ahe há. A ma yi he liwu bendi bedyong-ifee abe be ma waa he Ujeruselem le bè hwua lizi ke bendi abongale.
44021009	A ma yi lè bebwaa bengingye bèndè abe be ma wa gye abee ye. Bebwaa-ma bemen ana be maa kpa 'isom lè ha Unim kong.
44021010	Li kwu há zī ati. Undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim angwu be ko le Agabes a be lè he Ujudia.
44021011	A be hwaa lè bel. A kung ukwob Uporl bua 'uhwo-ma abwo lè abee; u de le: "Ukatia Kunyong Unim a de le, 'Kitaa i na Ijuus ı be bua undi angwu ù yi lè ukwob anwun he Ujeruselem, be kung he ke bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye.' "
44021012	Bel lè bendi abe be teng li tim Uporl anung le ù gye he Ujeruselem ye.
44021013	A de li le: "Ma sha 'ibang a? Ma kya nyin le mì wee abwo â? Mi kam le bè bua mi indi ife-ife a he Ujeruselem ye. Mi kam le bè gwu-m igwu or he 'uhwo Atyetyan Ujeso."
44021014	Li kong na ana a bong ye. Li tyang he: li de le: "Kì shi nya a na Unim a kee."
44021015	Li kwu há gbe 'anwaa 'igbe, li hà kam biwom bityan gbe ndo he Ujeruselem.
44021016	Bendi abongale besuso lè he Usesaria be te utung ha abel. Be te lè bel gye he ushaale undi angwu be ko le Unesen angwu 'ı ma yi le lì lè kwu ha ahe. Unesen umen i a maa ba lè he Usaipres a. A bong ha Ujeso kung lè há ukpi-ikwu a.
44021017	Li lè wu he Ujeruselem. Bendi abongale be kpe li lè igor.
44021018	Ashi a taa, Uporl a gbe utung ha abel le u la ndà Ujems. Bekaandi bendi abongale or be ma yi há.
44021019	Uporl a kong lè be; u de be biwom puu abi Unim a shi ha bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye gbe he aki angi a shi.
44021020	Puu ubell be pee Unim he 'unyong ahwu be gyo he. Be de Uporl le: "Unwandatyan, wo-gyang wo ndè ná Ijuus gbamm or i bong ha Ujeso. Ki shi le be ndor Iten Ijuus kangg.
44021021	Be gyo le wo hwua Ijuus mbee abong bendi besuso puu mbee 'unyong le bè tyang Iten Umosis, bè nem ten bebwaa-bell or, ngwu bè shi akpe angi befe Ijuus be shi or ye.
44021022	Ki shi na ana be ba gyo le wo be. Wò ha sha ná a?
44021023	Shi 'iwom ashi lı da-a le wò shi. Bendi bè yi i nyin bèndè abe be shi ukyebb ke Unim.
44021024	Te ha-a à lè shi 'uhwo-gang wò fel utaa-utaa utung ha abe nya a na Iten ityan, bel Ijuus, i kong. Wo-ò ke únde angwu 'ì yi le bè ke hè be bè hà hwaā ābe lishi nya a na bendi be shi nyong be ke úkyébb anwun. Gbe wo shi ná, mà undi uyang-yang u ngya le biwom abi be gyo gbe lè wo bì yi uman a. Undi uyang-yang u ngye le wo-o ndor Iten Umosis.
44021025	Bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye abe be fel bendi abongale befe, li fee 'ushia de be le li shi ugim le bè zī biwom ūkèm ye, be zī anung inyia or, ngwu inyia angi be ngib gwu he abwo or ye, be mbee ndor 'uhwo-bell betaa-betaa lè he akpela atanale."
44021026	Ashi a taa, Uporl a gbe lè bendi abena, lè shi 'uhwo-ma he-e ù fel utaa-utaa utung ha abe nya a na Iten ityan, bel Ijuus, i kong. A kung gye he Ushom Unim; u la da bendi 'ugii ati angi a teng gye he umbee-likel liti mà ukpong be hà shang Unim ke be.
44021027	He 'unyong ahwu ati amen adyong-ifee i a maa ndo mbee, bendi Ijuus besuso abe be be lè he Eshia be nde Uporl he Ushom Unim. Be shi bendi puu abe bè yi há be fel he ingywo fe Uporl. Be lè shwia kwu-e.
44021028	Be gaa le: "Men bendi Izwell, mà be kpell li. Ungikye anwun na u tan mbee bipi kong ban bendi betyan lè Iten ityan lè Ushom Unim anwun. A mbee be lè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or he Ushom Unim be ban 'iteng ashi 'ì yi ndor ta-ta ke Unim!"
44021029	(Be kong ashin likorye be ma ndè Utrofimes angwu u be lè he Efesos há he lifung-ushu utung ha Uporl. Be kong le Uporl a gye lè he há he Ushom Unim.)
44021030	Ki fel há he 'ubong yia-yia-yia. Bendi be buu lè kwu Uporl; be shwia gbe lè he lè há he Ushom Unim. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo be shī àshì he Ushom Unim.
44021031	He 'unyong ahwu be maa fel kaa le be gwa Uporl, bendi besuso be som undi le ù lè de ukaandi ishogya angi Urom le linaa likaandi lì yi mbeè Ujeruselem puu.
44021032	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo ukaandi anwuna a kpe bekaandi besuso lè ishogya ibell buu lè be gye há. Bendi be nde-e utung ha ishogya, be tyang Uporl ikwun akpamale.
44021033	Ukaandi anwuna a lè kwu Uporl; u de le bè fe-e ashishilika afee. A bii liwu anyina le: "Ungikye umen i u ba lè hung a? A shi 'ibang a?"
44021034	Puu abe há he liwu, undi-undi a maa gaa da he 'ima, undi-undi u gaa de-e 'ima. Kihwee 'i ma go gbe le ukaandi anwuna a gyo 'iwom ashi Uporl a shi ye. A hà de le bè gye lè Uporl he ushaale ishogya.
44021035	Be gye lè he lè wu he 'ipi be mbo gye he afee, ishogya i fel kung he ikung likorye liwu bendi li ma yi lè ingywo kangg.
44021036	Bendi puu be kwuo pwom ābe, bè yii gaa le: "Mà gwu-e! Mà gwu-e!"
44021037	He 'unyong ahwu be maa ndo mbo gye he afee, Uporl a kung de ukaandi ishogya le: "Mì nya da-a 'iwom a?" Ukaandi a bii he le: "Wo kong igie Igrik mbee a?
44021038	Ki ze le wò yi ungikye Igyept angwu íti a ma gbong bendi asi lisi 'ugbe lihwo abe be kam 'ukye gye he libeb a ye a?"
44021039	Uporl a fan he le: "Mì ye ufe a ye. Mì yi undi Ijuus a. Be hwan mi he lishi Usilisia angi be ko le Utaasos angi lì yi he 'ukpo a. Kusi hā tyang mi mî kong ha bendi aben."
44021040	Ukaandi anwuna a bong. Uporl a bo naa 'inaa há he ungwu likong, yor abwo de be le bè kwun atyung. Be kwun atyung. Uporl a kung kong ha abe he igie Ihibru le:
44022001	"Betyagi lè bebuye, mà dang 'utyung mî de men gbe lè 'uhwo-gi."
44022002	Be gyo he u kong he igie Ihibru. Be hà kwun atyung shangg. Uporl a gye 'ushu kong le:
44022003	"Mì yi undi Ijuus a. Be hwan mi he lishi Usilisia angi be ko le Utaasos a. Hen he Ujeruselem na mi ma kwu kpè. Ugamaliyell na a ma hwua mi iten betietyan kangg. Mì yi lè 'igyor he ashele aki Unim nya a na men abe ma sho nyin a.
44022004	Mi maa ka bendi abe be pwom 'ukwo Ujeso Ukristi 'ingie kpamm be gbe hwō. Mi kwu bengikye or, bengingye or, fe igaadye.
44022005	Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe be teng be naa mi ushada le mi kong 'igyang a. Be ke-m ashia le mì lè ke betyan Ijuus he Udamasikos. Mi kung bo ndo há, he-m mì lè kwu àbe be pwom 'ukwo Ujeso Ukristi, mi fe be ashishilika be lè be he Ujeruselem be ke be 'ingie."
44022006	"Nya a na mi maa tan be fel kpee-kpee ha Udamasikos he libwee 'udyan lishi, kikung-gbo ashi lè he lifung-atabe 'i kung taa imbul-imbul fe-m kel-kel kpe lishi.
44022007	Mi mbu tyang he itang, mi gyo igie i da-m le: 'Usorl, Usorl, 'ibang a, wo ke-m 'ingie?'
44022008	Mi-i kung bii le: 'Atyagi, wo ayang a?' A kung de-m le: 'Mi Ujeso angwu he Unazaret angwu wo ke-m 'ingie a.'
44022009	Bendi abe be ma yi utung ha ami be ndè 'ikung-gbo, ukpor be gyo igie undi angwu a maa kong ha ami ye.
44022010	Mi kung bii le: 'Atyagi, mì shi ná a?' Atyagi Ujeso a de-m le: 'Bo 'inaa gye he Udamasikos. Nya na be be da-a biwom puu abi Unim a kee le wò shi.'
44022011	Bendi-utung begi be kwu-m abwo gye lè mi he Udamasikos likorye 'ikung-gbo 'imen ana 'i ma hwuǎ mi àshì.
44022012	"Ungikye ususo a ma yi há angwu be ko le Ananayas. A ma yi undi angwu u fe Unim, u ndor Iten ityan a. Ijuus puu he Udamasikos i maa ka he ife.
44022013	A be naa gwaa ha ami, u de-m le: 'Unwandagi Usorl, fel ndè.' Nya 'ukwo-ukwo mi fel nda. Mi bel àshì nde-e.
44022014	A de le: 'Unim betietyan a waa kung-a le wò ngye ugim uma, wo ndè Unwaa-ma ununung, wo gyo igie ima igyang angi u kong.
44022015	Wo ba naá he ushada gba he abunale de bendi puu biwom abi wo ndè lè abi wo gyo.
44022016	Wo mbee kwa nyong 'ibang a? Bo 'inaa hè be bè kib-a he umbwo hè Unim u to taa-a lè he biban bigang ná wo kong ha ahe.' "
44022017	"Mi tem gye he Ujeruselem. He liti ken nyong mi ma yi he Ushom Unim mi maa kong ha Unim, Unim a tyung mi le Atyagi Ujeso a be de-m le:
44022018	'Gbe lè hen he Ujeruselem akikye likorye bendi be ba bong kpa àshi wo be bun de be gbe lè mi ye.'
44022019	Mi kung fan le: 'Atyagi, bé ngye dangg le mi maa gya he ishom angi Ijuus ı kwu liwu la kwa bendi abe be bong ha awo, mi kpam ābe.
44022020	He 'unyong ahwu be ma gwu Ustibin angwu a maa bun gbe lè wo, mi or mi ma yi há. Mi ma bong le bendi abe be gwu-e be shi 'i ngbebb, mi kpē aliga abell kwu ābe.'
44022021	Atyagi a kung de-m le: 'Ndo te, mi som-a gya hwaa lè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye he 'ipi 'ì yi lè 'igbe.' "
