44022022	Bendi abena be dang 'utyung gyo Uporl kpamm a gbe kong ashin. Be keb agaale le: "Mà gwu-e. A kpè le u kwa uwum ye."
44022023	Be maa gaa, be yor bihwom bibell, be shi 'umbulmbul 'u teb gye he 'usi.
44022024	Ukaandi umen angwu lè he Urom ana a de bendi bema le bè gye lè he he afee ushaale ishogya, bè kpam he he-e ù de be atan-lengi angwu Ijuus ı gaa fe-e 'itaa i.
44022025	Be bua he indi le be ndo kpam he. Uporl a bii undi ishogya angwu ù yi naa há le: "Uten a bong le wò kpam undi Urom angwu be wa maa he ushe le a shi 'iwom a or ye a?"
44022026	Undi ishogya anwuna a gyo ashin, a lè bii ukaandi le: "Kibang wo la shi nyin? Ungikye anwuna ù yi undi Urom a."
44022027	Ukaandi a lè bii Uporl le: "De-m, wò yi undi Urom â?" Uporl a bong.
44022028	Ukaandi umen ana a kung de le: "Mi-i ma ke únde a go kangg, mi hà fel undi Urom." Uporl a de-e le: "Undi Urom na a hwan i-mi."
44022029	Bendi abe be ma be le be bii Uporl bibibi be tem item. Ukaandi angwu a gyo le Uporl ù yi undi Urom a ana, u fel he 'ushell likorye a fe-e ashishilika.
44022030	Ukaandi umen angwu lè he Urom ana a kee le u ngya 'iwom kpa-kpa ashi Ijuus i de le Uporl a shi. Ashi a taa, a kong, be waa Uporl ashishilika; u de bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bìkēm ukoto abi bi teng le bè lè kpee ukem. A kpē Uporl lè naa ābe he 'ushu.
44023001	Uporl a ndè bìkēm ukoto kporr. A hà de be le: "Bebuye, ugim ugi ù yi-m utaa-utaa gbe lè biwom puu abi mı shi he ashi Unim kpamm be wu 'unyin nyin."
44023002	Ananayas angwu ù yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim a de bendi abe bè yi naa gwaa ha Uporl le bè kpam he 'ubwo he ungwu.
44023003	Uporl a kung de-e le: "Wo angwu wo ngbèbb item, ban afee, Unim u ba kpam-a awo or titi. Wò yi kwu há ana le wo maa mi ushe ná Iten i kong, ukpor wo-o ban Iten a nyong wo de le bè kpam mi ana."
44023004	Bendi abe be naa gwaa ha Uporl be de-e le: "Taa! Shī kong ban ukaandi ye."
44023005	Uporl a kung de be le: "Bebuye, mi ngye le ù yi Usu bekaandi abe bè shang Unim a ye. Be ma fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le: 'Undi ù kong ban ukaandi angwu u nde gbe lè bendi ye.' "
44023006	Uporl a ndè le bendi besuso há he liwu be ma yi Isadusis, besuso be shi Iferesis. He atan-lengi anwun a kung gaa há he liwu libell le: "Bebuye, mi-ì yi Iferesis a, mi shi unwaa Iferesis a. Mì yi he ukoto nyin, le bwo mi ndor lishi le bendi abe be hwō be ba wum a."
44023007	A kong ashin kong-kong, Iferesis befe lè Isadusis be fel shwan lè bende. Liwu anyina li ma tang he abwo.
44023008	(Bendi Isadusis be de le bendi be ba wum lè he lihwu ye. Be mbee de le idengell Unim or ì yi, nyong ihwutang ì yi ye. Iferesis ife i bong le bimen bikie nyin bì yi.)
44023009	Be fel gaa kangg. Bendi besuso abe be hwua bendi Iten abe bè yi he likwu Iferesis be bo 'inaa, be fel gaa fe be le: "Li ndè 'ibibi ashi ungikye anwun a shi ye. Pisoye udengell Unim a kong ha ahe 'igyang a; pisoye uhwutang a."
44023010	Be fel shwan kangg. Ukaandi ishogya a fel he 'ushell le hà nyin bè shwia wal Uporl abwo or. A som ishogya ima gye há he liwu bendi le bè lè kpe Uporl lè ikeb gbe lè he lè há gye he ushaale ishogya.
44023011	Kusu 'u gye, Atyetyan Ujeso a be naa gwaa ha Uporl de-e le: "Shī shell ye. Wo ma bun de bendi gbe lè mi he Ujeruselem. Wo ba bun da bendi abe he Urom or titi."
44023012	Ashi a taa leèti, bendi Ijuus be lè kpee ukem shi ugim ná bè be shi. Be tam le kì yi lè 'iwom ashi 'ì hà ndo shi ābe bè zī lizi or, ngwu bè ngwo umbwo or ye kpamm be gbe gwu Uporl.
44023013	Bendi abe be ma tam ashin be maa gba gyong asi afee.
44023014	Be lè hwaa lè bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi abe he 'ubong, de be le: "Bel puu li kwu he 'iteng ken tam le li za lizi ye kpamm li gbe gwu Uporl.
44023015	Kanaa-anaa i men lè bìkēm ukoto puu mà som 'isom hwaa lè ukaandi ishogya angwu u be lè he Urom le ù be lè Uporl hwaa lè men. Mà lam he le ma kee le ma mbee gyo he 'inunung. Li ba la gwa he há he 'ukwo mà ukpong u hà wu hen."
44023016	Unwaa unwanam Uporl a gyo le be tim le bè gie he 'ukwo nyong he. A gye há he ushaale ishogya lè de Uporl gbe lè shi.
44023017	Uporl a kung undi ishogya ken ko. A de-e le: "Te lè ushomate anwun lè hwaa lè ukaandi ugang. U yi lè 'iwom ashi a kee le u da ukaandi."
44023018	Angwu ishogya ana a kpe-e gye lè he he 'ipi ùkaandi. A de ukaandi le: "Undi igaadye angwu be ko le Uporl ana a ko mi. A de-m le mì be lè ushomate anwun be hwaa lè wo likorye ù yi lè ashi u la da-a."
44023019	Ukaandi ana a kwu-e abwo he 'ubwo, gbe lè he gye he ufaa lè bii he le: "Wò yi lè 'ibang a le wo da-m?"
44023020	A fan he le: "Ijuus i tim le, kuhwo bè be lam-a le wò te lè Uporl hè bìkēm ukoto bì mbee gyo he 'inunung.
44023021	Shī dang 'utyung gyo ābe ye, likorye bendi bè yi há, be gba gyong asi afee abe nyin be ndyell he 'ukwo nyong Uporl. Puu ubell be tam le be za lizi or, ngwu bè ngwo umbwo or ye kpamm be gbe gwu-e. Bè fel yi kwu, be nyong-a awo a le wò bong."
44023022	Ukaandi ishogya anwuna a de-e le ù de undi le a be bun ashin de-e ye. A hà de-e le ù ndo gye.
44023023	Ukaandi ana a hà ko ishogya ima, bendi befee, de be le: "Mà lè be lè ishogya asi lihwo. Mà be lè bendi asi akie lè be lihwo abe be pwom bekaa-inyia lè bendi asi lihwo abe be kwu akung. Mà de be le bè kam hè be nyin bè bo he inde idyong-inde lè 'usu gye he Usesaria.
44023024	Mà shun bekaa-inyia ke Uporl he-e ù pwom; ma te lè he lè ke Ukaandi Ufelis faale 'idoale."
44023025	Ukaandi umen ana a kung 'ushia fee hwaa lè Ufelis le:
44023026	"Ufelis ukaandi utyan, mi Ukeladiyes Ulisias, mi kong lè wo.
44023027	Bendi Ijuus be ma kwu ungikye anwun, be kaa he agwele. Mi ma gyo le ù yi undi Urom a. Bel ha ishogya igi li lè kpan he.
44023028	Mi gye lè he hwaa lè bìkēm ukoto bibell, likorye mi kee le mi ngya 'iwom 'ibibi ashi be de le a shi.
44023029	Mi nde le a shi 'iwom ashi 'i kpè le bè gwu-e or, ngwu bè fe-e he igaadye or ye. Kiwom ashi be kee-kee kong fe-e 'ì yi 'iwom gbe lè iten ibell ife-ife a.
44023030	Undi a be de-m le Ijuus i kam le i gwa he. Mi hà shi ugim le mi som he hwaa lè wo. Mi de bendi-linaa bema le bè te lè ushe uma lè hwaa lè wo."
44023031	Ishogya i lè shi ashi a de be. Be te lè Uporl nya lè 'usu lè wu he Antipatris.
44023032	Ashi a taa, ishogya angi he abee i tem gye he ushu le angi he bekaa-inyia bè ndo te lè Uporl.
44023033	Be te lè he lè wu he Usesaria. Be kung 'ushia or, Uporl or, ke ukaandi.
44023034	Ukaandi ana a bo 'ushia. A hà bii Uporl 'ubong ahwu u be. Uporl a de-e le u ba lè he Usilisia a.
44023035	Ukaandi a de-e le: "Bendi-linaa begang be ba, mà mi gyo-a." A hà de le bè gye lè Uporl he ukoto Uherod, be kang he há.
44024001	Ati a gbe adyong, Ananayas angwu ù yi Usu bekaandi abe be shang Unim befe lè bekaandi besuso lè Utateles angwu a ma yi uloya be gye he Usesaria. Be lè hwaa lè Ufelis hè be bè de-e 'ibibi ashi Uporl a shi.
44024002	Be ko Uporl, Utateles a fel kong fe-e le: "Ukaandi, le bwo wo bi lishi, li fel lè ikwun 'i gbe 'igbe. Wo gie biwom gbamm ha abel 'ubong hè hwu 'ù kwu 'ununung.
44024003	Mbee 'unyong kpamm lì yi lè igor he ashin mbee bipi puu. Li pee-a kangg.
44024004	Mi kee le mi ban-a 'unyong gba gyong ye. Mi tim-a anung le wò hā kwu lè inung ha-a à dang 'utyung gyo li he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg.
44024005	Ungikye anwun ù yi undi linaa ashele kangg a. A kpi linaa ashele he liwu Ijuus angi ì yi mbee igye puu. Ufe na u teng likwu bendi abe be ko le Unazarin likorye be bong ha Ujeso angwu u be lè he Unazaret.
44024006	A maa kaa le he-e ù ban Ushom Unim. Li hà kwu-e. [Li ma kam le li maa he ushe keè ha iten ityan,
44024007	ukpor Ulisias angwu a ma yi ukaandi ishogya a ma be shwia kpe kung he lè ha abel lè ikeb kangg.
44024008	Ulisias a hà ke uten le bendi-linaa bema bè be hwaa lè wo.] Wò bii he bibibi, mà wo-gyang wo ndà biwom abi lı kong fe-e i."
44024009	Ijuus i kong fe-e, be bong le abin puu bì yi 'igyang a.
44024010	Ukaandi anwuna a yor abwo de Uporl le ù ndo kong igie ima. Uporl a kung kong le: "Mì yi lè igor ná mi ndo maa ushe ugi he ashi agang nyin, likorye mi ngye le 'i fel aze gbamm ná wo kwu ná undi angwu u maa bendi 'ubong ahwun ushe.
44024011	Bendi or be ba da-a le ati lihwo lè ngi afee a gbe ná mi ma gye he Ujeruselem, mí-ì lè fe Unim.
44024012	Ijuus i ma nde-m mi fa undi ifung he Ushom Unim or, ngwu bè nde-m mi shi linaa ha bendi he ishom ibell angi be kwu liwu or, ngwu he 'iteng 'iyang-yang or ye.
44024013	Bè yi lè 'iwom ashi bè hà ndo shi tyung le ashi be kong fe-m 'ì yi 'igyang a ye.
44024014	Ashi mi da-a 'ì yi le be kong 'igyang a le, mi-i fa Unim betietyan he 'ukwo ahwu befe be de le 'ù yi dell-dell ye. Ukpor mi bong biwom puu abi be fee he 'ushia Iten Umosis lè ashia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim.
44024015	Kitaa ashi befe be bong le bendi puu abe benunung or, abe bebibi or, be ba wum lè he lihwu, kitaa 'imen na mi bong.
44024016	He atan-lengi anwun mi kaa he 'unyong 'uyang-yang hè ugim ugi ù kwu-m utaa-utaa ha Unim or, bendigye or.
44024017	"Mi ma kwu lè 'igbe lè he Ujeruselem he aze gbamm. Mi hà tem gye há lè únde le mi la shang Unim, mi mbee kpell bendi begi.
44024018	He 'unyong ahwu mi maa shi 'imen ashin na be nde-m he Ushom Unim, mi ma mbee lè ashele 'uhwo-gi le mì fel utaa-utaa nya a na Iten ityan i kong. Bendi gbamm be ma yi utung ha ami há ye; linaa li shi há ye.
44024019	Ukpor bendi Ijuus besuso abe be maa be lè he 'ubong Eshia be ma yi há. Bè kwu lè 'iwom ashi bè kong fe-m, hang befe na be be naa-a he 'ushu kong ashi mi shi.
44024020	Gbe ná a ye, wo de abe bè yi nyin le bè kong 'ibibi ashi be ma nde le mi shi he 'unyong ahwu mi ma naa he ashi bikem ukoto,
44024021	fem 'iwom ken ashi mi ma gaa kong há tyang. Mi gaa le: 'Má maa mi ushe 'unyin i likorye mi bong le bendi abe be hwō be ba wum.' "
44024022	Ufelis angwu a ngye dangg gbe lè 'ukwo Ujeso a fe likong Uporl lishi le: "Ukaandi angwu be ko le Ulisias u ba, mà mi tang-a ushe."
44024023	A de undi ishogya angwu u kang Uporl le ù kang he, ukpor ù tyang he he-e ù kwu porr 'unyong 'ususo, u tyang bedim-ma bè be kong lè he, be kpell he.
44024024	Ati a gbe, Ufelis a be lè ungye-ma angwu a ma yi Ijuus, be ko le Udrusila. A kong, be be lè Uporl. A dang 'utyung gyo Uporl ná u bun gbe lè abongale ha Ujeso Ukristi.
44024025	Ukpor he 'unyong ahwu Uporl a gye 'ushu bun gbe lè 'inunung ashele lè 'uhwo akwele lè Liti Ushe Unim angi lı be, Ufelis a fel he 'ushell. A de-e le: "Ndo gye. Mi ndà 'unyong, mà mi mbee ko-a."
44024026	U kong ashin, ù yii ndor lishi le Uporl u ndyebb abwo lè he. He atan-lengi anwun a maa ko he akikye-akikye kong ha ahe.
44024027	Aze a gbe afee, Uporshus Ufestes a fel ukaandi lishi Ufelis. Ufelis a ma tyang Uporl he igaadye likorye a kee le u sha nyin Ijuus.
44025001	Ki zī ati akie ná Ukaandi Ufestes a be wu he Usesaria. A bo lè há gye he Ujeruselem.
44025002	Bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè bekaandi Ijuus be be de-e gbe lè ushe ubell ha Uporl. Be tim Ufestes anung le,
44025003	ù shi nyin ābe gbe he asomale ko Uporl be he Ujeruselem. Be kee le ù shi ashin likorye be kam le be la gie he 'ukwo gwa he.
44025004	Ufestes a kung de be le: "Uporl ù yi he igaadye angi he Usesaria a. Ki shi le baale mì tem gye há.
44025005	Gbe 'ì yi le a shi 'iwom 'ibibi, mà tyang bekaandi bēmen bè fe utung ha ami gye há he Usesaria lè kong 'iwom ashi a shi."
44025006	Ufestes a kwu há lè wu he ati adyong-ikie or, lihwo or, u hà bo ndo he Usesaria. Ashi a taa, a lè kwu he ukoto. A som ko Uporl.
44025007	Uporl a be. Bendi Ijuus abe be be lè he Ujeruselem, be be naa kel-kel fe-e keb akongale biwom bibibi gbamm fe-e. Be ma yi lè 'iwom ashi 'ı tyung le abi be kong bì yi 'igyang a ye.
44025008	Uporl a kung maa ushe uma le: "Mi shi 'iban fe Iten Ijuus or, ngwu mì shi fe Ushom Unim or, ngwu mì shi fe Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom or ye."
44025009	Ufestes a ma kee le u sha nyin Ijuus. Kife na 'i shi-e a bii Uporl le: "Wo kee le wo gya he Ujeruselem, mî lè maa-a ushe há he abi be kong fa-a nyin a?"
44025010	Uporl a de-e le: "Mi-ì yi naa he ukoto Usu ukaandi Urom he 'ipi 'ì yi le bè maa mi ushe a. Wo-gyang wo ngye dangg le mi shi Ijuus 'iwom 'ibibi ye.
44025011	Mì bia uten, mi shi 'iwom ashi le 'ì kpè le bè gwu-m, hang mi swan lihwu ye. Gbe abi be kong fe-m bì yi 'igyang a ye, hà 'ì yi lè undi angwu ù hà ndo kung mi ke be ye. Mi kpo ushe gye he 'ipi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom."
44025012	Ufestes a shi azu ha bendi bema puu. A hà de Uporl le: "Wo kpo ushe gye he 'ipi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom. Há na wo be gye."
44025013	Ki zī ati, usu ususo angwu be ko le Agripa befe lè Ubanis be be le be ba kong lè Ufestes.
44025014	Be kwu há zī ati. Ufestes a de usu gbe lè Uporl le: "Ungikye ususo ù yi hen angwu Ufelis a ma tyang he fe he igaadye.
44025015	He 'unyong ahwu mi ma gye he Ujeruselem, bekaandi Ijuus abe be shang Unim lè abe he 'ubong be ma be hwaa lè mi, kong biwom gbamm fe-e. Be de-m le mì bong le bè gwu-e.
44025016	Mi de be le undi Urom ù hà ndo kung undi angwu be de le a bia uten ka faale afaale a ndè bendi-linaa abe be kong 'imen i fe-e, u maa ushe ha abe ye.
44025017	Befe puu be be. Ashi a taa, mi bo faale 'unyong abanale lè kwu he ukoto, mi som ko Uporl.
44025018	Bendi-linaa bema be bo 'inaa kong, ukpor biwom abi be ma kong fe-e bi ma yi biwom bibibi abi mi gim he lityam ligi le be kong a ye.
44025019	Be maa kee-kee fung fá he gba lè akpe abell lè ungikye ususo angwu be maa ko le Ujeso angwu a ma hwō angwu Uporl u de le ù yi uwum a.
44025020	Mi ma tyāng ná mì tang ushe umen i. Mi hà kung bii Uporl le a kee le u gya he Ujeruselem mî lè maa he ushe há a?
44025021	Uporl a kpo ushe. A de le bè ngyor lè he kwu he igaadye kpamm hè Usu ukaandi hwan ù tang ushe uma. Mi de le bè kang he kpamm mi gbe som le bè te lè he he 'ipi Usu ukaandi Urom."
44025022	Agripa a de Ufestes le: "Mi-í kee le mi gyo ungikye umen i." Ufestes a kung de-e le: "Kuhwo mà wo gyo he."
44025023	Ashi a taa, Agripa befe lè Ubanis be be 'ugwu-ugwu be he afee ukoto he 'ipi bekaandi ishogya lè bekaandi he 'ubong be sho. Ufestes a ma ke ikeb le bè be lè Uporl.
44025024	Ufestes a kung kong le: "Usu Agripa lè men puu abe mà yi utung ha abel nyin, mà nde ungikye angwu Ijuus puu he i nyin or, he Ujeruselem or, be de-m biwom bibibi gbe lè he. Befe puu be kung gaa kong le bè gwu-e.
44025025	Ukpor mi ndè ashi a shi ngwu mì de le bè gwu-e ye. Le bwo ufe-gyang a kpo ushe gye he 'ipi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom, mi de le mi kong hè be bè te lè he há.
44025026	Mì yi lè 'iwom kpa-kpa ashi mì fee de Usu ukaandi Urom gbe lè he ye. Mi be lè he le ù be naa amen he ashi le ha-a wo Usu Agripa, wò maa he ushe ha-a à de-m ashi mì fee.
44025027	Mi gim le 'ì yi 'inunung a le mì som undi igaadye lè hwaa lè Usu ukaandi Urom faale afeeale biwom bibibi abi be kong fe-e ye."
44026001	Agripa a kung de Uporl le: "Wo fel lè libwo le wo maa ushe ugang." Uporl a yor 'ubwo 'uma kong lè usu, u keb akongale le:
44026002	"Usu Agripa, mi ndè le mi zī 'ufe a ná mi naa he ashi agang, mi maa ushe he biwom bibibi puu abi Ijuus i de le mi shi.
44026003	Le bwo wo ngye dangg gbe lè akpe Ijuus lè ifung ibell, mi tim-a anung le wò mbu 'uhwo dang 'utyung gyo mi.
44026004	"Bendi Ijuus puu be ngye ná mi ma yi kung lè há he 'isun 'igi. Bé ngye le mi kwu he 'ubong 'ugi lè he Ujeruselem a kung lè he ukpi-ikwu.
44026005	Befe-gyang be ngye le mi ma yi he likwu Iferesis angi lı ndor iten 'indee-indee a. Gbe 'ì yi le be bong ibong, befe-gyang or be da-a gba lè shi.
44026006	Mi naa i le mà maa mi ushe, le bwo mi ndor lishi ha úkyébb angwu Unim a ma ke betietyan le u wum bendi lè he lihwu a.
44026007	Úkyébb umen i na bendi puu he ashi atyan lihwo lè ngi afee be ndor lishi le be kpa nya a na be fe Unim ishu or, kusu or. Usu, Ijuus i kong abin puu fa-m, le bwo mi ndor lishi ha úkyébb umen i a.
44026008	Ki shi ná a, men Ijuus, ma bong le Unim u wum bendi lè he lihwu ye?
44026009	"Mi-i maa kong le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le mì kaa he 'ukwo 'uyang-yang le mì shi ban lizen Ujeso angwu Unazaret.
44026010	Kife na mi maa shi he Ujeruselem. Mi ma kpe ikeb lè ha bekaandi abe be shang Unim lè kwu bendi gbamm abe be bong ha Ujeso fe he igaadye. He 'unyong ahwu be maa de le bè gwu ābe, mi bong utung ha abe.
44026011	Mi maa ka ābe 'ingie he ishom puu angi be kwu liwu mbee 'unyong kpamm. Mi kaa le mì shi ābe bè tyang abongale ha Ujeso. Mi maa ngywa fa ābe 'indee-indee le mi maa gya he abong bendi or la ka ābe 'ingie."
44026012	"Kimen ashin na 'i ma shi-m mi ma kpe ikeb lè 'isom lè ha bekaandi abe be shang Unim gye he Udamasikos le mi la kwa bendi abongale.
44026013	Usu, he 'unyong ahwu mi ma nde àshì gye há he libwee 'udyan lishi na mi ma nde 'ikung-gbo lè he lifung-atabe ashi 'ı taa hwò libwee, ki taa kel-kel fe li, bel ha bendi abe li ma yi utung.
44026014	Bel puu li mbu shī he itang. Mi-i gyo igie i kong ha ami he igie Ihibru le: 'Usorl, Usorl! Kibang a, wo ke-m 'ingie? Wo do 'uhwo-gang gba he 'ingie ashi wo ke-m ná 'igundu ashi 'ı ti 'ubee fe he unwaa ukwan undi angwu ù yi lè shi nà.'
44026015	Mi kung bii le: 'Atyagi, wo ayang a?' Atyagi Ujeso a kung de-m le: 'Mi Ujeso angwu wo ke-m 'ingie a.
44026016	Bo naa 'inaa. Mi be hwaa lè wo mî waa kung-a ha-a à shi aki ke-m. Kì yi le wò de bendi biwom abi wo ndè lè ha ami 'unyin lè abi mi mbee be tyung-a.
44026017	Mi ba som-a hwaa lè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye; mi be kpan-a lè he abwo abell, befe lè bendi Izwell.
44026018	Kì yi le wò be buu ābe àshì, wo shi ābe bè bel lè he 'ifufebb be he 'ikung-gbo, be bel lè he ikeb Usetan be hwaa lè Unim he-e ù tyang biban bibell ke be gbe he abongale ha ami, hè be bè kwu lè 'iteng he liwu bendi abe Unim a waa ndor ta-ta ke 'uhwo-ma.' "
44026019	Uporl a gye 'ushu kong le: "Usu Agripa, mi ma bia igie angi Ujeso a ma be kong ha ami lè he lifung-atabe ana ye.
44026020	Mi bun igie Unim de bendi puu le bè bel àtyám lè he biban, be hwaa lè Unim, be shi biwom abi bı tyung le be bel àtyám lè he biban. Mi kpi 'imen ashin he Udamasikos lè Ujeruselem, mi hà gye mbee 'ubong Ujudia puu lè abong bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye.
44026021	Kife na 'i ma tan lè shi ngwu Ijuus i ma kwu-m he Ushom Unim le be gwa.
44026022	Unim a kpell mi kung lè há kpamm be wu he liti angi 'unyin i he-m mì bun 'isom de bendi puu, bekaandi or, bebwani or. Kiwom ashi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim lè Umosis be ma de le 'i ba sha na mı kong i. Be ma de le:
44026023	'Kì yi kpe-kpe le Ujeso Ukristi, Undi-likpan, ù be kpe 'ingie hwō, u kwu ukpi-ikwu undi angwu u wum lè he lihwu he-e ù de Ijuus or, bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or, gbe lè 'ikung-gbo ashi likpan 'unyong.' "
44026024	Nya a na Uporl a maa maa ushe uma, Ufestes a kong ikaa-ikaa le: "Uporl, wo fel ngyor lityuo. Lingye ligang li shi-a wo fel ngyor lityuo."
44026025	Uporl a kung de-e le: "Ukaandi Ufestes, mi ngyor lityuo ye. Igie angi mı kong i ì yi 'igyang a, inyin a ye.
44026026	Usu Agripa, mi kong ha awo porr likorye wo ngye gbe lè biwom bimen i. Mí ngye dangg le wo kwu àshì ábi puu likorye biwom bimen i bi ma shi he 'undyell a ye.
44026027	Usu Agripa, wo bong àshi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be fee a? Mi ngye le wo bong."
44026028	Usu Agripa a kung bii Uporl le: "Wo kong le wo sha-m mi fel undi Ukristi he 'anwaa 'unyong aken a?"
44026029	Uporl a de-e le: "Mi kong ha Unim le mà he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg or, mà lè 'igbe or, men lè bendi puu abe ma gyo mi i mà fel ná mì yi, fem ashi le be fe-m ashishilika he igaadye tyang!"
44026030	Usu Agripa lè Ukaandi Ufestes lè Ubanis lè abe be teng puu be bo 'inaa gbe he igye.
44026031	Be hà de bende le: "Ungikye anwun a shi 'iwom ashi bè gwu-e or, ngwu bè fe-e he igaadye or ye."
44026032	Usu Agripa a de Ufestes le: "Ungikye anwun ù kpo ushe gye he 'ipi Usu ukaandi Urom ye, hang wo tyang he abwo."
44027001	Be hà tim le bè som Uporl gye he Itali. Mi Uluk or, mi gye utung ha abe. Be kung Uporl lè bendi igaadye abe be teng fe Ujuliyes he 'ubwo. Ujuliyes umen i a ma yi ukaandi ishogya angi be ko le Liwu ishogya Agestes, Usu ukaandi Urom.
44027002	Li lè ngwee he 'inong lishor ashi 'i maa ndo gbe lè he Adramitiyem lè gbe he Eshia gye he abong angi he 'ibam. Alistakes angwu a maa be lè he 'iteng Umasedonia ashi be ko le Utesalonaika a ma yi utung ha abel.
44027003	Ashi a taa, li wu he Usaidon. Ujuliyes a ma yi lè inung ha Uporl, u tyang he le ù lè kong lè bedim-ma abe be ke-e biwom abi bi baa he.
44027004	Li bo lè há ana gye 'ushu. Le bwo 'ufem 'u maa shi ndè àshì hwaa lè bel, li gbe lè 'inong gwaa ha 'ubong Usaipres ahwu 'ù yi he 'udyan umbwo he 'igie ashi 'ufem 'u maa shi kangg ye.
44027005	Li lè gbe gwaa ha Usilisia lè Upamfilia be he lishi Ulisia angi be ko le Umayira.
44027006	Ukaandi ishogya a ma ndè 'inong há ashi 'i maa ndè àshì be lè he Alezandria gye he Itali. A de le lì lè ngwee āshi.
44027007	Li te tyuo-tyuo ati gbamm. Li kpe 'ingie kpamm li gbe gwaa ha Unades. Kufem 'u nem bong li li te 'ushu ye. Li hà fel lè gbe gwaa ha 'ubong Ukrit ahwu 'ù yi he 'udyan umbwo he 'igie ashi 'ufem 'u maa shi kangg ye. Li lè gbe gwaa ha Usalmoni.
44027008	Li maa gba gwaa he 'ibam; lì yii kpa 'ingie kangg kpamm li gbe be wu he 'ipi be ko le 'ibam ashi 'ı ngbebb ndor binong. Ki ma yi lè 'igbe lè he Ulasia ye.
44027009	Li kwu há kpamm 'i gbe fel li lè begyong he agyele 'ushu likorye 'ifong 'i shul. Uporl a ke be utebb le:
44027010	"Bendi begi, mi gim le kung lè nyin gye 'ushu litan lityan li ba kwa lè begyong. Bigbor abi bì yi hen he afee 'inong or, 'inong 'igyang or, bi ba ban; bendi be be hwō."
44027011	Ukaandi ishogya a bong àshi ugyang 'inong befe lè undi angwu u naa 'inong be kong, fem utebb angwu Uporl a ma ke tyang.
44027012	Kiteng 'imen ashi be ndor binong ana 'i ma ngbebb ashi be kwu lè 'ifong ye. He atan-lengi anwun bendi gbamm he liwu libell, ki ngbebb ābe le bè kaa hè be bè ndè le be nya wa he Ufinis angwu ù yi he 'ubong Ukrit umen ana a? Ki ngbebb ashi be ndor 'inong há lè 'ifong likorye 'ufem 'u maa sha há kangg ye.
44027013	Kanwaa 'ufem 'a keb ashele lè he 'igie umbwo. Bendi abena be maa kong le 'i ngbebb le bè gye 'ushu. Be shwia lè bínde abi bı shi 'inong 'ı naa fe gye he afee 'inong. Be bo litan. Be gbe gwaa ha ungwu 'ibam ashi he Ukrit 'ife-ife-ife.
44027014	He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg 'ufem 'ukaandi 'u keb ashele lè he ugo-igye. Kufem 'umen i, be ko āhwu he igie Beke le northeastern.
44027015	Ku shi kung 'inong. Li maa nem naa āshī gba he 'ufem mbee ye. Li tyang āshi le 'ufem 'ù ndo te lè shi he 'ipi 'u kee.
44027016	Li gbe gwaa ha kakiti 'ubong ake 'à yi he 'udyan umbwo ake be ko le Ukorda he 'igie ashi 'ufem 'u maa shi kangg ye. Li kpe 'ingie shwia lè unwaa 'inong lè fe he 'inong 'ikaandi.
44027017	Be hà bua āshī indi ikaandi kel-kel kpe lishi hè shi 'ì ngie. Kitapwell ashi be ma gyam tye fe 'inong lè he 'usi 'i shi 'ufem 'u maa kung 'inong gye he 'ushu. Le bwo be shell le 'inong 'ibell 'i ba tim fa he 'uyia gwaa ha Ulibia, be pell 'itapwell be he itang le 'ufem 'ù tem kung 'inong 'ikaa-ikaa ye.
44027018	Kufem 'ukaandi 'u shi kpamm ashi a gbe taa. Be hà keb biwom abungale lè he afee 'inong wu gye he umbwo le 'inong 'ì fel fěē.
44027019	Àshì a mbee fem taa, be mbee bung bigbor 'inong wu he umbwo lè 'uhwo-bell.
44027020	Kufem 'ukaandi 'u shi kpamm li ndè libwee or, ngwu ikpen or ye gbe 'igbe kangg. He umbee-likel li wee abwo le li ndo nim.
44027021	Bendi abena be zī lizi ye gbe 'igbe. Uporl a bo 'inaa de be le: "Bendi begi, hang ma ma dang 'utyung gyo mi nyong li ma so he Ukrit. Mà gyo mi, hang li pam biwom abi bi shi fe li nyin.
44027022	Kanaa-anaa i mi tim amen anung le mà wee abwo ye. Undi ken or lè he liwu lityan u ba nim fem 'inong tyang ye.
44027023	Unim angwu mì yi ha ahe 'ubwo, mi fe-e, a som udengell uma hwaa lè mi uhwuhwo lè 'usu.
44027024	A de-m le: 'Uporl, shī shell ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le wò be lè hwaa lè Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom. He 'uhwo 'ugang Unim angwu ù yi lè inung u ba kpan bendi abe bè yi utung ha awo he 'inong.'
44027025	Bendi begi, mà wee abwo ye, likorye mi fe lityam ha Unim le 'i ba kwa nya a na udengell uma a be de-m.
44027026	Kinong 'i ba la tim fa he ungwu 'ibam 'ubong 'ususo ahwu 'ù yi he 'udyan umbwo."
44027027	He ati lihwo lè ngi ande 'ufem 'ukaandi 'u maa kung li 'inong gye 'ushu he umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Umeditereniyen. He 'ididyan 'usu bendi abe be naa 'inong be tyāng le li ndo fel kpee-kpee he ugo-igye.
44027028	Be kung undindi tye fe 'iwom ashi 'ı ngbebb tyàng gye há he umbwo. Be ndè kung lè hen he likwu lè wu he liten umbwo 'i ma yi abee asi adyong-ken. He 'anwaa 'unyong zangg be mbee shi 'itaa 'iwom ken. Be ndè le 'i fel abee asi ande lè ngi lihwo a.
44027029	Be maa shell le nyin 'inong 'i la tya fa he akor akaandi. Be kung bínde bìndè abi be fe bi indi ikaandi tyuu he item 'inong tyàng gye há he umbwo hè bi bì shi 'inong 'ì naa. Be maa fel kong ha Unim le ashi a taa akikye.
44027030	Bendi besuso abe be naa 'inong be kaa hè be bè paa. Be kung unwaa 'inong tyàng he umbwo. Be lam li le be kung bínde a tyàng lè he 'ushu 'inong.
44027031	Uporl a kung de ukaandi ishogya lè ishogya angi i teng le: "Gbe bendi aben be ngyor kwu hen he 'inong ye, hà ma kpan ye."
44027032	Ishogya ana i kung tang indi angi ı kwu unwaa 'inong naa. Unwaa 'inong a kò gbe.
44027033	Ashi a maa ndo taa, Uporl a tim ābe anung le bè zī lizi. A de be le: "Ki fel ati lihwo lè ngi ande ná ma kwu faale lizi azele.
44027034	Mi tim amen anung le mà hā zī lizi. Kì yi kpe-kpe le mà zī lizi hè men mà hwō ye. Udal ugil ken or u ba nim lè ha amen lishi ye."
44027035	Uporl a kong ashin puu, a kung ibred kwu he 'ubwo; u pee Unim he ashi bendi puu, u hà kung bun zī.
44027036	Be fel lè ingie. Befe puu be zī lizi.
44027037	Puu utyan há he afee 'inong li ma yi bendi asi lihwo lè asi bendi akie lè bendi lihwo lè be bedyong-ken.
44027038	Be zī lizi puu, be hà bung bigem azi abi bi teng wu gye he afee umbwo hè 'inong 'ì fel fěē.
44027039	Ashi a taa, bendi 'inong be ndè itang, ukpor be shob āngi ye. Be nde 'iteng ashi umbwo a nyii gye he ugo-igye a. Kiteng 'imen ana 'i ma yi 'uyia-uyia. Be tim le bè kaa hè be bè nde le be nya ta lè 'inong há a?
44027040	Be kung indindi bínde abi bı shi 'inong 'ı naa tang tyàng gye he umbwo. Be pell indi angi be bua bikpakpaa 'inong hè be bè nong āshi 'ushu gye he 'ipi be kee. Be gyam 'itapwell ashi lè he 'ushu 'inong hè 'ufem 'ù nyii kung āshi gye he 'ushu. Be bo ndo he ugo-igye.
44027041	Kinong 'i lè tim fe he 'uyia he afee umbwo. Kushu 'inong 'u lè gbe fe he 'uyia, kù nem fem lè há ye. Kufem 'ukaandi 'u shi; ushob umbwo a paa item 'inong.
44027042	Ishogya i shi ugim le ì gwu igaadye teng i kwob umbwo gya he ugo-igye, i paa nim.
44027043	Ukaandi ishogya a swan likorye a kee le u gwa Uporl ye. A de bendi abe be kwob umbwo mbeè le befe hwan bè geb tye he umbwo 'ushu hè be bè kwob umbwo gye he ugo-igye,
44027044	hè abe be teng bè kwu abwo he bigie bikpakpaa pwom ābe lè he item. Nyin 'itaa i na bel puu li gbe tang he ugo-igye.
44028001	Li tang he ugo-igye, li bii gyo le be ko 'ubong 'umen ahwu 'ù yi he 'udyan umbwo ana le Umalta.
44028002	Bendi 'ubong 'umen ana be ma yi lè inung ha abel kangg. Umbwo a maa ndo ndor; ligwu lì yii sha. Be hwee 'inde ndor li bel puu le lì gwee.
44028003	Uporl a tor ìkwán fong he 'ubwo be fe he 'inde. Kinde 'i shī ùshiı angwu a ma yi há he ikwan, a fem be ngmam Uporl he 'ubwo ngyor tyuu há.
44028004	Bendi abe há he 'ubong 'umen ana be nde ùshiı ù yi tyuú he he 'ubwo. Be de bendi le: "Kì shi na ana ungikye anwun ù yi undi-ihwu a. Mà na a hwaa lè he umbwo ukaandi or, u hwa he 'ibibi ashi a shi."
44028005	Uporl a mbi ùshiı tyàng he 'inde. Ùshiı a shi-e 'iwom ye.
44028006	Be baa lishi ná 'ubwo 'uma 'u mbwee kaa; be baa ná u mbu hwō kaa. Be baa lishi gbe 'igbe hè be bè ndè ná 'iwom ashi 'i wa shi ngye ye, kı shi-e. Be nde ye, be gie ugim ubell. Be fel da le ù yi unim a.
44028007	Itang ungikye angwu be ko le Upubliyes i ma yi há kpee-kpee. Ungikye umen i a ma yi usu 'ubong 'umen ana a. A kpe li gye lè bel ha ahe ushaale lè shi li ngbebb-ngbebb. Li kwu há ati akie.
44028008	Ātyām Upubliyes umen i a ma yi gogo ye. Inyiahwo i maa shá he; kutaa 'u taa he. Uporl a gye ha ahe 'ipo lè kong ha Unim ke-e; u pwom he abwo, a mbee.
44028009	He 'unyong ahwu ashin 'i shi, bendi-angmam gbamm be be há, be mbee.
44028010	Be ke li beke gbamm. He 'unyong ahwu li maa ndo gye, be fe li biwom gbamm he 'inong abi bì lè kpell li he litan.
44028011	Afell akie a gbe, li ngwee 'inong ashi 'i ma yi há lè 'ifong. Kinong 'imen ana 'i maa ba lè he Alezandria a. Be ko āshi le Ìnīm angi ì yi bégbé.
44028012	Li gbe lè he 'ubong Umalta lè wu he Usirakuz. Li kwu há ati akie.
44028013	Li ngwee 'inong lè há gye he Uregyem. Ashi a taa, kufem 'u keb ashele lè he 'igie umbwo. He liti angi lefee li wu he Uputiyoli. Li shul lè he 'inong.
44028014	Li ndè bendi abongale besuso há. Be ngie fe li le lì kwu ha abe há ati adyong-ifee. Li hà gbe ndo he Urom ha abee.
44028015	Bendi abongale abe há he Urom be gyo le li fel he 'ukwo. Be be kwu he 'ate ake he Apiyes lè lishi angi be ko le Ìshōm begaandi ikie, nyong li. Uporl a nde be; a pee Unim; u fel lè ingie.
44028016	Li lè wu he Urom. Ukaandi ishogya a ke Uporl ikeb le befe lè undi ishogya angwu u kang he bè kwu he ushom angwu ù yi ta-ta.
44028017	Ati a gbe akie, Uporl a ko bekaandi Ijuus abe be ndē he Urom be he 'iteng ken. Be be puu. A de be le: "Bebuye, mà na mi shi 'iwom ban bendi betyan or, ngwu itetel angi li kpe lè ha betietyan ye or, be kwu-m fe he igaadye he Ujeruselem. Be kung mi ke bendi Urom.
44028018	Bendi Urom be bii mi bibibi. Be maa la tyang mi abwo, likorye be ndè 'iwom ashi mi shi ngwu bè gwu-m ye.
44028019	Ijuus i swan ashin. He atan-lengi anwun, ki ma yi-m kpe-kpe le mì kpo ushe gye he 'ipi Usu ukaandi angwu he Urom, mà na mi ma yi lè 'iwom ashi mì kong fe bendi begi ye or.
44028020	Atan-lengi angwu mi ko amen mî kong ha amen ù yi le be fe-m ashishilika anyin, likorye mi bong ha undi angwu bel, bendi Izwell, li ndor lishi nyong he a."
44028021	Be hà de-e le: "Li wa kpē 'ushia ahwu Ijuus i fee lè he Ujudia gbe lè wo ngye ye. Bendi betyan or be wa be lè há, be kong 'ibibi gbe lè wo ngye ye.
44028022	Li kee le li ngya àshi wo-o gim gbe lè 'imen i. Lí ngye le bendi be kong ban likwu bendi bemen abe wò yi he liwu libell i mbee bipi puu."
44028023	Befe lè Uporl be kung liti ndor. Bendi abe be ma be he 'ipi Uporl a ma yi nya he liti limen ana be fel go hwò abe lè he ukpi-ikwu. A bun 'isom 'ima ashi gbe lè Kusu Unim de be, kung leèti gyebb likwulukwu. A maa kaa he-e ù shi ābe bè bong ha Ujeso gbe he aboale lè he ashia Iten Umosis lè ashia bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim.
44028024	Besuso be bong gbe he ashi a kong, ukpor besuso be bong ye.
44028025	Be gbe lè há lè ifung ha bende. Ashi 'i shi ābe be gbe lè há lè ifung 'ì yi le Uporl a de le: "Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ma kong 'igyang a, he 'unyong ahwu a ma kong ha betiemen gbe ha Azaya, undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim.
44028026	A ma de le: 'Lè de bendi bemen i le Unim a de le, "Ma ba gyo agyoale ufe-ufe-ufe, ukpor 'i nung amen ye; ma nde andele ufe-ufe-ufe, ukpor ma shob ye."
44028027	Unim a de ashin, likorye be teb àtyám, be kpo 'utyung, be shi àshì kpi-kpi. Gbe 'ì yi ná a ye, kiwom 'i nung ābe, be gyo, be nde shob, mà be bel hwaa lè mi Unim, mà mi kpan ābe.' "
44028028	Uporl a mbee de be le: "Mi kee le mà ngye le Unim a som 'isom 'ima ashi gbe lè likpan 'unyong hwaa lè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye. Be ba dang 'utyung gyo āshi." [
44028029	Uporl a kong ashin puu, Ijuus i gbe lè há, ì yi fa ifung ha bende kangg.]
44028030	Uporl a kwu aze afee he ushom angwu a ma kpē. A gor kpē bendi puu abe be maa be le be ba kong lè he.
44028031	A maa bun 'isom 'inunung gba lè Kusu Unim, u hwua bendi gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi. A maa kong porr faale 'ushell.
45001001	Mi Uporl, angwu mì yi uboyi Ujeso Ukristi, na mı fee 'ushia ahwun. Unim a waa kung mi le mì kwu unwaa-isom uma, u som mi le mì lè bun 'isom 'inunung Unim.
45001002	Kisom 'inunung 'imen i na leěti Unim a ma ke úkyébb gbe ha bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima, befe be fee āshi he 'ushia Unim.
45001003	Kisom 'inunung 'imen i 'ì yi gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi Unwaa-ma á. Ná undigye, a be ūbū lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Udebid á.
45001004	Ná Unim, kife na a wum lè he lihwu gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim. Ashina 'i tyung gboo le ù yi Unwaa Unim a.
45001005	Gbe ha ahe, Unim a tyung inung ima ha ami, u waa mi le mì kwu unwaa-isom uma le he lizen lima mî be lè bendi lè he abong puu be be bong ha ahe, be ke-e ife.
45001006	Men or titi mà yi he liwu bendi abe Unim a ko le bè kwu bendi Ujeso Ukristi.
45001007	Mi fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè men puu he Urom abe 'i nyin Unim lè men, abe a waa kung le mà kwu bendi bema. Unim Atyetyan lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi bè hā ke men 'ukwun, be shi 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa.
45001008	He lizen Ujeso Ukristi, mi pee Unim ugi he 'uhwo 'umen, likorye bendi mbee igye puu be gyo ná ma bong ha Ujeso Ukristi.
45001009	Unim angwu mı shi-e aki lityam ken he abunale 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Unwaa-ma, a naa mi ushada le mi kong ha ahe mbee 'unyong ka amen.
45001010	Mbee 'unyong puu mi kong ha Unim, mi bii he le gbe 'i ngbebb he, ù ma buu mi 'ukwo mî be ha amen há.
45001011	Mì yi lè 'igyor kangg le hang mi nde men, hè abele ugi há ù be lè 'ukwun lè ha Ukatia Kunyong Unim ke men, 'u shi amen ma naa genn fe Unim.
45001012	Àshi mı kong ana 'i ze le, mi kee le bel lè men lì kpell bende, ugi abongale u fa amen ingie, umen u fe-m mi ingie.
45001013	Bebuye, mi kee amen le mà ngye le, kpamm be wu 'unyin i, mi kaa le mî be ha amen há, mi nda 'unyong ye. Mi kee le mi ba há, mi shi aki angi a kwu lè lifem linunung he liwu līmen ná mi shi he abong angi a teng.
45001014	Kì yi kpe-kpe le mì bun 'isom 'inunung de bendi puu. Kì yi le mì bun āshi de bendi abe be buu àshì, lè abe bè so àshì kpi-kpi, mì bun de abe be ngye 'ushia, lè abe be ngye 'ushia ye.
45001015	He ashin, mì yi lè 'igyor kangg le mi bun 'isom 'inunung da amen abe he Urom or titi.
45001016	Ishwia i sha-m he abunale 'isom 'inunung ashin ye. Gbe he 'isom 'inunung 'imen i na Unim u kpan bendi puu abe be bong ha ahe. Be bun āshi de Ijuus, saa be hà bun de abe bè yi Ijuus a ye.
45001017	Kisom 'inunung 'imen i 'i tyung ná 'anaa-anaa i Unim u shi bendi be fel benunung he ashi ama kee-kee gbe he abongale ufe-ufe, gbe he 'isuso pel ha abongale ye. Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Undi angwu Unim a shi-e a fel ununung he ashi ama likorye a bong ha ahe na u kwu lè likpan ligyang angyell."
45001018	Unim u tyung le ù yi lè ingywo ha biban lè bibibi abi bendi be shi, likorye 'ibibi 'ibell 'i shī ndyell 'igyang.
45001019	Unim a ke be 'ingie, likorye be shi 'iban mà na be ngye gbe lè Unim or, likorye Unim ugyang a tyung ābe abin.
45001020	Kung lè há 'unyong ahwu Unim a shi igye anyin puu, biwom abi a shi bi tyung bendi gboo 'itaa Unim ù yi, mà na be nde-e lè atong-shi ye or. Bi tyung gboo le ikeb ima ì yi 'itaa ken ngyor igye, bi tyung le ù yi Unim ugyang angwell a. He atan-lengi anwun, bendi-biban abena bè yi lè ashi be kwu 'ubwo hwaa ingywo Unim ye.
45001021	Mà na be ngye gbe lè Unim or, be ke-e ife angi i keè ha ahe or, ngwu bè pee he or ye. Igim ibell i fel 'idideng, be fel he 'ifufebb, ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa 'ì tem nung ābe ye.
45001022	Be kong le bè yi dangg, ukpor bè yi bikwo a.
45001023	Àshi le bè fe Unim angwu a dyam, u hwō ye, be tem fel fa litelakpa angi be tān ná bendigye abe be hwō, lè linyun, lè inyia, lè bishishi biwom puu abi bı su lifung he itang a.
45001024	He ashina Unim a tyang ābe abwo le bè ndo shi bibibi abi be kee, be mbee shi biwom ishwia ha bende.
45001025	Be swan 'igyang ashi gbe lè Unim, be fel tàn he akwo iman. Be fa biwom abi Unim a shi a, fem Unim ugyang angwu a shi biwom puu tyang. Ki shi le Unim a kpè le bè pee he ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor ná Unim a kong.
45001026	He atan-lengi anwuna Unim a tyang ābe abwo le bè ndo shi biwom ishwia abi bì yi bigyor bibell. Bengingye bebell or be tyang bengikye tem fel gbà ipel ha bende ashi 'i tel Unim kangg.
45001027	Bengikye or titi, be tyang andēle ipel ha bengingye tem fel nda ipel ha bende. Biwom abi be shi bì yi ishwia-ishwia. Be ba lè ushe Unim angwu a keè nya swa 'uhwo-bell he lishi.
45001028	Bwo be fe ukaa swan le be ka Unim ife ye, Unim a tyang ābe abwo le bè ndo pwom igim ibibi ibell he biwom ashele abi bì yi le undi ù shi ye.
45001029	Àtyám abell à yi sho lè biban lè bibibi, be ndor lishi biwom bendi, be sha 'ibibi ha bende, be ban lityam fe 'iwom undi, be gwu bendi, be shwan 'ushwan, be ndo 'undo, be lam bendi, be bell bendi 'ibibi, be kèm bende,
45001030	be kong bia bendi, be shi bendi-linaa Unim, be kaa lishi, be dim idim, be pwom ungwu, mbee 'unyong puu be gim 'ukwo 'ufufe ahwu bè shi 'iban, be fa betyabell or, ngwu bendabell or ye.
45001031	Bè tem ngya atyetye 'inunung lè 'ibibi ye, be ndor íkyébb ibell ye, bè yi lè inung or, ngwu beshi or, ha bendi ye.
45001032	Mà na be ngye le Unim a de le bendi abe be shi bitaa biwom abina be ba lè lihwu ka 'uhwo-bell or, bè so-i gya 'ushu sha ābi. Ashina 'ife-ife a ye, nyong bendi be shi biwom abin, befe be bong le be shi 'i ngbebb.
45002001	Udim-gi, wo angwu wo de le bendi abe be teng be sha 'i ngbebb ye, ndè le wo ngye le wo-gyang or wò yi lè ashi wo kwu 'ubwo hwaa ingywo Unim ye? Nyong wo de le undi-iso a shi 'i ngbebb ye, hà wo de le wo-gyang na wo shi 'i ngbebb ye, likorye wo-gyang wo sha bimen abi befe be shi ana.
45002002	Li ngye le nyong Unim u maa ushe tang libi ke bendi abe be shi bitaa biwom bimen ana, ushe uma ù yi kpa-kpa.
45002003	Wo da le bendi abe be shi biwom abi 'itaa ana be shi 'i ngbebb ye, ukpor wo-o sha biwom bimen ana. Wo-o gim le wo ba hwaa ushe Unim bee?
45002004	Pisoye wo gim le, le bwo Unim a ngbebb inung kangg, u shi lè lityam angibale, ù tem ba maa-a ushe ye. Ndè le wo ngye le atan-lengi angwu Unim ù yi lè inung lè beshi ha awo ù yi le he-e ù ka-a 'ukwo ha-a à gie lè he akwo agang?
45002005	Ukpor wo kaa lishi, wo swan le wo gie lè he akwo agang ye, wo shì 'ingie 'igang 'i fel ba dyam kangg. Wo ba kpa 'ingie 'igang ana nyá Liti angi Unim u be tyung ingywo ima gboo, u maa bendi puu ushe dell-dell.
45002006	Nya Liti limen ana Unim u ba ka undi uyang-yang 'uke keè ha ashi angwu há a shi.
45002007	Bendi abe be gye 'ushu shi 'inunung, be kung àshì abell ndor he ifem lè ife lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye, Unim u ba ka ābe likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm.
45002008	Bendi besuso be gim 'uhwo-bell 'ufe-ufe a, be kpē 'igyang ye, be shi bibibi he akwo ayang-yang. Befe na Unim, he ingywo ima, u ba ka ābe 'ingie 'i gba itie.
45002009	Bendi puu abe be shi 'iban, be ba kpa 'ingie 'i dyam kangg, mà bè kwu Ijuus or, mà bè kwu Ijuus a ye or.
45002010	Ukpor Unim u ba dyam bendi puu abe be shi 'inunung, u fem ābe, u shi ābe be kwu he ikwun, mà bè yi Ijuus or, mà bè yi Ijuus a ye or.
45002011	Bendi puu bè yi Unim 'itaa ken.
45002012	Bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, be ngye Iten Umosis ye; mà na or, gbe be shi 'iban, be nim likpan 'ūnyōng libell faale ushe amaale gbe he Iten imen ana. Bendi Ijuus abe be ngye Iten imen ana or titi, gbe be shi 'iban, Unim u maa ushe ka ābe libi, likorye be ngye Iten imen ana ukpor be ndor āngi ye.
45002013	Unim u kpā undi le ù yi ununung le bwo a gyo Iten imen ana a ye, u fel ununung he ashi Unim le bwo a ndor āngi a.
45002014	Nyong bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, abe be ngye Iten imen ana ye, be shi nya a na Iten imen ana i kong, be tyung le be ngye he atyam abell ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa le bè shi, mà na be ngye Iten imen ana ye or.
45002015	Abi be shi bi tyung le Iten imen ana ì yi he atyam abell. Igim ibell i tyung ābe ashi 'i ngbebb lè ashi 'i ban. I da ābe nyong be shi ashi 'i ngbebb lè nyong be shi ashi 'i ban.
45002016	Kitaa ana na Unim u be maa bendi ushe gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi nya Liti limen angi u be maa bendi ushe he biwom 'undyell abi be shi. U ba sha ashin nya a na mi bun de men he 'isom 'inunung ashi mı bun.
45002017	Kì yi lè bendi há liwu līmen abe be de le, befe bè yi Ijuus a. Wo 'itaa undi 'imen ana, wo da le 'i kwun-a awo he 'uhwo, likorye wo ngye Iten imen ana, wo pwom ungwu le wo-ò yi undi Unim a.
45002018	Wo ngye ashi Unim a kee le wò shi, bwo be hwua-a Iten imen ana; wo fel ngye ashi 'i ngbebb, wo ngye ashi 'i ngbebb ye.
45002019	Wo gim ha awo lityam le wo kpè angwu wo tyung uhwua-ashi 'ukwo, wo kwu 'ikung-gbo ke abe bè yi he 'ifufebb;
45002020	wo gim le wo kpè angwu wo tebb àbe bè yi kpel-ye, wo hwua àbe be wa ngye 'iwom ye. Wo gim le Iten imen ana i ka-a lingye, i fem 'igyang tyung-a.
45002021	Ki ngbebb! Bwo wo na wo hwua àbe be teng, kibang a, wo hwua 'uhwo-gang ufe ye? Wo-o bun da bendi le, bè zì 'azi ye. Hà wo ufe? Wo zà a?
45002022	Wo da bendi le bè kee ungye undi ye. Hà wo ufe? Wo kee ungye undi a? Wo da bendi le bè shi ikem ye. Wo zì kung biwom lè he ishom ikem a?
45002023	Wo pwom ungwu le wo ngye Iten imen ana. Kibang a, wo be lè ibia ke lizen Unim gbe he abanale Iten imen ana a?
45002024	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye be kong bia lizen Unim gba he likpe līmen Ijuus."
45002025	Lìten lì yi 'itaa ashi 'ı tyung le men Ijuus mà yi bendi Unim a, gbe ma ndor Iten imen ana; ukpor gbe ma ban āngi, hà lìten līmen lì yi 'idideng. Mà ndo tyang atenale 'ugbe ken.
45002026	Gbe undi a ten ye, ukpor u ndor Iten imen ana, Unim u kpa he le ù yi undi uma nya a na abe be ten a.
45002027	Kitaa ana na bendi abe be ndor Iten imen ana, mà na be ten ye or, be tyung gboo le men abe ma ngye Iten ma zī libi. Men ma ngye Iten imen angi be fee fe he 'ushia, ma mbee ten, ukpor ma ndor Iten imen ana ye.
45002028	Mà undi ù ten or, ashina 'i shi-e a fel undi Ijuus ugyang angwell a ye. Lìten ligyang angyell lì yi 'iwom ashi be ndè lè atong-shi a ye.
45002029	Undi Ijuus ugyang angwell ù yi undi angwu Unim a gié he lìtyám gbe ha Ukatia Kunyong uma a, gbe he Iten a ye. Undi angwu 'itaa ana, Unim na u pee he, undigye a ye.
45003001	Nyong 'ì yi nyin, kibang 'ì hà yi lifem le undi ù kwu Ijuus? Kibang 'ì hà yi lifem le undi ù ten?
45003002	Kì yi lè lifem he akwo gbamm. Ukpi-ikwu, bendi Ijuus na Unim a ma kpi 'ikwu kung igie ima fe be he 'ubwo.
45003003	Bwo bendi Ijuus besuso be shi ashi Unim a kong ye, kutyung akwomale 'ubell 'ú nya shi Unim le ù tem shi ashi a kong le u sha ye a?
45003004	Dia! Mà bendi puu he igye anyin bè swan le be fa Unim ye or, mbee 'unyong puu Unim ufe u sha ashi a kong. Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Wo Unim, kunyong 'uyang-yang wo kong igie, ki nung nwongg le igie igang ì yi 'igyang. Nyong be kaa-a ndè, mbee 'unyong puu wo hwà."
45003005	Ukpor pisoye bendi besuso be da le 'ibibi ashi lı shi 'i sha bendi be ndà 'inunung Unim, hà ashina 'i ze le ana a? Ki ze le Unim u sha 'ibibi a, nyong u ke li 'ingie he biban bityan a?
45003006	Dia! Abi bendi be tan kong ana. Gbe Unim ù yi ununung ye, u ba tang bendigye ushe ná a?
45003007	Pisoye undi-iso u da le uman uma u sha bendi be nda 'igyang Unim gboo, be pee Unim. He ashina, kibang a, Unim u tang libi ke-e le ù yi undi-iban a?
45003008	Bitaa bendi abena be da le: "Bwo 'ì yi 'itaa ana a, mà lì gye 'ushu shi 'ibibi le hè bendi bè ndè 'inunung Unim." Bendi besuso be fel bà iman or le bel na li kong ashina. Unim u ka ābe 'ingie ashi 'i keè nya dell-dell.
45003009	Fe, bel Ijuus ife lì yi he libwo linunung hwò bendi abe be teng a? Kpaa ye! Mi bè kong mà le, bendi puu, mà Ijuus or, mà bendi abe be teng or, befe puu bè yi 'itaa ken, puu ubell bè yi he abwo 'iban.
45003010	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Kì yi lè undi ken or angwu ù yi ununung he ashi Unim ye.
45003011	Kì yi lè undi angwu 'igyang 'i nung he ye. Kì yi lè undi angwu u pwom 'ukwo Unim ye.
45003012	Undi uyang-yang a swan 'ukwo Unim. Befe a puu be fel 'idideng. Undi ken-ken or a teng angwu u shi 'inunung ye.
45003013	Igie ibell i ban ná likwun ungwu hwuo. Be lam bendi lè iman angi i sho he ingwu ibell gbamm. Igie ibell i do nya a na bezu ūshiı a.
45003014	Ingwu ibell i sho lè àtyé, i sho lè igie ibibi.
45003015	Be buù he abee mbee bipi hà do bendi, be gwu bendi.
45003016	He 'iteng 'iyang-yang be gye, be tan lè 'utor lè linim ka bendi.
45003017	Be ngye ná be kwu ikwun-ikwun ye gbangg.
45003018	Be shell Unim or ye."
45003019	Li ngye le Iten angi Unim a ma ke, ì yi ke bendi abe a ke be ángi a. He ashina 'ì yi lè 'iwom ashi undi u kwu 'ubwo hwaa ye; undi uyang-yang u ba naa maa ushe he 'ushu Unim.
45003020	Kì yi lè undi angwu a ndor Iten he-e ù kwu ununung he ashi Unim ye. Àshi Iten ife i shi 'ì yi le i tyung undi 'iban 'ima a.
45003021	Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i Unim a tyung gboo 'ukwo ahwu u shi bendi be fel benunung he ashi ama. Kukwo ahwun 'u gbe kpee Iten Umosis ye, mà na Iten imen ana lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be ma kong gbe lè hwu or.
45003022	Unim u sha bendi be fel benunung he ashi ama gba he abongale ubell ha Ujeso Ukristi a. U sha ashin ka bendi puu abe be bong, mà bè yi Ijuus or, mà bè yi Ijuus a ye or, kì yi lè atyetye ye.
45003023	Bendi puu be shi 'iban, be gyan ìfém Unim.
45003024	Ukpor gbe he inung Unim lè beshi bema, u shà bendi be tem fel benunung gba ha Ujeso Ukristi angwu a pong li 'uke.
45003025	Unim a kung he ke le bè shang, le gbe he anung ama Unim ù tyang biban bityan ke li, bel abe li bong ha ahe. Unim a shi ashin he-e ù tyung 'inunung 'ima a. Leěti a maa ngib lityam nda biban bendi gba àshì wa.
45003026	Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i a shi 'ukwo ahwu u tyang biban ke bendi, u tyung le ù yi ununung, u mbee tyung le u sha undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha Ujeso u kwa ununung.
45003027	He ashina, kì nya yi lè 'iwom ashi bel lì kung pwom ungwu a? Kpaa ye! Kì yi le bwo li ndor Iten imen ana na lì yi benunung i ye, kì yi le bwo li bong ha Ujeso Ukristi a.
45003028	Ki nung nwongg le undi u fel ununung he ashi Unim, gbe a bong ha Ujeso Ukristi a, ki gbe kpee Iten Umosis ye gbangg.
45003029	Unim ù yi ke Ijuus ife-ife â? Ù yi ke bendi abe be teng befe ye a? Ù yi ke bendi puu,
45003030	bwo Unim ù kee-kee yi a ken a. U kpa bendi Ijuus abe be ten le bè yi benunung, gbe be bong ha Ujeso Ukristi a. Kitaa a ken, u kpe bendi abe be ten ye le bè yi benunung, gbe be bong ha Ujeso Ukristi.
45003031	Bwo 'ì yi le undi u fel ununung he ashi Unim gba he abongale a, ashin 'i ze le Iten ife i mbee â? Dia, li tyung bendi ashi 'ì yi 'ikwu Iten a.
45004001	Hà Ebraham angwu ù yi atietyan, bel Ijuus ufe? Unim a ma kpe-e le ù yi ununung le bwo a shi aki â?
45004002	Kì be kwu le Unim ù kpē Ebraham le ù yi ununung he áshi a shi a, hang ù yi lè ashi u pwom ungwu gbe lè shi. Ukpor ù yi lè ashi u pwom ungwu gbe lè shi he ashi Unim ye.
45004003	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Ebraham a ma fe lityam ha Unim, he ashina Unim a kpe-e ná undi ununung he ashi ama."
45004004	Nyong undi u shi aki, be ka he únde he aki angi a shi. Ashina 'ì yi 'uke a ye, ki yi he 'ingie 'ima a.
45004005	Gbe undi u fe lityam he aki angi ufe-gyang a shi a ye, ukpor u fe lityam ha Unim angwu u shi bendi-iban be fel benunung a, Unim u kpa undi umen ana le ù yi ununung gbe he abongale uma.
45004006	Udebid or a kong 'itaa a ken, nyong a kong gbe lè igor angi ì yi ke undi angwu Unim a kpe-e ná undi ununung he ashi ama fem aki ama tyang.
45004007	A de le: "Igor ì yi ke bendi abe Unim a tyang biban bibell ke be, u mbee lè bibibi bibell.
45004008	Igor ì yi ke undi uyang-yang angwu biban bima, Unim u tem well ābi ye."
45004009	Bendi abe be ten befe-befe na igor imen i ì yi ke be a, hà ì yi ke abe be ten ye or titi? Li bè kong mà le Unim a ma kpē Ebraham le ù yi ununung gbe he abongale uma a.
45004010	He 'unyong ahwu a ma kpe Ebraham le ù yi undi ununung ana, a ma ten mà a? Dia, nya he 'unyong 'umen ana a ma wa ten ye.
45004011	He 'unyong ahwu a ma so 'ididim, a ma bong ha Unim; he ashina Unim a ma kpe-e le ù yi ununung. Unim a hà kung de-e le ù ten hè 'ì kwu 'itaa le Unim a kpe-e le ù yi ununung. Kitaa ana na Ebraham a fel ātyām bendi puu abe be bong ha Unim, Unim u kpe be le bè yi benunung, mà na be ten ye or.
45004012	U mbee shi ātyām bendi abe be ten, gbe be bong ha Unim ná Ebraham a ma bong kung lè há 'unyong ahwu a ma so 'ididim.
45004013	Leěti Unim a ma ke Ebraham lè igia ima úkyébb le u ba kung igye anyin fa abe he 'ubwo. Unim a ma ke be úkyébb anwun le bwo be ndor Iten Umosis a ye, a ma ke be ahe le bwo Ebraham a bong ha ufe Unim a, he ashina Unim a kpe-e ná undi ununung he ashi ama.
45004014	Kì be kwu le abe be ndor Iten Umosis na be kpe abi Unim a kyebb, hang ashin 'i ze le abongale ù yi 'idideng, úkyébb Unim u shi lè lifem ye.
45004015	Gbe undi a ngye Iten Umosis, hà ban āngi, u kpa 'ingie. Ukpor he 'ipi iten ì yi ye, bendi be ban iten ye.
45004016	He ashina, gbe he abongale na undi u kpe úkyébb Unim hè 'ì tyung gboo le 'ì kee-kee yi he inung Unim na a ke li úkyébb uma. U sha úkyébb anwun ka igia Ebraham puu 'uke, u kee-kee ka igia angi i ndor Iten Umosis a ye, u ka angi i bong ha ufe Unim ná Ebraham a ma bong. Ebraham ù yi atyetyan, bel puu abe li bong ha Unim.
45004017	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le Unim a de Ebraham le: "Mi sha-a wo fel ātyām abong gbamm." Ebraham a kpē úkyébb anwun nya he ashi Unim ugyang a, Unim angwu ufe a bong ha ahe. Unim umen i na u wum akwom, u ko bendi abe be wa hwan ābe ye or le bè kwu bendi bema, u kung ābe fel ná be hwan ābe mà á nà.
45004018	Ebraham a ma gye 'ushu fe lityam ha Unim, mà na àshī Unim a kyebb he 'i maa ndo gba ishu or. He ashin Ebraham a ma fel ātyām abong gbamm nya a na Unim a de-e. Be fee he 'ushia Unim le Unim a de Ebraham le: "Igia igang i ba go 'ugii kangg ná ikpen he 'usi."
45004019	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Ebraham a maa ndo fel aze asi adyong, a ma ndè 'uhwo-ma a fel ná likwom nà, u ngye le ungye-ma a gbe ìshù lihwan. Mà na or, a ma gye 'ushu fe lityam ha Unim.
45004020	A ma fel igim ifee gbe lè úkyébb Unim ana ye. A ma tem fel pee Unim a. He ashina a ma fel fe lityam ha Unim fel gbe gyong.
45004021	A ngye dangg le Unim ù yi lè ikeb le u sha nya a na a ke úkyébb.
45004022	Gbe he abongale uma na Unim a ma kpe-e le ù yi ununung.
45004023	Ukpor Ebraham ufe-ufe na Unim a kpe-e le ù yi ununung ye,
45004024	a kpe li bel puu titi ná. U kpa li le lì yi benunung, gbe li bong ha ufe Unim angwu a wum Atyetyan Ujeso lè he lihwu.
45004025	Ujeso umen i na leěti be ma gwu-e he 'uhwo biban bityan, ukpor Unim a wum he lè he lihwu le he-e ù shi li lì fel benunung he ashi ama.
45005001	Le bwo 'ì yi le Unim a kpe li le li fel benunung gbe he abongale utyan, li fel ikwun ha Unim gbe ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
45005002	Ujeso Ukristi na a buu li 'ukwo le lì ngye inung Unim gbe he abongale utyan ha ahe. U tyung inung Unim ha abel, bel li yal gor, likorye li ndor lishi le li ba kwa ipel ha Unim he ifem ima.
45005003	Li yal gor he bingie or titi, likorye li ngye le 'ingie 'i sha li li naa genn,
45005004	anaale genn u shi li li kaa kpè, akaale kpè u shi li li kwu lè lishi andorale ha Unim le u sha ná a kyebb.
45005005	Gbe lì yi lè lishi andorale 'itaa ana, lishi andorale lityan li kwa 'idideng ye, likorye Unim a ke li Ukatia Kunyong uma angwu u shi li lı kwu lè benyin Unim he atyam atyan kangg.
45005006	He 'unyong ahwu li ma yi lè ukpell ke 'uhwo-tyan ye, Ujeso Ukristi a ma be hwō ke li bel bendi-iban he 'unyong ahwu Unim a ndor.
45005007	Kì yi lè 'ingie ná undi u bong hwō ke undi ununung or. Pisoye undi u nya mba lityam kam le u hwa ka undi angwu a ngbebb.
45005008	Ukpor Ujeso Ukristi a hwō ke li bel, nyong li ma so bendi-iban. Kitaa ana na Unim a tyung ná 'i nyin he lè bel 'indee-indee.
45005009	Le bwo Unwaa-ma, Ujeso Ukristi, a wu anung he 'uhwo 'utyan, Unim a kpe li le lì yi benunung. He ashina, kì yi faale ifung le u fel kpan li lè he ingywo Unim.
45005010	Nyong li ma yi bendi-linaa Unim a, gbe he lihwu Ujeso Ukristi a shi li li fel ikwun ha Unim. Bwo 'anaa-anaa i li fel ikwun ha Unim a, Ujeso angwu ù yi uwum u ba kpan li mbee akekel puu.
45005011	Ashin 'ife-ife a ye. Li yal gor he 'uhwo ashi Unim a shi ke li gbe ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, angwu a shi li li fel ikwun ha Unim.
45005012	Leěti undi ken angwu ù yi Adam a ma shi 'iban. He ashina 'iban 'i fel he igye anyin, ki be lè lihwu. Kitaa ana na lihwu li keb li fel gwu bendi puu likorye bendi puu be shi 'iban.
45005013	Ki nung nwongg le 'iban 'i ma fel hen he igye mà ukpong Unim u hà ke Umosis Iten. Ukpor he 'ipi uten ù yi ye, be bo 'iban fa undi ye.
45005014	Kpi kung lè he 'unyong ahwu Adam a shi 'iban kpamm be wu he 'unyong Umosis na lihwu li keb li fel gwu bendi puu, mà besuso bè yi lè abwo he abanale uten Unim ipel ha Adam ye or. Mà lì ndè ná Adam ù yi 'itaa ken ha undi angwu Unim a kyebb le u ba ba.
45005015	Bè yi lè atyetye. Adam a be lè 'iban, ukpor Ujeso Ukristi a be lè inung Unim. Bwo Adam a shi 'iban, lihwu li fel gwa bendi. Ukpor inung Unim i dyam gbe gyong. Undi ken angwu ù yi Ujeso Ukristi na a be lè inung Unim imen ana ke li 'uke.
45005016	Lifem 'iban Adam lì yi atyetye lè ha lifem inung Unim. He 'uhwo 'iban Adam 'imen ana, Unim a tang bendi puu ushe le be zī libi, ukpor mà na bendi be shi biban gbamm or, he 'uhwo inung Unim, be fel benunung he ashi ama.
45005017	He 'uhwo 'iban undi ken, lihwu li keb li fel gwa bendi he 'uhwo undi umen ken ana. Ukpor àshī undi angwu ken, Ujeso Ukristi, a shi 'i dyam gbe gyong. Bendi puu abe be kpe inung Unim 'uke, Unim a shi ābe be fel benunung he ashi ama, be ba kwa lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye, be be kwu besu gbe ha ufe, Ujeso Ukristi.
45005018	Li ndè le nya a na 'iban undi ken 'i be lè linim be ke bendi puu, kitaa 'imen na gbe he inung undi ken, bendi be hwaa lè he linim, be fel lè likpan 'unyong.
45005019	Le bwo undi ken a kpo utebb Unim, bendi puu be fel bendi-iban. Kitaa 'imen na le bwo undi angwu ken a ke Unim ife, a shi bendi be fel benunung he ashi Unim.
45005020	Unim a hà kung Iten ke Umosis, he ashina bendi bè ha fel sha biban gba gyong. Nya a na bendi be fel shi biban gbe gyong, Unim or u tyung inung ima lè beshi bema ha abe kangg.
45005021	Nya a na ikeb 'iban i be lè lihwu, na inung Unim ì yi lè ikeb le i sha li li fel benunung, li kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm gbe ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
45006001	Ashin 'i hà ze le ana a? Lì ndo gye 'ushu shi 'iban le hè Unim ù gye 'ushu tyung inung ima lè beshi bema ha abel a?
45006002	Dia! Bwo li tang he abwo lè he 'iban mà, ki nya sha ná a, lı tem geb lè abwo tye há 'iban?
45006003	Ndè le má ngye le nyong be ma kib li he umbwo, li tyung le li ma gwaa 'uhwo-tyan ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi a? He ashina li hwō ipel ha ahe.
45006004	Nyong li ma gwaa 'uhwo-tyan ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi, li hwō ipel ha ahe, be ngi li ipel ha ahe, le hè nya a na Unim Atyetyan a ma wum Ujeso Ukristi lè he lihwu gbe he ikeb ikaandi ima, na bel or lı be kwu lè likpan lifufe.
45006005	Bel li gwaa 'uhwo-tyan ipel ha ahe he lihwu lima. He ashina, faale ifung li ba wum lè he lihwu utung ha ahe.
45006006	Li ngye le be ma maa gwu likpe lìtım lityan angi lı shi li lı shi likpe libibi bee he 'ikpakpaa ipel ha ahe, le hè udaa 'iban ù hwō gbangg, hè li lì tem kwu he abwo 'iban ye,
45006007	likorye undi angwu a hwō a mbee lè abwo lè he 'iban.
45006008	Li bong le nya a na li hwō ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi na lı be kwu bewum ipel ha ahe titi.
45006009	Li ngye le Ujeso Ukristi a ma wum lè he lihwu, ù tem hwa ye. Lihwu lì tem yi lè ikeb le li gwa he ye.
45006010	Nyong a hwō, kiban 'ì tem yi lè ikeb angi 'ı shi-e 'iwom ye, a kung likpan lima fe Unim he 'ubwo.
45006011	Men or titi mà well le nyong ma hwō ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi, ma mbee lè abwo lè he 'iban mà. Há 'unyong 'umen ana ma kung likpan līmen fe Unim he 'ubwo gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi.
45006012	He atan-lengi anwun, mà ndè le ma bong 'iban 'ì kpe men ityuu ye, teng 'i nyii amen fa abwo he ashele bigyor bibibi. Mà well le inyiahwo īmen, baa ı hwō.
45006013	Mà ndè le ma kung ligwo līmen ken or keb ke he 'ibibi ashele ye. Mà keb āngi ke Unim hwan, bwo mà yi ná bendi abe be hwō, be tem wum nà. Mà kung ligwo līmen liyang-yang shi 'inunung.
45006014	Kì yi le 'iban 'ì kpe men ityuu ye, likorye mà tem kaa le hè men mà kwu benunung gbe he andorale Iten a ye, ukpor ma fel benunung gbe he inung Unim a.
45006015	Ashin 'i hà ze le ana a? Ki nya ze le lì ndo fel shi 'iban zii le bwo lı fel benunung gbe he inung Unim a, gbe he Iten a ye a? Dia!
45006016	Má ngye dangg le gbe undi a keb 'uhwo-ma fel ufee undi le hè-e ù ke-e ife, ashin 'i ze le a fel ufee undi umen angwu u ke-e ife ana a. Ù hà ndo kwa ufee 'iban, u kwu ufee Unim nya 'ugbe ken ye. Gbe ù yi ufee 'iban a, lifem áshi lì yi lihwu. Ukpor gbe ù yi ufee he akele Unim ife a, lifem áshi lì yi le Unim u kpa he le ù yi ununung.
45006017	Ipee ì kwu ke Unim, likorye leěti ma ma yi ifee 'iban, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i ma ke ife lè lityam līmen puu he biwom abi li hwua amen.
45006018	Nyong ma mbee lè abwo lè he 'iban, ma fel ifee Unim hè men mà shi 'inunung.
45006019	Mi kung biwom igye anyin paa tyung amen le hè 'ì nung amen nwongg a, likorye ná bendigye, biwom bi shwie nung amen ye. Leěti ma maa keb inyiahwo īmen puu ka 'iban lè 'ibibi le hè men mà shi bibibi gye 'ushu. Kanaa-anaa i ufe, mà ndè le ma keb 'uhwo-men puu ke he 'inunung ashele le hè men mà kwu bendi Unim a 'igyang-igyang.
45006020	Leěti nyong ma ma yi ifee 'iban, ma ma yi lè abwo he 'inunung ashele ye.
45006021	Bibibi abi bi fel amen ishwia-ishwia 'unyin i, kibang 'i ma yi lifem līmen nyong ma maa shi ābi? Lifem ábi lì yi lihwu a.
45006022	Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i ma mbee lè abwo lè he 'iban, ma fel ifee Unim a. Lifem ashina lì yi le ma fel bendi Unim a 'igyang-igyang. He ashin, he umbee-likel ma be kwu lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm.
45006023	Lifem 'iban lì yi lihwu, ukpor 'uke Unim 'ù yi likpan akwele ngyor igye kpamm gbe he agwaale ipel ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
45007001	Bebuye, mi kong ha amen ná bendi abe be ngye gbe lè uten a. Faale atyangale men ma ngye le uten u kee-kee bua undi nyong ù yi uwum a.
45007002	Hà iten libee ife? Uten a bua ungingye le ù tyang ukyema ye, lè 'igbe ná ukyema ù yi uwum. Ukpor gbe ukyema a hwō, ù ha fel porr lè he uten angwu a de le ù tyang ukyema ye ana.
45007003	Ashin 'i ze le, gbe a tyang ukyema nya gye lè bee lè ungikye ususo, hà u tan akpela a. Ukpor gbe ukyema a hwō, ù ha fel porr lè he uten angwu a bua he ana. Gbe a fel gye libee, hà a tem tan akpela a ye.
45007004	Bebuye, kì yi 'itaa ken ke men or titi. Iten Umosis i tem bua amen ye, likorye ma ma hwō ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi. Kanaa-anaa i ma fel ke Ujeso Ukristi angwu Unim a wum lè he lihwu, le hè li bel puu lì shi aki anunung ke Unim.
45007005	Leěti mà ukpong li hà ngye Unim, Iten Umosis i maa wum bigyor bibibi abi bì yi ha abel, bi shi li li shi bibibi abi bı be lè lihwu gwu li.
45007006	Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i, li fel porr lè he Iten Umosis angi leěti i ma bua li fe he lifee, li tem kaa le lî pwom Unim gbe he andorale Iten angi be fee fe he 'ushia ana a ye, ukpor lì fel pwom he he 'ukwo 'ufufe gbe ha Ukatia Kunyong Unim hwan.
45007007	Ashin 'i hà ze le ana a? Ki nya ze le Iten Umosis ì yi ibibi â? Dia! Ukpor, kì be kwu le Iten ana i be ye, hang mi ngye 'iban ye. Uten a de le: "Bell 'iwom undi ye." Kì be kwu le uten ù kong ná ye, hang mi ngye úbéll ye.
45007008	Ukpor he 'uhwo uten umen ana, kiban 'i ndè libwo shi-m mi fel bell mbee bishishi biwom puu. Kì be kwu lè uten a ye, hang 'iban 'ì yi lè ikeb ye.
45007009	Ki ma yi lè 'unyong 'ususo ahwu mi ma ngye uten ye. Ukpor nyong mi be ngye uten Unim, kigyor 'iban ashele 'i wum, mi hwō.
45007010	Unim a ma ke Iten le hè bendi bè kpan a, ukpor i fel be lè lihwu a gwu-m mi.
45007011	Gbe he uten umen ana, kiban 'i ndè libwo lam mi fe abwo he 'ibibi ashele, ki tan lè lihwu gwu-m.
45007012	He ashin, ki nung nwongg le Iten Umosis i be lè ha Unim a, uten uyang-yang ù yi gelalala, u shi kpa-kpa, u shi lè ukpell ke bendi.
45007013	Fe ashin 'i ze le 'iwom 'imen ashi 'i ngbebb i na 'i be lè lihwu gwu-m a? Dia! Iten na i be lè lihwu ye, kiban a. Gbe he Iten inunung anyina na 'iban 'i be lè lihwu gwu-m hè 'ì tyung gboo ashi 'i ze le 'iban. He ashin, gbe he uten Unim 'i nung nwongg le 'iban 'i ban ná afong-afong.
45007014	Li ngye le Iten ana i be lè ha Unim a, ukpor mi ufe mì yi undigye a, mi shi ufee 'iban.
45007015	Biwom abi mi-gyang mı shi or bì nem nung mi ye, likorye mi sha binunung abi mi kee le mi sha a ye, mi bel sha bibibi abi mi kee ye a.
45007016	Bwo mi kee le mi sha bibibi abi mı shi i a ye, ashin 'i tyung le mi bong le Iten ana i ngbebb a.
45007017	Ashin 'i ze le mi-gyang na mi fe ukaa shi bibibi bimen ana ye, kiban ashi 'ì yi ha ami lityam na 'ı shi-m mı shi ābi.
45007018	Mi ufe ná undigye, mi ngye le 'ì yi lè 'inunung ha ami lityam ye. Mi sha ugim ufe le mî shi ashi 'ì yi 'inunung, ukpor mì yi lè ikeb angi mı shi āshi ye.
45007019	Mi sha 'inunung ashi mi kee a ye, mi tem bel sha 'ibibi ashi mi kee ye a.
45007020	Bwo mı shi 'ibibi ashi mi kee ye a, ashin 'i tyung le mi-gyang na mı shi ye, kiban àshī.
45007021	He ashin, mi ndè shi 'i fel a ná uten a le 'unyong 'uyang-yang mı kee le mi sha 'inunung, kiban 'i bong mi ye.
45007022	Ha ami unwaa lityam, Iten Unim i nyin mi kangg.
45007023	Ukpor mi ndè ha ami inyiahwo, kiwom 'isuso 'i ndo 'ukye ha ashi ugim ugi a ngye le 'i ngbebb. Kiban ashi 'ì yi ha ami lityam a, kife na 'ı shi-m mì yi ufee 'iban.
45007024	He ugim ugi ufe, mi ka Iten Unim ife, ukpor bwo mì yi undigye a, mi ka iten 'iban ife. Mi nim 'i mbee! Ayang ù nya kpan mi lè he 'ukwo ahwu 'u be lè lihwu? Ipee ì kwu ke Unim! Ufe na u kpan bendi gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi Atyetyan.
45008001	He ashina, bendi abe be gwaa 'uhwo-bell ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi, kì tem yi lè linim ke be ye,
45008002	likorye ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu a be lè likpan gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi, a fem kung li lè he abwo 'iban lè lihwu.
45008003	Iten i ma yi lè ikeb le i kpan li ye, likorye bel bendigye li ma yi lè ikeb angi lı ndor āngi ye. Ukpor Unim a shi ashi Iten ana i maa shi mbeè ye. A shi āshi gbe he asomale Unwaa-ma angwu be hwan ná bel abe lı shi 'iban i. Unwaa-ma umen i a mbee lè ikeb 'iban ashi 'ì yi ha abel.
45008004	Unim a shi ashin le lî fel benunung ná Iten i kee li le lì kwu. Li kwa ná gbe lì mā ma tan ná Ukatia Kunyong Unim u teng li a, li tan ná bigyor agwo atyan bı teng li a ye.
45008005	Bendi abe be tan ná bigyor agwo abell bı teng ābe a, be kee-kee gim ná be shi nyin 'uhwo-bell ufe-ufe a. Ukpor bendi abe be tan ná Ukatia Kunyong Unim u teng ābe a, be kee-kee gim ná be shi ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim a kee a.
45008006	Bendi abe be kung igim ibell ndor he bigyor agwo abell a, be tan lè lihwu gwa 'uhwo-bell. Ukpor bendi abe be kung igim ibell ndor ha Ukatia Kunyong Unim a, be kwa lè likpan lè ikwun ngyor igye kpamm.
45008007	Undi angwu u tan ná bigyor agwo ama bı teng he a, u kwa undi-linaa Unim a, likorye u ka Iten Unim ife ye. Ù hà ndo kwa lè ikeb ka āngi ife ye.
45008008	Kigyang-igyang, bendi abe be tan ná bigyor agwo abell bı teng ābe a, bè hà ndo sha nyin Unim ye.
45008009	Ukpor men ufe, gbe 'ì yi le Ukatia Kunyong Unim ù yi ha amen atyam 'igyang, ma tan ná bigyor agwo āmen bı teng amen a ye, ma tan ná Ukatia Kunyong Unim u teng amen a. Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Ukristi ha ahe lityam ye, hà ù yi ke Ujeso Ukristi a ye.
45008010	Gbe Ujeso Ukristi ù yi ha amen atyam a, mà na inyiahwo īmen ı be hwō he 'uhwo 'iban or, Ukatia Kunyong Unim u ba ka amen likpan 'unyong likorye Ujeso a shi amen ma fel benunung he ashi Unim.
45008011	Unim angwu a wum Ujeso lè he lihwu, gbe Ukatia Kunyong uma ù yi ha atyam āmen, hà 'i nung nwongg le ufe angwu a wum Ujeso Ukristi lè he lihwu u ba wum amen or titi lè he lihwu gba he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong uma umen angwu ù yi ha amen ana.
45008012	Bebuye, he ashin, kì yi kpe-kpe le lì bong bigyor agwo bì teng li ye.
45008013	Gbe ma bong bigyor agwo bi teng amen, hà ma hwa. Ukpor gbe ma kung ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim gwu bigyor agwo, ma kwa lè likpan ligyang angyell.
45008014	Bendi puu abe Ukatia Kunyong Unim u teng ābe, bè yi bebwaa Unim a.
45008015	Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu ma kpē, a shi amen lifee a, ngwu ù shi amen le mà fel he 'ushell a ye. A shi amen ma fel bebwaa Unim a. Ufe na u shi li lı ko Unim le: "Ada, Adida."
45008016	Kitaa ana na Ukatia Kunyong Unim u de li he atyam atyan le lì yi bebwaa Unim a 'igyang-igyang.
45008017	Bwo lì yi bebwaa-ma a, bel or li ba kpa àbi a kam ndor bendi bema. Bel lè Ujeso Ukristi li ba kpa àbi a kam ndor he, likorye gbe li bong kpē 'ingie utung ha ahe, hà li ba kwa he ífém utung ha ahe.
45008018	Mi ngye dangg le bingie abi lı kpē 'anaa-anaa i bi kpee ìfém angi Unim u be ke li ye.
45008019	Biwom puu abi Unim a shi he igye anyin bi fel ngib lityam a kwa nyong 'unyong ahwu Unim u be tyung ìfém bebwaa-ma he igye gboo.
45008020	Biwom abi Unim a shi bi fel faale lifem. Bife-gyang na bi kee le bi kwa faale lifem ye, ukpor Unim na a de le bì kwu ná. Unim a shi ugim ndor fel kwu u nyong 'unyong ahwu u pell biwom puu abi a shi tyang abwo lè he ushang ubibi, le hè bi bì tem ban ye. Bi ba fel porr, Unim u fem ābi ná u fem bebwaa-ma.
45008022	Li ngye le kpamm be wu 'unyin i, biwom abi Unim a shi bi kpa 'ingie lè lishi andorale ná ungingye angwu u shi uzwaa nà.
45008023	Biwom abi bi teng iteng abi Unim a shi bife-bife na bı kpe 'ingie ye, ukpor bel-agyang abe a ke li Ukatia Kunyong uma ná ukpi-ikwu 'uke 'uma or lì yi lè 'ibebebb he lityam nyin i ná li kwu lı nyong le ù tyung gboo le lì yi bebwaa-ma a. Li mbee kwu lı nyong 'unyong ahwu u be kpan inyiahwo ityan lè he lihwu i.
45008024	Bel abe li fel lè likpan 'unyong mà, li fel lè lishi andorale he biwom abin. Gbe li kpē 'iwom mà, lì tem ndor lishi a le lî kwu lè shi ye. Ki nya sha ná a, undi u mbee ndor lishi 'iwom ashi a fel lè shi?
45008025	Ukpor bwo li ndor lishi 'iwom ashi li wa fel lè shi ye a, li ngib lityam kwa nyong āshi.
45008026	Kitaa 'imen na Ukatia Kunyong Unim or u kpell li likorye lì yi kang-kang he 'ukwo Unim ye. Li ngye ná lì kong ha Unim ná hang 'ì yi le lì kong or ye. Ukpor Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong ha Unim he 'uhwo 'utyan, u kong igie angi undigye u kong mbee ye.
45008027	Unim angwu a ngye àtyám atyan, a mbee ngye ugim Ukatia Kunyong uma. Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong ha Unim ka bendi Unim, nya a na Unim ugyang a kee a.
45008028	Li ngye le 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ı shi, Unim u sha āshi 'i ba lè 'inunung ka bendi abe 'i nyin abe lè he, abe a ko le bè shi ashi a kee.
45008029	Bendi abe Unim a ma gia le bè kwu bema, a kam ndor or mà le be ba kwa ná Unwaa-ma, le hè Unwaa-ma ana ù kwu ukpi-ikwu unwaa he liwu bebwende gbamm.
45008030	Abe a shi ābe be fel ta-ta ke-e, u ko ābe le be fel bema. Abe a ko ābe le be fel bema, u shi ābe be fel betaa-betaa he ashi ama. Abe a shi ābe be fěl he betaa-betaa, u shi ābe be kwu he ifem utung ha ahe.
45008031	Kibang 'i teng le lì kong? Gbe Unim ù yi li he item, ki gbeě li lè angwu u tel li ye.
45008032	Unim a nyim li Unwaa-ma ye, a kung he ke li puu. He ashin, faale ifung u ka li biwom puu 'uke.
45008033	Ayang ù nya tyung li bel bendi abe Unim a gia kung 'ubwo he 'iban? Unim ugyang na a de le lì yi-e betaa-betaa gelalala.
45008034	Ayang ù nya de le li zī libi? Kì yi Ujeso Ukristi a ye! A hwō ke li, Unim a wum he lè he lihwu, kanaa-anaa i ù yi kwu he 'ubwo lizen Unim, u kya fa Unim he 'uhwo 'utyan.
45008035	Kibang 'ì nya tang li he abwo lè ha Ujeso Ukristi angwu 'i nyin he lè bel? Mà 'ì kwu ugilale or, ki kwu 'ingie or, be teb lè bel or, li kwu itung or, li kwu uten-ibong or, li kwu he begyong or, ki kwu lihwu or, abin puu, kì yi lè ashi 'ì tang li he abwo lè he benyin Ujeso Ukristi ye a kpamm!
45008036	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "He 'uhwo 'ugang, wo Unim, na be gwu li mbee 'unyong puu. Be kung li ná ìtiā angi be lè gwu nà."
45008037	Ukpor he biwom abin puu, bel li hwò mbee akekel puu gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi angwu 'i nyin he lè bel.
45008038	Mi ngye dangg le 'ì yi lè ashi 'ì tang li he abwo lè he benyin Ujeso Ukristi ye. Mà likpan or, mà lihwu or, mà idengell Unim or, mà biwom bisuso abi bì yi lè ikeb he lifung-atabe or, mà biwom abi 'anaa-anaa i or, mà abi lè he 'ushu or,
45008039	mà abi he lifung-atabe or, mà abi he 'usu behwu or, kì yi lè ashi 'ì yi lè ikeb le 'i tang li he abwo lè he benyin abe Unim ù yi lè be ha abel gbe ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ye a kpamm.
45009001	Igie angi mi ndo kong i, mì yi ke Ujeso Ukristi a, mi kong 'igyang a, mi bà uman a ye. Ugim ugi a naa mi ushada, Ukatia Kunyong Unim u tyung le 'ì yi ná.
45009002	Lityam ligi li sho lè 'imbwee lè 'utor ahwu 'u tor mi ishu or, kusu or,
45009003	gbe lè bendi begi, Izwell. Gbe 'ì nya kpell ābe, hang mi kong ha Unim bii he le ù ke ushang ubibi fe-m mi hwan, u tang mi he abwo lè ha Ujeso Ukristi.
45009004	Bè yi bendi Izwell a, Unim a waa kung ābe le bè kwu bebwaa-ma, u kung ìfém ima tyung ābe, u kong ndor ha abe, u ke be Iten ima, u tyung ābe 'ukwo 'ugyang ahwu be fe-e, u ke be íkyébb.
45009005	Be shi igia betietyan a abe gbel. Umizaya ugyang, undi angwu a hwan he, ù yi 'ubong 'ubell 'ugyang a. Ufe angwu ù yi Unim angwu a hwò puu, ipee ì kwu ke-e ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor ná li kong.
45009006	Mà na bendi Ijuus be gyo Unim ye or, ashin 'i ze le Unim a ndor úkyébb uma ye a ye. Bendi Izwell puu na bè yi igia ima igyang-igyang, ngwu igia Ebraham or, puu na ì yi igia ima igyang angyell a ye. Unim a ma de Ebraham le: "Igia unwaa-gang Azik na ı be kwu igia igang igyang angyell."
45009008	Ashin 'i ze le, bebwaa abe be ma hwan he úkyébb Unim na bè yi bebwaa Unim, abe be hwan faale úkyébb Unim a ye.
45009009	Nyong Unim a ma ke Ebraham úkyébb, a ma kong igie anyin: "Ùzé 'igbe ashin mi ba tem ba ka ungye-gang Usara unwaa-ngikye."
45009010	Ashin 'ife-ife a ye. Uribeka ungye Azik a ma shi lizam, hwan begbe. Ātyām begbe ana na ù yi Azik.
45009011	Nyong be ma wa hwan ābe or, ngwu bè shi 'iwom or mà ye, mà 'ibibi or, ngwu 'inunung or ye, Unim a ma de Uribeka le: "Angwu gbel u ba kwa he 'ubwo angwu 'isun a." Ashin 'i tyung le Unim ugyang u gia ugia he ugim uma, ki gbe kpee àshi bendi be shi ye.
45009013	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Mi gia kung Ujekob, ukpor mi swan Isor."
45009014	Ashin 'i ze le Unim ù yi ubibi â? Kpaa ye!
45009015	Leěti a ma de Umosis le: "Mi kwa lè inung lè beshi ha undi angwu mi-gyang mi kee."
45009016	Ashin 'i tyung le ūgia angwu Unim u gia a gbe kpee igim bendigye or, ngwu aki abell or ye, u kee-kee ba lè he beshi bema a.
45009017	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le Unim a ma de Ufero, Usu Igyept le: "Mi kwa-a 'usu le mî kung-a shi 'asu 'agi 'à fem mbee igye puu a."
45009018	Ki nung nwongg le Unim a tyung beshi ha undi nyong ufe a kee, u shi undi u teb lityam nyong ufe a kee.
45009019	Pisoye undi-iso u bii mi le: "Gbe Unim u gia bendi 'itaa a kee a, kibang a, Unim ù ha ben bendi he ashi be shi, bwo 'itaa Unim a shi undi le ù kwu na u kwu?"
45009020	Udim-gi, ayang ù yi-a wo angwu wo mbe lityam bii Unim 'ibibi? Kiki 'i nya bii undi angwu a mbe shī le: "Ki shi ná a, wo mbe-m 'itaa i?" a?
45009021	Undi angwu u mbe biki ù yi lè ikeb le u mba biki bifee lè he ūbībī limbe ken. U mba ashi ken 'i kwa ka 'unyong 'ipam, u mbe ashell 'i kwu àshi ke liti liyang-yang.
45009022	Kì yi 'itaa ken ha Unim. Mà na Unim a kee le ù tyung ingywo ima ha abe be waa ndor linim hè be bè ndè ikeb ima or, ù so-i ngib lityam a ndor ābe.
45009023	U ngib lityam le he-e ù tyung inung ikaandi ima ha bendi abe ù yi lè beshi ha abe, abe a kam sa-sa ndor le bè kwu he ifem ima a.
45009024	Bel na lì yi bendi bemen abe a gia le bè kwu bema i. A gia li lè he bendi Ijuus ufe-ufe a ye, a gia bendi lè he abong angi a teng or titi.
45009025	He 'ushia Uhozaya, be fee le Unim a de le: "Bendi abe leěti be ma yi bendi begi a ye, mi ba ko ābe le, 'Bendi begi.' Kubong ahwu leěti 'i ma nyin mi lè hwu ye, mi fel ko ābe le, 'Kùnyin-mi.'
45009026	Bendi he 'iteng ashi mi ma de be le, 'Mà yi bendi begi a ye,' bendi bemen ana na be be de be le, 'Mà yi bebwaa Unim angwu ù yi uwum a.' "
45009027	Azaya angwu a maa tye ugie 'isom Unim a ma kong gbe lè bendi Izwell le: "Mà na bendi Izwell be go 'ugii ná ayia lishor or, bendi zangg na be teng.
45009028	Unim ù tem ban 'unyong ye, u ndo tang ushe igye puu a."
45009029	Azaya a ma mbee kong le: "Kì be kwu le Unim ikeb puu ù be teng ubu utyan zangg or ndor ye, hang li mbee kò lishi ná 'ubong Usodem lè Ugomora."
45009030	Ashin 'i hà ze le ana a? Kì yi le bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, abe be maa bè kaa ikaa or le hè be bè kwu benunung ye, Unim a kpe be le bè yi benunung likorye be bong ha Ujeso Ukristi.
45009031	Ukpor bendi Izwell abe be maa kaa ndor Iten Umosis le hè be bè kwu benunung, be ma ndor Iten imen ana mbeè ye.
45009032	Kibang a, be ma fel benunung ye? Be ma fel benunung ye, likorye be maa kaa le hè be bè kwu benunung gbe he andorale Iten a, gbe he abongale ha Ujeso Ukristi a ye. Be ma gbaa limbu he 'ukor ahwu undi-iso a fee gbe lè hwu he 'ushia Unim le Unim a de le: "Ndè, mi beb 'ukor he Uzayon ahwu 'u shi bendi be gbaa mbu. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ufe angwu ù yi 'ukor 'umen ana, u lam he ye."
45010001	Bebuye, mì yi lè 'igyor he lityam kangg le bendi begi, Izwell, bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong. Mi kong ha Unim le ù kpan ābe.
45010002	Mi ngye le 'i nyin ābe lè Unim 'igyang-igyang, ukpor 'igyang 'i nung ābe ye.
45010003	Kukwo ahwu Unim u shi bendi be fel benunung he ashi ama, 'u nung ābe ye. Ukpor be kaa lè 'uhwo-bell le hè be bè fel benunung he ashi Unim. He ashin be swan le be keb 'uhwo-bell ka Unim he-e ù shi ābe bè fel benunung ye.
45010004	Bwo 'ì yi le Ujeso Ukristi a be mbeè shi ashi 'i ma yi le hang Iten ana ì shi, le hè undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe ù fel ununung he ashi Unim.
45010005	Leěti Umosis a ma fee gbe lè 'ukwo ahwu undi u fel ununung he ashi Unim gbe he andorale Iten. A fee le: "Gbe undi a ndor Iten puu u kwa lè likpan."
45010006	Ukpor be fee he 'ushia Unim gbe lè 'ukwo ahwu undi u fel ununung he ashi Unim gbe he abongale le: "Shī bii 'uhwo-gang 'ibibi ashin ye. 'Ayang ù nya mbo gye he 'usi lifung-atabe?' " (Ashin 'i ze le be fel gim le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le undi ù gye he lifung-atabe le he-e ù lè be lè Ujeso Ukristi he itang.)
45010007	Be mbee fee le: "Shī bii 'uhwo-gang 'ibibi ashin ye. 'Ayang ù nya shul gye he 'usu behwu?' " (Ashin 'i ze le, be fel gim le 'ì yi kpe-kpe le undi ù shul gye he 'usu behwu le he-e ù wum Ujeso Ukristi lè he lihwu.)
45010008	Ashi be fee he 'ushia Unim na 'ì yi le: "Kisom Unim 'i fel kpee-kpee ha amen. Kife na bendi be kong gbe lè shi, be gim gbe lè shi he atyam abell." Kisom 'imen i 'ì yi 'isom gbe lè abongale ashi lı bun a.
45010009	Gbe wo buu ungwu ugang kong gboo le Ujeso ù yi Atyetyan a, wo bong lityam ken le Unim a wum he lè he lihwu, wo kwa lè likpan 'unyong.
45010010	Gbe undi a bong ha Ujeso Ukristi lityam ken, Unim u kpa he le ù yi ununung. Gbe undi a buu ungwu uma kong gboo le Ujeso ù yi Atyetyan a, u kwa lè likpan 'unyong.
45010011	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha ahe, u lam he ye."
45010012	Ashin 'ì yi ke undi uyang-yang, mà ù yi Ijuus a or, mà ù yi Ijuus a ye or. Unim a ken ù yi Atyabell puu 'itaa ken. Bendi puu abe be bii he ukpell, u ka ābe 'ukwun kyoo.
45010013	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a bii Atyetyan ukpell, u kwa lè likpan 'unyong."
45010014	Ki nya sha ná a, bendi be bii Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ukpell gbe be wa bong ha ahe ye? Ki nya sha ná a, be bong ha ahe gbe be wa gyo gbe lè he ye? Ki nya sha ná a, be gyo gbe lè he faale afaale undi a lè bun de be?
45010015	Ki nya sha ná a, undi u lè bun de be faale angwu a som he? Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Abele unwaa-isom a ngbebb he ashi bendi abe be kpē 'isom 'inunung."
45010016	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo 'isom 'inunung na a kpē shi ye. Azaya angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a de le: "Atyetyan, nyong 'ì yi i, ayang a hà kpē ashi li bun?"
45010017	Ki nung nwongg le bebwaa-isom be bun 'isom gba lè Ujeso Ukristi, mà ukpong bendi be hà gyo āshi. Bendi be gyo 'isom ana, mà ukpong be hà bong ha ahe.
45010018	Mi-i bii le, kì nya yi 'igyang a le bendi Izwell be wa gyo 'isom 'inunung ye a? Dia, be gyo. Kì yi nya a na be ma fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Kisom ashi bebwaa-isom bema be bun 'i gye mbee ugugem uyang-yang puu he igye i."
45010019	Mi mbee bii le, kì nya yi 'igyang a le 'isom 'imen i 'í nya nung bendi Izwell ye a? Ki nung ābe. Ukpi-ikwu mî kung igie Umosis fan 'ibibi. Umosis a kong le Unim a de le: "Mi Unim, mi ka bendi abe bè yi he 'ukpo ye 'ukwun, le hè 'ì ban amen he atyam. Mi mbee ka bendi abe bè yi kpel-ye 'ukwun, le hè men nà ngywo."
45010020	Azaya or titi a kong gboo faale 'ushell le Unim a de le: "Mi fem 'uhwo-gi tyung bendi abe be maa shun mi ye. Abe be maa shun mi ye, be nde-m."
45010021	Ukpor Azaya a kong gbe lè bendi Izwell le Unim a de le: "Kung leèti kpamm gye 'usu, mi ndaa abwo le mî kpe bendi begi fe he 'uhwo, ukpor be kwom 'utyung, be swan le be gyo mi ye."
45011001	Mî mbee bii 'ibibi 'isuso. Unim a nya zob bendi bema gbang-gbang a? Kpaa ye! Mi-gyang ufe, mì yi undi Izwell a, mi be ubu lè ha atyetyan Ebraham a, mi shi 'ikwu-lihwan Ubenjamen a.
45011002	Unim a zob bendi bema ye, a waa kung ābe kung lè há linde a. Ma naa lityam ashi be fee he 'ushia Unim gbe lè Ilaja a? Be fee le he 'unyong ken a maa kya da Unim gba lè bendi Izwell.
45011003	A de Unim le: "Atyetyan, bendi aben be gwu bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom 'igang, be gyebb 'imbe ashi be shang-a. Mi ututeb na mi fel teng angwu mı fa-a, be tan kee mi le hè be bè gwu."
45011004	Unim a ma hà fan he le ana? A ma fan he le: "Mi kam bengikye ndor 'uhwo-gi abe be wa fe ukem ukaandi angwu be ko le Ubal ye. Bè yi bengikye asi lihwo 'ugbe adyong he biteng bidyong-ifee."
45011005	Kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi 'unyin i, ki gia teng lè bendi Izwell zangg abe Unim a gia kung gbe he inung ima lè beshi bema.
45011006	Bwo Unim a gia kung ābe gbe he beshi bema lè inung ima a, ashin 'i ze le a gia ābe gbe he ashi befe be shi a ye. Ù be gia ābe gbe he ashi be shi a, hang inung ima imen i ì yi inung igyang a ye.
45011007	Lì hà de le ana? Bendi Izwell be ndè ashi be maa kee ye. Inwaa bendi zangg bemen abe Unim a gia na be nde shī. Unim a shi abe be teng iteng be kwom 'utyung.
45011008	Kì yi nya a na be fee he 'ushia Unim a le: "Unim a shi ābe be fel faale ugim lè lityam. A shi ābe be fel ná bendi abe be hwuà àshi, be kwom 'utyung kpamm be ná 'unyin i."
45011009	Udebid or titi a kong le: "Unim ù shi ābe bè mbu he bikpam nyong be shi bipam, bè mbu, Unim ù ke be 'ingie he ashi be shi.
45011010	Atong-shi à hwua hè be bè tem ndè ye, ù so ābe bengbebb abe be keb ābe ugang ngyor igye kpamm ngyor igye kpamm."
45011011	Mi mbee bii le, ashin 'i ze le bendi Izwell be mbu le hè be bè tem bo 'inaa ye a? Dia! Le bwo bendi Izwell be shi 'iban, Unim a buu 'ukwo ke bendi abe be teng le bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong, hè 'ì shi bendi Izwell bè kee likpan limen i.
45011012	Bwo 'iban 'ibell 'i be lè 'inunung ke bendi abe be teng he igye anyin, umbeb ubell u be lè 'inunung ke bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye, nyong bendi Izwell puu be be ke Unim ife, ná Unim u be ke bendi 'ukwun 'ù go lè kwom?
45011013	Men abe mà yi Ijuus a ye, na mi ndo kong ha amen i. Mì yi unwaa-isom Ujeso Ukristi angwu Unim a som le mì bun 'isom de men, mi kung aki anyin le à yi he 'ukpo kangg.
45011014	Pisoye mi sha bendi begi, Izwell, be fel he ubell abellale le hè be bè fel lè likpan 'unyong.
45011015	Nyong Unim a ma zob bendi Izwell, ashina 'i ma shi 'ukwo ke bendi abe be teng puu he igye i be fel ikwun ha Unim. Ná 'ı be kwu nyong Unim u be tem kpe be le be fel bema a? Ki ba kwa a ná bendi be hwō tem wum a.
45011016	Gbe undi a te lè ūhwaā 'iwom lè ha ahe utia lè ke Unim, ashin 'i ze le ashi 'i teng puu or 'ì yi ashi Unim a. Gbe idaa ukwan 'ì yi angi Unim a, hà ibubu or ì yi angi Unim a.
45011017	Kì yi lè ùkwán angwu be ko le olif. Be ma già ibubu ima kpi tang wu lè hell, be be lè ibubu bífee ukwan umen ana lè he libeb, be tim gwaa nya le hè ngi ì kpan. Men abe mà yi Ijuus a ye na mà yi ná ibubu bífee ukwan angi be tim gwaa ana, men ma fel kpa 'ukwun lè he idaa ukwan ugyang.
45011018	Bwo ashin 'ì yi 'itel i a, mà ndè le ma kong bia abe bè yi ná ibubu igyang angi be kpi tang ana ye. Kibang a, ma dim? Men na ma kwu idaa naa ye, idaa na ı kwu amen naa.
45011019	Pisoye ma da le bè kpi tang ibubu imen ana wu lè hell, le hè be bè bé lè men tim gwaa nya a.
45011020	Kì yi ná 'igyang. Be kpi tang ibubu imen ana angi ì yi bendi Izwell, likorye be bong ha Ujeso Ukristi ye a. Men ufe, be tim amen gwaa nya ukwan likorye ma bong ha Ujeso Ukristi a. He ashin, mà kwu lè idim ye, mà kwu lè 'ushell hwan.
