52003006	Kanaa-anaa i Utimoti a tem lè ha amen há, a de li 'iwom ashi 'ı ke li igor kangg. A de li le mà yi naa genn he abongale lè benyin. U mbee de li le, mbee 'unyong puu ma gim gba lè bel igor-igor, ma mbee shi lè 'igyor le hang ma nda li nya a na bel or lì yi lè 'igyor le hang li nde men.
52003007	Bebuye, he ashin, mà na lı kpe bingie or, biwom gbamm bi kem fe li or, ki kwun li he lityam kpatiaa likorye li gyo le mà yi naa genn he abongale.
52003008	Bwo 'ì yi le mà yi naa genn he 'ukwo Atyetyan Ujeso, bel li fel lè igor kangg.
52003009	Kì yi lè 'itaa ashi lı pee Unim he 'uhwo 'umen 'ı kwun li igor ye, likorye lì yi sho lè igor he 'ushu 'uma he 'uhwo 'umen.
52003010	Ishu or, kusu or, bel li kong ha Unim kangg le lì ndè 'ukwo be ndè men, li kpell amen ma gye 'ushu he abongale.
52003011	Bel li ka ushang le Unim Atyetyan lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi bè buu li 'ukwo le lì be ndè men.
52003012	Atyetyan Ujeso ù hā kpell amen mà gye 'ushu kwu lè benyin ha bende gbe gyong, ma kwu lè be ha bendi puu nya a na bel lì yi lè be ha amen.
52003013	Kitaa ana na u fe men ingie le mà naa genn le hè men mà be kwu faale uben, ma kwu betaa-betaa faale 'iban he 'ushu Unim Atyetyan nyong Atyetyan Ujeso u tem be lè bendi bema puu.
52004001	Bebuye, ashi lı mbee kong 'ì yi le, bel li hwua āmen ma ngye ná 'ì yi le mà shi hè men mà shi nyin Unim. Kigyang-igyang ma shaa sha nya a na li hwua amen. Lè lityam lityan puu li tim amen anung he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso le mà gye 'ushu shi nya 'itaa ana.
52004002	Má ngye itebb angi li ke men he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso.
52004003	Kiwom ashi Unim a kee 'ì yi le mà kwu betaa-betaa faale 'iban. Ki shi kpe-kpe le mà gbe lè abwo fe he akpela ye gbangg.
52004004	Undi ūmen uyang-yang ù ndè le a kwu 'uhwo-ma he-e ù kwu utaa-utaa faale 'iban, u kwu lè ife.
52004005	Mà ndè le ma kwu lè 'igyor akpela ná bendi abe be ngye Unim ye ana á ye.
52004006	Mà ndè le undi a shi 'iban ha unde-ma he likong limen i ye, likorye Unim u ka bendi puu abe be shi bitaa biwom abina 'ingie nya a na li de men, li tuu amen 'ubwo he 'utyung.
52004007	Unim a ko li le lì be shi bibibi a ye, ukpor a ko li le lì be kwu betaa-betaa faale 'iban á.
52004008	He ashin undi uyang-yang angwu a swan ashin, a swan undigye a ye, a swan Unim angwu a ke men Ukatia Kunyong uma a.
52004009	Gbe lè ashi le 'ì nyin amen lè bende, kì tem yi lè ashi mì kong gbe lè shi ye, likorye Unim ugyang a hwua amen ná 'ì nyin amen lè bende.
52004010	Kigyang-igyang, ki nyin amen lè bendi Unim tang mbee ufam Umasedonia puu. Ukpor lì so-i fa amen ingie le mà gye 'ushu lè benyin bēmen gbe gyong.
52004011	Mà kwu 'iken kangg hè men mà kwu mbiloo, ma geb lè ungwu tang he likong bendi ye, ma shi aki lè abwo āmen nya a na li ma tebb amen.
52004012	Gbe ma shi ná, bendi abe bè yi bendi abongale a ye or be ka amen ife, ma tem kwu nyong undi ye.
52004013	Bebuye, li kee le 'ì nung amen nwongg gbe lè bendi abe be hwō, hè 'ì fel ban amen he lityam ná 'ı ban bendi abe be ndor lishi awumale lè he lihwu ye ana ye.
52004014	Bel puu li bong le Ujeso a ma hwō, u tem wum lè he lihwu. He ashina li bong le nyong Ujeso u be tem be, Unim u ba ba lè bendi utung ha ahe abe be ma bong ha ahe, mà ukpong be hà hwō.
52004015	Biwom abi li de men i bi be lè ha Atyetyan Ujeso ugyang a, le bel abe lı be so bewum he igye i nyong Atyetyan Ujeso u tem be, li ba gba tyang ābe ye.
52004016	He liti limen ana Unim u ba gaa lingmam, atie-lishi idengell Unim u gaa lingmam, usom Unim u gwee. Atyetyan Ujeso u ba shul lè he lifung-atabe ba he bibu. Bendi abe be ma bong ha Ujeso Ukristi mà ukpong be hà hwō, befe na be be wum lè he lihwu 'ushu.
52004017	Bel abe lı be so bewum he igye i, Unim u ba nyòng kung li utung ha abe la kpee ha Atyetyan Ujeso he 'usi bibu. Kung lè há liti limen ana li fel ngyor kwa ipel ha ahe ngyor igye kpamm.
52004018	Bwo abin bì yi 'igyang a, mà fe bende 'ingie he biwom abin.
52005001	Bebuye, gbe lè liti lè 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı be shi, kì tem hwaa yi 'indee-indee le hang mi fee amen gbe lè bi ye,
52005002	likorye men-agyang ma ngye dangg le he Liti angi Atyetyan Ujeso u tem be, u tya imbul ba nya a na uzi a.
52005003	He 'unyong ahwu bendi be be de le, "Ki kwun li he 'uhwo, kushell 'ù tem yi ye," ukong ubibi u tye be imbul kpu ná uzwaa u tye ungingye lizam, be ba hwaà ye.
52005004	Ukpor bebuye, men ufe mà yi he 'ifufebb a ye. He ashina Liti limen ana lì be tye men imbul ná uzi u tye bendi imbul ana ye.
52005005	Men ufe mà yi bendi 'ikung-gbo a; mà yi he 'ikung-gbo a, bel lè men lì yi he 'ifufebb ye.
52005006	He ashina mà lì mbu 'unde ná abe be teng be mbu ye, lì kwu lè 'akang, li kwu dangg.
52005007	Lè 'usu na bendi be mbu 'unde, lè 'usu 'umen na bendi be bwom ibwom.
52005008	Ukpor bel ufe lì yi he 'ikung-gbo, he ashina mà lì kwu lè 'akang. Mà lì gye 'ushu bong ha Ujeso, li kwu lè benyin, likorye abongale lè benyin bì yi ná aliga 'índe angi ishogya ı shī kwuu 'akem le hè 'iwom 'ì do ābe ye á. Lì kwu lè lishi andorale he likpan 'unyong, likorye lishi andorale li shi ná 'ishilishi 'ukye ashi ishogya ı shī kwuu lishi le hè 'iwom 'ì do lishi libell ye.
52005009	Unim a waa kung li le lì be kpe 'ingie he ushe uma a ye, ukpor a gia li le lì kwu lè likpan 'unyong gbe ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi a.
52005010	A hwō he 'uhwo 'utyan le he 'unyong ahwu u tem be, lî gye lè kwu ipel ha ahe, mà lì so bewum he igye i or, mà lì hwo mà or.
52005011	He ashina, mà gye 'ushu fe bende ingie, ma kpell bende nya a na ma shaa shi kpam-kpam.
52005012	Bebuye, li tim amen anung le mà ke bekaandi abe be shi aki Atyetyan he liwu līmen ife, be tebb amen.
52005013	He 'uhwo aki angi be shi, mà kwu lè ife lè benyin kangg ha abe. Men-agyang mà kwu ikwun-ikwun ha bende.
52005014	Bebuye, li tim amen anung le mà tebb bendi lihwun, ma fe bendi 'ushell ingie, ma kpell àbe bè yi kang-kang he 'ukwo Unim ye, ma kwu lè lityam angibale ha bende.
52005015	Mà ndè le ma tem bende utyang ye, ukpor mà shi ashin 'ì fel aki āmen a le mbee 'unyong mà shi 'inunung ha bende lè bendi puu.
52005016	Mà yal gor mbee 'unyong.
52005017	Mà kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong.
52005018	He 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'i kem fe men, mà pee Unim. Ashina na 'i ngbebb Unim le men abe ma gwaa ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi mà shi.
52005019	Mà kwom Ukatia Kunyong Unim he 'ukwo 'uyang-yang ye.
52005020	Kisom Unim ashi abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima be kong, mà kung āshi idal-idal ye.
52005021	Kiwom 'iyang-yang, mà shun āshi li-li-li ndè le hà 'i be lè ha Unim á or. Mà kpē àshi 'i ngbebb.
52005022	Mà fe abwo ha 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi 'ibibi a ye.
52005023	Mi kong ha Unim le ufe-gyang angwu u ke ikwun, ù hā kam lityam līmen lè 'ūnyōng 'ūmen lè inyiahwo īmen hè 'iwom 'ì do amen ye, hè men mà kwu betaa-betaa gelalala faale uben he 'ushu Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi nyong u tem be.
52005024	Unim na a ko amen le mà kwu bebwaa-ma, u ba sha biwom puu abi a kyebb amen.
52005025	Bebuye, mà kong ha Unim ke li bel or titi.
52005026	Ma kong li lè bendi abongale puu ha amen há, mà gaa ābe lè uko lè uko ná bendi Unim be shi a.
52005027	He lizen Atyetyan Ujeso, mi da amen le mà ndè le be bo 'ushia ahwun de bendi abongale puu.
52005028	Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ù hā ke men 'ukwun.
53001001	Mi Uporl lè Usalas lè Utimoti na lı fee 'ushia ahwun. Li fee āhwu hwaa lè men liwu bendi abongale angi he Utesalonaika, men abe mà yi ke Unim Atyetyan lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
53001002	Unim Atyetyan lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi bè hā ke men 'ukwun, be shi hè 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa.
53001003	Bebuye, kì yi le lì pee Unim mbee 'unyong he 'uhwo 'umen. Kì yi dell-dell le lì pee he ná, likorye abongale ūmen ha Ujeso Ukristi lè benyin bēmen ha bende bi gya 'ushu ngbebb-ngbebb.
53001004	Bel li kung amen pwom ungwu he awu bendi abongale Unim, likorye ma ngyor naa genn, ma gye 'ushu bong ha Ujeso Ukristi, mà na bingie atyetye-atyetye bı be hwaa lè men or.
53001005	Ki nung nwongg le ushe Unim ù yi dell-dell faale 'ilebale. He 'uhwo biwom abin men ma ba kpà le ma kwa lè abwo he Kusu Unim. He 'uhwo ashin na ma kpe bingie i.
53001006	Unim u tang ushe dell-dell faale 'ilebale. Bendi abe be teb lè men, u ba tem ābe utyang.
53001007	Men abe ma kpe 'ingie, u ba sha 'i kwun amen he 'uhwo, u shi 'i kwun li bel or titi. Ashin 'i ba sha nyong Atyetyan Ujeso u be be lè he lifung-atabe gboo lè idengell ima angi ì yi lè ikeb.
53001008	U ba ba lè 'ìndē 'ikaandi he-e ù ke bendi 'ingie abe be swan Unim, be mbee ke 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso ife ye.
53001009	Kingie 'ibell 'ì yi le be ba nim ngyor igye kpamm, bè tem tem 'ubee or he 'ushu Atyetyan Ujeso, ngwu bè nde ikeb ikaandi ima or ye.
53001010	Ashin 'i ba sha nyong Atyetyan Ujeso u tem be he Liti likaandi angi bendi bema be be fém he, bendi puu abe be bong ha ahe be pee he. Men or ma ba kwa he liwu libell likorye ma bong igie Unim angi li bun de men.
53001011	He ashina na lı kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong ke men, li ke ushang le Unim utyan ù shi amen mà kpè le ma kwa bendi bema. Ù hā kpell amen gbe he ikeb ima hè men mà shi 'inunung 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi 'igyor 'īmen, u fe sho biwom puu abi ma shi gbe he abongale.
53001012	He ashina men ma fem lizen Atyetyan Ujeso, men or ma kpa ifem likorye mà yi ke-e ufe a. Unim utyan lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, he inung ibell, be shi ashin 'i ngyor 'itaa ana.
53002001	Bebuye, li kee le li da amen 'iwom gba lè 'unyong ahwu Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi u tem be, lè 'unyong ahwu u gbong li gye hwaa lè 'uhwo-ma. Li tim amen anung le,
53002002	mà bong bendi abe be de le Atyetyan a be mà, bè lam amen shi ugim ūmen ù fel amen yamm ye. Mà undi ù de le ufe a kpe 'isom lè ha Unim a le a be gbe or, mà bè bun he ityang Unim a or, mà bè bè uman de men le bel na li fee 'ushia kong ná or,
53002003	mà ndè le ma bong undi ù lam amen zangg or ye gbangg, likorye Liti limen ana li ba ye kpamm 'unyong ahwu bendi be mbu lè ha Unim 'ù be ukpong. Undi ubibi angwu ù yi usu bibibi puu u fem he igye i, ufe angwu be fe-e ūfee linim.
53002004	U ba kwa linaa ha 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi bendi be fe shi ná unim ubell, u kung 'uhwo-ma le a dyam hwò ābi puu. U ba mba lityam la ngwee he Ushom Unim la kwa ko he 'ipi Unim, u de le ufe ù yi Unim a lè 'uhwo-ma.
53002005	Mà so-i well le nyong mi ma yi ha amen há, mi maa da amen biwom abin ye a?
53002006	Kì yi lè ashi 'i kwom usu bibibi 'ukwo a waa fem he igye ye. Men ma ngye àshi há. Ki kwom he 'ukwo kpamm 'unyong 'u fel há, u fem be he igye.
53002007	Ikeb usu bibibi umen ana i sha aki hen he 'undyell kpamm be kpe kung àshi 'ı kwóm he 'ukwo ana gbe lè shi,
53002008	saa usu bibibi umen ana u hà fem he igye gboo. Ukpor Atyetyan Ujeso u ba fem 'ufem a wa gwa he. Nyong ahwu Atyetyan Ujeso u be be he ifem ima, u ba mbee lè usu bibibi ana gbangg.
53002009	Nyong usu bibibi ana u be fem he igye, u ba ba he ikeb Usetan puu, u lam bendi gbe he ashele bifem bitaa atyetye-atyetye.
53002010	U ba kung 'ukwo 'ubibi a lam bendi abe be be nim. Be ba nim likorye be swan 'igyang ashi 'ı shi ābe be kwu lè likpan 'unyong.
53002011	He ashina Unim a tyang igim ibell i fel liketye le hè be bè bong àshi 'ì yi uman.
53002012	Kitaa ana na bendi puu abe be bong ha 'igyang ye, abe 'i ngbebb ābe le bè shi bibibi a, Unim u be ke be libi puu.
53002013	Bebuye, ki nyin Atyetyan lè men, bel ufe, kì yi le lì pee Unim mbee 'unyong puu he 'uhwo 'umen. Mà ukpong igye anyin i hà fel, Unim a waa kung amen le mà kwu lè likpan 'unyong gbe ha Ukatia Kunyong uma angwu a shi amen ma fel bendi bema gbe he abongale ūmen ha 'igyang.
53002014	Unim a ko amen gbe hè 'isom 'inunung ashi li bun de men le hè men mà be kwu ipel ha Atyetyan Ujeso he ifem ima.
53002015	He ashin, bebuye, mà naa genn, ma gye 'ushu shi biwom abi li hwua amen, mà li hwua amen ábi gbe he igie Unim abunale a or, mà gbe he ashia angi li fee hwaa lè men á or.
53002016	Atyetyan Ujeso ugyang lè Unim Atyetyan bè hā fe men ingie, be ke men ikeb angi ma shi aki anunung, ma kong igie inunung. Unim na a tyung li benyin bema lè inung ima, u fe li ingie angi ı ngyor igye, u shi li li ndor lishi biwom binunung.
53003001	Bebuye, mà ukpong li hà mbee, li kee le li da amen le mà kong ha Unim ke li le 'isom Atyetyan Ujeso 'ì gye mbee bipi, bendi be kpe shi lè igor nya a na men ma kpē shi.
53003002	Mà mbee kong ha Unim le ù kpan li lè he abwo bendi bebibi abe be ban lityam, likorye bendi puu na be bong 'isom 'imen ana ye.
53003003	Ukpor Atyetyan Ujeso u sha ashi a kong ndor, u ba ka amen ikeb, u kpan amen lè he abwo Usetan, undi ubibi.
53003004	Bel li ngye dangg le Atyetyan Ujeso u kam amen le hè men mà shi ashi li de men, ma gye 'ushu shi āshi.
53003005	Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ù shi amen mà nde shob 'itaa 'i nyin Unim lè men, u shi amen ma naa genn ná ufe-gyang a ma naa genn.
53003006	Bebuye, he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi li tuu amen 'ubwo he 'utyung le mà naa 'igbe-igbe lè ha undi Unim uyang-yang angwu a hwun lihwun, u shi biwom abi li hwua amen ye.
53003007	Men-agyang má ngye le nyong li ma yi ha amen há li ma yi lihwun-lihwun ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le mà ndè kung likpe lityan.
53003008	Nyong li ma yi ha amen há, li zī undi lihwua ye, ukpor li maa mbwa gbel sha aki lè abwo atyan ishu or, kusu or, lî ndè le li ba lè 'ingie ka amen ye.
53003009	Li ma yi he libwo angi le li bii amen le mà kwob li, ukpor li maa bii amen ye, likorye li kee le li tyung amen 'ukwo 'ununung hè men mà ndè kung likpe lityan.
53003010	Nyong li ma yi ha amen há, li maa tuu amen 'ubwo he 'utyung le: "Gbe undi a swan le u sha aki ye, mà ke-e lizi ye."
53003011	Li gyo le 'ì yi lè bendi besuso há he liwu līmen abe be hwun lihwun, be sha 'iwom ye. Ashi le bè shi 'iwom, be tan geb lè abwo abell tya he biwom bendi.
53003012	He lizen Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, li tim bendi abe be shi 'itaa ana anung le bè kwu womm, be shi aki hè be bè kwob 'uhwo-bell.
53003013	Bebuye, men ufe mà wee abwo lè 'inunung ashele ye.
53003014	Biwom abi li fee kong he 'ushia ahwun, undi uyang-yang angwu a kpē bi ye, mà nde-e sii, ma tan utyang ha ahe ye, hè ishwia ì shi-e.
53003015	Ukpor mà fel nde-e ná undi-linaa ūmen a ye, mà ke-e utebb ná unwandamen.
53003016	Atyetyan Ujeso ufe-gyang angwu u ke ikwun, ù hā ke men ikwun mbee 'unyong he akwo puu. Ù hā kwu utung ha amen puu.
53003017	Mi Uporl na mi fee igie anyin lè 'ubwo 'ugi: Mi Uporl, mi kong lè men. Kitaa i na mi fe 'ubwo he 'ushia 'uyang-yang ahwu mı fee.
53003018	Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ù hā ke men puu 'ukwun.
54001001	Mi Uporl angwu mì yi unwaa-isom Ujeso Ukristi na mı fee 'ushia ahwun. Unim angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan befe lè Ujeso Ukristi angwu bel lı ndor lishi ha ahe he biwom puu, befe na be shi-m mì yi unwaa-isom Ujeso.
54001002	Mi fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè wo Utimoti. Wo fel mi ná unwaa-gi ugyang a likorye wo pwom mi bong ha Unim. Unim Atyetyan befe lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi bè hā ka-a 'ukwun, be kwu lè beshi ha awo, be shi hè 'ì kwun-a he lityam kpatiaa.
54001003	He 'unyong ahwu mi ma ndo gye he 'ubong Umasedonia, mi ma ka-a utebb kangg le wò kwu he 'ubong Efesos. Kanaa-anaa nyin or, mi kee-a le wò ngyor kwu há ha-a à ndè le wo swan de bendi abe be hwua biwom atyetye lè ha 'igyang ashi mi hwua amen.
54001004	Wò tye be uten le bè tyang bitim ikorli ilaa abunale; be tyang ungwu apwomale gbe lè biwom abi betiebell be maa shi. Bimen i bi sha bendi be fa ifung likor-likor. Bi kpell bendi le bè shi 'iwom ashi Unim a kam ndor ābe le bè shi ye. Kiwom 'imen ashi Unim a kam ndor i, undi u ngya āshi gba he abongale ha Unim a.
54001005	Atan-lengi angwu 'i shi Unim a ke-m uten angwu mi ka-a le wò tye bendi bemen ana, ù yi le, hè 'ì shi bendi bè kwu lè benyin. Benyin abe 'itel i be ba lè he lityam angi lì yi gelalala; be be lè he ugim angwu a ngye ná ù shi 'iwom ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa; be be lè lityam afele ha Unim faale ilam.
54001006	Bendi gbamm be kung biwom abi bì yi 'igyang i ndor he itang. He atan-lengi anwun, be pwell 'ukwo, fel he bikukong abi akpel-ye.
54001007	Be kee le be kwa bendi abe be hwua bendi iten Unim, ki shi le biwom abi befe-gyang be kong lè ungwu ubell or, bi nung ābe ye.
54001008	Bel li ngye le Iten Unim i ngbebb, gbe 'ì yi le bendi be ndor āngi dell-dell.
54001009	Kì yi le lì ngye le Unim a shi iten imen i ke bendi benunung a ye, a shi āngi ke bendi bebibi abe be kwom 'utyung, be ke iten ife ye, lè abe be ngye Unim or, ngwu bè pwom he or ye, lè bendi abe biwom Unim or bı nung abe ye, lè abe be gwu betyabell lè bendabell, lè abe be gwu bendi, lè abe be tan akpela, lè bengikye abe be gbe ipel ha bende-bell bengikye, lè abe be zì kwu bendi, lè abe be tam le be kong 'igyang, ukpor bè yii bà uman, lè abe be shi biwom abi bi teng iteng puu abi bì yi atyetye lè ha 'igyang ashi li hwua amen. Bendi abe 'itel i na Unim a shi iten ima ke be.
54001011	Kigyang ashi mi hwua amen i, kì yi 'isom 'inunung ashi Unim a kung āshi fe-m he 'ubwo a. Kisom 'inunung 'ì yi gbe lè ifem Unim, Unim angwu ufe-gyang ù yi 'ukwun a lè 'uhwo-ma.
54001012	Mi pee Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, angwu a ke-m 'iken ashi mı shi aki ama. Mi pee he likorye a ndè le mi kpè le ù fe lityam ha ami, a gia kung mi le mì shi-e aki.
54001013	Leěti mi maa kong bia he, mi teb lè he, mi fe-e ishwia he 'uhwo. He biwom abi mi shi-e i puu or, a tyung beshi ha ami likorye mi ma ngye-e or, ngwu mì bong ha ahe mà ye a.
54001014	Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi a ma tyung inung ima ha ami kangg; u shi-m mi fel fe lityam ha ahe; u shi-m mi fel lè benyin ha bendi. U kung abongale lè benyin ka bendi abe be gwaa ipel ha ahe.
54001015	Kigyang ashin na 'ì yi le bendi puu bè bong. Kigyang ashi há 'ì yi le Ujeso Ukristi a be he igye anyin le he-e ù be kpan bendi-iban. Mi-i shi biban hwò bendi puu. He atan-lengi anwun na a tyung beshi bema ha ami angwu mi shi biban hwò puu, le he-e ù shi bendi bè ndè shob lityam angibale lima. A shi ashin tyung 'itaa a ke bendi puu abe be be bong ha ahe, be be kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm.
54001017	Kì yi le bendi bè kung ipee lè ifem ke-e ufe angwu ufe-ufe na ù yi Unim ugyang, u shi Usu angwu u ngyor igye kpamm; ufe u hwa ye, undi u nde-e lè ashi he igye anyin ye. Kì ngyor ná li kong.
54001018	Unwaa-gi Utimoti, mi kung likong anyin fa-a he 'ubwo le ha-a à hwua bendi. Ashin 'i shi nya a na igie angi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be tye ugie gbe lè wo leěti. Igie imen i, ì ka-a ikeb ha-a à kwu 'uhwo ndo 'ukye ngbebb-ngbebb ná undi Unim.
54001019	Wo-ò gye 'ushu fe lityam ha Ujeso Ukristi, wo mbee kwu lè ugim angwu a ngye ná ù shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa. Kì yi lè bendi abe be shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa ná ugim ubell a de be ye. He atan-lengi anwun, be do abongale ubell, nya a na 'inong lishor 'ı ti fe he 'ukor he lishor 'ı ban nà.
54001020	He liwu bendi abe be do abongale, kì yi Uhimenayes lè Alezanda. Mi tyang ābe ke Usetan, usu bibibi, le hè shi 'ì hwua ābe le bè tem kong bia Unim ye.
54002001	Ukpi-ikwu mi kee le mi tebb amen le mà kong ha Unim ke bendi puu. Mà bii he le ù kpell ābe; ma keb 'uhwo-men ke-e, pee he.
54002002	Ki ngbebb le mà kong ha Unim ke besu lè bekaandi abe be kam bendi, hè li lì kwu lè ikwun, li shi ashi 'ı keè ha Unim, li mbee shi likpe linunung he akwo puu.
54002003	Ki ngbebb le mà kong ha Unim 'itaa ana. Unim ugyang angwu u kpan li or, ki ngbebb he ná.
54002004	Ufe a kee le bendi puu bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong, u kee le bè ngye 'igyang.
54002005	Unim ù kee-kee yi ken a. Ki kee-kee shi lè undi ken a angwu a naa he 'udyan Unim lè bendigye he-e ù gwell ābe. Undi angwu há ù yi Ujeso Ukristi.
54002006	Ujeso Ukristi a kung 'uhwo-ma ke pong bendi puu. A shi ashin he 'unyong kpa-kpa ahwu Unim a kee le ù kpan bendi puu.
54002007	Ashin na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu Unim a waa kung mi ná unwaa-isom uma, a som mi le mì lè hwua bendi he abong angi à yi Ijuus a ye, le bè bong ha 'isom ashi 'ì yi 'igyang. Mi kong 'igyang a, mi bà uman a ye.
54002008	Mi kee le he 'iteng 'iyang-yang bengikye be kong ha Unim, be kung 'uhwo-bell shang gbangg ke Unim, bè kung abwo abell he 'usi nya a na be kong ha Unim. Kì yi le he 'unyong ahwu be kong ha Unim bè kwu lè ingywo ha bende or, ngwu bè kwu lè ifung he atyam abell or ye.
54002009	Bengingye or, mi kee ābe le bè tyung likpe linunung, be bwee 'uhwo-bell he 'uhwo ūkee. Bè kwu lè ugim ununung gbe lè 'ukwo ahwu bè bwee, ná bè tim igil ibell or, bihwom bibell or bì kaa 'ate he 'uhwo ūkee,
54002010	hè be bè tyung likpe linunung nya a na be fel bendi Unim i.
54002011	Bè mbu 'uhwo kwu womm he liwu 'ipi bengikye be hwua 'iwom.
54002012	Mi-i bong bengingye le bè fel lè bengikye or, ngwu bè hwua ābe 'iwom or ye. Ki yi ngbebb-ngbebb le bengingye bè kwu womm he liwu bendi abongale.
54002013	Má ngye le Unim a ma mbe Adam a 'ushu, saa u há mbe Ifu.
54002014	Usetan or a ma lam Adam a ye, a ma lam Ifu a. Ufe na a ma ban uten Unim.
54002015	Mà na or, Unim u ba kpan ungingye gbà he bebwaa ahwanale, gbe a mā ma ngyor naa he lityam afele ha Ujeso Ukristi, u shi lè benyin ha bendi, u kwu utaa-utaa he akwo ama puu, u mbee tyung bendi likpe linunung.
54003001	Likong likaandi na mı kong i. Gbe undi a kee le u kwa ukaandi liwu bendi abongale, hà a gia aki anunung.
54003002	Ukaandi angwu 'itel i, kì yi kpe-kpe le ù kwu faale uben. Ù kee-kee kwu lè ungye ken a, u kwu dangg, u ngye ná ù kwu 'uhwo-ma, u kwu undi angwu u gim ugim kpa-kpa, u ndor 'uhwo-ma utaa-utaa, u tyung likpe linunung, u kwu undi angwu 'i ngbebb he le ù kpē begaandi ha ahe ushu, u kpè le ù hwua bendi 'iwom,
54003003	u kwu undi ibwom a ye, u kwu undi linaa ashele ye, u kwu mbiloo, u kwu ikwun ha bendi, u kwu undi 'igyor únde a ye.
54003004	U kam ushu uma ngbebb-ngbebb, u teng bebwaa-ma he 'ukwo ahwu be ke-e ife.
54003005	Gbe undi a ngye ná ù kam ushu uma ugyang or mbee ye, ù hà ndo kam liwu bendi abongale mbee ye.
54003006	Ù kwu undi ufufe a he abongale ha Unim ye, teng 'i sha he u fel he idim, Unim u maa he ushe nya a na a maa usu bibibi.
54003007	Ù kwu undi angwu bendi 'ubong be ke-e ife, hè Usetan, usu bibibi, ù fe-e ishwia he 'uhwo gbe he alamale uma ye.
54003008	Bendi abe be waa le bè kpell shi aki he liwu bendi abongale, kì yi kpe-kpe le befe or bè kwu lè likpe linunung. Bè kwu bendi ingwu ifee a ye. Bè ngwo bingwungwo abi bikaa-bikaa a ye; be kee lifem he 'ukwo 'ubibi a ye;
54003009	be ngyor naa genn he ashele 'igyang ashi Unim a fem tyung li, be kwu lè ugim nwongg gbe lè 'igyang 'imen ana.
54003010	Mà gil ābe ndè; gbe be gbe ugilale, saa ma hà ke be libwo le bè shi aki he liwu bendi abongale.
54003011	Bengye-bell or bè kwu lè likpe linunung. Bè bun ibubun ye; be ngye ná bè kwu 'uhwo-bell; be shi biwom puu dell-dell a.
54003012	Undi angwu u shi aki he liwu bendi abongale, kì yi le ù kwu lè ungye ken a, u kam ushu uma ngbebb-ngbebb.
54003013	Bendi-ukpell abe be shi aki abell he liwu bendi abongale ngbebb-ngbebb, be sha bendi be fa lityam ha abe, bè ha kwa lè ikeb le be bun porr da bendi gba lè Ujeso Ukristi angwu be bong ha ahe.
54003014	Mì yi lè ugim le hang mi be kong lè wo akikye. Mi fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè wo le gbe mi mā ma shwie be ye, ha-a à ngye ná lı shi ashi lı shi ná bendi Unim. Bendi Unim na bè yi liwu bendi abongale ha Unim angwu ù yi uwum. Liwu bendi abongale na lı kwu 'igyang ashi Unim naa genn.
54003016	Biwom 'undyell abi bel li bong ha abi, bí kwu he 'uhwo kangg. Bì yi le: Ujeso a bel fel undigye, hà be he igye anyin. Ukatia Kunyong Unim ù shi 'ì nung bendi le Ujeso ù yi 'igyang. Idengell Unim i nde-e. Bendi be bun gbe lè he de bendi abong puu. Bendigye be bong ha ahe. Unim u kung he gye he lifung-atabe lè ke-e ifem.
54004001	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a bun gboo de li le iti-ishi bendi besuso be ba tyang abongale ha Unim. Be fel ba ka ife he biwom abi ikeb ibibi angi ı bè iman i hwua, be shi ābi.
54004002	Ihwuale anyin i ba lè ha bendi-uman abe be tem ndè shob 'iwom ashi 'ì yi 'igyang ye a, likorye ikeb ibibi i shi igim ibell i fel ikaa-ikaa.
54004003	Bendi abe 'itaa i, be hwua bendi le 'i ngbebb le bè bee libee ye, be tel bitaa azi bisuso. Ki shi le Unim a shi azi amen i le bendi abe be bong ha ahe, be ngye 'igyang, hè be bè pee he, be kung āngi zī a.
54004004	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi Unim a shi 'i ngbebb. Kì yi lè 'iwom ashi le bendi Unim bè tel ye. Kì yi ngbebb-ngbebb le bè zī ābe pee Unim ipee.
54004005	Gbe be shi ashin, kiwom 'iyang-yang 'i fel 'itaa-itaa he 'uhwo igie Unim lè akongale ha ahe ke shi.
54004006	Gbe wo kung biwom abin hwua bebuye bendi Unim, hà wo shi aki Ujeso Ukristi ngbebb-ngbebb. Biwom abi wo bong ha abi i, bi shi-a wo kwa kang-kang he 'ukwo Unim nya a na wo shi 'igyang ashi bel li hwua-a.
54004007	Wo-ò swan ikorli ilaa. Ki nyin Unim lè ngi ye. Hwua 'uhwo-gang, ha-a à ndè le wo sha likpe angi li ngbebb Unim.
54004008	Bendi besuso be hwua agwo abell le hè ngi à kwu kang-kang. Ashin 'i ban ye. Ukpor gbe ma kam àtyám āmen ndor le à fe Unim, hà ashin 'i ngbebb hwò puu, likorye Unim a ke úkyébb le bendi abe be shi 'imen i be kwa lè likpan 'unyong 'anaa-anaa nyin, be kwu lè ngi ngyor igye kpamm.
54004009	Likong likaandi angi lì yi le bendi puu bè bong na mı kong i.
54004010	Lī kwa 'uhwo kangg sha aki Unim likorye li ndor lishi ha Unim angwu ù yi uwum, u shi Undi-likpan bendi puu, mbee-mbee lè bendi abe be bong ha ahe.
54004011	Wo-ò kong ha bendi lè ikeb kangg, wo hwua ābe biwom abin.
54004012	Wò shī tyang bendi bè fel nda-a ilaa-ilaa le bwo wò yi 'isun ye. Ukpor wò shi likpe linunung angi lı tyung bendi Unim ná 'ì yi le bè kwu. Shi ashin he biwom abi wo kong lè abi wo shi. Kì mbee yi le wò tyung ābe likpe linunung he 'ukwo ahwu 'ı nyin-a lè bendi lè 'itaa wo fe lityam ha Unim lè 'itaa wò yi gelalala faale 'iban.
54004013	Biwom abin na wò shi há nyong mi. Bo igie Unim de bendi he 'ugbo. Fe ābe ingie le bè shi igie Unim, wo ke be uhwuale.
54004014	Naa lityam tyang 'uke aki ashele ahwu Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ka-a ye. Kuke 'ugang 'umen na 'u ma be hwaa lè wo he 'unyong ahwu bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be tye ugie he ikeb Unim, nyong bekaandi he liwu bendi abongale be ma pwom-a abwo kong ha Unim ka-a.
54004015	Shi biwom abin, wo kung 'uhwo-gang keb ke bi hè bendi puu bè ndè ná wo gye 'ushu ngbebb-ngbebb.
54004016	Wò kang 'uhwo-gang; wo baā he biwom abi wo hwua bendi. Gye 'ushu he ashele biwom abin. Gbe wo shi ná, wo ba kpan 'uhwo-gang, wo mbee kpan bendi abe be gyo biwom abi wo hwua.
54005001	Ki ngbebb le wò kong ha bekaashi bengikye faale ife ye, kong ha abe ná wo kong ha betia á nà. Kung ishomate ná bebwanaa nà.
54005002	Wò mbee kung bekaashi bengingye ná benaa nà. Wo kung bebwaasul ná bebwanaa nà, ukpor ugim ugang gbe lè be ù kwu utaa-utaa.
54005003	Ndè gbe lè bengye-uhwuu abe bè yi lè undi ye.
54005004	Gbe ungye-uhwuu ù yi lè bebwaa or, igia or, kì yi ke bebwaa abe há le bè ngye 'ukwo kpa-kpa ahwu bè ndè gbe lè bendi bebell, ná 'ì yi ke bendi Unim le bè shi. Gbe be shi ashin, hà be shi betyabell lè betiebell 'itaa ken ná betyabell lè betiebell be ma shi ābe a. Ashin na Unim a kee.
54005005	Ungye-uhwuu angwu 'ima 'i yi 'igyang-igyang le ù yi lè undi ye, a ndor lishi ha Unim; ishu or, kusu or, u kong ha Unim, u bii he ukpell ke 'uhwo-ma.
54005006	Ukpor ungye-uhwuu angwu a fel he 'ugwu lè ishagba ashele, mà na u tan ana or, a hwō mà.
54005007	Kong ashin ha abe lè ikeb kangg hè be bè shi likpe linunung hè bendi bè bia ābe ye.
54005008	Kigyang-igyang, gbe undi u ndè gbe lè behwan-ma ye, u ndè gbe lè ushu uma ugyang or ye, hà a tyung le a bong ha Ujeso Ukristi 'igyang a ye. Undi angwu 'itel i, a ban àshì hwò bendi abe be bong ha Unim ye.
54005009	Gbe wò fee azen bengye-uhwuu fe he 'ushia, ungye-uhwuu angwu a gbe gyong aze asi akie ye, wo fee he ye. Angwu a bee lè ukyebb ken a ye, wo fee he ufe or ye titi.
54005010	Kì yi le bè kwu bengye-uhwuu abe bendi be kong 'inunung gbe lè be he aki anunung angi be shi; be tyung bebwaa-bell 'ukwo 'ununung; be kpe begaandi he ishu ibell; be to bendi Unim abee; be kpell bendi abe be kpe 'ingie; be shi binunung bitaa atyetye-atyetye he akwo puu; be kung 'ùnyōng 'ubell puu shi binunung.
54005011	Shī fee azen bengye-uhwuu abe bè so bebwaasul ye, likorye pisusoye be ba tyang Ujeso Ukristi he 'igyor libee abeeale.
54005012	Gbe be mā ma shi ná, hà 'i ba ba lè 'ingie ka ābe, likorye be ban ukpi-ikwu ukyebb ubell angwu be ke Ujeso Ukristi.
54005013	Ki mbee shi le, be fel ban 'unyong tan indyebb yam-yam-yam. Ashi 'i hà ban hwò puu, kì yi le, be ndo bun ungwu, geb lè ungwu tye he biwom bendi, be bun ibubun angi ì yi le hang be bun ye.
54005014	Gbé 'ì yi le be sha abin, mi kee le bengye-uhwuu abe bè so bebwaasul bè gye libee lè hwan bebwaa, be ndè gbe lè ishu ibell, hè bendi-linaa betyan bè ndè libwo angi bè kong bia li ye.
54005015	Kì yi lè bengye-uhwuu abe be kung 'ukwo ahwu kpa-kpa ndor he itang or mà, be fel pwom Usetan, usu bibibi a.
54005016	He atan-lengi anwun, gbe 'ì yi lè ungingye angwu a bong ha Ujeso Ukristi, bendi bema bè gia yi bengye-uhwuu, ufe ù ndè gbe lè be. Ufe ù tem kung bengye-uhwuu abe bema ndor bendi abongale a le bè ndè gbe lè be ye, hè bendi abongale bè kwu lè 'ukwo le bè ndè gbe lè bengye-uhwuu abe bè yi lè undi ye.
54005017	Bekaandi abe be shi aki Unim ngbebb-ngbebb, mbee-mbee lè abe bè kung ikeb ibell puu ke he igie Unim abunale lè ahwuale bendi, kì yi ngbebb-ngbebb le bè fem ābe he akele ubell únde hwò bebell.
54005018	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Bigundu abi bı sha-a aki he utia, wò shī nyim ābi lizi kung indindi bua ābi he ungwu ye." Be mbee fee le: "Ki ngbebb le undi angwu u shi aki, ù zī."
54005019	Gbe undi ututeb a be bun da-a le ukaandi a shi 'iban, wo-ò shī bong ye, hà gbe bè yi befee ha bekie abe be bun da-a gbe lè he.
54005020	Bendi puu abe be gye 'ushu shi biban, ben ābe he 'ugbo, hè bendi abe be teng bè baā 'ushell.
54005021	He 'ushu ahwu Unim or, Ujeso Ukristi or, idengell ima or, mi tuu-a, wo Utimoti, 'ubwo he 'utyung le wò kpe itebb angi mi ka-a puu. Shī kpam àshì wu 'iban undi uyang-yang, ngwu wò fel shell undi or ye.
54005022	Shī buu ibuu fe abwo bong le undi ù kpi aki Unim ashele ye; wo gbe lè abwo agang fe he biban bendi ye; wo ndor 'uhwo-gang gelalala faale 'iban.
54005023	Wo-ò ngwo umbwo ufe-ufe a ye, ngwo 'utyuo zangg he 'uhwo lifung angi lı teb lè wo.
54005024	Biban abi bendi besuso be shi, bì yi he igye gboo; undi uyang-yang a ngye le be ba za libi he ushe Unim. Biban bendi abi bì so he 'undyell or, bi ba fem he igye gboo lè he 'ushu.
54005025	Kitaa a ken, binunung or bì yi he igye gboo; mà abi bì so he 'undyell or, bi ba ngyor he 'undyell ye.
54006001	Ifee puu ì shi ugim gbe lè betyabell le bè yi bendi abe befe ifee be ke be ife kangg a, hè bendi bè kong bia lizen Unim lè biwom abi lı hwua ye.
54006002	Ifee angi betyabell be bong ha Ujeso Ukristi a, i fel bia ābe le bwo bè yi bendi Unim a ye. Kì yi ngbebb-ngbebb le ifee imen i, ì fel shi aki betyabell hwò bebell abe be teng, likorye betyabell bemen abe 'i nyin ābe lè be i be bong ha Ujeso. Kì yi kpe-kpe le wò hwua abin, wo bun ābi de bendi.
54006003	Gbe 'ì yi lè undi angwu u hwua biwom abi bì yi atyetye, u bong ha 'igyang ashi Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ye, u swan biwom abi li hwua gbe lè 'ukwo ahwu lì pwom Unim,
54006004	undi umen i ù yi lè idim, u ngye 'iwom ye. Ù yi ná bendi abe 'ı nyin ābe le bè fe ifung he biwom abi bı kpell undi ye, be fe ifung he biwom likor. Ifung i shi bendi be ban lityam fe biwom bende, be gie bende bikwu, be ndo kong bia bende, be bun ibubun fe bende.
54006005	Bendi abe 'itel i, be fel lè igim liketye, be tem ngye 'igyang ye, be shwan 'ushwan mbee 'unyong. Be gim le gbe be fe Unim, hà 'i sha ābe be mbwa 'ingbebb.
54006006	Kì yi 'igyang a le undi angwu u fe Unim, gbe 'i kwun he 'igyor lè biwom abi ù yi lè bi, hà a mbu 'ingbebb he ashi Unim a.
54006007	He 'unyong ahwu li be he igye anyin, li be abubwo. Kitaa 'imen i na nyong lı gbe tyang igye anyin, lı gye abubwo.
54006008	He atan-lengi anwun, gbe lì yi lè lizi lè inditen, kì kwun li 'igyor.
54006009	Bendi abe be kee 'ingbebb, be mbwa he ugilale, bigyor ilaa bibell bi be lè 'ibibi. Kibibi ashi há 'i kwu ābe ná 'ikpamkpor 'ı kwu inyia nà. Ki shi ābe be tyang afele Unim gbangg. He ashin, ki be lè linim ke be.
54006010	Benyin únde na bè yi 'ikwu bibibi puu. Le bwo bendi bè yi lè 'igyor kangg le hang be kwu lè únde, be kung abongale ubell ha Ujeso Ukristi ndor he itang. Ashin 'i be lè bingie gbamm ke be.
54006011	Wo angwu wò yi undi Unim i, wò naa 'igbe-igbe lè he biwom bibibi abin. Kaa kangg ha-a à kwu ununung, wo shi ashi 'i ngbebb Unim, wo gye 'ushu bong ha Ujeso, wo kwu lè benyin ha bendi, wo ngib lityam naa genn, wo kwu mbiloo.
54006012	Kwu 'uhwo kangg ndo 'ukye ahwu abongale ha Unim ha-a à kwu lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm. Likpan limen i na Unim a ko-a le ha-a à kwu lè ngi, he 'unyong ahwu wo ma naa he ashi bendi gbamm, kong gboo le wo bong ha Ujeso Ukristi.
54006013	Unim angwu u ke biwom or, bendi or, likpan lè Ujeso Ukristi angwu a ma naa kong gboo he 'ushu Usu Upalet, he 'ushu 'ubell na mı ka-a iten anyin.
54006014	Ngye dangg le wo shi iten imen i yilididi. Shī ban āngi he 'ukwo 'uyang-yang ye kpamm Ujeso Ukristi u gbe tem be.
54006015	Gbe 'unyong 'u be fel há, Unim u ba sha he u ba. Unim angwu 'ukwun puu 'ù yi he 'ubwo 'uma, igye i shi he 'ubwo 'uma, ù yi Usu besu, u shi Atyam bekaandi puu.
54006016	Ufe-ufe na u ngyor igye kpamm. Ù yi he 'udyan 'ikung-gbo ashi 'ì yi lè undi angwu u die ngie há kpee-kpee ye. Kì yi lè undi he igye anyin angwu a bè nde-e ngye or, ngwu ù ha be nde-e or ye. Ifem ì kwu ke-e; kusu 'uma 'ù kwu ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor ná mi kong.
54006017	Bendi abe be mbu 'ingbebb he biwom igye anyin, ke be utebb lè ikeb kangg le bè fel he idim ye, be kung ugim ubell ndor ha abi ye, likorye bì yi ngyor igye ye. Ki ngbebb le bè kung ugim ubell ndor ha Unim hwan. Unim na u ke bendi biwom puu, u ke li biwom biyang-yang le lì kwu lè igor.
54006018	De be le bè shi binunung hè be bè zī 'azu he binunung ashele hwan. Bè kwell 'akwukwell ye, be kwu bendi abe be ke 'uke.
54006019	Gbe be mā ma shi abin, hà be kam biwom ndor abi bı be kpell ābe lè he 'ushu. Ashin 'i sha ābe be kwa lè likpan ligyang angyell.
54006020	Utimoti, wo-ò kang biwom abi Unim a kung fa-a he 'ubwo i. Swan ikorli ilaa lè ifung akpel-ye angi bendi besuso be ko le lingye.
54006021	Bendi besuso be pwom ungwu le bè yi lè lingye. He ashin be kung 'ukwo 'ugyang ndor he itang, tem bong ha Ujeso Ukristi ye. Unim ù hā ke men puu 'ukwun.
55001001	Mi Uporl angwu Unim a waa mi le mì kwu unwaa-isom Ujeso Ukristi le mî bun de bendi le Unim a ke úkyébb le u ka likpan gba he agwaale ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi na mı fee 'ushia ahwun.
55001002	Mi fee āhwu hwaa lè wo Utimoti, unwaa-gi lityam. Unim Atyetyan lè Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi usu utyan bè hā ka-a 'ukwun, be kwu lè beshi ha awo, be shi hè 'ì kwun-a he lityam kpatiaa.
55001003	Mi pee Unim angwu mı fe-e lityam ligi a ken ná betiegi be maa fe. Mbee 'unyong puu, ishu or, kusu or, mi kong ha Unim ka-a.
55001004	Mi well ná wo ma ki wu akye nyong mi ma gbe tyang-a. Mì yi lè 'igyor kangg le mi nda-a mî kwu lè igor kangg.
55001005	Mi ngye le wo bong ha Ujeso lityam ken ná andiegang Ulowis lè anaa Uyunis be ma bong. Mi ngye dangg le wo or wò yi lè 'itaa abongale umen ana titi.
55001006	He atan-lengi anwuna na mi well-a le wò kam 'uke aki ashele ahwu Unim a ma ka-a nyong mi ma pwom-a abwo he lishi.
55001007	Kì yi le Unim a ke li Ukatia Kunyong uma le ù shi li lì kwu lè 'ushell a ye, a ke li le he-e ù shi li lì kwu lè ikeb, li kwu lè benyin, li ngye ná lì kwu 'uhwo-tyan a.
55001008	He ashin, ishwia ì shi-a ná wò bun de bendi gboo gbe lè Atyetyan Ujeso ye. Mi angwu mì yi he igaadye he 'uhwo 'uma or, mì fel-a ishwia-ishwia ye. Ndè le wo naa genn kpē 'igang 'ingie he 'uhwo 'isom 'inunung gbe lè Ujeso ná Unim a ka-a ikeb.
55001009	Unim a kpan li, a shi li li fel bendi bema. A shi ná he 'uhwo 'inunung ashi bel li shi a ye, a shi li ná he 'uhwo inung ima lè ashi ufe-gyang a kong ndor a. A tyung inung anyin ha abel gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi, mà ukpong igye anyin i hà kpi.
55001010	Kanaa-anaa i a tyung inung ima ha abel gboo gbe he asomale Ujeso Ukristi, Undi-likpan utyan, be he igye anyin. A mbee lè ikeb lihwu, gbe he 'isom 'inunung a fem likpan angi lı ngyor igye tyung gboo.
55001011	Kisom 'inunung 'imen i na Unim a waa mi le mì kwu unwaa-isom angwu mı bun āshi, mi mbee hwua bendi áshi.
55001012	He 'uhwo áshi na mı kpe bingie abin. Mà na or, mi wee abwo ye, likorye mi ngye angwu mi bong ha ahe; mi ngye dangg le aki angi a ke-m le mì shi, ufe-gyang u kam āngi kpamm la wa nya Liti angi ufe-gyang a ndor.
55001013	Ngyor naa genn he 'igyang ashi mi hwua-a, mi mbee shi āshi tyung-a ná wò shi. Wò gye 'ushu kwu lè 'itaa abongale lè benyin abi bì yi ke li bel abe li gwaa ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi.
55001014	Gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu ù yi ha abel, kam biwom binunung abi Unim a kung fa-a he 'ubwo.
55001015	Wó ngye le he 'ubong Eshia, undi uyang-yang a buu tyang mi, Ufigeles befe lè Uhamorgenes or be buu tyang mi.
55001016	Unim ù tyung beshi ha bendi Undesiforles, likorye a fe-m ingie 'ugbe ibwan-ibwan. Ashi le mì yi he igaadye or, ki shi-e ishwia ye.
55001017	A be wu he Urom wu-wu, a keb mi ashunale kpamm a gbe nde-m.
55001018	Wó mbee ngye dangg gbe lè aki anunung angi a ma shi he Efesos. Atyetyan ù hā tyung beshi bema ha ahe he Liti limen angi a ndor.
55002001	Unwaa-gi, wo ufe wò naa genn gbe he ikeb àngi Unim, he inung ima, u ke li gbe li gwaa ha Ujeso Ukristi.
55002002	Biwom abi wo gyo mi mi hwua he ashi bendi gbamm, kung ābi fe bendi abe wo fe lityam ha abe he 'ubwo. Bè kwu bendi abe be kpè le be tem lè bi hwua bendi besuso titi a.
55002003	Kam le wo kpā 'ingie utung ha abel ná undi ishogya ununung angwu Ujeso Ukristi.
55002004	Undi ishogya he ungwu aki u gba lè abwo ama fa he biwom abi ūshù ye. U kee-kee kaa kangg he-e ù shi nyin ukaandi uma a.
55002005	Undi angwu u paa akye, u kee-kee kpa 'uke gbe a buu ná iten akye i kong a.
55002006	Undi utia or titi, angwu u shi aki kang-kang na ù zī uhwaa 'iwom lè ha ahe utia.
55002007	Shi ugim gbe lè biwom abi mı kong i, Atyetyan Ujeso ù hā sha-a hè biwom abin puu bì nung-a.
55002008	Gye 'ushu shi ugim gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi angwu a wum lè he lihwu, u be ubu lè ha Udebid. Ashin na 'ì yi lishi 'isom 'inunung ashi mı bun de bendi.
55002009	He ashi le mi bun 'isom 'inunung imen i na mı kpe 'ingie i, be fe-m he igaadye ná be fe uzi nà. Ukpor igie Unim ife, be fe ngi he igaadye ye.
55002010	Ashin 'i shi-m mi kam le mi kpa bingie abin puu he 'uhwo bendi abe Unim a waa kung, le hè be bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi angi lı be lè ifem ngyor igye kpamm.
55002011	Dang 'utyung gyo 'igyang ashin: "Gbe 'ì yi le li hwō utung ha ahe, li ba kwa bewum utung ha ahe.
55002012	Gbe li gye 'ushu naa genn kpe 'ingie puu, li ba kwa besu utung ha ahe. Ukpor gbe li swan he, ufe or u ba swan li.
55002013	Mà bel lì yi àtyám afee gbe lè he or, ufe u ba sha nya a na a kong, likorye ù yi libell lifee ye."
55002014	Gye 'ushu well bendi Unim gbe lè biwom abi wo gyo i, wo tuu abe 'ubwo he 'utyung he 'ushu Unim le bè fe ifung ye. I sha 'inunung zangg or ye, i kee-kee ban igim bendi abe be gyo āngi iban.
55002015	Kaa kangg ha-a à shi ashi 'i ngbebb Unim, wo bun 'isom 'igyang ashi Unim dell-dell, ha-a à kwu undi aki angwu ishwia ı shi-e lè aki ama a ye.
55002016	Gbe lè abwo agang fe he ikorli ilaa ye. Ki nyin Unim lè ngi ye, i sha undi u tyang 'ukwo Unim.
55002017	Kitaa likong ashina 'ì yi ná 'ibaa ukpasho ashi 'ı bi ye, kı gang igang igang nà. Bendi befee abe be shi 'imen i bè yi Uhimenayes lè Ufilitus.
55002018	Be tyang 'ukwo ahwu 'igyang, be fel da le bendi be wum lè he lihwu mà. He ashin be do abongale bendi besuso.
55002019	Ukpor lìshií angi Unim a fe, li ngie kangg, kì yi lè ashi 'ı nyung āngi ye. Be fee nya he likwu ángi le: "Unim a ngye bendi abe bè yi bema." Be mbee fee nya le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a de le ù yi undi Unim a, ù tyang bibibi ashele."
55002020	He ushom ukaandi uyang-yang, kì yi lè bigbor lizi bitaa atyetye-atyetye. Bisuso, be kung igold lè isiliba a shi ābi; bisuso, be kung ìkwán lè limbe a shi ābi. Bisuso, be ndor ābi ka 'unyong 'ipam; bisuso, be shi 'iwom lè bi he liti liyang-yang.
55002021	Gbe undi a ndor lityam lima litaa-litaa lè he bibibi, u kwa ná 'igbor ashi 'i ngbebb aki ashele he liti 'ipam ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke átyám le ù kung fe 'iwom.
55002022	He atan-lengi anwuna mi da-a le wò ndè le wo gbe lè abwo agang fe he biwom akpel-ye abi bebwaa-idem be shi ana ye. Ndè le wo kung lityam ligang ndor he ashele binunung, lè afele lityam ha Ujeso Ukristi, lè akwele lè benyin, lè akwele ikwun ha bendi, nya a na bendi puu abe be teng àbe àtyám abell à yi ataa-ataa, be mbee fe lityam ha Atyetyan le u kpell ābe.
55002023	Ndè le wo gbe lè abwo agang fe he ifung akpel-ye angi ì yi lè lifem ye ana ye. Ifung angi 'itaa ana i ba lè 'ushwan.
55002024	Kì yi le undi angwu u shi Atyetyan Ujeso aki ù shwan 'ushwan ye. Kì yi le ù kwu ikwun ha bendi puu, u kwu lè lityam angibale, u hwua bendi biwom he 'ukwo 'ununung.
55002025	Nyong bendi be kpē ashi u hwua ye, ù mbu 'uhwo tebb ābe. Pisoye Unim u kpell ābe be gie ugim tem item hè be bè ngye 'igyang.
55002026	Mà na Usetan, usu bibibi, a ma kwu ābe fe, u shi ābe be fel kee-kee shi ashi ufe a kee a or, pisoye 'i nung ābe be buu hwaa lè he abwo ama.
55003001	Mi kee le wò ngye le he 'unyong ahwu igye anyin i ndo be mbee i, biwom bi ba kwa bikaa-bikaa.
55003002	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, ki fel ba nyin bendi lè 'uhwo-bell, be ba fel lè 'igyor únde, be kung 'uhwo-bell pwom ungwu. Bendi be fel ba dim idim, be kong bia bendi, be ke betyabell lè bendabell ife ye. Bendi bè tem ba kwa lè ipee he ungwu ye, be ke Unim ife ye.
55003003	Kì tem ba gbee ābe lè bendi ye, be tyang ke bende ye, be kong ban azen bende. Bendi be fel ba sha bibibi faale abwo akwele ná inyia ibibi nà, be tel 'inunung.
55003004	Bendi be fel ba kung 'undyell bendi bun da bendi-linaa bebell, be fel ba sha biwom ha 'akem 'abell. Idim i ba kpa kung bendi lishi. Kì tem ba nyin bendi lè Unim ye; ki fel ba nyin ābe lè biwom abi bi ngbebb ābe a.
55003005	Bendi be fel ba fa Unim he bikpe-ashi, ukpor be swan ikeb Unim. Ndè le wo ndor 'uhwo-gang 'igbe-igbe lè ha bendi abe 'itaa ana.
55003006	Bendi bemen i, besuso be gya he ishom bendi hà lam kwa bikpel-ye bengingye abe biban bibell bi go, bì yi fem ābe 'ushun, bengingye abe igim ibell or titi ì yi ābe kpatiaa ye.
55003007	Bengingye abe 'itaa ana be ndor 'utyung gyo ihwuale iyang-yang, ukpor be nde shob àshi 'ì yi 'igyang ye.
55003008	Nya a na leěti Ujanis lè Ujambris be ma kpē ashi Umosis a maa kong ye, na bendi aben 'unyin i be kpe 'igyang ye. Igim ibell i ban, abongale ubell u shi angwu ugyang-ugyang a ye.
55003009	Ukpor baā be be fe lishi, likorye baa 'ı nung undi uyang-yang le ashi be shi 'ì yi akpel-ye a, nya a na leěti 'i ma nung bendi le ashi Ujanis lè Ujambris be maa shi 'ì yi akpel-ye a a.
55003010	Ukpor wo ufe, wō pwom biwom abi mi hwua, wō ndè kung likpe ligi. Wó ngye ashi 'ì yi-m he lityam-lityam, wo ngye abongale ugi. Wo mbee ngye ná mi ngib lityam kpē 'ingie lè 'itaa mì yi lè benyin ha bendi, wo ngye ná mi ngyor naa genn kpē 'ingie.
55003011	Wō ndè lè ashi agang ná bendi be teb lè mi, lè 'itaa mi kpē bibibi bingie abi be ke-m he Antiyok, lè Ikoniyem lè Ulistra, ukpor Atyetyan Ujeso a fem mi lè há puu.
55003012	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le u gwaa 'uhwo-ma ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi, u shi ashi Unim a kee, u kpa 'ingie.
55003013	Bendi bebibi lè abe be shi biwom he bikpe-ashi be gya 'ushu sha bibibi ta ita ita ita, befe be lam bendi, bendi be lam ābe.
55003014	Ukpor wo ufe, wò gye 'ushu shi biwom abi mi hwua-a, abi wo bong lityam ken. Wó ngye àbe be hwua-a biwom bimen ana.
55003015	Wó well le kung lè há 'isun 'igang na wo ngye Kushia Unim ahwu 'u tyung undi ná u kwu lè likpan 'unyong gbe he abongale ha Ujeso Ukristi.
55003016	Puu abi be fee he Kushia Unim puu 'i be lè ha Unim a, bi ngbebb ahwuale bendi 'igyang, atyungale bendi biban bibell, anongale bendi 'ukwo ahwu kpa-kpa, lè ahwuale bendi ná bè shi biwom kpa-kpa.
55003017	Gbe undi Unim u shi ābi, u kpè mbee akekel puu le u sha 'itaa aki anunung ayang-yang.
55004001	Well le Ujeso Ukristi u tem ba he igye anyin, ba kwa Usu, u be maa bendi bewum lè abe be hwō ushe. He ashina he 'ushu Unim lè ahwu Ujeso Ukristi, mi tuu-a 'ubwo he 'utyung le,
55004002	wò bun igie Unim, gye 'ushu bun āngi, maa anung 'unyong ye, tyung bendi biban bibell, tuu ābe 'ubwo he 'utyung le bè shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa, gye 'ushu mbu 'uhwo hwua bendi biwom.
55004003	Mi kong ashin likorye 'unyong 'u ba lè há, ahwu bendi be tem be dang 'utyung gyo ihwuale igyang angyell ye. Be fel ba kee-kee bong gyo abi bi ngbebb ābe a; he ashina be ba gbong bendi le be hwua ābe abi befe be kee.
55004004	Bè tem ba dang 'utyung gyo 'igyang ye; be fel ba gyo ikorli itim angi ì yi lè lifem ye a.
55004005	Ukpor wo ufe, wò ngyor naa he 'igyang mbee 'unyong puu, naa genn kpē 'ingie, shi aki undi angwu u tan bun igie Unim, shi aki puu yilididi angi Unim a ka-a le wò shi.
55004006	Mi ufe, kunyong 'u fel ahwu mì pwom lishi he aki Unim, mi be kwu 'itaa ken ha 'ityuale ashi be shang Unim. Kunyong ahwu mì tyang igye anyin 'u fel há.
55004007	Mi kwu 'iken ndo 'ukye hwò, mi buu akye wu he 'ubi, mi gye 'ushu bong ha Ujeso be wu he umbee-likel.
55004008	Ashi 'i fel teng 'ì yi 'uke ahwele ahwu 'ù yi ke bendi abe be shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa, ahwu Atyetyan Ujeso angwu u shi bilebale ye a ndor mi he Liti angi a ndor. A ndor imi-imi a ye, a ndor bendi puu abe bè yi lè 'igyor abele uma.
55004009	Kaa kangg ha-a à be akikye,
55004010	likorye Udimas a buu tyang mi. Benyin igye be kpe-e ityuu a gbe ndo he 'ubong Utesalonaika. Ukresen u gbe ndo he Ugalesha, Utaitus u gbe ndo he Udalmashia.
55004011	Uluk ufe-ufe na a fel teng utung ha ami hen. Be lè Umak utung ha awo, ù yi-m lè lifem he aki agi.
55004012	Mi som Utikikes gye he Efesos.
55004013	Nyong wo be, be lè 'iteteb aliga 'igi ashi mi tyang ndor he 'ipi Ukapes he Utrowas. Wò be lè ashia agi or titi; angi a dyam mi hwò puu na à yi angi mi fee 'iwom.
55004014	Alezanda angwu u ndè 'ùndè a shi-m 'ibibi kangg. Atyetyan Ujeso na u be hwee he he ashi a shi.
55004015	Wo or titi ndo baa he, likorye u fa ifung kangg gbà lè 'isom ashi lı bun.
55004016	Kushu-ushu nyong mi ma naa mı maa ushe, undi ken or a ma naa mi he item ye; undi uyang-yang a ma buu tyang mi. Unim ù hā tyang ke be.
55004017	Ukpor Atyetyan Ujeso a naa mi he item, u ke-m ikeb angi mı bun 'isom 'inunung mbee akekel ashi puu hè bendi abe bè yi Ijuus a ye or bè gyo āshi. A kpan mi lè he abwo begaba.
55004018	Mí ngye dangg le Atyetyan u kpan mi lè he bibibi puu, u te lè mi ikwun-ikwun lè wu he Kiteng-usu 'ima he lifung-atabe. Ifem ì kwu ke-e ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor a 'itaa ana.
55004019	Kong mi lè Uprisila lè Akwila, wo mbee kong lè bendi Undesiforles.
55004020	Irastes ù so he Ukorint, mi tyang Utrofimes he Umalites likorye a ma yi gogo ye.
55004021	Kaa kangg ha-a à be mà ukpong 'akwuo 'a hà beb. Uyubulus, lè Upudens, lè Ulainus lè Ukeladia be de-m le mì kong lè wo; bebuye bendi Unim hen puu be de-m le mì kong lè wo.
55004022	Atyetyan Ujeso ù kwu utung ha awo. Unim ù ke men puu 'ukwun.
56001001	Mi Uporl angwu mì yi uboyi Unim, mi mbee shi unwaa-isom Ujeso Ukristi na mı fee 'ushia ahwun. Unim a som mi le mì lè shi abongale bendi abe ufe a waa kung à kwu kang-kang, mi hwua ābe bè ngye 'igyang puu gbe lè 'ukwo Unim,
56001002	ahwu 'u shi bendi be ndor lishi likpan angi lì yi ngyor igye. Unim angwu u bè uman ye a ke li úkyébb likpan limen i mà ukpong u hà shi igye anyin.
56001003	Nyong 'unyong 'u ma fel há, ufe Unim angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan a fem likpan limen i be he igye gbe he igie ima. A kung aki abunale 'isom 'ima fe-m he 'ubwo, u de le mì bun āshi kpe-kpe-kpe.
56001004	Mi fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè wo Utaitus angwu wò yi unwaa-gi ugyang a he abongale angwu ù yi ke li puu. Unim Atyetyan lè Ujeso Ukristi, Undi-likpan utyan, bè hā ka-a 'ukwun, be shi hè 'ì kwun-a he lityam kpatiaa.
56001005	Atan-lengi angwu mi ndor-a he Ukrit ù yi le ha-a à mbee biwom shi abi bi teng lè ashele, wo waa bekaandi ndor he liwu bendi abongale he 'ubong 'uyang-yang. Well utebb angwu mi ka-a le:
56001006	kì yi kpe-kpe le ukaandi liwu bendi abongale ù kwu faale ungwu atimale, u kee-kee kwu lè ungye ken a, bebwaa-ma be kwu bendi abe be fe Unim a, be shi akpe abibi ye, be kpo lishi ye.
56001007	Bwo 'ì yi le atie-lishi liwu bendi abongale u nda gba lè biwom Unim a, kì yi kpe-kpe le ù kwu faale ungwu atimale, u kwu undi idim a ye, u kwu undi 'agbugbel a ye, u kwu undi ibwom a ye, u kwu undi linaa ashele a ye, u kwu undi angwu u kee lifem he 'ukwo 'ubibi a ye.
56001008	Kì yi kpe-kpe le ù gor kpē begaandi gye ha ahe ushu, u kwu undi angwu 'i nyin he lè 'inunung. Ù kwu undi angwu u gim ugim kpa-kpa, u shi biwom puu kpa-kpa, u ndor 'uhwo-ma utaa-utaa lè he 'iban, u ngye ná ù kwu 'uhwo-ma.
56001009	Kì yi kpe-kpe le ù kwu undi angwu a naa genn he 'isom 'igyang ashi bel li hwua, saa u ha kwa lè ikeb angi u hwua bendi 'igyang he-e ù fe be ingie. U mbee kwu lè ikeb angi u tyung bendi abe be shi atyetye lè ha 'isom ashin le bè yi liketye.
56001010	Kì yi lè bendi gbamm abe be kpo lishi, mbee-mbee lè bendi Ijuus abe be de le undi uyang-yang angwu a fel undi Unim ù ten kpe-kpe. Be kong akpel-ye a, be lam bendi ilam.
56001011	Kì yi kpe-kpe le wò shi ābe bè shib ungwu, likorye be hwua bendi biwom abi 'ì yi le hang be hwua ye, be hwua ābi kee únde a, ashina 'ì yi ishwia-ishwia. Gbe he ashin be sha bikwu-lihwan bi tyang 'ukwo Unim.
56001012	Undi ubell ugyang ken angwu u ndè benim a de le: "Bendi Ukrit bè yi bendi-uman a, bè yi ná inyia ibibi nà, be hwun lihwun ukpor be gwul ye."
56001013	Ashi a kong ana 'ì yi 'igyang. He ashina, ndè le wo kong ha abe igie ikaa-ikaa hè be bè bong àshi 'ì yi 'igyang,
56001014	hè be bè tem gye 'ushu gyo ikorli itim Ijuus angi ì yi lè lifem ye ana ye, be pwom iten bendi abe be swan 'igyang ana ye.
56001015	Undi angwu lityam lima lì yi litaa-litaa, biwom puu bi kwa he bitaa-bitaa, ukpor undi angwu ù yi ubibi, u bong ha Ujeso ye, kì yi le ashi 'ì yi-e 'itaa-itaa ye, likorye ugim uma a ban, u ngya atyetye 'inunung lè 'ibibi ye.
56001016	Be kong he ungwu le befe be ngye Unim, ukpor likpe libell li tyung gboo le be ngye-e ye. Be ban tang abwo tang abee, be ka Unim ife ye. Kì yi lè 'inunung ashi be shi mbee ye.
56002001	Wo-gyang ufe, ndè le wo hwua biwom abi bi keè he 'igyang ashi li hwua bendi.
56002002	Tebb bengikye abe gbel le bè shi 'iwom 'iyang-yang he 'uhwo ūkee, be kwu gbelakaa ye, bè kwu dangg, abongale ubell ha Ujeso Ukristi ù kwu ugyang-ugyang, be kwu lè benyin begyang abell ha bendi, be kwu bendi lityam angibale.
56002003	Wō tebb bengingye abe gbel le bè ke Unim ife he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi be shi. Bè kong bendi he ungwu 'ibibi ye, bè kwu ufee ke 'utyuo ye. Bè hwua bebwaasul ashi 'ì yi 'inunung,
56002004	le hè be bè tebb ābe le 'ì nyin ābe lè bekyebell, ki nyin ābe lè bebwaa-bell.
56002005	Bè mbee hwua bebwaasul le bè kwu dangg, be kwu lè àtyám ataa-ataa, be ndè gbe lè ishu bekyebell ngbebb-ngbebb, be kwu benunung, be keb ke bekyebell, le hè bendi bè ndè ashi bè be kong 'ibibi gbe lè igie Unim ye.
56002006	Tebb ishomate or titi le bè kwu dangg.
56002007	Ndè le wo-gyang wo shi 'iwom 'iyang-yang dell-dell, le hè bendi abe be teng bè ndè kung lè ha awo. Nya a na wo hwua bendi, ndè le abwo agang agyang or à yi ataa-ataa.
56002008	Nyong wo hwua, kong igie inunung angi undi u tim āngi ungwu ye, le hè ishwia ì shi bendi-linaa betyan likorye be nda 'ibibi ashi be kong ban li ye.
56002009	Tebb ifee le bè keb ke betyabell hè be bè shi ngbebb betyabell he 'iwom 'iyang-yang. Bè naa fan ābe ye,
56002010	be bee he abwo ye. Bè kwu bendi abe betyabell bè fe lityam ha abe kangg, le hè 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi be shi 'ì shi bendi bè kong 'inunung gbe lè uhwuale utyan gbe lè Unim angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan.
56002011	Unim a fem inung ima lè beshi bema tyung he igye gboo le hè bendi puu bè fel kwu lè likpan 'unyong.
56002012	Inung lè beshi ana na bı tyung li le lì tyang ashele biwom abi bi ngbebb Unim ye, lè bigyor puu abi igye anyin. Bi hwua li le lì fel kwu dangg, li kwu benunung, li shi nyin Unim he biwom puu abi lı shi he igye anyin.
56002013	Nyin i ná li kwu lı nyong Liti igor angi lı ndor lishi nyong lı be nde ifem Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi Unim utyan angwu a hwò puu, u shi Undi-likpan utyan.
56002014	Ufe na a ma kung 'uhwo-ma ke he 'uhwo 'utyan le he-e ù pong li lè he abwo 'iban, u shi li li fel betaa-betaa lè ha 'iban le lî fel bendi abe ufe a waa kung, abe be shi 'inunung mbee 'unyong puu.
56002015	Biwom abina na 'ì yi le wò hwua bendi. Unim a ka-a ikeb le wò fe bendi ingie, wo tyung ābe imbeb ibell. Undi ù bia-a ye.
56003001	Gye 'ushu well bendi le bè keb ke besu lè bendi puu abe bè yi he ābwò akaandi. Bè ke be ife, be kam ashele 'inunung 'iyang-yang.
56003002	De be le bè kong undi he ungwu 'ibibi ye, bè tyua anaa ye, bè kwu lè 'uhwo ambwele, bè gim 'uhwo-bell a 'ushu ye.
56003003	Bel-agyang or, leěti li ma yi kpel-ye, li ma kaa lishi, igim ityan i ma yi liketye. Li ma yi ifee a ke bigyor biwom atyetye-atyetye. Li maa gim bìbíbı mbee 'unyong, li ban lityam fe biwom bendi. Bendi be maa tel li, bel li tel bende.
56003004	Ukpor he 'unyong ahwu Unim angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan a ma fem inung ima lè benyin bema he igye,
56003005	a ma kpan li. A ma shi ashin le bwo bel li maa shi 'inunung a ye, ukpor a ma shi āshi gbe he beshi abe bema begyang a. A kpan li, u to li lè he 'iban ndor betaa-betaa, u ke li likpan lifufe gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim.
56003006	Unim a mbò Ukatia Kunyong uma wu li kyo-kyo-kyo gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi, Undi-likpan utyan.
56003007	A shi ná le hè gbe he inung ima lî fel bendi benunung he ashi ama, li fel lè likpan angi lı ngyor igye angi lı ndor lishi.
56003008	Biwom abina puu bì yi 'igyang. Mi kee-a le wò kong ābi hwa-hwa ye le hè bendi abe be bong ha Unim ana, bè kung ugim ubell ndor he ashele binunung. Biwom abina bi ngbebb, bi shi lè lifem ke bendi.
56003009	Gbe lè abwo agang fe he ifung angi akpel-ye ye, ban 'unyong kwu kwell 'ikwu betyamen ye, wo shwan 'ushwan ye, wo kwu kwell Iten Ijuus ye. Likpe angi 'itaa ana lì yi lè lifem ye, lì yi 'idideng.
56003010	Undi uyang-yang angwu u ban liwu, ke-e utebb 'ugbe ken. Gbe wo mbee ke-e ubwan lefee a kpē ye, mbee lè abwo lè he 'uhwo-ma.
56003011	Ngye le 'itaa undi ashina, ugim uma a ban tang abwo tang abee, ù yi undi-iban a, ufe-gyang a tang libi ke 'uhwo-ma.
56003012	Mi ba som undi hwaa lè wo, pisoye mi som Atemas a, pisoye mi som Utikikes a. Nyong undi angwu mi som a wu há, ban 'unyong ye, be nde-m he Unikopolis likorye mi kam le mi kwa há kpamm 'akwuo 'a mbee.
56003013	Kaa kangg kpell Uzinas angwu ù yi uloya lè Aporlos he litan angi be kam ana hè 'iwom 'ì baa ābe ye.
56003014	Kì yi kpe-kpe le bendi betyan bè hwua ná bè kung 'ùnyōng 'ubell shi binunung, hè be bè kpell bendi abe 'i gben ābe, be mbee hwua ná bè ban 'unyong kwu 'idideng ye.
56003015	Bendi puu abe bè yi ipel ha ami hen, be kong lè wo. Kong li lè bendi abe 'i nyin ābe lè bel, be mbee bong ha Ujeso ná bel. Unim ù hā ke men puu 'ukwun.
57001001	Mi Uporl angwu mì yi igaadye he 'uhwo Ujeso Ukristi lè unwandatyan Utimoti na lı fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè wo, udim-tyan Ufilimon. Ki nyin li lè wo nya a na wo shi aki Ujeso Ukristi utung ha abel i.
57001002	Li kee le wò kong li lè Afia angwu ù yi unwandatyan ungingye lè Akipes angwu u shi aki kang-kang utung ha abel ná undi ishogya. Kong li lè liwu bendi abongale angi lı kpee fe Unim ha awo ushom or titi.
57001003	Unim Atyetyan lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi bè hā ke men 'ukwun, be mbee shi hè 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa.
57001004	Unwandagi Ufilimon, mbee 'unyong kpamm mı kong ha Unim ugi, mi mbu lè wo, mi pee he he 'uhwo 'ugang,
57001005	likorye mi gyo le 'i nyin-a lè bendi Unim puu, wo mbee fe lityam ha Atyetyan Ujeso.
57001006	Mi kong ha Unim le utyang ugang ha bendi abongale ù shi 'ì nung-a dangg le Ujeso Ukristi a ke li 'ukwun kangg gbe he agwaale ipel ha ahe.
57001007	Unwandagi, benyin begang abe wo tyung bendi Unim be shi-m mi fel lè igor kangg, be mbee fe-m ingie likorye be shi bendi Unim mbee bipi be fel lè ingie.
57001008	He atan-lengi anwun 'ì yi le hang mi ka-a uten faale 'ushell le wò shi ashi 'ì yi dell-dell, le bwo mì yi unwanaa he Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi,
57001009	ukpor mi tya-a uten ye, mi tim-a anung á likorye 'i nyin mi lè wo. Mà na mi Uporl angwu mì yi unwaa-isom Ujeso Ukristi, mì yi he igaadye 'anaa-anaa i likorye mi fa Ujeso Ukristi or,
57001010	mi tim-a anung he lishi Undesimes angwu ù yi-m ná unwaa angwu mi hwan ihwan nà. Mi shi-e a fel lè lityam afele ha Ujeso Ukristi nyin ná mì yi hen he igaadye nyin.
57001011	Mi ngye le, lè he item a ma yi lè lifem ka-a ye, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i a fel lè lifem ke li, bel lè wo puu.
57001012	Mi ndo tem lè Undesimes angwu 'i nyin mi lè he som ka-a,
57001013	mà na mi ma kee le mi tyang he u kwa ha ami hen or. Mi kee he le hang a ke-m ukpell lishi ligang nya a na mì so hen he igaadye angi be kwu-m fe le bwo mi bun 'isom 'inunung i.
57001014	Mi tyang he kwu hen ye likorye mi wa ngye ugim ugang gbe lè shi ye. Mà na or, mi kee le mi ngie fa-a le wò kpell mi kpe-kpe-kpe a ye, ukpor mi kee le wo-gyang wò shi ashi 'i nyin-a he lityam.
57001015	Pisoye 'i ngbebb le Undesimes a tyang-a he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg le he-e ù tem be kwu ha awo há kpamm.
57001016	Kanaa-anaa i ù nem yi ufee ufe-ufe a ye. A fel dyam hwò ufee. Ki nyin li lè he ná unwandatyan ha Ujeso Ukristi. Ki nyin mi lè he kangg. Mi ngye le wo or titi, ki ba nyin-a lè he fel gbe gyong i-mi or, likorye ù yi-a he 'ukpo ná ufee lè unwanaa ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
57001017	Nya a na mi ndo som Undesimes ka-a i, gbe wo ngye le bel lè wo li sha aki Unim ukem a, wo kpe-e nya a na hang wò kpe-m mi.
57001018	Gbe a ma shi 'iwom ban-a or, u zi-a lihwua or, bo ābi fe-m.
57001019	Mi ndo fee ashin lè 'ubwo 'ugi le: Mi Uporl, mi ba hwee-a ángi. Kì yi le mi mbee da-a he ungwu a le gbe he aki Unim angi mi shi na wo fel lè likpan 'unyong ye.
57001020	Ungwiye, mi tim-a anung le wò ke-m ukpell angwu mi bii-a he 'uhwo Atyetyan Ujeso. Ashin 'i ba fa-m ingie ná unwanaa ha Ujeso Ukristi.
57001021	Mi fee 'ushia hwaa lè wo likorye mi fe lityam ha awo le wo ba sha 'iwom ashi mi bii-a le wò shi i nyin. Mi ngye le faale ifung wo ba sha gba gyong 'itaa mi bii or.
57001022	He 'unyong 'umen i wo baā lishi ligi. Mi ndor lishi ha Unim le u fan 'ukye 'ūmen, sha 'ukwo ka-m mî be kong lè men.
57001023	Ipafras angwu ù yi he igaadye utung ha ami he 'uhwo Ujeso Ukristi u kong lè wo.
57001024	Baà Umak, lè Alistakes, lè Udimas, lè Uluk abe be shi aki Unim utung ha ami, Uporl, be mbee kong lè wo.
57001025	Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi ù hā ke men puu 'ukwun.
58001001	Lè há linde-linde Unim a maa kong ha betietyan mbee 'unyong he akwo atyetye-atyetye. A maa kong ha abe gba ha bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima.
58001002	Kanaa-anaa i ná 'ì yi he ati umbee-likel i, u fel kong ha abel gba ha Unwaa-ma a. Unim a shi igye anyin puu gbe ha ufe a; u mbee kung biwom puu fe-e he 'ubwo.
58001003	A bè zì tyung li ná Unim a dyam; likpe lima lì yi 'itaa ken ha angi Unim. U mbee kong igie angi ì yi lè ikeb kangg; igie ima imen i na i kwu igye anyin naa genn. A shi 'ukwo ahwu u to biban bendi hè be bè fel betaa-betaa, saa a hà gye he lifung-atabe lè kwu he 'ubwo lizen Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu.
58001004	Unim a shi Unwaa-ma le ù dyam hwò idengell ima, nya a na lizen angi a kwu-e le unwaa-ma or li dyam hwò angi le idengell.
58001005	Unim a de Unwaa-ma le: "Wò yi Unwaa-gi a, kunyin mi fel Atia a." A bè de udengell uma ken or ná ngye ye. A kong gbe lè Unwaa-ma le: "Mi ba kwa Átyám, ufe u be kwu Unwaa-gi." A kong gbe lè udengell uma ken or ná ye. Ujeso ufe-ufe na Unim a ma kong 'itaa ana gbe lè he.
58001006	Kunyong ahwu Unim a maa ndo som 'iken Unwaa-ma be he igye anyin, a ma mbee de le: "Kì yi le idengell Unim puu ì fe-e."
58001007	Ashi Unim a kong gbe lè idengell ima 'ì yi le: "Ufe a shi idengell ima le ì kwu ná 'ufem, i kwu ná umor-inde."
58001008	U kong gbe lè Unwaa-ma le: "Wo Unim, kusu 'ugang 'u kwa ngyor igye kpamm; Wo kam bendi begang faale bikpellale.
58001009	Ki ngbebb-a lè 'inunung; ki ban-a lè 'iwom ashi 'ì yi 'ibibi. Ashin na 'i shi Unim angwu ù yi Unim ugang a waa-a le wò dyam, wo kwu lè igor hwò bende-gang."
58001010	Unim a mbee de le: "Atyagi, wo-gyang na wo shi lifung-atabe lè igye anyin lè há linde.
58001011	Lifung-atabe lè igye puu bi ba mbee, bi be kashi ná bihwom bı kaa. Ukpor wo-gyang ufe wo ngyor ná wò yi i ngyor igye kpamm.
58001012	Wo ba kan ābi he abwo tyang lè hell, nya a na be kan 'ikekaa aliga tyang lè hell a. Bi ba gie fel ná 'ihwom ashi 'i hwò umbwo nà, ukpor wo ufe, wo ngyor 'itaa ken ngyor igye kpamm. Likpan ligang lì yi lè umbee-likel ye."
58001013	Unim a ma de Unwaa-ma le: "Bé kwu ha ami 'ubwo lizen i kpamm mi hwò bendi-linaa begang, mi shi-a wo tem ābe abee he itang." A kong ha udengell uma ken or ná ye.
58001014	Idengell ife ì yi bebwaa-isom Unim angi undi u ndè ngi lè ashi ye a. Ife na Unim ù som le ì lè kpell bendi abe Unim u kpan.
58002001	Ashin na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu 'ì yi kpe-kpe le 'isom ashi bel li gyo mà, lì kwu gbelakaa gbe lè shi ye, likorye gbe lì yi gbelakaa gbe lè shi, ki sha li li pwell 'ukwo ahwu ù yi kpa-kpa.
58002002	Li ngye le 'isom ashi idengell Unim i maa bun de betietyan gbe lè iten Unim 'ì yi 'igyang a. Bel li ngye le he ashin undi uyang-yang angwu a ma kpo utebb 'isom 'imen ana, u shi āshi ye, Unim a maa ka he 'ingie ashi 'i keè nya dell-dell.
58002003	Hà bel ufe? Ná lı be shi lî zī likpong ha Unim, gbe li ndè likpan 'unyong angi lì yi 'indee-indee i gbe àshì wu? Atyetyan Ujeso ugyang na a ma kpi 'ikwu bun de bendi gbe lè ngi, saa bendi abe be gyo he ná u bun, be hà tyung li le 'isom 'imen ana 'ì yi 'igyang.
58002004	Unim or a bong le 'isom likpan 'imen ana 'ì yi 'igyang. A shi ashin gbe he ashele bikwele-uhwo abi bı tyung bendi ikeb ima; u mbee kung beke abe be be lè ha Ukatia Kunyong uma, ke undi-undi 'itaa ufe-gyang a kee.
58002005	Igye angi ı be be lè he 'ushu angi lı kong gbe lè ngi nyin, Unim a ke idengell ima a ikeb le ì be ndè gbe lè ngi ye.
58002006	Ashi be ma bè kong lè he 'iteng 'isuso he 'ushia Unim 'ì yi le: "Aye Unim, ayang ù hà yi undigye angwu wò shi ugim gbe lè he? Ayang ù yi undigye angwu wò kpell he?
58002007	Wo ma shi-e a fel zen hwò idengell igang he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, saa wo hà kwu-e 'usu, wo ke-e ifem angi i zī 'asu kangg.
58002008	Wo kung biwom puu fe-e he 'ubwo." He akungale biwom puu fe undigye he 'ubwo, ashin 'i ze le 'ì yi lè 'iyang-yang ashi a ke-e teng ndor he item ye. Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i, li wa ndè biwom puu he 'ubwo undigye mà ye.
58002009	Ujeso na li ndè le Unim a kung biwom puu fe-e he 'ubwo. Le bwo Unim ù yi lè inung ha bendi kung lè he item, a ma shi Ujeso a fel zen hwò idengell ima he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg he-e ù hwō ke bendi puu. He 'uhwo 'ingie ashi Ujeso a ma kpē, lè lihwu angi a ma hwō na Unim a kwu-e 'usu, u ke-e ifem angi i zī 'asu kangg.
58002010	Le bwo Unim a shi biwom puu, u shi ābi puu ndor 'uhwo-ma, kì yi kpa-kpa le 'iwom ashi Unim a kam le u sha, a shi Ujeso a shi āshi yilididi gbe he 'ingie ashi Ujeso a kpe. A shi ashin hè bendi gbamm bè fel bebwaa Unim, be kwu ipel ha ahe he ifem ima. Atan-lengi ù yi le, Ujeso na ù yi atie-lishi angwu a teng ābe le bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong.
58002011	Ujeso a shi bendi be fel betaa-betaa lè he biban bibell. Ujeso ugyang or, bendi abe ufe a shi ābe be fel betaa-betaa or, befe puu be fel Atyabell ken. Ashina na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu ishwia ı shi Ujeso ná u ko ābe le bebwatyam ye.
58002012	He 'unyong 'ususo Ujeso a ma de Unim le: "Mi ba da bebwatyagi gbà lè wo; mi be naa he liwu bendi begang gyam agyam pee-a."
58002013	A ma mbee de le: "Mi ba fa lityam ha Unim." U mbee de be le: "Nde-m, mì yi nyin utung ha bebwaa abe Unim a ke-m."
58002014	Bebwaa Unim bemen ana bè yi bendigye a. He atan-lengi anwuna, Ujeso ufe-gyang or, be hwan he nya a na befe a, le he-e ù hwō, u ban ikeb Usetan, usu bibibi, angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u sha bendi be hwa.
58002015	A shi ashin hè bendi puu abe be ma yi he lifee kpam-kpam le bwo be shell lihwu, bè fel porr.
58002016	Ki nung nwongg le Ujeso a ma be le he-e ù kpell idengell Unim a ye, a ma be kpell igia Ebraham a.
58002017	Bwo 'ì yi 'itaa ana, ki ma yi kpe-kpe le ù fel ná bebwatyam he 'ukwo 'uyang-yang, he-e ù ndè le u fel Ukaandi ubell angwu u shang Unim, u shi Unim aki. A ma shi ashi Unim a kee dell-dell, u mbee shi lè beshi ha bendigye he-e ù ndè le u tyang biban bendi ka ābe.
58002018	He ashi le ufe-gyang a ma kpe 'ingie, be gil he, na a fel lè ikeb le ù kpell bendi abe bè yi he ugilale ná ufe a ma yi.
58003001	Bebuye, Unim a ko amen le mà kwu bendi bema a. He atan-lengi anwun mà kung àshì āmen ndor ha Ujeso. Ufe na Unim a som le ù be kwu Ukaandi angwu u shang Unim he likong Unim angi bel li bong.
58003002	Unim na a ma waa he le ù shi aki amen ana; a ma shi āngi lityam ken nya a na Umosis a ma shi aki Unim lityam ken he liwu bendi Unim.
58003003	Kì yi kpa-kpa le bè ke Ujeso ife hwò Umosis, nya a na be ke undi angwu a tye ushom ife hwò ushom ugyang a.
58003004	Kì yi 'igyang a le ushom uyang-yang, undi na a tye-e, ukpor Unim na a shi biwom puu.
58003005	Umosis a maa sha aki he liwu bendi Unim lityam ken. Aki angi a ma shi a ma yi le ù shi bendi bè ngye gbe lè biwom abi Unim u be kong lè he 'ushu.
58003006	Ujeso Ukristi ufe ù yi Unwaa Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè bendi Unim a. Ufe or u sha aki amen ana lityam ken. Gbe bel abe lì yi bendi Unim li gye 'ushu kwu lè ingie, li fe lityam he 'iwom ashi lı ndor lishi lè he 'ushu kpamm lè wu he umbee-likel, hà li kwa bendi Unim a 'igyang.
58003007	Ashin na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong le: "Gbe ma gyo lingmam Unim 'unyin,
58003008	mà ke ngi ife, ma kpo utebb ná leěti betiemen be maa kpo ana ye. Há he 'unyong 'umen ana nyong be ma yi he 'igbaa-libeb, be ma kpo utebb Unim, be mbee kaa he hè be bè ndè ashi ù nya shi ābe.
58003009	Unim a kong le, 'Betiemen be ma gil mi he 'igbaa-libeb, be kaa mi hè be bè ndè ashi mì nya shi. Mà na be ndè biwom abi mi ma shi he aze asi afee or, be ma so-i kpo utebb ugi.
58003010	Ashin na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu mi ma ngywo fe be, mi mbee de le, igim ibell i fel liketye, kukwo 'ugi 'u tem nung ābe ye.
58003011	Mi ngywo fe be, mi mbee tam le, bè hà tem ndo ba he 'iteng ashi mì yi, hè be bè sho 'unyong ipel ha ami ye.' "
58003012	Bebuye, mà baa 'uhwo-men teng undi ken or he liwu līmen u kwa lè lityam libibi angi lı shi-e u tem bong ha Unim ye. Kitaa lityam ashina 'i sha he u tyang Unim afele. Ma ngye le Unim ù yi uwum.
58003013	Kiwom ashi ma shi 'ì yi le mà gye 'ushu fe bende ingie he liti liyang-yang, teng Usetan u lam amen ma fel he lishi akpoale; mà gye 'ushu shi ashin lè 'igbe ná lì yi he 'unyong ahwu bel lì yi 'unyin i.
58003014	Mà ngye le 'anaa-anaa i bel li fel lè abwo he biwom abi Ujeso Ukristi, gbe li mā ma gye 'ushu naa genn he biwom abi li bong lè há item kpamm lè wu he umbee-likel.
58003015	Be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le: "Gbe ma gyo lingmam Unim 'unyin, mà ke ngi ife, mà kpo utebb ná leěti betiemen be maa kpo ana ye, befe be ma swan le be kwa he 'ubwo Unim ye."
58003016	Beyang abe be ma gyo igie Unim, be kpo utebb ángi? Bendi abe leěti Umosis a ma fem lè he abwo lifee he 'ubong Igyept a.
58003017	Beyang abe leěti Unim a ma kung aze asi afee ngywo fe be? Bendi abe be ma shi 'iban, be hwō wu he afee 'igbaa-libeb a.
58003018	Lè há 'unyong ahwu 'utim Unim a ma tam le bè hà tem ndo wa he 'iteng ashi ufe u gye lè be or, ngwu bè hà ndo sho 'unyong ipel ha ufe or ye. A ma tam ashina fe beyang a? A ma tam fe bendi abe be ma ke-e ife ye a.
58003019	Ashin 'i nung li nwongg le atan-lengi angwu a ma shi ābe be ma wu he 'iteng ashi Unim u gye lè be ye, ù yi le be ma fe lityam ha ahe ye.
58004001	Unim a ke li úkyébb le li ba gya he 'iteng ashi ufe ù yi la shwa 'unyong ipel ha ufe ngyor igye kpamm. He atan-lengi anwun, lì kwu lè 'ushell hè li lì baa 'uhwo-tyan teng undi he liwu lityan u gyan awele he 'ipi Unim ù yi.
58004002	Nya a na leěti betietyan be ma gyo 'isom 'inunung na bel or li gyo āshi. Ukpor bel li ndè le 'isom 'inunung 'imen ashi be ma gyo ana, ki ma be lè lifem ke be ye, likorye nyong be ma gyo āshi be ma bong ha ashi ye.
58004003	Bel ufe, li bong 'isom 'inunung ashi li gyo. He ashin bel na lı be gye lè sho 'unyong ipel ha Unim he 'ipi ù yi. Bendi abe be ma bong ye, Unim a kong leěti gbe lè be le: "Mi ma ngywo fe be, mi tam le bè hà ndo ba he 'iteng ashi mì yi, ba shwa 'unyong ipel ha ami ye." Mà na a ma mbee aki ama angi ashele igye anyin gbangg lè há item or, a ma tam 'itaa ana.
58004004	He 'iteng 'isuso he 'ushia Unim be fee gbe lè liti angi ledyong-ifee le: "He liti angi ledyong-ifee Unim a ma sho 'unyong likorye a ma mbee aki ama."
58004005	Be bè fee lè he item le: "Bè hà ndo ba shwa 'unyong ipel ha ami ye ngyor igye kpamm."
58004006	Li ngye dangg le, bendi bemen ana abe leěti be ma kpi 'ikwu gyo 'isom 'inunung, be ma wu he 'ipi 'unyong ashwele ye likorye be ma bong àshi Unim a kong ye. Li mbee ngye dangg le, kì so lè libwo ke bendi besuso le bè gye lè sho 'unyong ipel ha Unim ngyor igye kpamm.
58004007	Bwo ashin 'ì yi 'itaa ana mà, Unim a ndor liti lisuso angi be ko le 'unyin, ashi 'i ze le 'anaa-anaa i. Kung lè há he 'unyong ahwu bendi abena be ma wu he 'iteng 'imen ana ye, aze a gbe gbamm saa Unim a hà mbee kong gbe ha Udebid igie angi ì yi fee fe he 'ushia ahwun lè he item. Be fee le: "Gbe ma gyo lingmam Unim 'unyin, mà ke ngi ife, mà shi kpo utebb ángi ye."
58004008	Kì be kwu le Ujoshua ù be teng betietyan lè wu he 'ipi be sho 'unyong ipel ha Unim, hang Unim a ma tem kong gbe lè liti 'unyong ashwele lisuso lè he 'ushu ye.
58004009	Igie Unim anyina i tyung li le 'ì so lè libwo le bendi Unim be ba la shwa 'unyong nya a na Unim a ma sho he liti angi ledyong-ifee a.
58004010	Undi uyang-yang angwu a gye he 'ipi Unim ù yi, lè sho 'unyong ipel ha ahe, u ba tyang aki ama puu fel shwa 'unyong ngyor igye kpamm nya a na Unim a sho he 'unyong ahwu a mbee aki igye ashele.
58004011	Bwo ashin 'ì yi 'itaa ana mà, bel ufe lì kwu 'iken hè li lì gye lè sho 'unyong ipel ha ahe. He atan-lengi anwuna, kì kwu lè undi utyan ken or angwu u kpo utebb ná betietyan be ma kpo he afee libeb ana ye. Gbe li kpo utebb, hà li wa he 'iteng 'imen ana ye.
58004012	Bel li ngye le igie Unim ì yi iwum, i shi lè ikeb. Ì yi ná 'ashwia benyin befee ake 'a nyin dan-dan-dan nà. I ngwee wa he 'udyan 'ūnyōng lè lityam undigye. Nya a na 'ashwia 'a ngwee wu he ukeb or, he ahwaa angi à yi he afee ukeb or, na igie Unim ı maa undi ushe he ashi u gim ha ahe lityam.
58004013	He biwom puu abi Unim a shi, kì yi lè ashi le u nda āshi ye ye. Biwom puu bì yi ndor he he ashi nya gboo. Ufe na liti ken bel lı be lè naa he 'ushu 'uma de-e biwom abi li shi.
58004014	Kì yi le lì naa genn he likong Unim angi li bong, bwo lì yi lè Ukaandi angwu u shang Unim. Angwu há na ù yi Ujeso, Unwaa Unim. Ufe a gye he 'iteng 'igyang ashi Unim. ù yi.
58004015	Ukaandi utyan umen angwu u shang Unim i, ù yi lè beshi kangg ha abel he biwom abi li mbu gyan, likorye a ma yi 'itaa ken ha abel. A ma kpe bitaa igilale nya a na bel i, ukpor u shi 'iban ken or ye.
58004016	He ashina, kì yi kpe-kpe le lì kwu faale 'ushell he agyele he 'idem 'usu Unim he 'ipi Unim angwu ù yi lè inung, u shi lè beshi, ù yi kwu. Nya na Unim u tyung beshi ha abel, u kpell li he 'unyong igben gbe he inung ima.
58005001	Unim a waa bendi puu abe bè kwu bekaandi abe be shang he lè he liwu bendi a. Bendi be hà ndor ābe le bè shi aki Unim lishi libell he ashangale Unim he 'uhwo biban bibell, befe puu.
58005002	Bwo begyang or be dyam gbe 'iban ashele ye, be ngye ná be mbu 'uhwo ha bendi abe be shi imbeb, abe be ngye ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim ye a.
58005003	Le bwo be dyam gbe 'iban ashele ye, kì yi kpe-kpe le bè shang Unim he biban abi bibell bigyang or 'itaa ken ná be shang Unim he biban abi bendi abe be teng iteng.
58005004	Kì yi lè undi angwu u waa 'uhwo-ma le ù fel ukaandi angwu u shang Unim he-e ù fem 'uhwo-ma ye. Unim ufe-ufe na u waa he nya a na leěti a ma waa Eron le ù kwu undi angwu u shang he.
58005005	Ashin 'ì yi 'itaa ken ha Ujeso Ukristi. Ufe-gyang na a ma waa 'uhwo-ma le ù fel ukaandi angwu u shang Unim he-e ù fem 'uhwo-ma ye. Unim na a ma de-e le: "Wò yi Unwaa-gi a; kunyin mi fel Atia a."
58005006	A ma mbee kong he 'iteng 'isuso le: "Wò yi ukaandi angwu u shang mi ngyor igye kpamm nya a na Umellkizedek a."
58005007	He 'unyong ahwu Ujeso a ma yi he igye anyin, a ma ki fem he igye, u wu akye, u kong ha Unim, u tim he anung. A ma shi abin ha Unim angwu a ma yi lè ikeb le u kpan he le ù hwō ye a. Unim a ma ndor 'utyung gyo he likorye a maa ka he ife.
58005008	Mà na a ma yi Unwaa Unim a or, a ma hwua ná ù ke Unim ife gbe he bingie abi a ma kpe.
58005009	Ujeso a shi ashi Unim a kam 'i mbee puu, a hà fel undi angwu u ke bendi puu abe be ke-e ife likpan 'unyong ngyor igye kpamm.
58005010	Unim u mbee shi-e le ù kwu ukaandi angwu u shang he ngyor igye kpamm nya a na Umellkizedek a.
58005011	Mì so lè biwom gbamm gbe lè likong anyina abi mi kee le hang mi de men. Ukpor 'i ndee mi kangg likorye biwom bi shwie nung amen ye.
58005012	Ki kpè ashi hang men ma fel hwua bendi besuso, bwo 'i gbe 'igbe ná bel li keb lı hwua amen. Ukpor mà so a ná bendi abe undi a wa hwua ābe 'alila 'iwom ken or gbe lè igie Unim ye a. Kunyong ahwu hang ma fel zī lizi bendi abe gbel, kì so kpe-kpe le bè kung libi fe men he ungwu ná be fe inwaabwan abwo atong nà.
58005013	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù so nyia abi a, ù so unwaa abwo atong a. Kitaa undi ashina a wa ngye ná ù ndè shob ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim ye.
58005014	Ukpor undi angwu u fel zī lizi ligyang angyell, hà a kpè fel undi gbel. Ufe a fel undi angwu u fel gim ugim likorye a hwua ngye ná u fel ndè shob 'inunung lè 'ibibi.
58006001	Nya a na 'ì yi ana, mà lì tyang biwom abi li ma kpi 'ikwu hwua gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi, lì gye 'ushu hwua biwom abi bı shi li lı kaa kpe he 'ukwo Unim. Má ngye gbe lè beshi ashele he 'iban mà, ma ngye gbe lè atemale item lè he biwom abi bı be lè lihwu. Ma mbee ngye gbe lè abongale ha Unim.
58006002	Má mbee ngye gbe lè umbwo akibale lè itetel bituto lè abwo apwomale he lishi. Ma mbee ngye gbe lè awumale lè he lihwu lè ushe Unim angwu he umbee-likel liti.
58006003	Kanaa-anaa i lì fel hwua biwom gye 'ushu. Ashin na lı shi, gbe Unim a bong.
58006004	Atan-lengi angwu ù yi kpe-kpe le lì gye 'ushu ù yi le, bendi abe be ngye Unim abe be fel ndè àshì nya a gia tem item gye he biban bibell, kì yi lè 'itaa undi u shi hè be bè tem item, be shi beshi he 'iban 'ibell ye. Be ma ndè shob 'iwom ashi Unim a kee; be ngye 'ukwun ahwu 'u be lè ha Unim; be kpē ukpell lè ha Ukatia Kunyong Unim;
58006005	be ndè shob le 'isom Unim 'i ngbebb; be mbee ngye ikeb angi ì yi ke igye angi ı be lè he 'ushu.
58006006	Bendi abe be shi biwom abin puu, gbe be hà fel ndè àshì nya a gia tem item gye he biban bibell, kì yi lè 'itaa be shi hè be bè tem item, be shi beshi he 'iban 'ibell ye. Ashin 'i tyung le, be mbee maa gwu Unwaa Unim 'itaa ken ha bendi abe be ma maa gwu-e bee he 'ikpakpaa, be mbee fe-e ishwia he 'uhwo he 'ugbo.
58006007	Mî tie ashin tyung amen. He 'unyong ahwu umbwo u ndor wu he itang mbee 'unyong mbee 'unyong, bikwukwan bi mbwa, bi be lè lifem ke ugyang. Ashin 'i ze le Unim a ke itang imen ana 'ukwun.
58006008	Ukpor gbe itang imen ana i mbell abia afe-afe a, hà itang imen ana ì yi lè lifem ye. Baale Unim u buu āngi atye, umbee-likel ábi u shi le be kung ābi ting shī 'inde.
58006009	Bedim-gi lityam, mà na li kong igie anyin or, bel li ngye dangg le men ufe mà yi naa genn he biwom binunung abi bı be lè likpan 'unyong ke men.
58006010	Unim ù yi ùbíbı ye, he ashina ù hà ndo naa lityam tyang aki angi ma maa shi, nyong ù naa lityam tyang benyin abe ma ma yi lè be ye. Benyin abena na be ma shi amen ma maa kpell bendi Unim leěti he 'uhwo Ujeso nya a na mà so kpell ābe i.
58006011	Bel lì yi lè 'igyor kangg le men puu mà gye 'ushu kaa lè ikeb īmen puu lè wu he umbee-likel, mà shī wee abwo ye, hè men mà ndè le ma kpa biwom puu abi ma ndor lishi.
58006012	Li mbee kee amen le mà hwun lihwun ye. Ashi 'i ngbebb le mà shi 'ì yi le mà kwu 'itaa ken ha bendi abe be bong ha Unim, be mbee naa genn. He ashina, befe na be kpe biwom abi Unim a kyebb le u ka.
58006013	Leěti nyong Unim a ma ke Ebraham úkyébb, a ma tam lizen angi lima ligyang le u ba sha úkyébb uma, likorye 'i ma yi lè undi-iso angwu a dyam hwo-e ufe-gyang ye.
58006014	Unim a ma ke Ebraham ukyebb le: "Kigyang-igyang mi ba ka-a 'ukwun, mi mbee be shi-a wo kwu lè igia gbamm."
58006015	Ebraham a ma gye 'ushu ndor lishi faale abwo aweeale; he ashina a ma kpe biwom abi Unim a ma kyebb le u ka he.
58006016	Nyong bendi be tam, be tam lizen undi angwu a dyam hwò ābe a. Ki mbee shi le nyong bendi bè yi lè likong, atamale na be fe ngi lishi.
58006017	Bendi abe lè he 'ushu abe be be kpe biwom abi Unim a kyebb le u ka ābe, Unim a ma kee le u sha hè 'ì nung ābe le u gie ugim uma ye. Ashin 'i shi-e a tam lizen lima.
58006018	Biwom bifee abi Unim a kong ana, úkyébb lè atamale, bi gie ye, likorye Unim u bà uman ye. Biwom bimen bifee ana bi fe li ingie kangg le lì ndè le bel abe li buu bee lè Unim, li naa genn lè lishi andorale he biwom abi Unim a kam ndor li lè he 'ushu.
58006019	Biwom bimen abi li ndor lishi ana bi shi li li gye 'ushu naa genn. Lishi andorale limen i na lı shi li lı be wu he 'ipi Unim ù yi, li gbe gyong 'ihwom ashi 'ì yi tye tang 'ipo ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim.
58006020	He nya na Ujeso a tie 'ushu te lishi lityan, likorye a fel ukaandi angwu u shang Unim ngyor igye kpamm nya a na Umellkizedek a ma yi.
58007001	Undi umen angwu be ko le Umellkizedek i na leěti a ma yi usu he 'iteng ashi be ko le Uselem, u mbee shi undi angwu u shang Unim ikeb puu. Há he 'unyong 'umen ana nyong Ebraham a ma tem lè he 'ukye ahwu a ma gwu gwu lè besu or, Umellkizedek a ma bo lè kpee lè he ke-e 'ukwun.
58007002	Ebraham a ma kung biwom puu abi a zī 'ute lè he 'ukye hwua akwu lihwo, u kung likwu ken ke-e. (Ukpi-ikwu likpe lizen Umellkizedek lì yi le usu angwu u shi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim. Utepwom likpe lizen limen ana li shi le usu angwu u be lè ikwun, likorye likpe angi le Uselem or li ze le ikwun.)
58007003	Kì yi lè 'iwom he 'ushia Unim gbe lè ātyām Umellkizedek or, ngwu anam or ye. Ki shi lè 'iwom gbe lè betiema or ye. Undi a ngye 'unyong be hwan he or, ngwu 'unyong a hwō or ye. He ashin, ù yi undi angwu u shang Unim ngyor igye kpamm nya a na Unwaa Unim ù yi ngyor igye kpamm a.
58007004	Mà gim ná Umellkizedek a dyam kwom. Ufe na leěti Ebraham angwu ù yi ātyām bendi Izwell a ma kung biwom puu abi a ma zī 'ute hwua akwu lihwo, u kung likwu ken ke-e.
58007005	Bendi abe be shang Unim abe bè yi lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai befe, Iten angi Unim a ke Umosis i ma de le undi uyang-yang he Izwell ù ke be 'iwom ken lè he biwom lihwo. Ashin 'i nung li le bemen abe be shang Unim ana be maa kpā biwom abina lè ha bebwandabell begyang a, bwo 'ì yi 'igyang a le befe puu bè yi igia Ebraham a.
58007006	Ukpor Umellkizedek ufe, mà na a ma be lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai a ye or, a ma kpe 'iwom ken lè he biwom lihwo ashi Ebraham a ma ke-e. A ma ke Ebraham 'ukwun titi, ki shi le Ebraham na Unim a ma ke-e úkyébb.
58007007	Kì yi faale ifung le undi angwu u ke undi 'ukwun u dyam hwà angwu u kpē ikpe.
58007008	Bendi abe be shang Unim abe bè yi lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai, abe be maa kpē 'iwom ken lè he biwom lihwo, befe be hwa, ukpor Umellkizedek ufe u hwa ye nya a na 'ushia Unim 'u de li.
58007009	Ebraham na a ma yi atie Ulibai, a ma ke Umellkizedek 'iwom ken lè he biwom lihwo. Ashina 'i ze le Ulibai ugyang or a ma ke.
58007010	Li kong ashina likorye li ngye le nyong Umellkizedek a ma bo lè kpee lè Ebraham, Ulibai a ma so he anung Ebraham. Ebraham na a ma yi atiema, ufe, 'i ma yi le bè ha ba hwan he lè he ushu a.
58007011	Leěti Unim a ma kung Iten ima ke bendi Izwell, u tyung ābe 'ukwo ahwu 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai 'ı be shi aki ashangale uma, ufe Unim, he 'ubong Izwell. Bendi ashangale Unim bemen i be shi 'iwom ashi Unim a kam le u sha mbee ye. Be shi āshi yilididi, hang 'i ma tem yi kpe-kpe le undi ususo angwu u shang Unim ù be ye. Ukpor ushang-Unim a be he 'ukwo ahwu Umellkizedek a, angwu Eron a ye.
