58007012	Nyong Unim u gie undi le ù shang he he 'ukwo atyetye, kì yi kpe-kpe le iten or titi ì gie.
58007013	Atyetyan Ujeso angwu lı kong gbe lè he i, a be lè he 'ikwu-lihwan atyetye. Ki shi le undi lè he 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima a bè shang Unim ngye ye.
58007014	Bel li ngye dangg le Atyetyan Ujeso a be lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Ujuda a. Nyong Umosis a ma kong gbe lè bendi abe be shang Unim, a ma kong ko 'ikwu-lihwan Ujuda ye.
58007015	Kiwom ashi 'i shi likong anyin li fel nung nwongg 'ì yi le undi ususo a be angwu u shang Unim ná Umellkizedek a maa shang.
58007016	Undi umen i a ma be ná ushang-Unim he 'ukwo iten angi bendigye a ye. A be gbe he ikeb likpan angi lì yi ngyor igye a.
58007017	Be fee fe he 'ushia Unim le: "Wo ba kwa undi angwu u shang mi ngyor igye kpamm ná Umellkizedek a ma yi."
58007018	Iten itim angi Unim a ma ke, a kung āngi wu lè hell, likorye ì yi lè ukpell ye. I ma yi lè ikeb le i kpan bendi ye.
58007019	Iten imen ana i shi lè ikeb le i sha 'iwom 'iyang-yang 'i fel kpa-kpa he ashi Unim ye. Kiwom ashi Unim a kyebb li, ashi li ndor lishi há i, ki ngbebb hwò iten itim, likorye 'ife na 'ı die lè bel ngie ha Unim.
58007020	Atyetye ususo ù yi le, Unim a tam itam le Ujeso ù kwu undi angwu u shang he ngyor igye kpamm. Há he 'unyong ahwu be maa shi bendi 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai le bè fel shi aki ashangale Unim, ki ma yi lè atamale 'itaa ana ye.
58007021	Ukpor Ujeso ufe, nyong 'i ma fel le ù shang Unim, Unim ugyang a ma tam itam de le: "Mi Unim, mi tam itam le wò kwu undi angwu u shang mi ngyor igye kpamm. Ashi mi kong i 'ì hà ndo gie ye."
58007022	Atamale Unim anwun a shi li li ngye le ashi Unim a kong ndor le u sha gba ha Ujeso 'i ngbebb hwò ashi 'itim.
58007023	Atyetye ususo u mbee shi le, ki ma yi le abe be shang Unim abe lè he 'ikwu-lihwan Ulibai ana be go likorye befe be maa hwa, bè tem gye 'ushu shi aki ashangale Unim ye.
58007024	Ukpor Ujeso ufe, ù yi atyetye, ù yi uwum ngyor igye kpamm, kì yi le undi ù hà ndo kpa he lishi shang Unim ye.
58007025	Ashin 'i ze le ù yi lè ikeb le u kpan bendi puu abe be be gbe ha ahe lè hwaa lè Unim mbee 'unyong kpamm, le bwo ù yi uwum ngyor igye kpamm, u tim Unim anung ka ābe.
58007026	He ashina Ujeso na ù yi Ukaandi angwu u shang Unim, angwu a kwun li 'igyor biwom puu. Ufe ù yi ta-ta ke Unim, u shi gelalala faale uben. Unim a tang he he abwo lè ha bendigye abe befe puu bè yi bendi-iban, fem he ta-ta lè ndor he 'usi he 'ipi ufe-gyang ù yi.
58007027	Ù yi ná bekaandi abe be shang Unim a ye. Bekaandi bemen ana, befe be shang he he liti liyang-yang. Ki mbee shi le be maa kpya 'ikwu shang Unim ka biban abi bibell bigyang, be hà shang ke biban bendi abe be teng iteng. Ujeso ufe a shang Unim he 'ukwo ahwu 'itaa ana a ye, likorye a ma kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim 'ugbe ken ke bendi puu. Ki ma kwun 'igyor ngyor igye kpamm.
58007028	Gbe he Iten angi Unim a ma ke Umosis, mà na bendigye be shi imbeb or, be ma fel bendi abe be shang Unim. Ukpor gbe he igie ifufe angi Unim a tam he lishi Iten angi itim, a waa kung Unwaa-ma le ù shi ashi ufe Unim a kam le u sha. A shi āshi yilididi ngyor igye kpamm.
58008001	Ashi li kong i 'ì yi le, bel lè men lì yi lè Ukaandi angwu u shang Unim. Ufe ù yi Ujeso angwu ù yi kwu he lifung-atabe he 'ubwo lizen Unim angwu ù yi Usu, u shi lè ikeb puu.
58008002	Ufe ù yi he lifung-atabe, u sha aki he 'ipi Unim ù yi kpa-kpa. Kiteng 'imen ana, Unim na a shi āshi, undigye a ye.
58008003	Aki angi à yi ke bendi abe be shang Unim le bè shi à yi le bè kung beke lè bityuale shang Unim. He ashin 'i ma yi kpe-kpe le Ukaandi utyan angwu u shang Unim or, ù kwu lè ashi u shang he.
58008004	Kì yi le Ujeso ù yi i he igye a, hang ù yi undi angwu u shang Unim a ye gbangg, likorye bendi abe be shang Unim he igye i be shang nya a na Iten angi Unim a ma ke gbe ha Umosis ì yi a.
58008005	Aki bendi bemen ana a maa kee-kee tyung 'itaa aki angi ukaandi utyan angwu u shang Unim u shi he lifung-atabe a. Kubuu ahwu be shang Unim he igye anyin or 'u ma kee-kee yi 'itaa ashi 'ı tyung 'iteng 'igyang ashi Unim ù yi a. Leěti nyong Umosis a maa ndo shi 'ubuu 'umen ana, Unim a ma de-e le ù shi 'iwom 'iyang-yang nya a dell-dell 'itaa a ma tyung he lè he ukwell.
58008006	Aki ashangale angi Unim a ke Ujeso le ù shi a dyam hwò angi bendi betim. Kitaa 'imen na ashi Unim a kong ndor ha bendi bema le u sha gba he 'ubwo Ujeso 'i ngbebb hwò ashi 'itim, likorye Unim a ke li úkyébb biwom abi bi ngbebb hwò.
58008007	Unim ù be ndè le 'ukwo 'utim 'umen ana 'ù yi lè ikeb le 'u kpan bendi, hang a ma nem kee le u sha 'ukwo ahwu 'ufufe ye.
58008008	Ukpor Unim a ma ndè le bendi bema bè yi lè uben, a hà kung de le: "Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu mı be kong ndor le mi sha 'iwom 'ifufe ka bendi Izwell lè bendi Ujuda.
58008009	Kiwom ashi mı be kong ndor le mi ba sha i, kì yi atyetye lè ha ashi mi ma kong ndor ha betiebell he 'unyong ahwu mi-gyang mi ma fem ābe lè he 'ubong Igyept. Be ma tan he 'ukwo ahwu 'ugi a ye. Ashina na 'i ma shi-m mi tem ndè gbe lè be ye."
58008010	Unim a mbee de le: "Biwom abi mı be kong ndor ha bendi Izwell bì yi le, lè he ati angi a be lè he 'ushu, mi ba kung iten igi fee fa he atyam abell, mi shi ābe bè tem naa lityam ángi ye. Mi ba kwa Unim ubell, befe be be kwu bendi begi.
58008011	Bendi bè tem ba hwua bende-bell lè bebwandabell ihwua, le bè ngye-m mi Unim ye, likorye abe gbel or, inwaabwan or, befe puu be fel ngya-m.
58008012	Mi ba tyung beshi ha abe he 'unyong ahwu be shi bibibi, mi mbee tyang ābi ke be gbangg."
58008013	Nyong Unim a kong gbe lè 'iwom 'ifufe ashi a kong ndor le u ba sha, ashin 'i tyung le ashi 'itim 'i kaa. Bel li ngye le 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'i kaa, kì tem yi he 'ukpo ye; he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg 'i ban mbee gbangg.
58009001	He 'unyong ahwu Unim a ma kpi 'ikwu kong ndor le u ba sha 'iwom ka bendi bema, a ke be iten gbe lè 'ukwo ahwu be fe-e. Ki mbee shi lè 'iteng ashi bendi be shi ndor le hè be bè fe-e he igye anyin.
58009002	Kiteng 'imen ana 'i ma yi 'ubuu ahwu be ko le Utabanakol. Kitaa i na be ma shi 'ubuu umen ana. Be ma kpi 'ikwu shi uging uma kel-kel, be ko 'ipo ashi lè he ungwu le Kiteng ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim. Nya na be maa ndor 'imor-inde or, itebul or, ibred angi ì yi ta-ta ke Unim or.
58009003	He afee 'ubuu 'umen ana, ki ma yi lè 'ipo há ashi be ma kung 'ihwom a tye tang āshi. Be maa ko 'ipo 'imen ana le Kiteng ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim hwò biteng puu.
58009004	He afee 'ipo 'imen ana be shi 'iteng há ashi be ting shī behwu abe be nung nyin Unim. Be ma kung igold a shī 'iteng 'imen ana. Kakpa ake be ko le Kakpa úkyébb Unim 'a ma yi há titi. Kakpa 'amen ana 'a tyung le Unim a kong ndor le u sha 'iwom ka bendi bema. Be ma kung igold a wu shī 'akpa 'amen ana. Unwaa údím angwu be ma kung igold a mbe a ma yi fe he afee 'akpa 'amen ana. Há afee údím be fe lizi angi leěti Unim ugyang a ma ke be àngi be ko le imana. Utyuu Eron angwu a ma fel tim ashia or, bikpishia akor bifee abi leěti Unim a ma fee iten ima fe or, bi ma yi fe há afee 'akpa 'amen ana.
58009005	He likwu 'akpa be ma shi biwom bifee kwu há ná idengell Unim angi be ko le icherubim. Ife i ma yi nya hè 'ì tyung bendi le Unim ù yi nya. Be ma shi āngi lè abebaa gyam shī he 'ipi ashi Unim u tyang biban ke bendi. Kanaa-anaa i na lı bun tele-tele gbe lè biwom abina puu ye.
58009006	Taa be ma kam 'iteng 'imen ana 'itel i. Ki ma yi lè bipo bifee, ken lè he ungwu, ken lè he afee. Bendi abe be shang Unim be maa gya he 'ipo ashi he ungwu mbee ati puu la sha aki abell.
58009007	Ukpor 'ipo ashi lè he afee, ukaandi ubell ufe-ufe na a maa gye há. A maa gya há 'ugbe ken 'ufe-ufe a he lize. He 'unyong ahwu u gye há ana, u ta lè anung bityuale angi u lè shang Unim he 'uhwo 'iban 'ima 'igyang, u mbee shang Unim he 'uhwo biban abi bendi be shi likorye be ngye ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim ye.
58009008	Gbe he biwom bimen i Ukatia Kunyong Unim a shi 'i nung li nwongg le, há he 'unyong ahwu 'ubuu 'u ma so naa há ana, kukwo 'u ma buu ke bendi le bè gbe gye he 'ipo 'igyang ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim hwò puu ana ye.
58009009	Kubuu 'umen ana 'u ma yi 'itaa ashi 'ı tyung biwom abi lì yi lè bi 'anaa-anaa i a, ku mbee tyung li likpe ábi. Ashin 'i tyung li le beke abe undi a ke Unim, u mbee shang he, na be shi lityam lima lı fel gelalala he ashi Unim ye.
58009010	Kitaa ashangale ashin 'ì yi gbe lè lizi lè bingwungwo lè itetel bituto a. Bife puu bì yi ke agwo á, bi kwa kpamm lè wa he 'unyong ahwu Unim u be shi 'ukwo ahwu 'ufufe.
58009011	Ukpor Ujeso Ukristi a be mà, he-e ù kwu Ukaandi angwu u shang Unim angwu a be lè biwom binunung abi lì yi lè bi i. Ufe u sha aki ama he 'iteng ashi 'i dyam or, ki ngbebb or, hwò 'iteng ashangale ashi he igye anyin. Undigye na a shi 'iteng 'imen ana or, ngwu 'ì hà kwu he igye anyin a or ye.
58009012	Há he 'unyong ahwu Ujeso Ukristi a ma gbe gye há afee, a ma ngwee gye he 'ipo ashi be ndor ta-ta ke Unim hwò puu 'ugbe ken 'ufe-ufe, u ngyor kwu há. A ma te lè anung ibuu a há, nyong ù te lè angi īshōm bigundu a ye, a ma te lè ama agyang a. A kung anung ama amen ana pong li lè he biban ngyor igye kpamm.
58009013	Leěti be maa kung anung ibuu lè angi ikyēbb bigundu, be kung atyung angi be ting ūshōm bigundu shī 'inde mbya wa bendi abe bè yi betaa-betaa he ashi Unim ye, le hè be bè fel betaa-betaa.
58009014	Gbe 'i ma yi le anung bityuale a maa sha bendi be fel betaa-betaa, ashin 'i tyung le anung Ujeso Ukristi à yi lè ikeb gbe gyong, afe a to àtyám atyan a fel ataa-ataa. Ufe a kung 'uhwo-ma angwu ù yi faale 'iban shang Unim he 'uhwo 'utyan gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu ù yi ngyor igye kpamm. A shi àtyám atyan a fel ataa-ataa gbe he anung ama, le hè li lì tem shi bibibi abi bı be lè lihwu ke li ye, hè li lì fel fe Unim angwu u ke likpan hwan.
58009015	Le bwo Ujeso Ukristi a kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim, ufe na ù yi naa he 'udyan Unim lè bendigye. Gbe he 'uhwo-ma, Unim a kong ndor le u ba sha 'iwom 'ifufe le hè bendi abe a ko le bè fel bendi bema, bè kpē biwom binunung abi Unim a ke úkyébb le u ka ābe, be kwu lè bi ngyor igye kpamm. Ashin 'i sha 'itaa ana le bwo Ujeso Ukristi a hwō, lihwu lima li shi bendi be fel porr lè he biwom bibibi abi be maa shi nyong be maa so bua fe he 'iwom ashi 'itim ashi Unim a ma kong ndor le u ba sha.
58009016	He 'unyong ahwu undi u bun ungwu lihwu 'itaa bè hwua lishi lima nyong u be hwō, bendi be kee-kee sha ashi a kong ndor nyong a hwō ufe-ufe a.
58009017	Lè 'igbe ná undi umen ana ù so uwum, ashi a kong ndor ana 'i waa kwa lè ikeb ye. Ukpor gbe a hwō, kunyong ahwuna na 'ì ha fel lè ikeb.
58009018	Ashina na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu ukpi-ikwu 'iwom ashi Unim a kong ndor le u ba sha ha bendigye 'i ma kee-kee yi lè ikeb gbe he anung awele a.
58009019	Leěti nyong Umosis a ma ke bendi Iten puu angi Unim a kee le bè shi, a ma kpi 'ikwu de be Iten imen ana, saa a hà kung 'ifefeb ashi be maa ko le uhisop lè bègbè utia kib he anung īshōm bigundu lè umbwo, u kung mbi wu 'ushia Iten or, bendi or puu.
58009020	A hà kong le: "Anung anyin a tyung le ma ngi 'ubwo he ashi Unim a kong ndor amen, le men mà shi Iten ima."
58009021	Kitaa a ken Umosis u mbee kung anung mbi wu 'ubuu ahwu be maa shang Unim, u mbi wu he biwom puu abi be maa kung fe Unim lè bi.
58009022	Há he 'unyong Iten ana, biwom abi be maa kung anung a shī ābi le bì fel bitaa-bitaa ye, bi ma yi zangg a. Ki ma yi lè 'ukwo ahwu Unim u tyang biban ke undi faale anung awele ye.
58009023	Leěti 'i ma yi kpe-kpe le bè kung bityuale shang le hè 'ì shi biwom bimen ana abi bı tyung 'itaa biwom abi bì yi ke lifung-atabe, bì fel bitaa-bitaa he ashi Unim. Ukpor biwom bigyang abi bì yi ke lifung-atabe bife, akungale undigye shang 'i ngbebb hwò akungale bityuale shang hè 'ì shi ābi bì fel bitaa-bitaa.
58009024	He ashin Ujeso Ukristi a gye he lifung-atabe he 'ipi Unim ù yi, ù yi naa há he 'ushu Unim he 'uhwo 'utyan. Bekaandi abe be maa shang Unim lè he item be maa gba gya he 'iteng ashi be ndor ta-ta ke Unim hwò biteng puu, ashi 'ì yi 'iteng ashi bendigye be shi he igye anyin. Kiteng 'imen ana 'ì yi 'itaa ashi 'ı tyung li 'iteng 'igyang ashi Unim ù yi, ashi Ujeso Ukristi a gye a.
58009025	Ukaandi angwu u shang Unim a maa gya lè anung bityuale a he 'ipo ashi lè há afee 'ugbe ken he lize liyang-yang. A maa ta lè anung inyiahwo angi ima a ye. Ukpor Ujeso Ukristi ufe, a ma kee-kee te 'ugbe ken 'ufe-ufe a lè kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim.
58009026	Kì be kwu ná, hang a kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim ibwan-ibwan kung lè há 'unyong ahwu Unim a shi igye anyin a be 'ushu. Ashi a ma shi 'ì yi le a be he igye i 'ugbe ken ke bendi puu a he umbee-likel ati i; a kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim le he-e ù to taa biban bendigye ngyor igye kpamm.
58009027	Kì yi kpe-kpe le undi uyang-yang u hwa. Saa Unim u hà tang he ushe.
58009028	Kife na Ujeso Ukristi a ma hwō 'ugbe ken le he-e ù kpe bendi tyang lè he biban. A mbee tem ba he i igye i 'ugbe ahwu lefee. Nyong u tem be ana, ù tem ba le he-e ù be kpē bendi tyang lè he biban a ye. Kiwom ashi u be shi 'ì yi le u ba kpan bendi abe bè yi kwu, bè baā lishi lima.
58010001	Iten Ijuus ì kee-kee yi 'itaa ashi 'ı tyung ná biwom binunung abi bı be lè he 'ushu bı be kwu a. Ì hà ndo tyung dell-dell or ná bı be kwu ye. Leěti abe be maa shang Unim be shang 'itaa a ken mbee aze kpamm. Kitaa ashangale ashina 'ì yi lè ikeb le 'ì hà ndo sha bendi abe be kee le be fa Unim le bè fel gelalala he ashi ama ye.
58010002	Kì be kwu le ashangale umen ana ù yi lè ikeb le u sha bendi be fel gelalala, hang bendi be maa shang 'ugbe ibwan-ibwan ye. Ashangale umen ana a maa sha ābe be fel betaa-betaa, hang igim ibell i maa nem ben ābe le bè yi bendi-iban a ye.
58010003	Nyong 'ì yi nyin, nyong be maa shang Unim he lize liyang-yang, ki maa tem well ābe biban bibell iwell,
58010004	bwo li ngye le anung bityuale à yi lè ikeb le a kpa bendi tyang lè he biban ye.
58010005	He atan-lengi anwun, he 'unyong ahwu Ujeso Ukristi a ma kam le u ba he igye anyin, a ma de Unim le: "Wo nem kee le bendi bè shang-a bityuale a ye. He ashin wo shi agwo ke-m le mì shang-a.
58010006	Ki nyin-a lè bityuale abi be ting shī 'inde he 'imbe or, ngwu ashangale bityuale le ù to taa biban bendi or ye.
58010007	Mi hà kung de le, 'Unim, nde-m, mì yi nyin le mî shi ashi wo kee mi le mì shi nya a na be fee gbe lè mi he 'ushia Iten igang.' "
58010008	A kpi 'ikwu de le, Unim a kee le bendi bè kung bityuale lè inyia angi be ting shī 'inde he 'imbe shang he he-e ù tyang biban ke be ye. Kitaa ashangale ashina 'i nyin he lè shi ye. Ujeso a kong ná, mà na be maa shang he ná Iten Ijuus i kong a or.
58010009	A hà kung de le: "Unim, nde-m, mì yi nyin le mî shi ashi wo kee mi le mì shi." Unim a ma kung ashangale angwu utim ndor he itang hè ashangale angwu Ujeso Ukristi ù kpe lishi.
58010010	Le bwo Ujeso Ukristi a ma shi ashi Unim a kee he le ù shi, u kung 'uhwo-ma shang he 'ugbe ken ke bendi puu, bel puu li fel betaa-betaa lè he biban, li fel bendi bema. Ashangale umen i ù yi lè ikeb ngyor igye kpamm.
58010011	Bendi Ijuus abe be maa shang Unim be bo 'inaa hè be bè shi aki abell, kung bityuale shang Unim 'itaa ken mbee 'unyong kpamm. Ashangale umen i ù hà ndo to taa biban bendi ye.
58010012	Ujeso Ukristi a ma kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim 'ugbe ken ke 'iban. Ashangale umen i ù yi lè ikeb ngyor igye kpamm. A lè kwu he 'ubwo lizen Unim.
58010013	He nya na ù yi kwu, ù baā lishi kpamm Unim u gbe tem bendi-linaa bema abee fe he itang.
58010014	Gbe he ashangale Ujeso Ukristi 'ugbe ken, a shi bendi abe a to taa lè he biban bibell bè fel gelalala ngyor igye kpamm.
58010015	Ukatia Kunyong Unim or titi a tyung li le biwom abin bì yi 'igyang a. A kpi 'ikwu de le Unim a de le:
58010016	"Ashin na mi kong ndor le mi ba sha ha abe lè he 'ushu. Mi ba kung iten igi fa ābe he atyam. Mi fee āngi fe he igim ibell."
58010017	A hà mbee de le: "Mì tem ba well biban bibell lè akpe abibi abell ye ngyor igye kpamm."
58010018	Gbé Unim a tyang biban ke be mà, ki tem fong he lè ashangale he-e ù hà to taa biban bendi ye.
58010019	Bebuye, gbe he anung angi Ujeso a ma wu a buu 'ukwo ke li le li fel gba porr gya he afee 'ipo ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim hwò puu.
58010020	Ujeso a buu li 'ukwo likpan ahwu 'ufufe. A buu āhwu gbe he inyiahwo ima angi ì yi ukyekye 'ihwom ashi be ma tye tang 'ipo ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim hwò puu.
58010021	Li fel lè ushang-Unim angwu a dyam hwò puu. U nda gba lè bendi Unim.
58010022	Nyong 'ì yi i, mà lì die ngie Unim lè lityam puu lè abongale angwu ù yi faale ifung likorye Ujeso a shi àtyám atyan a fel ataa-ataa gbe he anung angi a wu, u to agwo atyan lè umbwo angwu ù yi gelalala angwu ù yi igie Unim.
58010023	Mà lì naa genn faale atyangale he biwom abi li ndor lishi le li ba kpa lè ha Unim, le bwo a ke úkyébb le u sha biwom abin. Lì fe lityam ha ahe le u ndor úkyébb uma.
58010024	Lì gim ná lì kpell bende hè 'ì nyin li lè bende, li mbee shi 'inunung.
58010025	Lì shī mor liwu bendi Unim ná likpe bendi besuso lì yi ana ye. Lì fe bende ingie hwan, likorye li ngye le Liti angi Atyetyan Ujeso u tem be li fel kpee-kpee.
58010026	Gbé Unim a tyung li 'igyang mà, gbe undi a fel fe ukaa shi 'iban, kì tem kwa lè ashangale angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u kpa he tyang lè he 'iban ye.
58010027	Gbe undi u shi ná, ù kwu lè 'ushell nya a na a kwu u nyong le Unim ù tang he ushe. Bendi abe be ke Unim ife ye, kìndē 'ikaandi 'i ba sha nim lè be puu.
58010028	Undi uyang-yang angwu a maa ban Iten angi Unim a ke Umosis, be maa gwa he faale beshi he 'unyong ahwu bendi befee hā bekie be naa ushada le a shi āshi.
58010029	Gbe be maa shi ná, hà undi angwu a swan Unwaa Unim ufe, be sha he ná a? U ba kpa 'ingie kangg likorye a shi anung akongale ndor Unim angi a to taa he, a fel ilaa-ilaa, u bia Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu u tyung inung ha ahe.
58010030	Lí ngye Unim angwu a kong le, "Mi ba tem utyang;" u mbee kong le, "Mi Unim Atyamen, mi ba maa bendi begi ushe."
58010031	Kì yi 'ushell-ushell le undi ù mbu fe he 'ubwo Unim angwu ù yi uwum he liti ushe.
58010032	Mà well ná 'i ma yi fe men lè he item nyong ma ma kpi 'ikwu ngye gbe lè Unim. Ma ma kpe 'ingie kangg, ukpor ma naa genn faale abwo aweeale.
58010033	Be maa buu amen atye he ashi bendi, be ke men bitaa bingie gbamm. Kunyong 'ususo ma maa fa ukaa naa ipel ha bendi abe be kpe 'ingie nya he abwo.
58010034	Ma ma kpe 'ingie utung ha bendi abe bè yi he igaadye. Bendi be maa kwa kpa amen bigbor, mà yii gor likorye ma ngye le mà so lè bisuso abi bı ngyor igye kpamm abi bi ngbebb hwò.
58010035	Bwo 'ì yi 'itaa ana, mà shī wee abwo ye, likorye undi uyang-yang angwu a ngib lityam lè kwom he umbee-likel u ba kwa lè lifem kangg.
58010036	Kì yi kpe-kpe le mà ngib lityam, ma shi ashi Unim a kee hè men mà be kpē ashi a kyebb le u ka amen.
58010037	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Ki teng zangg hè undi angwu 'ì yi le u ba, ù be. Baa u fel i.
58010038	Bendi begi abe bè yi kpa-kpa he ashi agi be ba kwa lè likpan gbe he abongale. Ukpor angwu a tem item, ki ba nyin mi lè he ye."
58010039	Bel ufe lì yi abe lı tem item lè mbu nim a ye. Lì yi lè abongale ha Unim, he ashin u kpan li.
58011001	Abongale ù yi lishi andorale 'iwom faale atyangale. U mbee shi angyele dangg le 'iwom ashi be ndè shi lè ashi ye or, kì yi há 'igyang-igyang.
58011002	Kitaa i na bendi betim be ma bong ha Unim, ngwu Unim or a ma bong le be shi 'inunung.
58011003	Gbe he abongale na li ngye le Unim na a shi igye puu gbe he igie ima. A ma kung 'iwom ashi lı ndè he ashi ye a, shi ashi li fel ndè shi nyin.
58011004	Abongale umen i na a ma shi Ebell a ma shang Unim he 'ukwo ahwu 'u ngbebb hwò Uken. He abongale uma na a shi nyin Unim. Li ngye le Unim a bong le Ebell a shi 'inunung likorye a kpē 'uke ahwu Ebell a ma ting shī 'inde ke-e. Gbe he abongale umen i, mà na Ebell a hwō leěti or, bè so-i kong gbe lè he 'unyin i.
58011005	Abongale na a ma shi Inok a ma hwō ye. Unim a ma kpe-e gye he 'usi uwum. Be ma nem nde-e ye, likorye Unim a kpe-e gye lè he he lifung-atabe. Be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim le Inok a ma shi nyin Unim mà ukpong Unim u hà kpe-e gye lè he he lifung-atabe.
58011006	Undi ù hà ndo sha nyin Unim faale abongale ye. Kì yi kpe-kpe le undi uyang-yang angwu u be hwaa lè Unim ù bong 'igyang-igyang le Unim ù yi, u bong le u sha 'inunung ka bendi abe be mbu 'uhwo kee he.
58011007	Abongale na a ma shi Unuwa a ma gyo utebb Unim angwu gbe lè biwom abi bı be shi lè he 'ushu abi a ma wa ndè bi ye. A ma ke Unim ife, u shi 'inong lishor ashi 'i ma kpan he lè 'ikwu-lihwan 'ima. Gbe he 'imen ashin Unuwa a tyung le bendigye be shi 'iban, ufe u fel kpa-kpa he ashi Unim gbe he abongale uma.
58011008	Abongale na a ma shi Ebraham a ke Unim ife he 'unyong ahwu a ma ko he le ù bo tyang 'ubong 'uma gye he 'ipi ashi Unim a kyebb le u ka he. A ma gbe lè he 'ubong 'uma, mà na u ngye he 'ipi u gye ye or.
58011009	Gbe he abongale a ma ngyor kwu ná ugaandi he 'ipi ashi Unim a kyebb ndor he. Ufe lè Azik lè Ujekob be ma ndē he bebuu. Befe or be ma kpē úkyébb umen i lè ha Unim.
58011010	Ebraham a ma ndor lishi he ushu angwu Unim a kam, u mbee tye. Ushu angwu há, lìshií lima li ngie.
58011011	Abongale na a shi Ebraham a fel ātyām bebwaa, mà na ungye-ma Usara a ngyor 'ukwom, u kashi or. Ebraham a fe lityam ha Unim le u ba sha 'iwom ashi a kong ndor.
58011012	He 'unyong 'umen ana, mà na ati lihwu ama a ma teng zangg a or, gbe he inyiahwo ima na a hwan bebwaa gbamm abe be go 'ugii ná ikpen ı go he 'usi, be mbee go gbe gyong aboale ná 'uyia lishor.
58011013	Bendi bemen ana puu be fe lityam ha Unim kpamm be gbe hwō. Be kpē biwom abi Unim a kyebb ndor ābe mà ukpong ye, ukpor be naa ndè bi gye he 'ushu, be kpe bi he abongale. Be kong he ashi bendi le bè yi begaandi a he igye anyin.
58011014	Abe be kong 'itaa ana, be tyung le be ndor lishi hè be bè kwu lè 'ubong 'ubell 'ugyang.
58011015	Be tem ndor lishi gye he item he 'ubong ahwu be gbe tyang a ye. Kì be kwu le be ndor lishi ná, hang be ndè libwo le bè tem item.
58011016	Be ndor lishi ha 'ubong ahwu 'u ngbebb hwò puu ahwu 'ù yi he lifung-atabe. Gbé be ko Unim le Unim ubell, ishwia i sha Unim ye, likorye a shi ushu ndor ābe befe a.
58011017	-
58011018	Abongale ha Unim na a ma shi Ebraham a bong le u kung unwaa-ma Azik shang Unim he 'unyong ahwu Unim a gil he. Unim a ma ke-e úkyébb le: "Wo ba kwa lè igia gbe ha Azik." Mà na or, unwaa angwu Ebraham ù kee-kee yi lè he a ken, a nyim Unim ahe ye.
58011019	A ma ngye le Unim ù yi lè ikeb le u wum Azik lè he lihwu. Kigyang-igyang Azik ù yi átyám ná undi angwu a wum lè he lihwu a.
58011020	Abongale na a ma shi Azik a kyebb 'ukwun ahwu 'u be be lè he 'ushu ndor Ujekob lè Isor.
58011021	Abongale na a ma shi Ujekob a ke bebwaa Ujosef, bendi befee, kukwun mà ukpong u hà hwō. A mbu kpo he lishi utyuu uma fe Unim.
58011022	Abongale na a ma shi Ujosef a bun de bendi Izwell le be ba gba lè he Igyept. A kong ashin mà ukpong a hà hwō. U mbee kong ndor 'itaa bè shi lè ikeb ima.
58011023	Abongale na a ma shi ātyām Umosis lè anam be ma kung he ndyell afell akie kung lè he 'unyong ahwu be ma hwan he. Be ma ndè le a ngbebb 'unung; be maa shell le be ban uten usu ye.
58011024	Abongale na a shi Umosis, nyong ahwu a ma fel gbel, a ma swan le bè ko he le igia Ufero ye.
58011025	Ki nyin he le ù kpē 'ingie utung ha bendi Unim hwò ashi le ù kwu he igor shi 'iban he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg.
58011026	A ngye le gbe undi a kpe 'ingie he 'uhwo Ujeso Ukristi, Undi-likpan, ki ngbebb hwò ashi le ù kwu lè bingbebb puu abi Igyept, likorye a maa ndor lishi ha lifem angi lı be lè he 'ushu a.
58011027	Abongale na a ma shi Umosis a gbe lè he Igyept faale 'ushell ingywo usu. A ma tem item ye fel ná a nde Unim angwu bendi be nde-e ye nà.
58011028	Abongale na a ma shi-e a kpi Kipam ashi Agbele-gyong. A de bendi Izwell le bè kung anung unwaa utia mbi wu he isi ungwu lishi hè udengell Unim angwu u gwu bendi ù gwu uhwaa unwaa Izwell nyong u be ye.
58011029	Abongale na a ma shi bendi Izwell be gbe he 'uyia he 'unyong ahwu be gbe he umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Umbwo ubwaa. He 'unyong ahwu bendi Igyept be ma kaa le be gba gyong umbwo umen ana, be ma kò umbwo.
58011030	Abongale na a ma shi uging 'ubong Ujeriko a ma gyebb shī he itang he 'unyong ahwu bendi Izwell be tan kel-kel fe-e ati adyong-ifee.
58011031	Abongale na a ma kpan Urehab, ungingye akpela, he 'unyong ahwu be gwu bendi abe be ke Unim ife ye, likorye bendi Izwell abe be be ndè 'ipi, a kpē be udim-udim.
58011032	Mì gye 'ushu a? Kì yi lè 'unyong le mi kong gba lè Ugidyon, Ubarak, Usamson, Ujefeta, Udebid, Usamuwell lè bendi puu abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim ye.
58011033	Gbe he abongale besuso be ndo bekye hwò abong. Be shi biwom abi bi ngbebb, he ashin be kpe biwom abi Unim a kyebb ndor ābe. Besuso be shi begaba be shib ungwu.
58011034	Besuso be maa naa he 'udyan 'índe, umor-inde u do ābe ye. Besuso be buu hwaa hè bendi bè gwu ābe lè lishwia ye. Mà na bè yi lè 'iken ye or, be tem fel kang-kang. Be maa fel ndo 'ukye kangg; bendi-linaa bebell be maa fel buu ābe.
58011035	Bengingye besuso abe be bong ha Unim, bendi bebell abe be hwō be wum lè he lihwu. Bendi besuso be kpē 'ingie he abwo bendi-linaa bebell kpamm gbe hwō. Bendi-linaa bebell be de be le bè swan Unim hè be bè tem ke be 'ingie ye. Bendi bemen i be bong le be swan Unim ye, likorye be ngye le be ba wum lè he lihwu, be kwu lè likpan angi li ngbebb hwò.
58011036	Be nyan besuso, be kpam ābe ikwun. Be bua besuso indi, fe he igaadye.
58011037	Be maa akor gwu besuso; be baā besuso bigie bifee; be gwu besuso lè lishwia. Bendi bemen i be mbu likaa, be fel fe ikwob inyia a; bendi-linaa bebell be maa ka ābe 'ingie kangg.
58011038	Be maa fel buu ndyell mbee libeb lè ikwell, be ndē he afee ibung lè ahwom akor. Igye anyin i ma kpè lè bendi bemen i ye.
58011039	-
58011040	Bendi bemen i be fem lizen likorye be ma bong ha Unim. Mà na or, be ma kpē biwom abi Unim a ma kyebb ndor ābe ye, likorye Unim a de le u ba sha 'iwom 'inunung ashi 'i ngbebb hwò ka li. Ugim Unim a ma yi le u ba sha ābe be fel gelalala utung ha abel.
58012001	Bel ufe, lì yi he 'udyan bendi a. Bendi bemen i be tyung li ashi 'i ze le abongale. Bwo 'ì yi 'itaa ana, mà lì pam 'uhwo-tyan lè ha biwom abi bı kwuǔ li 'ukwo lè biban abi lı tyang ābi abwo mbee ye. Mà lì naa genn hè li lì buu akye angi à yi ndor li le lì buu.
58012002	Mà lì ngyor lè ashi atyan ndor ha Ujeso angwu abongale utyan ù yi ha ahe kung lè há he ukpi-ikwu gye he umbee-likel. He 'uhwo igor angi Unim a ma kam ndor he lè he 'ushu, a ma bong hwō lihwu he 'ikpakpaa, li ma shi-e ishwia ye. He atan-lengi anwun 'anaa-anaa i ù fel yi kwu he 'idem 'usu he 'ubwo lizen Unim, u ndè gbe lè bendi.
58012003	Mà gim gbe lè Ujeso ná a ma bong kpe 'ingie lè he abwo bendi-iban abe be ma tel he. He ashin mà kwu lè ingie, ma wee abwo ye.
58012004	Mà yi he 'ushu 'ukye ma ndo ha 'iban, ki wa fel ashi mà hwō ihwō a ye.
58012005	Má naa lityam ingie angi Unim a ma fe men ná undi u fe bebwaa-ma a? Unim a de le: "Unwaa-gi, kpē 'ingie ashi, mi Atia, mı ka-a ná utebb faale inem anemale. Shī wee abwo he 'unyong ahwu mı ben-a ye.
58012006	Undi angwu 'i nyin Unim lè he, u kpe-e ná unwaa-ma, na Unim u ke-e 'ingie, u tebb he."
58012007	Mà ngib lityam kpē 'ingie likorye 'ingie ashi 'itaa ana na ātyām unwaa u ke unwaa-ma he-e ù tebb he. Kingie 'imen ashi 'itaa i 'i tyung le Unim a bong le wò yi unwaa-ma a. Kì yi lè unwaa angwu u shi 'iban, átyám u mor he atebbale ye.
58012008	Gbe ma kpē 'ingie he 'iban ná bebwaa Unim be kpē ye, hà mà yi bebwaa abe ufe-gyang a hwan a ye, hà mà yi bebwaa ushu a.
58012009	Betyetyan abe he igye i be ka li 'ingie le li shi 'ibibi, li ka ābe ife, teng-teng lè Atyetyan Unim angwu he lifung-atabe a? Li ka Atyetyan Unim ife hè li lì kwu lè likpan.
58012010	Betyetyan abe he igye i be ka li 'ingie 'itaa ashi be kee he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg. Unim ufe u ka li 'ingie ashi 'ì kpell li hè li lì fel gelalala ná ufe-gyang.
58012011	He 'unyong ahwu lı kpē 'ingie nya he abwo, ki ngbebb li he lityam ye, li mbwee. Ukpor nyong 'ingie 'imen ana 'ı be mbee, ki ba lè lifem linunung; ki sha bendi abe be kpē shi lityam ken, be sha 'inunung, be kwu ikwun ha bende-bell.
58012012	Mà pell abwo angi ma bua fe ana, ma ndaa abee angi ma kan fe ana.
58012013	Mà tan he akwo angi kpa-kpa afe-afe hè ukeb 'igwun 'ubee ù mbee for ye, hè 'igwun 'ubee 'ì mbee imbee.
58012014	Mà kaa kangg hè men mà kwu ikwun ha bendi puu, ma kwu gelalala faale 'iban likorye undi ù hà ndo nda Unim faale afaale ù yi gelalala ye.
58012015	Mà baa teng undi ūmen ken or u tem item lè he inung Unim. Ma baa teng undi ūmen ken or u kwa lè likpe libibi angi lı ban likpe bende-ma. Likpe libibi li yi ná ùkwán ubibi lè bezu.
58012016	Mà baa teng undi ūmen ken or u sha 'igbang, u nem kung likong Unim he 'ukpo ye ná Isor. Isor a ma ndyebb 'ukaandi 'uma zī he lizi 'ugbe ken kporr.
58012017	Má ngye le Isor a ma hà fel kee le átyám ù ke-e 'ukwun, ukpor átyám a ma ke-e ye. Mà na a ma kee 'ukwo lè akye he ashi he-e ù gie àshi a ma shi or, a ma ndè 'ukwo ye.
58012018	Mà well he 'ipi ma naa. Mà yi 'itaa ken ha bendi Izwell ye. Be ma naa gwaa he ukwell, angwu be ko le Usanai angwu be nde-e lè ashi, be tyua he abwo. Be ndè 'ìndē 'i mor dema-dema lè há ukwell. Kibu 'i ma gye 'ifufebb, itaa i tye.
58012019	Bendi bemen ana be gyo usom, be mbee gyo lìngmam lè há. Lingmam anyina li ma shi ābe be shell kangg, be fel tim anung le be kee le bè tem gyo ye,
58012020	likorye lingmam anyin li ke be uten le, gbe undi a gye he ukwell ana, bè maa akor gwu-e; inyia or titi, bè shi āngi ná. Uten anwun a ma dyam gbe be.
58012021	Biwom abin puu bi ma shi ābe be shell kangg. Umosis ugyang or a ma de le, "Mi fel shell, tung for-for-for."
58012022	Men ufe ma wu há he ukwell angwu be ko le Uzayon mà. Ma wu he Ujeruselem angwu he lifung-atabe, angi lì yi ushu Unim angwu ù yi uwum. Idengell Unim ì yi há asisilisi asisilisi.
58012023	Mà yi he liwu bendi Unim abe be kpee liwu lè igor. Bè yi bebwaa-ma abe be fee azen abell he 'ushia he lifung-atabe a. Mà yi naa he 'ushu Unim angwu u tang bendi puu ushe. Ma gbe he 'ubee bendi benunung abe Unim a shi ābe be fel gelalala.
58012024	Má be hwaa lè Ujeso angwu a ma shi 'iwom 'ifufe ashi Unim a kong ndor ha bendigye a fe lishi gbe he 'uhwo-ma. Kiwom ashi anung ama a shi 'i ngbebb hwò ashi angi Ebell a shi.
58012025	Mà baa teng ma kpam atyung wa àshi Ujeso u kong ha amen. Bendi abe be ma kpam atyung wu àshī undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim a kong, be ma kpē 'ingie. Befe be ma hà hwaa ye, teng-teng lè bel abe li gyo igie Unim angwu ù yi he lifung-atabe kpam atyung wu a?
58012026	He 'unyong 'umen ana lìngmam lima li maa nyùng itang he abwo. Kanaa-anaa nyin ufe a fel ke úkyébb a le a mbee ba nyùng itang he abwo tii-tii-tii 'ugbe ken; lifung-atabe or, u be nyùng āngi.
58012027	Igie àngi le 'kugbe ken' nyin 'i tyung li le Unim u ba nyùng biwom abi a mbe puu he-e ù mbee lè bi, kee-kee teng biwom abi bı nyùng ye bife-bife.
58012028	He ashin lì pee Unim angwu a ke li 'usu ahwu u nyùng ye. Li mbee ke-e ife angi ı nyin he, li shell he.
58012029	Kigyang-igyang Unim utyan ù yi a ná 'ìndē ashi 'ı shī nim lè biwom puu a.
58013001	Men abe mà yi bebwanam bende he 'uhwo Ujeso Ukristi, kì gye 'ushu nyin amen lè bende.
58013002	Mà kpe begaandi be he ishu īmen abwo afee-afee. Bendi-iso be ma kpē begaandi ná kpe-kpe lè idengell Unim or be ma ngye ye.
58013003	Mà gim gbe lè bendi abe bè yi he igaadye nya a na hang ma gim gbe 'i yi nya yi amen a. Mà gim gbe lè abe be kpē 'ingie nya a na hang ma gim gbe 'í yi nya yi amen a.
58013004	Bendi bè shi libee lì kwu lè ibia ye. Kì yi le ùkyēbb ù shi ungye ù fe lityam ha ahe; ungye u shi ùkyēbb ù fe lityam ha ahe. Bendi abe be shi 'igbang lè abe be kee bengye bendi, Unim u ba maa ābe ushe.
58013005	Mà nyòng únde ye. Ashi mà yi lè shi 'ì kwun amen 'igyor likorye Unim a de le ù hà ndo tyang amen ye, u ndè gbe lè men.
58013006	He atan-lengi anwun lì kwu lè lityam uteb, undi-undi ù kong le: "Unim na ù yi undi-ukpell ugi, mì hà ndo shell ye. Kì yi lè ashi undigye ù hà ndo shi-m ye."
58013007	Mà gim gbe lè bekaandi bēmen abe be ma bun igie Unim de men. Mà gim gbe lè likpe linunung libell he igye anyin, mà bong ha Unim ná befe be ma bong.
58013008	Kitaa Ujeso Ukristi a ma yi leěti, kitaa 'imen na ù yi 'unyin i, kitaa 'imen na u be kwu ngyor igye kpamm.
58013009	Mà bong ihwuale atyetye-atyetye angi bendi be hwua amen ì bel àtyám āmen lè ha ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa ye. Ma naa genn he abongale gbe he inung Unim a, gbe he itetel angi gbe lè bizizi a ye. Ife i kpell bendi abe be ndor āngi ye.
58013010	Ujeso Ukristi a kung 'uhwo-ma shang Unim ke li. Bekaandi abe be maa shang Unim he 'ubuu Ijuus be ma yi lè libwo azēle 'iwom he ashangale Ujeso Ukristi ye.
58013011	Ukaandi Ijuus angwu u shang Unim a maa kung anung bityuale gya lè ngi he 'ipo ashi be ndor ta-ta ke Unim la shang he biban bendi. Be kung akwom ábi lè ting shī 'inde he ugbaakwo.
58013012	Kitaa 'imen i na Ujeso or a ma hwō he lifung-ushu a ye, hè anung ama à to taa bendi lè he biban.
58013013	Gbe ná a, mà lì gbe lè he lifung-ushu, hè li lì pwom he, li kpē ishwia angi a kpē,
58013014	likorye lì yi lè ushu angwu u zī igye he igye anyin ye, li ndor lishi ushu angwu u be lè há 'ushu.
58013015	He ashin mà lì ke Unim ipee gbe ha Ujeso mbee 'unyong. Ipee angi lı ke-e ì yi ukyekye bityuale abi lı shang he a. Mà lì pee lizen Unim lè lingmam lityan.
58013016	Mà naa lityam lè 'inunung ashele lè akpellale bendi ye, likorye 'i nyin Unim lè biwom bimen i. Bì yi a ná bityuale abi ma shang he a.
58013017	Mà ke bekaandi bēmen ife, mà shi ashi be de men le mà shi. Be nda gba lè bēnyōng bēmen faale 'unyong ashwele le bwo be be naa he 'ushu Unim he-e ù maa ābe ushe he aki ama angi be maa shi ke men he igye anyin. Mà ke be ife, hè be bè shi aki abell lè igor. Gbe ná a ye, hà be ba sha āngi lè 'imbwee. Gbe be shi āngi lè 'imbwee, a ba lè lifem ka amen ye.
58013018	Mà gye 'ushu kong ha Unim ke li. Lí ngye dangg le ugim ù yi li utaa-utaa likorye li kee le li sha ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa mbee 'unyong.
58013019	Mi mbee tim amen anung kangg le mà kong ha Unim le ù shi 'ukwo ke-m mî tem be ha amen há akikye.
58013020	Atyetyan Ujeso angwu ù yi Ukaandi angwu u ndè gbe lè bel ná ukang-itia, Unim a wum he lè he lihwu hè ashi Unim a kong ndor ha bendigye 'ì fe lishi gbe he anung ama ngyor igye kpamm.
58013021	Unim angwu u ke bendi ikwun ù ke men biwom binunung abi bi baa amen hè men mà shi lè bi ashi a kee le mà shi. Unim ù shi aki he atyam atyan gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi hè li lì shi likpe angi li nyin he. Ipee ì kwu ke Ujeso Ukristi ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor ná mi kong.
58013022	Bebuye, mi tim amen anung le mà ngib lityam kpē utebb anwun. Kushia ahwu mi fee amen i 'u kwob ye.
58013023	Mi kee le mà ngye le be fem unwandatyan Utimoti lè he igaadye mà. Gbe a be akikye, mi ba ba lè he ha amen há.
58013024	Mà kong mi lè bekaandi bēmen lè bendi Unim puu. Bendi abongale abe lè he Itali be bii atye āmen.
58013025	Unim ù hā ke men puu 'ukwun.
59001001	Mi Ujems angwu mì yi uboyi Unim befe lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, na mı fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè men bendi Ijuus abe ma fe Unim, abe ma paa wu mbee igegem he igye i. Mi kong lè men puu.
59001002	Bebuye, he 'unyong 'uyang-yang ahwu bingie bitaa atyetye-atyetye bı kem fe men, mà kpe bi igor-igor,
59001003	likorye bingie abin bi kaa amen nda le ma fe lityam ha Unim'igyang-igyang â? Bingie bimen ana bi ba sha amen ma fel naa genn fa Unim.
59001004	Mà ngyor naa genn fe Unimlè wu he umbee-likel, hè men mà fel kpa-kpa he ashi Unim faale uben, ma mbu gyan he 'inunung 'iyang-yang ye.
59001005	Gbe 'ì yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu a bi lishi ye, ù bii Unim le ù ke-e lishi abyele. Unim a ngbebb inung 'indee-indee; ufe na u ke bendi biwom puu, u kwell 'akwukwell ye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a bii he lishi abyele, u ka he ángi lityam ken.
59001006	Ukpor undi angwu a bii Unim le ù ke-e 'iwom, ù fe lityam ha ahe le u ka he, u fel lè atyāngale le hà ù ke-e or, hà ù ke-e ye or, ye. Undi angwu u tyāng ityang ù yi ná umbwo angwu u tim puu-puu-puu mbee 'unyong.
59001007	Undi angwu 'itaa i, u ndor lityam he 'iteng ken ye, u fe lityam ha Unim ye, ù ndor lishi le u kpa 'iwom lè ha Unim ye.
59001009	Undi Unim angwu 'ù yi he 'ukpo he igye anyin ye, ù kwu lè igor, bwo a dyam he ashi Unim.
59001010	Undi Unim angwu a mbu 'ingbebb or, ù kwu lè igor nyong Unim a be lè he he itang likorye a ngye le undi-ingbebb u za igye ye nya a na bibubo ukwan bı zī igye ye i a.
59001011	Nya a na ishu ı bi kangg, bibubo bı nia, bi well wu he itang, kunung ábi 'u mbee. Kitaa 'imen i na undi-ingbebb u be hwō tyang bingbebb bima shal-shal-shal.
59001012	Undi angwu a ngyor naa genn fe Unim he 'unyong ugilale, u ba kwa lè igor likorye gbe a hwò igilale puu, Unim u be ke-e likpan ligyang angyell.Life na lì yi lifem angi Unim a kyebb le u ba ka bendi puu abe 'i nyin ābe lè he.
59001013	Undi uyang-yang angwu 'itaa ugilale 'iyang-yang 'i be hwaa lè he, ù fel lè ugim le Unim na u gil he ye. Kì yi lè ashi 'ı lam Unim shi-e u shi 'ibibi ye. Ufe-gyang or, u sha undi le ù shi 'ibibi ye.
59001014	Bigyor bibibi abi bì yi he lityam undi na bı lam he shi-e u shi bibibi. Gbe a shi āshi puu, ki be lè lihwu.
59001016	Bebwandagi lityam, mà tyang 'iyang-yang 'ì lam amen ye.
59001017	Kinunung 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi lè àbēl ye, hà 'i ba lè ha Unim a. Puu abi bi ba lè ha Unim angwu a shi libwee, lè 'ufell lè ikpen ndor he usi a. Ufe u gie or, ngwu ù tan ná libwee lı tan he-e ù gbe tyang li he 'ifufebb or ye.
59001018	Ufe-gyang na a fe ukaa ndè waa le gbe he igie ima angi ì yi 'igyang i, u sha li li fel bebwaa-ma, hè li lì fel utie-ushu bendi puu abe a ke be likpan 'unyong.
59001019	Bebwandagi lityam, má ngye abin. Undi uyang-yang ù gyo 'igyo dangg, ukpor ù shwie fan likong ye, u shwie ngywo ingywo ye,
59001020	likorye undi u ngywa ingywo á ha sha 'inunung ashi 'ı nyin Unim ye.
59001021	He ashin mi da amen le, mà mbeè lè 'ibibi 'iyang-yang lè he likpe līmen. Mà kung abwo āmen lè he 'ibibi 'iyang-yang. Mà keb'uhwo-men ke Unim, ma gyo igie ima angi a fe men he atyam, likorye igie ima ana na ì yi lè ikeb le i kpan amen lè he 'iban.
59001022	Mà shi biwom he 'ukwo ahwu igie Unim i hwua amen, mà kee-kee gyo agyoale ufe-ufe a ye. Undi angwu u gyo agyoale ufe-ufe, u shi ashi a gyo ana ye, u sòm 'uhwo-ma isòm.
59001023	Undi uyang-yang angwu u gyo agyoale ufe-ufe, u shi ashele ye, hà ù yi 'itaa ken ha undi angwu a ndè 'uhwo-ma li-li-li he 'inde-ushu, nyong a gbe lè há, nya 'ukwo-ukwo u tem well ná á yi ndè 'uhwo-ma á yi yi ye.
59001025	Ukpor undi angwu u shun igie Unim li-li-li, u gye 'ushu shi biwom he 'ukwo ahwu igie Unim i hwua he, gbe u kee-kee gyo, mà u naa lityam a ye, u gyo u shi abi a gyo, Unim u ka he 'ukwun kangg, likorye igie Unim ì yi gelalala, i shi lè ikeb le ì kpan li lè he 'iban.
59001026	Undi uyang-yang angwu a kung 'uhwo-ma le ù yi undi Unim a, gbe u ndor 'abell 'ama kporr mbee ye, hà u lam 'uhwo-ma ilam le ù yi undi Unim, hà biwom abi u shi ná undi Unim ana or, bì yi 'idideng.
59001027	Likpe undi Unim angi lì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim lì yi le ù kpell bebwaa-aban, u kpell bengye-uhwuu abe be kpē 'ingie, u ndor 'uhwo-ma'igbe-igbe lè ha biwom igye anyin puu abi bì yi bibibi he ashi Unim.
59002001	Bebuye, bwo men ma bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi angwu 'asu 'ama 'a dyam hwò puu a, ki ngbebb le mà taā bendi itaa ke be ife ye.
59002002	Pisoye bendi befee be be he 'ipi ma kpee liwu. Angwu ken ù yi undi-ingbebb, a fe biwom abi bı kaa 'ate, u fe unwaande angwu be kung igold shi-e. Angwu ken u shi undi-likaa, u fe bigegem bihwom. Má gor kpē angwu a bwee idem i bwo-e he ashi 'indee-indee ana, ma kie he 'idem ishagba, de-e le, "Ukaandi, kwu ana." Angwu likaa ufe, ma de-e le ù naa ana; pisoye ma de-e le ù bel kwu he itang a. Likpe linunung na lì nya yi ana a?
59002004	Undi angwu a shi 'itaa ana, hà a shi likpe liketye likorye a shi tyung le undi-iso a dyam hwò unde-ma. Kitaa likpe anyin lì yi likpe libibi a.
59002005	Bebwandagi lityam, mà gyo. Bendi abe be mbu likaa he igye i, na Unim a waa le bè bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, hè be bè fel mbu 'ingbebb he ashi Unim. Be mbee fel lè abwo he 'iteng-usu ashi Unim a kyebb leěti le u ka bendi abe 'i nyin abe lè ufe Unim.
59002006	Bwo 'ì yi ná, kibang a, ma bia bendi-likaa? Ndè le bendi-ingbebb na be shi amen zī, be kwu amen gye lè men he ukoto?
59002007	Bendi-ingbebb na be kong bia lizen ishagba angi Ujeso Ukristi. Lizen limen ana na Unim a kung shì le gbe ha angi be fel ko li le bendi bema ufe Unim.
59002008	Uten angwu Ujeso Ukristi, Usu utyan, a tye, be fee fe he 'ushia Unim, ù yi le: "Kì nyin-a lè unde-gang ná 'i nyin-a lè 'uhwo-gang." Bendi abe be ke ife shi-e, hà be shi 'i ngbebb.
59002009	Ukpor, gbe undi a hà fel ke undi-iso ife hwò unde-ma, hà a shi 'iban, hà a zī libi he abanale Iten Unim.
59002010	Mà undi ù shi iten Unim puu, fel kee-kee ban ken ufe-ufe or, hà a ban Iten Unim puu.
59002011	Unim umen angwu a tye uten le undi ù gbe ipel ha undi-iso fem ungye-ma tyang ye i, ufe umen na a mbee tye uten le undi ù gwu undi ye. He ashin gbe undi a gbe ipel ha undi-iso fem ungye-ma tyang ye, ukpor a gwu undi ufe, hà a ban iten Unim a puu.
59002012	He ashin mi kee le mà ngye le, he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma kong lè ashi ma shi, mà well le he liti ken Unim u ba maa amen ushe le hà ma ke ife shi iten ima angi ı kpan amen lè he biban a or.
59002013	Undi angwu u kwu lè beshi ha bendi ye, Unim or u ba kwa lè beshi ha ahe he liti ushe ye. Ukpor undi angwu u kwu lè beshi ha bendi, u ba nda le beshi abe Unim u kwu lè be ha ahe he liti ushe be sha he u za likpong.
59002014	Bebuye, gbe undi a bong ha Unim, ukpor u shi aki anunung ye, kitaa abongale ashina 'ì yi 'idideng a zii. Kidideng abongale ashina 'i ba kpa he tyang abwo he ushe Unim ye.
59002015	Gbe 'ì nya yi le lì yi lè unwandatyan ken angwu a bong ha Unim, angwu ù yi lè lizi or, ngwu inditen or ye, undi he liwu līmen a de-e le, "Gye lè 'ukwun, Unim u hā ka-a lizi lè inditen," ukpor ufe u ke-e lizi lè inditen ye, ashi a kong ana 'ì yi 'idideng a zii.
59002017	Kitaa ana nà abongale ha Unim or a kwu 'idideng zii, gbe à yi faale aki anunung.
59002018	Pisoye undi u da le: "Undi ken a bong ha Unim a, angwell u shi aki anunung a." Mi fan undi angwu há le: "Kì yi lè 'ukwo 'ususo-ususo ahwu undi u tyung le a bong ha Unim fem aki anunung ashele tyang ye. Kinunung ashi undi u shi na 'ı tyung le a bong ha Unim."
59002019	Ndè le wo bong le Unim ù kee-kee yi ken a? Gbe wo bong ná, hà wo shi 'i ngbebb. Ukpor wò ngye le ikeb ibibi or i ngye le Unim ù kee-kee yi ken a, ki shi āngi i shell, tung for-for-for.
59002020	Wò yi dangg ye! Mì shi ná a, mî sha-a 'ì nung-a le, gbe undi a bong ha Unim, a shi aki anunung ye, hà abongale uma ù yi á 'idideng zii?
59002021	Ndè atietyan Abraham, kibang a ma shi ashi 'i shi Unim a kung he ná undi ununung he ashi ama? Kiwom ashi Ebraham a ma shi 'ì yi le a ma kung unwaa-ma Azik te lè he le u la shang Unim.
59002022	Ki nung nwongg lè he likpe Ebraham le a ma yi lè abongale or, u shi aki anunung or. Kinunung ashi a ma shi na 'i ma shi abongale uma a ma hà fel kpa-kpa.
59002023	Ashi 'i ma shi i, ki shi nya a na be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim a. Be fee le: "Le bwo Ebraham a fe lityam ha Unim na Unim a kpe-e ná undi ununung he ashi ama." Be mbee fee le, Unim a ko Ebraham le udim-ma.
59002024	Ashin 'i tyung amen le undi u fel ununung he ashi Unim gbe a shi aki anunung or, ki kwom he abongale mà 'i mbee a ye.
59002025	Mà mbee ndè undi ná Urehab angwu a ma yi ungingye akpela. Leěti nyong Ijuus i ma som bendi gye he 'igie ashi ù yi, a ma kpe be ngbebb-ngbebb, u tyung ābe 'ukwo ahwu be gbe wu he ushu lè 'ukwun. He ashi a ma shi ana, Unim a ma kpe-e ná undi ununung he ashi ama.
59002026	Gbe 'ūnyōng 'u gbe lè ha undigye, hà undi umen ana a fel likwom a, a fel 'idideng zii. Kitaa 'imen ana na abongale ha Unim or a kwu 'idideng zii, gbe à yi faale aki anunung.
59003001	Bebuye, ki ngbebb le bendi bēmen gbamm bè fel bitisha ye, likorye men ma ngye le ushe angwu be be maa li bel bitisha u ba dyam hwà angwu bendi abe be teng iteng.
59003002	Bel puu li sha imbeb gbamm. Gbe 'ì yi lè undi angwu 'abell 'ama 'a shi umbeb ye, hà undi umen ana ù yi faale uben he akwo ama puu. U shi lè ikeb le u ndor agwo ama puu le a shi biwom puu kpa-kpa.
59003003	Mà ndè 'iwom ná 'ukaa-inyia i, gbe undi a kee āhwu le 'ù ke-e ife, u kung 'anwaa 'igem 'inde bua kwa āhwu he ungwu atong, le nyong 'i fong he le he-e ù pwom āhwu gye he 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi 'i fong he.
59003004	Mà mbee ndè 'iwom ná 'inong lishor, mà na 'i dyam or, kufem ahwu 'ukaa-ukaa 'u sob lè shi lo-lo-lo or, undi angwu u naa 'inong u kung unwaa 'ikpe a, tan lè shi gya he 'ipi a kee.
59003005	Kitaa ana na 'abell 'à yi. Mà na 'a zen or, kà yi lè ikeb he inyiahwo undigye 'indee-indee, ka kong biwom or bi dyam kangg. Men ma ngye le umbee-inde ù yi lè ikeb le u gba 'ìndē sha mbee ukor gbangg.
59003006	Kabell 'à yi 'itaa ken ha 'ìndē. He 'abell 'atyan na bibibi he igye anyin puu bi fe ushu. Kafe na 'a tan lè bibibi ke agwo undigye puu. Ka nim lè undigye kung lè he 'unyong be hwan he lè wu he 'unyong ahwu u hwō. Kà yi 'ìndē ashi 'ı be lè ha Usetan ugyang a.
59003007	Bendi bè yi lè ikeb le be kwun bitaa inyia puu, be bè kwun inyia libeb, linyun, ìshiı, lè abi lishor.
59003008	Ukpor kabell 'afe-afe na 'ì yi lè undi angwu u kwun āke mbee ye. Kà yi 'ibibi 'iwom ashi 'ì yi lè abwo akwele ye gbangg. Bezu abe be tan lè lihwu be ba lè ha 'abell a.
59003009	Kabell 'amen a ken, lı kung pee Atyetyan Unim angwu a gyan li puu; kafe a ken, lı tem lè ke buu bendi abe Unim a mbe bi 'uhwo-ma atye.
59003010	Kabell a ken, lı kung āke ke ipee, fe lı mbee tem lè ke buu unde-tyan atye. Bebuye, kitaa 'iwom ashin 'i ngbebb le lì shi ná ye.
59003011	Linwan a ken, umbwo u nyin he ungwu, u zu he ungwu a?
59003012	Bebuye, umogol ú nya fel wum agbe ulyom, ngwu ulyom na ù nya fel wum agbe umogol ye. Umbwo ununung u ba lè he linwan angi lı tal he azor ye.
59003013	Kì nya yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu a bi lishi, biwom bi nung he à? Ù shi binunung, u keb 'uhwo-ma likorye binunung lè 'uhwo akebale na bı tyung le a bi lishi.
59003014	Ukpor, gbe mà yi lè ubell ubibi lè lityam abanale, ma gim 'uhwo-men ufe-ufe-ufe, hà 'i ngbebb le mà pwom ungwu le ma bi lishi ye, hà ma mbee bè uman fe 'igyang.
59003015	Lishi abyele angi 'itaa i, li be lè ha Unim a ye, lì yi angi igye anyin a. Li be lè he igim ibibi angi bendigye, li be lè ha Usetan, usu bibibi.
59003016	He 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi bendi bè yi lè lityam abanale, undi-undi u gim 'uhwo-ma ufe-ufe, anaa lè akpe abibi bi kwa há titi.
59003017	Lishi abyele angi lı be lè ha Unim lì yi atyetye. Undi angwu ù yi lè lishi abyele angi 'itaa i, u kwa gelalala, u kwu ikwun ha bendi, u mbu 'uhwo ha bendi, u kpo 'utyung ye, u kwu lè beshi kangg ha bendi, u shi 'inunung mbee 'unyong. Undi angwu ù yi lè lishi abyele angi 'itaa i, ù yi kpell-kpell-kpell ye, u lam bendi ye.
59003018	Bendi bemen abe bè yi bendi-ikwun, abe be yi bendi-ikwun, abe be gwell bendi, be ba nda 'inunung kangg lè he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi be shi. Kinunung 'imen ana 'ì yi ná lifem angi lı be lè he 'iwom ashi undi u kwan.
59004001	Kibang ashi 'ı be lè anaa lè beshwan he liwu līmen mbee 'unyong? Ma mbwa linaa likorye igim ibibi īmen i fell amen 'uhwo he atyam.
59004002	Mà yi lè 'igyor le hang mà kwu lè biwom, ukpor mà shi na ana or le hè men mà fel lè bi, ma fel lè bi ye. Ashin 'i shi amen ma kam bendi or agwele. Ma bell biwom bendi or, ma fel lè bi ye, ashin 'i shi amen ma ndo shwan beshwan, ma ndo bendo. Ashi 'i shi amen ma ndè biwom abi ma kee ye, kì yi le ma bii Unim a le ù ke men ábi ye.
59004003	Pisoye ma bii Unim ábi, ukpor a ke men ábi ye, likorye ma bii he lè ugim liketye. Ma bii he biwom abi bı ke men-agyang ufe-ufe igor a.
59004004	Aye, men bendi bikpellale! Ki ze le ma ngye le undi angwu ù yi utyang ha igye anyin ù yi undi-linaa Unim a ye a? Undi uyang-yang angwu a kee le ù fel utyang ha igye anyin, hà a fel undi-linaa Unim a.
59004005	Be fee fe he 'ushia Unim le: "Kūnyōng ahwu Unim a shi fe undigye 'u bung ashi kangg." Mà shī gim le ashi be fee i 'ì yi 'idideng zii a ye.
59004006	Ukpor, kiken ashi Unim u ke li he inung ima, kì yi lè ikeb hwò igim ibibi angi ì yi ha abel. Kì yi nya a na be fee fe he 'ushia a le: "Unim ù yi linaa ha bendi idim, ukpor u sha 'inunung ha abe be keb 'uhwo-bell."
59004007	He ashin mà keb 'uhwo-ma fe Unim he 'ubwo. Mà swan Usetan, mà u buu tyang amen.
59004008	Mà die ngie Unim, he-e ù fel kpee-kpee ha amen. Men abe mà yi bendi-iban, mà kung abwo āmen lè he 'iban. Men bendi bikpellale, mà mbee lè bibibi lè he atyam āmen gbangg.
59004009	Mà shi ugim gbe lè biban abi ma shi, mà mbwee, ma ki, ma fe akpen he 'uhwo abi. Mà tyang ābi inyin, mâ fel fe akpen hwan; mà tem gor igor aye, mà fel mbwee imbwee.
59004010	Men mà keb 'uhwo-men fe Unim he 'ubwo, he-e ù hà bo amen 'inaa.
59004011	Bebuye, mà bia bende ye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ban lizen unde-ma, u bia he, hà a ban Iten Unim, u mbee bia āngi. Gbe men ma fel bendi abe be bia Iten Unim a, hà mà yi bendi abe be ke Iten ife a ye, hà ma sha 'uhwo-men ma fel bendi abe be bia Iten Unim a.
59004012	Unim ufe-ufe na ù yi lè ikeb le u ka uten, u shi lè ikeb le u gie he. Ufe umen na ù kee-kee yi lè ikeb le u kpan bendi, u ke ikeb le bendi bè hwō. Wo ufe, ayang ù hà yi-a wo angwu wo bia unde-gang?
59004013	Mà dang 'utyung gyo mi, men abe ma de le, "Liti anyin, liti anyin, bel li ba gya he 'ubong ahwell ee, li ba kwa há lize libo sha ūshī hè li lì nde lifem."
59004014	Men-agyang ufe, ma ngye ashi 'ı shi 'uhwo a? Men ufe, ma ba kwa ná a? Men mà yi ná 'ibu ashi 'ı mbu leèti, he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg 'i taa.
59004015	Kì yi ngbebb-ngbebb le mà de le, "Gbe 'i ngbebb Unim, a ndor li bewum, li ba sha 'iwom 'itaa i 'itaa i."
59004016	Kukwo-ukwo i ufe, mà so lè idim, mà yii pwom ungwu. Ungwu apwomale angwu 'itaa i ù yi liketye.
59004017	Ki ngbebb le mà well le undi angwu a ngye 'iwom ashi 'ì yi le ù shi, a mor āshi ashele, hà a shi 'iban.
59005001	Men bendi-ingbebb, mà dang 'utyung gyo mi! Ki ngbebb le mà ndo kung ki, fe akpen, likorye 'ingie ashi 'ı be hwaa lè men 'i dyam kangg.
59005002	Bingbebb bīmen bi hwee ban, ikung i ndeb ban amen bihwom idem.
59005003	Únde ūmen or, bindebekpen bi mbe ban he; bindebekpen ana bì yi 'itaa a ashi 'ı tyung le, nya a na bi mbe ban únde ana na bı be mbe ban inyiahwo īmen fel ná wò ko le 'ìndē na 'i shī āngi nà. Men mà so-i kam bingbebb bīmen ndor he 'usi. Ashin 'i ze le ma ngye le umbee-likel ati igye anyin na à yi he abwo i ye a?
59005004	Mà yii gya 'ushu lam bendi abe be shi amen aki he utia, ma kung únde angwu be shi amen aki ke be ye. He ashin be ki hwaa lè Unim le ù ndè lè be. Kùkye 'ubell 'u wu ha Unim angwu biwom puu bì yi he 'ubwo 'uma a.
59005005	Mà yi kib he binunung abi igye anyin, ma shi 'iyang-yang 'itaa ma kee.Ma za dyam kwa nyong liti linim nya a ná be ke bigundu lizi le bì zī dyam nyong liti agwele a.
59005006	Men ma maa ushe tang libi ke bendi benunung, ma gwu ābe, be shi 'ukaa ha amen ye.
59005007	Bebuye, mà ngib lityam naa genn kwu kpamm Atyetyan Ujeso u gbe be. Mà ndè undi-utia, u ngib lityam kwa baā utia uma lishi, u kwa umbwo ligbe undor, u kwu 'ungmam 'u te, u mbee kwu 'unyong ahwu be fem agbudyu 'u fel.
59005008	Men or mà ngib lityam 'itaa ken. Mà naa genn he afele Unim, likorye 'unyong ahwu Atyetyan Ujeso u be 'u fel kpee-kpee.
59005009	Bebuye, mà shī nem inem fe bende ye, hè men mà zī libi ha Unim ye. Mà nde, Atyetyan Ujeso angwu u be tang ushe a fel kpee-kpee.
59005010	Bebuye, mà shi ugim gbe lè bendi abe leěti be maa tye ugie 'isom Unim. Lè há íti, nyong be maa kpē 'ingie, be ma ngib lityam naa genn.Men or mà ngib lityam naa genn ná befe be ma naa.
59005011	Li dè le Unim a ke be 'ukwun likorye be ngib lityam naa genn lè wu he umbee-likel. Mā ndè ná Ujob a ma ngib lityam nyong bingie bi ma yi fe-e; ma mbee ndè ná Unim a ma shi 'ingie Ujob 'i ma be lè 'ukwun ke-e. Kì yi faale atyangale le Unim u ngya 'ingie undi, u shi lè beshi ha bendi bema.
59005012	Bebuye, kigyang ashi 'i hwò puu na 'ì yi le undi ù tam 'iwom ye.Undi ù tam lifung-atabe or, ngwu ù tam igye or, ngwu ù tam 'iwom 'iyang-yang he igye i or ye. Mà 'ibang-ibang 'ì shi, undi ù tam ye gbangg. Gbe ma bong ibong, kì ngyor le ma bong; gbe ma swan iswan, kì ngyor le ma swan, hè men mà zī libi he ushe Unim ye.
59005013	Gbe 'i yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu u kpē 'ingie, undi umen ana ù bii Unim ukpell. Gbe 'ì yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu ù yi lè igor, ufe ù gyam agyam pee Unim.
59005014	Gbe 'ì yi lè undi he liwu līmen angwu ù yi gogo ye, ù ko bekaandi liwu bendi abongale hè be bè kong ha Unim le ù mbee he. Nyong bendo kong ha Unim, bè kung behwu gbaa he he lizen Atyetyan Ujeso.
59005015	Gbe be kong ha Unim, be bong le u sha ashi be bii, ki sha Unim u mbee undi-lingmam ana, u shi-e u fel kang-kang. Mà undi-lingmam umen ana a ma shi 'iban or, Unim u tyang āshi ka he.
59005016	He ashin mà bun biban bīmen de bende, ma kong ha Unim ke bende, hè Unim ù mbee amen. Akongale ha Unim angwu undi ununung u kong ù yi lè lifem kangg, likorye Unim u kpa he abwo afee-afee.
59005017	Mà ndè undi ná Ilaja, a ma yi undigye nya a na bel lì yi i a.Leěti a ma kong ha Unim lityam ken le umbwo ù ndor ye. Umbwo a ma ndor ye aze akie lè 'igem.
59005018	He umbee-likel aze anyina a ma mbee kong ha Unim le umbwo ù ndor lè.Umbwo a ma keb andorale lè he 'usi a kya-kya-kya, itang i wum, biwom bi tem keb ambyele.
59005019	Bebuye, mà ngye dangg le, gbe undi ūmen a tyang 'ukwo ahwu 'ù yi 'igyang, unde-ma a kpell he a tem item hwaa lè Unim, u kpell he u kung abwo lè he biban ashele, hà unde-ma angwu há a kpan 'ūnyōng undi-iban ana lè he linim a. Ki sha Unim u tyang biban bima abi a shi gbamm ana ka he.
60001001	Mi Ipita angwu mì yi unwaa-isom Ujeso Ukristi na mı fee 'ushia ahwun. Mi fee āhwu hwaa lè men abe Unim a waa kung ke 'uhwo-ma abe mà yi he Upontes, Ugalesha, Ukapadosia, Eshia lè Bitinia. Leěti ma ma paa wu mbee biteng abina, mà yi begaandi a há.
60001002	Leěti hell na Unim Atyetyan a ma shi ugim fe-e lishi le mà kwu bebwaa-ma, a kung Ukatia Kunyong uma a shi amen ma fel ta-ta ke-e. A shi ashina le hè men mà ke Ujeso Ukristi ife, gbe he lihwu lima he 'ikpakpaa àtyám amen a fel ataa-ataa gelalala he ashi Unim. Unim ù hā gye 'ushu ke men 'ukwun, u shi 'i kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa.
60001003	Ipee ì kwu ke Unim, Atyam Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi! U shi Unim uma. Unim a tyung beshi kangg ha abel, a ke li likpan lifufe gbe he awumale Ujeso Ukristi lè he lihwu. Awumale uma ana na a shi li li fel lè lishi andorale le li ba kwa lè likpan ipel ha ahe.
60001004	Lì mbee yi lè lishi andorale le li ba kwa lè likpan lè biwom binunung bimen ana puu abi Unim a kam ndor bebwaa-ma. A kam biwom bimen ana ndor ābe he lifung-atabe a, hè bi bì kwu ngyor igye kpamm, bi ban ye, bi zī mbee ye.
60001005	Unim u mbee kung ikeb ima kam amen nya a na ma gye 'ushu fe lityam ha ahe, le he 'unyong ahwu igye ı mbee, kì nung undi uyang-yang nwongg le Unim a kpan amen.
60001006	He ashina mà yal gor he 'uhwo biwom abi Unim u kam ndor amen i, mà na 'unyin i àtyám āmen à yi lè 'imbwee he 'uhwo bingie atyetye-atyetye abi bı be hwaa lè men i or. Mà ngye le bingie bimen ana bì yi he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg a.
60001007	Atan-lengi angwu bingie bimen i bı be hwaa lè men ù yi le hè 'ì tyung le lityam afele līmen ha Ujeso Ukristi lì yi dell-dell. Igold angi ì yi ke igye anyin a or, bendi be kung 'ìndē a kaa āngi nda le ì yi gelalala. Kitaa 'imen na 'ì yi gbe lè lityam afele angi lì yi 'indee-indee hwò igold, be kaa amen nda 'anaa-anaa i, le hè Unim ù pee amen, u fem amen kangg he 'uhwo abongale ūmen he Liti angi Ujeso Ukristi u tem be tyung 'uhwo-ma.
60001008	Mà na ma ndè Ujeso Ukristi lè ashi mà ye or, ki nyin amen lè he, ma fe lityam ha ahe, ma gor igor ì yi angi be kong a ye.
60001009	Gbe ma gye 'ushu fe lityam ha ahe, ma kpa likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye kpamm.
60001010	Leěti bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be maa kong gba lè 'inunung 'ikaandi ashi Unim a de le u ba ka amen. Be maa kee kangg le hè be bè ngye 'ukwo ahwu Unim u be kpan bendi.
60001011	Ukatia Kunyong Ujeso Ukristi angwu a ma yi he atyam abell, a maa da ābe ná Ujeso Ukristi u be kpē 'ingie, saa bendi be hà fem he. Be ma kaa kangg le hè be bè ngye 'unyong ahwu ashin 'ı be shi, lè 'itaa 'ı be kwu.
60001012	Unim a ma shi 'i nung bendi abe be maa tye ugie 'isom 'ima le befe be sha aki ka 'uhwo-bell a ye, be sha ka amen a. Biwom bimen i na bendi abe be bun 'isom 'inunung de men, be de men gbe lè bi nya a na Ukatia Kunyong umen angwu u be lè he lifung-atabe a ke be ikeb. Idengell Unim or i kee ná ı shi hè ngi ì nde biwom bimen i.
60001013	He 'uhwo biwom abi Unim a kam ndor amen ana, mà ndor igim īmen le hè men mà shi ashi Unim a kee. Mà kwu gbelakaa ye, mà kung atong-shi āmen ndor he likpan 'unyong angi Unim u be ke men he inung ima nyong Ujeso Ukristi u be kung 'uhwo-ma tyung he igye gboo.
60001014	Mà gye 'ushu ke Unim ife, biwom bibibi abi ma ma yi lè 'igyor ábi kangg nyong ma ma wa ngye igie Unim ye ana, mà ndè le ma keb àshī āmen he itang ke bi ye gbangg.
60001015	Le bwo Unim angwu a ko amen le mà kwu bebwaa-ma ù yi utaa-utaa gelalala faale 'iban, men or mà kwu betaa-betaa gelalala faale 'iban he biwom puu abi ma shi.
60001016	Kì yi nya a na be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le Unim a de le: "Kì yi kpe-kpe le mà kwu betaa-betaa gelalala faale 'iban nya a na ufe Unim ù yi utaa-utaa gelalala faale 'iban."
60001017	Nyong ma kong ha Unim, ma ko he le Ada, mà well le Atyamen umen ana u maa undi uyang-yang ushe keè he ashi a shi a, u shell 'ushu undi ye. He atan-lengi anwuna nyin i ná mà so he igye i, mà fe-e he biwom puu abi ma shi.
60001018	Má ngye le Ujeso Ukristi a pong amen le hè men mà fel porr lè he likpe lìtım angi betiemen be maa hwua amen likor-likor a. Úndē angwu ù yi kwom hen igye i na a ma kung pong amen ye.
60001019	Anung Ujeso Ukristi angi à yi he 'ukpo 'indee-indee na a ma kung pong amen. Ujeso Ukristi ù yi ná unwaa utia angwu undi u lè shang Unim nà, ù yi utaa-utaa gelalala, kì yi lè 'ibibi zangg or ha ahe ye gbangg.
60001020	Leěti mà ukpong Unim u hà shi igye anyin, a ma shi ugim fe-e lishi le Ujeso Ukristi u ba kpan bendi. He i 'unyong ahwu igye i ndo mbee i, a ma be he-e ù kpan li.
60001021	Gbe he 'uhwo Ujeso Ukristi na men ma fel fe lityam ha Unim angwu a wum he lè he lihwu, u ke-e libwo likaandi angi lì yi lè ife kangg. He atan-lengi anwuna men ma fe lityam ha Unim, ma mbee kung àshì āmen ndor ha ahe.
60001022	Men ma fel betaa-betaa, likorye ma ke ife he biwom abi Unim a tyung amen, ki mbee nyin amen lè bende bendi Unim lityam ken. He ashina undi uyang-yang ù kung lityam lima puu lè ikeb ima puu tyung benyin ha unde-ma mbee 'unyong.
60001023	Unim a tem lè men hwàn gbe he igie ima angi ı be lè likpan. Igie ima imen ana ì yi ngyor igye. Undigye angwu u hwō na a ke men likpan limen ana ye, Unim angwu u hwō ye na a ke men ángi.
60001024	Be fee ndor he 'ushia Unim leěti le: "Bendigye puu be hwa nya a na abia, kunung 'ubell 'u shī 'ìhwú liti ken nya a na bibubo a.
60001025	Ukpor igie Unim ife, ì yi ngyor igye kpamm!" Igie Unim imen ana na ì yi 'isom 'inunung ashi be ma bun de men.
60002001	Le bwo Unim a tem lè men hwàn, mà kung abwo āmen lè he bibibi puu. Mà tem lam bendi ye, ma tem kwu ingwu ifee ye, ma tem ban lityam fe 'iwom undi ye, ma tem kong bia bendi ye.
60002002	Mà kwu ná bebwaa befufe, befe bè yi lè 'igyor ábı bendabell mbee 'unyong. Men or mà kwu lè 'igyor agyoale igie Unim igyang angyell angi ı shi amen ma kaa kpè kwu kpamm Unim u gbe kpan amen he liti umbee-likel.
60002003	Mà kwu lè 'igyor ashin likorye men-agyang ma ndè ná Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi a ngbebb inung 'indee-indee or mà.
60002004	Mà be hwaa lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi uwum ngyor igye kpamm. Bendigye be swan he, he ashina ù yi 'itaa ken ha 'ukor 'umen ahwu bendi be swan le 'ù yi lè lifem ye ana. Ukpor Unim a gia kung he, u shi lè lifem kangg he ashi Unim.
60002005	Men or mà yi lè likpan lifufe. Mà tyang Unim ù gwaa amen 'iteng ken tye ushom Ukatia Kunyong uma ná undi u kung akor tye ushom. Mà yi ná ikwu-lihwan ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke ashangale Unim. Mà kung 'uhwo-men shang gbangg ke Unim gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi. Gbe ma shi ashin, ki nyin Unim kangg.
60002006	Mi kong ashin likorye be fee he 'ushia Unim le Unim a de le: "Mi Unim, mi kung 'ukor fe lìshií ushom ugi he Uzayon. Mi gia kung 'ukor 'umen ana, kù yi he 'ukpo ke-m kangg. Undi uyang-yang angwu u fe lityam ha angwu ù yi 'ukor 'umen i, u fá hē ishwia he 'uhwo ye."
60002007	Men abe ma fe lityam ha ahe, ù yi lè lifem kangg ke men. Ukpor abe be fe lityam ha ahe ye, be ba nda le: "Kukor 'umen ahwu bendi abe be tye ushom be swan le 'u ngbebb he ushom atyele ye ana, kufe na 'u tem fel kwu ushom naa genn."
60002008	Unim a mbee kong he 'ushia 'uma le: "Kukor 'umen ana na bendi be be gbaa mbu." Atan-lengi angwu be mbu ù yi le be ke igie Unim ife ye. Leěti hell na Unim a ma kong ndor le 'ì kwu 'itaa ana.
60002009	Men ufe mà yi liwu bendi angi Unim a gia kung, mà yi bendi abe ma shang Unim, abe ma fe Unim angwu ù yi Usu ukaandi. Mà yi 'ubong ahwu Unim a gia 'u fel ta-ta ke-e 'uhwo-ma. Ma fel bendi bema ufe-ufe a. A gia kung amen le hè men mà bun de bendi gboo gbe lè 'inunung ashi a shi 'i kwu he 'uhwo ná a fem amen lè he 'ifufebb be he 'ikung-gbo ashi 'i dyam 'indee-indee.
60002010	Leěti men ma ma yi bendi Unim a ye, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i ma fel bendi Unim a. Unim a ma wa yi lè beshi ha amen ye, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i a fel lè beshi ha amen.
60002011	Bedim-gi lityam, mà well le mà yi begaandi a, mà yi kwu hen igye ikwu. He ashina mi tim amen anung le, mà kung abwo lè he bibibi biwom abi agwo à yi lè 'igyor ábi, likorye biwom bimen i bi ndo 'ukye ha likpan lifufe angi Unim a ke men.
60002012	Nyin i ná mà yi ipel ha bendi abe be ngye Unim ye i, mà gye 'ushu shi likpe linunung le hè 'unyong 'uyang-yang be kong le ma shi bibibi, hè be bè ndè shob le ma sha 'inunung a. He ashina be kung ipee ke Unim he Liti angi u die fel kpee-kpee ha abe.
60002013	-
60002014	He 'uhwo Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi, mà keb 'uhwo-men ke undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi he libwo andele gbe lè bendi. Mà 'ì yi undi angwu a gyan li he 'ubong puu a or, mà idengell ima angi a waa ndor le ì ke bendi bebibi 'ingie, i pee abe be shi 'inunung a or, mà keb ke be.
60002015	Ashi Unim a kee amen le mà shi 'ì yi le, mà shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa hè men mà shib ingwu bikpel-ye bendi abe be ngye Unim ye.
60002016	Mà ndor 'uhwo-men ná bendi abe bè tem yi he abwo lifee ye. Mà fel gim le bwo mà tem yi he abwo lifee ye mà, ma fel sha 'ibibi 'itaa ma kee ye. Ukpor mà ndor 'uhwo-men ná ifee Unim.
60002017	Mà kung undi uyang-yang ilaa-ilaa ye; kì nyin amen lè bende bendi Unim, ma ke angwu a gyan li he 'ubong puu ife, ma shell Unim.
60002018	Men abe mà yi bebwaa ushom bendi, mà keb 'uhwo-men ke betyamen, ma mbee shell ābe kangg. Mà shi ashin ha betyamen puu, mà abe bè yi benunung abe be gim 'inunung gbe lè men or, mà abe bè yi bekaa-bekaa or.
60002019	Undi angwu be ke-e 'ingie likor-likor faale ashi a shi, gbe a kpē shī igor-igor, likorye a kee le u sha nyin Unim, hà a shi ashi 'ı nyin Unim.
60002020	Ukpor undi angwu a shi 'ibibi a, be hà kpam he, gbe u kpē ìkwūn imen ana igor-igor, ayang ù ha pee he he ashina? U kpa 'ingie ashi ufe-gyang a be lè shi ke 'uhwo-ma a. Ukpor undi angwu u shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa, gbe a ngib lityam kpē 'ingie he 'uhwo ashele ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa, hà a shi ashi 'i nyin Unim.
60002021	Kukwo ahwuna na Unim a ko amen le mà gbe. Mà well le Ujeso Ukristi or titi a kpē 'ingie shi 'inunung ke men. Ki ngbebb le mà pwom he shi ná ufe a shi hè men mà pwom abee ama.
60002022	Ufe, bwo ukong-ukong a shi 'iban ngye ye, u bè uman ngye ye gbang-gbang.
60002023	Bendi be maa buu he atye, ukpor u tem lè ngi buu ābe ye. Nyong be maa ke-e 'ingie, a ma kong fe be 'ushell le u ba sha 'iwom ha abe ye, ukpor a ma kung 'iwom 'iyang-yang fe Unim he 'ubwo, Unim angwu u maa ushe kpa-kpa mbee 'unyong puu.
60002024	Bingie abi bi ma yi ke li he 'uhwo biban bityan, a ma kung bife a so, nyong be ma maa he bee he 'ikpakpaa. A shi ashina le lî mbeè lè abwo lè he 'iban gbang-gbang, li fel kung likpan angi lı be lè ha ahe sha ashi Unim a kee. Le bwo be ma do he, men ma mbeē.
60002025	Leěti men ma ma yi ná ìtiā angi i mbeb 'ukwo, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i ma tem item, ma fel pwom Ujeso Ukristi angwu u ndè gbe lè men. Ufe na u kam amen le hè 'iwom 'ì do amen ye.
60003001	Men bengye or, ungye-libee uyang-yang ù keb 'uhwo-ma ke ukyema. Mà shi ashin, le gbe ungye angwu ukyema u fe Unim ye, pisoye u gie ugim uma fel fa Unim gba he likpe linunung ungye-ma.
60003002	Mà na ungye a buu ungwu kong 'iwom ha ahe gbe lè likong Unim ye or, u nda ná ungye ù yi lè ife, u mbee ndè ná likpe lima lì yi litaa-litaa faale uben.
60003003	Mà kung igim īmen ndor he idem-idem-idem abweeale le hè men mà tyung bendi 'ùnùng 'ūmen ye. Biwom ná igil aniale lè ashele ishagba i, afele ashor umbell lè biwell-atyung lè bikeb-abwo gbam-gbam, afele bihwom abi bı kaa 'ate shi 'ugwu, likpe anyina li ngbebb ye.
60003004	Ukpor, kiwom ashi ma shi hè 'ì shi amen mà ngbebb 'unung 'ì yi likpe linunung angi lı be lè he atyam āmen; mà kwu mbiloo, ma kwu lè 'uhwo ambwele. Kunung ahwu 'itaa i 'u hwa umbwo ye, ku mbee shi lè lifem kangg he ashi Unim.
60003005	Kitaa ana na bengingye besuso abe leěti be ma fe lityam ha Unim be maa tyung 'unung 'ubell, be ma tyung āhwu gbe he akebale 'uhwo-bell ke bekyebell.
60003006	Undi ken lè he liwu libell ù yi Usara. A maa ka ukyema Ebraham ife, u ko he le "Atyagi." Men ma kwa 'itaa ken ha Usara, gbe ma shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa. Ashin 'i sha amen ma kwa lè 'ushell ye.
60003007	Men bekyebb or titi, mà tyung likpe linunung ha bengye-men. Mà ngye le bè yi kang-kang ná men ye. He ashina mà ke be ife. Mà ke be ife likorye men lè befe puu ma kpa likpan angi Unim u ke bendi 'uke. Mà shi 'itaa ana hè akongale ūmen ha Unim ù be lè lifem ke men, hè 'iwom 'ì kwuǔ hē 'ukwo ye.
60003008	Kiwom ashi mi kee le mi kong fa likong anyin lishi 'ì yi le, men puu mà kwu ugim ken, ma ngye igben bende, ma kwu lè benyin ha bendi Unim likorye bè yi bebwandamen a, mà ngbebb lityam ha bende, ma keb 'uhwo-men ke bende.
60003009	Gbe undi a shi 'ibibi ha undi ūmen, ù tem lè shī shì angwu há ye. Gbe undi a buu undi ūmen atye, ù tem lè ngi buu angwu há ye. Ashin na 'i ngbebb le ù shi, ù kong ha Unim le ù ke angwu há 'ukwun. Mà well le ashi 'ı shi Unim a ko amen 'ì yi le he-e ù shi 'inunung ha amen a.
60003010	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Undi angwu a kee le u kwa lè igor, u kee le 'ì ngbebb he he 'uhwo, ù kung ungwu uma kong 'ibibi ye, u bè uman ye.
60003011	Ù kung abwo ama lè he 'ibibi ashele, u fel shi binunung hwan, u kaa kangg he-e u fel lè ikwun.
60003012	Unim u kang bendi benunung, u dang 'utyung gyo ābe nyong be kong ha ahe. Ukpor abe be shi bibibi, ù yi linaa ha abe."
60003013	Gbe ma kaa lè ikeb īmen puu le hè men mà shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa, ayang ù nya do amen? Kì yi lè undi ye.
60003014	Mà bendi bè fel ke men 'ingie likorye ma shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa or, Unim u sha 'inunung ha amen. He ashin mà kwu lè 'ushell bendi abe be ke men 'ingie ye, kì waa men ufung or ye.
60003015	Mà shi Ujeso Ukristi ù kwu Usu ūmen, mà ke-e ife. Mà kam he 'unyong 'uyang-yang hè men mà fan undi uyang-yang angwu u bii amen atan-lengi angwu ma bong ha Ujeso Ukristi.
60003016	Mà ndè le nyong ma fan ābe, mà mbu 'uhwo fan ābe lè ife kangg. Mbee 'unyong puu mà shi ashi ma ngye le 'ì yi kpa-kpa, le gbe undi u kong 'ibibi gbe lè men, u mbee kong bia amen, hè ishwia ì shi-e likorye u nda ná likpe līmen li ngbebb nya a na 'ì yi le likpe undi Unim lì kwu.
60003017	Ki ngbebb le undi angwu u shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa, ù kpe 'ingie he 'uhwo ashi gbe 'ì yi ugim Unim á hwò ashi le ù kpē 'ingie he 'ibibi ashele.
60003018	Ujeso Ukristi or a ma kpē 'ingie le he-e ù kpan li lè he biban bityan. Nya he 'ugbe a ken a mbeè aki amen ana puu. Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi ununung a ma hwō he 'uhwo 'utyan, bel abe lì yi benunung ye, le he-e ù be lè bel hwaa lè Unim. Bendi be gwu inyiahwo ima, ukpor Unim a shi 'ūnyōng 'uma 'ù yi 'uwum.
60003019	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana 'ūnyōng 'uma 'u ma gye he 'ipi Unim a kwu idengell ima angi i kpo utebb uma ngib fe, lè kong ha angi.
60003020	Idengell imen ana na leěti i maa ke Unim ife ye, há 'unyong 'umen ana nyong Unim a maa ngib lityam kwu nyong Unuwa le ù tān 'īnōng. Bendi bedyong-ikie befe-befe na be ma ngwee há 'inong, be hwaa lihwu umbwo.
60003021	Umbwo umen ana a tyung 'itaa akpanale gbe he umbwo akibale a. Nyong be kib undi he umbwo, be kib he le he-e ù kwob taa umbe lè he inyiahwo a ye, ukpor ù yi 'itaa a ashi 'ı tyung le undi u tim Unim anung le ù to taa he lityam lima lè he 'iban. Unim u kpan amen likorye Ujeso Ukristi a wum lè he lihwu.
60003022	A wum gye he lifung-atabe, ù yi kwu he 'ubwo lizen Unim. Nya na idengell Unim puu i fel he 'ubwo 'uma, kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ì yi lè ikeb 'i fel he 'ubwo 'uma.
60004001	Men mà ngye le leěti Ujeso Ukristi a ma kpē 'ingie he agwo. He ashina mà kwu lè 'itaa lityam angi ufe a ma yi lè ngi hè men mà naa genn. Mi kong ashina likorye undi angwu a kpē 'ingie he agwo nya a na Ujeso Ukristi, ù tem gya 'ushu sha 'iban ye.
60004002	He ashina, lè 'igbe ná mà yi he igye i, mà tem bong biwom igye àbi bendigye bè yi lè 'igyor ábi bì kpē men ityuu ye. Mbee 'unyong puu mà shi ashi 'ı nyin Unim hwan.
60004003	Leěti ma maa ban 'unyong sha biwom abi bı nyin bendi abe be ngye Unim ye. Ma ban 'unyong 'u kpè! Há 'unyong 'umen ana men ma maa sha 'iwom 'ibibi 'iyang-yang he 'akem 'āmen, ma maa tyang biwom igye abi bendigye be kee bi kpē kung atyam āmen. Ma maa za igye fa he 'uhwo; ma maa gbong awu ngwa bingwungwo kangg; ma maa fa ikem, ki shi le 'i tel Unim 'indee-indee.
60004004	Ukpor 'anaa-anaa i mà tem yi lè abwo ipel ha abe he ashele biwom bibibi abina ye. He ashina, ki kwu ābe he 'uhwo, be kong ban amen.
60004005	Kunyong 'u ba lè há ahwu Unim u be maa ushe bendi abe be kong ban amen. Be ba buu ungwu ubell da Unim abi be shi puu. Unim ù fel yi kwu u nyong 'unyong 'umen ana he-e ù maa bendi bewum lè abe be hwō ushe a.
60004006	Ashin na 'i tan lè shi undi a ma bun 'isom 'inunung de abe be hwō mà or titi, le hè be bè kwu lè likpan 'unyong nya a na Unim ù yi lè ngi. Mà na be hwō nya a na bendi puu be hwō i or, ashin 'ì yi ushe angwu Unim a maa ābe.
60004007	Ki fel teng 'anwaa 'unyong zangg a hè 'iwom 'iyang-yang he igye anyin 'ì mbee. He ashin mà naa genn, ma baa 'uhwo-men le hè men mà kong ha Unim mbeè.
60004008	Kiwom ashi 'í dyam hwò puu 'ì yi le, mà gye 'ushu kwu lè benyin ha bende lityam ken, likorye undi angwu ù yi lè benyin u tyang biban bendi ka abe, mà na bi go gbamm or.
60004009	Nyong bendi be be ha amen ishom, mà kpe be igor-igor, ma ndè le ma mbwee 'ushu fe be ye.
60004010	Unim a ke undi uyang-yang 'uke aki ashele atyetye gbe he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong uma. He ashina, undi uyang-yang ù kung 'uke ahwu Unim a fe-e he 'ubwo kpell unde-ma.
60004011	Undi angwu Unim a ke-e ikeb le ù bun igie ima a, ù bun āngi ná Unim a ke-e. Undi angwu Unim a ke-e ufe le ù kpell bendi a, ù kung ikeb puu angi Unim a ke-e kpell ābe. Mà shi 'itaa ana hè bendi bè kung ipee ke Unim he 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma shi gbe ha Ujeso Ukristi. Ufe na ifem puu lè ikeb puu bì yi ke-e ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor ná mi kong.
60004012	Bedim-gi lityam, bingie bikaa-bikaa abi bı be kem fe men ana, bì kwu amen he 'uhwo ye. Mà fel nde bi ná biwom abi bwo ukong-ukong bi shi ngye ye a ye. Bingie bimen ana bi kaa amen hè Unim ù ndè ná ma naa genn a.
60004013	Mà yal gor igor likorye ma fe abwo he bingie abi Ujeso Ukristi a ma kpe. Mà gor 'itaa ana le hè liti angi ifem Ujeso Ukristi ı be fem he igye gboo, hè men mà yal gor lè ibubo he ungwu.
60004014	Gbe bendi be kong ban amen le bwo mà yi ke Ujeso Ukristi a, hà 'ì yi 'iwom 'inunung a ke men. Nyong ma kpē 'ingie 'itaa ana, Ukatia Kunyong Unim ù yi ha amen. Ukatia Kunyong umen ana a dyam 'indee-indee.
60004015	Ukpor, gbe ma shi bibibi, ma gwu bendi, ma zì 'azi, ma tyua anaa, gbe ma kpē 'ingie he ashele abina, kingie ashi 'itaa ana 'ì yi lè lifem ke men ye. Undi ūmen ken or ù be lè 'itaa 'ingie ashina so 'uhwo-ma he lishi ye.
60004016	Ukpor undi angwu u kpē 'ingie le bwo u pwom Ujeso Ukristi a, ishwia ì shi-e ye. Ù pee Unim likorye bendi be ndè shob he le ù yi ke Ujeso Ukristi a.
60004017	Kunyong ahwu Unim u maa bendi ushe 'u kpi mà. Unim u maa bendi bema begyang a ushe 'ushu. Bwo 'ì yi le u maa li bel bendi bema begyang or ushe, bendi abe be ke 'isom 'inunung ashi Unim ife ye, ushe ubell u ba kwa ubibi ná a?
60004018	Be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Gbe undi ununung or a ndè 'ingie mà ukpong u hà hwaa linim Unim, ki ba kwa 'ibibi kangg ka bendi bebibi abe be ke Unim ife ye."
60004019	He atan-lengi anwuna bendi abe be kpē 'ingie le bwo Unim na a tyang āshi le 'ì be hwaa lè be, bè gye 'ushu lè 'inunung ashele, bè kung 'uhwo-bell fe Unim he 'ubwo, Unim angwu a mbe li puu. Unim u gie igie ye.
60005001	Mì yi lè utebb angwu mi kee le mi ka amen bekaandi bendi abongale. Men ma ngye le mi or mì yi ukaandi a ná men a, mi ndè lè àshì agi ná Ujeso Ukristi a ma kpē 'ingie. Bel ha amen li ba kwa lè abwo ipel he ifem Ujeso Ukristi nyong Unim u be fem he he ashi bendi puu.
60005002	Ashina na 'ì yi atan-lengi angwu mi ke men utebb le, mà ndè gbe lè bendi abe Unim a kung fe men he abwo, mà ndè gbe lè be ná undi angwu u kam ìtiā u ndè gbe lè ngi. Mà ndè gbe lè be ná be kwu amen he ikeb a ye, mà shi āshī igor-igor. Mà shi āshī he 'uhwo únde a ye, likorye 'igyor únde 'ì yi 'iwom 'ibibi a. Ukpor mà shi āshī likorye mà yi lè benyin le ma nda gba lè be a.
60005003	Bendi abe Unim a kung fe men he abwo le mà kam ana, mà kam ābe he ikeb a ye. Ukpor likpe līmen lì kwu ngbebb-ngbebb le hè bendi bemen ana bè pwom abee āmen.
60005004	Gbe ma shi 'itaa ana, liti angi Ujeso Ukristi angwu u ndè gbe lè bel puu u be be, u ba ka amen abe ma hwò 'ukye, kuke ahwele ahwu 'u dyam 'indee-indee, ku mbee hwō umbwo ye.
60005005	Men bebwaa-idem, mà ke bekaandi bēmen ife. Men puu mà keb 'uhwo-men ke bende, ma kam hè men mà kpell bende, likorye be fee he 'ushia Unim le: "Unim ù yi linaa ha bendi idim, ukpor u sha 'inunung ha abe be keb 'uhwo-bell."
60005006	He ashina mi mbee da amen le, mà keb 'uhwo-men ke Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu, le gbe 'unyong 'uma 'u fel, he-e ù kung amen gye he 'usi.
60005007	Mà kung 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ı fem amen 'ushun fe-e he 'ubwo, likorye u ka amen ukpell uyang-yang angwu ma kee.
60005008	Mà kwu gbelakaa ye, ma baā 'uhwo-men, likorye Usetan, usu bibibi, angwu ù yi linaa ha amen u baà amen. U baà amen ná 'ugaba 'u baà kee àshi 'ù zī nà.
60005009	Mà naa 'ukye ha ahe, ma ke-e libwo ye gbangg. Mà gye 'ushu fe lityam ha Unim, ma naa genn. Ma well le bebwandamen mbee igegem puu he igye i be kpa 'ingie nya a na men ma kpē i.
60005010	Mà well le 'inunung 'iyang-yang 'i ba lè ha Unim a. Ufe na a ko amen le hè men mà kwu ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi kwu lè abwo he ifem ima ngyor igye kpamm. Gbe ma kpē 'ingie he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, ufe-gyang u ba tem lè men kam, u ke men ikeb hè men mà naa genn faale abwo aweeale.
60005011	Mà lì pee Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb ngyor igye kpamm. Kì ngyor ná mi kong.
60005012	Usalas na a kpell mi fee 'anwaa 'ushia aken. Mi ngye-e ná ungwiye undi Unim angwu a kpè le bè fe lityam ha ahe. Biwom abi mi fee i, mi fee ābi le mî fe men ingie, mi mbee de men le abi mi fee gbe lè inung Unim i bì yi 'igyang. He ashina mà naa genn he 'igyang.
60005013	Bendi Unim abe hen Ubabilon abe Unim a gia kung le bè fel bema ná a gia amen ana, be kong lè men. Unwaa-gi Umak or a kong lè men.
60005014	Ná bebwanam bende abe be fe Ujeso Ukristi, mà gaa bende lè uko lè uko. Agaale anwuna a tyung le 'i nyin amen lè bende. Men puu abe mà yi ke Ujeso Ukristi, Unim ù shi hè 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa.
61001001	Mi Usaimun Ipita angwu mì yi uboyi Ujeso Ukristi, mi mbee shi unwaa-isom uma na mı fee 'ushia ahwun. Mi fee āhwu hwaa lè men puu abe ma bong ha Ujeso Ukristi 'itaa ken ha abel. He 'uhwo inung Ujeso Ukristi na a ke li bel puu ikeb bizang-bizang le lì bong ha ahe, abongale angwu ù yi lè lifem kangg. Ujeso Ukristi ù yi Unim, u mbee shi Undi-likpan utyan.
61001002	Unim ù hā ke men 'ukwun, u shi āhwu 'ù gbo shal-shal-shal. U shi hè 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa mbee 'unyong nya a na men ma gye 'ushu ngye Unim lè Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi.
61001003	Ujeso Ukristi na a shi li li ngye Unim angwu a ko li le lì kwu ipel ha ahe he ifem ima, li mbee pwom he shi ashi 'i ngbebb gbe gyong. Bwo li ngye Unim 'itaa ana, a kung ikeb ima shi li li fel lè 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'ı kpell li lı kwu lè likpan 'unyong, li mbee shi ashi 'ı nyin he.
61001004	He 'ukwo ahwun na Unim a ke li biwom bikaandi bimen abi leěti a ma kyebb li, abi bì yi lè lifem kangg ke li. Atan-lengi angwu a ke li biwom bimen ana ù yi le, hè men mà buu hwaa lè he biwom bibibi abi bì yi he igye anyin abi bendigye bè yi lè 'igyor ábi, mà mbee pwom he shi likpe 'itaa ken ha ufe-gyang.
61001005	He 'uhwo biwom abina mà bong abongale ufe-ufe a ye, mà kwu 'iken gye 'ushu shi likpe linunung or titi. Gbe ma shi likpe linunung, ma kaa kangg ngye Unim gye 'ushu.
61001006	Gbe má ngye Unim, ma ngib lityam kangg. Gbe ma ngib lityam, ma gye 'ushu naa genn he biwom abin. Gbe ma naa genn he biwom abin, ma gye 'ushu ke Unim ife.
61001007	Gbe ma ke Unim ife, ma gye 'ushu kwu lè benyin ha bende ná bebwanam bende, ki nyin amen lè bendi lityam ken.
61001008	Gbe ma gye 'ushu shi biwom abin ishi ishi ishi, hà angyele ūmen Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi u kwa lè lifem, likpan līmen li kwu linwom-linwom ye.
61001009	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a shi biwom abin ye, hà 'i ze le ù yi ná uhwua-ashi angwu u ndè ye gbangg nà. Undi umen i u naa lityam lè biban bima abi leěti Unim a tyang ābi ke-e.
61001010	He ashin, bebuye, mà kaa kangg hè men mà shi likpe angi lı tyung le Unim a ko amen shi amen mà fel bendi bema. Gbe ma shi 'itaa ana, mà ha tyang 'ukwo Unim ye.
61001011	Kitaa ana na Unim u be buu amen 'ukwo gye he Kiteng-usu Ujeso Ukristi, angwu ù yi Atyetyan, u shi Undi-likpan utyan. Bendi bema be ba kwa ipel ha ahe nya ngyor igye kpamm.
61001012	Ashina na 'ı shi-m mı well amen biwom abin mbee 'unyong puu. Mí ngye le ma ngye bi, ma mbee shi naa genn he biwom bimen abi ma ngye i.
61001013	Lè 'igbe ná mì so uwum, ki ngbebb mi le mì well amen biwom abin hè men mà bo 'inaa he ashele ábi.
61001014	Mí ngye le ati agi he igye i a mbee pu, nya a na Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi a ma de-m.
61001015	Mi mbee kee le mi kaa 'itaa ikeb igi ì yi kwom, mi shi 'iwom ashi 'ı shi amen ma well biwom abin mbee 'unyong puu, mà mì hwō or.
61001016	Leěti bel li maa da amen ná ifem lè ikeb Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi bi ma fem tyung he igye gboo. Biwom bimen abi li maa de men ana, bì yi ishob angi bendigye be fe a ye, ukpor bel-agyang li ma ndè ifem ima lè atong-shi atyan.
61001017	He 'unyong ahwu Unim Atyetyan a ma ke-e ifem angi i dyam 'indee-indee i, bel li ma ndè, li gyo Unim angwu ifem ima i dyam gbe angi undi u kong gbe lè ngi mbee, a de le: "Anwun na ù yi 'iken Unwaa-gi. Ki nyin mi lè he 'indee-indee."
61001018	Bel-agyang li ma yi utung ha Ujeso Ukristi he ukwell angwu Unim a ma kong ha ahe, li ma gyo igie imen angi lè he lifung-atabe ana lè atyung atyan.
61001019	Igie angi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be kong gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi, i dyam hwò puu. Gbe ma dang 'utyung gyo āngi, hà ma shi 'i ngbebb, likorye ì yi ná 'imor-inde ashi 'ı taa lè 'usu kpamm taa ashi nà. Há 'unyong 'umen nyong ukpen ashi-liti, ashi 'ı ze le Ujeso Ukristi, u be he atyam āmen, biwom puu bì ha ba nung amen nwongg.
61001020	Kiwom ashi 'i dyam hwò puu ashi mà ngye 'ì yi le, igie angi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be maa kong be fee fe he 'ushia Unim i. Befe-gyang na be maa gim āngi kong ye,
61001021	likorye 'ì yi lè undi angwu a maa kong 'isom Unim lè he lishi abyele lima ligyang ye. Ukatia Kunyong Unim na a maa ke be igie angi be maa kong.
61002001	Leěti bendi abe be bè uman le be tya ugie 'isom Unim, be ma fel he liwu bendi Unim. Kitaa 'imen i na bendi abe be hwua bendi biwom uman be be fel he liwu līmen. Bendi aben be ba sha beshu hwua bendi biwom abi bı teng ābe gye he 'ukwo liketye.
