Bendi bemen be hwua biwom uman i, be mbee swan-swan lè Ujeso Ukristi or, ki shi le ufe na ù yi Usu utyan, angwu a pong ābe. He ashina be be lè ushe Unim so 'uhwo-bell he lishi imbul-imbul.
61002002	Bendi gbamm be ba nda ha abe sha likpe libibi. He ashina bendi be ndo kong bia 'ukwo Unim.
61002003	Bendi bemen be hwua biwom uman i, be ndor lishi he biwom bendi. He ashina be ba bà iman da amen, hè be bè lam kpe men biwom. Nya a leěti a, ná Unim a tang ushe ubell, u kong 'ingie ashi u ke be. Unim angwu u ke be 'ingie 'imen ana ù yi he 'unde ye.
61002004	Leěti nyong idengell Unim igyang or i ma shi 'iban, Unim a ma tyang āngi i gye 'idideng ye, ukpor a ma kwu āngi fe he 'inde. Nya na be fe ngi ashishilika tyuu he 'ipi 'ifufebb 'i gye kpenn, i kwa nya kpamm nyong Liti angi Unim u be tang bendigye puu ushe.
61002005	He 'unyong ahwu Unuwa bendi abe be ma kpo utebb Unim, Unim a ma tyang ābe be gye 'idideng ye. A ma som umbwo ukaandi a ma be sho nim lè igye puu. Unuwa ufe-ufe lè bendi bema bedyong-ifee na Unim a ma kpan, umbwo a ma shi ābe 'iwom ye. A ma kpan ābe ná likorye Unuwa a maa bun da bendi le bè shi ashi 'ì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim.
61002006	He 'unyong ahwu bendi Usodem lè Ugomora be maa shi bibibi, Unim a ma ke be 'ingie ting 'inde shī dim, abong afee ana a fel atyung-atyung. Kitaa ana na a tyung ná u be ke bendi puu abe be ke-e ife ye 'ingie.
61002007	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana Unim a ma kpan Ulot. Ulot a ma yi undi ununung a. Akpe abibi angi bendi abena be maa shi, a maa tor he he lityam kangg.
61002008	Ulot a ma yi ndē utung ha bendi bemen ana a. He liti liyang-yang a maa nda bibibi abi be shi, u gyo bibibi abi be kong. Biwom abina bi maa tor he kangg likorye a ma yi undi ununung a.
61002009	Likong Unuwa lè Ulot li tyung gboo le Unim a ngye ná ù fem bendi abe be ke-e ife lè he 'ingie. Biwom abi a shi ha abe be ke-e ife ye, bife bi tyung gboo le Unim a ngye ná ù ke bendi bebibi 'ingie kpamm kwu nyong Liti Ushe bendi puu.
61002010	Bendi bemen i abe be kee-kee shi biwom bibibi 'itaa inyiahwo ibell i kee a, be mbee swan le be kwa he 'ubwo Unim ye, kíbell 'ingie 'i ba dyam hwà puu. Bendi bemen be hwua bendi biwom uman ana, be shell undi ye, be kpe utebb undi ye. Idengell Unim angi ì yi he ifem Unim he lifung-atabe or, be shell ná be kong bia āngi ye.
61002011	Ukpor idengell Unim imen ana, mà na ife ì yi lè ikeb hwò bendi-uman bemen ana or, nya a na ı naa he 'ushu Unim i ben ābe ye.
61002012	Ukpor bendi bemen ana be geb lè ingwu ibell tya he biwom abi be ngye gbe lè bi ye, ndo kong bia ābi. Be sha biwom faale ugim nya a na inyia libeb angi Unim a shi ndor le bè gwu ziì a. Linim lì yi gie li nyong ābe nya a na li gie lı nyong inyia i a.
61002013	Nya a na befe be shi bendi be kpē 'ingie 'unyin i, na Unim or u be ke be 'ingie tyang lishi. Bendi bemen i be kwa awu za igye fa he 'uhwo. Be kung liti libo or sha ashina. Nyong be kwu ipel ha amen be za azi igor-igor likorye be nda 'ukwo lam amen, ukpor bè yi ibia a ke liwu līmen.
61002014	Be kung àshì abell ndor ha bengingye akpela befe-befe, be shi 'iban 'i kwun ābe 'igyor ye. Bendi abe be naa genn he 'ukwo Unim ye, bendi-uman bemen i be kaà hè be bè lam kwu ābe, shi ābe be tyang 'ukwo Unim. Mbee 'unyong puu àshì abell à yi he biwom bendi. Ushe Unim a fel kwu nyong ābe.
61002015	-
61002016	Bendi-uman bemen ana be tyang ukwo Unim, kung 'ukwo linim a. Be kung abee Ubelem angwu ù yi unwaa Ubiyor. Ubelem, he liti ken, a ma bo u la sha 'ibibi ashi 'ı ke-e lifem, ukpor 'izaaki 'ima 'i ben he likorye a ke Unim ife ye. Kizaaki ashi 'ı kong likong ye, ki ma kong nya a na undigye, shi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim ana a tem gye 'ushu shi akpel-ye angwu a maa la lè shi ye.
61002017	Bendi-uman bemen ana be lam bendi nya a na abell umbwo a nyung a, be mbee shi 'itaa ken ha 'ibu ashi 'ufem 'u shi paa āshi wu mbee bipi, umbwo u tem ndor ye. Unim a kam 'iteng ashi be be kwu ndor ābe he 'ifufebb ashi 'i gye kpenn.
61002018	Be pwom ungwu nya 'idideng zii, be kaà hè be bè lam bendi abe be kaà nya he abwo le hè be bè fem lè he liwu bendi abe be ngye 'igyang ye. Be kaà hè be bè kwu kung ābe tem lè be lè ngwee abwo fe he ashele bigyor agwo àbi befe-gyang be shi. Kitaa ana na be shi ābe be tyang 'ukwo Unim.
61002019	Be hwua bendi abe be hà ngye 'ukwo Unim ingye ana le, gbe be shi abi befe be hwua ābe, be fel lè 'uhwo-bell. Ukpor befe-gyang or, bè yi lè 'uhwo-bell ye, bè yi ìfeè a ke bibibi abi be shi, likorye 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'i kpē undi ityuu, hà undi umen ana a fel ùfeè a ke shi.
61002020	Gbe undi a kung abwo ama lè he bibibi igye anyin abi bı ban bendi le bwo a ngye Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan, u ha tem item lè mbu fe he bibibi bimen ana, bi kpe-e ityuu, u kpa 'ingie 'i go hwà ashi hang a ma bè ngye Ujeso Ukristi ye gbang-gbang.
61002021	Ù ngye 'ukwo ahwu 'ù yi kpa-kpa ye, hang 'ì yi ngbebb-ngbebb ke-e hwò ashi le a ngye hwu, saa a hà tem item tyang 'ukwo 'umen ana, u tem ke ashi Unim a kong ife ye.
61002022	Kitaa 'iwom ashi undi anwuna a shi, kì yi nya a na ityang angi be bun a. Be bun le: "Ubua a faa ifaa wu, tem lè ngi zī." Be bun isuso le: "Be kwob ukagbo umbwo, a tem lè ngywal he bisor."
61003001	Bedim-gi lityam, kushia ahwu lefee na mı fee hwaa lè men i. Biwom puu abi mi kong he ashia amen afee i, mi kong ābi mî well amen biwom abi ma ngye mà a. Mi well amen le hè men mà bo 'inaa, gye 'ushu fe Unim lityam ken.
61003002	Mi kong abin le hè men mà well biwom abi bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be maa kong leěti le bi ba sha; ma mbee well àshi Atyetyan Ujeso angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan a kong de bebwaa-isom bema, be bun de men.
61003003	Mà kpi 'ikwu ngye le he ati umbee-likel igye anyin, bendi-inyan be ba ba àbe be kee-kee shi biwom he 'akem 'abell.
61003004	Be ba nyan amen da le: "Ndè le men ma de le Ujeso Ukristi a ma ke úkyébb le u tem ba? He hung ù hà yi? Kung lè há 'unyong 'umen ana betietyan be kwu nyong he nyong-nyong gbe hwō. ukpor 'iwom 'i shi ye. Biwom puu bì so nya a na bi ma yi nyong Unim a ma mbe igye anyin a."
61003005	Bendi-inyan abena be ngye biwom abi Unim a ma shi leěti dangg, ukpor be fe ukaa kpam àshì wu ābi, likorye be ngye le, leěti Unim a ma kong igie ife-ife a mbe itang lè 'usi. Umbwo na Unim a ma kong a bel itang. Ashin 'i ze le itang i be lè he umbwo a.
61003006	Leěti umbwo na Unim a ma kung ban igye anyin puu, gwu nim ubu 'iwom 'iyang-yang.
61003007	Unim a mbee kong igie-igie a shì lè itang lè 'usi abi lı ndè i, bì kwu kpamm nyong liti angi 'ìndē 'ı be shī dim ābi puu. A kam ābi ndor nyong liti angi u be tang ushe bendi puu. Bendi bebibi bemen abe be fe Unim ye ana, Unim u ba tang ābe he abwo lè ha 'uhwo-ma gbang-gbang.
61003008	Bedim-gi lityam, kì yi lè 'iwom ken ashi 'ì yi le mà naa lityam áshi ye. Kiwom ashi há 'ì yi le, liti ken lì yi Unim ná aze asisilisi, aze asisilisi a shi-e ná liti ken.
61003009	Bendi besuso be fel gim le Unim a fel gbelakaa gbe lè ashi a kyebb le u sha. Kì yi 'itaa ana a ye, u ngib lityam á kwa nyong le bendi puu bè tyang abwo lè biban ashele be hwaa lè he a, likorye a kee le undi ken or ù nim 'ūnyōng 'uma ye.
61003010	Mà na 'ì yi 'itaa ana or, Atyetyan u ba kpe-kpe-kpe. U ba ba imbul-imbul ná uzi nà. Nya he Liti limen ana, lifung-atabe he 'ipi libwee lè 'ufell lè ikpen bì yi, li ba sha 'ihwee kangg, li hà nyòng. Kìndē 'i ba sha dim biwom puu abi Unim a kung shì igye anyin. Itang lè biwom puu abi bì yi hen bi ba dim mbee puu.
61003011	Bwo men ma ngye le biwom puu bi ba mbee 'itaa ana, mà shi ugim gbe lè 'itaa likpe angi lì yi le mà kwu lè ngi. Kì yi le mà shang 'uhwo-men ke Unim, ma ke-e ife mbee akekel puu.
61003012	Mà ndor ashi ha Liti angi Unim u be be; ma mbee kaa kangg shi ashi Unim a kee, hè 'ì shi-e ù be akikye. Nya he Liti limen ana, kusi ana 'u ba shā 'inde dim mbee, biwom puu abi Unim a kung shi igye anyin bi be shī 'inde dim mbee titi.
61003013	Ukpor Unim a ke li úkyébb le u ba sha itang lè 'usi abi bifufe. Bife na li fel kwu lı nyong. Nya na undi uyang-yang u be shi ashi Unim a keē mbee 'unyong puu.
61003014	He ashina, bedim-gi lityam, nya a na ma kwu ma nyong Unim le ù shi abina, mà kaa kangg hè men mà kwu gelalala faale uben he ashi Unim le hè men mà be kpee lè he he ikwun-ikwun.
61003015	Mà well le Atyetyan a ngib lityam a kwu, likorye a kee le u ka bendi libwo hè be bè fel lè likpan 'unyong. Uporl, unwandatyan lityam, a ma fee 'ushia hwaa lè men, ke men utebb gbe he lishi abyele angi Unim a ke-e a.
61003016	He ashia puu angi a fee a ke 'itaa utebb umen i. Biwom bisuso abi a kong he ashia amen ana bì yi bikaa-bikaa, bi shwie nung bendi ye. Bendi abe be ngye 'iwom ye, be mbee naa genn he 'ukwo Unim ye ana, be gie biwom bimen a fee he ashia amen ana. Be gie ābi nya a na be gie igie Unim angi i teng iteng a. He 'ukwo ahwuna na be be lè linim ke 'uhwo-bell.
61003017	Bedim-gi lityam, men ufe ma ngye biwom abin mà. He ashina, mà ndo baa 'uhwo-men teng bendi abe be ke iten Unim ife ye ana, be sha amen ma tyang 'ukwo 'ununung ahwu ma naa genn ana la pwom ābe sha bibibi.
61003018	Kiwom ashi 'i ngbebb le mà shi 'ì yi le, mà gye 'ushu fe Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi Undi-likpan utyan, ma mbee ngye-e te ite ite, he-e ù gye 'ushu tyung inung ha amen. Ifem puu ì kwu ke-e ngyor igye kpamm! Kì ngyor ná mi kong.
62001001	Kushia ahwu lı fee hwaa lè men i, li fee āhwu gba lè ukpi-ikwu undi angwu a ma yi kung lè há linde-linde mà ukpong igye anyin i há kpi. Bel-agyang li gyo he lè atyung, li nde-e lè ashi. Li nde-e li-li-li, li mbee tyua he abwo or. Ufe na ù yi Igie Unim angi i be lè likpan ke li.
62001002	Likpan limen i, Unim a shi āngi li be he igye gboo le bendi be fel nda āngi lè ashi. Bel li nde ngi; li da amen gba lè likpan limen li ndè lè ashi atyan i a. Li bun da amen gba lè likpan ligyang angyell angi lı yi ngyor igye. Leěti likpan limen i li ma yi ipel ha Unim Atyetyan, saa a hà som āngi be tyung li.
62001003	Biwom bimen abi bel li nde lè ashi atyan, li mbee gyo ābi lè atyung atyan na lı de men gbe lè bi le bi fel li ukem, li fel utyang ken. Utyang utyan angwu li ngwee li ngweě he ha Unim Atyetyan lè Unwaa-ma Ujeso Ukristi.
62001004	Bel li fee abin hwaa lè men le hè igor ityan ì kwu yilidididi.
62001005	Kisom ashi Unwaa Unim ugyang a bun de li na bel or lı bun de men i. Kì yi le, Unim ù yi 'ikung-gbo; kì yi lè 'ifufebb ha ahe zangg or ye.
62001006	Gbe bel li de le li ngwee utyang ha Unim, ki shi le lì so he 'ifufebb, hà li bà uman a, hà biwom abi lı shi or bì yi 'igyang a ye.
62001007	Ukpor gbe bel or lı tan he 'ikung-gbo ná ufe ù yi he 'ikung-gbo, hà li ngwee utyang ha bende, anung Unwaa-ma Ujeso a to taa li lè he biban bityan puu shi li li fel betaa-betaa gelalala.
62001008	Gbe li de le lì yi lè 'iban ye, hà li lam 'uhwo-tyan ilam, li ngye 'igyang ashi 'ı be lè ha Unim ye gbangg.
62001009	Ukpor gbe li bun he igye gboo de Unim le li shi 'iban, Unim u tyang biban bityan bimen ana ka li, u to taa li ábi shi li li fel betaa-betaa gelalala, likorye Unim ù yi ununung, u bel igie ye.
62001010	Gbe li de le li wa shi 'iban ngye ye, ashin 'i ze le li da le Unim ù yi undi-uman a, li ngye igie ima ye gbangg.
62002001	Bebwaa-gi lityam, mi fee abin hwaa lè men le hè men mà shi 'iban ye a. Ukpor gbe undi a tem lè shi 'iban, lì yi lè undi angwu ù yi gelalala faale 'iban. Ufe na ù yi ipel ha Unim, u yi kong ha ahe ke li. Undi umen ana na ù yi Ujeso Ukristi.
62002002	Gbe he 'uhwo-ma na Unim u tyang biban bityan ke li. Biban bityan bife-bife na Unim u tyang ke gbe he 'uhwo-ma ye, u tyang biban ka bendigye mbee igegem puu he igye i.
62002003	Kì yi lè 'iwom ken ashi 'ı tyung le li ngye Unim 'igyang-igyang. Kiwom ashi há 'ì yi ife angi lı ke iten ima.
62002004	Undi uyang-yang angwu u kong le ufe a ngye Unim, gbe u ndor iten ima ye, hà ù yi undi-uman a, a ngye 'igyang ashi 'ı be lè ha Unim ye gbangg.
62002005	Ukpor undi angwu u shi ashi Unim u kong, ufe na benyin Unim bè yi yilididi ha ahe lityam. Kì yi lè 'iwom 'isuso ashi 'ı tyung li le li ngwee befee kpebaa ha Unim.
62002006	Undi uyang-yang angwu a de le ufe a ngwee befee kpebaa ha Unim, ù shi likpe ná Ujeso Ukristi a ma shi. Kife na 'ı tyung le a ngwee befee ha Unim.
62002007	Bedim-gi lityam, uten Unim angwu mı fee de men gbe lè he i, ù yi angwu ufufe a ye. Ù yi uten umen angwu men ma gyo kung lè há 'unyong ahwu ma kpi 'ikwu fe Ujeso Ukristi a. Uten umen ùtım i ù yi 'isom Unim ashi ma gyo kpam-kpam a.
62002008	Mà na or, kì yi lè 'iwom 'ifufe he uten umen i. Ujeso Ukristi ugyang a tyung li le uten umen i ù yi ufufe 'igyang; men-agyang or titi ma tyung le ù yi ná 'igyang. Bel li ngye le ù yi ufufe 'igyang likorye 'ifufebb 'i ndor àshì 'i ndo mbee, kikung-gbo 'igyang ashell 'i kpi ataale mà.
62002009	Undi uyang-yang angwu u gim há le ufe ù yi he 'ikung-gbo, gbe u tel unde-ma, hà ù so he 'ifufebb kpamm be wu i ná 'ì yi.
62002010	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu 'i nyin he lè unde-ma undi Unim, hà ufe ù yi he 'ikung-gbo, kì yi lè 'iwom ashi 'ı shi-e u gbaa mbu ye.
62002011	Undi uyang-yang angwu u tel unde-ma undi Unim, hà ù yi he 'ifufebb, litan lima puu li shi he 'ifufebb. He ashina u tan a be-be-be-be likorye 'ifufebb 'i hwuǎ hē àshì.
62002012	Bebwaa-gi lityam, mi fee abin hwaa lè men le bwo Unim a tyang biban bīmen ke men gbe he ashi Ujeso Ukristi a shi a.
62002013	Bekaandi, mi fee abin hwaa lè men likorye men ma ngye Ujeso umen angwu ù yi kung lè há linde-linde mà ukpong igye i hà kpi. Bebwaa-idem, mi fee abin hwaa lè men le bwo men ma hwò Usetan, usu bibibi.
62002014	Bebwaa-gi lityam, mi fee abin hwaa lè men likorye men ma ngye Atyetyan Unim. Bekaandi, mi fee abin hwaa lè men likorye men ma ngye Ujeso umen angwu ù yi kung lè há linde-linde mà ukpong igye i hà kpi. Bebwaa-idem, mi fee abin hwaa lè men likorye men mà yi kang-kang, ma naa genn, igie Unim i shi ha amen atyam, ma hwò Usetan, usu bibibi.
62002015	Mà kung àshì āmen ndor he benyin igye anyin lè biwom abi bì yi hen a ye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a mā ma kung àshì ama ndor he benyin igye anyin a, hà 'ì yi lè 'ukwo ahwu 'ı mbee nyin he lè Unim Atyetyan ye gbangg.
62002016	Biwom igye bimen ana na bì yi i: biwom abi bendigye bè yi lè 'igyor kangg le be kwa lè bi ka 'uhwo-bell; biwom abi bendigye be ndè, be fel lè 'igyor le be kwa lè bi; biwom puu abi bendigye be pwom ungwu lè bi he igye anyin. Biwom bimen i puu bi ba lè há igye anyin a, bi ba lè ha Unim Atyetyan a ye.
62002017	Má ngye le igye anyin i ndo mbee, biwom abi bì yi hen abi bendi bè yi lè 'igyor ábi ana, bife or bi ndo mbee. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu u shì ashi 'i nyin Unim, ufe u nim ye, u kwa ngyor igye kpamm.
62002018	Bebwaa-gi, kunyong ahwu igye anyin ì mbee 'u fel kpee-kpee. Kunyong 'umen i na Undi-linaa Ujeso u be nya a na be bè de men. Kì yi faale ifung, bel puu li ndè le 'anaa-anaa i bendi gbamm abe bè yi bendi-linaa Ujeso Ukristi be fel hen mà. Ashin 'i tyung li le 'unyong ahwu igye anyin ì mbee 'u fel kpee-kpee.
62002019	Mà na bendi-linaa bemen ana be waa gbe lè ha abel liwu a or, kì bè yi lè 'unyong ahwu be ma yi ungwu ken ha abel ye. Kì be kwu le bè yi ungwu ken ha abel, hang be ngyor kwu ipel ha abel. Ukpor be gbe tyang li, agbele ubell tyang li a tyung gboo le be ma yi ungwu ken ha abel ye.
62002020	Men ufe, Ujeso Ukristi a ma ke men Ukatia Kunyong uma le men puu mà ngye 'igyang.
62002021	Mi fee ashin hwaa lè men le bwo ma ngye 'igyang ye a ye. Mi fee le bwo ma ngye 'igyang a. Ma mbee ngye le uman lè 'igyang bi gwaa ha bende ye.
62002022	Bwo 'ì yi 'itaa ana mà, fe ayang ù hà yi undi-uman? Undi-uman ù yi undi angwu a swan le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin a ye. Undi angwu u swan Unim Atyetyan lè Unwaa-ma ana na ù yi undi-linaa Ujeso Ukristi.
62002023	Undi uyang-yang angwu a swan Unwaa Unim, hà a swan-swan lè Unim Atyam or titi. Ukpor undi angwu a kpē Unwaa Unim, hà a kpe-kpe lè Unim Atyam or titi.
62002024	He ashin mi da amen le, biwom abi ma gyo kung lè há 'unyong ahwu ma kpi ma fe Ujeso Ukristi, mà tyang ābi bì gye 'ushu ngyor kwu he atyam āmen. Biwom bimen ma gyo kung lè há ukpi-ikwu ana, gbe ma tyang ābi bi gye 'ushu ngyor kwu he atyam āmen, hà men or ma gya 'ushu ngyor kwa ipel ha Unwaa Unim lè Unim Atyetyan ngyor igye kpamm.
62002025	Mà well úkyébb angwu Ujeso Ukristi a kyebb li le li kwa ipel ha Unim ngyor igye kpamm.
62002026	Mi bè kong biwom abin gbe lè bendi bemen abe be kee le be lam amen ana.
62002027	Ukpor men ufe, Ujeso Ukristi a ke men Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu ù yi ha amen atyam. He ashin undi angwu u hwua amen 'igyang ù tem baā amen ye, likorye Ukatia Kunyong Unim umen ana u hwua amen biwom puu. Biwom puu abi u hwua amen bì yi 'igyang, u lam amen ye gbangg. He ashin mi mbee bwan da amen le, biwom abi a hwua amen, mà ke bi ife, hè men mà gye 'ushu kwu ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi.
62002028	Bebwaa-gi, mi mbee da amen le mà ngyor kwu ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi le hè liti limen angi u tem be ana, lî kwu lè 'ushell ye, ishwia or i tem shi li ye.
62002029	Bwo men ma ngye le Ujeso Ukristi ù yi ununung, ki kung nung amen le undi uyang-yang angwu u shi 'inunung ù yi unwaa Unim a.
62003001	Mà ndè 'igegang benyin abe Unim Atyetyan a tyung ha abel. Le bwo 'i nyin he lè bel, a shi li li fel bebwaa-ma. Kì yi faale atyangale le lì yi bebwaa Unim a. Atan-lengi angwu bendi abe bè yi ke igye i be ndè shob le lì yi bebwaa Unim a ye ù yi le be ngye-e ufe-gyang or ye.
62003002	Bedim-gi lityam, kanaa-anaa i, bel li fel bebwaa Unim or mà. Kitaa ìtí lı be fel, ki wa nung li dangg ye. Ukpor li ngye le nyong Ujeso Ukristi u be be, li ba fel 'itaa ken ha ahe likorye li ba nda he gboo.
62003003	Undi uyang-yang angwu a ndor lishi ha ahe le ashina 'i ba kwa ná, u ndè le a ndor 'uhwo-ma gelalala nya a na ufe ù yi gelalala.
62003004	Undi uyang-yang angwu u shi 'iban, hà u ban iten Unim á. Kiban na 'ì yi abanale iten Unim.
62003005	Men má ngye le atan-lengi angwu Ujeso Ukristi a ma be he igye anyin ù yi le he-e ù fem kung li lè he 'iban a. Ma mbee ngye le 'ì yi lè 'iban ha ahe ye gbangg.
62003006	Bwo 'i tyung li gboo le undi uyang-yang angwu u gye 'ushu ngyor kwu ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi, u gya 'ushu sha 'iban ye; he ashina undi uyang-yang angwu a gye 'ushu shi 'iban, hà 'i ze le a wa nde-e or, ngwu ù ngye-e or ye.
62003007	Bebwaa-gi, mà baa teng undi u lam amen. Mà well le undi angwu u shi biwom he 'ukwo ahwu Unim a kee, hà ù yi ununung gelalala nya a na Ujeso Ukristi ù yi ununung gelalala.
62003008	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu u gye 'ushu shi 'iban, ù yi unwaa usu bibibi a likorye usu bibibi umen ana a shi 'iban kung lè há ukpi-ikwu igye a. Kife na 'i shi Ujeso, Unwaa Unim, a ma be he igye anyin le he-e ù be mbee lè biwom puu abi usu bibibi ana a shi.
62003009	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi unwaa Unim a, u gya 'ushu sha 'iban ye, likorye likpe Unim angi lì yi ha ahe li ngyor kwa ipel ha ahe. Ù tem gya 'ushu sha 'iban mbee ye, likorye ù yi unwaa Unim a.
62003010	Undi uyang-yang angwu u shi biwom he 'ukwo 'ununung ye, ki nyin he lè unde-ma ye, hà ù yi unwaa Unim a ye. Gbe he ashin na bendi be ngye atyetye bebwaa Unim lè bebwaa usu bibibi umen ana.
62003011	Kisom ashi men ma gyo kung lè há 'unyong ahwu ma kpi ma fe Ujeso Ukristi, kì yi le, kì nyin li lè bende kpe-kpe-kpe.
62003012	Bel lì kwu ná Uken a ma yi ana ye. Ma gyo le a ma yi unwaa usu bibibi a, a ma fe ukaa gwu unwanam Ebell. Kibang 'i ma shi-e ngwu a gwu-e? A ma gwu-e likorye biwom abi ufe Uken a shi bi ban, ukpor abi unwanam ufe a shi bi ngbebb.
62003013	Bebuye, nyong ahwu bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin be tel amen, kì shī kwu amen he 'uhwo ye.
62003014	Li ngye le bel ufe li buu hwaa lè he abwo lihwu, li fel lè likpan mà. Ashin 'ì yi ná likorye 'anaa-anaa nyin 'i fel nyin li lè bende-tyan. Ki nung gboo le undi uyang-yang angwu 'i nyin he lè unde-ma ye, hà 'i ze le undi umen ana ù so he abwo lihwu.
62003015	Gbe undi uyang-yang a tel unde-ma, hà ù yi undi 'ihwu a. Li ngye ashin dangg le undi 'ihwu ù yi lè likpan 'unyong ye.
62003016	Kiwom ashi 'i ma shi leěti na 'i tyung li ashi 'i ze le benyin. Kiwom ashi há 'ì yi le Ujeso Ukristi a ma kung likpan lima ke he 'uhwo 'utyan. Kì yi kpe-kpe le bel or lì kung likpan lityan ke he 'uhwo bende-tyan.
62003017	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'iwom, u ndè unde-ma angwu ù yi lè 'iwom ye, ukpor u bel àshì ama ndor hell, hà 'i ze le benyin Unim bè yi ha ahe lityam ye gbang-gbang-gbang.
62003018	Bebwaa-gi, bwo biwom abin bì yi 'itaa ana mà, gbe li de le 'i nyin li lè bende, lì shi biwom ha bende abi bı tyung le lì yi lè benyin 'igyang-igyang, lì kong he ungwu ufe-ufe a le lì yi lè benyin ye.
62003019	Gbe 'i nyin li lè bende 'igyang a, hà li ngye dangg le lì yi bendi abe bè yi he 'igyang. Kimen ana na 'ı mbee shi àtyám atyan a kwu lè ikwun 'unyong 'uyang-yang lı be he 'ushu Unim.
62003020	Mà igim ityan ì fel ben li le li shi 'iban or, li ngye le Unim a dyam hwò igim ityan, u mbee ngye biwom puu.
62003021	Bedim-gi lityam, he ashina gbe 'ì yi 'igyang a le igim ityan i ben li ye, hà ashin 'i ze le 'unyong 'uyang-yang lı naa he 'ushu Unim li kwa porr faale 'ushell.
62003022	Hà Unim or u ka li 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi li bii lè ha ahe likorye li ndor iten ima, li mbee shi ashi 'ı nyin he.
62003023	Uten angwu Unim a ke li ù yi le, lì fe lityam ha Unwaa-ma, Ujeso Ukristi, li mbee kwu lè benyin ha bende nya a na a tye li uten.
62003024	Undi uyang-yang angwu u ndor iten Unim hà a gwaa ha Unim kpebaa, Unim or u gwaa ha ahe kpebaa. Kiwom ashi 'i shi li li ngye dangg le ù yi gwaa ha abel kpebaa 'ì yi Ukatia Kunyong uma angwu a ke li.
62004001	Bedim-gi lityam, bendi gbamm abe be bè uman le be tya ugie 'isom Unim be paa wu mbee igegem puu hen igye. He ashin mà fe lityam ha bendi puu abe be de le bè yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim ana ye. Mà shun li-li-li hè men mà ndè shob dangg le hà bè yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim a or, hà ufe a ye or.
62004002	Ashi 'ı shi amen ma ndè shob le hà undi umen ana ù yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim a or 'ì yi le, undi uyang-yang angwu a bong gboo le Ujeso Ukristi a ma be he igye i ná undigye, hà ù yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim a.
62004003	Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a swan le Ujeso Ukristi a ma be he igye i ná undigye ye, hà ù yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ye. Undi umen ana a be lè ha Undi-linaa Ujeso Ukristi umen ana a. Ufe na ma maa gyo le u ba ba. Kigyang-igyang, a be or mà, a fel hen igye.
62004004	Bebwaa-gi, men ufe mà yi bebwaa Unim a, ma hwò bendi-uman bemen ana mà, likorye angwu ù yi ha amen ù yi lè ikeb hwò angwu ù yi ha bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin.
62004005	Bendi-uman bemen ana bè yi ke igye anyin a. He ashina be kong gba lè biwom igye anyin bife-bife a, bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin be gyo ābe.
62004006	Ukpor bel ufe lì yi bebwaa Unim a. Undi angwu a ngye Unim, u dang 'utyung gyo li, ukpor undi angwu a ngye Unim or, ngwu ù kwu unwaa Unim a or ye, u gyo li ye. Kitaa ana na lı ngye le hà undi ù yi lè Ukatia Kunyong Unim angwu u tyung 'igyang a or, hà a be lè ha Undi-linaa Ujeso Ukristi angwu u lam bendi a or.
62004007	Bedim-gi lityam, mà lì gye 'ushu kwu lè benyin ha bende. Benyin be ba lè ha Unim a. He ashin undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè benyin, hà 'i tyung le ù yi unwaa Unim a, u mbee ngye Unim.
62004008	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè benyin ye, hà a ngye Unim ye, likorye Unim na ù yi usu benyin.
62004009	Kitel i na Unim a tyung benyin bema gboo ha abel, a som 'ugbe Unwaa-ma a ken be he igye anyin, le lì fel lè likpan 'unyong gbe he 'ubwo 'uma.
62004010	Ashin na 'ì yi benyin. Kì yi le 'i ma nyin li bel lè Unim a ye; Unim na 'i ma nyin he ufe lè bel, nyong a som Unwaa-ma angwu a be hwō le gbe ha ahe, Unim ù tyang biban bityan ke li.
62004011	Bedim-gi lityam, bwo 'i nyin Unim lè bel 'i go 'itaa ana, kì yi kpe-kpe le 'ì nyin li, bel or, lè bende.
62004012	Kì yi lè undi angwu a wa ndè Unim lè ashi ngye ye. Mà na or, gbe 'i nyin li lè bende, Unim u gwaa ha abel, benyin bema be kwu yilidididi he atyam atyan.
62004013	Ashi 'i shi li li ngye dangg le li gwaa ha Unim, ufe u gwaa ha abel, 'ì yi le, a ke li Ukatia Kunyong uma.
62004014	Bel li ndè le Unim Atyetyan a ma som Unwaa-ma be le ù be kpan bendigye, li bun da bendi gba lè ashin a.
62004015	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong le Ujeso ù yi Unwaa Unim a, hà Unim ù yi gwaa ha undi umen ana, ufe u shi gwaa ha Unim.
62004016	Bel li ngye le 'i nyin Unim lè bel, li fe lityam ha benyin bema bemen ana. Unim na ù yi usu benyin. Undi uyang-yang angwu u gye 'ushu tyung benyin, hà ù yi gwaa ha Unim, Unim u shi gwaa ha ahe.
62004017	Kukwo ahwuna na benyin be kwu yilididi ha abel, le hè Liti angi Unim u be tang ushe bendi puu, lî kwu lè 'ushell ye. Li ba kwa faale 'ushell likorye likpan lityan he igye i lì yi 'itaa ken ha angi Ujeso Ukristi.
62004018	He 'ipi benyin abe be be lè ha Unim bè yi, kushell 'u kwa nya ye, likorye gbe benyin Unim bè yi yilididi ha abel, be ndō 'ushell lè ha abel gbang-gbang. Undi u kwa lè 'ushell nyong ù fel yi kwu u nyong 'ingie a. Ashina 'i ze le, gbe undi ù yi lè 'ushell, hà benyin Unim bè yi ha ahe lityam yilididi ye.
62004019	Bel lì yi lè benyin, likorye 'i nyin Unim a lè bel 'ushu.
62004020	Undi uyang-yang angwu a de le 'i nyin he lè Unim, ù yii tel unde-ma, ù yi undi-uman a, likorye unde-ma angwu u nde-e lè ashi, gbe 'i nyin he lè he ye, kì hà ndo nyin he lè Unim angwu u nde-e ye ye.
62004021	Uten angwu Unim a tye li ù yi le, undi uyang-yang angwu 'i nyin he lè Unim, kì nyin he lè unde-ma or titi.
62005001	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong le Ujeso ù yi Ukristi, Undi-likpan angwu Unim a som be he igye anyin a, hà undi umen ana ù yi unwaa Unim a. Gbe 'i nyin li lè ātyām unwaa, ki nyin li lè unwaa-ma or titi.
62005002	He ashin lí ngye le gbe 'i nyin li lè Unim, li mbee ndor iten ima, hà 'i nyin li lè bebwaa-ma or titi.
62005003	Ife angi lı ke iten Unim na ı tyung le 'i nyin li lè Unim. Iten ima i dyam gbe li ashele ye,
62005004	likorye undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi unwaa Unim a, ù yi lè ikeb le u hwà igye ibibi anyin. Kiwom ashi lı kung hwò igye imen i 'ì yi abongale le Ujeso ù yi Unwaa Unim a.
62005005	Undi angwu a bong le Ujeso ù yi Unwaa Unim a, ufe-ufe na u kwu lè ahwele umen ana.
62005006	Ujeso Ukristi na a ma be he igye i, u tyung 'uhwo-ma gbe he umbwo akibale, u tyung 'uhwo-ma gbe he anung angi a wu nyong a ma hwō. Ki ma yi umbwo ufe-ufe a ye; umbwo lè anung na bı tyung le ù yi Unwaa Unim. Ukatia Kunyong Unim or titi a naa ushada le 'ì yi 'igyang a le Ujeso ù yi Unwaa Unim a. He ashin bel li ngye dangg le 'ì yi 'igyang a likorye Ukatia Kunyong Unim u bà uman ye.
62005007	Biwom bì yi bikie abi Unim a kung tyung li le 'imen i 'ì yi 'igyang a.
62005008	Biwom bimen bikie ana bì yi Ukatia Kunyong Unim, lè umbwo akibale lè anung angi Ujeso a ma wu he 'uhwo 'utyan. Puu abi bì yi 'itaa ken.
62005009	Nyong bendigye be kong gbe lè biwom abi be ndè, li kpa ābi. Unim ufe, ima igie i dyam hwò; ufe-gyang na a de li le Ujeso Ukristi ù yi Unwaa-ma.
62005010	He ashin undi uyang-yang angwu a bong ha Unwaa Unim, u ngya ha ahe lityam le ashi 'imen i 'ì yi 'igyang a. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a bong àshi Unim a kong ye, hà u da le Unim ù yi undi-uman a, likorye a bong àshi Unim a kong gbe lè Unwaa-ma ye.
62005011	Ashin 'i ze le, Unim a shi li li fel lè likpan 'unyong, li kwa ipel ha ahe ngyor igye kpamm; li fel lè likpan limen ana gbe he 'ubwo Unwaa-ma.
62005012	Undi uyang-yang angwu a fel lè Unwaa Unim, hà ù yi lè likpan limen i, ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu a fel lè Unwaa Unim ye, hà ù yi lè likpan limen i ye.
62005013	Mi fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè men abe ma bong ha Unwaa Unim, le hè men mà ngye le ma fel lè likpan 'unyong angi lı ngyor igye mà.
62005014	He 'unyong 'uyang-yang lı be he 'ushu Unim, li kwa lè 'ushell ye, likorye li ngye le 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi li bii lè ha ahe u gyo li, gbe li shi biwom abi bì yi he ugim uma a.
62005015	Bwo li ngye le he 'unyong 'uyang-yang lı bii 'iwom lè ha ahe u gyo li, ashin 'i shi li li mbee ngye le li kpē ashi li bii lè ha ahe ana or mà.
62005016	Undi uyang-yang angwu a tang lè unde-ma, undi Unim, u shi 'iban, gbe 'iban ashi há 'ì yi ashi 'ı be lè lihwu a ye, ù kong ha Unim ke undi umen ana le Unim ù ke-e likpan. Kì yi faale atyangale le Unim u ka he likpan. Ashin 'ì kee-kee yi ke bendi abe be shi 'iban ashi 'ı be lè lihwu ye a. Kiban ashi 'ı be lè lihwu 'ife, undi angwu a shì āshi, mi de le mà kong ha Unim le ù ke-e likpan ye.
62005017	Likpe liketye liyang-yang lì yi 'iban a, ukpor biban bisuso bi ba lè lihwu ye.
62005018	Bel lí ngye le undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi unwaa Unim a, u gya 'ushu sha 'iban ye, likorye Ujeso Ukristi, Unwaa Unim, u kang he le hè Usetan, usu bibibi, ù do he ye.
62005019	Lí ngye le lì yi bebwaa Unim a, mà na igye puu ì yi he 'ubwo Usetan or.
62005020	Lí ngye le Ujeso Ukristi, Unwaa Unim, a be he igye i be buu li àshì le lì fel ngye Unim angwu ufe-ufe na ù yi Unim ugyang. Lì yi gwaa ha Unim angwu ù yi 'igyang, li shi gwaa ha Ujeso Ukristi, Unwaa-ma. Ufe na ù yi Unim ugyang. Likpan angi lı ngyor igye kpamm li be lè ha ufe a.
62005021	Bebwaa-gi, mà baa 'uhwo-men hè men mà ndè le mà gbe lè abwo fe he ikem ye. Ì yi Ùnīm a ye.
63001001	Mi angwu mì yi ukaandi bendi abongale na mı fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè wo, andagi angwu Unim a waa kung. Mi fee āhwu hwaa lè wo lè bebwaa-gang, men abe 'i nyin mi lè men lityam ken. Mi-mi na 'i nyin mi lè men ye, bendi puu abe be ngye igie Unim, ki nyin ābe lè men titi.
63001002	Igie imen angi ì yi he atyam atyan ana na 'i shi li, ki nyin li lè men; igie imen ana i kwa ha abel ngyor igye kpamm.
63001003	Nya a na lı gye 'ushu ke igie Unim ife, ki mbee nyin li lè bende, Unim Atyetyan befe lè Ujeso Ukristi, Unwaa-ma, be ka li 'ukwun, be kwu lè beshi ha abel, be mbee shi 'i kwun li he atyam atyan kpatiaa.
63001004	Nyong mi ndè bebwaa-gang besuso be shi igie Unim he 'ukwo kpa-kpa ná Unim Atyetyan a de li, ki ke-m igor kangg.
63001005	Andagi, mi kee le mi well-a le bel puu lì kwu lè benyin ha bende. Uten umen ana ù yi angwu ufufe a ye, ù yi angwu li ngye kung lè há 'unyong li ma kpi 'ikwu fe Ujeso Ukristi a.
63001006	Ayang angwu 'i nyin he lè Unim? Undi angwu u ndor iten Unim na 'i nyin he lè Unim. Uten angwu li gyo kung lè há 'unyong ahwu li kpi 'ikwu fe Ujeso Ukristi ana ù yi le, kì nyin li lè bendi mbee 'unyong.
63001007	Ashi mi kong ana, mi kong āshi likorye bendi-ilam gbamm be fel hen igye, be paa wu mbee igye puu. Bendi bemen ana be swan le Ujeso Ukristi a be he igye anyin ná undigye ye. Befe bè yi ke Undi-linaa Ujeso Ukristi a. Undi-linaa umen ana na u lam bendi kpam-kpam.
63001008	He ashina, kì yi ngbebb-ngbebb le men ufe mà kang 'uhwo-men, hè 'iwom 'iyang-yang ashi ma shi mà shi āshi wu abwo likor a ye, ukpor hè men mà be kpē 'uke 'ūmen sho yilididi lè ha Unim.
63001009	Undi uyang-yang angwu u gye 'ushu shi biwom abi Ujeso Ukristi a hwua li a ye, u fe bima ipel ha abi Ujeso Ukristi a hwua li, undi umen ana ù yi ke Unim a ye. Ukpor undi uyang-yang angwu u gye 'ushu shi biwom abi Ujeso Ukristi a hwua li, ufe na ù yi ke Unim Atyetyan lè Unwaa-ma.
63001010	He ashin mi da amen le, undi uyang-yang angwu a be u hwua amen 'iwom ashi 'ì yi atyetye lè ha ashi Ujeso Ukristi a hwua amen, mà kpe-e kwu ha amen ushom or, ngwu mà kong lè he or ye gbangg.
63001011	Mi kong ashina likorye undi uyang-yang angwu a kong lè he, hà a fel lè abwo he bibibi bima.
63001012	Mì so lè biwom gbamm abi mi kee le mi da amen, ukpor mi kee le mi fee bife ifee hwaa lè men ye. Mi ndor lishi le mi ba ha amen há, hè li lì kwu ukem kong ābi, lî yal gor 'iteng ken.
63001013	Unwanaa ungingye angwu ù yi hen, angwu Unim a waa kung titi, bebwaa-ma be bii atye.
64001001	Mi angwu mì yi ukaandi bendi abongale na mı fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè wo Ugayas, udim lityam angwu 'i nyin mi lè wo lityam ken.
64001002	Udim-gi lityam, kigyor 'igi 'ì yi le, kiwom 'iyang-yang gbe lè wo 'ì te ngbebb-ngbebb-ngbebb, inyiahwo igang or ì kwu kang-kang nya a na lityam ligang lì yi kpa-kpa he ashi Unim.
64001003	Nyong bebuye bendi Unim be wu hen, be de li le wo fa Unim lityam ken nya a na mi ngye le wo shī shà mbee 'unyong puu. Ashin 'i ke-m igor kangg.
64001004	Kunyong 'uyang-yang mı gyo le bebwaa-gi be fa Unim kpa-kpa, ki ka-m igor angi i dyam hwò biwom puu abi bi teng iteng.
64001005	Udim-gi lityam, wo sha 'inunung a nyong wo kpell bebuye bendi Unim abe bè yi begaandi a or.
64001006	Bendi bemen wo kpell ana, besuso be bè de liwu bendi abongale hen ná wo tyung benyin ha abe mbee 'unyong. Mi tim-a anung le wò gye 'ushu ke bendi abe 'itaa ana ukpell nya he 'ukwo ahwu 'u nyin Unim ana, he 'unyong 'uyang-yang be bel gbe ha awo há.
64001007	Atan-lengi angwu be bo gye he igye ù yi le hè be bè lè bun de bendi gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi, ki shi le be kpa 'iwom lè ha bendi abe be bong ha Ujeso Ukristi ye ye.
64001008	He ashina 'ì yi kpe-kpe le lì ke be ukpell, hè li lì fel lè abwo ipel ha abe he aki igie Unim abunale.
64001009	Mi ma fee 'ushia hwaa lè liwu bendi abongale līmen, ukpor Udiyortrefis a swan le u gyo li ye, likorye a kee le be gyo he ufe-ufe a.
64001010	Nyong mı be be há, mi ba ba lè biwom puu abi a shi he igye gboo, mi ba da bendi ná u bun ibubun fe li. Ashi 'i ban hwò puu 'ì yi le, bebuye bendi Unim abe be be ha amen há, u bong kpa ābe ye, u bong àbe be kee le be kpa ābe or, le bè kpē be ye. U ndō àbe be kpe be lè he liwu bendi abongale.
64001011	Udim-gi lityam, ndè le wo hwua kung likpe libibi ye, ukpor wo hwua kung likpe linunung. Undi uyang-yang angwu u shi 'inunung ù yi unwaa Unim a. Ukpor undi angwu u shi 'ibibi, hà a ngye Unim ye.
64001012	Udemitriyes ufe, undi uyang-yang u kong he he ungwu 'inunung. Ki tyung gboo le u pwom 'ukwo Unim kpa-kpa. Bel or li da-a le ù yi ununung. Wo-gyang wo ngye le li bà uman ye.
64001013	Mì so lè biwom gbamm abi mi kee le mi da-a, ukpor mi kee le mi fee ābi ifee hwaa lè wo ye.
64001014	Mi ndor lishi le baale mı be ha amen há, hè li lì kwu ukem kong ābi.
64001015	Ikwun Unim ì kwu ha awo lityam. Bebuye bendi Unim abe hen puu be de le mì kong lè wo. Wo-ò kong li lè bebuye bendi Unim abe há he 'uken-uken.
65001001	Mi Ujud angwu mì yi unwanam Ujems, mi shi uboyi Ujeso Ukristi na mı fee 'ushia ahwun. Mi fee āhwu hwaa lè men abe 'i nyin Atyetyan Unim lè men, u waa kung amen le mà kwu bema, men abe mà yi he abwo Ujeso Ukristi.
65001002	Unim ù hā kwu lè beshi ha amen kpamm, u shi hè 'ì kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa, u shi benyin bema be sho ha amen yilididi.
65001003	Bedim-gi lityam, mi ma yi lè 'igyor kangg le mi fee da amen gbà lè likpan 'unyong angi Unim a ke li bel lè men puu i a, ukpor mi tem fel nde shi 'ì yi kpe-kpe le mi fe men ingie le mà kwu 'igyang gbe lè Ujeso Ukristi abwo kpebakaa, ma kang āshi hè bendi bè gie āshi ye. Kigyang ashi Unim a ma ke bendi bema 'i sho yilididi, ki ngyor 'itaa ken ngyor igye kpamm.
65001004	Mi kong ashin likorye bendi besuso abe be ke Unim ife ye, be nyia gbe be fel he liwu līmen. Bendi aben be da le bwo Unim ù yi lè inung 'indee-indee, be kwu 'ubwo he inung Unim a, be shi bibibi 'itaa be kee. He ashele 'itaa ana be swan Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi angwu ù yi Usu utyan. Be ma fee he 'ushia Unim leěti le bendi abe be shi biwom abina be nim.
65001005	Mà na ma ngye biwom abi mi ndo kong i mà or, mi kee le mi well amen ábi. Mà well le leěti Unim a ma fem bendi Izwell lè há 'ubong Igyept, lè he 'ushu a ma gwu abe be bong ha ahe 'igyang-igyang ye.
65001006	Idengell Unim angi i ma kpo utebb Unim or, i ma ngyor kwu he libwo angi Unim a ndor āngi ye, i bo tyang 'iteng kpa-kpa ashi Unim a ke ngi. He ashina Unim a ma kwu āngi lè fe he lifee he 'ipi 'ifufebb 'ì yi kpenn, be fe ngi ashishilika tyuu há ngyor igye kpamm. He Liti likaandi angi Unim u be tang bendigye ushe, u tang āngi ife or titi.
65001007	Mà well likong 'ubong Usodem lè 'ubong Ugomora lè abe be ma ndē há kel-kel or titi. Bendi abong anyina be maa tan akpela, be shi 'itaa 'ibibi 'iyang-yang ashi lityam libell li de be le bè shi ashi 'ì yi le hang undigye ù shi ye. He ashina Unim a ma kung 'ìndē ashi 'ı ngyor igye kpamm ke be 'ingie hè 'ì kwu utebb ke bendi puu le Unim u ka bendi abe be ke-e ife ye 'ingie.
65001008	Bendi bemen abe be fem he liwu līmen i, be sha bitaa bibibi atyetye-atyetye nya a na bendi abena be maa shi a. Be nda biwom he itam, be de le Unim na a tyung ābe ábi. He ashina be tan akpela ban inyiahwo ibell; be bong le be kwa he 'ubwo Unim ye; be kong bia idengell Unim angi i dyam 'indee-indee he lifung-atabe.
65001009	He 'unyong ahwu Umaikell angwu ù yi atie-lishi idengell Unim puu a ma kin likwom Umosis lè Usetan, Umaikell a ma naa lè 'uhwo-ma kong 'ibibi ha Usetan or, ngwu ù nyan he or ye. Ukpor a ma de-e le: "Unim-Unim na u ben-a."
65001010	Bendi bemen abe be fem he liwu līmen i, be kong ban biwom abi be ngye ye. Bè yi lè ugim ye a ná inyia libeb a; kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'i bé be he lityam mà 'i mbee a, be sha āshi 'i bé be he lityam mà 'i mbee a, be sha āshi. Nya a na be shi ashin be be lè linim ke 'uhwo-bell.
65001011	Ki ba kwa 'ibibi ka ābe. Be pwom abee abibi angi Uken. Be shang 'uhwo-bell puu ke he 'ibibi ashele hè be bè ndè úndē ná Ubelem a ma shi. Bè yi lìshī likaa-likaa nya a na Ukora a ma yi a; be ba nim nya a na ufe a ma nim a.
65001012	Nyong ahwu ma kpee ukem zī lizi, bè yi he liwu līmen ná bikpaa umbe he 'ihwom 'ifung nà, bè yi ibia a ke liwu līmen, likorye be sha likpe libibi. Be kwa ipel ha amen nya, be za be gwul ye, be ngwo 'i kpè be ye, be gim 'uhwo-bell 'ufe-ufe-ufe, bè yi lè ishwia he lishi ye. Bè yi lè lifem ye a ná 'ibu ashi 'ufem 'u shì paa āshi 'i ndor umbwo ye a. Be shi ná ìkwán angi ı wum ye nà. Mà na 'unyong ahwu be bung āngi 'u fel or, i kwa lè agbe ye. Be mbee shi ná ìkwán angi be wob āngi, i hwō lè idaa lè idaa nà.
65001013	Bè yi lè 'ipi bè naa ye ná 'ipuupuu umbwo nà. Biban bibell bi fem he igye gboo ná bihwu umbe bı fem ndē he likwu umbwo nà. Be mbee shi ná ikpen angi ı kwu he 'iteng ken kporr ye nà. Kiteng ashi 'ifufebb 'i gye há kpenn hwò puu na 'ì yi kam ndor ābe, be ba kwa nya a ngyor igye kpamm.
65001014	Leěti Inok angwu ù yi he ūgbè ledyong-ifee kung lè ha Adam, a ma kong 'iwom ashi 'ı be shi fe bendi abe 'itaa ana. A ma de le: "Atyetyan u ba ba lè idengell ima asisilisi asisilisi.
65001015	U ba tang ushe bendi puu. U ba ka bendi abe be ke-e ife ye ana libi he 'uhwo bibibi abi be shi fe-e gbe gyong akongale, lè igie ibibi angi bendi bebibi ana be shi fe-e gbe gyong akongale, lè igie ibibi angi bendi bebibi ana be kong bia he."
65001016	Mbee 'unyong puu bendi bemen i be nem inem, be ben bendi. Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'i bé be he lityam, mà 'i mbee a, be sha āshi. Be kung 'uhwo-bell pwom ungwu, be kong ungwu benyin-benyin hè bendi bè shi ashi befe be kee.
65001017	Bedim-gi lityam, men ufe mà well biwom abi leěti bebwaa-isom Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi be maa de le bi ba sha.
65001018	Be maa da amen le: "He ati umbee-likel igye anyin bendi-inyan be ba ba àbe be be nyan bendi Unim, be ke Unim ife ye. Be kee-kee sha abi àtyám abell a de be le bè shi a."
65001019	Bendi bemen i na be tan lè bikwu agieale he liwu bendi Unim. Ukatia Kunyong Unim na u teng ābe hé abi be shi ye, be kee-kee sha abi bi be lè he igim ibell ife-ife a.
65001020	Bedim-gi lityam, men ufe mà fe bende ingie hè men mà kaā naa genn he biwom abi ma bong, abi Unim ugyang na a tyung amen. Mà kong ha Unim mbee 'unyong puu he ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim.
65001021	Mà ngyor kwu he benyin Unim nya a na mà yi kwu ma nyong 'unyong ahwu Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi u be kpē men he beshi bema lè kwu ipel ha 'uhwo-ma ngyor igye kpamm.
65001022	Kì yi lè bendi abe be fel lè igim ifee, mà shi ābe hè 'igyang 'ì nung ābe.
65001023	Kì yi lè bendi besuso abe 'ì yi le mà kin fem ābe lè he 'inde. Ki mbee shi lè bendi besuso abe 'ì yi le mà kwu lè beshi ha abe, ukpor mà baa 'uhwo-men kangg, teng befe be tem lè men lam kpa fa he liwu libell. Mà gbe lè abwo fe he 'iwom 'ibell 'iyang-yang ye, mà tel-tel lè inditen ibell or, likorye i fel àbēl-àbēl gbe he bigyor bibibi bibell.
65001024	Mà lì pee Unim. Ufe na ù yi lè ikeb le u kpell amen ma naa genn hè men mà tyang 'ukwo 'uma ye. U shi lè ikeb le u sha amen mà fel gelalala faale 'iban, he-e ù te lè men lè naa he 'ushu 'uma, ufe Unim angwu a dyam hwò puu. Nya na ma yal gor igor lè ibubo he ungwu.
65001025	Mà lì pee Unim angwu ufe-ufe na a dyam hwò puu. Ufe na a kpan li gbe ha Atyetyan Ujeso Ukristi. Ipee puu lè ifem puu ì kwu ke-e. Ufe na u yi Usu, u teng li, ikeb ima ì yi ngyor igye kpamm! Kì yi nya 'itaa i kung lè há linde, kì so ná 'unyin i, ki kwa ná ngyor igye kpamm! Kì ngyor ná mi kong.
66001001	Kushia ahwun 'ù yi gbe lè biwom abi Unim a fem tyung Ujeso Ukristi le ù tyung bendi abe be fe-e, biwom abi bì yi kpe-kpe le baale bì shi. He ashin Ujeso a ma hà som udengell uma a lè tyung Ujon angwu u fe-e biwom bimen ana.
66001002	Ujon a fee biwom bimen abi a ndè ana he-e ù tyung bendi gboo le bisom Unim bimen i, Ujeso or titi a naa ushada le bì yi 'igyang.
66001003	Biwom bimen Unim a kong le baale bì shi ana, undi angwu a bo ābi he atyung bendi, lè bendi abe be gyo ābi, gbe be shi ābi, hà 'i kwun ābe he 'uhwo, likorye 'unyong ahwu biwom abin bı be shi 'u fel kpee-kpee.
66001004	Mi Ujon na mi fee 'ushia ahwun hwaa lè men awu bendi abongale angi he Eshia. Unim angwu ù yi lè há linde, ù so 'unyin i, u mbee tem be he igye anyin, ù ke men 'ukwun, u shi 'i kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa. Ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim idyong-ifee angi ı naa he 'ushu 'idem 'usu Unim ì ke men 'ukwun, i shi 'i kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa.
66001005	Ujeso Ukristi angwu u kong 'igyang mbee 'unyong puu, angwu a ma wum lè he lihwu 'ushu, u mbeē shi usu besu puu he igye i, ù ke men 'ukwun, u shi 'i kwun amen he atyam kpatiaa. Ki nyin he lè bel, a bong hwō he-e ù pell li tyang abwo lè he ikeb biban bityan.
66001006	A shi li li fel bendi abe be shang Unim Atyam he 'iteng-usu 'ima. Kusu lè ifem bì yi ke-e ufe a ngyor igye kpamm! Kì kwu ná.
66001007	Mà gyo! Baale u be. U ba he bibu; bendi puu be ba nda he lè ashi. Bendi abe be ma tim he likung or titi be ba nda he. Bendi mbee igegem puu he igye i be ba kya fa akpen he 'uhwo 'uma. Faale ifung, ki ba sha ná. Kì yi lè ashi 'ı gie āshi ye.
66001008	Atyetyan Unim a de le: "Mì yi Alfa, ashi 'i ze le ukpi-ikwu; mi shi Ombeega, ashi 'i ze le umbee-likel." Ikeb puu ì yi he 'ubwo 'uma a, ù yi lè há linde, ù so 'unyin i, u ba kwa ngyor igye kpamm.
66001009	Mi angwu mi fee 'ushia ahwun mì yi Ujon, unwandamen angwu bel lè men li gwaa ipel ha Ujeso, li naa genn kpe 'ingie likorye lì yi ke Kiteng-usu 'ima. Be kwu-m lè ndor he 'ipi umbwo a bel bigie, ashi be ko le Upatimos, likorye mi bun de bendi gbe lè 'isom Unim ashi Ujeso or a naa ushada le 'ì yi 'igyang.
66001010	He liti Usundee lisuso, Ukatia Kunyong Unim a ma be shì-m kpemm, mi gyo igie i kong mi lè he item fem kangg ná be gwee usom nà.
66001011	Igie ana i de le: "Kung 'ushia, fee biwom abi wo ndo ndè i fe há, wo som āhwu lè ke awu bendi abongale adyong-ifee angi he Efesos, Usimana, Upegamem, Utayitara, Usadis, Ufiladellfia lè Uleyodisia."
66001012	Mi hà bel àshì he item le mî ndè angwu u kong ha ami. Nyong mi bel àshì, mi ndè bidem abi be pwom bimor-inde bidyong-ifee abi be kung igold a shi ābi.
66001013	Há liwu bimor-inde ana, kiwom 'i naa há ashi 'i bi undigye. Ki shī aliga uwulu angi a wu āshi he bityung abee, ki shi lè ukwob angwu be kung igold a shi-e bua he anyong.
66001014	Ìbí i tee he lishi hwongg ná uwuu; atong-shi áshi a ndeb melang-melang-melang ná umor-inde.
66001015	Abee áshi a taa ná nyong be gyong upii he 'índe, be mbee gbaa he u taa nà. Ki kong igie ashi ná 'ipuupuu umbwo 'ı bua nà.
66001016	Ki shi lè ikpen idyong-ifee kwu he 'ubwo lizen. Kashwia benyin befee ake 'a nyin dan-dan-dan 'a bé shī lè he ungwu. Kùshú áshi 'u taa ná libwee lı taa nyong lı pwom he 'udyan lishi.
66001017	Nyong mi nde shi, mi mbu shī he itang fel ná likwom. Ukpor, ki kung 'ubwo lizen áshi pwom mi, ki de-m le: "Shell ye, mi na mì yi ukpi-ikwu, mi shi umbee-likel biwom puu.
66001018	Mi na mì yi angwu ù yi uwum. Leěti mi ma hwō, ukpor 'anaa-anaa i mì yi uwum, mi fel kwa uwum ngyor igye kpamm. Lihwu lè 'usu behwu bì yi he 'ubwo 'ugi a. Mi na mì yi lè ukukol ábi.
66001019	He ashin mi da-a le, biwom abi wo ndè i lè abi wo be ndè lè he 'ushu, fee ābi.
66001020	Ndor mî da-a likpe ikpen idyong-ifee angi wo ndè ha ami 'ubwo lizen lè bimor-inde bidyong-ifee abi be kung igold a shi ana. Ikpen idyong-ifee i naa ke idengell Unim idyong-ifee angi ı ndè gbe lè awu bendi abongale adyong-ifee ana. Bimor-inde bidyong-ifee bi naa ke awu bendi abongale adyong-ifee ana."
66002001	Undi umen mi ndè ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Efesos. A de le mì fee le: "Mi angwu mi kwu ikpen idyong-ifee he 'ubwo lizen, mi mbee tan he liwu bidem abi be pwom bimor-inde bidyong-ifee abi be kung igold a shi ābi ana na mi kong igie anyin.
66002002	Mi ngye likpe līmen; mi ngye ná ma shi aki lè ikeb īmen puu, ma naa genn kpe 'ingie. Mi ngye le ma bong bendi bebibi he liwu līmen ye. Bendi-uman abe be kung 'uhwo-bell le bè yi bebwaa-isom Ujeso a, ma shun ābe li-li-li, ma ndè shob ābe le bè yi befe a ye, be bà uman a.
66002003	Mi ngye le ma naa genn he 'iwom 'iyang-yang, ma bong kpe 'ingie he 'uhwo 'ugi, ma wee abwo ye.
66002004	Ukpor, kì yi lè 'iwom ken ashi ma shi ashi mi kee ye. Kì yi le, ki tem nyin amen lè mi ná leěti ye.
66002005	Mà well ná 'i ma nyin amen lè mi leěti, mà tyang abwo lè likpe libibi ana, fel shi biwom abi ma maa shi leěti. Gbe ma tyang abwo lè likpe libibi ana ye, hà mi ba kung 'imor-inde gbe lè shī lè ha amen.
66002006	Ukpor, kì yi lè 'iwom ken ashi mı pee amen. Kì yi le ma tel bibibi abi bendi-utung Unikolas be shi nya a na mi or mi tel a.
66002007	"Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, mi ba tyang he u za ágbe ukwan angwu u ke likpan angwu a naa he 'ipi igor ashi Unim a kam."
66002008	Undi angwu mi ndè ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Usimana. A de le mì fee le: "Mi angwu mì yi ukpi-ikwu, mi shi umbee-likel biwom puu, mi ma hwō, ukpor mi tem wum lè he lihwu na mi kong igie anyin.
66002009	Mí ngye ná ma kpē 'ingie kangg; mi ngye ná ma mbu likaa he biwom igye anyin, ukpor 'igyang-igyang ma mbu 'ingbebb he ashi Unim. Mi mbee ngye ná bendi abe be kung 'uhwo-bell le bè yi Ijuus be kong bia amen, ukpor bè yi Ijuus a ye, bè yi he likwu bendi Usetan, usu bibibi a.
66002010	Mà gyo! Mà ndè le ma shell 'ingie ashi ma ndo kpē ye. Baale Usetan u kwu amen besuso fe he igaadye he-e ù kaà abongale ūmen ndè. Kingie 'īmen 'i ba kee-kee kwa ati lihwo a. Mà 'ì kwu le be gwa amen or, mà gye 'ushu bong ha ami lityam ken. Likpan angi lı ngyor igye na lì yi lifem angi mı be ke men hè men mà dyam he lifung-atabe.
66002011	"Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, ù tem hwa lihwu 'ugbe 'afee ye."
66002012	Undi angwu mi ndè ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Upegamem. A de le mì fee le: "Mi angwu mì yi lè 'ashwia benyin befee ake 'a nyin dan-dan-dan na mi kong igie anyin.
66002013	Mí ngye 'iteng ashi mà yi; nya na Usetan a kie 'idem 'usu 'ima. Má gye 'ushu fe-m lityam ken, ma tyang abwo lè abongale ha ami ye, mà he 'unyong ahwu be ma gwu Antipas nya he liwu līmen he 'ipi Usetan a fe ushu or. Be gwu-e likorye a fe-m lityam ken, u mbee bun gboo le a bong ha ami.
66002014	Ukpor, kì yi lè biwom abi ma shi abi mi kee ye. Kì yi lè bendi há he liwu līmen abe be shi biwom abi Ubelem a hwua. Ubelem umen ana na a ma tebb Ubelak ná ù shi bendi Izwell bè tyang 'ukwo ahwu kpa-kpa. A shi ābe be maa fel za biwom abi be shang ikem, be mbee tan akpela.
66002015	Men or ma fel sha bibibi bimen ana, ma sha biwom abi Unikolas lè bendi bema be hwua.
66002016	Mà tyang abwo lè likpe libibi anyin. Gbe ma mā ma tyang āngi ye, mi ba ha amen há nyin i 'ukwo-ukwo i, mi kung 'ashwia ake 'a be lè ha ami ungwu ba ndo ha bendi abe be shi bibibi bimen ana.
66002017	"Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye. Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, mi ba ka he lizi angi lì yi ndor he lifung-atabe. Mi mbee ke-e 'ukor 'ūfūng ahwu be fee lizen lifufe fe há. Undi-iso u ngya lizen limen ana fem angwu mi ke-e áhwu tyang ye."
66002018	Undi angwu mi ndè ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Utayitara. A de le mì fee le: "Mi Unwaa Unim angwu atong-shi agi à ndeb melang-melang-melang ná umor-inde, abee agi a taa ná nyong be gyong upii he 'índe, be mbee gbaa he ù taa, na mi kong igie anyin.
66002019	Mi ngye likpe līmen. Mi ngye le 'i nyin amen lè bende, ma kpell bende, ma bong ha ami, ma gye 'ushu naa genn. Biwom abi ma fel shi 'anaa-anaa i or, bi fel ngbebb hwò abi ma maa shi leěti.
66002020	Ukpor, kì yi lè 'iwom ken ashi ma shi ashi mi kee ye. Kì yi le, ma bong kpē ungingye angwu ù yi Ujezebell ana he liwu līmen. Ufe-gyang u ko 'uhwo-ma le undi angwu u tye ugie 'isom Unim. Ukpor a ban bendi begi; a teng ābe gye he atanale akpela lè azele biwom abi be shang ikem.
66002021	Mi ke-e 'unyong le ù tyang abwo lè likpe libibi anyina, ukpor a gye 'ushu lè ngi.
66002022	Mi ba tya he lingmam shǎ he u fel 'ikwu itang. Bendi abe be tan ha ahe or, mi ba ba lè 'ingie 'ikaa-ikaa swa ābe he lishi, gbe be mā ma tyang abwo lè bibibi bibell ana ye.
66002023	Mi ba gwa bendi puu abe be pwom he. He ashin bendi abongale he 'iteng 'iyang-yang bè ha ngya le mi ngye 'iwom ashi 'ì yi he ugim lè lityam undi uyang-yang. Mi ba ka undi uyang-yang ashi 'i keè ha ashi a shi.
66002024	"Men besuso abe ma teng há he Utayitara abe ma shi bibibi abi Ujezebell a hwua ana ye, abe ma shi bibibi biwom abi bendi besuso be ko le 'undyell Usetan ana ye, mì yi lè biwom gbamm abi mı de men ufe ye.
66002025	Kiwom ken ashi mi kee le mi da amen 'ì yi le mà gye 'ushu naa genn he biwom abi ma ngye ana kpamm mi gbe be.
66002026	"Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, angwu a gye 'ushu shi ashi 'i ngbebb mi lè wu he umbee-likel, mi ba shǎ he u fel usu igegem puu he igye i,
66002027	ná Atyagi a shi-m mi fel usu igegem puu he igye i. U ba kwa utyuu usu he 'ubwo angwu be kung 'índe a shi-e, hà teng ābe he ikeb-ikeb, u kem ti ābe ná undi u kem ti 'iki.
66002028	Mi ba ka undi umen angwu a hwò ana ukpen ashi-liti.
66002029	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye."
66003001	Undi angwu mi ndè ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Usadis. A de le mì fee le: "Mi angwu mì yi lè ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim idyong-ifee, mi shi lè ikpen idyong-ifee kwu he 'ubwo, na mi kong igie anyin. Mi ngye likpe līmen; bendi be kong le mà yi bewum, ukpor mà yi bewum ye, ma hwō.
66003002	Mà bo 'inaa! Mà kin 'anwaa likpan zangg ake 'a teng ha amen teng 'a mbee kwun, likorye mi ndè likpe līmen li wa wu he ūkee Unim ugi ye.
66003003	He ashin mà well biwom abi ma gyo, abi be hwua amen. Mà tyang abwo lè likpe libibi līmen hè men mà shi biwom bigyang abi be hwua amen. Gbe ma swan le ma bo 'inaa ye, mi tya amen imbul ná uzi nà, ma ngya 'unyong ahwu mı be ye.
66003004	"Ukpor, ki già teng lè men besuso nya he Usadis abe ma shi ban Unim ye, ma mbe bihwom bīmen ye. Ma ba shā bihwom bifung tan utung ha ami likorye ma kpè.
66003005	Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, mi ba shá he 'ihwom 'ifung 'itaa ana. Mi mbee gbel nim lizen lima lè he 'ushia azen bendi abe bè yi lè likpan 'unyong ana ye. Mi ba naa he 'ushu Atyagi lè idengell ima bun gboo le ù yi ugi a.
66003006	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye."
66003007	Undi angwu mi ndè ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Ufiladellfia. A de le mì fee le: "Mi angwu mı be lè ha Unim, mi shi undi 'igyang, na mi kong igie anyin. Ukukol angwu leěti Udebid a ma yi lè he, ù yi he 'ubwo 'ugi a. Nyong mi buu lishi, kì yi lè undi-iso angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u shā āngi ye; nyong mi ngib āngi, ki shi lè undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u buu āngi ye.
66003008	Mi ngye likpe līmen. Mi ngye le mà yi lè ikeb gbungg ye, ukpor ma shi ashi mi kong. Ma fe-m lityam ken. He ashin mi buu lishi ndor amen hwuo; kì yi lè undi angwu ù yi lè ikeb le u shā āngi ye.
66003009	Ukpor abe bè yi he likwu Usetan, abe be kung 'uhwo-bell le bè yi Ijuus ana, mi ba sha bendi-uman abena be ba tim anung he itang fa amen, hè 'ì nung ābe le 'i nyin mi lè men.
66003010	Má naa genn ná mi de men. He ashin mi ba kpan amen lè he 'ingie 'ikaa-ikaa ashi 'i ndo be hwaa lè igye puu hè shi 'ì kaa bendi abe bè yi hen igye ndè.
66003011	"Baale mı tem be! Mà gye 'ushu naa genn he biwom abi ma gyo, abi ma bong ana, hè 'uke ahwu Unim a kam ndor bendi abe be ngyor naa genn, hè undi ù kpē kung amen áhwu ye.
66003012	Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, mi ba shǎ he u kwa 'ìhwuà he ushom Unim ugi; u ngyor kwa nya he ushom ana ngyor igye kpamm. Mi ba fee lizen Unim ugi fa he 'ushu 'uma, mi fee ùshù Unim ugi angwu ù yi Ujeruselem Ufufe angwu u be be lè he lifung-atabe; mi mbee fee lizen ligi angi lifufe.
66003013	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye."
66003014	Undi angwu mi nde ana a de-m le mì fee igie anyin som lè ke udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè liwu bendi abongale angi he Uleyodisia. A de le mì fee le: "Mi angwu mì yi 'A kong, mà 'i mbee,' mi shi undi 'igyang, igie igi i kpè angi undi uyang-yang ù fe lityam ha angi, biwom puu abi Unim a mbe bi be ubu lè he 'ubwo 'ugi a, mi na mi kong igie anyin.
66003015	Mi ngye likpe līmen. Ma fa-m lityam ken ye, mà swan mi iswan a ye. Ki ngbebb le mà gia ken. Gbe ma fe-m lityam ken ye, hà mà tem fe-m ye gbang-gbang. Mà yi ná lizi angi lı shī ye, li kwun ye, li gbal he ungwu nà.
66003016	Le bwo ma gbal he ungwu, mi shwa amen wa he itang.
66003017	Men ma kung 'uhwo-men le ma mbu 'ingbebb, le 'ì yi lè ashi 'ı tem gben amen ye, le 'i kwun amen he 'uhwo. Kì yi le mà ngye le ma mbu 'indee, ma hwuà àshì, ma shi libong, ma shi beshi-beshi.
66003018	He ashin mi tebb amen le mà be hwaa lè mi hè men mà ndyebb igold angi be so angi i bi, hè men mà mbu 'ingbebb 'igyang ashell. Ma mbee ndyebb 'ihwom 'ifung fe, hè men mà tem kwu libong ye, hè men mà tem kwu lè ishwia ye. Mà mbee ndyebb usi tye he atong-shi amen hè men mà ndè nwongg.
66003019	Bendi abe 'i nyin mi lè be na mı tyung ābe biban abi be shi, mi tebb ābe gbe he 'ingie akele. Mà bo 'inaa, mà tyang abwo lè likpe libibi anyin.
66003020	Mà gyo! Mì yi naa he ungwu lishi, mi kem abwo mì yii ko lìngmam. Undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo lingmam ligi, u buu lishi, mî ngwee he afee ushom, bel lè he li zī lizi abwo ukem.
66003021	"Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, mi ba bong he le ù kwu ipel ha ami he 'idem 'usu 'igi, nya a na mi or mi ma ngyor naa genn hwò ugilale, mi fel kwu ipel ha Atyagi he 'idem 'usu 'ima.
66003022	Undi uyang-yang angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo ashi Ukatia Kunyong Unim u kong de bendi abongale he biteng atyetye-atyetye."
66004001	Nyong ashin 'i mbee, mi mbee ndè 'iwom 'isuso, mi ndè lìshì há 'usi li buu ndor hwuo. Mi mbee gyo igie Undi angwu á yi há bè kong ha ami ana. U kong igie i fem kangg ná be gwee usom nà. A de-m le: "Mbo be he 'usi nyin, mî tyung-a biwom abi bì yi kpe-kpe le bì be shi lè he 'ushu."
66004002	Nya 'ukwo-ukwo Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be shí-m kpemm. Mi ndè 'idem 'usu kie he lifung-atabe, mi ndè Undi ù yi kwu nya 'idem 'imen ana.
66004003	Undi angwu a ma yi kwu há 'idem ana a maa taa ngyal-ngyal-ngyal ná akor angi a ngbebb 'unung angi be ko le udaimon lè urubi. Umia ukwun-ukwun u kaa kel-kel fe 'idem ana, u taa kil-kil-kil ná 'ukor ahwu be ko le emered.
66004004	Be kie bidem 'usu lisi lè bi binde kel-kel-kel fe ashi 'ikaandi he 'udyan. Bekaandi lisi lè be bende be ma yi kwu nya bidem 'usu ana. Ukaandi uyang-yang a shī 'ihwom 'ifung, u shī 'ishilishi usu ashi be kung igold a shì āshī.
66004005	He 'ipi 'idem 'usu 'i kie, kindeb-nwaa 'i ndeb lè há nwaa-nwaa-nwaa, itaa ì yi tya lè há. Be gbē àgòr adyong-ifee ndor he 'ushu 'idem ana. Àgòr ana a naa ke ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim idyong-ifee.
66004006	Nya he 'ushu 'idem ana, kiwom ná 'idyeshor 'i ma yi tyung há, ashi 'ì yi udang-udang gelalala ná 'inde-ushu. Biwom binde abi bì yi biwum bi ma yi naa kel-kel-kel fe 'idem 'usu he 'udyan, bi shi lè atong-shi mbee inyiahwo puu.
66004007	Kiwom ashi ukpi-ikwu, ki bi 'ugaba; ashi utepwom, ki bi ùkyēbb 'igundu; ashi lekie, ki shì lè 'ùshú ná ahwu undigye; ashi lende, ki shi ná agamafe nyong u ndo.
66004008	Biwom bimen bì yi biwum ana, kiyang-yang 'i ma yi lè abebaa adyong-ken, ki shi lè atong-shi mbee inyiahwo puu. Ishu or, kusu or, bi maa gyam agyam faale 'unyong ashwele. Bi gyam le: "Wo Unim wò yi Usu, wò yi lè ikeb puu, wò yi gelalala, wo shi ununung. Wò yi lè há linde, wò yi 'unyin i, wo kwa ngyor igye kpamm."
66004009	Nya a na biwom binde abi bì yi biwum bı gyam agyam ipee fem Undi angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu u kwu ngyor igye ana,
66004010	na bekaandi lisi lè be bende ana be buu bishilishi usu ndor he itang mbu tim anung he itang nya he 'ushu angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu, be fe-e. Be gyam agyam le:
66004011	"Wo Unim, wò yi Usu utyan a. Wo kpè angwu lı pee-a, li fem-a, li kwa-a 'usu. Wo na wo shi biwom puu; ki shi ugim ugang a le biwom puu bì fel, bi kwu biwum."
66005001	Mi ndè Undi angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu, ù yi lè 'ushia kwu há he 'ubwo lizen. Kushia 'umen ana, be fee āhwu sho puu afung afee, be kan āhwu, be tyell āhwu ànyōng adyong-ifee.
66005002	Mi hà ndè udengell Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb kangg, u gaa kangg le: "Ayang a kpè le u bor àbi be tyell shī 'ushia ahwun he-e ù bo āhwu?"
66005003	Ki ma yi lè undi he igye i or, he 'usu behwu or, há lifung-atabe or, angwu a kpè le u buu 'ushia ana he-e ù bo āhwu ye.
66005004	Mi ma ki kangg likorye 'ì yi lè undi angwu a kpè he-e ù buu 'ushia ana bo ye.
66005005	Lè he liwu bekaandi lisi lè be bende ana, undi ken a de-m le: "Tem ki ye! Gyo, undi angwu be ko le Kugaba 'ikwu-lihwan Ujuda, u be ubu lè ha Usu Udebid ana, a hwò biwom puu. He ashin a kpè le u bor àbi be tyell āhwu ànyōng adyong-ifee ana, u buu āhwu bo."
66005006	Mi kung ndè Unwaa Utia naa gwaa lè 'idem 'usu. Biwom binde abi bì yi biwum lè bekaandi lisi lè be bende be naa kel-kel-kel fe-e he 'udyan. Utia ana a ma yi fel ná be ma bè gwu-e ngye nà. U shi lè isom idyong-ifee lè atong-shi adyong-ifee. Atong-shi ama a naa ke ikeb Ukatia Kunyong Unim idyong-ifee angi Unim a som gye mbee bipi puu he igye i.
66005007	Utia ana a ma bo lè ndaa 'ubwo kpē 'ushia ahwu 'ù yi he 'ubwo lizen undi angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu.
66005008	Nya a na a ndaa 'ubwo kpē hwu, biwom binde abi bì yi biwum lè bekaandi lisi lè be bende i be keb tim anung he itang he 'ushu Utia. Befe a puu, undi-undi a ma yi lè litung, u shi lè ukem-undor angwu be shǐ-e lè igold, u shi lè behwu abe be nung nyin. Kinung behwu ana 'i naa ke ushang angwu bendi Unim bè ke.
66005009	Befe be maa gyam 'ugyam 'ufufe le: "Wo na wo kpè le wo kpa 'ushia ana buu āhwu likorye wo na be ma gwu, wo kung anung agang a pong bendi ke Unim. Bendi abe wo pong bè yi lè he 'ikwu-lihwan 'iyang-yang, mbee igegem puu he igye i, abe be kong igie atyetye-atyetye.
66005010	Wo shi bemen abe wo pong ana be fel bendi abe be shang Unim he 'iteng-usu 'igang. Be ba fel besu a he igye anyin."
66005011	Mi mbee ndè 'iwom 'isuso, mi ndè idengell Unim i sho tim-tim-tim, sho kel-kel-kel tang 'idem 'usu or, biwom binde abi bì yi biwum or, bekaandi lisi lè be bende or, fe há 'udyan. Idengell Unim ana i go gbe aboale.
66005012	Mi gyo āngi i gyam agyam a hwaa kangg. I gyam le: "Wo Utia angwu be ma gwu na ikeb puu, kingbebb lè lishi abyele bì yi he 'ubwo 'ugang. Wo na wò yi usu puu. Wo kpè le lì fem-a, li fa-a, li pee-a."
66005013	Mi gyo abi he lifung-atabe lè abi he igye i, lè abi he 'usu behwu, lè abi he umbwo, bi gyam agyam le: "Lì pee undi angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu, lì pee Utia, lì fe be, li fem ābe. Bè ngyor kwu besu biwom puu ngyor igye kpamm."
66005014	Biwom binde abi bì yi biwum ana bi maa fel shà le: "Amen! Kì ngyor ná li kong!" Bekaandi ana be keb tim anung he itang kung ipee lè ifem puu ke angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu or, Utia or.
66006001	He 'unyong ahwun, mi ndè Unwaa Utia a bor 'ùnyōng ken lè he ànyōng adyong-ifee angi be tyell 'ushia ana. Mi kung gyo 'iwom ken lè he biwom binde abi bì yi biwum, ki kong lingmam likaa-likaa ná ìtaà. Ki de le: "Fem be he igye!"
66006002	Mi kung ndè 'ukaa-inyia 'ufung 'u fem be he igye. Undi angwu a ma pwom āhwu, a ma yi lè usinde kwu he 'ubwo, be hà kung 'ishilishi ahwele ke-e. Ufe angwu a hwò 'ukye mà, a mbee bo u la hwà 'ukye 'ususo.
66006003	Ashina 'i gbe, Utia ana a mbee bor 'ùnyōng lefee ahwu be tyell 'ushia ana. Mi gyo 'iwom lefee lè he biwom binde abi bì yi biwum 'i de le: "Fem be he igye!"
66006004	Mi ndè 'ukaa-inyia 'ususo 'u fem be he igye. Ku bung 'ubwaa-ubwaa gbuu. Undi angwu a pwom āhwu, be ke-e ikeb le ù kung ikwun lè he igye hè bendi bè ndo gwu bende. Be kung 'ashwia benyin befee ake 'akaandi ke-e.
66006005	Ashin 'i gbe, Utia ana a bor 'ùnyōng lekie ahwu be tyell 'ushia ana. Mi gyo 'iwom lekie lè he biwom binde abi bì yi biwum, ki de le: "Fem be he igye!" Mi kung ndè 'ukaa-inyia 'ùshì-ùshì 'u fem be he igye. Undi angwu a pwom āhwu a ma yi lè ugbogo kwu he 'ubwo.
66006006	Mi mbee kung gyo igie ná igie undi nà lè he liwu biwom binde abi bì yi biwum ana, i de le: "Bè fel keè ugbogo ityungkafa he únde angwu undi u shi aki kpē he liti. Bè keè igbogo igali ikie he únde angwu undi u shi aki kpē he liti. Ukpor, behwu lè 'utyuo, mà shi ābi bì baa ye."
66006007	Ashin 'i mbee gbe, Utia ana a bor 'ùnyōng lende ahwu be tyell 'ushia ana. Mi gyo 'iwom lende lè he biwom binde abi bì yi biwum, ki de le: "Fem be he igye!"
66006008	Mi kung ndè 'ukaa-inyia ahwu 'u tee felaa 'u fem be he igye. Undi angwu a ma pwom āhwu, be ko he le Lihwu. Angwu a pwom Lihwu lè he item, be ko he le Likwun. Be kung igye puu hwua akwu ande, be kung likwu ken ke Lihwu befe lè Likwun le bè gwu. Biwom abin na be kung gwu likwu ana: kùkyē, ubwaa, àngmam lè inyia ibibi.
66006009	Ashin 'i mbee gbe, Utia ana a mbee bor 'ùnyōng ledyong ahwu be tyell 'ushia ana. Mi ndè bēnyōng bendi abe be ma gwu ābe likorye be bun gboo le be bong igie Unim, be mbee bun āngi porr. Bēnyōng ana be ma yi he liten 'iteng ashi be shang Unim he lifung-atabe.
66006010	Be ma gaa kangg kong le: "Wo Atyetyan Unim angwu lì yi he 'ubwo 'ugang, wo angwu wo kong 'igyang; lì hà kwu lè 'igbe ná a, saa wo hà tang ushe bendigye abe be gwu li, ha-a à tem ābe utyang?"
66006011	Undi a kung aliga uwulu afung ke be ken-ken-ken, u de be le: "Mà mbee ngib lityam kwu he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg, likorye 'ugii bendi 'u wa sho ye. Bebwandamen besuso be teng há he itang abe be fe Ujeso abe 'ì yi le bè gwu ābe ná be gwu amen."
66006012	Ashina 'i mbee gbe, Utia ana a mbee bor 'ùnyōng ledyong-ken ahwu be tyell 'ushia ana. Mi ndè isun i kwuo. Libwee li gib fel lishi-lishi kpenn ná 'ihwom akpen; kufell 'u bel fel 'ubwaa-ubwaa gbuu ná anung.
66006013	Ikpen i mbu lè he 'usi wu be he itang ná 'ufem 'u shī well bikpukpo agbe ikwan nà.
66006014	Lifung-atabe li kan ngele-ngele-ngele ná ugaa nà, li nyong. Ikwell lè itang angi umbwo a tang kel-kel fe ngi bi gie biteng gye he biteng bisuso.
66006015	Bendi puu, besu igye or, bekaandi or, bekaandi ishogya or, bendi 'ingbebb or, besu ikeb or, ifee or, bebwaa or, be hà buu lè ndyell he ibung, be ndyell he áhwóm akor angi he ikwell.
66006016	Be kùng ko ikwell lè akor angi há le: "Mà be mbu shí li, hè men mà ndyell li, hè undi angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu ù ndě li ye, li mbee hwaa ingywo Utia,
66006017	likorye liti likaandi angi angwu a kwu he 'idem 'usu befe lè Utia be tyung ingywo ibell li fel. Yang ù nya naa mbee?"
66007001	Nyong ashina 'i mbee puu, mi ndè idengell Unim inde, i naa ken-ken-ken he bigie igye a puu binde. Angwu ken a naa lè he likwu, angwu ken u naa lè he atong angyell, angwell u naa lè he atong angi ken. I ma naa i kwun 'ufem ahwu 'u maa be lè he bigie a puu binde, le 'û shi itang or imbwo or, ìkwán or 'iwom ye.
66007002	Mi hà mbee ndè udengell Unim ususo u ba lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı fem, u shi lè 'iwom kwu he 'ubwo ashi u fe bendi ūfee Unim angwu ù yi uwum. A keb u fel gaa kangg da idengell Unim inde angi be ke ngi ikeb le ì kung 'ufem ban itang lè imbwo,
66007003	a de ngi le: "Mà naa atye. Mà wa shi itang or, imbwo or, ìkwán or 'iwom ye kpamm li fe bendi abe be fe Unim utyan ūfee uma he 'ushu."
66007004	I hà kung de-m 'ugii bendi Izwell abe be fe be ūfee umen ana mà. I de-m le bè yi bendi asi lisi 'ugbe lisi lè 'ugbe lihwo he biteng lihwo 'afee.
66007005	-
66007008	Kikwu-lihwan 'iyang-yang, be fe bendi asi lisi 'ugbe akie he biteng lihwo ūfee: Kikwu-lihwan Ujuda, bendi asi lisi 'ugbe akie he biteng lihwo. Kikwu-lihwan Uruben, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Ugad, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Asha, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Unafatali, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Unafatali, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Umanasa, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Usimiyen, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Ulibai, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Isaka, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Uzebulon, kitaa a ken, kikwu-lihwan Ujosef, kitaa a ken, lè 'ikwu-lihwan Ubenjamen, kitaa a ken.
66007009	Ashina 'i mbee gbe, mi mbee ndè bendi be go gbe aboale. Be be lè he 'ikwu-lihwan 'iyang-yang, kubong 'uyang-yang, ugugem uyang-yang lè igie iyang-yang he igye i. Be ma yi naa he 'ushu 'idem 'usu he 'ipi Unwaa Utia ana ù yi. Be ma shī aliga uwulu afung, be shi lè akikie kwu he abwo.
66007010	Befe puu be maa yal gor kong le: "Wo Unim utyan, wo angwu wò yi kwu he 'idem 'usu, men ha Unwaa Utia na ma kpan li."
66007011	Idengell Unim puu i ma naa kel-kel-kel tang 'idem 'usu or, bekaandi lisi lè be bende or, biwom binde abi bì yi biwum or fe he 'udyan. I gyebb shī he itang yal gor fem Unim,
66007012	kong le: "Wo Unim utyan, wò yi lè ikeb puu, wo shi lè ifem puu, wo shi lè lishi abyele puu. Li bong le wò yi usu puu. Li pee-a, li fem-a. Abin bì ngyor 'itel i kpamm! Amen!"
66007013	Ukaandi ken lè he bekaandi lisi lè be bende a bii mi le: "Bendi abe be shī aliga uwulu afung ana, baa ayang a? Be ba lè hung a?"
66007014	Mi fan he le: "Ukaandi, mi ngye ye, wo na wo ngye be." A kung de-m le: "Bendi aben bè yi bendi abe be kpē 'ingie ashi 'ì yi 'ikaa-ikaa, ukpor be ngyor naa genn. Be kung anung Unwaa Utia ana a to bihwom bibell taa fel kpeladadada.
66007015	He atan-lengi anwun na be naa he 'ushu 'idem 'usu Unim he ushom uma, be fe-e ishu or, kusu or. Ufe angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu, u kwa utung ha abe, u ndè gbe lè be hè 'iwom 'ì do ābe ye.
66007016	Itung or ì tem ba ndo ābe ye, umbwo or u tem ba gyor ābe ye, ishu i tem be bi ābe ye,
66007017	likorye Unwaa Utia ana angwu ù yi he 'udyan 'idem 'usu, u kam ābe, u teng ābe gye he lishi umbwo, he 'ipi umbwo angwu u ke likpan u ko. Unim u ba shell ābe àkye lè he ashi."
66008001	Nyong ashina 'i mbee gbe, mi ndè Unwaa Utia a bor 'ùnyōng ledyong-ifee ahwu be tyell 'ushia ana. Nyong a bor āhwu, atyung a kwun shangg he lifung-atabe, gbe 'anwaa 'igbe kpoo.
66008002	Mi hà ndè idengell Unim idyong-ifee ana ì yi naa he 'ushu Unim, be kung isom a idyong-ifee kung ke ngi undi-undi ken-ken-ken.
66008003	Udengell Unim ususo a be naa he 'imbe ashi be shang Unim ashi be kung igold a shi. A ma yi lè 'igbor ashi be kung igold a shì āshi kwu he 'ubwo, he 'ipi be fe behwu abe be nung nyin. Be kung behwu ana kangg ke-e, u kung ābe ipel lè ushang bendi Unim gye há 'imbe 'imen ana, ki shì he 'ushu 'idem 'usu Unim.
66008004	Udengell Unim a kung behwu ana, u gbe 'inde ting ābe, angyu a waa tyuu ipel ha ushang bendi Unim gye hwaa lè Unim.
66008005	Udengell Unim a kwuo 'inde nya 'imbe ana fe he 'igbor 'imen ana, kung bel wu be he igye. Nyong a bel wu, itaa i tye gbang-gbang-gbang; kindeb-nwaa 'i fel ndeb nwaa-nwaa-nwaa; itang i nyung ti-ti-ti.
66008006	Ashina 'i gbe, mi mbee ndè idengell Unim idyong-ifee ana, i kwu isom idyong-ifee he abwo kam agweeale.
66008007	Ukpi-ikwu udengell Unim a gwee uma. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo abo umbwo lè 'ìndē bi be bell-bell lè anung be wu he itang. Itang i ma yi he akwu akie, ìkwán i shi he akwu akie. Kìndē 'i shī dim likwu itang ken lè likwu ikwan ken gbangg. Ki shī dim abia lè bikwukwan puu.
66008008	Udengell Unim angwu lefee a gwee uma, mi ndè 'iwom 'isuso i mung ba, 'i dyam ná ukwell, kì yii mor 'ìndē gedi-gedi-gedi, be tye he umbwo ukaandi. Imbwo or, likwu ken lè he akwu akie li bel fel anung-anung borr.
66008009	Biwom puu abi bì yi he umbwo or, likwu ken lè he akwu akie li hwō. Binong lishor or, likwu ken lè he akwu akie li ban.
66008010	Udengell Unim angwu lekie a gwee uma usom. Ukpen ukaandi angwu u paa bìndē gem-gem-gem a mbu lè he 'usi be mbu he likwu umbwo ken lè he akwu akie, lè likwu lishi umbwo ken lè he akwu akie. A be mbu há kpuuwaa paa bìndē gemm.
66008011	Lizen ukpen ana lì yi le Bezu. Likwu umbwo ken lè he akwu akie li fel zwa. Bendi gbamm be ngwo-e hwō.
66008012	Udengell Unim angwu lende a gwee uma usom. Likwu ken lè he akwu akie angi libwee or, kufell or, ikpen or, li fel bin shorr. Likwu ken lè he akwu akie angi liti or, kusu or, li gye 'ifufebb kpenn.
66008013	Mi hà ndè agamafe u ndo há he 'usi lè 'ùkye he ungwu, u kong fem he igye le: "Wò'o! Wò'o! Wò'o! Kibibi 'i ba iba! Kì yi beshi-beshi kè bendi abe be be kwu hen igye nyong idengell Unim angi i teng ikie ı gwee ibell isom."
66009001	Udengell Unim angwu ledyong a gwee uma usom. Mi ndè ukpen angwu a ma mbu lè he 'usi be he itang. Be kung ukukol ke-e le ù buu ungwu lishi 'ubell angwu 'ù yi lè likel ye.
66009002	A kung ukukol buu lishi 'ubell ana. Angyu a dim be lè há kwun-kwun-kwun ná a dim nyong ūkōr u shī 'ìndē. Angyu ana a shī libwee kpemm, kifufebb 'i kung gye kpenn.
66009003	Igwom i fem lè há angyu, i shul be kpe mbee igye puu. Be ke ngi bezu abe bè yi ná àbe īnòng.
66009004	Be ke ngi ikeb le ì shì abia or, ìkwán or, bikwukwan or, he igye i 'iwom ye. Ukpor ì kee-kee shì bendi abe bè yi lè ūfee Unim he 'ushu 'ubell ye befe-befe a 'iwom.
66009005	Be ke ngi ikeb le ì teb lè bendi abena afell adyong, ukpor ì gwu ābe ye. Kutor ahwu ı be lè hwu ke be 'ù yi 'itaa ken ha ahwu īnòng.
66009006	Nya he afell adyong ana, bendi ana be ba tan lè abee kee lihwu le hè be bè waa 'inde, ukpor lihwu li ba gwa ābe ye.
66009007	Igwom imen ana ì yi ná bekaa-inyia abe be kam 'ukye nà, i shī 'iwom he lishi ná 'ishilishi usu ashi be kung igold a shi, i shi lè beshu ná bendigye.
66009008	Igil ángi i wee ná angi bengingye. Ishang ángi i nyin ná angi begaba.
66009009	I shī 'iwom he 'akem ashi be kung 'índe a shì. Abebaa ángi a bua ná ateng bekaa-inyia nyong be su lè utrok gye 'ukye.
66009010	I shi lè itell angi ı tung ná ìnòng. Itell ángi ì yi lè bezu abe be be lè 'utor ke bendi abena he afell adyong.
66009011	Undi angwu ù yi usu igwom ana na u ndè gbe lè 'ubell ahwu 'ù yi lè likel ye. He igie Ihibru, lizen lima lì yi le Abadon. He igie Igrik, lizen lima li shi le Aporliyon, ashi 'i ze le, Ùbān-ipi.
66009012	Ukpi-ikwu 'ingie 'ibibi na 'ì yi ana, bingie bibibi bi teng bifee abi bi ndo be.
66009013	Ashina 'i gbe, udengell Unim angwu ledyong-ken a gwee uma usom. Mi gyo igie lè he 'udyan 'iteng ashangale Unim ashi be kung igold a shì āshi, ki shi naa he 'ushu Unim.
66009014	Igie ana i de udengell Unim ledyong-ken angwu a ma kwu usom le: "Pell idengell inde angi be kwu tyuu gwaa lè umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Uyufretis ana tyang abwo."
66009015	Idengell inde ana, be ma kwu āngi tyuu nyong lize anyin, he i 'ufell ahwun, he i liti anyin, he i 'unyong ahwun a. Be hà pell āngi tyang abwo le ì gwu undi ken lè he bendi bekie-bekie-bekie he igye puu.
66009016	Be be lè ishogya i go 'ugii kangg, ì yi asisilisi asisilisi.
66009017	Mi ndè bekaa-inyia aben lè bendi abe be pwom ābe. Be shī bíndē he 'akem, bì yi ùnìm angwu a bung gbuu ná 'ìndē, u shi ukwun-ukwun, u shi aligem-aligem. Àshī bekaa-inyia ana a bi àngi begaba. Kìndē lè angyu lè 'inung ubi bi bé bē lè he ungwu.
66009018	Biwom bedye bikie ana, kìndē, angyu lè 'inung ubi, bi ma gwu undi ken lè he bendi bekie-bekie-bekie he igye puu.
66009019	Bekaa-inyia bè yi lè ikeb he ingwu ibell lè itell ibell. Itell ábe i shi lè àshī ná ìshiı hè ngi ì do bendi.
66009020	Mà na or, kigem bendi abe be teng àbe biwom bedye ana bi gwu ābe ye, be tyang abwo lè afele biwom abi be kung abwo abell shi ana ye, biwom ná litelakpa angi be kung igold, isiliba, upii àkór lè 'ikwán shì, bi nda or, ngwu bì gyo or, ngwu bì tan or ye. Be fa baa Usetan lè ikem.
66009021	Be tyang abwo lè bendi agwele lè isi ibibi ashele, lè akpela atanale lè 'azi azele ye.
66010001	Mi mbee ndè udengell Unim ususo angwu ù yi lè ikeb kangg, u shul ba lè he lifung-atabe. Kibu 'i shi-e he inyiahwo, u shi lè umia nii fe-e he lishi. Kushu 'uma 'u taa ná libwee, abee ama à yi lè 'ìndē ná 'ishinde.
66010002	U shi lè 'anwaa 'ushia buu kwu he 'ubwo. A be naa tem 'ubee lizen he lishor, u tem àhwu limbell he igye.
66010003	A kung lingmam gaa li fem ná angi 'ugaba. Nyong a gaa, ìtaà i tye 'ugbe adyong-ifee.
66010004	Nyong i tye, mi kung mı fee àshī mi ndè, mi gyo lingmam lè he lifung-atabe, li de le: "Ndyell àshī ìtaà i kong, fee āshī ye."
66010005	Udengell Unim angwu mi ndè a naa tem 'ubee ken he lishor, u tem àhwu ken he igye ana, a kung 'ubwo lizen tyung gye he 'usi,
66010006	kung tam le: "He lizen Unim angwu ù yi ngyor igye, angwu a shi lifung-atabe lè abi bì yi há, u shi itang lè abi bì yi hen, lè imbwo lè abi bì yi há, lì tem ban 'unyong ye.
66010007	Nyong udengell Unim ledyong-ifee u gwee uma usom na Unim u be shì biwom puu abi leěti a ma kam ndor le u ba sha nya a na a ma de abe be fe-e, be tye ugie 'isom 'ima."
66010008	Igie angi í yi bè kong ha ami lè he lifung-atabe, i mbee kong ha ami de-m le: "Te lè kpē 'ushia ahwu udengell Unim angwu a naa tem 'ubee ken he lishor, u tem àhwu ken he igye a buu kwu he 'ubwo ana."
66010009	Mi bo lè hwaa lè he, mi de-e le ù kung 'anwaa 'ushia ana ke-m. A de-m le: "Kpe hwu zī. Ku ba ban-a he lifung, mà na 'u be nyin-a he ungwu ná ìhwaà or."
66010010	Mi hà ndaa 'ubwo kpē 'anwaa 'ushia ana lè ha ahe kung fe he ungwu. Nyong mi zī, ku nyin mi he ungwu ná ìhwaà, ukpor nyong mi mbell āhwu, ku ban mi he lifung kangg.
66010011	Mi gyo igie i kong de le: "Gye 'ushu tye ugie 'isom Unim gbe lè bendi he abong atyetye-atyetye abe be kong igie atyetye-atyetye lè besu bebell."
66011001	Nyong ashin 'i mbee, undi a kung ùkwán angwu be keè biwom ke-m, a de-m le: "Bo lè keè ushom Unim, wo keè 'iteng ashi be shang Unim. Wò bo bendi abe be fe Unim nya.
66011002	Ukpor utemkung ushom Unim, tyang he, keě he ye, likorye ù yi ke bendi abe be fe Unim ye a, be ba tem abee ban ushu angwu ushom Unim ù yi, be tem ban he he afell asi afee lè ngi afee.
66011003	Mi ba som bendi befee hè be bè tye ugie 'isom Unim ati asi adyong 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'afee lè ati asi akie. Be fa bihwom akpen a."
66011004	Bendi befee ana bè yi 'itaa ken ha ìkwán ifee angi be ko le olif lè bimor-inde bifee. Ìkwán ana lè bimor-inde bì yi naa he 'ushu Unim angwu ù yi lè igye puu.
66011005	Gbe undi uyang-yang a kaà le u do bendi befee ana, kìndē 'i ba lè he ingwu ibell sha gwa bendi-linaa bebell. Kitaa ana na undi angwu a kaà le u do ābe, u hwō.
66011006	Nya he 'unyong ahwu abe be bun 'isom Unim ana bè yi lè ikeb angi be swan de umbwo le ù ndor ye, u ndor ye. Be shi lè ikeb angi be shì imbwo puu he igye i i bel fel ibwaa-ibwaa ná anung. Be mbee shi lè ikeb angi be be lè 'itaa língmām 'iyang-yang he igye i he 'unyong ahwu be kee.
66011007	Nyong 'unyong ahwu be bun 'isom Unim ana 'u mbee, kibibi inyia 'i ba fem lè he 'ubell ahwu 'ù yi lè likel ye, ki ndo ha abe, ki hwò ābe, kwu ābe gwu.
66011008	Akwom abell a ba ngyor wa he 'ukwo nya he 'ubong 'ukaandi ahwu be ma maa gwu atyabell bee he 'ikpakpaa. Kìnyìn lízen 'ubong 'ukaandi ana, kì yi le Usodem lè Igyept.
66011009	Bendi abe be be lè he 'ikwu-lihwan 'iyang-yang, mbee igegem puu he igye i, abe be kong igie atyetye-atyetye, be ba nda akwom abell ati akie lè 'igem, be ba bong le bè ngi ābe ye.
66011010	Bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin a, be ba yal gor, be shi 'ipam, be ke bende beke, likorye bendi befee abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim, abe be maa teb lè be, be hwō.
66011011	Nyong ati akie lè 'igem ana a mbee, Unim a dim 'unyong ahwu 'u ke likpan fe be, be wum, be bo 'inaa. Bendi puu abe be ndè be, 'ushell 'u kwu ābe kangg.
66011012	Bendi bemen befee ana, be gyo igie angi i be lè he lifung-atabe, i kong fem he igye kangg de be le: "Mà be he 'usi nyin!" He atong-shi bendi-linaa bebell puu, kibu 'i be shī ābe, be bo ndo he 'usi lifung-atabe.
66011013	Nya he 'unyong 'umen ana, itang i ma nyung he abwo kangg, likwu ken lè he akwu lihwo he 'ubong 'ukaandi ana li ma gyebb. Bendi asi adyong 'ugbe lihwo he biteng bidyong-ifee be ma hwō. Bendi abe be teng be ma fel lè 'ushell kangg, be keb anung he itang fe Unim angwu he lifung-atabe.
66011014	Kanaa-anaa i 'ingie 'ibibi ashi lefee 'i mbee, kingie 'ibibi ashi lekie 'i ba lè há.
66011015	Ashina 'i mbee-mbee, mi hà ndè udengell Unim angwu ledyong-ifee a gwee uma usom. Mi gyo angmam lè he lifung-atabe a gaa kangg kong le: "Atyetyan Unim befe lè Ukristi angwu a som be he igye anyin, be kpe kung 'usu igye anyin. Ufe na a fel Usu ngyor igye kpam-kpam-kpam."
66011016	Bekaandi lisi lè be bende abe be kwu he bidem 'usu bibell he 'ushu Unim, be keb lè 'ushu 'ubell kpi he itang fe Unim.
66011017	Be de le: "Wo Atyetyan Unim, ikeb puu ì yi he 'ubwo 'ugang a, wò yi kung lè há linde, wo shi 'unyin i! Li pee-a likorye wo tem lè ikeb igang angi i hwò puu kpe kung tem fel usu.
66011018	Bendi abe be fa-a ye, be maā gbel fa-a, Ukpor 'ùnyong 'u fel ahwu, wo Unim or, wo ngywo fe be, wo mbee tang ushe bebell abe be hwō. Kunyong 'u fel ahwu wo gwu nim ūbū bendi abe be ban igye. Kunyong 'u mbee fel ahwu wo shi 'inunung ha abe be tye ugie 'isom 'igang lè bendi begang puu abe be shell-a, be fa-a, mà abe gbel or, abe 'isun or."
66011019	Lìshì ushom Unim he lifung-atabe li ma buu, mi ndè Kakpa Ukyebb Unim ha afee ushom. Kindeb-nwaa 'i fel ndeb nwaa-nwaa-nwaa, itaa i tye gbang-gbang-gbang, itang i nyung ti-ti-ti, abo umbwo akaandi a wu kputu-kputu-kputu.
66012001	Mi hà ndè 'ikaa 'iwom 'i fem há he lifung-atabe. Mi ndè ungingye ususo a shī libwee ùkyèkyè aliga, u shì naa he 'ufell, u shī ikpen lihwo lè ngi ifee he líshī ukyekye 'ishilishi ahwele.
66012002	A maa sha uzwaa, u ki kangg likorye uzwaa u tor he.
66012003	Mi mbee ndè 'ikaa 'iwom 'isuso 'i mbee fem há he lifung-atabe. Mi ndè 'ibibi ushii 'ibwaa-ibwaa, kì yi 'ushell-ushell. Kì shi lè àshī adyong-ifee, ki mbi isom lihwo, ki shī 'ishilishi usu he líshī liyang-yang.
66012004	Ki kung utell áshi nyii likwu ikpen ken lè he akwu akie há he lifung-atabe wu be he igye. Ùshiı ana a bel lè naa he 'ushu ungingye angwu u shi uzwaa ana, kwu u nyong le ù hwan he-e ù kung unwaa mbell.
66012005	Ungingye ana a kung unwaa ungikye hwan, angwu ù fel usu igegem puu he igye i, u kwa utyuu usu he 'ubwo angwu be kung 'índe a shi-e, teng igye puu he ikeb-ikeb. Nyong unwaa ana a shul-shul, be tim kung he buu lè he lè hwaa lè Unim he 'ipi a kwu he 'idem 'usu 'ima.
66012006	Angwu ungingye a tie bo 'inaa buu gye he 'igbaa-libeb. Nya na Unim a kam 'iteng ndor he, he 'ipi be ndè gbe lè he ati asi adyong 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'afee lè ati asi akie.
66012007	Kùkyē 'u hà kung beb há he lifung-atabe. Umaikell, usu idengell Unim, lè idengell Unim angi i teng i ndo ha ùshiı ana. Ùshiı lè ima idengell be ndo ha baà Umaikell,
66012008	ukpor baà Umaikell be ma hwò ābe. Be tem bong ùshiı ana lè 'ubwo bendi bema le bè gye 'ushu kwu há lifung-atabe ye.
