66012009	Be ma kwu ābe nyii lè há lifung-atabe gin be hen igye. Ùshiı ubibi ubwaa-ubwaa ana na ù yi ùshiı utim angwu lizen lima lì yi le Usetan, usu bibibi puu. Ufe na a lam igye puu.
66012010	Mi kung gyo lingmam lè he lifung-atabe, li gaa kangg de le: "Unim utyan a hwò 'ukye! Bendi puu be fel nda ikeb Kusu 'uma, be ndè ikeb Ujeso Ukristi angwu Unim a som. Usetan angwu leěti a maa naa he 'ushu Unim ishu or, kusu or, bun de Unim biban bebwandatyan, be nyii he lè hen tye gye he igye.
66012011	Gbe he anung Unwaa Utia lè 'isom Ujeso ashi be bun na be hwo-e. Be ma kam le lihwu or, be hwa he 'uhwo ashi.
66012012	Igor ì kwu he lifung-atabe, men abe mà yi há, mà yal gor lè ububo he ungwu! Ukpor igye lè imbwo, ayuo! Beshi-beshi lè men, likorye Usetan a fel ha amen há. Ù yi lè ingywo kangg likorye a ngye le 'unyong 'uma 'u teng zangg a."
66012013	Nyong ushii ana a ndè le be ndó he lè he lifung-atabe tyang be he igye, a keb u fel ndeb lè ungingye angwu a ma hwan unwaa ungikye ana.
66012014	Ukpor be ma ke ungingye ana abebaa agamafe ukaandi afee he-e ù ndo hwaā ùshiı ana gye he 'iteng 'ima he 'igbaa-libeb, he 'ipi be lè ndè gbe lè he aze akie lè afell adyong-ken.
66012015	Ùshiı ana a faā umbwo kangg wu pwom he lè he item le hè umbwo ù ko kung he.
66012016	Ukpor itang i kpe ungingye ana tyang, i ging uhwuu kpē kung umbwo angwu ùshiı a faa fe gye he itang.
66012017	He ashina, ùshiı a ma fel lè ingywo fe ungingye ana kangg, a mà bo u la ndo 'ukye ha igia ima angi i teng, angi ì yi bendi abe be shi igie Unim, be kpē ashi Ujeso a de be.
66012018	Ùshiı ana a lè naa he ungwu lishor.
66013001	Ashina 'i gbe, mi hà ndè 'ibibi inyia, kì yi 'ushell-ushell, ki fem ba lè he umbwo ukaandi. Kì yi lè àshī adyong-ifee, ki mbi isom lihwo. Ki shī 'ishilishi usu he usom uyang-yang, be fee lizen ibia angi lı bia Unim fe shi he líshī liyang-yang.
66013002	Inyia ana i bi ùkpòng, abee ángi a dyam ná angi inyia angi be ko le ubeya, ungwu ángi u shi ná angwu 'ugaba. Ùshiı ana a kung 'usu 'uma lè ikeb ima ná angi ufe-gyang ù yi lè ngi ke inyia imen ana.
66013003	Inyia ana, be nem āngi he líshī ken, ki go kangg fel ná i la hwa or, ukpor 'i tem bi. Ki ma kwu bendi he igye i puu he 'uhwo gbe lè inyia ana, be ti kwuo pwom āngi.
66013004	Bendi puu be ma fe ùshiı or, likorye a ke inyia ana ikeb ima, be fēm inyia kong le: "Ayang a dyam bizang ha inyia anyin? Ayang ù nya mbe lityam naa ndo ha angi?"
66013005	Be ma ke ngi ikeb porr le ì kong 'ugwu, i kong bia Unim; be mbee ke ngi ikeb porr le ì zī 'usu afell asi afee lè ngi afee.
66013006	Inyia ana i keb i kong bia Unim, i bia lizen lima, i bia ushu uma, i bia bendi puu abe bè yi há lifung-atabe.
66013007	Be ma mbee ke ngi ikeb le ì ndo 'ukye ha bendi Unim, i hwò ābe. Be ke ngi ikeb le ì fel usu ugugem uyang-yang, kubong 'uyang-yang lè igie iyang-yang he igye i.
66013008	Bendi puu abe bè yi he igye i be ba fa inyia ana, kee-kee teng àbe leěti be ma fee azen abell fe he 'ushia Unwaa Utia angwu be ma gwu. Leěti, mà ukpong Unim u hà shì igye anyin, be ma fee azen abell fe he 'ushia azen bendi abe bè yi lè likpan 'unyong.
66013009	"Undi angwu ù yi lè 'utyung 'igyo, ù gyo igie anyin!
66013010	Undi angwu 'i fee ndor he le ù fel hē līfee, u ba kwa hē līfee kpe-kpe-kpe. Undi angwu 'i fee ndor he le u ba hwa he 'ashwia a, u ba hwa nya 'ashwia kpe-kpe-kpe. Kì yi le bendi Unim bè ngyor naa genn, be gye 'ushu fe lityam ha Unim."
66013011	Mi mbee ndè 'ibibi inyia 'isuso, ki fem be lè he itang. Ki mbi isom ifee ná unwaa utia, ki kong igie ife ná angi ushiı ana.
66013012	Ki kung ikeb àngi ukpi-ikwu inyia, shì biwom he ashi ukpi-ikwu inyia, ki shì igye puu lè bendi abe bè yi hen be fe ukpi-ikwu inyia angi be nèm 'i go kangg, ukpor 'i bi ana.
66013013	Ki shì bikwele-uhwo gbamm, ki shi 'ìndē or 'i be lè he lifung-atabe be he itang he ashi bendi.
66013014	Gbe he bikwele-uhwo abi be ma ke inyia ana ikeb le ì shì he ashi ukpi-ikwu inyia, i lam bendi puu abe bè yi he igye i. I de be le bè shì 'atelakpa ná ukpi-ikwu inyia angi be ma kpi nem āngi he líshī, ukpor ì so iwum ana.
66013015	Be ma mbee ke ngi ikeb le ì shì 'atelakpa ana 'à dim 'unyong le hè ke 'à fel kong likong mbee. Be mbee bong āke le 'à ke ikeb le bè gwu bendi puu abe be bong fe 'atelakpa ana ye.
66013016	I som bendi le bè lè fe bendi ūfee. Gbe be fé be he 'ubwo lizen a ye, bè fé be he 'ushu. Be fe bekaandi or, bebwani or, bendi-ingbebb or, bendi-likaa or, ifee or, bebwaa or.
66013017	Undi uyang-yang angwu a bong fe ūfee ana ye, be bong he ù ndyebb 'iwom or, ngwu ù ndyebb zi or ye. Ūfee ana ù yi lizen, u shi ubo ukpi-ikwu inyia.
66013018	Kì yi le bendi bè ngye 'ikwu ashin. Undi uyang-yang angwu a bi lishi, u ngya likpe ubo ukpi-ikwu inyia. Ubo ana a naa ke undigye a, ù yi le, asi adyong 'ugbe 'adyong-ken lè lihwo 'ugbe 'adyong-ken lè 'adyong-ken (666).
66014001	Nyong ashin 'i gbe, mi ndè 'iwom 'isuso. Mi ndè Unwaa Utia ù yi naa he ukwell Uzayon. Mi ndè bendi puu abe be fee lizen lima lè angi Atyam fe be he 'ushu naa ipel ha ahe há. Bè yi asi lisi 'ugbe lisi lè 'ugbe lihwo he biteng lihwo 'afee.
66014002	Mi gyo 'ugyam lè he lifung-atabe 'u kwom 'ihwee ná 'ipuupuu umbwo, ku nem ateng ná ìtaà, ku nyin he 'utyung ná litung.
66014003	Bendi abena bè yi naa he 'ushu 'idem 'usu Unim, lè biwom binde abi bì yi biwum lè bekaandi lisi lè be bende, be gyam 'ugyam 'ufufe. Kì yi lè undi angwu u hwua ngye 'ugyam 'umen ana ye, kee-kee kwom ha abe asi lisi 'ugbe lisi lè 'ugbe lihwo he biteng lihwo 'afee, abe Unwaa Utia a pong.
66014004	Be kee-kee pwom Unwaa Utia ana ufe-ufe a, be wa gbe ipel ha undi ngye ye. Be tan utung ha Unwaa Utia gya he 'iteng 'iyang-yang ashi u gye. Aben na Unwaa Utia a pong, u shi ābe be fel ta-ta ke Unim lè 'uhwo-ma.
66014005	Kì yi lè uman he ungwu ubell ye, bè yi faale uben.
66014006	Mi hà mbee ndè udengell Unim ususo u ndo ha 'usi. U bun 'isom 'inunung Unim ashi ı ngyor igye da abong ayang-yang, bikwu-lihwan biyang-yang, igie iyang-yang, lè bendi beyang-yang he igye i.
66014007	U bun fem he igye gboo de le: "Mà shell Unim, ma pee he, likorye 'unyong ahwu u tang bendi ushe 'u fel. He ashin mà fe Unim angwu a shi lifung-atabe lè itang lè imbwo lè àshī imbwo."
66014008	Udengell Unim angwu lefee a be, u kong le: "Ubabilon, kubong 'ukaandi 'u mbu, kima 'i mbee. Ku teng bendi puu gye he ibwom atanale akpela utung ha 'uhwo-bell."
66014009	Udengell Unim angwu lekie a be, u kong fem he igye gboo le: "Undi uyang-yang angwu a fē inyia, lè 'atelakpa 'ama, u bong be fe-e ūfee inyia ana, mà he 'ushu or, mà he 'ubwo or,
66014010	ingywo Unim angi ı shī i ba hwaa lè he. Kingie ashi u kpē 'i kwa 'ikaa-ikaa ná 'utyuo ahwu 'ukaa-ukaa, u kpa āshi kpe-kpe-kpe, u hwaa āshi ye. Be ba kung 'ìndē lè ubi ka he 'ingie he 'ushu idengell Unim lè Unwaa Utia uma.
66014011	Angyu 'inde ashi be ke he 'ingie a ngyor ngib kpamm ngyor igye. Kitaa ana na bendi abe be fē inyia lè 'atelakpa 'ama, be bong fē ūfee lizen lima, be be kwu lè 'ùnyōng 'ūnyōng ashwele ye, ishu or, kusu or."
66014012	Kì yi le bendi Unim bè ngyor naa genn, be ndor iten ima, be bong ha Ujeso.
66014013	Mi gyo igie lè he lifung-atabe i de le: "Fee ashin, kung lè he liti angi 'unyin gye 'ushu, bendi puu abe be fel hwō le bwo be bong ha Atyetyan Ujeso, ki kwun ābe he 'uhwo." Ukatia Kunyong Unim a bong, u de le: "Kì yi ná, ki kwun ābe he 'uhwo, likorye aki akaandi abell a mbee. Ki fel le bè sho 'unyong. Be kpē 'uke he biwom abi be shì."
66014014	Ashin 'i gbe, mi kung ndè 'ibu 'ifung. Kiwom ashi 'i kwu nya he 'ibu 'i bi undigye. Ki shī 'ishilishi usu ashi be kung igold a shì āshi, ki shì lè 'andi bikwukwan atamale ake 'a nyin kwu he 'ubwo.
66014015	Udengell Unim ususo a hà fem be lè he ushom Unim, a ko de undi angwu a kwu he 'ibu le: "Bikwukwan bi bi, kùnyong 'u fel ahwu be tam ābi, kung 'andi 'agang ndo lè tam ābi."
66014016	He ashin a kung 'andi 'ama mbu há igye. A tam bikwukwan puu he igye.
66014017	Mi mbee ndè udengell Unim ususo a fem be lè he ushom Unim he lifung-atabe. Ufe or ù yi lè 'andi bikwukwan atamale ake 'a nyin.
66014018	Udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè 'ìndē he 'imbe ashi be shang Unim, a fem be lè nya, u ko da angwu a kwu 'andi bikwukwan atamale le: "Ndè, ìkwán angi ı wum agbe angi be ko le igrep i bung. Kung 'andi 'agang ndo lè kpi tang āngi he angyo-angyo, wo gbong āngi."
66014019	He ashin udengell Unim ana a mà kung 'andi 'ama mbu he igye keb āngi ashebbale tang, u kwuo āngi lè fe he 'ania he 'ipi be shor shwie kung udung. Kania ana 'à yi he igye a; kà yi he 'ubong Unim a ye. Kania ana 'a naa ke ingywo Unim a. Be shor agbe ikwan ana nya he 'ania, anung a ko lè há gbung-gbung-gbung ná bekuko umbwo, a sho be he 'usi abee adyong, a ko lè wu ilamba asi lihwo.
66015001	Mi hà mbee ndè 'iwom 'isuso hen 'usi 'i kwu he 'uhwo, kì yi lè 'itaa be kong ye. Mi ndè idengell Unim idyong-ifee i be lè bingie bibibi bidyong-ifee. Bingie bibibi abin na bì yi umbee-likel ingywo Unim.
66015002	Mi kung ndè 'iwom ná 'idyeshor tyung. Kì yi ná be kung 'inde-ushu a shì āshī, ki shi bell-bell pel ha 'índe. Bendi abe be hwò inyia ana, be hwò inyia ana, be hwò 'atelakpa ángi, be hwò ubo ángi, be ma yi naa gwaa nya he umbwo, be shi lè atung angi Unim a ke be kwu he abwo.
66015003	Be gyam 'ugyam Umosis angwu a shi aki Unim lè ahwu Unwaa Utia, be gyam le: "Wo Atyetyan Unim, ikeb igang i hwò puu! Biwom abi wo shi bi dyam, bi kwu he 'uhwo! Wo na wò yi Usu abong puu he igye i. Biwom abi wo shi bì yi 'igyang, wo tang ushe he bilebale ye.
66015004	Atyetyan, ayang ù nya shell-a ye? Ayang ù nya fem-a ye? Wo-wo na wò kee-kee yi Unim. Bendi abong puu be ba fa-a, likorye be ndè le wo shi biwom puu bì yi faale ungwu atimale."
66015005	Nyong ashina 'i gbe, mi ndè 'iteng he lifung-atabe ashi 'ì yi ta-ta ke Unim he 'ubuu ahwu 'u tyung le Unim ù yi nya. Kiteng 'imen ana 'i buu,
66015006	idengell Unim idyong-ifee angi ì yi lè bingie bibibi bidyong-ifee i fem be he igye. I shī bihwom bifung abi bı taa, i shi lè ikwob angi be shì āngi lè igold bua he anyong.
66015007	Kiwom ken lè he biwom binde abi bì yi biwum, ki be lè ikem-undor idyong-ifee angi be shi āngi lè igold, be ke idengell Unim idyong-ifee. Ukem-undor uyang-yang u shi sho lè ingywo Unim angwu ù yi ngyor igye kpamm.
66015008	Ifem Unim lè ikeb ima bi sho nya he 'ipi Unim ù yi ná angyu. Undi a maa gya há afee mbee ye, kpamm bingie bibibi abi idengell Unim idyong-ifee i maa be lè bi bi gbe shi.
66016001	Nyong ashina 'i mbee, mi kung gyo lingmam lè he 'ipi Unim ù yi, li kong fem he igye gboo de idengell Unim idyong-ifee le: "Mà ndo lè bel ingywo Unim angi ì yi he ikem-undor idyong-ifee ana wu he igye anyin."
66016002	He ashina, ukpi-ikwu udengell Unim a bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu be he itang. Bendi puu abe be ma bong fe ūfee inyia ana lè abe be fe 'atelakpa inyia, bibaa bibibi bi gbel ābe àshì pwob-pwob-pwob.
66016003	Udengell Unim angwu lefee a hà bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu he umbwo ukaandi. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo umbwo u bel fel ná anung ūndì angwu a hwō. Biwom biwum abi bì yi he umbwo bi hwō puu.
66016004	Udengell Unim angwu lekie a hà bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu he imbwo lè àshī imbwo, imbwo puu i bel fel anung-anung.
66016005	Mi gyo udengell Unim angwu u ndè gbe lè imbwo a de le: "Wo undi angwu wo-wō na wò kee-kee yi Unim. Wò yi lè há linde, wo shi 'unyin i. Wo tang ushe dell-dell.
66016006	Bendi abe be ma gwu bendi begang wu anung, be gwu abe be maa tye ugie 'isom 'igang wu anung, wo or wo ke be anung le bè ngwo; kingie ashin 'i keè nya."
66016007	Mi kung gyo igie lè he 'imbe ashi be shang Unim i bong de le: "Eng-heng! Wo Atyetyan Unim, wò yi lè ikeb hwò puu. Wo tang ushe he 'igyang, wo tang liketye ye."
66016008	Udengell Unim angwu lende a hà bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu he libwee. Be ke libwee ikeb le lì shī ná 'ìndē, li shī bendi be fel kolo-kolo-kolo.
66016009	Ukpor àshī le bè tyang abwo lè bibibi ashele kung ipee ke Unim, be tem fel kong bia he ufe angwu bingie bibibi abina bì yi he 'ubwo 'uma.
66016010	Udengell Unim angwu ledyong a hà bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu he 'idem 'usu inyia ana. Kifufebb 'i ma gye a kpenn kpe mbee 'iteng ashi inyia ì yi usu ana puu. Kutor 'u tor ābe, be naa lè ishang ngmam lìbell líbēll.
66016011	Ukpor àshī le bè tyang abwo lè bibibi ashele, be tem fel kong bia Unim angwu há lifung-atabe he 'uhwo bingie lè bibaa abi bı tor ābe.
66016012	Udengell Unim angwu ledyong-ken a hà bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu he umbwo ukaandi angwu be ko le Uyufretis. Nya 'ukwo-ukwo umbwo a nyung gogololoo, le hè 'ukwo 'ù buu ndor besu abe be be lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı fem.
66016013	Mi kung ndè ikeb ibibi ikie angi i bi bishor. I fem ba lè he ungwu ūshiı ana, i be lè he ungwu inyia ibibi ana, i be lè he ungwu undi-uman angwu u kung 'uhwo-ma le u tya ugie 'isom Unim.
66016014	Ikeb ibibi ikie ana ì yi idengell Usetan a, i shi bikwele-uhwo. I bo gye mbee igegem puu he igye i hè ngi ì lè gbong besu igye ukem kwu nyong 'ukye he Liti likaandi angi Unim ikeb puu u be tyung ikeb ima.
66016015	Ujeso a de le: "Mà gyo! Mi tya imbul ba nya a na uzi a. Ki ba kwa 'inunung ka bendi abe be kam kwu be kang, be kam aliga abell a nim ye, hè be bè be tan libong ye, ishwia or i be shi ābe ye."
66016016	Ikeb ibibi ikie ana i gbong besu he igye i puu ukem he 'iteng ashi be ko he igie Ihibru le Amagedon.
66016017	Udengell Unim angwu ledyong-ifee a hà bel àshī 'ì yi he uma ukem-undor wu he 'ufem. Mi kung gyo lingmam li gaa lè he 'idem 'usu Unim he ushom Unim de le: "Ki mbee!"
66016018	Kindeb-nwaa 'i ndeb, ìtaà i tye, itang i nyung he abwo kangg. Bwo undigye a fem, i bè nyung àshi 'ibibi-ibibi 'itaa ana ye.
66016019	Kubong 'ukaandi ahwuna, uhwuu a ma ging tang āhwu he akwu akie. Abong puu he igye i a paa. He 'ukwo ahwun na Unim a ma well 'ubong 'ukaandi ahwu be ko le Ubabilon, u shì āhwu 'u ngye ingywo ima mbee akekel ángi puu. A shì āhwu 'u kpē mbee 'ingie 'ikaa-ikaa ana nya a na be kwu undi u ngwo mbee ugbaala 'utyuo 'ukaa-ukaa a.
66016020	Itang puu angi umbwo a kaa āngi fe he 'udyan, mbee lè ikwell puu bi nyòng.
66016021	Abo umbwo akaandi a be lè he lifung-atabe ti kpe bendi shī he itang. Libo umbwo liyang-yang li ngbebb ná igaa bendo ifee. Bendi be kong bia Unim he 'uhwo bingie bibibi abi abo umbwo a be lè bi ke be.
66017001	Ashin 'i mbee gbe, mi hà mbee ndè udengell Unim ken lè he liwu idengell Unim idyong-ifee angi i ma yi lè ikem-undor idyong-ifee, a be de-m le: "Be, mî tyung-a ná usu akpela ana u be kpē 'ingie, ufe a naa ke 'ubong ahwu be tye gwaa ha umbwo ukaandi.
66017002	Besu igye anyin be gbe ipel ha ahe, bendi abe bè yi ke igye anyin or be fel he ibwom akpela atanale ná bendi abe 'utyuo 'u bwom ābe."
66017003	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a hà be shí-m kpemm, udengell Unim u kpe-m gbe lè mi he 'igbaa-libeb. Nya na mi ndè ungingye kwu he item inyia angi ì yi ibwaa-ibwaa gbuu. Inyia ana, be fee azen abibi angi a bia Unim fe ngi mbee inyiahwo puu. Ì yi lè àshī adyong-ifee, i mbi isom lihwo.
66017004	Angwu ungingye ufe, a bwee idem kangg, u fe 'ihwom 'ibwaa ashi ùnìm áshi u taa, u fe biwell-atyung lè inwaa-ashor umbell abi be kung igold a shì, u fe ukpana he umbell, u kwu ugbaala he 'ubwo angwu be shi-e he igold. Ugbaala ana, biwom abi bi sho há bì yi abel-abel.
66017005	Be fee 'ìnyìn lízen fe-e he 'ushu, lì yi le: "Ubabilon 'ubong 'ukaandi, usu akpela lè usu biwom bibibi puu he igye i."
66017006	Mi ndè ungingye ana u ngwa anung bendi Unim, mbee-mbee lè angi bendi abe be hwō he 'uhwo Ujeso. A ngwo āngi kpamm fel he ibwom. Nyong mi nde-e, ki kwu-m he 'uhwo kangg.
66017007	Udengell Unim a kung bii mi le: "Kibang a, 'ı kwa-a he 'uhwo? Ndor mî da-a 'iwom gbe lè ungingye ana lè inyia ibibi angi i kung he, angi ì yi lè àshī adyong-ifee, i mbi isom lihwo.
66017008	Inyia angi wo ndè ana, i ma yi iwum, ukpor 'unyin i ì tem yi iwum ye. I la ndo fem ba lè he 'ubell ahwu 'ù yi lè likel ye, hè ngi ì gye he 'iteng ashi be mbee lè ngi gbang-gbang. Bendigye abe kung lè há linde nyong Unim a shi igye be ma yi lè azen he 'ushia azen bendi abe bè yi lè likpan ana ye, ki ba kwa ābe he 'uhwo lè inyia ana kangg, likorye leěti i ma yi iwum, kunyin i ì tem yi iwum ye, ukpor i tem ba fem.
66017009	"Ndor mî shì ashin 'ì nung bendi. Àshī adyong-ifee ana a naa ke ikwell idyong-ifee angi ungingye ana ù yi kwu, a mbee naa ke besu bedyong-ifee.
66017010	Besu abe bedyong, kusu 'ubell 'u mbee; angwu ledyong-ken ù so usu; angwu ledyong-ifee a wa be ye. Nyong u be be, kusu 'uma 'u kwa he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg a.
66017011	Inyia ibibi angi leěti i ma yi iwum, ukpor ì tem yi iwum ye ana, ì yi usu angwu ledyong-ikie, i shi hé líkwu besu bedyong-ifee ana. Undi u ba mbee lè ngi.
66017012	"Isom lihwo angi wo ndè, i naa ke besu lihwo abe be wa kwu ābe 'usu ye. Ukpor be ba kwa besu ipel ha inyia ibibi ana he awa ken.
66017013	Besu lihwo aben bè yi ungwu ken, be kung ikeb lè 'usu 'ubell ka inyia ana.
66017014	Be ba la ndo 'ukye ha Unwaa Utia, ukpor Utia ana u hwà ābe, likorye ufe ù yi Usu besu, u shi Atyam bekaandi puu. Bendi abe a gia kung, be fe-e lityam ken, be ba kwa lè abwo ipel ha ahe he ahwele."
66017015	Udengell Unim ana a gye 'ushu de-m le: "Umbwo ukaandi angwu wo ndè usu akpela ù yi kwu há ana, a naa ke awu bendi he abong puu, he ugugem uyang-yang he igye i.
66017016	Isom lihwo angi wo ndè i naa ke besu lihwo ana, be ba naa ùtén ken ha inyia ana tel usu akpela. Be kpa kung biwom bima tyǎng he abubwo, be pell he tyang uten-ibong, be zī inyia ima, be ting 'ìndē shī 'igem 'ima ashi 'i teng.
66017017	Unim na a shì ābe le bè kwu ungwu ken, be kung ikeb lè 'usu 'ubell ke inyia ana, le hè be bè shi ashi ufe Unim a kam, hè 'ì ngyor ná ufe a kong.
66017018	"He 'ukwo ahwun na ungingye umen wo ndè ana a naa ke 'ubong 'ukaandi ahwu besu igye puu bè yi he 'ubwo 'ubell."
66018001	Nyong ashina 'i gbe, mi ndè udengell Unim ususo u shul lè he lifung-atabe ba he itang. Ù yi lè ikeb angi i dyam, u taa kangg le 'i kung he igye i gboo.
66018002	A kung ikeb ima puu gaa kong le: "Wò'o! Wò'o! Ubabilon, kubong 'ukaandi 'u mbu, kima 'i mbee. Ku fel bíshií-bíshií, ku fel ushu ihwutang, ikeb ibibi, bipuuzabung, bikung lè bibibi biwom puu.
66018003	Bendi abong puu be ngwo 'utyuo 'uma ahwu 'ù yi akpela atanale ipel ha ahe. Besu puu be gbe ipel ha usu akpela umen angwu ù yi 'ubong Ubabilon ana. Bendi-ushi be fel mbu 'ingbebb likorye ù yi lè 'igyor biwom igye kangg."
66018004	Mi mbee gyo igie isuso lè he lifung-atabe i de le: "Men bendi begi, mà buù ungingye ana lè he 'uhwo! Gbe ma shi ná ye, ma gba lè abwo fa he biban bima, ma kpē 'ingie utung ha ahe.
66018005	Le bwo biban bima bi sho ukong-ukong lè wu he lifung-atabe, Unim a naa lityam biban bima ye.
66018006	Bibibi abi a shi bì tem be so-e ufe-gyang he lishi. Bingie abi a be lè bi ke bendi, bì tem so-e ufe-gyang he lishi gbe gyong abi a shi 'ugbe 'afee. Mà ke-e 'utyuo 'ubibi ù ngwo àhwu 'u ban hwò ahwu ufe a maa ke bendi 'ugbe 'afee.
66018007	Nya a na ufe a dyam 'uhwo-ma, u kung àshì ama ndor he bigyor biwom igye, men or mà ke-e 'ingie lè akpen abi bi keè he bibibi bima. He idim u gim he lityam le, 'Mì yi usu a, mì yi ungye-uhwuu a ye, mì hà ndo fa akpen ye.'
66018008	Ukpor, kutor, kingie, lingmam, ubwaa, abin puu bi ba hwaa lè he nya a liti ken. Kìndē or 'i shá he nya liti limen ana, likorye Atyetyan Unim angwu a tang ushe uma, ù yi lè ikeb kangg."
66018009	Besu igye abe be maa tan ha ahe, be kwu ukem ha ahe zī igye fe he 'uhwo, be ba swa abwo he lishi kya nyong be ndè angyu 'índe ashi 'ı shí-e.
66018010	Be fel ba naa 'igbe-igbe, likorye be shell 'ingie 'ima, be de le: "Wò'o, Ubabilon, kubong 'ukaandi, beshi-beshi lè wo, kingie 'i be hwaa lè wo nya a 'ugbe ken."
66018011	Bendi-ūshī or, be ba swa abwo he lishi kya, be fe akpen, likorye 'ì tem yi lè undi angwu u ndyebb ābe biwom ye.
66018012	Azen biwom ūshī bibell i: igold, isiliba, ukpana, bihwom binunung he īnìm atyetye-atyetye ná ijorge lè ibellbeti lè ilesi lè ishiliki; lè ìkwán inunung ná liswa lè iloko lè eboni; biwom abi be kung ishang uto lè eboni tan; biwom abi be kung upii lè bínde atyetye-atyetye lè 'ukor 'ununung shi;
66018013	behwu abe be nung nyin ná itelali lè isinamon lè umuru lè ifrankinsens; kutyuo lè behwu azēle, lè ikwul lè umuu ikwul; bigundu, ìtiā, bekaa-inyia, itrok lè ìfeè. Biwom abin puu bi ngyor. Kì tem yi lè undi angwu u ndyebb ābe ábi ye.
66018014	Bendi-ūshī ana be de 'ubong ana le: "Biwom abi wo maa ndor àshì bi mbee; bingbebb lè binunung bigang bi mbee. Wò hà tem ndo nda ābi ye."
66018015	Bendi-ūshī bemen ana abe be ndyebb biwom abina zī mbu 'ingbebb, be fel ba naa 'igbe-igbe likorye be shell 'ingie 'ima. Be ba swa abwo he lishi kùng le:
66018016	"Wò'o, beshi-beshi lè 'ubong 'ukaandi ana! Kù yi ná ungingye angwu a bwee idem kangg, u fe bihwom binunung abi bifung or, bibwaa or, u fe biwom abi be shì lè igold, u fe ukpana he umbell.
66018017	Nya a 'ugbe ken bingbebb bima puu bi mbee!" Bekaandi binong lishor puu, bendi abe be gye litan he binong lishor puu lè bendi puu abe be shi aki he binong lishor, befe or be ba naa 'igbe-igbe.
66018018	Be ndè angyu 'inde ashi 'ı shī 'ubong ahwuna, be kùng kangg le: "Bwo ukong-ukong 'ì bè yi lè 'ubong ahwu 'u dyam ná ahwun ye."
66018019	Be bè atyung kem wu 'uhwo-bell mbee lìshī, be kùng le: "Wò'o! Wò'o! Wò'o! Beshi-beshi lè 'ubong 'ukaandi ahwun. Lè he 'ingbebb áhwu na bendi abe bè yi lè binong lishor be be lè bingbebb bibell. Ukpor he awa ken, kubong 'u fel bíshií-bíshií!"
66018020	Men bendi puu abe he lifung-atabe, mà yal gor; men bebwaa-isom Ujeso lè bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim lè bendi Unim puu, mà yal gor, likorye Unim a ke hwu 'ingie he 'ibibi ashi 'u shi ha amen.
66018021	Udengell Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb kangg a ndaa kung 'ukor ahwu 'u dyam ná 'ukor bikuko maa tye he umbwo, a kung de le: "Kitaa i na be be kpam ti Ubabilon 'ubong 'ukaandi. Umbee-likel áhwu ana.
66018022	Nya he 'ubong 'umen i, bendi abe be kem atung be tem teng nya ye, abe be gyam agyam be teng nya ye, abe be gwee ipipi be teng nya ye, abe be gwee isom be teng nya ye, abe bè yi lè abwo aki be teng nya ye. Undi ù tem ba gyo ukpee nya ye.
66018023	Kimor-inde or 'ì tem ba taa lè nya ye. Kì tem ba kwa lè libee nya ye. Leěti, bendi-ūshī 'ubong ahwun na be ma yi besu 'ingbebb he igye i puu, ukpor Unim a kpam tye hwu likorye 'u shì isi ibibi lam bendi he abong puu he igye i.
66018024	Anung bendi abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim lè anung bendi Unim puu abe be gwu he igye i à yi he líshī áhwu."
66019001	Nyong ashina 'i mbee, mi gyo 'iwom ná igie liwu bendi angi li dyam he lifung-atabe, be gaa kangg le: "Aleluya! Ipee ì kwu ke Unim. Unim na a kpan li, ù yi lè ikeb hwò puu, ifem ì kwu ke-e.
66019002	U tang ushe he 'igyang, u tang ushe he 'ilebale ye. A tang ushe usu akpela, a ke-e libi likorye akpela ama a ban igye. Unim a ke-e 'ingie tyang lishi bendi bema abe a gwu."
66019003	Be mbee gaa le: "Aleluya! Ipee ì kwu ke Unim. Angyu 'inde ashi 'ı shī dim āhwu a dim ngyor igye."
66019004	Bekaandi lisi lè be bende or, biwom binde abi bì yi biwum or, be gyebb shī he itang fem Unim angwu ù yi kwu he 'idem 'usu kong le: "Kì yi 'igyang! Amen! Aleluya! Ipee 'ì kwu ke Unim."
66019005	Mi hà gyo igie i be lè he 'idem 'usu Unim, i de le: "Men bendi aki Unim puu abe ma shell he, mà bekaandi or, mà bebwani or, mà pee Unim utyan."
66019006	Mi mbee kung gyo igie ná angi liwu bendi angi li dyam kangg nà. I nem ateng ná 'ipuupuu umbwo lè ìtaà. I gaa le: "Aleluya! Ipee ì kwu ke Unim, likorye ufe Unim angwu ù yi Atyetyan ù yi lè ikeb hwò puu, a tyung le ù yi Usu.
66019007	Mà lì yal gor lè ibubo he ungwu pee Unim, likorye 'ùnyong 'u fel ahwu Unwaa Utia Unim u shi 'ipam libee. Ungye-ma a kam 'uhwo mà.
66019008	Utia ana a ke-e 'ihwom 'ifung 'itaa-itaa ashi 'ı taa ngyal-ngyal-ngyal." Kihwom 'ifung ana 'i naa ke binunung abi bendi Unim be shi.
66019009	Udengell Unim a kung de-m le: "Fee igie anyin: Ki ba kwa 'inunung ka bendi puu abe bé ko ābe be he 'ipam libee ashin." A mbee de-m le: "Igie anyin, Unim ugyang na a kong āngi, ì yi 'igyang."
66019010	Mi keb anung he itang le mî fe udengell Unim, ukpor a de-m le: "Tyang, shi ná ye! Mi or mi sha aki Unim 'itaa ken ha amen lè bebwanaa, men abe ma kpē àshi Ujeso a kong. Unim ufe-ufe na 'ì yi le lì fe-e." Ashi Ujeso a kong na 'ì yi lìshī biwom àbi àbe be tye ugie 'isom Unim be kong.
66019011	Mi hà ndè lìshì lifung-atabe li buu ndor hwuo, kukaa-inyia 'ufung 'u fem naa há. Be maa ko undi angwu ù yi kwu há he 'ukaa-inyia ana lizen le Adell-dell lè 'igyang. U tang ushe or, u ndo 'ukye or he 'ukwo ahwu dell-dell.
66019012	Atong-shi ama a ndeb melang-melang-melang ná umor-inde. U shī bishilishi usu gbamm. Be fee lizen fe-e angi undi-iso a ngye ngi fem he ufe-gyang tyang ye.
66019013	A shī aliga uwulu angi anung a paa wu āngi. Lizen lima li shì le Igie Unim.
66019014	Ishogya puu angi he lifung-atabe i shī bihwom bifung bitaa-bitaa, pwom bekaa-inyia befung pwom he lè he item.
66019015	Kashwia benyin befee ake 'a nyin dan-dan-dan ka be-e lè he ungwu ake u gwu bendi abong puu abe be naa linaa ha ahe. U kwa utyuu usu he 'ubwo angwu be shi-e he 'índe a, teng ābe he ikeb-ikeb. U tem shor agbe ikwan he 'ania; kitaa ana na a tyung ingywo ikaa-ikaa Unim, Unim angwu ù yi lè ikeb hwò puu.
66019016	He aliga uwulu ama lè 'unaa 'uma, be fee lizen lima fe nya le: "Usu besu, Atyam bekaandi puu."
66019017	Mi hà ndè udengell Unim ù yi naa he libwee. A gaa kangg ko bipuuzabung puu lè linyun likwu ábi puu, u de bi le: "Mà be gbong ukem he 'ipam 'ikaandi Unim,
66019018	hè men mà zī akwom bendi abe Unim u be gwu. Mà be zī akwom besu, bekaandi ishogya, besu ikeb, bekaa-inyia lè abe be pwom ābe, mà be zī akwom bendi puu, mà ifee or, mà bebwaa or, mà bekaandi or, mà bebwani or."
66019019	Mi hà ndè inyia ibibi ana, lè besu igye anyin lè ishogya ibell be gbong ukem hè be bè ndo 'ukye ha undi angwu a pwom 'ukaa-inyia 'ufung ana lè ishogya ima.
66019020	A kwu inyia ana, u kwu undi-uman angwu u de le ufe u tya ugie 'isom Unim. Undi-uman ana, gbe he bikwele-uhwo abi leěti a maa shi he 'ushu inyia ana, na a maa lam bendi abe be bong fe ūfee inyia, be fe 'atelakpa ángi. A ma kwu inyia lè undi-uman ana bewum nyii tye gye he 'ubell 'inde ahwu 'ìndē lè ubi bı mor gedi-gedi-gedi kpamm ngyor igye.
66019021	Undi angwu a kwu he 'ukaa-inyia 'ufung a kung 'ashwia ake 'a be-e lè he ungwu gwu mbee 'igem ishogya ashi 'i maa pwom inyia. Bipuuzabung ana bi be zī akwom kwom 'itaa 'i ngie ābi.
66020001	Ashina 'i mbee gbe, mi hà ndè udengell Unim ususo u shul lè he lifung-atabe ba he itang, u shi lè ukukol 'úbēll ahwu 'ù yi lè likel ye kwu he 'ubwo, u mbee shì lè ashishilika angi a teb kangg.
66020002	A kwu ùshiı angwu ù yi lè há linde angwu be ko le Usetan, usu bibibi ana, a kung ashishilika ana fe ùshiı,
66020003	kwu-e nyii tye gye he 'ubell, u ngib āhwu, u tyell āhwu he-e ù kwu há he 'ubell aze asi lihwo 'ugbe 'adyong le he-e ù tem ndè 'ukwo lam bendi he abong puu ye kpamm aze ana a mbee. Nyong aze ana a mbee, be buu he tyang abwo he 'anwaa 'unyong zangg.
66020004	Mi hà ndè bidem 'usu gbamm. Bendi abe bè yi kwu há, Unim a ke be ikeb le bè tang ishe. Mi ndè bēnyōng bendi abe be ma gwu ābe likorye be bun gboo 'igyang ashi Ujeso a fem tyung ābe ashi 'ì yi igie Unim. Abin na be fē inyia ibibi or, ngwu 'atelakpa ángi or ye; be bong fē ūfee inyia he 'ushu or, ngwu he 'ubwo or ye. Be wum lè he lihwu be fel besu ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi aze asi lihwo 'adyong.
66020005	Aben na be be wum 'ushu. Bendi abe be teng, abe be ma hwō be waa wum ye kpamm aze asi lihwo 'adyong a mbee.
66020006	Ki ba kwa 'inunung ka bendi abe be be wum 'ushu. Bè yi ta-ta ke Unim. Lihwu 'ugbe 'afee lì tem shà ābe 'iwom ye. Be ba shang Unim befe lè Ujeso Ukristi. Be ba za 'usu ipel ha Ujeso Ukristi aze asi lihwo 'adyong.
66020007	Nyong aze asi lihwo 'adyong ana a gbe, be ba waa Usetan lè he igaadye.
66020008	Nyong a fem be he igye, u ba gya mbee bipi puu he igye i lam bendi he abong puu. Abong anyina na be ko le Ugog lè Umegog, u la ko ābe le bè be he 'iteng ken hè be bè ndo 'ukye ha Unim. Bendi bemen ana be go 'ugii a ná 'uyia lishor a.
66020009	Mi ndè be be dim utung hwul-hwul-hwul be mbee biteng puu he igye i, be kaa kel-kel-kel fe 'iteng ashi bendi Unim be gbong, ashi 'ì yi 'ubong ahwu 'u nyin Unim. Ukpor, kìndē 'i be lè he lifung-atabe be shī dim bendi-linaa bendi Unim puu.
66020010	Usetan ufe, ufe angwu a ma lam ābe, be ma kwu-e fe he 'ubell 'inde ahwu 'ìndē lè ubi bı mor gedi-gedi-gedi kpamm ngyor igye. Nya na inyia ibibi ana lè undi angwu u bè uman le u tya ugie 'isom Unim bè yi. Be kwa he 'utor ishu or, kusu or, ngyor igye kpamm.
66020011	Mi kung ndè 'idem 'usu 'ikaandi 'ifung-ifung ana, mi mbee ndè undi angwu ù yi kwu há. Nyong a be, itang lè 'usi bi nyòng mbee he 'ushu 'uma.
66020012	Mi kung ndè bendi abe be hwō, bekaandi or, bebwani or, bè yi naa he 'ushu 'idem 'usu ana, be buu ashia ndor ābe he 'ushu. Be mbee buu 'ushia 'ususo, ahwu 'ù yi 'ushia azen bendi abe bè yi lè likpan. Undi angwu a kwu he 'idem 'usu a maa ābe ushe keè he biwom abi be ma shi nya a na be fee nya he ashia ana.
66020013	Bendi abe be ma hwō he umbwo or, abe be hwō lihwu liyang-yang, be shì he 'usu behwu, be fem be he igye, undi u maa ābe ushe keè he biwom abi bi shi nya a na be fee nya ashia ana.
66020014	Undi a kwu lihwu lè 'usu behwu fe he 'ubell 'inde. Kubell 'inde ahwun na 'ù yi lihwu 'ugbe 'afee.
66020015	Undi uyang-yang angwu lizen lima lì yi he 'ushia azen bendi abe bè yi lè likpan ana ye, be kwá he tyang gya há 'ubell 'inde ana a.
66021001	Ukpi-ikwu lifung-atabe lè ukpi-ikwu igye, lè imbwo or, bi mbee. Mi hà ndè lifung-atabe lifufe lè igye ifufe.
66021002	Mi mbee ndè Ujeruselem ufufe angwu ù yi ushu Unim ná u shul be lè he 'ipi Unim be he itang. A ma bwee idem ná ungye ufufe u bwee gye libee nà.
66021003	Mi kung gyo lingmam li be lè he 'idem 'usu Unim, li ko fem he igye kangg le: "Mà gyo! Kung lè ha 'unyin i gye 'ushu, Unim ù yi he liwu bendigye. Unim ufe-gyang u kwa ipel ha abe, befe be be kwu bendi bema,
66021004	u shell ābe akye puu lè he ashi. Undi ù tem ba hwa ye, lityam lì tem ba ban undi ye, kùkye 'u tem be kwu ye, kutor 'u tem be kwu ye, likorye biwom bitim bi mbee."
66021005	Undi angwu a ma yi kwu nya he 'idem 'usu ana a hà de le: "Kanaa-anaa i, mi sha biwom puu bi fel bifufe." A mbee kung de-m le: "Fee igie anyin, likorye ì yi 'igyang, i kpè angi undi u fe lityam ha angi."
66021006	A mbee de-m le: "Kiyang-yang 'i mbee. Mì yi Alfa lè Ombeega, ashi 'i ze le, Ukpi-ikwu lè umbee-likel biwom puu. Undi uyang-yang angwu umbwo angwu u ke likpan u gyor he, mi ka he ahe 'uke lè he lishi umbwo.
66021007	Undi uyang-yang angwu a ngyor naa genn he-e ù yi lè ahwele, mi ba ka he biwom abina puu. Mi kwa Unim uma, ufe u kwu unwaa-gi.
66021008	Ukpor bendi abe be bi lityam ye, befe be shi ungwu ken ye, be shì biwom abi bı tel Unim, be gwu bendi, be tan akpela, be shi 'ukee, be shì ikem, be bè iman, bendi puu abe be shì bitaa biwom abina, umbee-likel ubell u ba kwa he 'ubell 'inde ahwu 'ìndē lè ubi bı mor gedi-gedi-gedi kpamm ngyor igye. Lihwu 'ugbe 'afee na lì yi ana."
66021009	Udengell ken lè he liwu idengell Unim idyong-ifee angi i ma yi lè ikem-undor idyong-ifee angi ì yi lè umbee-likel bingie bibibi bidyong-ifee ana, a be de-m le: "Be, mî tyung-a ungye ufufe angwu Unwaa Utia a kpebb."
66021010	Ukatia Kunyong Unim a be shí-m kpemm, udengell Unim a ma kpe-m gbe lè mi gye he líshi ukwell angwu a wee bedung kangg. A kung tyung mi ushu Unim angwu be ko le Ujeruselem ná u shul be lè he 'ipi Unim be he itang.
66021011	Kikung-gbo Unim 'i taa nya. Ushu Unim u taa ngyal-ngyal-ngyal ná 'ukor ahwu 'u ngbebb 'unung be ko le udaimon 'u taa nà.
66021012	Uging uma u wee bedung gye he 'usi kangg. U shì lè ingwu likong lihwo lè ngi ifee. Idengell Unim lihwo lè ngi ifee i kwa kang ingwu likong lihwo lè ngi ifee ana. He ingwu likong be fee azen bikwu-lihwan bendi Izwell lihwo lè bi bifee fe nya.
66021013	Be ma fe ingwu likong ikie he 'igie 'iyang-yang; ikie lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı fem, ikie lè he 'igie ashi libwee lı ngwee, ikie lè he lizen, ikie lè he limbell.
66021014	Be fe lìshií uging ana he likwu akor lihwo lè ngi afee. He likwu akor ana, be fee azen bebwaa-isom Unwaa Utia, bendi lihwo lè be befee, fe nya.
66021015	Udengell Unim angwu u kong ha ami a ma yi lè ùkwán angwu be keè 'iwom angwu be shǐ-e lè igold. A ma kam le u keè ushu lè ingwu likong lè uging.
66021016	Bègie ushu lè likwob lima bi ma yi bizang. A keè bègie, likwob lè bedung, bi ma yi bizang, bi ma yi ilamba asi adyong 'ugbe lihwo lè 'ugbe 'adyong.
66021017	A mbee keè uging or titi. Ūkee udengell Unim ana a ma yi he ūkee angwu bendigye, abee asi lihwo lè abee lihwo lè ngi adyong-ken.
66021018	Be ma kung akor angi a ngbebb 'unung, a taa, be ko le idaimon a tye uging, be kung igold inunung tye ushu ı taa ná 'inde-ushu nà.
66021019	Lìshií ushu ana be ma fe akor anunung lihwo lè ngi afee bitaa atyetye-atyetye. Ukpi-ikwu 'ukor 'u taa ná 'inde-ushu, be ko āhwu le udaimon. Utepwom 'ukor 'u taa kil-kil-kil, be ko āhwu le usafaya. Lekie 'ukor 'u taa ìnìm ikwun gbamm, be ko āhwu le aget. Lende 'ukor 'u taa ná ùnìm abia akwun, be ko āhwu le emered.
66021020	Ledyong 'ukor 'u shi seke-seke, be ko āhwu le oniks. Ledyong-ken 'ukor 'u bung gbuu, be ko āhwu le ukaniliyan. Ledyong-ifee 'ukor 'u shì ùnìm aligem-aligem, be ko āhwu le ukwots. Ledyong-ikie 'ukor 'u shì ùnìm ukwun-ukwun ngyashii, be ko āhwu le beril. Ledyong-inde 'ukor 'u bung ná 'ugbe umogol 'ubwaa, be ko āhwu le utopaz. Lihwo 'ukor 'u taa ùnìm ukwun kangg, be ko āhwu le ukrisopreiz. Lihwo leken 'ukor 'u taa kil-kil-kil, be ko āhwu le ujasint. Lihwo lefee 'ukor 'u taa bell 'ukwun lè 'ubwaa, be ko āhwu le ametist.
66021021	Be kung akor lihwo lefee angi a ngbebb 'unung kangg, be ko le upel, shi ushu ana ingwu likong lihwo lefee. Ugbaakwo há ushu ana, be kung igold igyang angi inunung a shǐ-e, ı taa ná 'inde-ushu nà.
66021022	Ki ma yi lè ushom nya angwu be lè fe Unim há ye, likorye Unim Atyetyan angwu ù yi lè ikeb puu befe lè Unwaa Utia ana na bè yi ushom ana, bè yi mbee 'ipi nya puu.
66021023	Ki maa fong bendi lè libwee or, ngwu 'ufell or ye, likorye 'ikung-gbo Unim 'i taa nya. Unwaa Utia ana ugyang nà ù yi 'ikung-gbo ushu umen ana.
66021024	Kikung-gbo ushu ana na 'ı be taa tyung bendi abong puu 'ukwo ahwu be gbe. Besu igye be be tem lè bingbebb bibell puu lè ifem ibell be nya.
66021025	Ingwu likong ima i ba ngyor ndor hwuo kpamm, be ba shā āngi ye, likorye 'ùsū 'u ba gya há ye.
66021026	Be ba tem ba lè bingbebb puu lè ifem puu lè he abong puu he igye i ba nya.
66021027	Ukpor 'ibibi 'i ba gba nya ye. Bendi abe be shì bibibi biwom abi Unim a tel, be mbee bè iman, be ba ngwee há afee ye. Bendi abe bè yi lè azen he 'ushia Unwaa Utia ahwu be fee azen bendi abe bè yi lè likpan, befe-befe na be be ngwee há afee.
66022001	Udengell Unim ana a tyung mi umbwo ukaandi angwu ù yi lè umbwo angwu u ke likpan, ù yi udang-udang ná 'ukor ahwu be ko le ukristal. U kò ba lè he 'idem 'usu Unim befe lè Unwaa Utia ana,
66022002	kò ta lè 'udyan ubo ukaandi angwu a gbe nya he ushu. Ùkwán angwu u ke likpan u shi naa he ufaa umbwo ana indi hen indi hen. Ùkwán ana u wum bitaa agbe lihwo lè bi bifee he lize. U wum bitaa agbe atyetye he 'ufell 'uyang-yang. Ashia ama à yi usi angwu u mbee bendi-angmam mbee abong puu.
66022003	Kiwom 'iyang-yang ashi 'i ban he ashi Unim 'i ba kwa nya ye. Kidem 'usu Unim befe lè Unwaa Utia na 'ı be kwu nya, bendi abe be shi-e aki ama be be fe-e nya.
66022004	Befe be ba nda 'ushu 'uma nwongg, be fee lizen lima fe be he 'ushu.
66022005	Kùsū 'ù tem ba gya ye. Kì tem ba fong bendi lè bimor-inde or, ngwu libwee or ye, likorye Atyetyan Unim na u be kwu 'ikung-gbo 'ibell, befe be be zī 'ùsù ngyor igye kpamm.
66022006	Udengell Unim a de-m le: "Igie anyin ì yi 'igyang, i kpè le undi ù fe lityam ha angi. Unim Atyetyan angwu a ke abe be tye ugie 'isom 'ima Ukatia Kunyong angwu u ke be ikeb angi be tye ugie, a som i-mi, udengell uma, le mì be tyung bendi aki ama biwom abi baale bì be shi."
66022007	Ujeso a de le: "Mà gyo! Baale mı be. Ki ba kwa 'inunung ka undi angwu a fe igie angi i be lè ha Unim, be fee fe he 'ushia ahwun."
66022008	Mi Ujon, mi-gyang mi gyo biwom abin lè atyung agi, mi mbee ndè bi lè ashi agi. Nyong mi gyo ābi, mi ndè bi, mi keb he itang he abee udengell Unim angwu a tyung mi ábi le mî fe-e,
66022009	ukpor a de-m le: "Tyang, shi ná ye! Mi or mi sha aki Unim 'itaa ken ha amen lè bendi bēmen abe be tye ugie 'isom Unim, lè bendi puu abe be fe igie angi be fee he 'ushia ahwun a. Kee-kee fe Unim ufe-ufe."
66022010	A mbee de-m le: "Igie angi Unim a kong, be fee he 'ushia ahwun, ndè le wo ndyell āngi lè ha bendi ye, likorye 'ùnyong ahwu biwom bimen i bı be shi 'u fel kpee-kpee.
66022011	Undi angwu a ndè gia le u sha bibibi a, tyang he ù hâ shi bibibi, angwu a ndè gia le u sha biwom ibia a, tyang he ù hâ shi ābi. Undi angwu ù yi ununung he ashi Unim, ù gye 'ushu shi ashi 'ì yi 'inunung. Undi angwu ù yi undi Unim, ù gye 'ushu fe Unim."
66022012	Ujeso a de le: "Mà gyo! Baale mı be. Mi ba ka undi ashi 'i keè 'itaa a shi.
66022013	Mì yi Alfa lè Ombeega, ashi 'i ze le Ukpi-ikwu lè umbee-likel biwom puu. Mì yi 'ikwu biwom puu, mi shi lìshī biwom puu."
66022014	Ki ba kwa 'inunung ka bendi abe be to inditen ibell ndor itaa-itaa. Befe na be kpè abe be zī agbe ukwan angwu u ke likpan, be mbee kpè le be gbà he ungwu likong ūshù Unim.
66022015	Ukpor bendi abe be shi 'igbang ná ibua, bendi 'ukee, abe akpela, abe be gwu bendi, abe ikem, lè abe be bè iman pwom ungwu, bendi puu abe be shì biwom abin, be ba gya he afee ushu ana ye, be ngyor kwa he igye.
66022016	Ujeso a mbee de le: "Mi na mi som udengell ugi hwaa lè men le ù bun biwom abin he 'uhwo awu bendi abongale. Mì yi igia Usu Udebid a. Mi mbee shi ukpen ashi-liti angwu u taa."
66022017	Ukatia Kunyong Unim befe lè ungye ufufe be de le: "Be!" Undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo igie anyin, ufe or u de le: "Be!" Undi angwu umbwo angwu u ke likpan u gyor he, ù be kpe-e 'uke.
66022018	Mi Ujon, mi tuu undi uyang-yang angwu a gyo igie angi Unim a kong be fee he 'ushia ahwun 'ubwo he 'utyung le, gbe a kung 'iwom 'isuso-isuso fe ipel ha igie anyin, Unim u kung bingie bibibi abi be fee gbe lè bi he 'ushia ahwun, fá he ipel ha bima.
66022019	Gbe undi a waa 'iwom tyang lè hell lè he igie anyin, Unim u waa he tyang lè hell, u bong he le ù zī agbe ukwan angwu u ke likpan or, ngwu ù bong he le ù ngwee he ushu uma, ufe Unim or ye. Ùkwán lè ushu ana, be fee gbe lè bi he 'ushia ahwun.
66022020	Undi angwu a de le igie anyin ì yi 'igyang, a de le: "Kigyang-igyang, baale mı be." Kì ngyor ná a kong. Atyetyan Ujeso hā be!
66022021	Atyetyan Ujeso ù hā ke bendi Unim puu 'ukwun.
